1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na sa twa s+ya pa ra mAr+tha na sa gI ti/ bod skad du/
1b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ 'jam
1b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul
2a1(rgyud 'bum): dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ dpa' bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// rdo rje
2a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal/ / rnam rgyas pad+ma dkar po'i spyan// pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal// rang gi
2a3(rgyud 'bum): lag gi rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa// khro gnyer ldan pa'i rlabs la sogs// lag na
2a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mtha' yas pa/ / dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po// dpa' bo 'jigs rung gzugs can dang /
2b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba// rang gi lag gis gser byed pa// shes rab thabs dang snying rje che// 'gro don byed pa rnams kyi mchog/
2b2(rgyud 'bum): dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can// khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa// sangs rgyas 'phrin las byed pa'i mgon// lus btung rnams
2b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis lhan cig tu/ / mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar ba byas gyur nas//
2b4(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra bas
2b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon rdzogs pa'i/ / byang chub ji ltar bdag thob bgyi// nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrug cing // mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can kun
3a1(rgyud 'bum): la sman pa dang / / bla med 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// bcom ldan ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i bla mas bshad du gsol
3a2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen/ / dbang po bsam pa rig pa mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku// gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag/ 'jam dpal ye shes
3a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' yi/ / ye shes sku snga rang byung ba// don zab don ni rgya che zhing // don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// mtshan yang dag par
3a4(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa mchog/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang yang yang yang
3a5(rgyud 'bum): gsung ba gang / / rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'dir// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang // dpag med rnams kyis dges pa yi// gang yang yang dag rab gsungs pa/
3a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag kyang 'di ni gzung bar bgyi// bsam pa brtan pos nges 'byung bar// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi// gsang 'dzin ji ltar bdag 'gyur bgyi// nyon
3b1(rgyud 'bum): mongs ma lus gsal ba dang / / mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yi// khyad par ji bzhin rab bshad 'tshal// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis// de bzhin gshegs la de skad du/
3b2(rgyud 'bum): gsol btab thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang dge/ ring zhing yangs pa
3b3(rgyud 'bum): brkyang mdzad de/ / 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa// 'jig rten rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis//
3b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// gsang dbang la ni slar gsungs pa// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // lag na rdo rje khyod legs so// 'gro la phan po'i don du khyod/
3b5(rgyud 'bum): snying rje che dang ldan gyur te// 'jam dpal ye shes sku yi mtshan// yang dag brjod pa don che ba// dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so//
3b6(rgyud 'bum): de phyir 'di ni nges bshad bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bcom ldan de ni legs zhes gsol// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// gsang sngags mtha' dag rigs chen po// gsang
3b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags rig pa 'chang ba'i rigs/ / rigs gsum las ni rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rigs
4a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang / / gtsug tor chen po'i rigs chen no// gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing // gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // skyes pa med pa'i chos can 'di// tshig gi bdag
4a2(rgyud 'bum): pos tshigs bcad gsungs/ / a A/ i I/ u U/ e e/ oM au/ a aHs+thi ti hri di/ dz+nyA na mUrti ra ha~M bud+d+ho bud+d+hA naM/ t+r+ya d+ha bar+t+ti nA~M/ oM badz+ra tAM k+Sha duHkhats+tshe da/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na mUr+t+ta ye/
4a3(rgyud 'bum): dz+nyA na kA ya/ wA gI shwa ra/ a ra pa tsa nA ya te na maH/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a yig byung // a yig yige 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen 'gyur med dam pa yin/
4a4(rgyud 'bum): srog chen po ste skye med// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed//
4a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mchod pa chen po khro ba che// khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che//
4a6(rgyud 'bum): chags pa thams cad sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po mgu ba che// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// kha dog che zhing lus bong che// ming yang che zhing rgya che ba// dkyil 'khor chen
4a7(rgyud 'bum): po yangs pa yin/ / shes rab chen po mtshon 'chang ba// nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog/ grags chen snyan grags chen po ste// snang ba chen po gsal ba che// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang //
4b1(rgyud 'bum): dbyings 'di thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rdo rje sems
4b2(rgyud 'bum): rapa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ de bzhin
4b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa chen po'i skyes bu'i gzugs 'di/ de bzhin
4b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs so/ / byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid zhal gsum pa lta bur/
4b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ ched du
4b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni rab byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa'o// de nas bcom ldan
4b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa spros pa de kho
5a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po/ / thog ma med pa spros med bdag/ de bzhin nyid dag dag pa'i bdag/ yang dag smra zhing tshig gzhan med// ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// gnyis su med pa
5a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med smras/ / yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// kun tu 'gro ba don yod bgrod// de bzhin gshegs pa yid ltar mgyogs//
5a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor los sgyur ba stobs po che// tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu chen gces par 'dzin pa ste// tshul chen gzhan gyi 'dren
5a4(rgyud 'bum): pa min/ / tshig rje tshig bdag smra mkhas pa// tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas// tshig bden bden par smra ba dang // bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong // bes ru so sor 'dren pa ste//
5a5(rgyud 'bum): nges 'byung sna tshogs nges 'byung ba// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa// dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad// 'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob// bsil bar gyur pa gos pa
5a6(rgyud 'bum): med/ / rigs pa dang ni rkang par ldan// bder gshegs 'jig rten rig pa mchog/ bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar gnas pa// bya ba byas
5a7(rgyud 'bum): pa skam sar gnas/ / ye shes 'ba' zhig nges byung ba// shes rab mtshon chas rnam 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa mchog/ chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal//
5b1(rgyud 'bum): legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po// don grub grub pa'i kun rtog ni// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad// chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes// bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams
5b2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs/ / ye shes ye shes 'byung gnas che// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// tshogs gnyis tshogs dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa kun rgyal rnal 'byor can// bsam gtan bsam byas blo yi bdag/ so/
5b3(rgyud 'bum): so rang rig mi g.yo ba// mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag cod pan can// spyan lnga chags pa med pa 'chang //
5b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po// sangs rgyas sras po dam pa mchod// shes rab srid 'byung skye gnas te// chos kyi skye gnas srid mthar byed// gcig pu sra mkhregs rdo rje'i bdag/ 'phral du bskyed pa 'gro
5b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bdag/ nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shes rab ye shes me bo che// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// ye shes snang ba lam me ba// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal
5b6(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug/ nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gro ba
5b7(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i mig dang ldan/ / sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po// mchod 'os rjod 'os drang srong che// rigs gsum 'chang ba gsang sngags ldan// dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo dkon
6a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog gsum 'dzin pa/ / theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal// 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// rdo rje 'jigs byed/
6a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs/ mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// ha la sa la gdong brgya pa// gshin rje mthar byed bgegs kyi rgyal//
6a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snying // sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che// rdo rje skye gnas rdo rje'i dbang // rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba// mi g.yo ral pa gcig bsgyings pa// glang chen ldam
6a4(rgyud 'bum): pa rlon pa 'chang / / drag chen hA hA zhes sgrogs pa// hi haM zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gad mo chen po gad rgyangs can// rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che//
6a5(rgyud 'bum): rdorje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje gtum po dga' ba che// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM gi gzugs// rdo rje mnga' yi mtshon 'chang ba// rdo rje ral gris gcod mdzad pa// rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can// rdo rje gcig pu
6a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yul sel ba/ / rdo rje 'bar ba gtsigs pa'i mig/ mgo skyes rdo rje 'bar ba ste// rdo rje 'beb pa 'bebs pa che// mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig/ rdo rje'i spu ni myu gu lus// rdo rje'i spu ri lus gcig pu/
6a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rtse mo sen mos brtsams// rdo rje snying po pags pa mkhregs// rdo rje 'phreng thogs dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gad rgyangs hA spangs par sgrogs// yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// 'jam
6b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbyangs ni sgra che ba/ / 'jig rten gsum gcig sgra chen po// nam mkha'i khams kyis mthar thug sgra// sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog/ yang dag med de de bzhin nyid// yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med// stong nyid
6b2(rgyud 'bum): smra ba'i khyu mchog ste/ / zab cing rgya che'i sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung ste sgra chen po// chos kyi gaN+DI sgra bo che// rab tu mi gnas mya ngan 'das// phyogs bcu chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs bzang dam pa ste/
6b3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gzugs can yid rang bzhin// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po// snang ba med cing che bar grags// khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'phags lam shin
6b4(rgyud 'bum): tu mtho la gnas/ / chos kyi tog ni cher byung ba// 'jig rten gsum po gcig gzhon lus// gnas bstan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ gsum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes//
6b5(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon 'jig rten yon tan shes// 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med// mgon skyob 'jig rten gsum khyab pa// skyabs dang skyobs pa bla na med// nam mkha' khyab pa longs spyod pa// thams cad mkhyen/
6b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ye shes 'tsho// ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho pha rol son// ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can// yang dag rdzogs pa'i
6b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas brgyan/ / sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal zhi// gsum mtha' mtha' yas grol gsum pa// sgrib pa thams cad nges par grol// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs dri ma
7a1(rgyud 'bum): @#/ kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtog par gnas// sems can kun gyi gru chen po// yon tan mod can rnams kyi thog/ lhag sa kun las rnam grol ba// nam mkha'i lam la
7a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ / yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems can kun don byed// pan thegs sems can
7a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyes gshin pa/ / bzang ngan shes pa dus shes pa// khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan// dus shes sems can dbang po shes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes//
7a4(rgyud 'bum): chos shes rab bzhi bkra shis 'byung // bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// grags pa dpal mo snyan pa dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' sngon che// dga' ba chen po rol pa che// bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs/
7a5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu dga' ba grags bdag dpal// mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste// skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os// rab mchog 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra// 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po// gtsug phud phung pu ral
7a6(rgyud 'bum): pa can/ / ral pa mgo re cod pan ldan// gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i thod// mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang // tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/ dka' thub mthar
7a7(rgyud 'bum): phyin dka' thub che/ / khrus ldan ko'u ta ma mchog/ bram ze tshangs par tshangs pa rig/ tshangs pa mya ngan 'das pa thob// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid// mya ngan 'das zhi mya ngan 'das/
7b1(rgyud 'bum): legs par nges 'byung mthar byed pa// bde ba sdub bsngal mthar byed gnas// 'dod chags bral ba brtags pa zad// thub pa med pa depe med pa// gsal min mi snang gos par med/ cha med kun 'gro khyab pa po//
7b2(rgyud 'bum): za mo sa bon zag pa med// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa// shin tu rab sang rnams sad bdag/ thams cad ye shes kun rig mchog/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das// ye shes
7b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med tshul 'chang ba/ / rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med//
7b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi dbang phyug smra ba che// smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal// smra ba'i dam pa mchog gi gnas// smra ba'i seng ge thub pa med// kun tu lta ba mchog tu dga'/
7b5(rgyud 'bum): brjid 'phreng ldan blta na sdug/ 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u// snang ba gsal bar byed pa'i 'od// sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing //
7b6(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs nad kyi dgra che ba// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng // 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig
7b7(rgyud 'bum): yangs pa ste/ / byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun dga' dngos po 'dzin
8a1(rgyud 'bum): @#sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/ rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag
8a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje kun 'chang mnga' bdag ste/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtsho dang ldan// rdo rje nyim snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od
8a3(rgyud 'bum): chags bral dang po chags pa che/ / kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin
8a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang // che ba sangs rgyas rig pa 'chang // rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// rnam par dag pa 'gyur med mchog/ theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod/ mtshon ma chen po rdo rje chos/
8a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zab mo dzi na dzi ka/ rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams thams cad rnam par brgyan// rnam dang dag pa bdag med chos// yang dag ye shes zla snying 'od// sgyu 'phrul dram/
8a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor che// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ ma lus rdo rje skyil krung ste// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang // kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang // sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po
8a7(rgyud 'bum): / / sna tshogs sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos de sna tshogs don// chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang ba// skad cig gcig la shes/
8b1(rgyud 'bum): rab che// chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang // chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog yang dag mtha'// mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang // sangs rgyas kun
8b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi mngon sum pa/ / ye shes me lce 'od rab gsal// 'dod pa'i don sgrub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba// mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed// nyon mongs
8b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yul du gcig dpa' ba/ / mi shes dgra yi dregs pa 'joms// zla ni sgeg 'char dngal dang ldan// dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa'i dbyug pa brgya bskyod cing // rkang pa bskyod pas gar byed
8b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang la// nam mkha' khyab par gang byed pa// rkang pa gcig gi mthil gnon pa// sa yi snying po mthil la gnas// tshangs pa'i sgo nga'i rtse mo gnon// rkang mthe ba sen mo la gnas
8b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// rnam rig sna tshogs rang bzhin dor// sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan// dngos po ma lus don dga' ba// stong pa nyid dga'
8b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi blo/ / srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs 'das// srid pa gsum po dga' ba che// dag pa sprin dkar bzhin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ki'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes//
8b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags chen po sen mo'i 'od// zur phud bzang po mthon kha mchog/ sgra mchog mthon ka chen po 'chang // nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan 'jig rten
9a1(rgyud 'bum): khams brgya kun bstod pa/ / rdzu 'phrul rkang pa stobs chen ldan// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang // dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin d+hal// byang chub yan lag me tog dga'/
9a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtsho// lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems can kun la shas cher chags// nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med// sems
9a3(rgyud 'bum): can kun gyi yid las skyes/ / sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don shes// sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de nyid shes// rnam dag phung po
9a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga 'chang ba/ / thams cad nges 'byung mtha' la gnas// thams cad nges par 'byung ba mkhas// thams cad nges 'byung lam la gnas// thams cad nges 'byung ston pa po// yan lag bcu gnyis srid
9a5(rgyud 'bum): bton/ / dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang // bden pa 'i tshul gyi rnam pa can// rigs pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa ban+d+ha drug rig/ rnam pa nyi shus byang
9a6(rgyud 'bum): chub pa/ rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ dpag med sangs rgyas sprul pa yi// sku yi mtha' ni rnam sgom pa// skad cig thams cad mngon par rtogs// sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna
9a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs thabs tshul gyi/ / 'gro ba'i don gyi rnam dbyed can/ leg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung ni/ leg pa gcig gi 'bras phung gnas// nyon mongs khams rnams rnam dag bdag/ las kyi khams rnams zad
9b1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// nyon mongs nye nyon kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa rab spangs pa// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/
9b2(rgyud 'bum): 'du shes thams cad rab spangs don// rnam shes don ni 'gog pa 'chang // sems can kun gyi yid kyi yul// sems can kun gyi yid gnas pa// sems can kun gyi yid nang gnas// de dag sems dang mnyam nyid
9b3(rgyud 'bum): son/ / sems can kun yid tshim par byed// sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba// grub mtha' 'khrul pa ldan pa yin// 'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo// kun don
9b4(rgyud 'bum): yon tan gsum gyi bdag/ dus gsum phung po lnga yi don// skad gcig thams cad rnam sgom pa// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang // lus med sku ste sku
9b5(rgyud 'bum): yi mchog/ sku ni bye ba rnam par 'gyed// gzugs rnams ma lus kun tu ston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// gsang sngags skye gnas g
9b6(rgyud 'bum): a med/ / gsang sngags chen po rigs gsum pa// gsang sngags don kun skyes pa po// thig le chen po yi ge med// stong pa chen po yi ge lnga// thig le stong pa yi ge drug/ rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med/
9b7(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// cha med cha ldan las 'das pa// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang // bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing // ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa// ting 'dzin sku ste sku yi mchog
10a1(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal/ / sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa//
10a2(rgyud 'bum): lha yi dbang po lha yi lha// lha min dbang po sbyin byed bdag/ lha yi bla ma 'chi med dbang // rab 'joms rab 'joms dbang phyug po// srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i tha// 'jig
10a3(rgyud 'bum): rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa/ / chos kyi sbyin bdag cheb po// byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos// shes rab ral gri mnga' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel//
10a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo bdud dgra bdud 'dul ba// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa mthar byed pa// bdud dpung thams cad pham par byed// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas// rtag tu
10a5(rgyud 'bum): rim gro bya ba'i 'os/ / bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod// nam mkha' mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste/
10a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab kyi ni de nyid thob// bdag rig gzhan rig thams
10a7(rgyud 'bum): cad pa/ / kun la phan pa gang zag mchog/ 'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin pa'i bdag/ phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa// 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas
10b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi mchog/ nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi// don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten gsum gyi bskal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor pa kun byed pa// 'jam dpal dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog mchog
10b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud/ / yang dag mthar gyur khod la 'dud// stong nyid snying po khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud//
10b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dgas pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyed la 'dud// sangs rgyas snang la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas gsung ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas
10b4(rgyud 'bum): thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ / dngos med las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// /
10b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gar mdzad khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku khyod la 'dud do// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
10b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang / 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa yongs su dge pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o// khyod kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / rab tu dang ba dang / mgu ba chen po yang
10b7(rgyud 'bum): dag par bskyed pa'i don dang / sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / yongs su ma dag pa'i sa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsod
11a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang na chen bya rnams yongs su rdzongs pa dang / yongs su dag par phyi dang / than med pa'i don lhag par martogs bslas par rtogs pa'i byang dang / thob thob pa'i phyir dang / ji thong ban
11a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i don du yang bdag gis bstan pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bshad pa dang / rnam par bkrol ba dang / rnam par bya ba dang / rab tu gsal bar
11a3(rgyud 'bum): byas pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni ngas khyod kyi rgyud la sngags kyi chos nyid thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 'di ni 'khor mo dang po'i rjes su bsngags pa'o//
11a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdorje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni shin tu yongs su dag pa yongs su byung ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / sgra dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// de bzhin
11a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub pa'o/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi
11a6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'o/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad pham par byed pa'o// stobs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i stobs su gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnams kyi thams
11a7(rgyud 'bum): cad mkhyen pa'o/ / chos thams cad kyi lung ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par kun chub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
11b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu skyes pa'o// lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing ngo // theg pa chen po'i rab tu gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i
11b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung khung ngo / / 'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o// rnam par grol ba rnams kyi brtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi skyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o//
11b3(rgyud 'bum): / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o// phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'o// mu stegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'joms pa'o// bdud bzhi'i stobs dang dpung dang sde rnams kyi pham
11b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa'o// nges par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin no//
11b5(rgyud 'bum): sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no// lus dang / ngag dang / yid mngon par sbyor pa rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro// yang dag par sbyor ba thams cad kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba'o// nyon mongs pa dang 'a ba'i
11b6(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spong ba'o/ / sgrib pa thams cad kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'ching ba thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'o// lhag ma thams cad kyi thar pa'o// sems nye bar 'phro ba thams cad kyi zhi ba'o//
11b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// rgud pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms pa'o// ngan song gi sgra thams cad kyi 'gebs pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam dam pa'o// 'khor ba'i 'kha/
12a1(rgyud 'bum): ro'i rab tu mi 'jug pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo'i rab tu bskor ba // de bzhin gshegs pa bstan pa'i gdugs dang // rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rab tu bsteng po'o// dam pa'i chos na
12a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lhag par gnas pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sngags kyi sgor spyod pa rnams kyi myung du thub pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyis sgom par ldag par rdzogs pa'o//
12a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su med pa so sor rtogs pa sgom pa mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi ston pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi bsted pa'o// yongs su dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams
12a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ / yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i sems so sor rtogs pa'o// mtshan yang
12a5(rgyud 'bum): dag par brjod pa 'di ni ji srid sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ro/ / 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// gzhan yang lagan rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang /
12a6(rgyud 'bum): dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dpa dang yid kyis kun tu spyad pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o// ngan 'tsha
12a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bzlog pa'o/ / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// mi khom pa brgyad du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// 'jigs pa chen po brgyad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o//
12b1(rgyud 'bum): rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par sel ba'o// mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rnam par sel bar byed pa'o// ltas ngan pa dang bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// bdud kyi dgra'i las thams cad thag
12b2(rgyud 'bum): ring du byed pa'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'phel bar byed pa'o// tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa/
12b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / ngar 'dzin pa thams cad nges par 'joms par byed pa'o// sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o// byang chub sem
12b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o// phyag rgya dang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba
12b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par bskyed pa'o/ / bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o// nad med pa dang / stobs dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o//
12b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal dang / dge ba dang / zhi ba legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa'o// grags pa dang / snyan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / bstod pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o// nang dang 'jig
12b7(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o/ / shin tu dab pa rnams kyi shin tu dag pa'o// shin tu gtsang ba rnams kyi shin tu gtsang ba'o// shin tu 'byor ldan pa rnams kyi shin tu 'byor ldanan/
13a1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu bkra shis pa rnams kyi shin tu bkra shis pa'o// skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi skabs so// gnas 'dod pa rnams kyi gnas so// skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyo pa'o// da
13a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no/ / gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling du gyur pa'o// rten 'dod pa rnams kyi bla na med pa'i rten du gyur pa'o// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu 'gro ba rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o// nang
13a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal po chen por gyur pa'o/ / blang bar bya ba dang dor bar bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dbye ba'i phyir shes rab tu gyur pa'o// lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa'i smag rum thams cad
13a4(rgyud 'bum): bsal ba'i phyir ye shes kyi snang bar gyur pa'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'o// 'jam dpal gyi ye shes kyi sku rab tu
13a5(rgyud 'bum): thob pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa'o/ / spyan lnga rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa'i ye shes gzigs par gyur pa'o// zang zing dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba
13a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o/ / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis bcu rab tu thob par gyur pa'o// gnyis kyi chos dang thal
13a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid do/ / lhag par sgro 'dogs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su dag
13b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid do/ / lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing ma lus pa nges par sel ba nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni
13b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid kyi don dang ming yang dag par 'dzin pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis chos thams cad brjod du med par gyur pa'o/ / 'di ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa
13b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis so/ / gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa spyad pas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa
13b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa/ ma tshang ba med pa/ dum bu ma yin pa/ tshigs su bcad pa dang /
13b5(rgyud 'bum): tshig dang / yi ge 'di rnams nyid kyis nyi ma so sor dus gsum du 'dzin par byed pa dang / rjod par byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / gzhan
13b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams la'ang dus ji lta bar rgyas par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang / mtshan gyi don gzhan dang gzhan re re zhing yang 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku mngon du byas te yid rtse gcig pas sgom par byed pa dang / lhag
13b7(rgyud 'bum): par mos pa dang / de kho na yid la byed pa dag gis kun nas sgo'i gnas pas gnas pa dang // chos thams cad so sor rtogs pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa dang / rnyog pa med pa dang / shes rab kyis rjes su 'bigs pa dang /
14a1(rgyud 'bum): dad pas yang dag par bzod pa de la ni dus gsum du dus med par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'dus te yang dag par gshegs shing yang dag par phyin nas chos
14a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sgo rnams nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ / bdag nyid sgom pa nye bar ston par byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi rgyung la yang dag par byin gyis
14a3(rgyud 'bum): rlob par byed do/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su 'dzin pas kyang 'dzin par byed do// chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa'ang nye bar sgrub par byed do// dgra bcom pa dang / nyan pos
14a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos la sdug pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po'ang nye bar ston par byed do// gdul dka' ba gdul ba po rnams kyang jo bo'i rgyal po chen po dang / rdo rje 'cha
14a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su skyob par gyur pa gzugs sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis mdangs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid zil gyis mi gnon pa nyid dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / mngon
14a6(rgyud 'bum): par rtogs pa dang / dkyil 'khor rnams che bar ston par byed do// sngags dang / reg pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud dang / dgra brir rgol ba dang / gnan gyis mi
14a7(rgyud 'bum): thub pa chen po thams cad kyang mtshan mo nyin mor bcas par skad cig so sor spyod pa thams cad dang / lam rnams su'ang srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / nyeng ba
14b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / drag po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / kun 'byed gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / smin drug gi bu dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lga dang / lus ngag
14b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'phrog ma dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du mtshan mo dang nyin mor bcas pa 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'dug pa dang / gnyid
14b3(rgyud 'bum): log pa dang / gnyid sad pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang / gcig pur gnas pa dang / skye bo mang po'i nang du song ba dang / ji srid grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang
14b4(rgyud 'bum): ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang na gnas pa dang / dbang po'i phur pa dang / sgo khang dang / lam srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / grong khyer gyi bar dang / tshong khang gi nang du gnas
14b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / ji srid khang stong dang / ri dang / dgon pa dang / chu klung dang / dur khrod dang / nags tshang tshing du nye bar son pa dang / 'bags pa dang / ma 'bags pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa rtag
14b6(rgyud 'bum): tu thams cad kyi rnam pa thams du mchog tu srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyin mo dang mtshan mo mchog tu bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang lha dang / klu dang
14b7(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dag / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / gzhan yang gang dag gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / ma mo dang /
15a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi bdag po rnams dang / gang yang ma mo bdun po rnams dang / gang yang gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo dang / sha ma mo rnams te/ de rnams thams cad lhan cig 'thun par sde dang
15a2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis spyod lam dang lam rnams su'ang mchog tu srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sla ba byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de'i lus la mdangs dang stobs rab tu 'jug par byed
15a3(rgyud 'bum): do/ / nad med pa dang / stobs dang / tshe 'phel ba'ang nye bar sgrub par byed do// 'di ni 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rjes su bsngags pa bcu dgu pa'o// gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang mtshan yang dag par brjod
15a4(rgyud 'bum): pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di nyi ma so sor ma nyams pa yang dag par blangs te mgrin par gnas pa lan gsum du kha ton du byed pa dang / glegs bam du chud pa klog par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed
15a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te/ de'i gzugs kyi rjes su sems par byed pa dang / yang de'i gzugs kyi rjes su bsam gtan byed pa de nyid sprul
15a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku yis yun mi ring ba nyid las gdul bya'i dbang nye bar gzung nas mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang lhan cig/
15a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa nam mkha'i mthil na bzhugs pa rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// sems dpa' chen po de'i skye ba ji ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro dang ngan so ltung ba'i 'jigs pa byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngan
15b1(rgyud 'bum): du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / yul mtha' 'khob kyi skye bor skye bar mi 'gyur ro// dbang po dman par mi 'gyur ro// dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi 'gyur ro//
15b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / des bstan pa'i chos spong ba dang lkog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro// lha tshe ring po rnams su skye
15b3(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / mu ge dang / nad dang / mtshon gyi bskal pa rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// snyigs ma lnga'i dus rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / dgra'i 'jigs
15b4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rgud pa dang dbul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ma bsngags pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa dang / smod pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / grags pa ngan
15b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / skye ba bzang po dang / rigs dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun nas mdzes par gyur pa dang / gzugs dang / kha dog yang dag
15b6(rgyud 'bum): par ldan par 'gyur ro/ / 'jigs rten pa rnams kyi sdug pa dang / yid dang la 'babs pa dang / 'grogs na mchog tu bde ba dang / mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mdzes pa dang /
15b7(rgyud 'bum): skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa dang / tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// longs spyod che ba dang / 'khor mang ba dang / longs spyod mi zad pa dang /
16a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mi zad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi yon tan
16a2(rgyud 'bum): dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro//
16a3(rgyud 'bum): bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang smra mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// tshig gsal ba dang / blun po ma yin pa dang / blo gsal bar 'gyur ro// mkhas pa dang / le lo med pa dang / cho ga shes pa dang /
16a4(rgyud 'bum): don che ba dang / srid pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par bya ba dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma bkur bar bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang / rtsis dang
16a5(rgyud 'bum): shes pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung las rab tu gsal ba yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ro// shin tu yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'tsho ba dang / kun tu spyod pa spyod pa
16a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang legs par bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub kyi sems rab tu brjed pa med par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dgra bcom
16a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa dang bgrod pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni 'khor lo lnga pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig go// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang de ltar yon tan dpag tu med pa dang yang
16b1(rgyud 'bum): dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang
16b2(rgyud 'bum): dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ring po mi thogs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags te/ shin tu myur bar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas bla na med yang dag
16b3(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa mang por yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos kyis sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i chos ston pa po dang / phyogs bcur
16b4(rgyud 'bum): / chos kyi rnga bo che lhag par gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'khor lo drug pa'i bsngags pa dpag tu med pa'o// oM sarba d+harmA b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ha badz+ra tsak+ShuHa AHaM aHpra kr-i tri
16b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHya du ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shI/ pa ri shud+d+hi tA/ mu pa dA ye ti/ a A/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ha ra ha ra/ iM hUM hriHb+ha ga ba na/ dz+nyA na mUrti/ wA gI
16b6(rgyud 'bum): shwa ra/ ma hA pA tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha/ d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha aHde nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/
16b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// rnam mang mgon po gzhan rnams dang // gsang dbang lag na rdo rje de/ khro bo'i rgyal por bcas rnams kyis// gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// mgon po
17a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag rjes yi rang / / legs so legs so legs par gsungs// bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni// rnam
17a2(rgyud 'bum): grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi/ / rnam dag legs pa'i lam 'di ni// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa// zab cing yangs la rgya che ba// don chen 'gro ba'i don byed pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni// rdzogs
17a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad/ / rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud sgyu 'phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa'i ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las byung ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
17a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ / / thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i bdag nyid chen po bla mangs
17a5(rgyud 'bum): pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis nye bar bskyangs pa sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsa ba blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gling gis dben gnas su bsgyur zhing dag par byas pa'o// sngon gyi sgra bsgrung chen po de dag gis/
17a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud 'di bsgyur zhing kun la grags lags mod// 'on kyang sgra don gtsug lag ji bzhin du// rgyud 'di blo brtan gnyis pas legs par bskur// // rgya ga
17a7(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ mA~M yA dz+wa la ma hA tan+ta rA dzA nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ @
17b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng na/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po bkod pa/ rdo rje'i ka bas brgyan pa/ shin tu mdzes pa'i rin po che bkod pas rnam par bkra ba/ rdo rje dril bu 'khrol
17b2(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par chen pos brgyan pa/ rdo rje'i 'khor los spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i cha byad sna tshogs 'chang ba rnams kyi don gyi bya ba byas pa/ rnam par snang mdzad
17b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying las yang dag par 'byung ba'i spyod pa bskyod nas/ zhal bzhi'i sgo'i go skabs nas byung ba sna tshogs dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che chen po dang / 'od dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
17b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po'i tshogs dang / rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams kyis brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / phyag brnyan dang / phyag brnyan mo du ma'i 'khor
17b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi bde ba'i bdag nyid dang dmigs pa dang bral ba/ thugs rje chen pos mnyes gshin pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba la brtson
17b6(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa mang pos
17b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
18a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje 'dug pa la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
18a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gying bag can du bltas nas rdo rje gsor te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
18a3(rgyud 'bum): dgongs pa ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gang gi slad du gzigs pa dang 'dzum pa mdzad/ des na bdag dang 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa lags na/ de'i slad
18a4(rgyud 'bum): du bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge chen po'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de skad du gsol ba btab ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das
18a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis rgyud kyis rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa/ rgyud thams cad kyi phyi mo'i yang phyi ma'i thabs bde ba rdo rje'i ye shes sgrub pa rol pas mnyes par bya ba'i thabs de kho na nyid thams cad
18a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'byung gnas stang stabs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs dang / shes rab bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes sgrol ba rol pas bzhad cing bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
18a7(rgyud 'bum): / sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ri mo'i gzugs dang / sgom pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / stang stabs dang / sbyor ba dgod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
18b1(rgyud 'bum): dbab pa dang / bskrad pa dang / dbrog pa dang / dgug pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / nyam thag par bya ba dang / gcad pa dang / bsreg pa dang /
18b2(rgyud 'bum): bskrad pa dang / bskrun pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / sbyin pa dang / slob dpon dang / slob ma gzung ba dang / gsang sngags mang po'i 'jo tshul rnams ngas bshad par bya'o// de'i phyir khyod
18b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin mchog la snyoms par zhugs la nyon cig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gzhan yang gang dag 'khor du 'dus
18b4(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag thams cad kyis chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam mnyan par brtsams so/ / de la re zhig dang po dngos grub ni slob dpon chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas/ slob dpon med par gyur na ni// dngos
18b5(rgyud 'bum): grub thob par mi 'gyur bas/ / slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya// ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig/ brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med// gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor
18b6(rgyud 'bum): shes pas/ / dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya'o// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing // sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// theg pa che la rtag dga' ba// de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs// phyi rol
18b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan bcos yongs shes shing / / nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro dang // gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang // theg pa chen po'i mi shes pa// snying rje yod pa ma yin dang // dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan la//
19a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang // bstan bcos rnams la smod pa min// gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang // ldan na slob dpon yin par gzung // de yis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /
19a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams bstan// de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags dag/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// dge dang sdoms la dga' ba dang // rtag tu bla ma la gus dang // rgyun du lnga rnams mchod byed pal//
19a3(rgyud 'bum): yon tan ldan na slob ma yin// slob dpon ci 'dra blta zhe na// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang // de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che// yid bzhin nor
19a4(rgyud 'bum): bu rin chen bzhin/ / slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung // skyon rnams nams kyang ma yin no// yon tan bzung bas dngos grub cing // skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams// de yi grib ma'ang mi 'go ma ste//
19a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs// rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang ba yi// dam pa gang yin spangs par 'gyur// slob dpon smod par byed pa dag/ rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya// slob dpon smod pa gang yin te//
19a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis gzung // ngan pa gtum po las byed pa// mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya// mnar med shin tu spyi g.ya' ba'i// dmyal ba bstan sa gang yin pa// der ni slob dpon smod
19a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs// de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te// bsam yas 'bras bu smin byed pa'i// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod byed pa'i// sems can dang pa ldan pas mchod//
19b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul rba ba las 'di ni 'jug pa rim par bye ba'i le'u ste dang pol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rnga rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dang
19b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po ye shes bsgyings pa gsang ba'i byin rlabs kyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang
19b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phye ma'i yang phyi ma ye shes chen po'i ye shes snying po 'bar ba rdo rje snying kur
19b4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur bas/ phyag na rdo rje sems can gang la las tshon rtsi mthong ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad la phyag byas pa
19b5(rgyud 'bum): dang mchod pa byas par 'gyur pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas nyid kyi grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur pa de nyon cig/ dang po kho nas yongs su bzung bar
19b6(rgyud 'bum): / byas te/ slob dpon gyis lha nyid kyi stang stabs su 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas bsgrims te rdo rje gsor zhing / lag pa g.yon pas dril bu gsil nas rdo rje 'gros kyis yongs su bskor bar bya'o// rgyan
19b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis hUM zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brjid pa gang gis bskor nas kyang khro bo'i skur bsgoms nas sdang ba'i lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gsang ba pa rnams
20a1(rgyud 'bum): la tshig 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o/ / slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob mche ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes
20a2(rgyud 'bum): thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po ming 'di zhes bya ba bri yis/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yid dgas dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang /
20a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnon po dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / rig sngags grub pa dang / rgan po dang / rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams
20a4(rgyud 'bum): dengs shig/ 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig/ gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni phyag na rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu 'bar
20a5(rgyud 'bum): pas mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ / zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ stang stabs la gnas bzhin du sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o// g.yas brkyang ba dang / g.yon brkyang
20a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / seng ge'i 'dug stangs dang / zlum po'i 'dug stangs dang / 'thun pa'i rkang stabs dang / rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang / rdo rje gdeg pa dang / rdo rje 'jo tshul dang / rkang pa ya gcig gi stangs
20a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / seng ge stabs dang / seng ge glal ba dang / bung ba 'phur ba'i stabs dang / rdo rje sgrog dang / rdo rje gsor ba dang / rdo rje'i stang stabs dang / rdo rje dgug pa dang / rdo rje gar dang / rdo rje 'jigs su
20b1(rgyud 'bum): drung ba dang / rdo rdo 'angs ma da / do mo bdat+ta/ rdo rjeng byin drurdzas dang / rdo rje'i bdun dang / bu med kyi sna 'phrul snang skabs dang / dadza na b+ha dang / rlabs pa tsha'i 'dregs pa dang /
20b2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / rdo rje ga mo dang / rdo rje sgra dang / ral gri thabs dang / rdo rje'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i thabs dang / gtun shing gi thabs dang / ba dan gyi thabs dang / zhags pa'i thabs dang / badz+ri
20b3(rgyud 'bum): tshul dang / betson gyi thabs dang / mi 'jigs pa'i tshul dang / lcags kyu'i thabs dang / 'phral bu'i tshul dang / mdung thung gi thabs dang / gzhu'i thabs dang / mda' bzung ba'i thabs dang
20b4(rgyud 'bum): mda' 'phang ba'i thabs dang / zag mdung bskor ba'i thabs dang / mchog sbyin pa'i tshul dang / mdung gi thabs dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang / rdo rje'i 'dug
20b5(rgyud 'bum): stangs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dug stangs dang / rdo rje skyil mo krung dang / pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang / dpa' mo'i 'dug stangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang
20b6(rgyud 'bum): tsecog pu'i 'dug stangs dang / rtse ba'i 'dug stangs dang / mdun du dgu pa dang / phyir dbye ba dang / mtha' yas dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / smin sgra dang / gsus po che dang / rgyal po'i
20b7(rgyud 'bum): puphur bus gnas pa'i bcing ba dang / phur bu brdung ba dang / dra ba dang ra bas mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba de lta bus sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs par bsgoms te gtan
21a1(rgyud 'bum): la dbab par bya'o/ / rang gi ming nas smos te/ hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi sgra brjod nas 'khor lo thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur ro// de nas sa'i lha mo sta gon du gnas
21a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba ni/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// dngos grub thams cad thob phyi'i phyir// bdag
21a3(rgyud 'bum): gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ / zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sta gon du gnas par bya ste/ thugs brtser gnas pa'i dgongs pa can// sangs
21a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol/ / sras dang lhan cig gshegs nas kyang // sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzod// de nas 'khor lo'i dbus su spos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la// mtha' kun tu yang mtshan
21a5(rgyud 'bum): nas smos te thig ler bya'o/ / de ltar spyan drangs te mchod pas mnyes par byas nas phyir byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no// de nas sems can sta gon du gnas par bya ste spos chus spyi bor bsang gtor byas nas/
21a6(rgyud 'bum): lag pa snying kar bkram nas su// rtse me lnga pargya gram bya// g.yas pa srung skud bcings nas su// lag mthil saM shing ku sha sbyin// de nas 'dug ste gsum la skyabs su gtang ba dang / sdig pa kun tu bsham/
21a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang / bdag nyid dbul ba dang / byang chub tu ni sems bskyed par bya'o// de la 'di ni skyabs su 'gro ba yin te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/
21b1(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'gro ba'i dge la yi rang ste// sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung // zhes lan gsum brjod do// de nas ci nus kyis ci 'dod pa'i chos bshad par bya'o// de nas
21b2(rgyud 'bum): sngar bshad pa bzhin du mnyes par 'gyur ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga bzang po bya ste/ slar yang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o// de nas nang du zhugasal dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhir glo g.yas pas nyal te/ rmi lam bzang
21b3(rgyud 'bum): ngan bltas nas phyi de nyid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ / tshon dang thag la sangs rgyas lnga'i// ngo bo dag kyang sprul par bya// 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can rnams ni rnam grol mdzad// de bzhin gshegs/
21b4(rgyud 'bum): pa kun gyi gnas// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal bdag ste// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i// tshon rtsi dbye ba brtsam par bya// dang por slob dpon nyid kyis dgye// de nas kun tu slob mas bya//
21b5(rgyud 'bum): dang po sa gzhi yongs gzung ba// gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste// nub gsum pa ni 'jug pa yin// tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu yis// khru stong pa 'am lnga brgya par// dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab bo//
21b6(rgyud 'bum): yang na khru lnga khru do pa 'am// khru gang ba yi bar du bya'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa yi// dbus su 'khor lo legs par bri// dkyil du rnam par snang mdzad gzhag
21b7(rgyud 'bum): shar phyogs su ni mi 'khrug pa/ lho phyogs su ni rin chen 'byung // nub phyogs su ni 'od dpag med// byang phyogs su ni don grub rnams// 'khor lo'i grwar ni lha mo bzhi// dngos grub sbyin par mdzad
22a1(rgyud 'bum): par bri/ / dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni spyan no// me'i phyogs su ni mA ma kI'o// bden bral gyis phyogs su ni gos dkar can no// rlung gi phyogs su ni lha mo sgrol ma'o// rdo rje shugs kyis/
22a2(rgyud 'bum): phyir phyung nas rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni rdo rje sems ma/ lhor rdo rje rin chen ma/ nub tu rdo rje chos ma/ byang du rdo rje las ma rnams bri'o// grwa rnams su skul byed ma dang / rin chen sgrol ma dang / khro
22a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyer can dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud rnams so// de nas yang 'gying bag tu langs te/ rdo rje shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gsum pa la/ shar phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / 'jam dpal
22a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / spos kyi glang po dang / ye shes tog rnams bri'o// lho phyogs su bzang skyong dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams dri'o// nub phyogs su ni mthu chen thob
22a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams bri'o// byang phyogs su zla 'od dang / 'od dpag med dang / nam mkha'
22a6(rgyud 'bum): / mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams bri'o// shar sgor ni ga shin rje mthar byed do// lho sgor ni shes rab mthar byed do// nub sgor ni pad+ma mthar byed do// byang sgor ni bgegs kyi gshed
22a7(rgyud 'bum): mthar byed do/ / grwa rnams su ni mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / be con sngon po dang / stobs po che'o// zung rnams su ni rdo rje bri'o// sgo'i ngan logs su'ang rdo rje bri'o// 'khor lo ni tshon rtsi dkar
22b1(rgyud 'bum): pos bri'o/ / gnyis pa ni tshon rtsi dkar po dang / ser po dang / sngon po gsum gyis bri'o// gsum pa ni sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor chen po yin no// de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du
22b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi dang ldan pa rim pa gnyis par bya'o// dbus su ni pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa bri'o// snam bu gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni rdo rje'o// lho phyogs su ni
22b3(rgyud 'bum): rin po che/ nub phyogs su ni pad+ma/ byang phyogs su ni ral gri ste/ de lta bur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyi lus legs par bkrus te/ spos kyis bskus nas legs par brgyus pa'i
22b4(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi 'phreng ba mgo la bcings nas/ mgul pa dar gyis bcings pa la// ldum bu yis ni kha bkab pa// rin chen sman 'byung sna lnga dang // spos chu yis ni bkang ba dang // bum pa mngon pa
22b5(rgyud 'bum): bsngags par bya/ / rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi// bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi// lha rnams kun gyi bum pa bzhi// las kun byed pas bzlas brjod do// sems can kun gyis bsad
22b6(rgyud 'bum): gtor bya/ / yang na ku sha'i chun pos bya// de nas bum pa mngon par bsngags te lha bshos dang gtor ma phul nas me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs
22b7(rgyud 'bum): bkru ba la sogs pa dbul lo/ / de rnams phul nas bum pa rnams grwar gzhag par bya'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dbus su spyan drangs par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil
23a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas gsal bar bya ste/ gzhug pa dang / bsdams pa dang / dbang du bya ste/ phur bu dang / ra ba dang / dra bas phyogs bcing ba dang / mtsham
23a2(rgyud 'bum): bcad pa byas la/ mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / gdan dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa'ang bsngos te phul nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rang rang la bstan par bya'o// bstod pa dang /
23a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i glu dang / dril bu gsil ba'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / rgyud kyi spri'i khyad par yang dbul lo// rol mo'i khyad par gzhan rnams kyis kyang bstod par bya'o// bstod nas bzod par
23a4(rgyud 'bum): gsol te dngos grub thams kyi phyir gsol ba gdab po/ / de nas slob dpon bdag nyid zhugs te/ de'i 'og tu slob ma gzhug go// de nas sems can thams cad snying po 'di dang phyag rgyas gnas lngar bsrung
23a5(rgyud 'bum): / zhing gnas lngar cho ga bya'o// hUM/ dzi ni dzi ka/ aM A ro li ka/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-i ka/ sA rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i//
23a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho brang dkyil 'khor snying po 'dir// bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya// rdo rje sems mas me tog gtor bar bgyi ste/ pra tIts+tsha badz+ra po/ tshigs su bcad pa
23a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dis gdong g.yogs 'grol lo/ / de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni// dkyil 'khor deng 'dir blta bar gyis// sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis
23b1(rgyud 'bum): brlabs/ / dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs// dam tshig mchog tu grub par byed// rdo rje pad+ma rol pa'i mchog/ sngags kyi bdag nyid shes par bya// de yi snying po 'di yin te// pa sh+ya badz+ra/
23b2(rgyud 'bum): gang la me tog bab pa de de'i lha yin no// de nas dbang bskur sbyin bya ste// dri dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// gos dang rgyan gyis legs par brgyan// steng du bla re bre bar bya// gdugs dang rgyal
23b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ba dan dang / / lha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang // bkra shis yo byad rnams kyis klubs// slob ma sdig dang bral ba la// slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro//
23b4(rgyud 'bum): dang por rnam rgyal bum pa yis// de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang // lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po yis// bkra shis tshogs bcad glu sgra dang // rdo rje dril du gsil ba yis// skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum
23b5(rgyud 'bum): du/ / til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i// rgyal ba bum pa bzung nas ni// de nyid la ni dbang bskur bya// dkyil 'khor de zhid rigs par bsam// de lta bur ni bsams nas kyang / chos kyi mtshan nyid
23b6(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya/ / bur ma me long 'khor lo dang // dung dang rdo rje glegs pam dang // gser dag dang ni dngul rnams kyis// mi shes rab rib la sogs pa// ci nus par ni bsal bar bya// thung ma la
23b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs med na yang / / phyag rgya'i gzugs rnams bstan par bya// de nas dam tshig bstan par bya// de rang phyin chad bu khyod kyis// srog dang lus la bab gyur kyang // dam pa'i chos dang byang chub ses//
24a1(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya// rdo rje spun rnams bkur sti ning // sdang la byams shing chags bral ba// nams kyang bya ba ma yin no// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyis// khyod na
24a2(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba'i nang du 'dor/ / de nas bla mas yon blangs te// sa dang yid 'ong chung ma dang // rin chen gser dang nor bu 'bar// mu tig byu ru la sogs dang // lus kyang dbul du gzhugs par bya// bla ma la
24a3(rgyud 'bum): ni gus pa yi/ / slob mas de bzhin kho nar bya// bla ma de ni mgu bar bya// tha ma mgu ba dngos grub kyi// gzhan du min zhes thub pa gsung // de nas slob ma bslang ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar mchod
24a4(rgyud 'bum): pa bya ste sbyin sreg gi las bya'o/ / de nas/ cho ga mthong bas las byas nas// sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod pa dang // de bzhin sgom pa'i rim pa'i tshul// zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa yis// las rnams
24a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad tshim par bya/ / de nas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// rgyal ba thams cad gshegs su gsol// bsgrims te tshon rtsi rnams bsdus nas// chu klung chen por bskur nas kyang // ba yi lci bas
24a6(rgyud 'bum): byug par bya/ / dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun// slob dpon nyid kyis bskur bar bya// slob mas cung zad mi bskur te// de ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur// slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs par//
24a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid 'dod pa spyad par bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
24b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas yang gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rjegs
24b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi snying po'i yi ge rnams nyon cig/ phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol
24b3(rgyud 'bum): / oM las rnam par snang mdzad do// oM hUM/ mi 'khrugs pa'i 'o// oM trAM/ rin chen 'byung gnas so// oM hrIH/ 'od dpag med do// oM khaM/ don yod grub pa'i 'o// oM ga ga na lo tsa na d+hU/
24b4(rgyud 'bum): spyan gyi no// oM ki ri ki / mA ma kI s+t+waM/ mA ma kI'o// oM ka Te bi ka Te kA tsa kA Ta ka ro Ta bIr+ya swAt+na/ gos dkar mo'i'o// oM t+tA ra tut+tA tur swA hA/ sgrol mo'o'o// oM satwa badz+ri hUM/ rdo rje sems mi
24b5(rgyud 'bum): A~M t+na bar+b+ba/ dzin chen mau gyi/ oMd+haHbad+hUd+d+ha/ chos myi ro// oM kaH dzIn+tu/ rdo rdzalas pa'og// oM tsa le na la nu na/ thul byed ma ga/ sa oM k+Sha~M t+tan
24b6(rgyud 'bum): / rin can sgrol ma ga/ oM d+d+hi k+ShaH/ / abadz+dza shrI la s+yA d+g+ha k+ShaH/ rjes ga ga/ a T+Te/ mas pa'i.an+ta 'jam pal kyi/ ku
24b7(rgyud 'bum): n tu bzang po'i'o/ / oM gtsu gasti ni hUM/ spos kyi glang po'i'o// oM dz+nyA na ke tu ba ti hUM/ ye shes tog go// oM b+ha dra ba ti b+ha dra pA le hUM/ bzang skyong ngo // oM swa ga re ma hA sA ga re n+tu
25a1(rgyud 'bum): blo gros rgya mtsho'o/ / oM Ak+Sha ya hUM hUM/ ak+Sha yak+Sha A karma A pa ra Na pa ri sho d+ha na swA hA/ blo gros mi zad pa'o// oM pra ti b+ha ne pra ti b+ha na ku Te hUM/ spobs pa brtsegs pa'o//
25a2(rgyud 'bum): oM s+thA me ma hA s+thA ma pa ti swA hA/ mthu chen thob pa'o// oM sarba a pA ya dza te sarba pA paM sho d+ha hUM/ ngan song thams cad spong ba'o// oM sarba sho ka ta mo ni rA ma ti hUM/ mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges pa
25a3(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa'i blo gros so/ / oM dz+wa li ni ma hA dz+wa la ni hU/ dra ba can gyi 'od do// oM su d+ha na shri ye hUM/ nor bzang ngo // oM tsan+d+ra tsan+d+ra tsan+d+ra bya ba lo ke te swA hA/ zla 'ong ngo // oM a mr-i ta pra b+ha a mr-i te hUM/
25a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od dpag med do// oM ga ga ne ga ga na bar lo tsa na hUM/ nam mkha' mdzod do// oM sarba ni ba ra Na balka bi ni hUM/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o// oM ya mAn+ta krita/ gshin rje gshed do// oM
25a5(rgyud 'bum): / pradz+nyAn+ta kriSha/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// oM pad+mAn+ta krita/ rta mgrin no// oM a mri ta kuN+Da li bi g+hAn+ta krita/ bdud rtsi thal sbyor ro// oM a tsa la hUM ha/ mi g.yo ba'o// a Tak+Shi hUM/ 'dod
25a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po'o/ / oM nI la daHmahA daN+Da hUM/ be con sngon po'o// oM kro d+ha hUM dzAH/ stobs po che'i dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge de dag go// 'di dag la brten nas ting 'dzin gyi
25a7(rgyud 'bum): khyad par las nges par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad ni lcags kyus spyan drang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rdo rje'i phyag
25b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas so/ / rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum rnams kyis so// khro bo rnams kyi ni zhal gyi phyag rgyas so// bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyas so// pho nya rnams ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so//
25b2(rgyud 'bum): de dag la sogs pa ni spyan drang ba'i sbyor ba'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
25b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
25b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje ras sam rtsig pa la sogs pa la gzugs brnyan bsgrub pa dmigs pa gang gis gsang sngags 'chang rnams kyi ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur zhes/ ye shes rdzogs pa sangs rgyas nyid bde blag tu
25b5(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshogs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gsang chen bla na med pa bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ oM gyi ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa//
25b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad ni// shes rab ye shes rab rgyas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gis mchod// zhi bzor tsugs cod pan 'chang // zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan// gsar
25b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi mdog can phyag drug pa/ / dang po bsam gtan phyag rgya can// bgrang 'phreng ldan zhing mda' yis brgyan// g.yon gyis lnga mo'i nu ma 'dzin// 'khor lo dang ni gzhu thogs shing // lha rnams zeng
26a1(rgyud 'bum): cing khams rnams 'dzag/ 'bar ba'i 'od dkyil brgyan pa la// sangs rgyas kun gyi sprin 'gro ba// rab tu byung zhing legs 'khyud pa// de nyid spyod yul can bsgoms
26a2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags nang gis bzlas brjod bya/ / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// oM zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam// 'jig rten dbang phyug
26a3(rgyud 'bum): 'od chen bsam/ / thor tsugs cod pan 'chang ba'i lha// dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas brgyan// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// gtso bo zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra// zhal gsum spyan
26a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'bar ba la/ / phyag drug 'dug stangs bzhi pa can// phyag gnyis padI'i 'jo tshul can// g.yas na bgrang 'phreng rdo rje 'chang // g.yon pas nu ma 'dzin pa la// ril ba spyi blugs gsum pa na//
26a5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs rnams thams cad 'phro mdzad cing // kun nas 'od zer 'phreng ba can// lag nas mtshon shor 'jigs 'khrugs pa'i// bgegs 'gyel ba la lta byed pa'i// de 'dra'i tshig gis lam bsgoms
26a6(rgyud 'bum): na/ ring po mi thogs sangs rgyas 'thob// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog yangs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// zla ba'i gzugs la hUM zhes bya// sems kyi
26a7(rgyud 'bum): rdorje bsgom par bya/ / mthing shing bzang po lta bu'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rab klubs pa// cod pan la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs// rin chen rnams kyis yongs su brgyan// zhal ras gsum ldan
26b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan gsum pa/ / cung zad bzhad cing 'jo sgeg can// phyag brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa la// rdo rje dang por gsor ba dang // gnyis pa na ni ral gri gdengs// lcags kyu bzang po gsum pa na// bzhi pa yis ni
26b2(rgyud 'bum): mda' yang gsor/ / de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams// de bzhin gnyis pas nu ma 'khyud// gsum pa na ni zhags pa ste// bzhi pa lha rdzas gzhu yang 'dzin// rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/
26b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'bar// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom pa// de yi rdo rje sems bstan zhig/ ring por mi thogs byang chub thob// rga shi rnams kyi pha rol 'gro// sems can gyi stobs mtha' yas
26b4(rgyud 'bum): pa rdzogs par byed pa'i tang nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdo rje shugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / tAM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// rin po 'byung ba'i bdag nyid de// zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa/
26b5(rgyud 'bum): thor tsugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan// bde ba chen po kha dog dmar// ting 'dzin phyag rgya rnam par bzhugs// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas pa ste// phyag g.yas na ni rdo rje dang // g.yon pa rin chen
26b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'dzin/ / 'od zer ser po 'phro ba las// rin chen 'byung ba'i sprin chen nam// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis// rin chen char gyis rgyas par byas// rin chen mngon par thob pa'i ye shes
26b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / khaM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// don yod rdo rje bsam par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya legs bzhugs pa// marbad ta yi 'od ldar 'bar// g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri dang /
27a1(rgyud 'bum): gson pa yis ni lcags kyu nyid// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro zhing // legs par sgrub phyir slar yang sdud// 'od zer chen pos rab gsal zhing // ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'od dang
27a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs/ / 'di 'dra rtag tu sems byed pa// nam mkha'i snying po thub pa che// 'du byed thams cad spangs pa yi// mkha' dang mnyam par de 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snang bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya
27a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / la yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang brgyan// lha mo spyan gsum phyag brgya pa// zhal gsum gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs// sgeg pa'i cha lugs legs
27a4(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba/ / cung zad bzhad pas 'dod chags mo// dang po'i phyag ni mchog sbyin mdzad// de bzhin gnyis pa mi 'jigs sbyin// phyag gsum pa ni rdo rje ste// bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa
27a5(rgyud 'bum): sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ / rin chen snyem gnyis pa na// gsum pa na ni bgrang 'phreng ste// bzhi pa ga nu yis legs par brgyan// 'od dmar 'od zer 'phreng ba can// lha rnams 'jigs pas sems myos
27a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ / lag pa thal mo sbyor bas byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'bro bar// ye shes rdo rje spyan ma pasam// byang chub yan lag 'bras brgyan pa'i// lha mo 'di 'dra ba sgom par bya// ye shes spyan
27a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'jo tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ rdo rje rigs can mA ma kI// lha mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// dgod cing zhal ras khro dang bcas/
27b1(rgyud 'bum): ut+pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// 'od dmar shin tu 'bar ba can// dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag/ gnyis pa legs par rdo rje bsdams// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i
27b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzum mo ste/ / gnyis pa zhags pa legs par bsnams// gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin// rdo rje can ma sku gsum 'chang // dngos med ngo bo mtshan nyid can// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro ba// 'di 'dra
27b3(rgyud 'bum): sgom pas bsgom par bya'o/ / sgyu 'phrul 'byung ba'i stobs kyi ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// zla ba'i mdog dang ldan pa'i yum// ming ni gos dkar can zhes
27b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan// zhal ras gsum pa dga' mdzad ma// phyag drug mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad ma// gnyis pa ni ni rdo rje ste// gsum pa ma' yis rnam par brgyan// g.yon/
27b5(rgyud 'bum): pa pad+ma bsnams par bya// gnyis pa na ni bgrang nor 'phreng // gsum pa na ni gzhu bsnams shing // rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs// sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'phro bar mdzad// pad+ma'i sprin
27b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis rgyas par bsgom/ / gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na// rin chen skur ni bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i gzugs kyis 'jo tshul sangs rgyas kyis rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
27b7(rgyud 'bum): ta yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul che// 'jo sgeg cha lugs la gnas pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // bzhad pa margad 'od dang
28a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag/ gnyis pa na ni rdo rje bsnams// gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa na ni ut+pal
28a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / gsum pa na ni gzhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po 'bar ba can// sangs rgyas 'phro bas rgyas mdzad pa// dga' mdzad sems can kun gyi ma// rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya// sems can thams/
28a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// skyes mchog rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// sems ma bzhi ni brjod pa'i ming // sems ma dang ni rig chen ma// chos ma
28a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las ma ste/ / rol pas rjes su mnyes mdzad ma// de dag ji ltar rigs par sgom// de dag kyang ni bsgoms pa yis// ring por mi thogs byang chub thob// sems can rab tu dga' byed pa'i//
28a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags ma bzhi yi ting 'dzin to// tsu gi yi ge las bsgrubs pa// ming ni skul byed ces ma'i gzugs// sku gsum rgyal ba bye ba phrag/ bdun gyis gsang sngags glu yis bstod// yi ge dgu pa
28a6(rgyud 'bum): thabs dgu can/ / lha dgu rnams kyi gnas kyang yin// zhal gsum ston ka'i 'dam bu mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na chung skal ldan dang la bab// rig sngags thams cad sgrol
28a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad ma/ / dang po'i zhal ni cung zad tsam// bzhad cing spyan gsum ldan pa ste// g.yas kyi zhal ni rnam gdangs pa// ut+pal sngon po 'dab mi'i 'od// mche ba zla ba tshes pa bzhin// lce ni glog
28b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin lcib par mdzad/ / g.yon pa kha dog dmar po ste// tshems kyis sgros ni rnam par mnan// rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs// gdu bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i phyag nyi shu rtsa drug
28b2(rgyud 'bum): la phyag gnyis rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas snying ka'i gnas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ / g.yas pa gnyis pa ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// gsum pa na ral gri'o// bzhi pa na rin po che sbyin pa'o// lnga pa na shing
28b3(rgyud 'bum): thog bi dza pu ra ro/ / drug pa na mda' gsor ba'o// bdun pa na dgra sta'o// brgyad pa na dbyug to'o// dgu pa na tho ba'o// bcu pa na lcags kyu'o// bcu gcig pa ni rdo rje'o// bcu gnyis
28b4(rgyud 'bum): pa nas gol gtog pa'o/ / bcu gsum pa na bgrang 'phreng ngo // g.yon pa gnyis pa na yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no// gsum pa na pad+ma'o// bzhi pa na ril ba spyi thugs so// lnga pa na zhags
28b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / drug pa na gnu'o// bdun pa na mdung thung ngo // brgyad pa na 'khor lo'o// dgu pa na rung ngo // bcu pa na sdigs pa'i mdzub mo'o// bcu gcig pA nA bum pa bzang po'o// bcu gnyis
