28b6(rgyud 'bum): pa na thag mdung ngo / / bcu gsum pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ pad+ma la bzhugs bsgom par bya// la yi zhing cung bsgos pa yi// steng du rba
28b7(rgyud 'bum): gos gyon pa ste/ / sna tshogs tshog gun bzar gsol// cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs 'phro// sum cu'i lha rnams ltung ba dang // bgegs rnams shin tu
29a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs skrag par/ / thal mo sbyor bar byed pa ste// 'di 'dra gang zhig rtag sgom zhing // bsgrims nas gsang sngags brjod pa des// sangs rgyas nyid du thob 'gyur na/
29a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig spros// ting 'dzin ngo bo thob 'gyur zhing // sdig pa kun las rnam par 'grol// rgyal ba mthar yas pa'i ye shes skul bar byed pa'i stobs kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i
29a3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ / ra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// rin chen sgrol ma zhes bya'i gzugs// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug gser gyi mdog dang ldan// na chung dar la bab pa'i
29a4(rgyud 'bum): tshad/ / zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa ste// phyag ni rin chen gdu bus gtams// phyag gnyis rin chen thal mo ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'phreng ba 'khrug/ g.yas pa'i phyag na mi 'jigs sbyin//
29a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor// g.yon mdzub ma rungs rnams las sdigs// gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin// 'od zer dmar po legs par 'bar// rol stabs thabs kyi zhabs kyis
29a6(rgyud 'bum): gnon/ / sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phro zhing sdud// chos 'dzin yid du 'ong ba yi// lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rin chen sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
29a7(rgyud 'bum): b+h+rUM yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// 'jigs las sgrol ba khro gnyer can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// phyag drug pad+ma la bzhugs pa// rol pa'i
29b1(rgyud 'bum): stangs la brtson pa ste/ / zhal ni khro dang bcas par bzhad// legs par 'bar ba'i rtser lha can// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa be con 'dzin par bshad// gsum pa yis ni mnga' yang gso/
29b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo can// gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs bsnams// gsum pa na ni mtshon cha gzhu// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing // de bzhin gzhan dag legs sdud pa'i// nyal dang
29b3(rgyud 'bum): 'greng dang 'dug pa dang / / lha mo 'di 'dra rtag tu bsgom// 'jigs pa thams cad dmigs pa med par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ ming ni rdo rje lu gu
29b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud/ / thams cad 'tshang ba bskyed pa ste// sems can ma rungs phung bar byed// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug sngo bas gzugs bzang ma// zhal ni cung zad bzhad par mdzad// lag pa
29b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas na rdo rje ste/ / gnyis pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud// gsum pa ni na mda' yang bsnams// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa na ni zhags par gsungs// gsum pa gzhu yang thogs par brtson//
29b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams ni sprin 'phro ba// rdo rje lu gu d+hAd bsgoms na// byang chub skad cig gis 'thob na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig spros// rdo rje sgrog gi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
29b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ grub pa'i skyes mchog byams pa ni// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// de yi 'og na pad+ma ste// sems dpa'i dkyil mo krung du bcugs// phyag bzhi dag gis rnam par brgyam/
30a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag gnyis chos 'chad phyag rgyas brgyan// g.yas pa yi ni phyag gnyis pa// sems can skyob pa mchog sbyin mdzad// g.yon pa lha rdzas klu shing gi/ me tog ze 'bru'i mgo lcogs bsnams/
30a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// sprin chen de bzhin 'phro bar mdzad// byams pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyis rdo rje rnam par brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// muM gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gzhon nu 'jam pa
30a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi lam/ / shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa// zab mo tshul ni ston pa po// zhal gsum spyan gsum zur phud gsum// gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// cod pan bzang po mo 'khrugs can// me tob sna
30a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rnams kyis klubs/ / 'og na pad+ma chen po la// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// 'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol pa ste// zhal na cung zad bzhad pa la// dpa' bo chen po phyag drug pa// dang po mi
30a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs sbyin par bya/ / gnyis pa na ni ral gri nyid// gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor// de bzhin g.yon pa shes rab 'chang // gnyis pa na ni ut+pal thogs// gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do// shes rab ye shes
30a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gis klubs/ / sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin gyi bsnams// 'phro bar sangs rgyas 'dod pas bsgom// 'jam pa mchog gi shes rab dang ye shes kyi rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// spos kyi gra
30a7(rgyud 'bum): po ye shes tog/ de bzhin du ni bzang skyong dang // blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros ni// mi zad pa dang spobs brtsegs nyid// ngan song kun spong mthu chen thob// mya ngan kun mun 'joms pa'i tho// nor bzang dang ni rba
30b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'od/ / de bzhin zla 'od 'od dpag med// nam mkha'i mdzod dang sgrib kun sel// de ltar de sogs grangs med pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa kun// sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs// yi ge
30b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i sbyor ba can/ / zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// sna tshogs thabs kyis rol par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi rgyu// gsang sngags zlos par bsgom par bya// mdog ldan 'du zhing 'phro mdzad
30b3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bsam/ / hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gzi brjid ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi// gshin rje'i dgra zhes rnam grags pa// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste// char sprin gyi ni 'od dang
30b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dra/ / nal drug pa la phyag drug pa// de bzhin zhabs drug mi'u thung 'dra// gsus khyim shin tu che ba ste// do ni drag po chen po yin// ljags 'dril rdo rje mche ba can// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/
30b5(rgyud 'bum): stag lpags kyi ni sham thabs bgos// rol pa'i stabs can ma he bcibs// de yi 'og tu pad+ma byas// mi thod 'phreng can skra 'khyil ba// a gtsem ser la sgra chen 'byin// mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs pa/
30b6(rgyud 'bum): sku gsum la ni rnam par bcugs// 'jam pa'i dpal gyis rnam par brgyan// dang po'i gas ni rnam par bzhad// g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste// g.yon pa'i choms kyis sgros mnan mo// g.yas pa
30b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag na ral gri ste/ / gnyis pa nani rdo rje nyid// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub nags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa gtsun bdungs pa yis// shin
31a1(rgyud 'bum): @tu legs par rnam par brgyan/ / lha mo mos ni g.yas nas 'khyud// gnyis pa na ni ut+pal thog/ g.yon pa zla ba ltar snang ba// pad+ma dkar po thogs par bya// 'og tu lnga dang bcags
31a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnams/ / sngar mthed nas phyag kyang 'tshal// 'od zer dmar po 'bar dang bcas// sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'phro zhing sdud// rnal 'byor ngag gi sgo nas su// bsgrims nas gsang sngags bzlas pa re/
31a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dug dang zhal dang 'chag pa na// legs par bsams te kun zos shing // 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod kyang // nam mkha' lta bur gos mi 'gyur// gshed byed thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i ye shes
31a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gshin rje gsod pa'i 'dul ba 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / pra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug gis ni rnam pa
31a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / mdog ser me'u thung gzugs can la// 'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa la// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// de bzhin
31a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa rnam par bsgyur/ / g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros kyang mnan// sna tshogs tshul gyis 'bar ba ste// lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje thogs// gnyis pa na ni dbyug pa ste// gsum pa na ni mda' yang thogs/
31a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa gzhu can yin par gsungs// spyi bo'i steng na mi 'khrugs pa// rim bzhin 'phro zhing sdud pa ste// 'di 'dra goms
31b1(rgyud 'bum): pas bsgom par bya/ / zlos pas sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ha yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ la lo pad+ma ma
31b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ / kha dog dmar po phyag brgyad spyan// sku ni sbrul gyis dkris pa ste// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs// khro bo lta bas gzigs mdzad pa// dang pa zhal ni rnam pa
31b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhad/ / g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan pa// stag lpags gsol zhing khro ba la// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni dbyug to gsungs// gsum
31b4(rgyud 'bum): nini lcags kyu ste/ / bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste// gnyis pa yis ni num 'dzin// gsum pa na naM pad+ma ste// bzhi pa na ni gzhu nyid do// de ma cosan
31b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs pa/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag/ 'phro zhing 'du bar bsgoms byas na// 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min// rnga mchog gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes la
31b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs pa/ ming ni khro bo bgegs kyi gshed// mi yi dkyil bzhugs sgrub pa skyon// lag na rdo rje'i rjes 'brangs pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// bgegs rnams 'joms mdzad bya
31b7(rgyud 'bum): drug can/ / dang po'i zhal ni gzhad pa ste// de bzhin g.yas pa'i zhal godangs po// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro// ut+pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra'i mdog/ zhabs kyis bgegs na mtshan
32a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / gnyis pa pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs// g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri ste// gnyis pa na ni dgra star gsungs// gsum pa yi ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub
32a2(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa can/ / de bzhin gnyis pa nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni gzhu yang gsungs// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bar// ye shes mkhas pas bsgom par bya// bgegs rnams thams cad 'dral
32a3(rgyud 'bum): nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// mi g.yo bus pa'i gzugs dang ldan// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis
32a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa la/ / dang po zhal ni bzhad pa ste// de yi g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pas// khrag gis brlan pa'i ljags kyang 'dril// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khri// hUM gis snying ka'i phyogs kyang bka'//
32a5(rgyud 'bum): mgrin shun gyi ni mdog can te// rin chen ri stengs pad+ma la// rol pa'i zhabs kyi stabs su bzhugs// thub pa bgegs kyi chu 'jing 'joms// phyag drug 'bar ba 'phro ba yi// 'od bzang dmar po'i dkyil 'khor
32a6(rgyud 'bum): na/ g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste// gnyis pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs// gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor// g.yon pas sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa gzhuni bdungs
32a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ / chang pas bzung ste lta ba dang // sna tshogs me tog gis bcings pa'i// cod pan dang ni dbu rgyan thogs// zur phud g.yon pa bung ba'i mdog/ mi 'khrugs pa yis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas rang bzhin
32b1(rgyud 'bum): sprin dag gis/ / cho 'phrul chen po du ma 'gro// de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor gang // sgom pas sgom par byed pa de// bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi// them skas la ni 'dzeg par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
32b2(rgyud 'bum): cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa mi g.yo ba'i ye shes rdo rje bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ ming ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/
32b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag drug pa zhes bya bar bsgrags// dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i// thor tsugs cod pan bzang po can// dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa la// g.yas pa yis ni rnam par bsgyur// g.yon pa tshems kyis
32b4(rgyud 'bum): sgros mnan khro/ / dpral ba khro gnyer rim pa can// 'bar ba char sprin lta bu'i mdog/ dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can// phyag gnyis 'dod pa'i phyag rgyar ldan// g.yas pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs// gsum pa
32b5(rgyud 'bum): mda' yis rnam par rol/ / g.yon pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum po'i phyag na gzhu yang bsnams// pad+ma la bzhugs rol pa'i thabs// 'og tu bgeg kyang rnam par mnan// sangs rgyas lang long 'phro mdzad pa
32b6(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom byas na/ / bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob// snying thams cad 'gugs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hUM gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// lo na ldan
32b7(rgyud 'bum): po can/ / zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ dang po'i zhal ni 'jo skrag band// de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs// g.yon pa choms kyis spos kya kA
33a1(rgyud 'bum): @#/ chu 'dra ba ste// lus ni sbrul gyis rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs lcang lor 'khyil ba ste// dbu rgyan la ni sangs rgyas bcugs// pad+ma la bzhugs rol stabs can// g.yas pa'i phyag na /
33a2(rgyud 'bum): ste// gnyis pa na ni be con nyid// gsum pa mtshon cha mda' dang ldan// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa ste// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni gcu nyid bsnams// dkyil 'khor dmar po 'phar
33a3(rgyud 'bum): pabacan/ / sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bskrun pa'i// sangs rgyas sprin ni rtag tu 'phro// bags kyis rtogs pa'i ye shes rdo rjes rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// hUM zhes gsungs pa'i khro bo ni// ye shes
33a4(rgyud 'bum): dam pa stobs po che/ / zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan// sprin gyi kha dog 'dra ba ste// sbrul gyi brgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// mig dmar skra 'bar gyen du brdzes/
33a5(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo sa ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs// dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad// de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs// g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan pa// pad+ma la bzhugs 'gying bag can// drag po'i tsham rngam
33a6(rgyud 'bum): stang stabs can/ / phyogs bcu'i lha rnams phung bar mdzad// 'bar ba rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor nang na bzhugs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa be tsan thogs
33a7(rgyud 'bum): par mtshon/ / gsum pa yis ni ral gri gdengs// bzhi pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin// gsum pa na ni tho ba nyid// phyag
33b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa ni gzhu can la/ / sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro ba// sgom pa mchog gis bsgom par bya// gnol ba med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// b+h+rUM gi ye
33b2(rgyud 'bum): shes las bsgrubs pa/ / gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ste// sku gsum ldan pa zhal ras gsum// gser gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba// 'dom gang 'od kyis rnam par brgyan// ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rnam par
33b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / rin chen ri stengs pad+ma la// rdo rje skyil mo krung du bzhugs// rigs kyi yum ni bzhi po rnams// gzugs dang yan lag kun mdangs can// zhal ras 'jo sgeg tshul gyis brgyan// gos dang rgyan gyis
33b4(rgyud 'bum): klubs pa ste/ / chags phyir spro ba'i rtsol ba can// phyag rgya rin chen snye ma dang // rdo rje pad+ma ut+pal ldan// lha mo so so'i phyogs na bzhugs// gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can// kun tu 'khor lo'i 'phreng
33b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / 'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas// 'od zer 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bas// nam mkha' thams cad 'gengs par mdzad// byang chub snying po don gnyer
33b6(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / 'di 'dra 'khor lo can bsgom zhing // bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// ring po mi thogs 'dod pa 'thob// byang chub snying po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
33b7(rgyud 'bum): dzaM gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// gnod sbyin gnod gnas sku gsum can// zhal ras gsum pa phyag gnyis na// bI dza pu ri ne'u le can// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'am// yang na bzang po'i 'dug spangs
34a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / ngos na rgyan rnams thams cad kyis// brgyan pa'i gnod sbyin mo bzhi dag/ rin chen char pa 'bebs par byed// mag za'i steng na sangs rgyas lnga// de yi cod pan bzang /
34a2(rgyud 'bum): po yi// g.yon phyogs rtse bran rgyan yang chags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing // rin chen char pa 'bebs par mdzad// gang zhig nor rdzas 'dod pa yis// gnod gnas 'di 'dra bsgoms byas na//
34a3(rgyud 'bum): de yis sa chen ror rdzas kyis// ring por mi thogs gang bar 'gyur// lag na rdo rjes bdud rtsi yi// chu yang rtag tu 'bul bar bya// rin po che sprin sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
34a4(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin to/ / ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i// nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer can// rta bdun ldan pa'i shing rtang bzhugs// 'bar ba'i lag 'khyor snang mdzad pa// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum ldan//
34a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag drug kha dog ser por snang // phyogs bcu bsrung bar brtson pa ste// 'jo sgeg tshul du zhal yang bzhad// na chung rgyan ni g.yo ba can// cod pan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga// thor tsugs me tog rnams kyis
34a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa na ni khab skud bsnams// gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa a shwa'i yal ga ste// gsum pa ni ni
34a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhu nyid do/ / gzugs brnyan mang po 'phro ba yis// sdang ba'i sems can bcing ba dang // mig dang kha ni 'drug par byed// gsang sngags bzlas brjod 'bad pa dag/ gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na//
34b1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo hUM mdzad bsgom par bya// 'di ni sgom par byed pa yin// dbang du sems can rab tu 'gro// spang ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i rdo rje mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// pa yi ye shes las
34b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs pa'i/ / rig pa'i ri khrod shing lo can// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// zhal ras bzhad cing khro dang bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na chung gzhon nu phyag drug ma/
34b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa ni ni dgra sta nyid// gsum pa mda' yang rnam par gsor// g.yon pa sngags mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa shing lo'i bam po ste// phyag gsum pa na gzhu
34b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid do/ / thor tsugs me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// de steng kha dog lnga po dag/ rab tu 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// mdog ser pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// dkyil 'khor dmar po cher 'bar
34b5(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / khro bo'i sprin 'phro sdud mdzad cing // gnod gang skyed dgu'i nang gnas pa// de dag khro bo'i mes kyang sreg/ phyir yang bsregs nas sangs rgyas kyis// kha dog bdud rtsi char 'bebs mdzad
34b6(rgyud 'bum): de 'dra rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms nas/ / mings thams cad zhi bar mdzad// nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dza yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/
34b7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags mtshan ni dug sel ma// sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can// nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa ste// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// gzhon nur mtshan ni 'bar ba can// bzhad cing
35a1(rgyud 'bum): khro dang bcas pa ste/ / sbrul gyi ska rags dag gis brgyan// phyag drug rol pa'i stang stabs can// mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/
35a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa ral gri thogs par brtson// phyag gsum pa ni gar thabs kyis// stang stabs tshul gyis mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// gnyis pa drug gi me tog can// phyag
35a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa ni gzhu nyid do/ / dbu rgyan me tog rnams kyis brgyan// gser mdog pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'od ni dmar po dkyil 'khor can// dzaM rnams 'phro bas bskor ba ste// kun nas 'bar ba rnam
35a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis khebs/ / sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'phro ba can// phyag bzang bum pa zla 'dra ba'i// kha ni dza yis rnam brgyan pas// dug gis phog pa rnams la ldugs// rtag tu sku gsum dug sel ma//
35a5(rgyud 'bum): dug gis phog pa rnams la bsgom// de ltar bsgom pa byas pa yis// ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob// nyon mongs rnams kyi dug sel ba// gdengs ka'i dbang po rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i
35a6(rgyud 'bum): / ting nge 'dzin to// tri yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// sku chen ha la ha la ste// zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa// thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan// zla ba tshes pa bsnams pa'i lha// dbu rgyan
35a7(rgyud 'bum): thod pa dag gis brgyan/ / bor tsugs rgyal po'i sku gzugs bzhugs// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// pad+ma dkar po lta bur snang // sems stobs ldan pa'i 'jo tshul can// phyag brgyad zhal yang
35b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhad pa ste/ / smad g.yogs stag gi pags pa mnapas// g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste// gnyis pa bgrang nor 'phreng ba can// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// g.yon pa pad+mas rnam par brgyan
35b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ / gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do// g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa la// sbrul gyis yongs su dkris pa ste// g.yon na thod pa dri zhim pa'i// me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba//
35b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dmar po la bzhugs pa// rol pa'i stang stabs tshul du gnas// rin chen ri pug nang bzhugs par// rnal 'byor sems dpas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas rang bzhin gzugs dang ni// cho 'phrul chen
35b4(rgyud 'bum): po sna tshogs 'byung / / rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis// kha zas thams cad za byed cing // nang gis sngags pas sngags brjod cing // rim bzhin rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na// byang chub myur du thob
35b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / bla na med pa'i bde ba 'dren// 'dod pa thams cad rang bsgrubs pa// hal hal yongs su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa//
35b6(rgyud 'bum): stong chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa'i// lha mo nad kun 'phrog ma ste// sdang ba'i sems can 'joms mdzad ma// phyag stong ldan zhing dbu stong la// spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan// brtson chen phyag
35b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad khro ba dang / / steg pa'i 'thabs kyis dgongs pa can// phyag g.yas mchod sprin lha rdzas kyi// ral gri lcags kyu mda' dang ldan// phyag g.yon pad+mo rdo rje nor// zhags pa gzhu dang sta ra can//
36a1(rgyud 'bum): mdog dmar zhal ras bzhi pa ste// bgegs stong 'joms par mdzad pa yin// rang gi rnal 'byor la brtson pas// nam mkha'i mthar gtugs 'jug cing spro// glang poH
36a2(rgyud 'bum): dang skyes pa dag/ za bar mdzad ma 'phreng ba can// de yi las kyis bskul ba yi// gsang sngags dpa' bos gdon par bya// rnal 'byor dbang phyug las 'dod pas// 'di byas pas ni srung bar 'gyur//
36a3(rgyud 'bum): dpung chen po la rnam par lta ba thams cad srung ba stobs kyi mchog stong chen po rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dz+ha zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i sdigs pa'i
36a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo'i phyag rgya can drag mo chen mo zhal son pa/ / spyan gsum dang phyag brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa la// ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / 'khor lo dang / mda' bsnams pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa
36a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / rdo rje dang / gcu dang / chom rkun mdzub mos sdigs pa ste// rdo rje ro langs 'byung ba dag/ mthong bas dpung rnams bcom gtor bas// lha mo rtag tu bsgoms na ni// ring por mi thogs bya
36a6(rgyud 'bum): chub 'thob/ / 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa la mkhas pa mchog gi rtse mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// stobs mo che pha rol gnon par mdzang ma spyan
36a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang phyag brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / mda' dang / phyag g.yon na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / dgra stong
36b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhu bsnams pa dang / sdang ba'i bgegs rnams ltung bar mdzad par bya'o// bu mi 'tsho dang mo gsham dag/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcug nas su// lha rnams kun gyi bum pa yis// slob dpon
36b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni dbang bskur zhing / / de yi mngal du byis pa ni// 'jam pa'i gzugs can 'jug par bsam// zhags pa'i phyag rgyas mtshan ngan nas// skyes pa gzugs can 'byung ba dang // dran pa yis
36b3(rgyud 'bum): ni bral nas kyang / / mngal ni bsod nams dag gis spel// mngal thams cad rnam par lta ba so sor 'brang ma'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// ba yi ye shes ral pas
36b4(rgyud 'bum): bskrun/ / lha mo nor gyi blo gros ma// gzi byin gser gyi mdog can la// phyag drug lang tsho dar la bam// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// 'jo sgeg zabs bcas 'bar ba ste// de yi phyag g.yas
36b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog sbyin mdzad/ / gnyis pa 'bru yi ske ma can// gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor// phyag g.yon yid bzhin nor bu dang // rin chen char 'bebs gzu yang 'dzin// grogs mo'i skye bos yongs
36b6(rgyud 'bum): bskor cing / / mngag gzhug gnod sbyin mo yi gzugs// rin chen char pa 'bebs pa dang // nor kun gyi ni char pa dag/ 'bebs par byed pa bsam par bya// nor gyi blo gros chen mo 'di// de ltar
36b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas bsgoms na de/ / dpag tshad bdun ni rgyas par yang // nor gyi char gyis khyab par mdzad// byang chub sbyin mchog dam pa ma// de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid sgom// nor gyi rgyun gyi char
37a1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / ba yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa// srin mo 'bar ba'i glog 'phreng can// ming ni dngul dkar las skyes
37a2(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / stobs mo chel pha rol gnon// gsus 'phyang mo la mche gtsigs ma// skra ser mo'amakham pa gyen du brdzis pa// thor nugs dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ spyi bo la mi 'jugs pa banus
37a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / phyag bco brgyad pa/ mgo bcu gnyis pa/ spyan gsum gsum can/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang ldan pa/ drag mo lag na khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa thogs pa/ smad g.yog seng ge'i
37a4(rgyud 'bum): pags pas g.yogs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can/ ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / 'khor lo dang / gtun shing dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang /
37a5(rgyud 'bum): ltalhag dbyug dang / mdung dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / mdung thung dang / be con dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / tho ba thogs pa/ lus kyi rgyan thams
37a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis brgyan pa/ mdog gnag pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la rol pa'i stabs su bzhugs pa/ sdang ba dang 'dul ba zhes brjod pa 'di lta bu/ rtag tu hUM gis hUM mdzad pa// bzlas brjod yang
37a7(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan par bsgom/ / sems can kun don tshogs pa yi// byang chub ring por mi thogs 'thob// sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog rang byang chub kyi snying por rnam par rgyal ba'i
37b1(rgyud 'bum): stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / k+ShiM zhes bya bas bsgoms pa'i gzugs// rgyan rnam kun gyis brgyan pa ste// na chung gzhon nu 'jo tshul can// mgo bo sgra tshugs phyed du gzung //
37b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du ni stod g.yogs kyang // la dkar seng ba bgos pa ste// de la kha dog lnga pa yi// me tog 'phrul pa rnams kyis brgyan// gser gyi mdog can bzhin 'dzum pa// phyed bzung
37b3(rgyud 'bum): bas ni rnam par rol/ / dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa yi// rin chen ri la legs par bzhugs// 'jam pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis// de yi mgo bo mnan nas bzhugs// tha ma thog thag
37b4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin mos/ / nam mkha' gang bar bsgom par bya// gnod sbyin mo thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// sngags la oM AHhUM/ yi ge gsum pa mig gsum gzug/
37b5(rgyud 'bum): khyab 'jug lha chen ma po ste// gdong gsum rang gi mtshon thogs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis bskul cing // rdo rje ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na// mod la dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten
37b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad grub pa mig gsum rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / gzhan yang gsang sngags yi ge yi// sa bon gang gis sbyar byas te// rdo rje yig 'bru rnams bsgoms nas//
37b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag ma bsgrims bzhin du sgrub// 'phrog ma 'phrog byed las skyes pa'i// bu ni lnga brgya po rnams dang // lnga rtsen dang ni dpal can ma// myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po
38a1(rgyud 'bum): sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'i le'u ste ban pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs
38a2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhi bar lta ba rdul dang bral ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las sna tshogs
38a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi ye shes bskyed par mdzad pa 'di dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las byung ngo / / oM b+ha ga ba ta ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ne sarba a sA d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas las thams cad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa
38a4(rgyud 'bum): 'odi gsungs pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams dgyes// bdud kyi dpung rnams 'das 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes par byed// zhi
38a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ / rdo rje dam tshig gis bskul na// shi ba rnams la srog sbyin mdzad// ma grub pa rnams grub par stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po
38a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsum rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / rdo rje 'chang mchog thams cad bskyed pa'i yum rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams
38a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dngos grub tham cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa 'di phyung ngo / / oM shaM ka re/ shan+tiM ka ri g+hu Ta g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya g+hu Ti ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rdo rje gsum las skyes gyur pa// tham
38b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ni mig phye nas/ / rdo rje shugs ni rjes dran gyur// sgrub pa thams cad srung mdzad ma// de bzhin las rnams sgrub pa yaM// sdig pa thams cad 'joms ma ste// zhi dang rgyas dang 'phel mdzad ma'o// de nas
38b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'dod chags chen pos zhen pa pad+ma gar gyi stang stabs thug kyis rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par 'thor ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom par zhugs nas/ chos tham cad 'dzin pa mchog gi yum 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyung ngo /
38b3(rgyud 'bum): / oM ka Ta bi ke Te ni ka Te ka kak+Sha Te swA hA// de nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan mchog/ dam pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// ting nge 'dzin gyi mig
38b4(rgyud 'bum): phye nas/ / rdo rje pad+ma rjes dran byed// rgyas pa chen po yum yin te// chos mdzod rnam par 'phel mdzad ma// bsgoms shing bstan te bzlas brjod na// rgya cher srung bar mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan
38b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bya ba khong du chud pas rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / ye shes la 'jug par byed pa sna tshogs
38b6(rgyud 'bum): tham cang 'chang ba'i yum gyi sgrol ma 'di gsungs so/ / oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun dang sras kyis rnams// spyan phye rnam par gdangs nas su// ye shes rdo rje
38b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa dran/ / lha mo bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis// skye dgu rnams ni mngag gzhug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi mchog gi ye shes la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
39a1(rgyud 'bum): @ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAHoM kha kha kha hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sata da ma ka a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hastA/
39a2(rgyud 'bum): tsa tur mu ka kha/ tsa tud d+hu dza/ Sha thung // A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba duSh+TaprASh+Ta/ a pa ha ri Ni/ ma hA bir+t+ti g+hA ta ka/ bi kr-i ta A nan/ sarba b+hu ta b+ha yaM ka ra/ Ar+thA n+na hA/ sa nA di na/ brA g+hA tsarma ni ba
39a3(rgyud 'bum): san/ ku ru ku ru/ sarba kar+m+ma Ni/ tsAn+di ts+tshin+da/ sarba man+t+ran/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ ba ra mu drAn/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ sarba d+hA tAn// tha ma tha ma/ nirma tha ni rmaH/ sarba suSh+Ta/ pra be sha ma pra be sha ya/
39a4(rgyud 'bum): maN+Da la ma d+h+ye bai ba sha ta/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAr+ya/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi laM ba mA bi laM ba/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ dU / phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba nA
39a5(rgyud 'bum): ya ri tAM/ ka ra ka ra/ big+h+nAn sarba A sha pa ri pU ra ka/ he he b+ha ga ban/ kiny+tsi rA ya si ma ma sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ya swAhA/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems mkhas kun//
39a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dar zhing 'jigs pa skyes gyur nas// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// rdo rje ra ba dra ba yi// ye shes sna tshogs can la lta// srubs gcig pa 'am srubs gnyis pa'i// thod pa bzang po rnyed pa dang /
39a7(rgyud 'bum): rkang rjes pa yi cho ga la// lha mo bzhi yi sbyor ba dang // sangs rgyas lnga yis byin brlabs te// sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms nas su// myur bar khugs kyi bar du ni// rkang pas mnan te bzlas brjod bya//
39b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyi rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i mchog sprin chen po nam mkha' rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
39b2(rgyud 'bum): / rdorje gsum rnams las snying po 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA daM ta ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ oM a mri tra kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA u0f7f k
39b3(rgyud 'bum): hA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+hA ban d+hA/ ha na ha na/ da had ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba b+hi g+h+nAM bi na ya kAn/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzA bi tAn+ta ka ra ye swAhA/ khro bo chen po gsungs pa
39b4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad ni// yid phyung nas ni skrag par gyur// log 'dren rnams dang bgegs rnams 'dar// sku gsum ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran//
39b5(rgyud 'bum): de yi rkang rjes sa dang ni// rlung gis gtsug pa'i shing lo la// khro bo'i 'khor lor gzir nas su// tshogs bdag rkang pa'i drung du gzhag/ hUM dang phaT kyis bskul nas su// bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas
39b6(rgyud 'bum): na ni/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje can yang skrod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rin chen gyis rin chen 'phro ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje zhes bya
39b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i khro bo chen po sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / / na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra trI/ oM hUM dzi na ri tiSh+Tha hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas khro bo'i 'di brjod pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems
40a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams/ / 'jigs par gyur cing skrag gyur nas// gtso bo rnam snang mdzad pa dran// srin po 'byung po dang mkha' 'gro// skem byed gdon rnams gzer ba la/
40a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gzer ba'i sbyor ba yis// hUM tsam gyis kyang las byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mtha' yas kyis yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa kun nas sdud pa'i rdo rje zhes bya
40a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje pad+ma ri khro bo chen po 'di sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ oM hUM hUM hUM ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sarba bi Sha g+hA ta ka/ dza li ta
40a4(rgyud 'bum): pu s+phu laM ga/ aT+TAn+da sA sa nA di naM/ ke Sha ri sarba to pa Ta ka ra/ badz+ra khu ra/ ri na g+hA ta na/ tsa li ta ba su d+ha ta la ni shA sa ma ru to ta k+Shi p+ta d+hA ra Ni d+ha ra/ b+hI Sha na aT+TAT+Ta ta/ Ta Ta Ta bA sa a pA ri mi tA/
40a5(rgyud 'bum): ba la pa rA kra ma/ Ar+ya ga Na b+hI ta b+hU ta ga/ ar+d+ha Shi ta/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha hA ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+ta na/ smin+dats+tshin+da/ sid+d+him+bi A be Sha A be Sha ya/ badz+ra sarba dz+wa ra bi shA tsA na/ sarba pra
40a6(rgyud 'bum): 'u/ / a pra ti sa to b+ha ba/ badz+ra daMShA kiny+tsi ra ya si/ i daM duSh+pa gra ha na/ duSh+Ta sarba ma hA/ d+hun d+hu na/ tha ma tha ma/ mar da mar da mar da/ pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ maT marba/
40a7(rgyud 'bum): baM d+ha ba~M d+ha/ budz+ra rdzarma saM g+ha/ a nu dz+nyA taM karma ku ru shI b+h+r-i ha ya grI bA ya phaT/ badz+ra ya phaT/ badz+ra g+hA ta ya phaT/ badz+ra ne tA ya phaT/ badz+ra daMShA ya phaT/ badz+ra khu rA phaT/ badz+ra khu ra rin/
40b1(rgyud 'bum): g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ra man+ta bi nA sha nA ya phaT/ badz+ra trai lokya b+ha a yaM ka ra phaT/ sarba karma su pra ti ha ta ya phaT/ badz+ra ku la san+d+ha sa nA ya phaT/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT paT swAhA/ de nas khro chen byung ba
40b2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / rdo rje pad mchog las byung rnams// yid ni 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur// 'khor bcas 'jigs pas rnams 'khrugs nas// byang chub tshogs ni dran byed cing // ye shes rdo rje dran
40b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / lag pa la ni pad+ma dang // ha zhes bya ba mchog 'bar bsam// khro rgyal ting 'dzin la gnas nas// rdo rje gsum yig 'dzin pa yis// khams gsum dag kyang khyab byed pa'o//
40b4(rgyud 'bum): mi bzadang dug ni drang bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis don yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
40b5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po be con sngon po can 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo / / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ e hi e hi/ b+ha ga b+ha nA/ nI la badz+ra dat+ta/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ gu lu
40b6(rgyud 'bum): gu lu/ gu lA pa ya/ gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga ba na bA yu be ga~M na/ d+hu tAn shIg+h+ra~M/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ ba ha ba ha/ btsa patsa/ ma tha ma tha/ bA ta ya pA ta ya/ maT ma Ta/
40b7(rgyud 'bum): mo TA pa ya mo TA pa ya/ sarba kar+m+ma Ni/ ts+tshin dats+tshi na da/ b+ha k+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ a s+thi mi daM a s+ya ru d+hi ha ra mad dza mi daM bi shwA mad dza/ ru d+hi ra/ pri ya e h+ye hi b+ha ga bA na/ sarba big+h+nan/ sarba man+ta Ni sarba
41a1(rgyud 'bum): mU la karmA Ni kr-i ti ma Ni/ sarba prahA na/ han ha na/ b+han+d+ha b+hAny+dza/ mang dmard/ i daM me/ kar+tha sA d+ha ya/ hU nI la ya ni la badz+ra dan+ta ya/ tu ru hu ru/ bag+h+nAn
41a2(rgyud 'bum): binA ya ka/ nA shA yan na ya/ hu ru hu r+ya/ dip+ta tsaN+Daya/ sarba sha trA na thaMng yAn pI rbaya/ ts+tshin sIH/ ba ra bin+da nA ma/ ts+tshe ka r+m+madzadz+haiM/ nam shiSh+Tha kA/ sa ma nA~M a nustA
41a3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra d+ha ra bA tsanaH/ mang na ma ni kr-in/ hU han ha na// da ga ha/ patsa pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ gu ru phu ru/ sarba paT+Ta/ rU pU kr-i ta nA ya/ de ba ri Shi bi drA ba ya ka/ san badz+ra nganan
41a4(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ blo 'a chen po mchog gsungs ma thag tu bdud kyi ris thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rab tu g.yos te sku gsum gyi mchog gtso ba rnam par snang mdzad dran par gyur te/ sangs rgyas
41a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs bskul na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la khro bo chen pos gsod par byed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas bkod
41a6(rgyud 'bum): ba kun tu rnam par 'phro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs po che rdo rje 'di sku gsum las phyung ngo / / na maHsa man+ta dudz+nyA nA ma hA hA swA paT phaT phaT/ uH
41a7(rgyud 'bum): shU la pA Ni hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo taM nir nA da hU hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA bA la ya swA hA// de nas khro bo gsungs tsam gyis// gdengs ka yis ni bskor ba kun/ yid ni shin tu
41b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs skrag ste/ / rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dran// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas pa yis// las kun rab tu grub par byed// char pa chen gcod gyur la// char pa chung na rab tu 'bebs/
41b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo chen po 'dod pa'i khro ba 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo // na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA/
41b3(rgyud 'bum): DAk+ki hUM dzaHde nas khro bo gsungs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'dar// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang skrag/ bdud kyi dpung rnams ltung bar gyur// rkang g.yas sna tshogs rdo rje
41b4(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / sbyor bas mtshan ni mnan nas su// sku gsum ye shes stobs ldan pas/ khro gnyer rim par bsnyer byas te// gsang sngags kun gyis bkug nas nas su// sems can thams cad dbang du byed//
41b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje rab tu 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i ye shes rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje khros
41b6(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yo ba gtum po 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyung ngo / / na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsa la kA Na tsa Na Da/ na Da na Da/ man+t+ra man+ta/ sar+b+ba sar+b+ba/ tan+na tan+da/ ta na ta na/ da ha da ha
41b7(rgyud 'bum): mo ga mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ has ha sa/ badz+ra pA sa ku ru/ ha sa hA sa hA sa/ ma ra ma ra rba ma raT/ kathA gar+dz+dza/ ha na han/ ban d+ha banaH/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ A bi sha A bi shA man+t+ra pa la ka/
42a1(rgyud 'bum): kun d+han/ taNata// kha dang/ big+h+nAn/ nA ra sa nA ra ya duShAn/ zaka dzAsa?/ sarban ku ru kA ru/ ka ri/ ma hA ga Sha ma r+d+ha sAms sAH
42a2(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ tri ba lI ta raM ga narta ka/ A A A hAM hA hAM/ a tsa la tsa traM/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ d+hU hUM/ a sa man+ta ka Ta Ta ma hA ba la sha ta ya/ pa ra man+tan/ a a hA traM/ maM shud t+yaM tu loka
42a3(rgyud 'bum): tu Sh+yaM tu badz+ra/ na mo tu sU a pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yaHdza lA ya/ trAT/ a sa ha na ma swAhA/ de nas khro bo mi g.yo ba// khro bo stobs chen 'di gsungs pas// lha dang klu kun mnga' gzhug byed/
42a4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin// 'jigs pa thob nas brgyal bar 'gyur// bdud kyi snga rnams lhung nas su// tshig cing rab tu zhum pa bzhin// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran// khro bo'i rgyal po du ma
42a5(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / bcug pas 'jigs pas nyin bzhin du// gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad nyid// sna tshogs las rnams myur du mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gsheg
42a6(rgyud 'bum): pas sku gsum gyi ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jigs pa chen po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gnod mdzes 'di gsungs so/ / oM sum+b+ha ni
42a7(rgyud 'bum): sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-i h+Na br-i sta hUM/ gr-i h+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A nA ya ho// b+ha ga dAn/ bi d+ha rA dzA hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas// lha yi bu mo thams cad ni// sla tshugs zhig cing ba
42b1(rgyud 'bum): bur gyur/ / mig rtsa rig rig byed pa dag/ sku gsum rdo rje mchog mnga' ba'i// zhal gyis nu ma gnyis mnan pas// gtso bo rdo rje rnam par mdzad// ye shes kyis ni 'joms dran gyur// lcags
42b2(rgyud 'bum): klu yis ni rnam dral te/ / rdo rje zhags pas bcings nas su// bu mo thams cad dgugs bya ba// bu mo dgug pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes chen po rnam par 'gyings pa'i
42b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsum gyis mchog rdo rje 'chang bskyed par mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di rjes su dran par mdzad do/ / 'khor lo che la rnams
42b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin dag dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba'i sprin// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags thogs 'byin// kun mkhyen ye shes las 'byung gtso// gsang sngags skyes bur
42b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag bsgoms na/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyang dgug byed na// rdo rje 'chang sogs ci zhig smos// bud med lha chen bu mo dag/ rlung la rkang pa gzhag nas su// lcags kyus snying la drangs nas ni//
42b6(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun yang 'gugs 'gyur te// 'di la dpyad pa cung zad med// rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ni// sku chen zla ba'i kha dog yin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// rdo rje bdud rtsa
42b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs bsam ste/ / lan grangs bcu ni brjod pa yis// de ni gdon mi za bar khugs// rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rdo rje lcags kyu chen po yis// 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yis//
43a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu ma dag nges par 'gugs// rdo rje gsum 'khrugs lnga ba ni// rdo rjes 'og gnas pa ste// lha ma yin kun nges sreg cing // lha min bu mo rjes chags pas/
43a2(rgyud 'bum): gsal shing gis ni bsgyel nas su// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis// drangs nas lha min bu mo 'gugs// btsag dang thod le kor dang ni// ba tha 'byor par 'gyur na ni// gzas zin tshen khar bcug
43a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rdzas rgyal rdo rje lcags kyus 'grub// drag po rlung dang khyab 'jug dang // lha mo gnod sbyin gnod sbyin ma// mngag gzhug bcas par 'jigs skrag ste// ming bris kun nas rtag tu 'gugs/
43a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'khor lor legs zhugs te// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer rnam par sgom// khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed// lag na rdo rje lcags kyu thogs// khros shing 'bar ba 'phro ba yis// gnod sbyin du
43a5(rgyud 'bum): / mo bkug nas spyod// phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan 'khor lo sbyor ba yis// 'gug par bya ba'i tshig gsungs pa// gzhan du byas na grub mi 'gyur// rgyal po'i zhabs drung
43a6(rgyud 'bum): kun gnas pas/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// kun gyis sems rab rdzogs byed pas// yang dang yang du skul bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos rdo rje'i de
43a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pas ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rgyal mo chen mo rnam par bsgyur ba'i rdo rje 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /
43b1(rgyud 'bum): oM shU li ni swA hA// de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// klu mo dbang chen grags pa dag/ gos dang bral zhing tshig bzhin du// gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran// gsang sngags rig sngags 'di yis ni/
43b2(rgyud 'bum): klu rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed// bsam gtan rdo rje mthu dang ni// gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa yis// gser gdub rgyan ni gsol ba yi// klu mo'i mig yangs bkug nas ni//
43b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags pa'i// klu mo nye bar spyod par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 'phro ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
43b4(rgyud 'bum): / zhugs nas skul byed ma chen mo'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen po 'di gsungs so// nA maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ sa muka sa bud+d+ha ka TI nan/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+d+ra swA hA/ de nas rig sngags che
43b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pas/ / sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus// ting nge 'dzin las g.yos par gyur// bdud rnams brgyal zhing tshog nas su// thams cad cho nges
43b6(rgyud 'bum): 'debs par byed/ / sa yi 'og gi bu mo dang // lha min bu mo klu mo dang // gsang dbang bu mo rnams 'khrugs nas// gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran// rig sngags 'di ni bzlas pa dang // sgom pa yi ni sbyor ba
43b7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur zhing // bkug nas rab tu longs spyod byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
44a1(rgyud 'bum): thabs nas chos bdud rtsi'i dam tshigs pa rdurdza grogazer 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las byu / / oM thA sa nA sha ni tras ni thA sa tAs ma/ ba d+hAk+Sha/ taH/ bci
44a2(rgyud 'bum): she te/ shwe te/ dza Ta ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// rig sngags 'chang dang lha rnams ni// g.yos shing 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur// bdud rnams 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs te// gas
44a3(rgyud 'bum): rdorje rnam snang mdzad/ / yid gcig tu ni dran par byed// nor bu'i gdub rnams g.yo ba yis// rig sngags 'chang ma klu mor bcas// lha min bu mo gsang ba yis// bu mo bkug nas spyod par byed// 'dis ni
44a4(rgyud 'bum): las kun byed pa dang / / mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'jigs pa yin// yang na gsang sngags thams cad ni// skye bo med pa'i nags tshal du// sngags pas bye ba bzlas nas su// las rnams thams cad bya bar
44a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / gang gzhan slob dpon smod pa dang // theg pa chen po spyan 'byin dang // mi gang gsang sngags rgyud dag gi/ sbyar ba la ni 'bya byed pa// de yis dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// don rtag tu
44a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis thon/ / bsgoms nas gsad par bya ba'am// yang na lus ni gzhig par bya// sngags pas 'di ltar byas nas ni// byang chub dngos grub legs par 'thob// phyogs btsun sems can thams cad
44a7(rgyud 'bum): sku gsum ye shes las 'byung ba'i/ / khyad par du ni bsgom par bya// dpral 'di ni the tsom med// khrag 'thung chu yis badran pa'am// dur khrod thal pa'am bshang gtsoyis// brlan pa'i gos ni bgos
44b1(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas su// khro za'i rgyal por sbyor byas te// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nA// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig/ chus brlan pa yi gos bgos te// rba
44b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i mdun du bcings nas su/ / rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig/ bshang gci yis ni spags pa'i gos// rul ba'i dri can smad pa dag/ bgos nas gsang sngags
44b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod na/ / mod la 'chi ba'am bskams par 'gyur// dur khrod thal bas bsdus pa'i gos// bgos nas khro bo 'khrugs nas nis// lan grangs stong du brjod na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par
44b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig/ sgra ni lkug par bshig nas ni// kha bzhin rnam par 'gyur byas te// rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas ni// nam mkha'i khams kyang 'jig par 'gyur// ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam// khang stong
44b5(rgyud 'bum): dam ni bzhi mdo 'am/ / mtshan ma gcig pa'am shing gcig tu// drag shul spyod pa rtsam par bya// de yi rkang rjes sa la ni/ mi rus las byas phur bu dag/ sor brgyad rtsam gyi tshad tsam la// lan grangs brgya
44b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i/ / phur bu yis ni btang nas su// dgra yi khyim sgor brkos te bzhug/ sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa// shes dang mi shes spangs pa yang // zla phyed nya yi nang rol du// 'ching
44b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'am yang na 'jig par 'gyur/ / mkhas pas thod pa yongs tshang ba// khyad par can ni rnyed pa dang // de la gsang sngags tshig bris te// rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod nas// dgra yi sgo 'am yang na ni/
45a1(rgyud 'bum): @grong du sbas na nges par skrod// ta la'i 'dab ma'am gzhan la'ang rung // khro bos gsang sngags legs bris te// dgra yi khyim mam sgo kar ni// sbas na 'chi'am bskams par 'gyur/
45a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsum rdo rje'i phur bu'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
45a3(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par zhugs te/ / khams gsum thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang // gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oMH
45a4(rgyud 'bum): g+hag+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAn phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la/ badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra/ kI la ya hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas 'di
45a5(rgyud 'bum): ni gsungs tsam gyis/ / rdo rje dbang chen grags pa kun// brgyal nas 'jigs pa skyes gyur te// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran// mi yi rus pa'i phur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng las byung ba 'am// lcags
45a6(rgyud 'bum): las byas pa'i phur bus ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par 'jig/ rdo rje sems dpar mnyam bzhag ste// 'od bzang me stag 'khrug pa can// sku gsum rdo rje mtha' gtugs pas// gzugs brnyan pa ni bsas/
45a7(rgyud 'bum): nas sbyar// rnam snang phyag rgya chen po 'am// yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can// phyag rgya chen po gshin rje gshed// 'dod pa'i khro ba nyid du ni// rdo rje phur bu bsam par bya// bdag nyid chen po stobs po che/
45b1(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi zab sbyor rdo rje dang // rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gyis// sdang dang gtum po gcad par bya// sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang // thugs nas zhabs la thug bar du// rdo rje phur bus rnam par bsgoms/
45b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par gnon// 'di ni phur bu'i mthu rlabs te// steng 'og lha yi dam tshig yin// rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang // sangs rgyas thams cad gnon pa yi//
45b3(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin sbyor ba 'di yis ni// myur du 'chi 'am bskams par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes rnams par 'gyings pa'i
45b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang / / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo // oM ts+tshin da
45b5(rgyud 'bum): ts+tshin da/ ha ra ha ra/ dIp+ta badz+ra tsakra hUM phaT/ phan tshun bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni// mthe bo'i ngos kyi drung du bdugs// snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnan nas su// rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya// btab pa tsam gyis
45b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' che/ / sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gi bzhengs par mdzad// gzhan du byas na rlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i thugs kyi ye shes chen po rnam par
45b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i stang stabs kyi phur bu zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje sku dang / / gsung dang / thugs rnams las phyung ngo //
46a1(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra rA NA hUM/ rtse mo lnga pa bcings nas su// me stag 'phro ba bsgoms byas te// rdo rje thugs kyis zhabs kyis mnan// rdo rje pur bus gdab par bya// btab pa tsam gyis
46a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po che/ / sku gsum ye shes las byung ba// dam tshig mchog gis bzhes mdzad do// gzhan du byas na rlag par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig mchog rnam
46a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig gi stang stabs kyis phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo //
46a4(rgyud 'bum): oM tri oM b+hur+N+Na pa/ rdo rje sor mo bcum pa yis// pad+ma kha bye 'bar ba yis// 'dod chags rdo rje zhabs kyis mnan// rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab// btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che// sku gsum ye shes las
46a5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ / dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod// gzhan du byas na rlag par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyis chags pa yin// cho ga bzang po tsam gyis ni// rdo rje mkha' dbyings mthas gtugs pa/
46a6(rgyud 'bum): mnan 'byung 'di la the tsom med// ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje phur bu'i tshig rnams bka' stsal to// de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog/ sems can khams la phan bzhed rnams/
46a7(rgyud 'bum): dgyes shing mgu ba brnyes nas su// rdo rje dbyings kyis 'di skad gsungs// kye mo'o gsang ba'i tshig gi mchog/ kye ma'o gsang ba kun 'dus pa// kye ma'o zhi ba chos kyi tshig/ ye shes rdo rje phur bu rmad/
46b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kun gyi phur bus 'di// bde gshegs bka' yi rjes su byed// 'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi ste// phur bu de nyid rnams las byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun thams cad
46b2(rgyud 'bum): gdongs par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'od zer can 'di gsungs so/ / oM mA rI ts+yai de ba tA yai swA hA/ rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni/
46b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang chen drag pa'i sangs rgyas kun// thugs ni dgyes shing mgu bar gyur// sras rnams kyis ni spyan yang phye// 'di ni las rnams thams cad ma// chom rkun sdang ba 'ching mdzad ma/ 'di yi
46b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba la gnas na/ / 'gro ba'i tshe na mthong mi 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas snang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa sems can thams cad
46b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrol bar byed pa'i ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs so/ / oM ma hA sa ha sra pa
46b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par si t+pA da mi ge ma Ni badz+ra Ni hU~M phaT bAd+d+ha/ de nas rig sngags tshe gsungs pas// sangs rgyas shing rnams rab tu g.yos// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // bdud kyi ris rnams pamos par 'gyur
46b7(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad pa/ / khams cad tshig bzhin btud nas rba// bcom ldan rig sngags mthu stobs kyis/ gnod babyin thams cad gzir lags so// gadza ni rig sngags stobs mo che/ kha ro
47a1(rgyud 'bum): gnon pa 'di zlos pa/ / der ni bdag cag mi mchi zhing // der ni bsrung ba dag kyang bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas brgya
47a2(rgyud 'bum): b yin mngon par mtho ba'i stobs lha ma yin rnam par 'joms pas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gzungs chen po 'di gsungs
47a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / oM b+ha ga ba tI d+ha dza gra ke yu re pa ra si n+ya/ bi d+hA na sa na ka sA sa n+ya pa ri la ni/ u lU kA mu khi/ kha kha khA bi khA hi pa ra s+yai nA ma/ a nan+ta b+hu dza/ a nan ta mu khe prA sa ra pra ba ra hU~M phaT phaT swAhA/
47a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams g.yos par gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rab g.yos shing // bdud kyi sde rnams tshig par gyur// gnod sbyin srin po gos bral nas// 'jigs
47a5(rgyud 'bum): shing skrag par gyur pa yis/ / gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis tshig lags te/ bdag cag dam tshig la gnas par 'tshal lags na/ mgon mdzad
47a6(rgyud 'bum): cing lus thams cad rab tu bsgrubs tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas mngal thams cad yang dag par skyes pas khyab pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
47a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo so so 'brang ma 'di gsungs so/ / oM ma Ni d+ha ri badz+ra Ni ma hA pra ti sa re swA hA/ rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa dang // rig sngags rgyal mo'i
47b1(rgyud 'bum): mthu yis ni/ / mi yi skye dgu 'tshe byed pa// mthu chen mangs ni 'phrog pa dang // log 'dren kun dang sdang ba'i rnams// mi bzad me lces tshig gyur nas// 'jigs pa dang ni skrag pa yis// rdo rje snang /
47b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad drung lhags te// zhabs la gtugs te tshig smras pa// bdag cag dam tshig gnas par 'tshal// rig sngags dam tshig rtag gnas pa// gang gis mngal yang mi 'phrog cing // rtag tu mngal ni sbal
47b3(rgyud 'bum): bar mdzad/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas nor gyi rgyun gyi yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal
47b4(rgyud 'bum): mo chen mo nor gyi rgyun 'di gsungs so/ / oM ba su d+hi ri ma hA ba su d+ha ra br-iSh+Ta ni pA ta ni ba su swA hA/ nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba yi// rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dag
47b5(rgyud 'bum): yid ni 'jigs shing skag gyur nas/ / rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi// drung du nye bar 'ongs nas su// dam bcas pa yi tshig smras pa// bcom ldan nor rgyun ces bya ba'i// mtshan ni mi mchog sgrogs bgyid na/
47b6(rgyud 'bum): de la nor gyi char 'bab cing // nor chen dang ni ldan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod par byed pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas srin mo thos
47b7(rgyud 'bum): sang sa bsgyur ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / a re du tri ni ma gu ma ka tsiH/ ma pA be ke d+ha ri srid d+ha dziH/ ma hedar/ ra~M dzi ka pA la ma la d+ha ri Na~M dza Tam kuH/ min te/ nan pra ha ra/ d+harmar+m+mAdz+dza
48a1(rgyud 'bum): paT laT/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu s+pha ra/ ru kra ru k+Sha/ dz+nyA d+d+ha/ bram d+ha ma/ sarba sha dzA tI/ sho na ta bi pa/ tsa/ be bad+ha ra/ patsa ta ba tsata/ bi ki ra ta sa ta
48a2(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ / da sad ha/ sarba shatrUM/ sarba duSh+TAn/ ni lin/ pra sa da yadz+dza/ ma hA d+hA ka ba te/ dz+wal dz+wa la hUM phaH/ che ge mo zhig me pa sha ma na ya swA hA/ de nas srin mo 'bar ba'i thog/ rig sngas
48a3(rgyud 'bum): chen mo gsungs pa yis/ / bdud kyi gnas rnams tshig par gyur// dgra rnams kyi ni snying yang bskams// dur khrod kyi ras la srin mo btsag gis bris nas legs par sbas te gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing
48a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ me tog dmar po dang / dri dmar po dang / gtor ma dang lha bshos dmar por byas pa byin nas dur khrod du brko bar bya'o// de'i steng du ming nas smos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
48a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis gtor to/ / brkos pa'i mod la phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro// mnan pa dang rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog mir
48a6(rgyud 'bum): dka' ston gnod sbyin mo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po 'phrog ma'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM hA ri t+ye ma hA yak+Sha NA ye/
48a7(rgyud 'bum): ha ra ha ra/ sarba yak+Shi NI pra be sha ni sAhA/ de nas 'phrog dga' 'brog ma ni// gnod sbyin chen mo gsungs pa dang // gnod sbyin ma kun g.yos nas su// dngos grub phyir ni mngon phyogs gyur// khro mo'i 'a
48b1(rgyud 'bum): lo gnod sbyin ma/ / brgyad dbus 'phrog mas brgyan byas te// lcags kyu 'bras bu ne le can// gnod sbyin brgyad kyis klubs nas su// gnod sbyin ma kun bsgrub par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad
48b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi ngas chen po zhi bar mdzad pa'i rig sngags ri khrod kyi shing lo can ma 'di gsungs so/ / oM pA shA rtsi brta sha ba
48b3(rgyud 'bum): ri sar+b+ba mA ra pra sha ma ni hUM phaT/ de nas rig sngags tshe gsungs pas// sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// gnod byed nad 'gro srin po dang // sdang ba rnams kyi snying yang zags// yang shing 'o ma can dang
48b4(rgyud 'bum): til/ / 'o mas du bzhi par 'gyur// nam mkhar kun nas rig sngags kyi// rgyal mo legs par bkang nas su// bdud rtsi char 'bebs bsams na ni// mod la gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po
48b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags kyi ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin
48b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sku gsum ye shes kyi rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba lag pa'i phyag rgya tha dad pa rnams mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis nyon cig/ gang zhig
48b7(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ / sdig pa kun las rnam 'grol zhing // 'di ni lus ni byin brlabs te// rang gi gzugs su rnam bsgoms na// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci
49a1(rgyud 'bum): dgos/ / lag pa gnyis su tshur bcangs pa las mthe bong gnyis bteg pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste/ sku byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yon pa'i ma
49a2(rgyud 'bum): bong nang du bcug ste g.yas pa'i mthe bong bteg pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ste/ gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa'i mthe bong nang du bcug ste g.yon pa'i mthe bong bteg pa na
49a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'chang gi ste/ thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng ba'i thor to g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad
49a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag ste/ g.yas pa sa la g.yon pa ni mi 'khrugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa mchog sbyin par
49a5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa ni rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul du byas pa ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa'i mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byas pa ni gdon mi
49a6(rgyud 'bum): za bar grub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcing bar byas pa las gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo'i tshogs dang po bkug ste/ rin po chel
49a7(rgyud 'bum): tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las gung mo pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar gdu bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje chos mo'i rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo nang du bskum pa ni rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgyang//
49b1(rgyud 'bum): lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyor ba las mdzub mo gnyis gdu du ltar byas te mthe bo'i rtse mo mig gi tshul du byas pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs
49b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum par mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul bzung ba ni mA ma kI'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyor te pad+ma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni gos dkar can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo
49b3(rgyud 'bum): khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te/ mthe bong gnyis dbus su bzhag nas cung zad bkug pa ni sgrol mi'i ut+pa la'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar
49b4(rgyud 'bum): te mdzub mo dang gung mo'i tshig dbu mar gdu bu'i tshul du byas nas mthe bong gnyis glor bzhag pa 'di ni skul byed ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nas rdo rje bcings pa byas pa las mdzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i
49b5(rgyud 'bum): rtse mor bkug pa 'di ni rin chen sgron ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis brkyang ste mthe bos so so'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas lhag ma rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa 'di ni khro gnyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o//
49b6(rgyud 'bum): lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings pa 'di ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las gung mo dang srin lag
49b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bsgrengs te rtse mo'i tshul du byas la gung mo'i rgyab tu srin lag bsnol la/ mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas pas dkris pas mthe bong gnyis mdun du bzhag pa las cung zad bkug ste/
50a1(rgyud 'bum): tshul du byas pa 'di ni gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying kar bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pa thal lcag gi
50a2(rgyud 'bum): tshul du byas pa ni khro bo bzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud ltar mdun la mdzub mo gzhibs te bsgrengs pa las bzlog ste dpral bar bzhag pa ni rnga mgrin gyi phyag
50a3(rgyud 'bum): tu'o/ / lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan la ral gri shubs nas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur
50a4(rgyud 'bum): bcangs pa las rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa las zhags pa'i tshul du byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub
50a5(rgyud 'bum): mo snying kar bzhag la/ g.yas pa khro bo'i sor mo be con gyi tshul du phyar ba ni be con sngon po can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje snying kar bzhag la/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par
50a6(rgyud 'bum): phyar ba ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs la/ mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs te sprad nas me tog gi tshul du byas pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong
50a7(rgyud 'bum): stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas/ ut+pa la kha bye ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag pa/ la
50b1(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pa glang po che'i sna ltar byas pa ni spos kyi glang po che'i phyag rgya'o/ / g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur nam mkha' la bsgrengs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du byas pa ni ye shes tog gi phyag
50b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / bzang po'i 'dug stangs su 'dug ste/ thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying kar bzhag pa ni bzang skyong gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis chu rlabs kyi tshul du brkyang ba las sor mo rnams chu rlabs
50b3(rgyud 'bum): drang ba ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'o/ / g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur snying kar bzhag la/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni blo gros mi zad pa'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur pang du bzhag la/ g.yas pa se gol
50b4(rgyud 'bum): gtogs pa'i tshul du byas pa na spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis pad+ma cung zad kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis me tog 'dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni ngan
50b5(rgyud 'bum): song thams cad spong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa ni mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis
50b6(rgyud 'bum): brkyang nas 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya'o/ / g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas la/ g.yon pa zla ba'i tshul du byas pa ni zla 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas
50b7(rgyud 'bum): nas dbang bskur ba ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/ / g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g.yas pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' la kun tu bskor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa
51a1(rgyud 'bum): sa la brkyang nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong smad nas zhi ba'i tshul du byas pa ni sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur
51a2(rgyud 'bum): las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying kar bzhag la hUM zhes bya zhing / lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas pa phyar ba ni ro khrod lo ma can gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa sor mo brkyang ba
51a3(rgyud 'bum): las mdzub mo dang mthe bong skam pas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ lag pa g.yas pa khab kyi tshul gyis 'tshe bar byed pa rnams kyi kha mig 'drub pa ni 'od zer can ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis
51a4(rgyud 'bum): spyi bor sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i gdugs ltar byas nas phud ces brjod pa ni dug sel ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o//
51a5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid las g.yos pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu yis dza zhes byas pas dgug pa ni rdo rje khro bo lcags kyus dgug pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa ste rdo rje khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o//
51a6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung mche ba'i tshul du byas pa las bsnol te 'gram pa gnyis su bzhag la/ lce 'jib cing khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las
51a7(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung gnyis bskum/ mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas nas kha'i grwar bzhag ste hUM zhes bya zhing khro bo'i lta bas lus gcu pa ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis kyis
51b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste bsnol nas gyen du bteg pa ltar byas pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las khrig ma gnyis bsnol te bstod cing btog pa ni sgo dbye
51b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bsnol nas mchan khung du bsdams te khro bo'i lta bas 'gyur ba dang bcas pa ni gdon thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon brkyang
51b3(rgyud 'bum): ste kha sbub pa la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag nas lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo bskyod pa ni lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang / 'khrul 'khor 'byed pa dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo smra ra gzhug pa'i phyag rgya'o//
51b4(rgyud 'bum): lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings te bzhag la/ lhag ma ba dan rtse gsum pa'i tshul du byas nas stang stabs dang bcas par hUM zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje sa 'og
51b5(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya'o/ / g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i mdzub mos sdigs pa ni rdo rje bdag mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste phur bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje phur bu'i
51b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brdung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje mdud pa dor ba'i tshul du byasapa
51b7(rgyud 'bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bcing ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te sog le drang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje sog le'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal
52a1(rgyud 'bum): mo zla ba'i tshul du byas te gdong g.yog cing brkyang la khro bo'i mig tu byas nas a la la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje srin mo'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings pa mdzub
52a2(rgyud 'bum): mo dang mthe bong gnyis pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni sprin thams cad gtub pa'i char pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te skam pa'i tshul du
52a3(rgyud 'bum): dpung pa brkyang ba ni 'khrul 'khor gyi phur pa dbyung ba'i skam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bong lag mthil du bzhag ste/ lhag ma rnams 'dab ma ltar g.yab cing rkang pa ya
52a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig sa la btsugs la/ gcig rgyab tu brkums nas khro bo'i lta bas lce 'jib cing hUM phaT ces bya bas rim gyi sa bskyod pa ni rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o// 'di bcings pa tsam gyis
52a5(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum khyab pa'i dug kyang skad cig gis sel bar byed do/ / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mda' gzhu dag gi tshul gyis phyogs bzhir mda' bkang ste 'phangs pas pha rol dpung gzhig pa ni mnyes
52a6(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa'i rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o/ / khu tshur gnyis las gung mo bzhibs te bsgreng ba las rin po che'i tshul du bkug la/ mthe bong brkyang ba'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas
52a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi phyag rgya g.yul las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ / lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos sor mo mnan te gung mo bsgreng la g.yas pas pad+ma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni ha la ba la'i phyag
52b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis dkris la mdzub mo gnyis gnibs te bsgrengs nas bzlog la dpral bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya ste/ dur khrod du 'jug pa na mkha' 'gro ma rnams
52b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par byed pa'o/ / g.yon pas thod pa bzung la g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum pa thogs nas ral pa bcings te zla bas brgyan cing mtshan bsgreng la/ mig gsum pa gar byed pa ni gar thabs kyi phyag rgya
52b3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / 'di ni bde byed kyi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa mi 'jigs par byas pa las sor mo rnams cung zad phye ste mthe bong lag mthil du gzhag/ de bzhin du g.yas pa'i khu tshur dbyug to 'dzin pa ltar byas pa ni khyab
52b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jug gi phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis brkyang nas pad+ma'i tshul du byas pa ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te me tog ltar byas pa ni ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje khu tshur
52b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi ni/ / rgyab tu 'dud pa ltar 'dor zhing // rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i// rin chen cod pan 'phreng dbang bskur// ting nge 'dzin gnas pas 'khor lo can// 'khor lo mnga' ba'i lha rnams
52b6(rgyud 'bum): la/ / sangs rgyas sa ni rab 'gengs pa'i// gsang ba'i mchod pa 'byung bar bsam// 'gyur zhing cung zad 'jo tshul can// sgeg mo yi ni phyag rgya yis// gar gyi tshul du bkod nas kyang // hUM zhes
52b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba glur blangs shing / / de nas sangs rgyas kun dgyes pa// rdo rje rgyud ni sbreng bar bya// de nas 'phreng tshul 'phreng ba yis// lha rnams kun la bcing bar bya// 'jo sgeg thabs la spro ba yis//
53a1(rgyud 'bum): @lag gnyis bskor zhing dgrol ba dang // g.yas nas g.yon du bskor ba yis// gar thabs byas la mgo la gzhag/ me tog dbul ba'i tshul du ni// gang gi me tog thal mo
53a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ / bdug spos rtse mo sbyar ba yis// gung mo gnyis ni bzlog ste bsgreng // bskor zhing bsgyur ba byas pa yis// mtheb gnyis mar me'i tshul du gzhag/ dung gi tshul du lag bsgyur nas// dung
53a3(rgyud 'bum): por lta bur mchod yon dbul/ / de nas lha rnams kun la yang // lag pa'i gar gyis byug tshul bya// de nas sil snyan tshul gyis su// lag gnyis sil snyan legs par brdung // dung dang gling bu bud
53a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / lag pa gnyis ni rnga yab g.yod// bsil yab tshul gyis bsil yab dang // sor mo gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan bya// tshon 'gyed tshe na lcug phran ltar// bskyod cing tshon gyis 'phreng ba dgye/
53a5(rgyud 'bum): lag g.yon snod kyi tshul byas la// g.yas pa yis ni lga bshos dbul// khang pa brtsegs pa bzhag nas su// gos kyi tshul gyis gos rnams dang // gdu bu ska rags rkang rgyan dang // rna cha do shal sna
53a6(rgyud 'bum): lnga gnag/ de nas gdugs kyi tshul gyis su// lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzugs// bsam gtan tshul gyis lag pa dag/ nam mkha' la ni mdzes bskor na// sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs
53a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i/ / bla re rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur// grwar ni pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang // dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan// gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin// rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis// sgo 'phar dag
53b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang dbye bar bya/ / oM badz+ra g+ha naN+Da ra Ni ta// pra ra Ni ta/ saM pra ra Ni ta/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha k+She tra/ pra tsa li ta/ pradz+nyA bA ra mi tA/ nA da sAdz+nyA be badz+ra d+harma hr-i da ya san+to Sha tin+na r+thA d+d+ha/ lag g.yas rdo rje gsor
53b2(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / / sna tshogs khugs su 'gyur ba yi// rdo rje glu yis bstod pa bya// rdo rje theg pas mnyes byed pa// 'di ni don dam mchod pa yin// gang gis rnam rtog rnam spangs te// byang chub sems ni
53b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam bsgoms pas/ / lus ngag sems ni rnam dag pa// de yi mchod pa bla na med// sems can gang gis dbu ma yi// theg pa gong ma ma bsgoms shing // theg pa dman pa lhag mos pa//
53b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi mchod sa kun rdzob pa// sangs rgyas dbang chen grags kun gyis// mchod pa de dag gsan pa dang // ngo mtshar byung ba'i spyan phye nas// legs so zhes ni rab tu gsungs// e ma go sangs rgyas
53b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / byang chub sangs rgyas thabs su ste// rdo rje bsgom pa byas pa yis// nyon mongs med par byang chub 'thob// rdo rje theg chen legs pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa legs
53b6(rgyud 'bum): zab cing rgya che legs pa ste/ / rdo rje rin chen kun 'dus legs// de nas ye shes kyi sku gsum las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rdo rje theg pa bsngags pa
53b7(rgyud 'bum): thos nas/ / dga' bas spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad la// dga' ba'i yid kyis bstod par byed// thog ma med cing skye ba med// 'gyur ba med cing gnas pa med//
54a1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' bzhin rnam rtog las grol ba// rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags// thabs su brtags pa gang yin des// ye shes kyis ni sras po kun// rdo rje theg pa bsgoms
54a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur// zhes smras so// bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yis// dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen// dang po gang du rnam par snang mdzad ni//
54a3(rgyud 'bum): dag cing dri med blos ni oM du sprul// gzugs mang tshul gyis 'phreng bas bskor ba yi// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yi// spros med gsung du 'jig rten
54a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug bzhugs/ / mig gsum lha mo dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa// sgyu 'phrul tshul mang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis// gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa// na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad
54a5(rgyud 'bum): cing / / g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas su// g.yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol// lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor 'gyur ba yi// dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur// gcig
54a6(rgyud 'bum): gi lag pas kun nas 'khyud pa ste/ / gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu// gsum pa mi bzod me tog 'phreng ba 'thor// bzhi pa bde ba yis ni mda' yang 'phen// gang zhig glu 'di len
54a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa dag/ bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu yin no// oM a nut+ta ra sarba pU dzA ma g+ha ud ga ke/ s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na
54b1(rgyud 'bum): maM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di lan gsum brjod pas mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byam thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa rim par phye
54b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
54b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/ / bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gces pa dri med pa// byang chub
54b4(rgyud 'bum): sems ni rin po che/ / bla na med pa bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
54b5(rgyud 'bum): cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sems ni lus kyi rnam yin la// lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin// sems kyang tshig gis brjod pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag
54b6(rgyud 'bum): gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rnam par sbyor ba thos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma kun tu bzang po ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
54b7(rgyud 'bum): can/ / chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// g.yo ba med cing gnas pa med// tog pa'i dri ma spangs pa 'di// bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
55a1(rgyud 'bum): pa mi 'khrugs pas gsung spros pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te//
55a2(rgyud 'bum): chos can med cing chos nyid med// nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i// byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas
55a3(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
