55a4(rgyud 'bum): nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po 'di dag dngos med de// chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems 'di
55a5(rgyud 'bum): brtan pa yin/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
55a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / dngos po skye ba med pa ste// dngos po ngo bo yod min pas// nam mkha'i go 'phang thob bo zhes// dngos rnams rab
55a7(rgyud 'bum): tu brjod pa yin/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnga mo'i yang bla ma
55b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ / chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can
55b2(rgyud 'bum): med cing srog kyang med/ / sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med// rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i// byang chub sems 'di bstan pa yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod
55b3(rgyud 'bum): grub kyis gsungs so/ / de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin
55b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ / kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o dag/ kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams//
55b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag med chos las legs byung ba// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems ni sgom pa yis// mi g.yo yi ge las byung ba// rmi lam sogs ltar ma skyes pa// byang chub
55b6(rgyud 'bum): sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ / gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas// dang por rang bzhin dag po'o zhes// dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas/
55b7(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis du byas rdo rje can// rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlabs// rin chen lus su brgyal bya// lag pa bstod de bskor ba yi// lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang // rkyen nas da
56a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcings te/ / dam tshig yang dag dbul bar bya// gdan rnams so sor phul nas su// mchod yon dbul ba'i sbyor ba bya// dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha sogs//
56a2(rgyud 'bum): sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya// rnam pa kun gyis mnyes par bya// rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis brtag/ rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste// byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang //
56a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs gnyis rdzogs par gyur pa ni// rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs// sngags kyis byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed// rnal 'byor byin brlabs yin par gsungs// byang chub sems
56a4(rgyud 'bum): ni dag pa dang / / gsang sngags sa bon bskyed pa che// phyag rgya'i tshogs su brtags pa yin// rim gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byas pa// de ni brtag par brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor cho ga yin par
56a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / bsdu dang spro bar byas pa las// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dag/ skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do// dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par
56a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor spyod pa bdag gis brtags/ / rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag/ 'di ni rnal 'byor cho gar bshad// nyon mongs dri mar byas pa'i sems// byang chub sems kyis dag byas te// de ni
56a7(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes/ / brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyar// dag gyur de nas blo yis ni// sems la so sor brtag par bya// sems la so sor brtags nas kyang // phyi rol rang bzhin
56b1(rgyud 'bum): stong par bya/ / sems tsam la ni gnas nas su// byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des// bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag/ zla ba'i gzugs su rnam par brtag/ lag pa'i pad+ma la gnas
56b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / oM gyi myu gus bskrun pa yis// yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs// rdo rje skur ni bsgom par bya// AHzhes bya ba spros med gsung // sems ni hUM zhes bya bar sprul// yi ge gsum
56b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis byin brlabs lus/ / snying la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs// de la rang gi yi ge ni// mdog gzugs 'od ni byed bsams te// nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag yin
56b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// cha shas kyi ni dra ba can// ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag/ de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis//
56b5(rgyud 'bum): go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya// rdzogs sangs rgyas lngar dbang bskur te// cod pan 'phreng ba rnams kyis klubs// de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi// sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro// yan lag bzhi
56b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbus ldan pa'i/ / phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang // bsnyems pa dang ni rtogs ldan ma// mtshon cha mda' dang rtse mo can// sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam mang ngo po// rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis
56b7(rgyud 'bum): brlabs/ / kun la khyab par byed pa yi// sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni// de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas// phyogs bzhi 'khor lo khyab byas te// dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang
57a1(rgyud 'bum): spro/ / ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la// longs par spyod pa'i sdug pa yis// 'khor lo la ni rdo rje'i gzugs// pad+ma'i gzugs la de dag ni// 'khor lo kun las
57a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma yi/ / ngo bo yi ni rol pa dang // e zhes bya ba 'phos pa las// mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya// mdzes pa'i rgyan nyid kun ldan pa// nyid kyi stan la bzhugs par blta/
57a3(rgyud 'bum): sgeg mo glu dang gar rnams dang // rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye dang // sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni// sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod par bya// rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni/
57a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas// myur ches pa dang bul ba dang // mi gsal gug kyad nyams pa dang // rtog pa ngan pa rnam spangs nas// de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya//
57a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pas skyon lag g.yas kyis// bsgrims te rdo rje gsor nas kyang // g.yon pas rdo rje dril gsil zhing // rdo rje gru tshul sna tshogs dang // ba ngan tshul du bya bas mchod// bzlas pa'i
57a6(rgyud 'bum): mjug ni brtul nas kyang / / gshegs su gsol te bdag nyid bsrungs// lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te// brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya// bar chad du ni gyur na yang // yi ge brgya
57a7(rgyud 'bum): pas byin gyis brlab/ / de ltar sgom pas sgom byed pa// rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i// byang chub des ni myur thob nas// zla zhi'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang // sna tshogs las kyi thog
57b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dren cing / / rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// chags chen pad+ma'i gdung brgyud can// gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug 'gyur// dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso// dga' chen rdo rje
57b2(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyur 'gyur/ / sgyu ma bshig pa kun shes shing // dregs pa 'joms byed khro bor 'gyur// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni byang chub kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa
57b3(rgyud 'bum): rarimi par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bki'i
57b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyi nang gi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi las kyi sbyor ba rab 'byam 'di bka'
57b5(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / lha ni gang yang rung ba zhig/ 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhag na ni// de yi ming smos rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs// zhi dang rgyas dang drag shul dang //
57b6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi las la sbyor ba na// 'khor lo'i rgyal po rnam bsgoms nas// bdag po nyid kyis rab tu bya// zhi ba spyan dang skul byed mas// rgyas la rin chen gos dkar mar// dbang la sgrol ma
57b7(rgyud 'bum): lu gu rgyud/ / yams dang gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir// 'od zer can dang ri khrod mas// drag shul spyad la mA ma kI// khro gnyer can ma dag gis bya// 'di dag shes rab rol pa ste//
58a1(rgyud 'bum): chags pa'i rdo rjes rjes chags pa// gsang sngags de nyid kyis bskul na// gdon mi za bar 'phrin las mdzad// spyan dang lha mo skul byed ma// dbang po zhi ba zla
58a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba/ / phyag gnyis na ni bgrang 'phreng dang // ril ba spyi blugs kyis brgyan pa// dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas// bum pa zla ba'i mdangs ldan pa// bdud rtsi'i 'o mas rab bkang
58a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / lag gnyis pad+ma'i gdub mchog gis// rnam par snang mdzad zhabs drung du// nad pa la ni bdugs par bsam// rin chen ma dang gos dkar can// sku che kha dog ser po ste//
58a4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo ser mo snang ba la// phyag na rin chen pad+ma can// dang po ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas// yid 'ong rgyal ba'i 'dod pa yis// rin chen 'byung ba'i zhabs drung du// bdud rtsis rab tu
58a5(rgyud 'bum): dgang ba dang / / bla med rin chen khar bab na// rgyas pa mtshungs med mdzad par 'gyur// lha mo sku chen mdog dmar ba// sgrol ma de bzhin lu gu rgyud// kun nas 'od dmar 'bar ba can//
58a6(rgyud 'bum): lgalha rdzas lcags kyu zhags thogs pa// rab tu bzhad cing spyan phye bas// 'od dpag med pa'i zhabs drung du// bsgrub bya rgyags pas myos pa dag/ bkug ste mda' yis bsnun na ni//
58a7(rgyud 'bum): skad cig nyid la dbang du mdzad// mi ngas gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir// sku chen nam mkha'i kha dog can// 'od zer can dang ri khrod mas// rdo rje don yod zhabs drung ngu// mkhas pas
58b1(rgyud 'bum): sngar bshad tshul du ni/ / bdud rtsi yis kyang rnam par bzlog/ lha mo khro gnyer mA ma kI// margad lta bu'i mdog can ma// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa// rdo rje sdigs par brtson pa yis//
58b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mi 'khrugs zhabs drung du// khros nas rdo rje'i me yi char// 'bebs par rnam par bsam par bya// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba des// bsgrub bya tshig nas mog ces byed// sbyor ba 'di yi mod
58b3(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ / de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am// yang na lus ni 'jig par mdzad// byin brlabs dam tshig dbang bskur la// rdo rje sems ma rin chen dang // chos dang rdo rje las ma bzhi// sbyor ba
58b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni rab tu sbyar/ / sems dpa' chen po bcu drug kyang // bla med 'khor lo byed pa ste// rang gi phyogs nas las byas na// 'bras bu don yod sbyin par byed// khro bo'i lus la legs gnas
58b5(rgyud 'bum): te/ / khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya// dam tshig la sogs cho ga bzhin// der ni rdo rje bsgoms nas bskul// rkang pa'i rjes kyi sa bslangs la// dur khrod thal ba dag dang bsre// de yi ras
58b6(rgyud 'bum): blangs mi rus dang / / mu 'gram gnyis kyi sa dag ni// btags nas lung bong gcin gyis spu// de las dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// de tshe gzugs brnyan bcing bar bya// dug dang ske tshe lan
58b7(rgyud 'bum): tshwatsha dang / / 'bru mar tsha ba rab bsres te// dgra bo tsha bskyed pa'i phyir// de yis lus nang rab tu dgang // de nas rnam shes rlung 'dra ba// lcags kyu yis ni bkug nas kyang // srin bu
59a1(rgyud 'bum): me khyer 'dra bcug ste/ / zhags pa yis ni dam du bzung // de ni rdo rje sgrog tu gzhug/ bsgrims nas de yi ming smos te// dgra bo'i lus ni ma lus par// po so cha
59a2(rgyud 'bum): yi tsher mas dbug/ mi rus las byas phur bu 'am// yang na seng ldeng las byung bas// dpral ba snying mgrin dpung mgo gnyis// gnas lnga dag tu bsgrims te gdab// nim pa'i shing la sbar
59a3(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / me sbar ba la bskal bar bya// mkhas pas rkang pa nas brtsams te// mtshon cha rnon pos gtubs nas ni// 'bar ba'i lus can khros pa yis// de yi dum bu sbyin sreg bya//
59a4(rgyud 'bum): las 'di la ni lhag par yang // rus sbal gyi ni rkang thabs sbyar// nyi ma'i gung ngam nam phyed na// las ni 'di nyid bsgrub par bya// las 'di byas nas nges par ni// gang zhig rgyal bas
59a5(rgyud 'bum): bsrungs na'ang des/ / nges par 'chi na khyab 'jug dang // lha chen tshangs pas ci zhag smos// phyi rol gyi drag shul spyod pa'i cho ga'o// gsod pa'i ye shes las sprul te// nang gi yang ni
59a6(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / bsgrub bya yid kyis bsrungs nas su// cho ga bzhin du dgug par bya// lag na ral gri mtshon cha dang // be con rdo rje gtun shing zhags// lag nas 'khor lo mda' gzhu can//
59a7(rgyud 'bum): khro bo sna tshogs bsnams pa des// bsgrub bya zhags pas bcings nas su// rdo rje ya ni khro bo yis// lho yi phyogs su khrid pa dang // rdo rje gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang // de ni ral gris btub pa dang //
59b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ma lang long nar bar bsam// oM hUM badz+ra rAk+Sha sa/ b+ha kA ya tha phaT/ rdo rje srin mo bsgoms nas kyang // bya rog wa dang bya rgod kyis// kun nas yongs su bskor nas su// de dag zang tho ba byed
59b2(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / sgom zhing ming nas skul bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// rdo rje rnga mo rnam bsams te// bsgrub par bya bar yongs brtags pas// de yi rgyab tu zhon nas su// rdo rje khro bos
59b3(rgyud 'bum): gzir bzhin du/ / lho phyogs su ni bkri bar bya// de yi rkang rjes sa la ni// rlung gis rtsubs pa'i shi'i lo la// de yi ming nas brjod byas te// rdo rje sna yon drung du sba// de lta bur ni sbyor ba'i las//
59b4(rgyud 'bum): sgom zhing cho ga bzhin byas na// brgya byin nyid kyang bskrad 'gyur na// sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos// de ming gsang dang sngags spel te// 'ug pa'i sgrol bris nas ni// dge sbyong bram ze'i skas
59b5(rgyud 'bum): dkris te/ / sa yi 'og tu bsgos nas gzhug/ rdo rje khro bo gnyis kyis ni// 'thab mo 'gyed du 'jug par bya// de ltar bsams pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa bzhin du 'bye bar 'gyur/
59b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM zhes bya bas gang ba yi// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas nas// rna ba'i rtse mo nas bton te// bsgrub bya'i lus ni dgang bar bya// lus kyi tshogs ni thams cad du// sna tshogs rdo rje bcings nas
59b7(rgyud 'bum): su/ / rdo rje 'bar ba 'phros 'gyur ba// des ni lus kyang bskam par bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgoms te// kun nas kyang ni gzhig par bya// oM badz+ra DA ki nA/ a mu ka s+ya rak+ta a
60a1(rgyud 'bum): kaR+Sha tsa sha ya sU phaT/ sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni// bskams 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// mkhas pas rlung gi phyog song ste// dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas
60a2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / spos kyi thig le bdun byas te// de dag kham pa'i bor pa dgab// de ni ri rab thams cad nas// rtse mo brgyad par sprul byas te// rdo rje 'phro bas brgyan pa yis// de dag rnams ni
60a3(rgyud 'bum): mnan par bya/ / yaM zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i rlung 'dun rnams// laM zhes bya bar mtshan ma dbang chen gyi// nang du rlung rnams nges par chud par bya// de lta'i sbyor bas 'jig pa'i rlung yang
60a4(rgyud 'bum): bcings/ / pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgoms nas de'i 'dab la// klu brgyad bkod dbus me tshogs 'bar ba can// rdo rje khro bo'i sku yi zhabs mthil gyis// klu rnams mnan na char sprin char pa 'debs//
60a5(rgyud 'bum): hUM zhes bya ba gnyis dbus klu rnams kyi// snying po yongs bcug spel mas gzir nas su// hUM zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas nas su// 'jigs dus char pa lta bu char pa 'bab// nyi ma'i mdog
60a6(rgyud 'bum): ltar dmar po'i 'od bzang zhal/ / nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs nas ni// kun nas char chus yongs su gang ba'i sprin// hUM zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lce yis bldag/ dbugs rngub pa yis
60a7(rgyud 'bum): bkug nas dbyung ba yis/ / shing bal bzhin du rab tu gtor bar bya// yang na rang gi phyag rgya'i tshogs 'bar ba// btang bas skad cig la ni bcad gtubs te// hUM zhes bya bas bsdigs pa
60b1(rgyud 'bum): byas na ni/ / nam mkha' dag kyang ston ka'i dus ltar snang // me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas snang mdzad kyi// zhabs drung dpral 'byes nas byung mi g.yo zan// bdud las rnam rgyal phyag drug
60b2(rgyud 'bum): mda' gzhu zhags/ / ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje char 'bebs pa// khro bo grangs med pa yis yongs bskor nas// bgegs rnams sreg mdzad hUM gi sgras bkang nas// 'jig rten gsum po gang
60b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang rnam par 'jig/ rkang rjes sa dang mi yi khrag dag las// mi yi gzugs byas mi rus phur bu la// 'od zer can gyi gsang sngags bsgrags pa yis// lan grangs nyi shur mngon bsngags
60b4(rgyud 'bum): mig tu gdab/ / tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar ni ming bcug nas// phyi bzhin rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung // oM sum+b+ha badz+ra mu sa le na/ rdzur+N+Na ya na ra big+h+nA na hUM phaT/ las 'di bsams
60b5(rgyud 'bum): pas mod la ni/ / me yi bgegs kyang bzlog par 'gyur// stang zil kha dog lta bu nam mkha' lding // lus la sbrul stong dag gis brgyan byas pa// mkha' le 'dug nas gdengs ka stong ldan
60b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / klu brgyad dag dang char sprin rnams la bsgo// brgya byin bka' ni de dag gis thos nas// sprin tshogs bum pa'i char gyis me yang gsod// nam mkha' lding gis 'dab mas bkab nas
60b7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / mchus brkos chu klung gis ni mtshams kyang bcad// oM badz+ra nA rA yak+Sha/ nir ba bA ya/ gab ma mu me g+he hUM/ zhal ras gsum pa ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog/ phyag bzhi 'od dmar
61a1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ / lha mo bzhi pa bsnyems ma byams ma dang // chu sprin rgyal mtshan me tog rol pas bskor// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje legs gsor zhing //
61a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu sgeg par gzhag/ ldem bag 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rol pa ste// sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin rnams rnam par 'phel// rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan cing // rin chen
61a3(rgyud 'bum): cod pan dbang bskur bas/ / nam mkha' la ni 'bab pa yi// thog thog rnam par zlog par byed// oM ma hA puk+ka badz+ra/ che ge mo dze zhes bya ba dang / hUM zhes bya ba nas/ pU ra Ta ban d+hA hUM
61a4(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ sbyor ba 'di ni byas pa yis// bla med byang chub rgyas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o// mi 'khrugs rin chen 'od
61a5(rgyud 'bum): dpag med/ / don yod gsang sngags rgyal rnams dang // bzang po rnam pa bcu drug po// kun dang drag po'i ting 'dzin la// gnas pa yis ni khro bo dang // gsang sngags rdzogs mdzad
61a6(rgyud 'bum): rig rgyal ma/ / rnam pa kun dang ldan pa dag/ rims bral rang gi ting 'dzin gnas// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la// gzigs pa chen pos rnam gzigs nas// sku gsung
61a7(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rdo rje can/ / smin ma mdzes par bskyod nas su// yan lag 'phrog pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// thugs kyi sems ni dga' bar mdzad// dga' bar mdzad pa'i mod la ni/
61b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mchog kun gyis mchod pa// shes rab chen po'i thog 'dren pas// bsgrims te so sor gsor nas des// bde chen ting 'dzin la gnas te// ldem bag 'jo tshul gyis bltas
61b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / lag gnyis pad+ma'i tshul gyur te// spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas// ye shes lam ni rab ston pa// rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad la// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// yid rgyas
61b3(rgyud 'bum): pa yis tshig gsol ba/ / ci slad rnam pa thams cad du// zur gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang // smin ma bskyod byas 'dzum mdzad pa// ye shes rnam par bsgyings pas gsung // byang
61b4(rgyud 'bum): chub chen po'i rdo rje can/ / lag na rdo rje gsol mod la// brtan zhing zab pa'i gsung gis ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa bshad// sgom pa'i lam la legs byung ba// rdo rje ye shes rnams
61b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi thabs/ / bde bas byang chub thob 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas kyi// rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor nyon cig/ gang la dngos rnams dngos med cing // mtha' gnyis kyi ni mtshan
61b6(rgyud 'bum): ma med/ / dbus la'ang spyod pa med pa dag/ dus gsum 'das pa nam mkha' 'dra// thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa// de la byang chub ji ltar rtogs// rtogs par 'dod pa de dag ni//
61b7(rgyud 'bum): thabs rnams nga yis bshad par bya// phung po dngos po yod med pa'i// byang chub sems ni grogs gyur pa// spro ba dang ni btung ba yis// sku gsum mchog ni mchod par bya// sems
62a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis sku ni 'thob 'gyur zhing / / sems kyis chos rnams bstan pa yin// sems kyis byang chub 'thob 'gyur bas// de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par sgom// sems ni
62a2(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste/ / byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra// dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas// gyo mo lnga ni sngags bzlas te// legs par byas pa'i gzugs dag la// sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na
62a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs// zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin bsod nams ye shes las// byung ba'i tshogs kyis sgom pa'i sems// sems can rnams kyi
62a4(rgyud 'bum): babasam pa la/ / bla med byang chub snang bar byed// dngos po don dam ma shes pa// phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pas// ngan par rtogs pa'i rnam rtog gis// rin chen sems 'di dri mar byas/
62a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams dang // dngos po thams cad ldan zhes gsungs// de la gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs// mi shes pa yis yongs su brtags// bdag tu 'dzin pa mngon zhen pas//
62a6(rgyud 'bum): don dam phyi rol byas pa yi// theg pa dman pa pa rnams kyis// tha med byang chub ji ltar 'thob// byang chub rnam pa gnyis gsungs te// lhag ma dang bcas lhag ma med// lhag bcas phung po'i
62a7(rgyud 'bum): ngo bo ste/ / nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su bsregs// lhag med bag chags med pa ste// mkha' ltar dri ma med pa yin// bla med byang chub 'di lta bur// sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par bshad
62b1(rgyud 'bum): de yi byang chub spel ba'i phyir/ / las kyi tshul ni sna tshogs yin// rnal 'byor can gyis gsang sngags gang // ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs drung du// rtag tu mnyes byas ma grub pa'i// lhag ma
62b2(rgyud 'bum): nga yis bshad bya ste/ / de ni bde blag thabs kyis su// tshar chad nas ni sgrub pa bshad// rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po che// rdo rje zhags pa rab tu byed// rdo rje khu tshur gzi brjid che// rdo rje phur bu rnam 'dril
62b3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / rdo rje tho ba rdung ba ste// rdo rje nag mo cher 'bab sa// lha rnams kun la 'jigs pa skyed// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs 'di// bsgoms nas las la sbyar na ni// dam tshig rgyal bas bstan
62b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ / mtshungs pa med pa'i las byed do// gsang sngags rig pas hUM zhes pa'i// lcags kyu gtang nas zhabs drung dgug/ 'di ni gal te sangs rgyas sam// rdo rje 'chang ba'i snying las
62b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs/ / dam tshig gis ni zhugs pa dang // rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas// rdo rje mag mos kun tu bsdigs// rdo rje yi ni phur bu yis// gzugs bsnyan gyi na
62b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas lnga po/ / dpral ba mgrin pa snying ka dang // de bzhin dpung pa gnyis su gdab// rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'ang yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par gnon/
62b7(rgyud 'bum): sdigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// gzugs brnyan mi g.yor gyur pa dang // sangs rgyas byang chubar ba rdzogs pa'i// dngos grub de tshe sbyin par mdzad// 'di ni mthu yis grub pa'i
63a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba gcig pu gsang chen yin/ / de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis gsang ba'i sgrub pa thos nas mgrin gcig tu thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsol to//
63a2(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad// dpa' bo chen po legs so zhe// zab mo chos kyi mchog gyur pa// dam pa bshad pa mdzad pa logs// sems can phan phyir thugs rje yi// lcags kyus kun nas 'bar
63a3(rgyud 'bum): ba legs/ / bdag med chos rnams sgrub pa yi// ye shes snying ku 'bar ba legs// gsang chen thams cad bstan pa yi// rdo rje theg pa nges par gsungs// theg pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na//
63a4(rgyud 'bum): / bla med byang chub bde bar thob// oM badz+ra aM ku sha A kaR+Sha ya hUM/ oM badz+ra pA sha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM badz+ra Tak+ki rA dzA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra muSh+TiM gr-ih+Na hUM/ oM badz+ra kI la ya kI la ya hUM/ oM badz+ra mud ga ra
63a5(rgyud 'bum): A ko Ta ya hUM/ ye shes kyi snying kas snying po can du gyur pa'i gsang sngags dag pa mchog tu gyur pa don yod pa'i las 'di dag su la'ang bstan par mi bya'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba
63a6(rgyud 'bum): las 'di ni sbyar ba'i thabs kyis sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sbyor ba'i
63a7(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbab pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba 'di bshad do/ / oM zhes bya ba mgor bzhag ste// a ni bzhin gyi
63b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma la/ / hU~M ni bskul nas snying kar gzhag/ yaM ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// bzhag nas bsgrims te gdag byas nas// 'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi// 'gro ba thams cad dbab par 'gyur//
63b2(rgyud 'bum): dbab snod skul byed gzugs de yi// gzugs kyi ngo bo bsams nas su// rdo rje 'chang ba'i nga rgyal gyis// gsang sngags bsnyems dang bcas par bklag/ brjod par bya ba thogs pa med pa'i
63b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba ni/ na maHsa man+ta nAM/ sa mya ka sa~M bud+d+ha ko TI nan/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun+de swAhA/ brtson 'grus chen mo thogs pa med par 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnon pa che ba
63b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag na ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa bsnams ma/ khro mo chen mo gro ma'i dbang phyug ma/ drag po'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas pa/ phyag stong ma/ ma pham
63b5(rgyud 'bum): ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod pa/ gdul bar dka' ba / mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod
63b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje'i sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rje 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stang stabs can/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can
63b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar snang ba/ sku rdo rje dang be DUr+yasra brgya na ma/ oM b+ha ga ba tI tsun+da dru dz+re dzudz+r-i/ mr-i mr-i/ ru ru/ sru sru ru ru/ gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ gr-i h+Na pa
64a1(rgyud 'bum): sa gr-i h+Na pa ya/ sar sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ gar ha ra/ b+has+dza b+hany+dza/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-istA/ sdang ba'i
64a2(rgyud 'bum): gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang
64a3(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa 'gro ba dang / gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba thams
64a4(rgyud 'bum): cad/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ mar da ya mar da ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ta pa ya ta pa ya/ u pa d+ha ya u pa d+ha ya/ ha na ha na/ bedz+dza Na sa ra sa ra daN+De na/ mA ra ma ra/ khang+ge na hUM hUM hUM/
64a5(rgyud 'bum): tsu tsu d+hu/ tI tri tI/ oM tsa le tsu rje sarba sA d+ha yA swAhA/ de ni rdo rjes bskul nas su// rdo rje dril bu gsol bya zhing // rdo rje bcing ba bskyod par bya'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas oM/
64a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad dang // 'brel ba'i pad+ma bzhag nas su// A zhes bya ba brgyad kyis brgyan// dbus su bsgrub bya bzhag nas su// hUM bzhi yis ni mdzes par bya// kham por
64a7(rgyud 'bum): kha sbyar nang bcug ste/ / steng du rdo rje 'chang bas mnan// sgom zhing gsang sngags bskul tshig gis// bzlas brjod dag ni bya ba dang // ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa yis// kun nas kyang ni
64b1(rgyud 'bum): bkri bar bya/ / 'di ni sku gsum las byung ba'i// lha dang mi kun mnan par 'gyur// sngags la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid ni// kha dog dmar po rdo rje can// 'dod chags tshe dang ldan pa'i gzug/
64b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i lha dang lhan cig bsam// sku gsum ldan pa mda' thogs shing // g.yon pa yis ni gzhu yang gzung // oM hUM bud med spyi bor bsam nas ni// 'dod pas snying zag dregs
64b3(rgyud 'bum): bdo ba/ / mdog dmar thal mo sbyar nas ni// 'dud bzhin du ni mdun bzhag ste// rdo rje mda' yis bsnun na ni// pad+ma dag nas zil pa 'dzag/ rdo rje mda' yi sbyor ba yis// 'dod chags
64b4(rgyud 'bum): can ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor can gyis dbang byi'i phyir// 'dod chags rdo rje can yang sgom// mi thod las byas cad te'u la// spre'u'i pags pa g.yogs nas ni// ngos nyid la
64b5(rgyud 'bum): ni pad+ma thi/ / bud med khrag gis 'dzag par bya// de yi dkyil du phre bris te// mi yi sgra yis btags nas ni// mthing ril gyi ni rkang rus kyi// phreM hU ming nas brjod cing brdung //
64b6(rgyud 'bum): lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor ni// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos zas// grwar ni bu mo zas sbyin ma// 'gugs par brtson pa'i lcags kyu bya// gtso bo khrag 'thung cha lugs kyis//
64b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can gyis ni rting pas brdung // 'dis ni khams gsum rnams gadras pa'i/ bu mo zos sbyin 'gugs par 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan la// gnas pa yis ni
65a1(rgyud 'bum): nga rgyal gyis/ / rnal 'byor 'khor lo rdzogs gyur na// tshig gi rnam pa tsam gyis kyang // lU dang lA min mi la sogs// rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad byed/
65a2(rgyud 'bum): gang tshe dbang nyid la gnas pa// de tshe thams cad mnga' gzhug 'gyur// bltas pa tsam gyis 'chi ba 'am// de tsam gyis kyang gcod pa'i mchog/ sgyu mi'i ye shes kyis bskul nas//
65a3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor can gyis glu dang gar// ji lta ji ltar bsgom byas pa// de ltar 'gro ba rab tu byed// sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i// me yi lha ni zhal yin pas// sna tshogs las rnams
65a4(rgyud 'bum): grub byed pa'i/ / sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad// sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ster// gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa// thams cad sbyin
65a5(rgyud 'bum): sreg dag gis skong / / de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis// sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad// gtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me// dge ba yi ni las rnams byed// gdol pa'am dur
65a6(rgyud 'bum): khrod las byung bar/ / me yi las rnams rab sgrub pa// thab khung zlum po gru bzhi pa// bla gam dang ni zur gsum pa// dkyil 'khor zur gyi kha khyer ba// rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan/
65a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rig pas// thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni// pad+mo steng gnas gtsug tor dang // rdo rje rin chen pad+mo gzhag/ ji ltar rigs par 'dug nas su// lag gnyis pus mo'i
65b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bzhag ste/ / dgang gzar mar gyis bkang nas ni/ blugs gzar bkang ste de bzhin sreg/ sbyin sreg la dgos g.yas su gzhag/ g.yon du chu yi snod dag go// las kun byed pa bzlas nas
65b2(rgyud 'bum): su/ bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya// ku shi'i rtse mos mnon pa yis// thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya// me ni 'bar bar shes pa dang // g.yas pas mi 'jigs mtheb bskyod cing //
65b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin// ma yi lha ni spyan drang ngo // tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che// lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog/ sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang // 'di nyid du ni
65b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs su gsol/ / oM ag+na ye/ dI pya dI pya/ A be sha ma hA shri ye/ ha bya ka bya ka/ ba ha nA ya swA hA/ lag g.yon rdo rje bsang gtor te// mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul//
65b5(rgyud 'bum): me yi phyogs nas bod pa ni// gsus po che la mig gsum pa// gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi dang ldan// 'od dmar ral pa'i thor tshugs can// me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing // las kyi
65b6(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan/ / lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la// gnyis pa ni ni sngags nor 'phreng // g.yon na ril ba spyi thugs te// gnyis pa na ni becon nyid// mdog dmar rgyan ni med pas/
65b7(rgyud 'bum): drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang // thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol// de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa// kun nas lan gsum sreg blugs dbul
66a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ / 'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis na// mkhas pas lha rnams tshim par bya// legs par tshim byas
66a2(rgyud 'bum): bzod gsol te/ / 'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab// bum pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugs// pad+ma lcags kyu'i rnam pa dag/ me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang // 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma mkhas
66a3(rgyud 'bum): pas brtag/ de nas myur du 'grub 'gyur bas// sgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni// oM zhes pa dang swA hA mthar// dbyangs kyi rgyun ni bsring ba dang // bar chad
66a4(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i dbyangs kyis sbyar/ / zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba'o// 'byor pa rgyas pa mngon par spel// dregs gdong stabs tshul bcas pa dang // dbang du gyur pas dbang bya'o// drag shul spyod tshul
66a5(rgyud 'bum): la gnas pas/ / hUM zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas// lus ni me lce 'bar ba dang // 'jig rten gsum po bzar bsam nas// bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi// gsang sngags yi ge nges par sbyar//
66a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags grub cho ga shes pa yis// sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la// sna tshogs las dang ldan pa'i lha// gang dag yin pa mchod par bya// sbyin sreg de nyid kyis bskul cing // dang po dgang blugs
66a7(rgyud 'bum): bsreg cing dbul/ / phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la// dge ba rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya// bshang gci khrag rkang rus pa dang // sha chen dag kyang sbyin sreg
66b1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal/ mi gtsang ba yis bkang na go/ ji ltar sdig pa mi skye 'gyur// gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang // sems can mi shes pas rmongs te// thams cad
66b2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab rnam spangs shing / / phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa// rnam rtog dra bas blun byas gang // de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/ phung po gnyis su rnam par brtag/ chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste//
66b3(rgyud 'bum): skye ba med cing gnas pa med// sems can shes pa spel ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs kyis bstan// dam pa'i don du dge spang na// bsod nams med la ci zhig smos// dper na
66b4(rgyud 'bum): chus gang chu klung gi/ pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag/ rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus te/ chu las rgal ba'i gzengs byas nas// de la 'jus te legs rgal na// bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar
66b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi/ / chos kyis lam ni bskyed byas kyang // chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas// byang chub bde ba thob pa bzhin// de phyir rnam rtog dra spongs la// zab mo yin
66b6(rgyud 'bum): chos spel te/ / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs lam la// sngags rig rnam rtog ma byed cig/ rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed pas// nam mkha' lta bur dri med
66b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin mnos// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te// lus dang ngab dang sems bsdams nas// pa'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs// rnam pa kun gyis rnam par
67a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / rnal 'byor ldan pa tshe 'di la// ye shes rdzogs pa nyid du gyur// las las byung bar rnam bstan pa'i// skyes pa bud med gzugs mang la// brnyas pa
67a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid du mi bya 'dis/ / rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin// ngan rtog bzang rtob dra ba yis// sems kyis sems can rnams la ni// sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi dbyung // rdo rje sems ldan dam
67a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig yin/ / sred pas bskyed rtsub phra ba yin// tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing // mnyan na bde bar byed pa 'di// rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin// rnam par snang mdzad cher 'khrugs mchog/
67a4(rgyud 'bum): yi khams la gnas pa yis// rkang la mi 'khrugs rgyal po ste// khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso// sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ rus gong la ni 'od dpag med// rtsa yi tshogs rnams
67a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam 'dren pa/ / thub pa skyed mchog don yod la// dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni// bsang chen nga yis bstan pa 'di// blo ldan rdo rje sems kyis ni// rtag tu bsten zhing bsgom par bya//
67a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin rmongs// sred dang de bzhin rnam spel ba'i// chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// bshang gci khu ba mchil ma khrag
67a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhin bsdus pa/ / sgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pa yis// dam tshig bsten par bya ba ste// rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
67b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni sbyin sreg ram par phye ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos
67b2(rgyud 'bum): grub dam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i mchog dngos grub 'di bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje gsang sngags sgom pa'i rnal
67b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyi tsho gas yang dag par bskul nas rdzas thams cad kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs gsang chen 'di nyon cig/ rnam par snang mdzad ting nge 'dzin la// gnas shing sku gsung thugs
67b4(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms te/ / mdun du 'khor lo legs par gzhag/ sku gsum rdo rje can gyi gzugs// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa'i 'od// 'khor lo'i nang du zhugs gyur par// bsgom zhing 'khor lo
67b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba'i 'od// 'khor lo chen po 'phags par 'gyur// spyan ni bzlas brjod byed bzhin du// bla med 'khor lo blang bar bya// rgyal chen 'khor lo 'grub
67b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dag/ 'od ni rnam par snang mdzad bzhin// lan gsum 'jug pa'i sems can la// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur// ma 'khrugs par ni rnam bsgom zhing // rdo rje mdun du bzhag nas
67b7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ rim pa bzhin du bskul na 'dis// sku gsum rnam par 'phel 'gyur zhing// 'bar ba'i 'phreng chen mnyam pa'i 'od// rdo rje chen po 'phags par 'gyur// mA ma kI ni zlos bzhin du//
68a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bla med blang bar bya// rdo rje rgyal po blangs pa yis// gtso bo rdo rje 'chang gnyis 'gyur// gtso bo chen po sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs
68a2(rgyud 'bum): bskor nas/ / sems can sems la gnas pa yi// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // 'jig rten khams su rnam rgyu zhing // kun gyi bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// rin chen 'byung ba bsgoms nas
68a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ rin po che ni mdun bzhag ste// sbyor ba'i rim pas rnam spel na// rin chen chen po 'phags par 'gyur// rin chen sgrol ma zlos bzhin du// 'od bzang gzi brjid 'bar ba can//
68a4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kun snang bar byed pa ya// nor bu'i rgyal po blang bar bya// lha rdzas nor bu blangs pa yis// rin chen 'byung ba gnyis par 'gyur// de ni sems can thams cad kyi// yid bzhin
68a5(rgyud 'bum): nor bu rin chen bzhin/ / rin chen char pa rab 'bebs shing // sems can kun gyi dbul ba 'joms// gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu can// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par rgyu// 'od dpag
68a6(rgyud 'bum): med par rnam bsgoms nas/ / pad+ma chen po mdun bzhag ste// rim bzhin gzi brjid gzengs bstod na// 'dab ma bye bas rnam brgyan pa// 'od bzang gser ltar 'bar ba can//
68a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma chen po 'phags par 'gyur// gos dkar can ma'i gsang sngags kyis// yid las byung ba'i pad+ma blang // pad+ma'i rgyal po blangs pa yis// 'o dpag med pa gnyis par 'gyur// /
68b1(rgyud 'bum): chos mdzad rnams kyis thog 'dren cing // sems can rnams la bdud rtsi stsol// sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang byed gtso// bde ba can gyi rgyan du gyur// don yod grub pa rnam bsgoms
68b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / ral gri mdun du rnam ban pa ste// rnal 'byor rim pa 'di yis na// sgom pa de nyid kyis bskul na// rdo rje 'bar blta ba'i 'od// ral gri chen po 'phags par 'gyur// sgrol
68b3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i gsang sngags zlos bzhin du/ / ral gri bla med blang bar bya// de ni ral gri mchog blangs nas// don yid grub pa gnyis par 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam rgyu zhing / sems can rnams kyi
68b4(rgyud 'bum): mi shes bcod/ / rtag tu dri med snang gyur te// chu yi nang gi ston zla bzhin// rdzas kyi dngos grub bstan nas ni// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor che la rnam gnas pa// de bzhin
68b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs kyi btsun mo che/ / zhe sdang rigs ni 'dren mdzad ma// rdo rje gdan can mA ma kI// rin chen 'byung ba'i lha mo dang // lha mo 'gro ba dbang mdzad ma// mkha' la longs spyod spyod mdzad
68b6(rgyud 'bum): ma/ / rim pa bzhin du nga yis bshad// de nas bu mo mig yangs ma// lo ni bcu drug lon pa la// gzugs dang mdangs dang lang tshor ldan// gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba can// gcig cig
68b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrims te btsal nas su/ / lha mo byi dor legs byas te// rigs lnga yi ni tshogs can ma// las kyi rjes su bsgoms byas nas// bzhag ste sprad pa'i sbyor ba yis// pad+ma la ni rdo rje
69a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ sprad pa dang ni 'khyud pa yis// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma bskul// gar gyi tshul du gyur pa dang // de bzhin spro dang bsdu ba yis// mod la sgyu mas dregs myos nas/
69a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las ni bdud rtsi 'byung // rnal 'byor ldan pa'i shes rab lag/ pad+ma la nas bdud rtsi btung // rnal 'byor ldan pa'i kha yis ni// 'thungs pas de bzhin gshegs lnga yi// sku ni yongs su 'gyur
69a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'thob/ / nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos kun las// thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'phel// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi snying po sgrub pa ste// 'dod lnga'i yon tan rjes 'jug pa'i//
69a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub bde bas bsgrungs na ni// rdo rje pad+ma bya ni brlabs nas// rjes su chags pas 'thob par 'gyur// grub chen gsang ba'i dngos grub ni// sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba'i thabs/
69a5(rgyud 'bum): rjes su chags pas bde ba yi// rdo rje theg pas mnyes par 'gyur// sbyor ba'i khyad par 'di yis ni// lan gsum 'jug pa'i gsang sngags dang // las kyi phyag rgya ngas bshad de// de dag
69a6(rgyud 'bum): lag pa'i phyag rgya dag/ ye shes phyag rgya rab bskul bas// dam tshig mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur// thub chen sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba// sna tshogs 'phrin las mdzad par 'gyur//
69a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyag na rdo rjes khams gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang // gsung dang // thugs las phyung ngo // sa ni spyan du brjod pa ste/ chu khams mA ma kI zhes bshad/
69b1(rgyud 'bum): ma rlung zhes kun tu brjod// gos dkar can ma me ru bsgrags// rdo rje dam tshig nam mkha'i dbyings// ston pa rdo rje 'chang bas bshad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa'i dbang phyug bcom
69b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang // gsung dang // thugs de bzhin gshegs
69b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas cang mi gsung bar
69b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
69b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ji ltar blta bar bgyi
69b6(rgyud 'bum): lags/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis 'di ni rdo rje'i byang chub kyi sems su blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems
69b7(rgyud 'bum): dang rdo rje slob dpon 'di gnyis gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar nas/ rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus nas yang bshad par bya'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang
70a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs shing gzhes pa'i bar de dag thams cad dus gsum du byon nas/ slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pas mngon par
70a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod nas 'di skad ces bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha yin no/ / bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma yin no// bdag cag de bzhin gsheg pa tham cad kyi ston pa yin no zhes rdo rje'i yi
70a3(rgyud 'bum): gegasum phyung nas slar yang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu dper na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdo rje'i
70a4(rgyud 'bum): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni// rdo rje slob dpon de'i spu'i khung bu gcig bsod nams kyi phung po ches khyad par du 'phags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
70a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'i bar nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
70a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po byams pa 'jigs shing skrag pa'i yid kyis cang mi smra bar gyur to/ / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa dang // rin chen 'byung ba dang / don yod grub pa dang / de bzhin
70a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms
70b1(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bos nas shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyon cig/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob
70b2(rgyud 'bum): dpon gyi drung du byon nas mchod par mdzad cing phyag 'tshal bar brjod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa yin pa dang
70b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
70b4(rgyud 'bum): dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dngos grub gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
70b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi gsang ba gsum ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang / ngag dang / yod la gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' thams
70b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis gsol pa/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang / ngag dang // sems kyi gsang ba gang la gnas/ nam mkha' la gnas so// nam mkha' gang la gnas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi sems
70b7(rgyud 'bum): la gnas so/ / sems gang la gnas/ gang du'ang ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do// dkyil
71a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / b+hag d+ha dang / stang stabs dang / 'dug spangs dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang / las la sbyar ba dang /
71a2(rgyud 'bum): slar bsdu ba rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul de kho na nyid bcu yin par gsungs so// dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thugs rje'i ro gcig pa rnams kyi gsang ba dag dang / gsang chen dang //
71a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rnam pa pa gsum gyi snying po bstan pa dag ni slob dpon gyi kha nas bla ma la gus pa'i slob mas shes par bya'o// bla mas dam tshig ji ltar lta ba bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas bshad par bya'o//
71a4(rgyud 'bum): bsgrims nas sems can rnams la rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po dang / lhag pa'i rnal 'byor rnams go rims bzhin bshad par bya'o// 'di mtha' dag ni rgyud thams cad kyi
71a5(rgyud 'bum): spyir shes par bya'o/ / de kho na nyid kyi dngos po mtha' dag yongs su mi shes par gsang sngags smra ba nga yin no zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'chad par byed na dam
71a6(rgyud 'bum): tshig thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro/ / dam tshig las nyams na bdud kyis gzung bar 'gyur ro// skyes bu shi nas dmyal ba'i gnas mi bzad pa chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sems
71a7(rgyud 'bum): can rnams la brten te byang chub thob par 'gyur bas sems can la bsdu bar mi bya'o zhes shes par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam de nyid la sems can de dag sbyar bar bya'o// /
71b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig 'di la brtson par ma byas pa de dag gis ni lag pa dang rkang pa dang / mig sbyin pa'i dka' ba spyad pa dang / dka' thub ji lta bus kyang sdig pa gzhom pa'am/ bdud rtsi'i
71b2(rgyud 'bum): ro thob par mi nus so/ / rnal 'byor gcig khong du chud nas dben par song ste bsgom pa byas na sdig pa las 'grol zhing tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams dang / chos bdag
71b3(rgyud 'bum): med par bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnal 'byor khong du chud par bya'o/ / shes rab dang ye shes kyi 'jo tshul gyis gsang ba lnga'i bdag nyid kyi gtso bo la mchod par bya'o//
71b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos po thams cad dngos med par/ gzhi bcu'i don ni rtogs pa dang / rdo rje pad+mas dbang bskur bas// bdud rtsi lngas ni dga' bar byed// gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang ba/
71b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang zhing sbas te gzhag par bya// 'dod yon lnga yi rnam pa ni// gzugs sgra dra ro reg bya sogs// rnal 'byor sems dpa' spyad bya zhing // de bzhin bza' dang btung byas na//
71b6(rgyud 'bum): bltas dang khu tshur rnam pa yis// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las cho ga thams cad bstan pa rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o// /
71b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/
72a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul na batheg pa chen po'i yang zag pa chen po'i tshul thab mo gsang pa sa
72a2(rgyud 'bum): ches gsang ba chen po rdzug so/ / khor gyi lo tsa ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur tsing nus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar ska
72a3(rgyud 'bum): sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ki ba tsit+ta kr-iSh+Na ya ma ri nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rjes gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i d+hud 'phags pa 'jam
72a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i btsun
72a5(rgyud 'bum): mo thams cad kyi b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs te/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phra ma rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje gshed
72a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje gshed dang / tho ba gshin rje gshed dang / dbyug pa gshin rje gshed dang / pad+ma gshin rje gshed dang / ral gri gshin rje gsher dang / mtshams rnams su
72a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje tsaM rtsa ka dang / rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / rdo rje gau r-I ste/ de rnams mtshams su'o// de dag la sogs te gshin rje gshed kyi tshogs chen po dang thabs cig tu
72b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs so/ / de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
72b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bdag pos bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par bton to/ / zla ba rdo rje sbyor ba yi// gshin rje mthar
72b3(rgyud 'bum): byed bsgom par bya/ / bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang // zhe sdang thams cad gsal ba'i phyir// 'od zer lnga yis 'khrigs pa yi// rdo rje srung ba'i don du sgom// phyir mtshams rdo rjes
72b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhi dang / ra ba dra ba de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje
72b5(rgyud 'bum): gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las nges par phyung ba/ dbus su ya dang k+She ma me da ya ts+tsha ni rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni ra'o// ya sogs yi ge
72b6(rgyud 'bum): dang po las/ / gshin rje gshed du 'gyur ba yin// yi ge k+She ni gauta mug brjod// yi ge ma ni phra mar gsungs// yi ge me ni 'dod chags nyid// yi ge da ni phrag dog 'gyur//
72b7(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed sogs lnga ru grags// yi ge ya las tho bar 'gyur// yi ge ts+tsha las dbyug pa'i gtso// lag na pad+ma ni yig las// lag na ral gri rA las yin// dza las tsats+ya
73a1(rgyud 'bum): ka zhes brjod/ / yi ge sa las phag gdong ma// yi ge do las dbyangs can bsgrags// yi ge ru las gau rI dran// Na yo ni ra mtshams kyi bzhi/ rjod pa//
73a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi ru 'dod pa yin// sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs rung ba// nam mkha' rdo rje dkyil du bsam// de dkyil bzhugs pa'i gshin rje gshed// gnag cing 'bar ba bsgom par bya// shar du gta
73a3(rgyud 'bum): mug rdo rje ste/ / lho ru de bzhin phra ma yin// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ste// de bzhin byang du phrag dog go/ mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la// tsartsi ka sogs rnam par sgom// sgo yi rdo rje rtse
73a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi la/ / tho ba la sogs rnam par sgom// sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru/ mi yi mgo bo bzhi dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gshin
73a5(rgyud 'bum): rje gshed po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge'i dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/ zhe sdang chen po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs pa/ oM hriHSh+Ti wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
73a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phra ma
73a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM rat+na d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod chags rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM A ro l-i ka/ de nas
73b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM prar+d+ha trA~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba
73b2(rgyud 'bum): pos rdo rje zla ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM mun ra d+h+r-ika/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyug pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM dar+Na dz+dza
73b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje pad+ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pad+ma d+h+r-i ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
73b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos rdo rje ral gri'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM khaD+ga d+h+r-i ka/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM mo ha ra ta
73b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje phag mo'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ oM dwe kha ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
73b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM rA ga ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje gau rI ma'i sngags
73b7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra ra ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bar+Na
74a1(rgyud 'bum): sa thA ba At+madza/ oM sarba tra thA ga gzhag badz+ra sarba ba At+ma kata/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsat+ta badz+ra sar+b+ba ba An+ta kas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de ban
74a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos zhe sdang chen po'i sku nges pa bstan pa/ zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la// in+d+ra nA la 'dra ba'i mdog/ phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa nyid/
74a3(rgyud 'bum): gshen rje gshed ni bsgom par bya// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba la// gsal ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i 'od// phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa nyid// gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom
74a4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / zhal gsum phyag drug rgyas gyur pa// gser gyi rnam pa'i 'od dang ldan// phyag na rin chen bsnams pa nyid// phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug dbang
74a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa nyid// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// zhal gsum phyag drug thams cad la// rin chen margad 'od dang
74a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / phyag na shungs can bsnams pa nyid// phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ mngon par
74a7(rgyud 'bum): rtogs pa'i rim par phye ba ste le'u dang po'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen po
74b1(rgyud 'bum): la bstod pa/ gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa// gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// gshin rje gshed po rab
74b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i/ / phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod// gshin rje gshed po rab 'jigs pa/
74b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsung dang rab mtshungs pa// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// phrag dog ngo bo'i rang bzhin khyod// gshin rje gshed po las kun pa// rdo rje chags dang rab tu mtshungs// phyag
74b4(rgyud 'bum): na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas// sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso// dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag
74b5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bstod/ / rdo rje mig dang / rdo rje rna ba dang / rdo rje sna dang / rdo rje lde dang / rdo rje lus dang / rdo rje thugs zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis
74b6(rgyud 'bum): brlab pa'i cho ga'o/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'dod pa'i don grub grub byed pa'i// gshin rje gshed po nyid mtshungs pa// gshin rje gshed 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor lo// krung
74b7(rgyud 'bum): pa gsar pa legs bsgrims la/ / legs pa'i tshad la mdzes pa yis// skud pa shes pas thig gdab bo// gshin rje tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo// mtshan rnams thams cad rab rdzogs shing //
75a1(rgyud 'bum): bar chad thams cad rab nyams pa// zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa'i// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i cha byad la// rtse mo lnga dang ldan mnyam pa'i// las kyi rdo rje de la bri/
75a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrigs pa yi// rdo rje de yi dbus su bri// ral gri byang gi phyogs su bri// 'khor lo'i 'od kyis bskor ba yi/ 'khor lo shar gyi phyogs su bri// 'od kyi 'phreng ba mnyam 'phro
75a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ / rin po che ni lho ru bri// pad+ma rA ga'i mdang 'dra'i 'od// pad+ma nub kyi phyogs su bri// 'od zer lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i// shar gyi mtshams su 'khor lo bri// lho ru rdo rje bri bar bya/
75a4(rgyud 'bum): nub tu pad+ma'i me tog ni// yu ba dang bcas kha bye gsal// 'od kyi 'phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i// ut+pa la ni byang nub bri// shar gyi sgor ni tho ba ste// dbyig pa de bzhin lho yi sgor// 'dam
75a5(rgyud 'bum): las skyes pa nub kyi sgor/ / byang du rdo rje ral gri'o// shes pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la// mchod pa khyab par 'phags pa ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis// 'jigs pa med par mngon
75a6(rgyud 'bum): pabar mchod/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// / de
75a7(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa yi/ 'jigs pa'i gshin rje 'joms
75b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gcig// mgon mo dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen pos nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rnams las bdud rtsi rtsang
75b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i cho ga nges par phyung ba/ oM AHhUM/ rdo rje me lce sbyor ba yis// rdo rje can kun mnyes pa dang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs// ye shes 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid/
75b3(rgyud 'bum): dgug pa dang ni gzhug pa dang // bcing dang de bzhin dbang bya nyid// tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis// mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par bsgom// ma he rdo rje rnam bsgoms la// dkyil
75b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gtso bo rnam bsgom bya/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// rta bdun ldan pa'i dbus gnas pa// za ma zhes bya rnam bsam bya// dkyil 'khor
75b5(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i dbus gnas pa/ / 'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya// zhi ba'i gti mug rdo rje ste// rgyas pa de bzhin phra ma yin/
75b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags rdo rje dbang du b+ha// rdo rje las kyi thams cad du'o// rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba yis// ma tshol mi yi thod par gnag/ de bzhin mi smras sdong du bya// dur khrod dag tu du ba sgrub/ oMH
75b7(rgyud 'bum): sman dag ni de bzhin du/ / mig sman las kyi sgom pa dang // las kyi bzlas par sbyor ba yis// mig sman 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur// khrag dang gur kum bzung byas nas// sgrub pa byug pa
76a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yi// rkang pa byug pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa la// sha lnga dang ni ldan pa yis// lcags gsum du ni bcug byas
76a2(rgyud 'bum): na/ / las kyi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// kan ta'i lcags kyi ral gri ni// las kyi sbyor ba bsgrub par bya// las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis// las kyi ral gri rab 'grub 'gyur// de bzhin gshes
76a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ las kyi rim par phye ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ bcom
76a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ las kyi dbye ba'i bye ba las// sems can 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur// rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol/
76a5(rgyud 'bum): yon tan rgya mtsho rnams nyan lags// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// las ni thams cad rab sgrub pa// nyes kun gsol ba'i bdag nyid kyis// 'di skad kyi ni tshig gsungs so// bcom
76a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rdo rje nyid kyi mthus phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang du phyag byas nas bcom
76a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to/ / de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor bstan// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo mchog/ ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bya ba
76b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / / srung ba'i don dang de bzhin du// zhi ba'i ro tsa nas bzung ste// gro ga'am de bzhin smyug shun la// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam zos nas// na ma na mas rnam ston la// kanag dang yu can
76b2(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pa'i/ / kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar te// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang bar gzhug/ skud pa dkar pos kham phor bcing // shar du mngon par phyogs pa yis// me tog dkar pos
76b3(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum gtor/ / shin rje mthar byed chu shel 'dra// bdag nyid bsgoms nas mdun bkod la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// bsgrub bya bltas nas dbang bskur bya// bdud
76b4(rgyud 'bum): / rtsertsa lnga yis gang ba yi// bum pa dkar po zla ba 'dras// rdzogs sangs du mas khrus byas te// bltas nas sngags kyi bzlas pa brtsam// oM na maHhrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/
76b5(rgyud 'bum): de ba dat+ta ya shAn+tiM ku ru nA ma swA hA/ zhi ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// skyes pa zhi ba'i gur kum gyis// bri bya de bzhin rgyas pa yang // 'khor lo gnyis ni kha che yi// swA hA sa mi ni brgyan pa yi//
76b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub pa'i ming ni bris byas la// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang nas ni// kham por kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni// me tog ser po dus gsum gtor// byang du kha
76b7(rgyud 'bum): bltas mdog ser ba'i/ / gshin rje gshed du bdag nyid bsam// bsgrub bya zla ba ser nag la// bum pa ser pos bskur bya zhing // dbang bskur ba ni bsgom byas la// spros las
77a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i bzlas pa bya/ / oM hriHk+Shi wI kri tA nan hU hUM phaT phaT sA hA/ de ba dat+ta puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ oM hrIHSh+NIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaTaHbau ShaT de ba dat+ta s+yo pa
77a2(rgyud 'bum): puSh+Ta ku ru bo khaT swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// gro ga'am ras la rgya skyegs kyi// khu ba'am tsan dan dmar po 'am// srin lag gi ni khrag kyang
77a3(rgyud 'bum): rung / / yi ge ho yis brten pa yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// 'khor lo nag po sogs bral ba'i// kham por gnyis ni kha sbyar du// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba
77a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ skud pa dmar po bcings byas la// nub phyogs su ni kha bltas nas// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa// kha dog dmar po che 'bar ba/
77a5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba dmar po la gnas pa'o// bsgrub bya yang ni rnam bsam bya// rang gi lus las byung ba yi// 'od zer dmar po'i lcags kyu yis// bsgrub bya 'gug par bya bar bsam// sngags
77a6(rgyud 'bum): ni spro zhing khri bzlas bya/ / des ni bsgrub bya nyams gyur nas// rkang pa gnyis su lpags gyur nas// gos bral skra ni bshig gyur pa// rnam par bsam la bzlas pa brtsam// gal te dbang
77a7(rgyud 'bum): du ma gyur na/ / mar la sogs pa bral byas la// du ba med pa'i seng ldeng mas// 'khor lo de ni sgrub pos bsro// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// ho de ba dat+ta ba shi ku
77b1(rgyud 'bum): ru ho/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hU hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ bau Sha Ta de ba dat+ta s+ya ya ba sha ma na ya bau ShaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bya ba'i cho ga gsungs so// dur khrod gos
77b2(rgyud 'bum): sam yang ni na/ / rang byung gis bskus ras la ni// khrag dang rgya skyegs bsres pa yi// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris la// yi ge dza dang yi ge hris// ming ni rnam pa brten byas la//
77b3(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo yi ni pad+ma'i snod// kha sbyor nang du btsud byas te// skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa// nub ka'i
77b4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma dang 'dra dmar/ / lcags kyu dmar pos bkug pa yi// bsgrub bya dag ni rnam bsgom bya// snying la lcags kyus brgyab nas ni// ske nas zhags pas bcings byas te// gcer bu
77b5(rgyud 'bum): sgra ni ma bcings par/ / rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// seng ge dmar po'i steng 'dug la// rdzas lnga yis ni bkru bya zhing / 'ongs pa ru ni bsam par bya// gal te bsgrub bya mi
77b6(rgyud 'bum): 'ong na/ / seng ldeng gi ni me mdag la// der ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya// brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor lo bsro// oM hrIHSh+Ti wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hrIHa mu kaM A kAR+Sha ya
77b7(rgyud 'bum): hrIHoM hrIHSh+Thi wi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT dza/ de ba dat+ta A kAR+Sha ya dzA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// dur khrod gos la mkhas pas ni// yung ba yi ni
78a1(rgyud 'bum): khu ba yis/ / 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri// yi ge laM gyis brten pa yi// bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya// kham por kha sbyor nang du ste// kham por ser po'i steng
78a2(rgyud 'bum): du gnag/ de la mkhas pas re khA bri// re khA bdun nam yang na ba ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bri bar bya// ri rab lcog brgyad ces grags pa// de yi steng du mnyam par bri// yi ge hUM dang yi ge baM//
78a3(rgyud 'bum): ri rab de ni brten par bya// de yi steng du laM yig las// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// sna tshogs rdo rje mnan pa la// skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni// gshin rje gshed po mdog ser po//
78a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// bsgrub bya ser po rnam bsam la// ri rab kyis ni mnan byas pa// phyag na rdo rjes mnan byas pa// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu// man dar sogs
78a5(rgyud 'bum): ri bo dag/ sna tshogs ri bo rnams kyis kyang // bsgrub bya mnan par bsgom par bya// de la gnas nas bzlas pa bya// oM hrIHSh+NIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ laM de ba dat+ta s+thA ne stam+b+ha ya ku ru
78a6(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis// de bzhin 'khor lo gnyis zis la// bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya// der ni
78a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyang spros la bzlas/ / oM hrIHSh+NIHwi kr-i tA na na hU hUM phaT phaT/ laM de ba rat+ta s+ya ya thA sra ra thA/ kar kr-it+ta nan+ti ba ra ya thA a bi ru pa kaM de ba dat+to/ ya dz+nyA dat+ta ya s+ya bA ka stam+b+ha na ku ru laM/
78b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga de skad gsungs so// shin tu legs par spros pa yis// 'di las gsungs bzhin dgongs pa dag/ gshin rje gshed nag sbyor ba yis// nyi ma
78b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ / sngar bzhin dur khrod kyi ras la// 'khor lo gnyis bris brtul zhugs can// ske tshe dang ni tshwa dang yang // dug dang gzhan yang nim pa dang // tsha ba gsum dang
78b3(rgyud 'bum): tsha ba'i mar/ / dur khrod kyi ni sol ba dang // da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba dang // tsan da li 'bras mdzub mo khrag/ tsha sgo can gyis blangs te// gdol pa'i rdza ma'i dreg pa dang // rab tu ltogs pa'i
78b4(rgyud 'bum): skra gu yis/ / bcu bzhi la bris brtul zhugs can// khros pa'i sems kyis nyin phyed na// gdug pa can rnams gsad pa'i phyir// sems can gnod pa byed pa'i ming // yi ge hUM gis brten
78b5(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'i// sbyor bas lho phyogs kha bltas te// khro chen rab tu drag po'i gzugs// rus pas mgo bo rnam brgyan la// ma sel bzhugs lce phyung 'dril/
78b6(rgyud 'bum): gsus pa che la rab 'jigs dang // skrag byed ska 'bar gyen du 'greng // sma ra smin ma de bzhin ser// g.yas na rdo rje chen po dang // gnyis pa na ni ral gri dang // gsum pa'i phyag na gri gug go/
78b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ni g.yon pa'i bri bar bya// 'khor lo dang ni pad+ma che// thod pa nyid ni g.yon na'o// rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnag/ g.yas pa'i zla 'od bzang po 'dra// g.yon pa'i dmar po yin par brtag
79a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan/ / ba spu khung nas 'jigs chen po// rang gis bdag po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na ni// zhabs ni g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas
79a2(rgyud 'bum): mche ba gtsigs shing rgyags pa yis/ / bskal pa'i 'bar ba me dang mtshungs// 'di lta bu yi bdag nyid kyis// bsgrub par bya ba mdun du dgod// gdug pa'i mtshon gyis rgyas pa yis//
79a3(rgyud 'bum): dri ma can la nad kyis gzir// gos med 'dar zhing nyam chung bas// don 'dod pa yi tshig smra zhing // mtshon gyis gzir ba byas pa yis// gnag gi thum pos las gang ba// grang ba'i
79a4(rgyud 'bum): rlung gis gtses 'gyur zhing / / me yi nang du zhugs pa la// ma he dang ni stag dag dang // khyi dang mchu rings can dag gis// sangs rgyas sde ni mngon 'jig pa'i// sdig po che dag za bar byed//
79a5(rgyud 'bum): mthar byed pa yi lhor gnas pa// tsher mas lus ni bkang ba dang // rkang pa shing lcags sgrog gis bsdams// de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas// pags pa dag ni ba shus byas nas//
79a6(rgyud 'bum): de la tshwa dang ske tshe bskus// hUM zhes zer ba bsgom par bya// de yi lus srung la sogs pa// cod pan dag ni mdun du dgod// de yi go cha'ang med byas nas// stong pa'i lus ni mdun du
79a7(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / rang gi lus byung khro bo ni// gshin rje gshed sogs bdag nyid 'dras// de yi lus la brgyab nas ni// tshil bu rkang dag 'thung bar byed// de yi mdun du gshin rje bsgoms//
79b1(rgyud 'bum): lag na dbyig pa stobs po che// gdug pa can des rdeg par byed// de yi rgyu ma'i 'phreng ba sogs// bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' la 'gro// sa yi 'og nas klu dang ni// lha ma yin la sogs
79b2(rgyud 'bum): pas brdeg/ 'di ltar bsgrub bya nyams bya ba// snying rje la gnas sems kyis ni// byed pas 'khor ba'i gnas bton nas// sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das
79b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyad par can gyi 'di lta bu'i gsung phyung bar mdzad do/ / e ma ho bsad pa'i yang dag bsad// bsad pa ma yin sdig las bskol// ji srid bsad kyang
79b4(rgyud 'bum): ma bsad de/ / sdig pa stong phrag byas pa yis// mnar med la sogs mi skye bar// e ma'o sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ bsad pas byang chub thob par byed// sems can gsod pa
79b5(rgyud 'bum): bsad pa nyid/ / sAng rje chen po nyid kyis byas// e ma'o snying rje stobs kyi mchog/ snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur// oM hrIHSh+NIHwi kr-iHtA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM de ba dat+ta ma
79b6(rgyud 'bum): ra ya hUM phaT/ oM briHSh+T+rIHwi kriHtA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+ta mA ra ya phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par rtog pa gsod pa'i rdo rje 'khrus 'khor dang / sngags dang
79b7(rgyud 'bum): sman gyis gsad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las// rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o// //
80a1(rgyud 'bum): nas 'khor lo gnyis bris la// yi ge phaT kyis brten pa yi// bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri byas la// thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ skud pa sngon pos bcings byas te//
80a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma phyed kyi dus su ni// dur khrod sa yi nang du sba// gshin rje bshed kyi sbyor ba yis// rta dang ma he zhon pa yis// lag na mtshon thogs bsgrub bya gnyis// mdun du bsgrub bya dgod
80a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / khros pa'i lus la sprul pa'i tshegs// gnyis ka'i phyogs su bsam par bya// gnyis kas 'thab mo mang po byed// khros shing gdug pa'i sem ldan pa'i// stobs ldan khros pa bsgom par bya// bsgom pas
80a4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ / oM hrIHSh+TiHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de ba dat+ta ya dz+nyA dat+ne bi dwe ShA ya hUM phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// cho ga dag na snga ma
80a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ 'khor lo gnyis ni bri byas la// yi ge hUM phaT kyis brten pa// thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ skud pa nag pos bcings byas la// sha za'i tshul du sba bar bya// gshin rje'i
80a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba la gnas pas/ mdun du bsgrub bya bsgom par bya// yaM byung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba'i// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po la// de steng mdog sngon rnga mo bsgom// de la gdug pa
80a7(rgyud 'bum): can bskyon la/ / lho yi phyogs su kha bstan te// khro bo'i tshogs kyis de brdeg pa// sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog pa dka'// oM hriHSh+NIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT/ hUM paT de ba
80b1(rgyud 'bum): dat+ta uts+tshu Ta ya naM hUM phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o// khros pas rnal 'byor lhor bltas la// ra khrag me bsregs thal ba dang / dug gi tshwa dang ske tshe dang //
80b2(rgyud 'bum): mar khu smon pa'i khu ba yis// dur khrod ras la 'khor lo gnyis// rim pa 'di bzhin bri bar bya// gsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas// dbye ba rta dang ma he yi// bskrad pa rnga mo'i lus la
80b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// rgyas pa zla ba ser po la// btsun mo snying khar dbang du bya// ra la smyon pas 'gugs par byed// ri bo'i dkyil du rebs bya gzhag/ sha ra ba'am
80b4(rgyud 'bum): seng ges 'gug/ de bzhin gzhan yang mtshon par bya// ro tsa na dang rgya skyegs dang // kha che yi ni khyad par gyi// dbang du bya ba gro gar bri// dge ba'i sems kyis bzung byas na// 'grub par
80b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te the tshom med/ / kham por kha sbyar nang du gzhug/ khwa yi sgro yi sbu gu yis// nyi ma phyed na bri bar bya// pad+ma'i kha sbyor ro bsregs sar// gshin rje'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/
80b6(rgyud 'bum): oM hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs gsang sngags bzlas// lho phyogs gnas te tshar gcad bya// mtha' ya ya bor zhi ba la// yi ge ni de gnyis ka dang // phyi gnas dkyil gyi ya spangs te/ yi ge ldag
80b7(rgyud 'bum): ma ci bde bar/ / mngon du bsnyen pa khri tsam bya// 'dis ni las rnams rab sgrub pa// ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste// gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas// rab tu grags pa'i 'khor lo 'di/
81a1(rgyud 'bum): yi ker bris nas gnas pa dang // 'khor lo bris nas gnas pa yi// khyim der 'thab mo rtag tu 'byung // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs pashin rje gshed nas pa
81a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud las/ 'khrul 'khor gyi go rims bri ba zhes bya ste rim par phye ba lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba bdab pa/ 5
81a3(rgyud 'bum): gis rdo rje can mnyes pa/ / zhe sdang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas// dngos grub rgya chen thob par byed// de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos// 'di lta bu yi gsung bsgrags
81a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha kun gyi// dbu la gshin rje gshed po bsgom// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// rtag tu sbyin sreg gis kyang dgang // rtag tu dam tshig dag kyang gzung / sdom pa dag
81a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang yang dag gzung / / dang po la ni cod pan dbang // gnyis pa ral gri sbyin par bya// gsum pa rdo rje dril bu dang // zla ba bza' ba bzhi pa ste// bzhi po 'di ni dbang chen po// nag po zhal nas byung ba
81a6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / dbang 'di dag gis bye brag gis// rgyal ba'i sras kyis byang chub thob// 'byung po kun gyis gtor ma'i lus// sngags 'di de nas rab bshad bya// sngags chen bzlas pa tsam gyis na
81a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad 'dar 'gyur ba/ oM in+d+ha ya hrIHya ma yaSh+NIHba ru NA ya wi/ ku be rA ya kr-i/ AM shA na ya ta/ ag+na ye A/ ne ri te ye na/ ba ya be na/ tsan+da ya hUM/ A kaR+Sha ya hUM
81b1(rgyud 'bum): zah+ma Ne phaT/ ba su rba ri N+yai phaT/ bai mo tsa tri Ne sA/ sarba b+hU te b+h+yo hA/ ha ha hi hi/ d+hU ng+ku/ pho po/ phaT phaT sAhA/ bi Ta mu tra chu bsregs pas// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni// lha rnams
81b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang ni tshim par byas/ / ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya// dkyil 'khor rim gsum bya ba ni// brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa'i// dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bris pa la// sngags ni kun tu dgod par bya//
81b3(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs can gyis bcu gnyis par// grub pa'i sngags rnams dgod par bya// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jog rten gsum// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// oM ya ma rA dza/ sa do ma ya/ ya me do ru/
81b4(rgyud 'bum): Na yo da ya// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA/ ma ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ dkyil du ya byas shar du k+She// lho ru 'jam po'i rdo rje ste// yi ge me ni nub tu bri// byang du dan+ta 'da' ba na//
81b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya'i ming ni sbyin bya ba// mtshams kyi stob pa dag tu'o// hUM gnyis kyis ni brten byas la// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed// ya tsa ni ra dza sa do ru// na yo ni ra la sogs pa// phyi rol
81b6(rgyud 'bum): rim par g.yon brtsams bri/ / don kun rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir// rim pa gsum pa de la ni// kun tu cher bor ba la// shar nas brtsams nas bri bar bya// oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHla sogs pa'i sngags/
81b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi bar dag thams cad kyi/ cha brgyad bor ba dag la bri// a mu kaM ku ru/ uts+tsha Ta ya ba shiM ku ru/ bi re Sha ya/ shAn+tiM ku ru/ puSh+TiM ku ru/ 'di ltar g.yon nas ni// las dang rjes su mthun
82a1(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / phyag 'tshal na ma tha ma'i bar// tha mar po Sha Ta dang // hUM baT dang ldan sa bon gyis// ni dang rgyas dang mthar dbang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
82a2(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo rnam par bri ba zhes bya ba ste rim par bye ba drug pa'o// / khrag dgug pa yi sbyor ba ni/ zhal gsum phyag drug
82a3(rgyud 'bum): skem pa yi/ / phyag na 'khor lo zla 'od 'dra'o// mkhas pas tsartsi ka bsgom bya// chang dag dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug phag gdong ma// rab sngo phyag na rdo rje bsnams// mkhas
82a4(rgyud 'bum): pas phag me bsgom par bya/ / shes rab bskyed par bya ba'i phyir// zhal gsum phyag drug dmar ba la// zhi ba phyag na pad+ma bsnams// dbyangs can brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom// khu ba dgug pa'i
82a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba ni/ / zhal gsum phyag drug ral gri bsnams// nor bu margad 'dra ba ni// gau ri mkhas pas bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gsher po gsad pa dang dgug pa zhes bya ba'i
82a6(rgyud 'bum): titing nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje tsartsi ka'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM tsartsi ke sid d+hen+na nI la ha ri Ni rat+na tra ya a pa ka ri No ru d+hi ra A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ sngags 'di dag ni dran byas na/
82a7(rgyud 'bum): kha gdangs pa dag byas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum gyi khrag chen po// 'gugs par 'di la the tsom med// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po chang 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting
82a8(rgyud 'bum): / nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje phag mo'i chang 'gugs pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra g+ho Ne g+ho ne su badz+ra mA ma kI b+ha ra b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ ke tu kAr+yaM/ A kaR+Sha ya dzaH
82b1(rgyud 'bum): mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas/ / bum pa kha mdzes nyer byas la// rkun ma'i sgra ni rten bzhag ste// sngags ni rjes su dran par bya// sngags 'di che ba'i bdag nyid 'di// ba ta mchod rten rab tu bstan//
82b2(rgyud 'bum): dal gyis dmigs nas 'dab par bya// chang ni 'gugs par rab tu grags// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i gshin rje gshed rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
82b3(rgyud 'bum): / snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ me d+ha bar+d+ha naM/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar+d+ha na swAhA/ chos kyi dang po nas bzung ste// kun
82b4(rgyud 'bum): tu zla ba nya yi bar/ / sbyar ba'i skad ni smra bar bya// ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug pas// rtag tu tshigs bcad brgya zin 'di // ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur// khams gsum ma lus pa dag ni//
82b5(rgyud 'bum): ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed rdo rjes khu ba 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhugs nas/ khu ba 'gugs par byed pa'i gau rI'i
82b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM A kaR+Sha Ni ArA Ni gau ra~M hrIHduSh+TA ya duSh+TA ya/ shu kra ma A ka ra ya dza dz+ra dz+ra hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ pad+ma kha dang rdo rje dang // dril bu lcags kyu'i rlung sbyor gyis/ bzlas
82b7(rgyud 'bum): dang sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni/ khu ba'i cho ga ni 'gugs par byed// nags kyi nang ngam dben pa ru// las 'di dag ni bskul byas nas// nub bdun tsam du sbyor ba yis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the
83a1(rgyud 'bum): tshom med/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po rdo rje nag po 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dbang bskur ba mchog
83a2(rgyud 'bum): gi dam tshig 'od nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung bar mdzad do/ / u dum par man dar// ba ri dze ta ka 'a phreng dang // kar ni ka yi 'phreng ba ni// bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlobs//
83a3(rgyud 'bum): ral gri chen pos khams gsum pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed// las kyi ral gri dam pa 'di// bzung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur//
83a4(rgyud 'bum): shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// rdo rje dril bu sgrub pa 'di// long la slob ma yang dag gzung // btung ba rin po che 'dis ni// rdo rje lus ni rab tu sgrub// kun tu ye shes bu khyod kyis// 'thur zhig ye
83a5(rgyud 'bum): shes las byung ba/ / slob ma'i khar yang blugs bya ba// gshin rje gshed kyis bsgrubs pa yin// rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid ches// shin tu dga' ba'i sems su bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
