83a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sku gsung thugs bshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ / 'gugs pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// srung ba'i
83a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo sbyor ba'i byed/ bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang // gdug pa can dag bsal phyir gsungs// dpal ldan ral gri 'chang ba'i bdag/ srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed// ral gri
83b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ / rig pa gsum las mchod par byed// sems can thams cad spyod pa yi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur//
83b2(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor ni// slob dpon dag gis dkyil 'khor bri// gos kyis gdong ni bcings byas la// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun sgor gzhag/ khyod su zhes kyang 'di skad bri// skal
83b3(rgyud 'bum): bzang bdag ces tshig tu brjod/ / gsol btab pa yi blo bzang la// yol ba'i nang du sbyin par bya// dbang bskur don du gus chen pos// de nas lan gsum ched du brjod// ji ltar sangs rgyas
83b4(rgyud 'bum): chos chen pos/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar// bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing // mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol// de bzhin glu dang rol mos mchod// de bzhin khrus
83b5(rgyud 'bum): / dang byug pas kyang // slob ma dad pas blug par bya// de la bstod pas kun kyang bya// de nas rdo rje 'chang gi rgyal pos stong pa'i sngag gsung+ga pa/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ oM pu dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma koha~M/
83b6(rgyud 'bum): i d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko6/ zhi ba la sogs byed pa yi// sbyin sreg de nas bshad par bya// sbyin sreg gang gis grub pa yi// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa// ni bzhi pa'i
83b7(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis te/ / rgyas pa rgyas pa'i sems kyis so// dbang yang der gtad sems kyis te// gsang dang bskrad pa la yang ngo // zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa ste// rgyas pa yi ni rdzing bu 'dra/
84a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang du bya ba zla gam ltar// nam mkha'i khams 'dra bas ni gsad// zhi ba khru gang tshad du ste// de bzhin rgyas pa'i khru do pa// ji ltar rgyas pa de ltar dbang // gsad pa la ni sor
84a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu/ / zhi ba steng du khru phyed tshad// rgyas pa la ni khru tsam ste// sor lnga gnyis ni gsad pa la// dbang la ji ltar de bzhin dgug/ tshes gcig la ni zhi ba bya// zla ba nya la rgyas pa ste// bcu bzhi la ni mngon
84a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod do/ / dbang gi las ni tshes brgyad la'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las// sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o//
84a4(rgyud 'bum): / rgya mtsho'i sa ni blang byas la// klu yi gzugs shig brtsams byas te// yi ge hUM phu snying khar ni// hrIHSh+NIHla sogs bzlas pa bya// char ni mi 'bab dus dag tu// bzlas pa khri byas 'babs
84a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / sbrul nag po yaM sha dang ni// nim pa'i lo ma dang bsres la// de la ril bu byas nas ni// brtul zhugs can gyis rgya mtshor gzhug/ sngags kyi bzlas pa wa byas na/ mtsho rlabs rangs byed
84a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog yin no/ / tsan dan 'bras bu brgya blangs la// 'bras dang mar shas bsres byas te// 'bum phrag brgya ni rab bzlas la// sbyin sreg byas na lha mthong 'gyur// dur khrod ro bsregs yog pa'i shing //
84a7(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs can gyis gzugs su bri// spong ba'i khu bas bsku byas la// sngags khri bzlas pas mdzes thebs 'gyur// grub pa'i yungs kar blangs byas na// 'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas byas na//
84b1(rgyud 'bum): sbrul gyis bzung nas 'gyel ba la// gtor na 'tsho bar the tsom med/ ri gshong chu yi sa blangs la// sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum byas nas// mgo la bskus pa tsam gyis ni// mgo yi nad ni nyams par
84b2(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / sngags ni lan bdun mngon bzlas pa'i// lag pas mgo bo mnyes nas ni// mgo ni zug gzer 'byung mi 'gyur// de ni 'di ltar the tsom med// bram ze yi ni sha dag la// dur khrod sa dang thal
84b3(rgyud 'bum): ba las/ / gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs byas te// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa la// rdo rje chen po g.yas pa na// de bzhin mi mgo g.yon pa na'o// mdog ni dkar po cher 'jigs pa// de yis
84b4(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa 'joms par byed/ / bdud rtsi lnga ni sha lnga yis// nyin re bzhin du gtor ma sbyin// bdag gi dgra bo choms shig ces// rnal 'byor pas bdag gsol ba gdab// nub mo de skad brjod pas
84b5(rgyud 'bum): nyal/ / dgra ni tho rangs 'chi bar 'gyur// chu 'gags la sogs pas gzir zhing // yang na nad kyis thebs par 'gyur// dgra yi be ro tsa na blang // mi yi rkang sbubs yongs bkang ste// rab tu
84b6(rgyud 'bum): bkang nas 'bum bzlas na/ / shing rtser rgyu ba'i yi dgas mtshungs// lha rdzas dngos grub kun byed cing // dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
84b7(rgyud 'bum): bshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed ces bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o// // ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs ni// de nas yang dag bshad par
85a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / sgrub po bzang po kun byed cing // dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub pa'i// bzang po ma gong rma med la// shing la sbyangs pas bsdus byas la// phab la legs par bkru
85a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ / der 'dug sngags bzlas brtul zhugs can// e ma ho ngo mtshar sngags kyi mthu// bsam pa chen po'i 'o dod 'bod// gshin rje gshed rnal 'byor ldan pa'i// yid kyis cung zad
85a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs mi bya/ / rnal 'byor lam ni gang 'dod pa// de kun thams cad ster bar byed// ma he dang ni ku be ra// stag dang de las gzhan pa dang // dom dang spre'u dag la ni// khyi dag gi ni khyad
85a4(rgyud 'bum): par dang / / dug dang ske tshe tshwa dang ni// de bzhin tsha gsum so ba na dza// 'di dag legs par sbyar gzugs bya// gshani rje gshed po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// de la rnal 'byor pas gsol
85a5(rgyud 'bum): gdab/ / hrIHhrIHla sogs sngags kyis ni// che ge mo de bdag la stsol// de yi pra yis ster bar byed// gal te rnal 'byor phra ma phyin// rmi lam gshin rje gshed brdeg cing // lho yi
85a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su khyer bar byed/ / sad nas de yi pha yis ster// zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa la// in+d+ra nI la 'dra ba'i mdog/ tho ba 'dzin pa'i brtul zhugs can// phyag tu tho ba dgod
85a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la// mdog dmar po ste khros pas 'jigs// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// mkhas pas phyag tu dbyig pa dgod// zhal gsum phyag drug
85b1(rgyud 'bum): dmar ba la/ / 'jigs pa chen po bsdigs pa yi// phyag na pad+ma dmar po bsnams// pad+ma zhes bya mkhas pas bsgom// zhal gsum phyag drug ljang khu ste// phyag na ral gri bsnams pa yi/
85b2(rgyud 'bum): las kun byed par gyur pa'o// ral gri zhes bya rnam bsgom bya// b+ha gar ling ga rnam bsgom nyid// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgom// zhe sdang rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// gta mug rjes dran
85b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / gti mug rjes dran la dmigs nas// phra ma rjes dran bsgom par bya// phra ma rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis// 'dod chags rjes dran bsgom par bya// 'dod chags rjes dran rnal 'byor
85b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / phrag dog dran bya brtul zhugs can// so so'i rigs kyi sprin rnams ni// ba spu'i khung nas spro bar bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gtum po'i khro bo bsgom par bya// zla ba'i
85b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ / lha mo bzhi po rab bsgom bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ rjes su dran pa rim par byed pa ste bcu pa'o//
85b6(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// zhe sdang gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan gshin rje'i dbang du mdzad// zhe sdang thams cad zad par byed// bita
85b7(rgyud 'bum): mug gis mnan 'gro mthong nas/ / gti mug gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan gshin rje gshed dbang mdzad// gi ta mug thams cad zad par mdzad// 'gro ba phra mas mnan mthong
86a1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / phra ma gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan snying rje can gyis mdzad// phra ma thams cad zad par mdzad// 'dod chags kyi sa mnan 'gro mthong nas/
86a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags gshin rje gshed gzugs su// bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas// 'dod chags thams cad zad par mdzad// phrag dog gis mnan 'gro mthong nas// phrag dog gshin rje gshed
86a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su/ / bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas// phrag dog thams cad zad par mdzad// byams pa tsartsi kar gsungs te// snying rje de bzhin phag mo'o// dbyangs can ma ni dga' ba ste// btang

86a6(rgyud 'bum): sbrul nag gis ni brgyan par bya// lcags kyi rdo rje gzugs par bya// skra yang ser po dag tu bya// gyen mdzes pa yi khyad par gyis// mgo la thod pas yang dag bskor// sma ra lkog spu ser por bya/
86a7(rgyud 'bum): hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags brjod cing // lcags kyi rdo rje mkha' la gsor// rdo rje gshin rje gshed sbyor bas// seng ge'i sgra yang de la bya// nus pa cung zad skyes pa ni// rol cing grong du 'jug
86b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / gar dang bde ba'i cha kun gyis// drug las skyes sogs glu blang bya// de nas rgyal mtshan khams mthong na// der ni 'o ma rab bsgrub bya// 'o ma la sems gcig goms pas// phyag rgya chen po
86b2(rgyud 'bum): rab bsgrub bya/ / phag mo yi ni gzugs gzung ba'i// btsun mo kun la 'khyud pa yis// dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du spyad// 'dod pa'i don kun rab tu 'grub// de nas da ni bshad bya ba// phyag rgya ma
86b3(rgyud 'bum): ni rab sgrub thabs/ / gsang sngags chen po yi ge gcig/ de yi bzlas pa mngon bshad bya// yi ge hrI las byung ba yi// ma he yang dag bsgom bya ste// rdo rje dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// ma he steng du bsgom
86b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gang yang cung zad gcod cing 'bigs// mtshon cha sna tshogs gzugs de na// ma he sna tshogs sgrub pa yi// blo dang ldan pa'i phyag na bsnams// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dbyig pa gshin rje
86b5(rgyud 'bum): gshed sgrub thabs/ / yi ge hri ni gsang sngags che// ma he chen po la bcibs pa// phyag ni 'bum phrag rdzogs pa'i phyag/ sku ni mi ro'i thal bas bskus// ri rab dang ni mnyam pa'i lus// gser gyis
86b6(rgyud 'bum): sa gzhi thug par mnan/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bye ba'i phyag can sgrub pa'i thabs// yi ge hrI las byung ba'i gtso// wi kri tA na gsang sngags che// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT ga
86b7(rgyud 'bum): hA hi hI hu hU he he ho hau haM ha phaT swA hA/ / dgos pa thams cad sgrub pa yi// dam tshig sgrub thabs bshad par bya// sngags kyis dub pas kha zas bza'// ngan pa dang bral rnyed bkad min// sha chen dang
87a1(rgyud 'bum): nirta dang ni/ / glang po che yi khyad par dang // ba glang gi dang khyi dang ni/ bong bu rnga mo ce spyang ngo // sngon po dang ni bsres pa yi// snum chen gyis ni lus byugs na// lus la byugs pa
87a2(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis ni/ / 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur// snang mdzad saM du ba ra dang // de bzhin bil ba'i lo ma dang // so phag phye ma bsres pa dang // gser shing lo ma'i khu ba rnams// 'di yis dril phyis
87a3(rgyud 'bum): byas gyur na/ / khams gsum po ni dbang du 'gyur// dug dang chu bur de bzhin mdze// dril phyis byas pas nyams par byed// gci ba chen po btung bar bya// rdo rje bdud rtsi de bzhin du// 'di ni rnal
87a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor mchog gtso bo/ / rang byung me tog btung ba bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ spyod pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud rim par phye ba bcu
87a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo tsar tsi ka'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing // phag mo'i rnam pa'i
87a6(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / dbyangs can gyis rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par zhugs pa dang / gau ri ma'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par zhugs te/ mchod pa'i gru 'di dag
87a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod par mdzad do/ / A kye kye gshin rje gshed nag bla// srin po'i gzugs can rang bzhin khyod// bdag gis khyod mthong shin tu 'jigs// khros pa'i rang bzhin 'di thong mdzod// mtho ris sa
87b1(rgyud 'bum): / steng sa 'og bcas// khyod kyi gar gyis g.yos par mdzod// an tsa nag po bcag 'dra ba'i// khro khyod ro langs zhi gar mdzod// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul zhing // mdangs nag tshad ni thung ba la//
87b2(rgyud 'bum): bde chen ngo bo bro bar gyis// rdo rje dbyangs can ma gsol 'debs// hrIHSh+T+rIHsngags dang gar gyis khyod// srid pa gsum gyi 'phrul pa mchod// snying rje khros po'i dang grol gar// 'gro bas dang ni
87b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshar 'gyur/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bzlas pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchog/ bzlas pa gang zhig rab bzlas na// dngos grub yangs pa thob pa ni// myur bar ma yin dal bar min// ring du
87b4(rgyud 'bum): ma yin thung ngu min/ / sngags ni cung zad thos par bzlas// gshin rje slob dpon mi mchog gi/ ma he ma dang so gnyis dang // ba lang dang ni rta dag dang // bing bu rnga mo'i rus pa las// bzlas
87b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'phreng ba rab bsgrub bya/ / zla ngo gcig gi bcu bzhi la// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// sha lnga dag ni bsdu byas nas// bzlas na dngos grub 'grub pa'i mchog/ ril bu dag ni so sol// rnal
87b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa yis gshin gshed bsgom/ / mkhas pas ni yang mi mgo ste// khrag gis bkang ba'i mgo bsgom bya// khri tsam gyis ni 'byung po rnams// mkha' 'gro ma rnams stong phrag dag/ bdud
87b7(rgyud 'bum): dang yi dgas tshogs kyang 'chi/ / gshin gshed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'bum bzlas pa// des ni las kun byed pa yin// bye ba bzlas na dngos grub ster// bye ba lnga bzlas
88a1(rgyud 'bum): smos ci dgos/ / nyin re 'am yang na bla re 'am// de bzhin lo ni re re 'am// gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi skyon// dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhir shes// rtag tu cung zad ci za dang
88a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin cung zad 'thung ba dang / / gzhan yang bza' ba thams cad kyi// phun ni gshin rje gshed la dbul// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bla ma la ni yon dbul ba'o// las ni thams cad sgrub
88a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / bdag nyid zhi bar byed pa'i phyir// bdag nyid kyang ni dbul ba dang // rta dang ba dang glang po dang // gser dang de las gzhan pa dang // rang gi chung ma de bzhin bu// ma dang sring ma
88a4(rgyud 'bum): tsha mo dang / / de bzhin du ni spyan zla dang // na bza' sna tshogs dag dang ni// gdugs dang rdul yang mdzes pa dang // khyim dang gdan dang dri zhim dang // de bzhin gru dang rol mo dang / ral gri
88a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ni rgyan dag dang / / brtul zhugs can gyis bla mar dbul// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ nye bar mkho ba'i las kyi khyad par
88a6(rgyud 'bum): thams ces bya ste rim par phye ba bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas sems can thams cad kyi// sdig pa dag ni ji snyed pa// de dag gcod pa'i gri gug ste// zhe dang gcod
88a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i shubs can no/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// ring ba'i thos pa sgrub pa'i phyir// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sgrub thabs// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gtogs par// nyi ma'i dkyil
88b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mchog bsam bya/ / gnas der rtse lnga pa yang sgom// de yi steng du gnas dgod bya// mthing mdog nag po 'jigs tshul la// phyag drug 'jigs su rung ba ste// phyag na rdo rje bsnam
88b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom bya/ / phyag gzhan dag la gzhan dag dgod// shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma// phyag drug gti mug rdo rje mtshungs// lag na 'khor lo 'jigs par byed// bsgom bya sbyor ba'i
88b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor du/ / lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro ma// phyag drug pa ma dang mtshungs pa// phyag na rin chen rab 'bar ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// nub tu pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma/
88b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag drug pad+ma 'dzin pa'o// byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// ral gri 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor rim pa'o// me la sogs pa mtshams bzhi ru// lha mo bsgom bya brtul zhugs can//
88b5(rgyud 'bum): lA s+ya mA le de bzhin grwar// glu ma yi ni khyad par ro// las kyi cho ga mthong ba des// der ni sgong skyes bsgom par bya// tho ba dbyig pa dang pad+ma// de bzhin gzhan ni ral gri'o//
88b6(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra D+ha ki ni// oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI/ oM rat+na DA ki nI/ oM pad+ma DA ki nI/ oM karma Ta ki nI/ laM naM gaM maM/ mtshams su'o// oM mud ka ra dza/ oM daN+Da pU/ oM pad+ma baM
88b7(rgyud 'bum): oM khaD+ga go/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rdo rje mkhang 'gro ming sgrub thabs gsungs pa'o// ring po'i thos pa sgrub don du// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya// de ni gsang sngabs/
89a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur te/ oM A k+Sha sha tsa ra badz+ra DA ki nI swAhA// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje sa 'og sgrub thabs so// sa 'og rnam par bsgrub don du
89a2(rgyud 'bum): gnod mdzes rdo rje bsgom par bya/ / phyag drug mdog sngon 'jigs pa yi// phyag tu gtun shing dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil dag tu// 'odi ni rab tu dgod par bya// shar du spyan ma
89a3(rgyud 'bum): dgod par bya/ / de bzhin lho ru mA ma kI// nub tu lha mo gos dkar mo// sgrol ma byang gi phyogs su dgod// me tog spos dang de bzhin dri// mar me la sogs mtshams su dgod// tho ba la sos
89a4(rgyud 'bum): sgo drung ste/ / sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags byas// las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni// dkyil 'khor 'di ltar bsgom par bya// rdo rje sa 'og sbyor ldan pas// rmi lam du ni lam mthong 'gyur// de nas
89a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad bya ba/ / bdun pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' spyod nyid ni rab sgrub phyir// rta yi mchog ni rab tu sgrub// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// sku mdog ljang khu 'jigs
89a6(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du gzhag/ rta yi gdong pa rab mdzes pas// g.yas pa srad du khu tshur bcas// phyag g.yon pa ni thod pa'o// oM phreM phruM phu gi gi hi/ gsang sngags 'di ni
89a7(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas bzla/ / rta yi mchog tu gyur par grags// shar du ba Da bing bsgom bya// lho phyogs su ni rim gro ma// nub tu bdun pa'i rgyal po ste// bdag po'i phyag dag ji lta dang // thams cad
89b1(rgyud 'bum): dadang 'dra par bsgom/ / thag sa 'ang mis ni thams cad du// gshegs su gsol bar rab tu grags// smug mo'i gling bu ba lang dang // dza zlum rdza than mtshams su gzhas/ phan thang sna dang
89b2(rgyud 'bum): swA/ de bzhin gdang bzang gdong ngan te// gtun shing dang ni sta re dang // lcags kyu dang na nags pa dang // gar la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sgo bani tshun rnab tu sdom// sngo chags g.yon pa
89b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / rang gi phyag mtshan de bzhin g.yas// ji ltar rta mchog sngags kyis ni// rdo rje sa 'og gi yang gter// rta mchog rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni/ khams gsum nam ma kha'i khams su 'gyur/
89b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rdzogashed nag po'i rgyud las// dngos grub nges par bstan pa ste rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa'o// de la 'di ni srang
89b5(rgyud 'bum): / bu brkyang ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ste/ oM a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+harmA NA a d+ya nut+pan+na tAta oM AHhUM/ dpal ldan gshin rje gshed bsgoms la// slob ma rnam snang mdzad du sgom// ye shes thig mchog
89b6(rgyud 'bum): / rtse mo rtse// shin tu mnyam par bzhag nas gdab// de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig go// oM AHhUM/ dkyil 'khor nyis 'gyur rim par bya// de yi sgo yi nyi shu'i tshad// bzhi pa'i rnam
89b7(rgyud 'bum): lnga mnyam byugs pa'i/ / skud pa sangs rgyas kyis rab brtags// de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po'i gsol ba btab pa'i dam tshig go// a ma go sangs rgyas slob dpon che// e ma go chos dang tshogs kyi gtso/
90a1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig dam tshig bdag la stsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// de la 'di ni sa chen po yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga ste/ rdo rje si'i lha mo bkug la/ lha mo khyod ni
90a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang du gyur/ / skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa yi ni khyad par dang // sa dang pha rol phyin pa la'o// sgo ni dkyil 'khor cha brgyad de// khyams chen dang ni bor pa la// bdag nyid chen pos
90a3(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / yid du 'ong zhing legs spras pa'i// mu khyud sgom tsam shes par s+ya// lha yi snam bu'ang de tsam mo// rdo rje lha mo ldan pa yis// glu dang rol mo gar yang dgod// mchod snam sgo yi phyed
90a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid de/ / 'gram dang ngos kyang de tsam mo// do shal se mo do dang ni// nyi ma zla ba me tog 'phreng // de la gos dang 'phan dag go/ rtsa ba sa yi thig rgyab tu// tshon rtsi'i snam bu de yi phyed// de la snying po
90a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'dis/ / bdag nyid 'khor lo rnam par dgod// der ni rang gi phyag rgya'ang brten// dam tshig ye shes gzhug pa ste// de ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// shar du dkar po chen po ste/
90a6(rgyud 'bum): lhor ni ser po dang ldan pas// nub kyi char ni dmar pa'o// byang du ljang khu dang ldan pa// in+d+ra nI la 'od 'dra ba'i// dbus kyi char na yang dag bri// de la phyag rgya dgod par bya// las kyi cho ga mthong
90a7(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / rtag tu phyag rgya mkha' mnyam pa// phyag rgya de nyid rtag tu bri// de yi dkyil du rdo rje bri// shar du 'khor lo yang dag bri// de lta bu la sogs pa blta// phyag mtshan kun tu zhal dang mtshungs
90b1(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di yi dgang gzar na/ / de yi yu ba'i tshad bya ba// khru gang dang ni ldan par bya// de yi dkyil 'khor rtse mo ni// sor bzhi pa la zlum por bya// gting du sor gnyis zab pa la// de la sor phyed ma
90b2(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'o/ / blugs gzar pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra ba'i// kha ni mthe bo'i lto gang la// de la sor gcig tsam zab pa// rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu bsngags// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang // mtshams med lnga
90b3(rgyud 'bum): ni byas pa dang / / sems can srog ni gcod pa dang // nya dang sha ni mngon za dang // chang la mngon par dad pa dang / chad lta'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa dang // mngon par dbang ni ma bskur dang //
90b4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'khyam zhing ldom pa dang // grong gi gra mi byed pas kyang // gshin rje gshed rgyud mngon gzhol na// nag po'i tshig ni ji lta bar// grub pa 'di la the tsom med// de nas byams pa la sogs
90b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / rdo rje nges pa 'di mthong nas// rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' kun// mi smra bar ni sdod par 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga'o// 'byung bzhi'i sa bon chen po yis// 'khor lo bani
90b6(rgyud 'bum): ni rab bsgrub bya/ / gnas bzhi rab tu sbyor bas bsam// nam mkha' la ni g.yo bar byed// rkang pa ngag gi 'og tu yaM// lte bar raM ste snying khar lo// mgo bo la ni yi ge baM// yi ge ya ni nag
90b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po/ / drag la rngam pa rab 'gyur ba'i// gru gsum sreg pa'i me ltar 'bar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur dmar// rdo rje sa gzhi 'dzin bzod pa'i// ser po chen po gru bzhi pa// ri rab
91a1(rgyud 'bum): ri yis mnan pa yi/ / nor 'dzin de ni bsgom par bya// dkar po zlum po bsil chen po// sprin bzhin du ni char pa 'dzin// rgya mtsho du ma chus gang ba'i// gangs kyi ri bo ltar/
91a2(rgyud 'bum): bsil ba'i// gnas bzhi ru ni sbyor bas na// khar ni snang ba mtha' yas te// slob ma rdo rje bsgom par bya// myur ba ru ni 'bebs par byed// de la 'di ni dri ba'i cho ga'o// rdo rje chos ni mgon chen
91a3(rgyud 'bum): po/ / snang ba mtha' yas bde ba che// gsungs shig 'dod chags chos chen po// dge dang mi dge legs par dri// khru gang nas ni brtsams nas ni// ji srid khru ni stong gi bar// slob ma chen po
91a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phar bar 'gyur/ / de ni 'bab pa'i cho ga'o// 'jigs gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// sa ni 'jam po blang byas la// brtul zhugs can gyis bzlas pa bya//
91a5(rgyud 'bum): sran gre'u 'o ma de bzhin sha// bu ram tin ni ni la sogs// snum dang nim pa'i lo ma dang // na ti de bzhin dza ge sa// dang por dkar por bri bar bya// kha dog gzhan gyis de nas bsgom/
91a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rgyus dang ni btsag dag las// rgya skyegs lta bu'i mdog tu 'gyur// yung ba de dag rams dag las// de bzhin kha dog ljang khur 'gyur// sngon po dag ni rams kyis bya// de bzhin du bas
91a7(rgyud 'bum): nag po yi/ / ldong ros kyis ni ser po ste// dmar po de bzhin mtshal gyis so// de la bil ba'i snying po gzhag/ ha cang nyung dang mang ba yin// mangs na nag por 'gyur ba ste// nyungs
91b1(rgyud 'bum): nade bzhin 'thul bar 'gyur/ / gzugs ni khro dang zhi ba'o// mtshan nyid dag ni bshad par bya// rol bzhi par gsungs pa ste// khro ba sbom la thung bar bshad// sna ni sor bzhi bya ba ste// dpral
91b2(rgyud 'bum): bko sko mchu de bzhin/ / mgrin pa 'gram pa de bzhin mtshan// sor bzhi dag tu bya ba yin// nyi shu rtsa bzhi lag pa la// gyen du sor ni nyi shu yin// lag pa rkang pa gdong ji ltar// mig ni mthe
91b3(rgyud 'bum): bo gang tsam ste/ / rna ba gnyis la sor gnyis bsgrags// 'bras bu gnyis pa de bzhin bzhi// mchu ni sor gnyis bsdoms pa'o// lte ba sor gcig zab pa yin// lus ni mgrin pa bor ba
91b4(rgyud 'bum): yi/ / gdong ni sum 'gyur lus la dgod// ral pa cod pan de yi tshad// rin chen cod pan sor drug pa'o// ral pa gcig ma rab sgrub thabs// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gnod sbyin
91b5(rgyud 'bum): mo ni sgrub 'dod pas/ / ral pa gcig ma rab sgrub thabs// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste// gri gug dang ni thod pa la// shin tu sbom la mdog sngo ba// dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom
91b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dzaM b+ha la ni shar du sgom// ba su d+hi ni lho phyogs su// chu dbang nub tu dgod par bya// byang du rna chag rkos rko 'byung // me la sogs pa'i mtshams ngag tu// gnod sbyin mo bzhi rnam
91b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bya/ / ku tal kye seMn gyi haM// sun rje ri cho ga bzhin dgod// der ni sgo ba rnams bsgoms te/ khro ba la sogs mnyam par ro// 'khor lo snga ma mthong ba bzhin// de bzhin mngon/
92a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rab sbyang bya// phyag mtshan bdag ni ltar 'dzin pa/ mkhas pas phyi nas sngags bzlas te// oM e ka dza Ti ba sung+ga ra Ni swA hA/ puk+ka si ni rab sgrub thabs/
92a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang dag bshad par bya// gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum la 'tshe nus pa// sku mdog ser po zhal bzhi pa// phyag bzhi bong bu la bcibs pa//
92a3(rgyud 'bum): puk+ka si yi lus bsgom bya// zhags pa tho ba mda' dag dang // brtul zhugs can gyis gzhu bcas sgom// oM puk+ka si aM zhes sngags brjod do// 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil
92a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ni/ / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// de yi mod la mi snang bar// 'jam pa'i rdo rje grags 'gyur ba// 'bar ba'i gser 'od 'dra ba yi// ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa//
92a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu'i gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mgon// mi mthong bya ba'i don du sgom// shar du mdzes ma dgod par bya// de bzhin lho ru sgra can ma// nub du ser po bsgom par bya// byang
92a6(rgyud 'bum): du nye ba'i skra can ma/ / thams cad phyag na ral gri dang // 'khor lo la sogs gzhan la dgod// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// sa bon
92a7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge maM las byung / / dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus na bzhugs// thams cad zhabs ni g.yon brkyang bas// ri bong can gyi gdan la bzhugs// 'od zer can dang ri khrod ma// de bzhin
92b1(rgyud 'bum): nor 'dzin skul byed ma/ / me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru// bsdus pa dgod bya snying po la'o// mya ngan med dang yal 'dab dang // 'bras kyi snye ma dbyig pa'o// ser dang ljang dang yang
92b2(rgyud 'bum): ser po/ / dkar po'i lus ni bsgom par bya// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dkyil 'khor dag tu gdab par bya// tho ba la sogs sgo ba bzhi// bsgoms na mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//
92b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba bcu bzhi pa'o// /
92b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa 'dzang gu li'i sgrub thabs// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis na// chu yi steng nas 'gro 'gyur ba// ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// sa bon du
92b5(rgyud 'bum): las yang dag byung / / sku chen phyag na sbrul bsdams pa// rma byA la ni zhon par dgod// shar du rma bya dgod par bya// de bzhin lho ru khro gnyer can// nub tur khrod lo ma can// byang du rdo/
92b6(rgyud 'bum): lcags sgrog ma// rma bya'i sgro dang spyi blugs dang // lo ma dang ni lcags sgrog ma// de dag rnam par bsgom par bya// ser dang dmar dang de bzhin ljang // kha dog sngon po dbye ba nyid// mkhas
92b7(rgyud 'bum): pas 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ / de bzhin sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas// oM sudza/ tho ba la sogs sgo ru dgod/ me tog la sogs mtshams su dgod/ 'dzang gu li yi sbyor ba yis/
93a1(rgyud 'bum): chu yi steng nas rtag tu 'gro// ku ru rab sgrub thabs// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// klu yi bu mo rab 'gugs pa// kha dog d
93a2(rgyud 'bum): mar po zhal bzhi pa/ / phyag brgyad dang ni rab tu ldan// hri yi sa bon las byung bas// klu ni 'gugs par byed pa yin// phyag brgyad du ni klu dgod de// mtha' yas la sogs klu rig brgyad//
93a3(rgyud 'bum): lus ni sbrul gyis rab tu brgyan// brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes ma sgom// sngags ni/ oM ku ru kul+le hriHpu swA hA/ de nas gsang ba bshad par bya// bsdus nas yin gyis rgyas pa min// gang
93a4(rgyud 'bum): zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ / lha yi bu mo 'gugs byed pa// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste// phyag na mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa// lus ni ser po chen po yi// rdo rje lus med bsgom par bya//
93a5(rgyud 'bum): shar du dga' ma bsgom par bya// lho ru 'dod pa'i mdzes ma sgom// nub tu 'dod pa'i lha mo sgom// byang du 'dod pa'i lcags kyu'o// 'dod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi// phyag tu mda' dang gzhu
93a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom bya/ / ser dang dmar dang de bzhin ljang // dmar sgra dag ni bsgom par bya// mtshams rnams su ni rtag dgod pa// mi 'gag de bzhin mtshams kyi bdag/ dbyi dang spre'u'i rgyal mtshan ni//
93a7(rgyud 'bum): sgo yi phyogs kyi bshad par bya// 'dod pa 'gying dang 'gying bag can// dran dang de bzhin mda' gri can// lha rnams de dag thams cad kyi// dbu la gshin rje gshed po sgom// bud med kyi ni pad+ma
93b1(rgyud 'bum): ru/ / rdo rje lus med bsgom par bya// yi ge yid las yang dag byung // kun tu 'khor bar rnam par 'gro// bslus shing g.yengs pa bsgom par bya// myong nas bde ba'i 'dod yis kyis// dmar pol
93b2(rgyud 'bum): gos kyis yongs dkris te/ / rkang pa'i drung du lhung bar 'gyur// der ni sngags kyang bzlas par bya// yi ge oM ni ring por drang // yi ge sAs+thA mtha' mar sbyin// yi ge si ti'i sngags bzlas bya//
93b3(rgyud 'bum): che ge mo zhig bdag dbang gyur// thams cad du ni bsgom byas nas// nag po'i tshig ni ji bzhin gyis// rnal 'byor 'dod pas de thob 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
93b4(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ / lus med rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rim par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o// // he ru ka chen sgrub pa'i thabs// de nas yang dag bshad par bya//
93b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor 'khor bar bcings pa la// gang zhig shes pa myur grol ba// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste// kha dog sngon po phyed gar can// rdo rje phyag tu bsgom par bya// gzhan yang thod pa bsgom
93b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / spyan gsum sgra ni gyen du 'greng // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kha T+wAM ga ni g.yon phyogs su// 'phreng ba dag gis rkang pa brgyan// sa bon hUM las yang dag byung // yi dgas
93b7(rgyud 'bum): la gnas rtag tu dgod/ / sangs rgyas lnga ru rab sbyor ba// thod pa lnga ni dbu la'o// cod pan la ni mi bskyod sgom// he ru kar grags bsgom par bya// shar du chos kyi 'khor lo ma// sangs rgyas
94a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub lho ru'o/ / 'dod pa kun gyis 'khris ma nub// byang du he ru ka nyid 'dra// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan pa'i// kha dog sna tshogs rnam par dgod
94a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs mdzes yi dgas la bzhugs pa/ / gti mug thams cad nyer 'joms byed// chos kyi a shad dbyug pa'i tha// de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu'i shing // lha mo rnams kyi phyag g.yas
94a3(rgyud 'bum): su/ / rdo rje yang ni bsgom par bya// chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad la/ thod pa'i snod ni g.yon pa la// spyan ma mA ma kI sgrol ma// gos dkar yid du 'ong ba rnams/ me la sogs pa'i mtsham
94a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi ru/ / 'khor lo phyi rol gshin gshed do// shes rab mthar byed rta mgrin dang // 'khyil bar bcas par bsgom par bya// 'khor lo yi ni sgo srungs te// cho ga las ni mthong bas so//
94a5(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las/ he ru ka sgrub pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o// // rnam pa lnga ni bsgom byas la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom par bya/
94a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms pa yis// mkhas pas 'khor lo bsgom par bya// gru bzhi yi ni sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo bskyed par bya ba ste// tsartsi ka sogs gru dang ni// drug pa las
94a7(rgyud 'bum): skyes sogs par byed/ / snying rje khros pa'i dang sgrol bzhengs// khams gsum kun gyi gti mugasol// dad sgrol gsol bsam bzhugs bzhengs// bdud 'di dag las rgyal bar
94b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzod/ / 'jig rten mgon po stong nyid ci ste bzhugs// dad sgrol 'jig rten bsod nams kyis bzhugs shing // byang chub 'dod pa'i 'jig rten mgron bos nas// khyod ni stong pa
94b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid la sems par byed/ / ji ltar skar mda' 'phro ba bzhini// byang chub sems la zhugs par gyur// rdo rje 'chang rang ngo bo nyid// snying rje dang ni 'dod chags sems// dang por sgom pa
94b3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor te/ / gnyis pa rjes kyi rnal 'byor yin// gsum pa shin tu rnal 'byor te// bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o// rdo rje sems dpa' rdzogs pa yin// rnal 'byor yin par 'di
94b4(rgyud 'bum): ltar 'dod/ / de ni rgyu mthun lha yi sku// rjes kyi rnal 'byor yin par grags// 'khor lo thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// shin tu rnal 'byor yin par grags// sku dang gsung dang thugs
94b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / lha yi mig sogs byini rlabs dang // ye shes 'khor lo gzhug pa dang // bdud rtsi myang ba dag dang ni// mchod dang bstod pa chen po dag/ rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya'o//
94b6(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya// bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya// de bzhin spun la khro ba dang // zhes pa bsgrag par mi byor// byang chub sems kyang gtang mi bya// bdag
94b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan chos la smad mi bya/ / sems can la ni byams pa dag/ nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o// yongs su ma smin sems can la// gsang ba dag ni bstan mi bya// bdag sogs phung rnga/
95a1(rgyud 'bum): khanas mi bya// grong pa'i chos ni sun mi gdon// gdug la byams pa rtag tu btang // chos la tshad ni gnal mi bya// sems can dad pa can mi bsdu// rtag tu
95a2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig bsten par bya/ / bud med shes rab rang bzhin la// smod pa zhes pa de bzhin no// rnal 'byor spong mos d+hU mi b+ha// rnal 'byor spang bar mi bya ste// rtag par rgyun du gsang
95a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags bkra/ / rtag tu dam tshig la sogs bsten// gal te ba ga med byung gyur te// bla ma dam tshig la gnod na// des ni dkyil 'khor bri byas la// bde gshegs rnams la zhes pa
95a4(rgyud 'bum): bshags/ / snying rje can gyis mi rtag par// dad pas bla ma'i dam tshig bsrung // nyes pa ma lus rnam spangs sems kyis ni// bsam gtan la sogs bzlas pa mchog gzhol bar//
95a5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu bla ma la ni bla mar bya// brtan zhing dul la snying rje gcig tu sems// dad dang lhag pa'i bsam pas bzod pa 'dzin// slob ma bla ma la ni gus pa dang // dad pas gshin rje
95a6(rgyud 'bum): gshed la gus pa la/ / brtul zhugs ldan pas de ni yongs sbyin bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu dga' ba chen po'i ngo bo rdo rje 'chang gi gsung
95a7(rgyud 'bum): nye bar thos nas cang mi smra bar gyur te/ 'di lta bu'i ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// brtul zhugs mthar thug thod pa chen po ltar// 'khrul 'khor mthar thug gshin rje gshed kyi rgyud/
95b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi mthar thug pa 'di 'dus pa ste// byung bar ma gyur 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// e ma'o zhi ba chen po'i chos// e ma'o khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa// e ma'o mya ngan las 'das pa'i
95b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ e ma'o 'khor bzhi pa nyid// e ma'o 'di na rab tu mtshar// zhes pa gang de yon tan gyur// byang chub med cing mngon rtogs med// dngos po ma yin bsgom bya min//
95b3(rgyud 'bum): khams ma yin zhing rnam shes min// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa nyid// nam mkha' lta bur bdag med pa// chos 'di bde ba chen po ste// sa yang ma yin chu min te// me
95b4(rgyud 'bum): min rlung min nam mkha' min/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// bskyed pa yang ni rab gnas nas// dngos po thams cad dngos med bshad// dngos po med ces ma bsgrags pa//
95b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor sbyor ba dang 'brel phyir// chad pa ma yin rtag pa min// yan lag med cing kha dog med// thog ma bar dang mthar spangs pa// dngos po thams cad med par 'gyur//
95b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu dgor ba'i mtshan nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das tsartsi ka chen po la sogs pas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// bsod nams sdig pa dag dang ma 'brel bas/
95b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu dga' ba dri med dag pa yi// mgon po de bzhin nyid kyi gter chen gcig pu dang // kun kyang snying rje'i sems kyis mgon 'di yod// chos rnams ngo bo bde ba chen po'i
96a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos/ / mchog tu dga' brji mdza ba cad// de la gzugs med bsod nams med cing sdig pa med// skye dang 'gag pa dag ni yod pa min// de bzhin
96a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshe nag po'i rgyud las/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rim par skye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas gtas d+hu
96a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen po la byang chub kyi bar du gcad pa'i phyir/ shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i 'jigs pa chen
96a4(rgyud 'bum): bopo ston cing bdud kyi dpung chen po lpags te/ de'i dus na bdud chen po las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs
96a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rnams las gshin rje gshed kyi khro bo nges par phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par phyung nas kyang lag na rdo rje thub pa chen po'i bka' bzhin byed pa la/ phyag na rdo rje khyod 'di lta bu'i
96a6(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed kyi khro bo'i gzugs su bsgyur te/ / bdud dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / lha rnams kyang tshems shig/ chings shig/ rtogs shig ces gsungs so//
96a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i dus na ji ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa zos te/ skad cig la bzung zhing don bzung ste bsdus nas rab tu yid la byas so// zhes gsang ba chen po'i bdag po chen po
96b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rigs kyi saca bo nA dku be ra'i yab kyis de skad ces gsungs so/ / o can gyi yul nas yang dag par byung ba dngas grub thams cad sbed par byed pa rgyud kyi rtul po 'bum thag bdun las byung ba//
96b2(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud las le'u bco brgyad pa'o// // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs shin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud rdzogs so// /
96b3(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po mkhas pa dI paM ka ra shI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// slad kyis lo tsa ba dge slong dar ma
96b4(rgyud 'bum): grags kyis bcos la/ de las kyang dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bcos so// rta kar skad du/ shrI badz+ra ma hA bre ba ra ba nA mnyan
96b5(rgyud 'bum): bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po khros pa'i rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi// sgrub pa yang dag rab
96b6(rgyud 'bum): bshad de/ / de yis lha rnams thams cad la// drag shul che zhing 'jigs par byed// de la thog mar sngags pas yid du 'ong ba'i gnas gang yang rung ba'i gnas la dgos pa thams cad bsgrub/
96b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o// de las gnas gsungs pa ni/ dur khrod dam/ chu klung gi 'gram mam/ shing gcig gam/ mtshan ma gcig pa 'am/ bzhi mdo 'am/ ri'i rtse mo 'am/ khang stong ngam
97a1(rgyud 'bum): ma mo'i khyim mam/ sgra'i khang pa 'am/ 'thab mo'i gnas sam/ grong khyer ram/ nags khrod dam/ grong la sogs pa'i gnas su sngags pa gnas te/ rdorje
97a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed chen po'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i ming gi rgyud 'dir dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor pas dbang dang / dgug pa dang / gsad pa dag dang / bskrad pa dang / dbye ba dang / rengs pa dang /

97a4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin mo dang / klu la sogs pa'i cho ga 'dis bsgrub par bya'o// de la cho ga ni dang por re zhig sngags pas ro bsregs pa'i thal chen gyis lus byugs te/ mtshan phyed na gcer bu skra
97a5(rgyud 'bum): gsil ba byas la/ / 'phags pa ma he'i gdong can gyi rnal 'byor gyis dur khrod la sogs par dkyil 'khor bris te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// dril bu
97a6(rgyud 'bum): dar gyi 'phan la sogs/ / me tog 'phreng bas rnam par klubs// grwa rnams dag ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud gyon phugs dag tu// rdo rje rin chen gyis sbas pa// zla ba pyad pa de bzhin
97a7(rgyud 'bum): / de dbus 'khor lo bri ba ni// re'u mig dgu pa zlum po'o// sgo gcig pa ni dbye bar bya// lhag ma yongs su gcad par bya// de dbus mi ro bri bar bya// shar du mgo bo/ lhor lag
97b1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / nub tu rgyu ma/ byang du rkang pa gnyis/ shar gyi grar thod pa/ lhor thod tshal/ nub byang du dur khrod kyi ras/ byang shar du skyes bu gsal shing la btsugs pa'o// de dag ni 'khor lo'i dbus
97b2(rgyud 'bum): su mtshan ma'i phyag rgya lnga'o/ / de nas 'khor lo'i phyi rol gyi phyag rgya rnams ni shar phyogs kyi snam bu la gri gug dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / gtun shing dang / chu gri dang / rdo rje rtse gcig
97b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams bri'o// lho phyogs kyi snam bu la sta re dang / mda' dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / dbyig to dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje zhags pa la sogs pa bri'o//
97b4(rgyud 'bum): nub phyogs kyi snam bu la rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / gri chung dang / phub dang / gzhu dang / dril bu dang / rlung gi ba dan la sogs pa bri'o// byang phyogs kyi snam bu la sdigs mdzub dang
97b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phan rtse gsum pa dang / glang po'i pags pa dang / rdo rje tho ba dang / mdung dang / me thab la sogs pa bri'o// sgo bzhi dang grwa rnams la ro langs chen po bri'o// gal te mchog gi dngos grub
97b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na mar khu chen po'i mar me dbul lo/ / mi dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / khyi dang / wa dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang ba man dang / lug dang / ri dgas dang
97b7(rgyud 'bum): pag pa la sogs pa'i sha rnams dbul bar bya'o/ / gzhan yang bya rgod dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / khra dang / chu sgur dang / thing ril dang / bzhad dang / rma bya dang / khyim bya
98a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / ri skegs dang / khyung chen po la sogs pa'i sha rnams dbul bar bya'o// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bza' ba dang / ston mo dang / skyon sreg dang

98a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas sngon du spyad pa byas te/ bdag zhi bar gyur pa'i shin tu mthun pa'i grogs sam/ bdag gcig pu rnam par snang mdzad kyis lus byugs te gcer bur phud nas skra gsil/ mtshan
98a4(rgyud 'bum): phyed na cang te'u dkrol la ha ha zhes bya zhing mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dngos grub 'dod pas 'jug par bya'o// rab tu zhim pa'i chang la sogs pa btung

98a6(rgyud 'bum): mdun du g.yas bskum du gnas la nga rgyal dang bcas pas sems rtse gcig tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzla bar bya'o/ / de nas 'jigs pa chen po byung na// de la
98a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya ste/ gal te 'jigs par gyur na/ de la bgegs chen po'i bar chad 'byung ngo // bar chad byung ba na dngos grub mi 'grub bo// de bas na sngags pas 'jigs
98b1(rgyud 'bum): par mi bya ste/ de la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dgyes so// dgyes nas khyod ci 'dod ces gsungs pa dang / de la rig 'dzin gyis smra bar bya ste/ ral gri dang / sa 'og dang / mig sman//
98b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / gser 'gyur dang / bcud kyis len pa'am/ de las gzhan yang yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub nges par bdag la gsol cig ces brjod na/ de la the tshom med par stsol lo// brgya gzhig
98b3(rgyud 'bum): la sngags pas de dag ma sgrub na'ang de'i phra mo'i las tham cad nges par grub bo/ / 'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i sbyor ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil
98b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bstan pa ste rtog pa dang po'o/ / // de nas las kyi tshogs kyi cho ga rab tu bshad de/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du gsad pa dang bskrad pa la sogs pa sngags pa khros

98b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir ro/ / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas thog mar ni de bya ste/ de la 'di'i las ni ji ltar gsad par 'dod pa'i sngags pas dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang / khrag dang / lan

99a1(rgyud 'bum): bas kha lhor bltas te/ ma he'i gdong gi sbyor bas bri bar bya'o// me gnyis kyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming bcas par gzhag la de yi ge bcu mas bskor zhing hUM brgyad
99a2(rgyud 'bum): bri/ / zur rnams su phaT kyi yi ge rnams bri/ bdag gnyis tsha ba'i mar gyis lus byugs la// thod pa gnyis kyi dbus su 'khrul 'khor rab tu bcug la sgyed bu gsum gyi steng du

99a4(rgyud 'bum): rims kyis thebs par 'dod pa na 'khor lo de nyid mi'i nya phyis gnyis kyi dbus su legs par bzhag la me thab kyi 'og tu khru byed brkos la bcug nas me sbar na rims nad kyis 'dzin no/ /
