99a6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge dang sngags spel lo/ / sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas dang lhan cig tu bya rog gis btogs pa'i lhag ma mi gtsang ba dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu dur khrod kyi ras la byugs te/
99a7(rgyud 'bum): del sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'khor lo zos te dur khrod du sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// shing gcig gi drung du sras na bskrad par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma gcig par sras na dbye bar 'gyur ro//
99b1(rgyud 'bum): chu'i nang du sbas na rengs par 'gyur ro// khyim du bzhag na zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyung nas legs par bkrus na grol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa gshin rje'i 'khor lo
99b2(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi tshogs dur khrod kyi ras la bris te/ dur khrod dam/ lam pa ni mdo dang / shing gcig dang / grog mkhar dang / chu 'gram dang / mtshan ma gcig pa dang / rgyal po'i sgo dang / rnam
99b3(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad dang / rdo rje chu dang / dur khrod kyi sol bas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan tshad sor brgyad pa byas la de'i snying khar 'khor lo'i sngags bcug ste/ mi'i rus pa'i phur bus gnas
99b4(rgyud 'bum): lngar gdab par bya'o/ / tshigs thams cad la tsher ma rnon pos dgang bar bya'o// re thod pa gnyis kyi dbus su bcug ste/ de grog mkhar dang gnas bdun gyi sas gshin rje'i gzugs khru gang
99b5(rgyud 'bum): tsam zhal gtsigs pa/ gsus pa che ba/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ phyag na ral gri dang zhags pa 'dzin pa/ gcer bu skra gsil ba byas la/ de'i snying khar thod pa gnyis bcug
99b6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / nyi ma phyed dam nam phyed na dur khrod dam ro bsregs pa'i sar sbas te/ shin tu ring bar mgo lhor bstan la kha 'thur du phu ba la sba'o// khyim du 'ongs pa dang mnyam par bzhag pas ma he'i
99b7(rgyud 'bum): gdong gi sbyor bas bsgrub bri'i maung dang bcas par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na nyi ma gsum gyis 'chi'o/ / phyung nas bkrus na thar par 'gyur ro// de nas rengs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba
100a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs te/ te'u lo pa'i pags pa la dug la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bris la/ pags pa de bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi rdul dang gcin btang ba'i shul
100a2(rgyud 'bum): gyisas bkang la de'i sgras bcing bar bya'o/ / phyi nas bong bu'i gcin dang rnam par snang mdzad dang lhan cig tu brdzis la kham por dgang bar bya'o// der 'khor lo bcug la ro bsregs pa'i me la
100a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhag ste/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la gshin rje'i sbyor bas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas pa byas na zhag gcig gis rengs par byed do// 'di ni phyis rjes su gzung ba mi 'grub pa'i rab tu sbyor
100a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sngags pas shin tu khros pas rab tu sbyor bar bya'o// gzhan yang dbye ba'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di ni gshin rje'i 'khor lo sngon gyi cho gas bris la/ gnas bdun gyi sas ma he dang rta byas te
100a5(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis gcig gi steng du gcig bzhag la/ de gnyis kyi snying khar 'khor lo bcug ste nim pa'i shing drung du gzhag go// 'khor lo'ang ma he dang rta'i khrag gis bris te/ 'di ni sngags kyi bye brag ste
100a6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas byas na zhag gsum gyis 'byed par byed do/ / de nas sngags pas bskrad par 'dod na gnas bdun gyi sas rnga mo byas la/ de'i rgyu ba yi ge yaM yongs su gyur pa las
100a7(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa dmigs te/ de'i steng du bsgrub bya dmigs la/ de'i rgyab tu gshin rje'i gzugs lag pas dbyug pa 'dzin par dmigs te/ de'i 'byug pas rje ba
100b1(rgyud 'bum): / kha lho ru bltas nas khrid pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// 'khor lo di de'i snying khar gong du gsungs pa'i cho ga las bsgrub bya'i ming dang sbal ba yang dag par bris la bcug na zhag bdun gyis the tsom
100b2(rgyud 'bum): med par skrod par 'gyur ro/ / de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs te/ nyi ma'i tshes gtum po tsha ba'i mar khus byugs la nim pa'i shing la 'dzegs nas/ der bzhag la de'i lus kyi mar khu
100b3(rgyud 'bum): phyis kyis bzhar la der gnas par gzung ngo / / mar khu de blangs nas lha chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi ras blangs la de bsregs pa'i bar gyi du ba'i dreg pa de dang mar khu de gcig tu byas la bskrad par
100b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa de'i mchil lha ma la de bsku'o/ / de'i lag pa dang rkang pa gnyis la'ang byugs na skad cig gis de skrod do// de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa ni dur khrod kyi ras sam/ gro gis
100b5(rgyud 'bum): lo ma la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bya rog gi khrag dang bya rog gi smyu gus bri bar bya ste/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel te gtor ma za ba'i mgrin par bcings la/ bya rog
100b6(rgyud 'bum): bzungs nas ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor bar gnas pas kha lhor bltas la 'phang ste/ de'i skad cig gis bya rog bzhin sa kun tu 'khor ro// gzhan yang bskrad pa ni tsha ba'i mar khus bskus la
100b7(rgyud 'bum): nim pa'i shing las gtor ma za ba'i tshang blangs la/ tshang de'i shing pha'i nags kyi shing mes bsregs pa'i thal ba de blangs la gang gi mgor blugs pa de skod par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
101a1(rgyud 'bum): dbye ba'i rab tu sbyor ba ni bya rog dang 'ug pa'i gshog pa dang / bram ze dang / gtum pa rnams kyi sku gcig tu byas la/ da du ra'i shing la me rab tu sbar te du ba med
101a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mes bsregs la/ de'i thal ba blangs la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas nas bud med dang skyes pa gnyis kyi bar du thal ba bzhag na de skad cig gis 'byed par byed do// de nas dur khrod kyi
101a3(rgyud 'bum): ras blangs la dug la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis bran pa'i bar du bsgrub bya'i ma'i bris la/ zer mo dang sbrul gyi spu dang pags pa blangs te/ de la bcug nas sdong bu byas te/ gang gi khyim du sbar
101a4(rgyud 'bum): ba der phan tshun 'thab par 'gyur ro/ / de nas gsad par 'dod pa ni bshang cig la gzugs brnyan byas la/ de'i steng du rus pa phye mas rab tu byugs la/ dur khrod kyi me la skra bshig pa
101a5(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ kha lhor bltas te ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor bas nam phyed na de gtubs la sreg go/ gang gi ming dang bcas par byas na de skad cig gis 'chi'o// rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po nyid kyi
101a6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sbyor ba 'di gsungs so/ / de nas bskrad par 'dod pas rgyal mtshan gyi ras la le tshe bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas dang dur khrod kyi sol
101a7(rgyud 'bum): bas gang gi ming dang bcas pa bris te/ nim pa'i shing la rgyal mtshan bzhag na de skrod par 'gyur ro// de nas rengs par 'dod pas gshin rje'i 'khor lo g.yam pa 'am ras la ba bla dang yung
101b1(rgyud 'bum): bas gang gi ming dang bcas pa legs par bris la bzhag na de rengs par 'gyur ro/ / gal te sngags pas dbang du bya bar 'dod na grog mkhar gyi sa dang / gur kum dang / gi'u wang dang
101b2(rgyud 'bum): pabapa bla dang / yung ba rnams lhan cig tu byas te/ bsgrub bya po 'am/ gal te mo'i gzugs brnyan tshad sor bcu drug pa byas la/ ge'u wang dang srin lag gi khrag gis gro ga la gshin rje'i
101b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo bris te/ de'i snying khar bcug nas rang gi khyim du bzhag la me tog dmar pos dus gsum du dbul ba dang / kha nub tu bltas la yi ge bcu pi'i sngags bzlas pa byas na/ zhag
101b4(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyis brgya byin yang dbang du 'gyur na yang phra mo'i mi lta ci smos/ / de nas yang 'gugs par 'dod na/ de la thod pa la 'khor lo gi'u wa ba dang srin lag gi khrag gis bris te/ seng ldeng
101b5(rgyud 'bum): gi ma la bsro zhing gang bya ba'i ming dang bcas par bzlas na/ de skad cig gis rlung ki shugs bzhin du 'gugs par 'gyur ro// de nas sngags pas myos par bya 'dod na d+ha du ra'i 'bras bu
101b6(rgyud 'bum): blangs la/ sha chen dang lhan cig tu shing srin gyis zos pa'i phye ma dang bsres nas bza' ba dang btung ba la sbyin no// sngags kyang bzlas pa bya ste/ de skad cig gis smyo bar 'gyur
101b7(rgyud 'bum): zhing zhag bdun gyis 'chi'o/ / de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor ba gsungs pa/ gshin rje'i sngags dur khrod kyi ras la dug la sogs pa'i rdzas kyis bris te/ mar metshon po dang
102a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs brnyan byas la/ de'i snying khar 'khor lo bcug nas pa'i gnas su song la ro bsregs pa'i me la mtshon rnon pos gtubs
102a2(rgyud 'bum): nas rnam par brtsegs pa'i sbyor bas rnal 'byor pa gnas la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis lus byugs te/ kha lhor bltas nas bsregs na de myur du 'chi'o// de nas dpral ba'i rab tu
102a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba byung ba ni bya rog dang 'ug pa'i rus pa blangs la/ de gnyis la lcags kyi tsher mas bsgrub byi'i ming dang lhan cig tu yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bris la/ gcig pu gnas su gnas te/
102a4(rgyud 'bum): gang gi ming dang bcas par bzlas shing // de gcig la gcig drud na 'bral bar 'gyur ro// de nas gshin rje'i 'khor lo gro ga'i 'dab ma la bud med dang skyes pa'i ming bris nas sbal pa'i gsus
102a5(rgyud 'bum): par bcug nas/ gang gi ming dang bcas pa them pa'i 'og tu sbas na/ de'i yan lag mtshon gyis 'bugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bu mo rengs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba 'di gshin rje'i sngags dur khrod
102a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi ras la dug la sogs pas bris la/ ro bsregs pa'i sol bas gzugs brnyan mtho gang tsam gyi tshad brtsigs la/ de'i snying khar 'khor lo bcug nas rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la
102a7(rgyud 'bum): ma ho'i sbyor bas che ge mo'i bu mo myur bar rengs par gyur cig ces yi ge bcu pa'i sngags bzlas na rengs par 'gyur ro/ / 'di'i las rnams ni gzhan su la'ang smra bar mi bya'o// gal te sngags
102b1(rgyud 'bum): ba rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can gyis ni dmyal bar nges par ltung ngo / / dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang / bla ma la brnyas par byed pa dang / dam tshig dang bral ba dang / sngags dang rgyud
102b2(rgyud 'bum): la 'phya bar byed pa dang / sems can la 'tshe ba 'di rnams la phan pa'i phyir sngags pas snying rjes gdungs pa'i sems kyis gnod pa rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// gal te gzhan la byas na dam tshig
102b3(rgyud 'bum): nyams nas tsha ba chen por 'gro'o/ / ngas rgyud gzhan du'ang bshad de/ slob dpon la ni smod byed dang // theg pa chen po skur pa dang // sngags rgyud rab sbyor ye shes la// 'phya bar byed pa'i
102b4(rgyud 'bum): mi gang dag/ de ni 'bad la gsad par bya// yang na gnas nas g.yo bar bya// rnal 'byor snying rje med pa yis// gzhan la rung rung byas na ni// de la de bzhini las de ni// phyir ldog par ni
102b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur/ / ci phyir sems can mtho ba tsam phyir// rnal 'byor ma ni 'di la'o// 'di ni 'jam dpal 'jam pa'i mchog/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las
102b6(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad grub pa'i rtog pa ste gnyis pa'o/ / / de nas go rims ji lta ba'i cho gas sngags btu ba rab tu gsungs te/ rab tu gtsang ba'i yul khams su sngags pas
102b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas la sngags btu bar bya ste/ ji ltar drug pa'i dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // drug pa yi ni gnyis pa la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa// gnyis pa yin gsum pa la
103a1(rgyud 'bum): yang ni dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan/ / bdun pa yi yang gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi yang gsum pa la// dbyangs yig bcu gsum dang ldan pa// lnga pa yaM yang lnga pa
103a2(rgyud 'bum): la/ dbyangs yig bcu gcig dang ldan pa// drug pa yi ni dang po dang // yang ni rlung gi sa bon sbyin// lnga pa yi yang lnga pa la// bcu dang gcig gis mnan ldan pa// bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa la//
103a3(rgyud 'bum): bcu gsum pa yis mnyam mnan pa// drug pa yi yang gnyis pa la// dbyangs yi ga lnga pa dang ldan pa// gsum pa yi ni lnga pa dang // rlung gi sa bon de nas sbyin// dbyangs yig bcu gsum yang
103a4(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan/ / bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang // de nas rlung gi sa bon sprin// drug pa yi yang dang po dang // bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang // de la rlung gi sa bon ni// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang ldan//
103a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa// de nas me yi sa bon sbyin// rlung gi sa bon de bzhin no// de nas yi ge tha ma sbyin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan//
103a6(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi sa bon de bzhin mchog/ drug pa yi ni dang po dang // de nas yi ge tha ma sbyin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan// yang ni rlung gi sa bon dang // gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // de ni
103a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis 'gyur ldan par bya/ / bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa// de nas me yi sa bon la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa dang // lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // de nas
103b1(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi sa bon sbyin/ / dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// mchog gi dbang phyug dang sbyar ba// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa yi ni dang po ni// mkhas pas lan gnyis brjod par bya//
103b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i// 'jigs byed chen po rgyud 'khor lo// ma he gdong can rtsa sngags te// 'bum bzlas pa yis las kun byed// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// ma byung 'byung
103b3(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang ldan pa// me yi sa bon 'og tu sbyin// de nas mnga' bdag bcu drug mtha'// bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa la//
103b4(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs yig bzhi pa dang ldan zhing // gsum pa yi ni dang po la// 'og tu me yi sa bon gdags// mnga' bdag bcu drug mtha' ma ste// drug yi ni bzhi pa la// dbyangs yig gsum pa
103b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa/ / dang po yi yang dang po dang // dbyangs yig bdun pa dang ldan pa// 'og tu ma yi sa bon sbyin// bzhi pa yi ni dang po la// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa// zhi pa yaM ni
103b6(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa ni/ / mkhas pa yis ni lan gnyis brjod// dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon la// dbyangs yig gnyis dang ldan la// spyi bo ru ni thig les brgyan//
103b7(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa yi naM dang po'o// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal po ste// ma dze'i gdong can sbyor ba yin// thams cad las ni byed pa'o// las kyi sngags su grags pa ste// sum 'bum bzlas na las kun byed// drug pa yin
104a1(rgyud 'bum): 'o dang / lnga pa yi yang snga pa la/ dbyang mig gshis pa dang ldan pa/ yin pa yi ni dang po ste/ de yi lnga bzang du bzhag dang pa ma ni nga po dang / dang por rnam par snang mdzad sbyim dran pa de ni mthar byin ma/ spod pa lnga mi ma mams
104a2(rgyud 'bum): lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang / gsum pa yi ni dang po'o/ 'di ni ma he gdong can gyi// snying po'i sngags su rab tu grags/ yi ge re re 'brur bzlas na/ 'jig rten gsum gyi las ni gag/ ci yang rung ba thams cad byed// sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i
104a3(rgyud 'bum): dus 'dir mchod par bya'o/ / 'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las/ sngags btu ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
104a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi bsgrub pa yang dag par bshad de/ sngon du chos thams cad la bdag med pa sngon du 'gro bas lhar dmigs pa bya ste// dang por re zhig rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i sngags
104a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod pas/ chos thams cad kyi med pa'i ngo bor byas nas// nam mkha'i dkyil du yaM gi rnam pa las grub pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor mdog du ba'i rnam pa bsam mo// de'i steng du dang po'i
104a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs yig las gyur pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dmigs te/ de'i steng du dr-iH'i rnam pa las 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i gzugs su gyur par bsam par bya'o// der i'i rnam pa las grub pa'i
104a7(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam ste/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rig pa'i
104b1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo dang / khro bo la sogs pa shin tu bskul te/ yang 'ongs nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bsam mo// de nas yang 'jam dpal dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa de rnams bcig
104b2(rgyud 'bum): tu gyur nas/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o// 'od zer 'bar ba'i rnam pas dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar khyab par gsal bar bya'o// de'i steng du hUM mdog nag po'i 'od zer lnga dang yang
104b3(rgyud 'bum): dag par ldan par bsam ste/ hUM de las 'od zer gyi rnam par 'phros pas/ sngon du gsungs pa bzhin du yang zhugs te/ yi ge de las rdo rje chen po rnam par gdengs pa kha dog nag po'i 'od zer
104b4(rgyud 'bum): lnga dang ldan pa rnam par dmigs par bya ste/ rdo rje de las phra mo'i rnam pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo dang / rig pa'i lha mos nam mkha' til gyi gang bu ltar gang ba nyi
104b5(rgyud 'bum): ma la gnas pa rnam par bsam par bya'o/ / de sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis ni sems can yongs su smin par btul nas byang chub la rab tu bkod do// yang de nyid lhan cig tu
104b6(rgyud 'bum): bsdus nas rdo rjer gzugs brnyan la rab tu grags par bsam mo/ / rdo rje'i gzugs de nyid zhal dgu pa/ mtsho'i gzugs can/ 'jig pa'i dus kyi me ltar 'bar ba/ rdo rje 'jigs byed
104b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po khams gsum pa bar nus pa/ nal gcig pa/ sa bzhes ljags 'jil ba/ rnam par gtsigs pa'i khro gzer 'dzags pa/ khro gnyer gyi 'gras nas smin ma dang spyan 'jam
105a1(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po'i dus ltar drag pa/ mi'i khrag dang / tshal dang / zhag dang / rkang za ba/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha la sogs pa la sngags mdzub
105a2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / khyab 'jug dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa za ba/ thod pa gtsigs pa'i rtse mo 'jigs su rung ba'i thod pas zor byas pa/
105a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa chen po can/ phaT ces sgrog cing thod pa'i byang phrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs bcu drug pa/ gcer bu'i gzugs mtshan ma gyen du 'greng ba/ g.yon brkyang ba
105a4(rgyud 'bum): gsus pa che ba/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/ pheM zhes sgra sgrog pa/ phyag sum cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa/ glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs
105a5(rgyud 'bum): byed chen po ma he'i gdong can rnam par bsam par bya ste/ de ltar shin tu bsam pa brtan par bya ste/ de kho na nyid kyi sbyor ba la shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par
105a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ g.yas dang po na kri kug/ gnyis pa na mtshon rtse gcig pa/ gsum pa na gtun shing / bzhi pa na chu kr-i/ lnga pa na rdo rje rtse gcig pa/ drug pa na sta re/ bdun pa na mdung
105a7(rgyud 'bum): thung / brgyad pa na mngar/ dgu pa na lcags kyu/ bcu pa na dbyig to// bcu gcig pa na kha T+wA~M ka/ bcu gnyis pa na 'khor lo// bcu gsum pa na rdo rje/ bcu bzhi pa na rdo rje tho ba
105b1(rgyud 'bum): bco lnga pa na ral gri/ bcu drug pa na cang te'u'o// g.yon pa'i dang po na thod pa/ gnyis pa na mgo bo/ gsum pa na phu ba/ bzhi pa na rkang pa/ lnga pa na zhags pa/ drug pa na gcu/ bdun pa na rgyu ma/
105b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa na dril bu/ dgu pa na lag pa/ bcu pa na dur khrod kyi ras/ bcu gcig pa na skyes bu gsal shing la btsugs pa/ bcu gnyis pa na ma thab/ bcu gsum pa na thod tshal/ bcu bzhi pas sdigs
105b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzub/ bco lnga pa na 'phan rtse gsum pa/ bcu drug pa na rlung gis phyar ba'i dur khrod kyi ras/ phyag gnyis glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa'o// zhabs g.yas pa'i dang pos mi/ gnyis pas
105b4(rgyud 'bum): ma he/ gsum pas glang / bzhi pas bong bu/ lnga pas rngo mo/ drug pas khyi/ bdun pas lug/ brgyad pas wa/ zhabs g.yas pas 'di dag la zhon pa'o// zhabs g.yon pa'i dang pos bya rgod/ gnyis
105b5(rgyud 'bum): pas 'ug pa/ gsum pas bya rog/ bzhi pas ne tso/ lnga pas khra/ drug pas khyud chen po/ bdun pas ri skegs/ brgyad pas bzhad/ zhabs g.yon pas 'di dag mnan po'o// dpal 'jigs
105b6(rgyud 'bum): byed chen po'i dang po'i zhal ni rab tu gnag pa ma he'i rnam pa shin tu khros pa can/ rwa g.yas kyi zhal gsum pa dang po sngon po/ gnyis pa dmar po/ gsum pa ser po ste/ mnga' bdag gi zhal gsum
105b7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu khros pa/ ra g.yon par zhal gsum la dang po dkar po/ gnyis pa dud kha/ gsum pa nag po rab tu khros pa/ gtsigs pa'i zhal rab tu bsam par byor// ra gnyis kyi bar du dbus kyi zham
106a1(rgyud 'bum): dmang po rab tu 'dzags pa/ rgas nas khrag 'dzags pa bsam par bya'o// steng du 'jam dpal gyig la cung zad sang ba ming tsam khro ba byis pa'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa/ smra
106a2(rgyud 'bum): ral pa lnga dang ldan pa rnam par bsams te/ zhal thams cad spyan gsum par bsgom de// 'di ltar bdag zhid rtag tu rtse gcig tu dmigs so// de nyid dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma se'i gdong can
106a3(rgyud 'bum): dag nyid yin par bsgoms nas/ dpa' bo'i gnas la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas de nas phyi nas sngags bzla bar bya ste/ bzlas pa'i dus su rang gi snyinga'i khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/ de'i
106a4(rgyud 'bum): steng du rang gi sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya'o/ / 'bar ba dang phyi nas ma yengs pa'i yid kyis bzlas pa bya'o// sbyor ba 'di la gnas pa'i sngags pa yis// rtag tu 'jigs byed las kun bya// dur
106a5(rgyud 'bum): / khrod gnas la bsgom bya zhing // rtag tu bdud rtsi lnga rnams bza'// de yis bsgrub las bsgrub gzhan med// gzhan yang mar me che za zhing // mtshan mo rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pas// sum 'bum rtsa
106a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sngags bzlas bya/ / 'di zlos pa yi sngags pa yis// thams cad las ni byed par 'gyur// 'di ni 'jam dpal 'jam pa'i mchog/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud las/ sgom pa'i rtog
106a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ste bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas dpal 'jigs byed chen pos bstan pa'i bris sku'i cho ga rab tu gsungs pa/ dpa' bo'i ras sam/ ro la bkab pa'i ras sam/ me tog can gyi ras
106b1(rgyud 'bum): sam/ du skyes pa'i ras sam/ de ma rnyed na ras gang yang rung ba la/ ri mo mkhan bzang po rnam rtog med pa/ mi khro ba/ gtsang ba/ mkhas pa/ yid gzhungs pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ brtse ba can
106b2(rgyud 'bum): sred pa dang bral ba/ 'di ltar yon tan dang ldan pa'o// de lta bu'i ri mo mkhan gyi lag pas dpa' bo'i ras la bri bar bya'o// gal te dngos grub 'dod pas dpa' bo'i yon sbyin no// de la cho ga ni gsang
106b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gnas su gnas la/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bri bar bya ste/ ri mo mkhan dang sgrub pa pos mthong ba la 'jig rten pa gzhan gyis mi mthong bar bri bar bya ste/ zhabs bcu drug pa/ phyag sum
106b4(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa bzhi pa/ zhal dgu pa/ bcer bu kha dog nag po g.yon brkyang ba/ 'jigs pa chen po yang 'jigs par byed pa'i rnam pa can/ mtshan ma gyen du 'greng bar thang 'bri bar bya'o// 'al dang po ma/
106b5(rgyud 'bum): rA'i g.yas su zhal gsum pa ste/ sngon po dang / dmar po dang / ser po shin tu khros pa bri bar bya'o// g.yon du dkar po dang / dud kha dang / nag po'o// de gnyis kyi dbus su rab tu dmar pa
106b6(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ / do'i steng du 'jam dpal gyi zhal ser po cung zad khro ba bri bar bya'o// phyag g.yas par gr-i gug dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / gtun shing dang / chu gri dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa
106b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / sA re dang / mdung dang / mnga' dang / ljags kyu dang dbyig po dang / kha T+wA~M ga dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rdo mo pa dang / ral gri dang cang te'u'o// phyag gson pa mthod pa dang /
107a1(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo dang / bub dang / rkang pa dang / zhags pa dang / gzhu dang / rgyu ma dang / dril bu dang / lag pa dang / dur khrod kyi ras dang / skyes bu gsal shing gis phug pa dang
107a2(rgyud 'bum): mem tha ba dang / zod tshal dang / sdigs mdzub dang / raphan rtse gsum pa dang / rlung gis bskyod pa'i ras so// phyag gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa rlon pa 'dzin pa 'bri'o// zhabs g.yas pas
107a3(rgyud 'bum): mi dang / ma he dang / glang dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / khyi dang / lus dang / wa rnams so// zhabs g.yon pas bya rgod dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / ne tso dang / khra dang bya chen dang
107a4(rgyud 'bum): ri skegs dang / bzhad rnams so// 'di lta bur 'dug pa'i rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po bri bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu dur khrod chen po'ang bri bar bya'o// 'jigs pa chen po byed pa/ srin po dang
107a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing skyong ba dang / ro langs dang ldan pa skyes bu mdung rtse gtsugs pa'i gzugs de mthong bar bya'o// n+ya gro d+ha'i shing dag gi steng du skyes bu 'phyang ba bri bar bya/ skyes bu sngags bcon rang bri
107a6(rgyud 'bum): mdung gis phug pa'i skyes bu'ang dri/ bya sna tshogs dang / bya rog dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang ha sa 'byin pa bri/ sgrub pa po rnams kyang bri ste/ bcom ldan 'das la rtse gcig tu wA gcer bu skra
107a7(rgyud 'bum): bshig pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ cang te'u dang / thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa/ thod pas spyi bor brgyan pa/ dgod cing dur khrod der 'jug pa bri/ 'di ni gsang ba'i mis sa
107b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas gcig tu legs par bzhag la/ sha chen gyi spos dbul/ do'i mdun du dung chen gyi 'phreng bas bzlas pa bya/ sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pas dus gsum du 'bang la bris su bsrung ngo //
107b2(rgyud 'bum): gnan gang yang mi gzhag go// gzhan gang gi mdun du'ang mi dgram mo// klag pa dang / btung ba dang / bza' ba dang / ston mo ni sha chen rtag tu mtshan mo bapa' 'o// gal te mchog gi dngos
107b3(rgyud 'bum): grub 'dod na dus gsum du rnam par snang mdzad dang khrag gi spos zis sku'i mdun du dbul lo/ / 'di ni 'jam dpal 'jam pa'i mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bris
107b4(rgyud 'bum): sku'i cho ga'i rdog pa ste lta pa'o/ / / de nas sbyin sreg gi las kyi cho ga gsungs pa/ ji ltar sngon gyi rim pa ste/ dang por re zhig sngags pas pa'i gnas su byin la/
107b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan phyed na sbyin sreg gi las kun byas te/ gang du gsungs pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas las thams cad bya'o// de las las ni 'di rnams yin no// gal te gsar par 'dod na ra
107b6(rgyud 'bum): mi'i rus pa dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang / bong bu'i spangs dang / khyi'i spangs dang / tsher ma dang / skra dang / srin mo dang / de dag thams cad tsha ba'i mar khrus sbrus la/ ma he'i zhal
107b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi sbyor bas shin tu mnyam par bzhag la/ kha lhor bltas te ro bsregs pa'i me la/ gang gi ming dang bcas par brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na the tshom med par de zhag gsum gyis 'chi'o//
108a1(rgyud 'bum): yang na phyogs gcig tu gnas la me thab gra gug gsum byas nas/ der sngon du gsungs pa'i rdzas kyis gtum po'i me la sbyin sreg bya ste/ sbyor ba des ni ngas de nyid
108a2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub bo/ / de nas dpral bar 'dod na bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / rma bya dang / sbrul dang / skra dang / 'bras pul dang / ma he dang / rta'i sha dang lhan cig tu gang gi ming dang bcas par yi ge
108a3(rgyud 'bum): bcu pa'i sngags kyis dur khrod kyi me la bsregs na des 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ / yang na dur khrod kyi shing la gtum po'i me rab tu sbyar la khyim du gnas te/ gong gi rdzas de bsregs na
108a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu'ang nyi ma bdun gyis 'bral lo/ / de nas bskrad par 'dod na bya rog gi sha dang rnga mo'i rtug pa dang lhan cig tu chang dang yang dag par ldan pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
108a5(rgyud 'bum): su dur khrod kyi shing la me rab tu sngar la/ gcer bu ska bshig par bsgyur nas kha lho phyogs su bltas te/ gshin rje'i sngags kyis che ge mo'i ming dang bcas par lag pa g.yon pas
108a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg stong byas na/ skrod pa las gzhan du ma yin no// de nas rengs par 'dod na ba bla dang / yung ba dang / ldong ros dang / gi'u wang dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa
108a7(rgyud 'bum): byas la kha byang du bltas te las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sbyor ba dmigs nas/ gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyi ni sreg byas na/ de nyi ma bdun gyis rengs par 'gyur ro// de nas grong bskrad
108b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod na nim pa'i shing la me rab tu sbar la/ khyi'i sha dang / skal pa'i shA dang / khyim byir sha dang / rnga mo'i rtug pa dang / byi la'i khrag gcig tu smras la/ gshin rje'i sbyor ba la
108b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas pas/ grong gi ming dang bcas par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu byas na grong skrod par 'gyur ro// las de rnams ni shin tu 'ang
108b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bzhag pas bya ste/ gzhan du na sngags pa rang nyid la 'bab par 'gyur/ gzhan gang la'ang mi bstan no// de nas zhi bar bya bar 'dod na mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / 'o ma dang /
108b4(rgyud 'bum): dur ba dang bcas par/ pa la sha'i shing la ma rab tu sbar na zhi bar 'dod par dmigs nas yul gyi shar phyogs su kha bltas te gnas pas dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na des
108b5(rgyud 'bum): yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rgyas par 'dod na til dang / 'bras dang / nas dang / mar dang bcas pas u dum pa ra'i shing la ma rab tu sbar nas las kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i lha'i
108b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba dmigs te/ kha byang du bltas nas mnyam par bzhag pas yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis dus gsum du sbyin sreg stong byas na rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas 'gugs par 'dod na ske tshes gzugs
108b7(rgyud 'bum): brnyan byas la de nas seng ldeng po ma'o dbus su gshin rje'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na ma grub pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma bdun gyis gang 'dod pa the tshom med par 'gugs
109a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas spro bar bya bar 'dod na bya rgong chen po'i tshang dang sha chen bsrags na spro bar 'gyur ro// de phub ma'i me la bsregs na bde legs su 'gyur ro// de nas nor nor ma yi
109a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya bar 'dod na ras bal gyi me la ng+ga du ri'i 'bras bu dang bcas par mtshan mo yi ge bcu pa'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na shin tu chud zos par 'gyur ro/ / a ru ra bsregs na slar rdzas
109a3(rgyud 'bum): de nyid du 'gyur ro/ / rje btsun gyi mdun du sha chen chang dang bcas pa zla ba drug tu mtshan mo sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// ba lang gi sha dang khrag tu bcas
109a4(rgyud 'bum): par gang gi mang dang bcas par sbyin sreg stong byas na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bran du gnas par the tshom med do/ / khyi sha rdo rje chu dang bcas par skyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis mtshan mo gang gi ming dang
109a5(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bdag nyid kyis nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rta'i sha rnam par snang mdzad dang bcas pa gshin rje gshed kyi sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad
109a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas gcig tu gnas la/ mtshan mo rgyal po la dmigs nas byas na zhag bdun gyis 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// glang po'i sha khu ba dang bcas pas me'i 'jig rten kun la dmigs
109a7(rgyud 'bum): la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis mtshan mo sbyin sreg stong byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ / wa dang / ga dang / chang dang bcas pas 'jigs pa med par yi pa bcu pa'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg
109b1(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de nas bskrad par 'dod na bya rog gi sha ma 'dres par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg stong byas na
109b2(rgyud 'bum): nyim bdun gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu'ang rab tu 'bros na/ phra mo'i maM lta tsaM smos/ de nas bya rog gi tshang dang 'bras kyi phub ma dang lhan cig tu d+ha d+hu ra'i shing la me rab tu sbar nas/ yi ge bcu pa'i
109b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags gang gi ming dang bcas par nam byed na sbyin sreg byas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro// de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod na seng ldeng gi me la til dang / 'bras dang / bud med kyi me to
109b4(rgyud 'bum): dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i chu dang bsres te/ rnal 'byor gyi gzugs dmar po dmigs nas kha nub tu bltas te/ yi ge bcu pa gang gi ming dang bcas par sngags pas bsregs na/ nyi ma bdun gyis
109b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'dus te de ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du mi 'bral lo/ / de nas 'gugs par 'dod na bdud rtsi mar dang bcas par seng ldeng gi me la gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na de skad
109b6(rgyud 'bum): cig gis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'di rnams ni sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags pas bya'o// gzhan pas byas na sngags pa 'jig rten pas dpyas par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bye brag mi bya ste/
109b7(rgyud 'bum): gang la'ang bye brag sbyin par mi bya'o// bye brag phye na sngags pas dngos grub mi 'grub bo// ngas rgyud gzhan las kyang bshad de/ ji ltar bye brag ma skyes pa/ de bzhin bya ba'i bye brag smras/
110a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpas kyang mi 'grub// gang gi mdun du'ang sngags pa yis// de phyir las rnams mthong mi bya// gzhan dang lhan cig tu mi bya// gal te sngags pas
110a2(rgyud 'bum): las bya 'dod/ / de dag gcig pu zhig gis bya// sngags pa de yis las kun byed// 'di ni 'jam dpal 'jam pa'i mchog/ rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las/ sbyin sreg gi
110a3(rgyud 'bum): las kyi cho ga rgya che ba'i rtog pa ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas bsam gtan gyi las kyi cho ga ji lta bu yang dag par gsungs te/ bsam gtan dang sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba
110a4(rgyud 'bum): las dgos pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed de/ de'i cho ga'i dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngon du sbyang ba byas pas las thams cad bya'o// re pha
110a5(rgyud 'bum): las yongs su gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar 'bar bar rnam par bsams la/ de'i steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa/ bred par gyur pa bdag gi mdun du rnam par
110a6(rgyud 'bum): bsam mo/ / de nas rang gi lus las khro bo'i gzugs mang po rnam par spros te/ khro bo de rnams kyis ral gris btab cing khrag 'thung bar bsam par bya'o// bsgrub bya de'i sha za ba dang
110a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ma drangs par bsam par bya'o/ / 'di skad smra bar bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa byed pa dang bla ma la skur pa 'debs pa la rgyob cig rgyob cig/ sod cig sod cog/ bsams
110b1(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang zhag bdun gyis 'chi na/ phra mo srog chags gzhan lta ci smos/ de nas gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ba ni ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba gsang ba
110b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas te las thams cad bsgrub par bya'o/ / me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya du bar bsams la/ de'i mdun du srin po mang po bsam par bya ste/ srin po de dag tha dad pa'i lus
110b3(rgyud 'bum): can ma rungs pa/ shin tu gtum par sha za ba dang khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam por bya'o// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya rnams te/ bya rgod dang bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang /
110b4(rgyud 'bum): wa rnams dang / khyi rnams kyis sha za ba dang khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas the tshom med par 'chi'o// dpag tshad brgyan gnas pa'i skyes
110b5(rgyud 'bum): bu'ang sems kyis gzung bas bsam gtan brtsam mo/ / sngags pas bsam gtan brtan par bya'o// de nas 'bral bar 'dod na ma he'i snying khar bsgrub bya bsam par bya ste/ bsgrub
110b6(rgyud 'bum): bya gzhan rta'i snying khar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ / rta dang ma he gnyis phan tshun 'thab par byed par bsam ste/ ji srid du rta dang ma he gnyis phye bar ma gyur kyi bar du'o// phyi nas bsgrub
110b7(rgyud 'bum): bya de gnyis rab tu mi mdza' bar bsam par bya ste/ bsams pa tsam gyis nyi ma mdun gyis nges par 'thab par 'gyur te gzhan du ma yin no// de nas bskrad par 'dod na de du yaM las
111a1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gyur pa'i rnga mo bsam par bya ste/ yang de'i rgyab tu yi ge rnam pa las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i steng du
111a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa bred par gyur par bsam par bya ste/ ma he'i gdong can gyi sbyor ba la gnas pas de'i rgyab tu gshin rje'i gzugs lag pa g.yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa
111a3(rgyud 'bum): sgra gsil ba rnam par bsam par bya ste/ rnga mo de kha lhor bltas la gtang ngo // de'i ming dang bcas par gshin rje'i sngags brjod pas rnam par bsam par bya'o// rnal 'byor
111a4(rgyud 'bum): pas 'di bsams pa tsam gyis zhag bdun na 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang skrod par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba ni bya rog gam bya rgod kyi rgyab tu bsgrub bya skra
111a5(rgyud 'bum): grol ba gcer bu rnam par bsam mo/ / de'i rgyab tu gshin rje rnam par bsam par bya ste/ lag pa tho ba thogs pa bsgrub bya'i skra bzung ba de ma he'i gdod can gyis bka' bsgo ste/
111a6(rgyud 'bum): kha lhor bltas nas song bar bsam par bya ste/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor bas bsam par byas na/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba des zhag bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro// de nas 'gugs par byed par
111a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na yi ge yaM las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du gshin rje'i gzugs lcags kyu dang zhags pa lag tu thogs pa rnam
111b1(rgyud 'bum): par bsam ma/ / ma he'i gdong pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas de la bka' bsgo/ gshin rje song la yul che ge mo myur bar khug cig/ de skad bskul bas yaM gi rnam par bskyod de song bar
111b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam par bya'o/ / bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngags pas khams gsum du gtogs pa'i bud med bkug la rol bar bya'o// ji ltar bsam gtan brtan par gyur na
111b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas de dag bya'i/ gzhan gyis mi bya'o// de nas sbrul gyis zin pa bslang ba'i rab tu byed pa gsungs te/ rang gi snying khar pad+ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam mo
111b4(rgyud 'bum): de'i steng du dbyangs yig gsum pa 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam mo/ / de yis ni 'og gi klu'i gzugs rnam par bsam par bya ste/ de'i spyi bor yi ge i kha dog dkar po las bdud rtsi 'dzag
111b5(rgyud 'bum): pa bsam par bya'o/ / klu de'i mi ga rnams nas bdud rtsi 'phros nas bsgrub bya de'i lus la thim par bsam par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i sbyor bas khams gsum yongs su gang ba'i dug kyang
111b6(rgyud 'bum): med par 'gyur ro/ / dug khur stong yang za nus so// de nas zhu ba'i bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ste/ bsgrub bya mdun du bsam ste/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la yi ge yaM las gyur pa'i rlung
111b7(rgyud 'bum): bi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ de'i steng du gsang ba'i gnas su me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar por gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o// de'i steng du snying khar sa'i dkyil
112a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor khru bzhi pa mdog ser po laM gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o/ / de'i steng du dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam par bya'o// de'i dbus
112a2(rgyud 'bum): su yi ge baM mgo 'thur du gnas pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsam ste/ 'di ni legs par rnam par bsam nas rlung gis me rab tu sbar te/ me des dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsregs par rnam
112a3(rgyud 'bum): par bsam/ dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi drod kyis bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor de bzhu bar bsam par bya'o// 'di yi sbyor ba tsam gyis ni// de yi bud med zhu 'gyur te// 'o ma yi ni shing bzhin du//
112a4(rgyud 'bum): zhu bar byed par the tshom med// de nas rgyal po 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ sngags pa ma he'i gdong can gyi rnal 'byor la rab tu gnas la/ de nyid mdog dmar por bsams
112a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ / bsgrub bya gang du gnas pa de'i steng du gnas la/ phyi nas rang gi lus 'jam dpal mdog dmar po phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa can phyung ste/ 'jam dpal des bsgrub bya'i snying khar dang
112a6(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa bcings nas bkug par bsam ste/ 'jam dpal gyi sku la rab tu gzhug go// bsgrub bya de myos par bsam par bya ste/ de'i snying khar yi ge bcu pa'i sngags rnam par bsam par
112a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / yang kha dog dmar po sgrub pa po sa ye shes kyi gzugs kyis yi ge la gzhug par bya'o// de dang bsgrub bya gcig tu gyur par bya'o// bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas nyi ma bdun gyis
112b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du the tshom med do// rab tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sngags pas mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan gyis bya'o// rgyud gang la'ang mi sbyin no//
112b2(rgyud 'bum): gal te sngags kyang mi bstan/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi bsam gtan gang la'ang mi sbyin/ smra bar yang mi bya/ sngags kyi dbye ba'ang mi bya/ bris sku'ang gang gi
112b3(rgyud 'bum): mdun du'ang mi dgram ste/ thang kha'ang gsang bar gzhag go// rgyud 'di rab tu sbyor ba dang / bzlas pa dang / smra ba gzhan su la'ang 'ga' tsam yang mi smra/ gal te smras na dpal rdo rje 'jigs
112b4(rgyud 'bum): byed dang / gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis za'o// dam tshig nyams par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sngags pas su la'ang mi sbyin no// de nas dam tshig mnyam par
112b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / dam pa'i brtul zhugs can dpa' bo bla ma la gus pa dul ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la nges par 'dzin pa/ rgyud sbas pa/ mi khro ba
112b6(rgyud 'bum): snying rje dang ldan pa/ bzlas pa dang bsam gtan la phyogs pa/ rnam par smin pa la 'dzem pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can ni slob ma bzang po ste/ dkyil 'khor dam pa dpal rdo rje
112b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed chen po la mchog tu gus pa/ snying rje chen pos yid brlan pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ mchog tu bla ma la gus pa rab tu rtag pa la shin tu rnam par bsams te/ thams de lta
113a1(rgyud 'bum): bu'i slob ma la dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rgyud sbyin no/ / sngags pas gzhan la byin na de dang slob mar bcas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar the tshom med do// 'jig rten
113a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni 'jig pa chen por 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten pha rol tu ni dmyal bar 'gro'o// dam tshig kyang nyams par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'jam dpal 'jam pa'i mchog dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen
113a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las/ bsam gtan gyi las bsgrub pa'i rtog pa ste bdun pa'o// / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud 'bum pa nas btus
113a4(rgyud 'bum): nas phyung ba rtog pa'i phyogs bklags pas 'grub pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyis dngos grub 'grub pa'i rtog pa rdzogs so// / dpal
113a5(rgyud 'bum): o M r+yan gyi gnas chen po nas dpal 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po zhes bya ba bla ma dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon
113a6(rgyud 'bum): dpal lA li ta badz+ra sa bton nas mdzapa rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa b+ha ro phyag rdum gyi zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong
113a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur @bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ / don dam chos sku zhi ba nyid// gang
113b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir khams gsum rnam rgyal te/ / gshin rje dgra zhes grags pa yi// 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga bshad// yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// cho ga bzhin du mnyes par bya//
113b2(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod dben pa la sogs par// dkyil 'khor khru do tshad du bya// dri dang ba yi rnam lnga dang // nyi zla sogs pa byi dor bya// ba glang la sogs dam rdzas lnga// gzhan yang tshogs kyi
113b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo dang / / phyi nang phyed pa'i bye brag gis// legs par mchod pa byas nas ni// 'khor lo bri dang btu ba dang // drang ba dang ni spo ba brtsams// sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa
113b4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te// dam tshig rjes su dran pa yis// oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ gsang sngags 'di ni rjes dran byed// 'khor lo bri ba brtsam par bya//
113b5(rgyud 'bum): dbus nas sor tshad bcu drug par// kun nas zlum pos bskor na ni// 'di ni nang gi dkyil 'khor te// rim pa gsum du bskor ba la// sgo med lcags mkhar bcu drug bya
113b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni gshin rje'i grong khyer te/ / srid pa gsum gyi 'jugs sa yin// de yi phyi rim mu khyud gsum// kun tu lcags ris bskor ba ste// mu khyud de dag re re yang // khang pa
113b7(rgyud 'bum): sum cu gnyis dang ldan/ / 'gro ba'i chos bzhin gsod pa yi// 'khor lo 'di ltar bris nas ni// phyi rol mu khyud mtha' ma la// yi ge ka sogs da yig mthar// nganya
114a1(rgyud 'bum): bsal nas dgod par bya/ / yi ge d+ha sogs kA yig mthar// de yi rjes su bri bar bya// mu khyud dbus ma dag la ni// dbyangs yig bcu gnyis
114a2(rgyud 'bum): nyis 'gyur dgod/ / btu dang dgod sogs rtsom pa na// mtshan ma 'di dag shes par bya// zla ba mig dang yon tan dang // rig byed mda' dang dbang po dang // rgya mtsho bkra shis
114a3(rgyud 'bum): gza' dang phyogs/ / dregs pa nyi ma yan lag sogs// tshes zhes bya bar rab tu grags// phyi rol mu khyud mtha' ma la// shar gyi tshangs thig nas brtsams nas// rim min
114a4(rgyud 'bum): gza' can khang pa nas/ / yi ge bkra shis tsam blangs te// nang gi ngos kyi mu khyud kyi// tshangs thig gi ni ngos dag la// phyogs bzhir dmig gi tshad du sbyin// rim min phyogs can
114a5(rgyud 'bum): khang pa nas/ / yi ge dmig gi tshad blangs te// shar du de'i g.yas g.yon gzhag/ rim min bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig gnyis pa can blangs nas// mig gi tshad du byas
114a6(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / de yi ngos la re re gzhag/ nub kyi tshangs thig nas bgrangs pa'i// rgya mtsho can gyi khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa ldan pa// dmig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// lho yi
114a7(rgyud 'bum): ngos su de bzhin sbyin/ / nub nas rim pa min pa'o// zla ba can gyi khyim nas ni// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ldan pa// mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// lho ngos de rjes sbyin par bya//
114b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid dbyangs yig gsal ba ni// mig gi tshad du blangs nas kyang // sngon sbyin nub kyi ngos su sbyin// nub nas bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa ldan pa// mig gi tshad
114b2(rgyud 'bum): du blangs nas ni/ / nub kyi ngos su de bzhin sbyin// byang nas bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa ldan pa// dmig gi tshad du blangs nas ni// byang gi ngos la de bzhin sbyin//
114b3(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi sa bon zhes bya ba// mig gi tshad blangs de bzhin sbyin// mda' can khang pa na gnas pa'i// 'od kyi gong bur byas pa dang // de nyid nas ni bgrangs pa yi// gza' can khang pa la
114b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ / dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa dag/ zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// byang shar mtshams su re re sbyin// rgya mtsho'i khang pa la gnas pa// dbyangs yig gnyis pa ldan pa dag
114b5(rgyud 'bum): rim min yon tan khang pa nas/ / zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// shar lho mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// rim min bkra shis khang pa nas// dbyangs yig lnga pa ldan pa dag/ yan lag can gyi khang
114b6(rgyud 'bum): pa nas/ / za ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// lho nub mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// rim min tshes can khang pa nas// dbyangs yig gsum pa ldan pa dang // rim min bkra shis khang pa nas//
114b7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni// byang shar mtshams su de bzhin sbyin// de ltar dgod par byas nas ni// de nas drang ba brtsam par bya// dam tshig rjes su dran byed cing // rdo rje shugs dang ldan pa yi//
115a1(rgyud 'bum): shar gyi tshangs thig ngos gnyis nas// yi ge zung ldan drangs nas ni// dbus kyi khang par gzhab par bya// phyogs gzhan tshangs thig ngos dag na// de bzhin zung ldan
115a2(rgyud 'bum): drangs nas ni/ / de bzhin dbus kyi khang par gzhag/ de na shar gyi yi ge yang / rim pa gnyis pa'i khang par drangs// phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no// shar gyi zung ldan gsum pa yang //
115a3(rgyud 'bum): rim pa gsum pa'i khang par drang // phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no// mtshams kyi yi ge ya bral 'dis// rang rang gi ni mtshams su drang // de dag phyung ba'i khong stong du// dbyangs kyi yi ge
115a4(rgyud 'bum): drang bar bya/ / dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi la ni// ming gi yi ge drang bar bya// so so'i las dang mthun pa yi// bskul ba'i yi ge dgod par bya// gsad dang bskad dang dbye ba la// yi ge phaT ni
115a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / mnan pa la yang yi ge laM// zhi ba la ni yi ge au// rgyas pa de bzhin yi ge swa// dbang la bo gyis brgyan pa ste// 'gug pa la ni yi ge dza// de la las kyi 'od zer ni//
115a6(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba chu ste rgyas pa sa// dbang ni rlung ste drag po me// dbye dgug bskrad pa dbang dang mthun// mnan pa dag ni rgyas pa bzhin// drang ba'i sbyor ba byas nas ni// bsre ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya//
115a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med sngags dang ldan pa yis// dbus kyi bkra shis yi ge yang // zla ltar 'od kyi gong bur bya// sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang // 'od kyi gong du de nang du/ 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya gzhag
115b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de dkyil rang ming dang por gzhag/ phyogs kyi khyim na gnas pa yi// yi ge zung ma thams cad dang // de tshe 'od kyi gong bur blta// sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang // bcu gnyis khyim
115b2(rgyud 'bum): du spel te zi/ / byin rlob hUM zhes bya ba yang // khang pa re la zur res kye// yongs su dag pa dgod byas nas// mchod dang gtor ma byas nas ni// spo ba dag ni brtsam par bya// las kyi
115b3(rgyud 'bum): dbye ba ji lta bar/ / 'khor lo las ni blang bya ste// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa la// shin tu rgyas pa'i ras la bya// dbang dang dgug la smad 'tshong sogs// gsad dang dbye ba bskrad pa dang //
115b4(rgyud 'bum): mnan pa la ni dur khrod ras// gi'u wang gur kum zhi ba rgyas// dbang dang dgug la tsan dan dmar// mnan pa la ni ldong ros sogs// bskrad la bya rog khrag gis te// dbye ba rta dang ma
115b5(rgyud 'bum): do'i sogs/ / gsad la dug la sogs pas bri// dge ba'i las la bzang po'i shing // dge min la ni rus pa dang // lcags la sogs pas bri bar bya// zhi ba shar blta dbang la nub/
115b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas la byang ste drag po lho// gzhan ni ci rigs sbyar bar bya// zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa la// sa bskor rim bzhin dgod par bya// gnam bskor dag ni rim par bzlog/ gsad bskrad
115b7(rgyud 'bum): dbye ba mnan pa la/ / sa bskor rim las bzlog pa ste// gnam bskor dag ni rim bzhin bri// de ltar legs par ma bris na// 'khor lo rang la ldog par 'gyur// de bas nan tan bskyed
116a1(rgyud 'bum): de bya/ / ras kyi 'khor lo legs zin nas// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor te// ras kyi 'khor lor spyan drangs te// rdo rje bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yin// dkyil
116a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'khor lo btu bar bya/ / ras kyi 'khor lo mchod nas ni// bden pa'i byin rlabs dmigs par bya// ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin// 'khor lo spo ba byas nas ni// gsang sngags
116a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ / oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM badz+ra be ga/ rdo rje shugs kyi sngags so// oM badz+ra a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ yi ge bsre ba'i
116a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ / oM badz+ra sa mA dza/ 'khor lo spo ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma rA dzA sa do ma ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya phaT phaT/
116a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rtsa ba'i sngags te/ las thams cad pa'o// shAn+ti ku ru swA hA/ zhi par skul ba'o// puSh+TiM ku ru sA hA/ rgyas pa'i'o// ba shaM ku ru sA hA/ dbang gi'o// mA ra ya phaT/ gsad
116a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i'o/ / ut+k+r-i Ta ya swAhA/ bskrad pa'i'o// staM b+ha ya hU laM/ mnan pa'i 'o// A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHdzAH/ dgug pa'i 'o// oM mu/ slar dgrol ba'i sngags so// A li kA l-i grong
116a7(rgyud 'bum): khyer ni/ / gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ste// las kyi btson ra dag kyang yin// yi ge btu ba med na ni// gsang sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur// yi ge tshang bar ma bkod na// gsang
116b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags sgra ni log par 'gyur/ / gsang sngags brda yis ma brjod na// sngags ni dngos grub med par 'gyur// drang ba dag ni ma byas na// shin tu 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro// yi ge bsre ba
116b2(rgyud 'bum): ma byas na/ / bcu drug khang pa don med 'gyur// bskor phyogs log na don mi 'grub// rig sngags nyams dang log pa ni// lha min g.yul las pham pa dang // dbang po dgra yis bsad
116b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / 'khor lo spro ba ma byas na// cho ga dag ni nyams par 'gyur// rgyu yin pa dang sbyor ba dang // dad pa brtan pas 'grub par 'gyur// de bas nan tan bskyed de bya// dpa'
116b4(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed kyi 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga'o/ / rdzogs so// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// las kyi 'grogs kyis byed pa ste// zhi ba'i las ni bla ba
116b5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / rgyas pa de bzhin mig tu bsgrags// dbye ba yon tan zhes bya ste// dbang du bya ba rig byed yin// dgug pa'i las la de bzhin mnga'// bskrad dang mnan pa dbang po
116b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / mnan pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa yis// gsad pa'i las ni rgya mtshor 'dod// las rnams de dag re re yang // 'phags tshogs mchod sbyin dang po ste// nyi ma gnyis
116b7(rgyud 'bum): pa gtor ma sbyin/ / gsum pa bzlas pa rnam par 'bad// bzhi pa sbyin sreg tshang bar bya// lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor// drug pa bsam gtan rtse gcig bya// bdun pa
117a1(rgyud 'bum): las kyi lhag chad bskang / / grangs kyi las la khyad par du// las kyi gtsor ni gang sgrub de'i// 'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi// las kyi bye brag 'di shes/
117a2(rgyud 'bum): na// zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob// rgyas pa yon tan drug dang 'byor// dbang gi mos pa rnam bzhir bsgyur// dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed// mnan pas dbang po
117a3(rgyud 'bum): drug 'ching byed/ / gzhan yang ji lta de bzhin du// sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la// dpyad na dngos grub mi 'grub ste// gal te yid gnyis za gyur tam// bsam pa 'gyur ram dad
117a4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyams/ / de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang // phyir bzlog 'gyur bar gdon mi za// dad pa brtan par bsgrubs pas na// nam mkha' med par gyur na yang // sngags kyi dngos grub
117a5(rgyud 'bum): med mi srid/ / lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i// rig sngags bslu ba mi srid na// 'dod chags bral bas bshad pa yi// gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni// ma byung
117a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// don la the tshom med pa yi// mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye// rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge pa// de la grub pa'i
117a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub ring / / man ngag dam pa bstan byas kyang // slob ma yid gnyis za gyur na// de la dngos grub ring bar bshad// bla mas mnag sbas byas kyang // slob ma yid gnyis
117b1(rgyud 'bum): mi za zhing / / bla ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes// gces spras byas na 'grub par nges// de yi phyir na sngags pa yis// rang gi yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir// bla ma mnyes par bya ba
117b2(rgyud 'bum): gces/ / bsnyen bkur byas pas nus mthu che// gsang ste brjod pas bar chad med// yon tan phul ba byas pas ni// rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur// rin chen gnyis la
117b3(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'byung / / dkon par gyur na bsngags pa brjod// bsngags na yon tan 'byung 'gyur te// bsngags pa dag ni ma byas na// ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu yang // gang gis bsngags
117b4(rgyud 'bum): pa ma byas na/ / de la 'dod don mi ster ro// dad pa sangs rgyas dad pa chos/ dad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma// dad pa bla ma dad pa pa/ dad pa lam chen dang pa gru// dad pa yid bzhin
117b5(rgyud 'bum): nor bu ste/ / dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid// dad pa bsod nams nor yin te// de yi phyir na sngags pa yis// rang sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir// gzhan la gus pa mchog
117b6(rgyud 'bum): tu bkur/ / rdzogs so// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sngags pas rtag tu brten pa ni// ru sngal 'o ma zhes bya ba// de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang // 'jim
117b7(rgyud 'bum): pa skam po nyid dang ni/ / de bzhin me yi khu ba dang // sgra snang gi ni rdzas dag dang // 'di rnams rtag tu dpyad na ni// rang bzhin gyis ni nad med cing // tshe ring dbang po rgyas pa dang //
118a1(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu lang tsho dar la bab// lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob// 'di la dpyad par mi bya ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis grub// ting 'dzin sngags kyis byin brlabs
118a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / las kyi rnam smin sbyong bar byed// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas// de phyir cho ga bzhin du bsten// tshes gcig skya rengs shar ba ni// snod la ma reg ru sbal zho// drod ma yal bar
118a3(rgyud 'bum): btung ba 'am/ / yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // mar gyi ngo bo'i tshes gcig la// 'od kyi lo ma btsal nas ni// de nyid nas ni gzung bar bya// zhag gsum chu yis char pa btang // lo ma
118a4(rgyud 'bum): de bcad bza' bar bya/ / yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // 'jim pa skam po sbyar nas ni// zhag gsum chu yi nang du spang // de blangs nas ni yang bskams nas// phye ma byi la'i spar tshad
118a5(rgyud 'bum): rero/ ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas// sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya/ mi yi sdong po ser po ni// sa yi mar gyis gril nas ni// kha sbyar sbyor dang ldan byas na/ me chu sa yis btsir nas ni//
118a6(rgyud 'bum): btung ba'am nyi ma'i sbu gus btung // lan tshwa bral ba dag la ni// zhag gsum 'chi ba'i sgra brnyan rdzas// nam gyi dus la sngags pas blang // cha gsum snod du zhag gsum gzhag/ kha yi
118a7(rgyud 'bum): tshan blugs pa ste/ / dbus ma'i cha ni bdud rtsi nyid// rtsa ba'i tshan dor ba ste// 'di rnams so sor bston pa na// tha mal 'bras bu gsum gyi phye/ byi la'i slar tshad de dang sbyar// ma sbyar
118b1(rgyud 'bum): na yang nyes pa med/ / tshogs par bsten nas bza' bar bya// re re bsnyen yang nyes pa med// dam rdzas rmad du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// / nad med rnams kyi
118b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub grub rtags bshad pa'o/ / / dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// rdo rje rnams las byung ba yi//
118b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis// lho phyogs rgya mtsho par brgal nas// de na gshin rje'i grong khyer ni// ga la ba yi gnas su byon// mi zad zhabs ni bcu drug gis/ lcags mkhar sgo med
118b4(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug brdzis/ / ye shes rtse gcig mtshan ma yis// dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po brdzis// de tshe bdud chen las rgyal nas// ha ha hi hi sgra sgrogs pas// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa//
118b5(rgyud 'bum): gizer bzhin du ni rab smras pa// dpa' bo chen po ga la ci// dpa' bo'i dgongs pa bdag gis bgyi// bdag cag srog gi snying po rnams// tshul bzhin 'bul gyis dpa' bo bzhes// lha ma
118b6(rgyud 'bum): yin sde brgyad kyi srog gi yang snying phul pa ni/ / gshin rjes ya phul ma mos ma// srin pos ra phul gnod sbyin k+She// me yis na phul sa bdag sa// btsan gyis rtsa phul bdud kyis da// de rnam
118b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu zil ba ni/ / bran du yang ni khas blangs so// gtan tshigs chen po de yi phyir// ye shes lha yi dgongs pa dang // bsnyen pa nyams 'og rab chud nas// lha yi bsnyen pa rab chung nas/
119a1(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi thugs dam las mi 'da'// mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya so ni ra ya kA ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya hUM hU phaT/
119a2(rgyud 'bum): phaT// de skad smras pa dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis// chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa// gshin rje'i pho nya la sogs kun// sgrol ba'i gang du byin gyis brlabs// ma dang sring ma bu
119a3(rgyud 'bum): / mo dang // 'khor bcas kun la bka' bsgo ba// lnga brgya dus kyi mtha' ma la// nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe// rnal 'byor rig 'dzin ldan pa la// bka' bsgo'i las rnams tshul bzhin gyis//
119a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes pas dam bcas pas dang / mnan bzhin du mna' bor ro// gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du/ ya mA ri kr-iSh+Na karma
119a5(rgyud 'bum): sarba tsakra sid+d+ha ka ra nA ma tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed dgra nag po'i 'khor lo las thams cad 'grub par byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la
119a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gti muka
119a7(rgyud 'bum): rdorje dang / ser sna rdo rje dang / 'dod chags rdo rje dang / phrag dog rdo rje dang / sa rdo rje dang / chu rdo rje dang / me rdo rje dang / rlung rdo rje dang / byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po ma dang / yon tan
119b1(rgyud 'bum): byi 'phreng ba ma dang / sems can gyi rgyud tshim par byed pa ma dang / btson 'grus kyi ngo bo ma dang / bdug spos ma dang / me tog ma dang / mar me ma dang / dri chab ma dang / de la sogs pa
119b2(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas lha mo be ta li stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar 'di
119b3(rgyud 'bum): na gdug pa can rnams kyis sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa dang / ma 'ongs pa na'ang theg pa chen po pa dang / sems can thams cad la'ang 'tshe bar bgyid pa dag 'byung na de
119b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams ji ltar tshar gcad par gyis/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgom par zhugs te/ nyid kyi skra gsung thugs rdo rje las
119b5(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'byung ngo / / hrI/ de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid zhal drug pa/ phyag drug pa/ zhabs drug pa'i ngo bor gyur nas/ ma he ru gnyis pa la brdzis te/ ma he'i bdag po chung ma bcas
119b6(rgyud 'bum): par/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-ita nan hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes zhal bzhad pa dang bcas pas/ oM gsung zhing mnan par gyur to// lha dang / lha ma yin dang / bdud thams cad kyis skrag cing 'dar
119b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang bcas pas 'dud par gyur to/ / tshangs pa dang dbang po la sogs pa thams cad kyang phyag 'tshal zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan khro bo yi// rgyal po chen po rab 'jigs
120a1(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas/ / gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// de nas sgrub pa bshad bya ba// rtsibs brgyad dbus kyi lte ba la// bdag nyid phyag da
120a2(rgyud 'bum): zhal rnams ni/ / drug drug ldan par gyur pa sgom// zhabs kyang re dang 'dra ba ste// g.yas kyi dang po'i phyag na ni// rdo rje tho ba g.yas gnyis na// ral gri de bzhin g.yon gyi yang /
120a3(rgyud 'bum): / dang por zhags pa sdigs mdzub ldan// gnyis par gtun shing legs par 'dzin// rdo rje drile bu mtha' mas bsnams// steng zhal nag po rab 'jigs pa// zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil
120a4(rgyud 'bum): krung ste/ / brkyang bskum gar gyis zhabs bzhir gnas// stag lpags kyis ni rnam dkris shing // seng ge ser la ral pa ni// gyen 'greng 'dus te spyi bor yang // thod pa'i 'phreng
120a5(rgyud 'bum): bas rnam par bcings/ / 'di ni khro bo tshol pa ste// lag cha sna tshogs dag dang ldan// shar rtsibs la sogs rnam bzhi la// gti mug sogs te bzhi po yang // dkar dang ser dang
120a6(rgyud 'bum): dmar ba yang / / de bzhin bzhi pa ljang khu ste// g.yas kyis 'khor lo rin chen 'bar// pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje ste// g.yon gyis dril bu legs par 'dzin// mtshams su laM sogs
120a7(rgyud 'bum): la skyes pa/ / lha mo bzhi po nges par bsam// bdag po 'dra ste sgeg nyams 'dzin// grA yi lha mo mtshams la ni// lA s+ye mu ti kur ldan no// rin chen 'phreng ba phyag gnyis bsnam//
120b1(rgyud 'bum): pi wang sgrog pa'i gsung dbyangs can// gar gyis rgyas par 'gro ba yi// don la rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan// bdug spos sogs dang bzhi po yang // rang gi mtshan ma nges par 'dzin// phyag
120b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i sngags rnams brjod pas so/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM dza na dzi ka/ de nas bcom ldan

120b5(rgyud 'bum): oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// lo tsa na hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
120b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos chu rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM mA ma kI tAM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos me rdo rje'i sngags
120b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs so/ / paN+Di ra hrI/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rlung rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// tA ra a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
121a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bde ba chen po skyed par byed pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ / lA s+ye/ de nas yang yon tan brgyud pa bla ma'i sngags 'di gsungs so//

121a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis mchod pa'i sngags rnams gsungs pa ni/ oM badz+ra d+hU pa/ oM badz+ra puSh+pa/ oM badz+ra dI pa/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i sngags dang /

121a6(rgyud 'bum): ni gdab pa la/ / tshad ldan 'jur mdud med pa dang / gsher zhing gsar pa mdzes pa yis// shar du bltas te gdab par bya// tshangs thig gnyis pa gdab pa yang // lho ru bltas te gdab par
121a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de 'og mtha' yi thig gdab pa// byin par gnas te dbang ldan blta// rlung gnas bden bral kha bltas te// nub tu legs par bri bar bya// de nas shar du kha bltas te// byang du bris te
121b1(rgyud 'bum): byin zar gnas/ / bden bral min po'i mtha' ma gdab// blta ba bden bral phyogs su'o// slob dpon ldang min grogs po ni// ri dgas zhon pa'i phyogs 'dug ste// mtshams thig dang po gdab par bya//
121b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'ang bden bral phyogs 'dug ste// bgegs phyogs brkyang la gdab par bya// dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba yi// gzhal yas khang pa'i mtshan nyid ni// gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang //
121b3(rgyud 'bum): rta babs bzhi ni brgyan pa yi// dbus kyi rtsibs brgyad lte ba la// rdo rje tho ba bri bar bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du// gri gug kyang ni bri bar bya// shar rtsibs 'khor lo chen po ste/
121b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen lho yi phyogs rtsibs la// pad+ma dmar po nub tu za// byang du rdo rje kun tu rtse// shar lho phyogs su'ang de dang 'dra// grwa bzhir rgyal po'ang nyis brtseg tu// mtshan ma rnams ni legs pa bri
121b5(rgyud 'bum): sgo bzhi dag tu bri ba yang / / lcags kyu zhags pa sgrog dril bu// gzhan yang rgyan kun legs par bri// mchod pa legs par dgram par bya// khu tshur dku gnyis gzhag pa dang // de bzhin dpral
121b6(rgyud 'bum): bar nyug pa dang / / kha nas 'byin dang gar bskyod dang // bdug spos nyug dang me tog 'thor// mthe bong bsgreng ste rang lus la'am// gzhan la nyug tshul gnas pa ni// brgyad po mchod pa'i lha
121b7(rgyud 'bum): mo dag/ bskyed dang legs gnas phyag rgya yin// sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams dang // rang lus bcug ste gnas pa la// sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra
122a1(rgyud 'bum): swa b+hA ba At+ma korga/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko rahA/ oM sarba ta thAg tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ mig sogs byin gyis brlab pa la// gti mug
122a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sogs kyis gsungs/ / dbang sbubs stong pa nyid byas te// snying po 'am ming gi yi ge yis// rigs kyis phyag mtshan bsnams pa yi// sku rnams nges par bskyed pas so// de nas
122a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdag bdud rtsi myang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te sngags 'di gsungs so/ / oM AHhUM/ dag cing 'bar
122a4(rgyud 'bum): ba rnam brtags te/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas// zhe sdang rdo rje'i bdag po ste// zla ba'i dbus su gti mug bsam// rin chen dbus su bsam pa yang // ser sna nyid du bsam
122a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / pad+ma'i dbus su 'dod chags bsam// sna tshogs dbus su phrag dog bsam// bsam bya ljags la sa bon te// 'phros pas bkug ste tshim par bya// shar ni dkar po chen po
122a6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / lho ni ser po nyid du'o// nub ni dmar por nges par shes// byangan ljang khur yang dag ldan// de las de bzhin re ba'i rim// dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i tshe na yang // byams dang snying rje
122a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' btang snyoms/ / tshad med pa yi rim pa yis// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rnams// yod min med min gnyis ka min// gnyis ka
122b1(rgyud 'bum): min pa'ang ma yin te/ / spos bral jo bo med par sgom// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko u0f856/ raM las nyi ma rnam bsgoms te// de dbus las kyi rdo rje ni// kun tu rtse lnga'i rang bzhin te/
122b2(rgyud 'bum): de dbus hUM las rdo rje ni// kun tu phra mos bgegs bcom ste// ra ba gur dang sa gzhi yang // de yi 'og tu nges par sgom// gru gsum gyen bsgreng dkar po ni// shin tu gsal bar bdag gis

123a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i/ / rmi lam mtshan ma 'di yin te// tshal chen zug pa'i gling dag dang // lha khang mchod rten gzhal yas su// dam pa rnams dang nges phrad de/

126b2(rgyud 'bum): skye bos 'tshe ba can/ / grang ba'i reg pas lus la rgyas// mtshon gyis btab pa byas pa la// gcan gzan sogs za mdun du bsam// gang du'ang de ltar yang yang brjod// lcags kyi khyud
126b3(rgyud 'bum): mes yan lag bsdams/ / tsher mas dbug pa byas pa ste// lus ni pags pa med par bsam// ske tshe lan tshwas lus byugs te// u chu ba yi sgra byin bsam// de yi mgon skyabs bsal
