126b7(rgyud 'bum): phrag bcu ni tshang bar bzlas/ / nim pa'i shing bsros de nang swa// de nang 'gras pa nyid dang ni// dpag tshad brgyas chos 'bab par 'gyur// a mu ki dang a mu ki/ bi dwe Sha ya phaT/ rims
127a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis thebs par bya ba la/ / dur khrod ko ba che ba la// arga shing gi lo ma dang // tsi tra ka dang ske tshe dang // khrag gis 'khor lo bri bar bya// bis brkos la ri mo dag/ sed/
127a2(rgyud 'bum): ldeng mdag me du med la// bsro zhing khros pas lnga brgya bzla// khyim dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang // dur khrod sbas na rims kyis 'dzin// rgyas pa'i las kyis rgyas 'dod na// gi'u wang gis ni gro ga la/
127a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo gnyis ni rnam bris te// bskul tshigs ldan par yi ge bri// zla drug thad kyi mdun dag tu// gnod sbyin dang ni gnod sbyin mos// rin chen char ni 'bebs pa dang // gshin dgra ser po zla ser la//
127a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas par bsams te khri bzlas na// 'phags pa nor 'dzin 'dra bar 'gyur// oM che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru oM/ gro ga sogs kyi shog shog la// gi'u wang dang ni rang byung gi/ me tog dag gis bri ba ste// yang
127a5(rgyud 'bum): na tha dag khrag dang ni/ / bil ba'i lo ma'i khu ba dang // ras dmar po yi khu ba dang // rtsi rnams bsres la bri bar bya// spra tshil gyis ni 'khor lo kril// bum pa mar sbrang ldan par gzhag/ dus bzhi dag tu
127a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa ni/ / me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o// de tshe bzlas pa tshul dag ni// ho ba shaM ku ru ho// de ma thag tu lha rnams kyang // dbang du byed par des 'gyur ro// gro ga dag la bri ba ni// zla ba gzas zin dus
127a7(rgyud 'bum): dag gam/ / rgyal gyi nyin par zi bya ste// skud pa dmar pos 'khor lo dkri// me tog dmar pos mchod pa bya// thod pa kha sbyar nang gzhag ste// bzlas pa khris ni brgya byin gyi// bu mo rang rnyed par nges 'gyur
127b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / dur khrod kyi ni ras dag la// gur kum sogs kyis 'khor lo bri// yi ge thig les rnam bskor te// a mu ki dang mA ma kI// mo ha na dang rnam spel la// bsgrub bya'i gos kyi mtha' ma la// legs btabs
127b2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings nyid du/ / bsgoms nas zlos shing 'gro na yang // lha dang lha min gyis mi mthong // bdag nyid gshin dgra ny-id bsgoms nas// chu yi steng nas 'gro 'dod na// rdul phran lha yi rnam par te//
127b3(rgyud 'bum): oM r+yan du ni bdag rang nyid// nges par steng 'gro gzhan dag kyang // bu mos nags kyi ras bal la// skud pa bkal ba gzhon nu mas// sum sgril du yang de yis bya// gdug sngags stong du tshang bar te//
127b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas tshul sngon du gsungs pa bzhin// skar ma rgyal gyi dus la bzla// bri ba'i nyin mo'ang de la'o// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lhar brtag pa// g.yon gyis mdun byas gzhan la gdags// ma lus mtshon dag rengs
127b5(rgyud 'bum): byed de/ / gcer bu la yang rengs par byed// me tog las ni gzhan du min// sha lnga sogs kyi ril bu ni// legs par grib ma dgal bskams// lcags gsum dag gas dkri bar bya// bzlas shing mchod
127b6(rgyud 'bum): pa byed pa'i tshe/ / dngul dag gi ni rengs bzhin bya// 'bar bar gyur pa nyid na yang // mchod pa legs par rnam byas te// bskor ba brgya phrag du ma bya// de nas blo ldan sgrub pa pos// khar bcug tsam
127b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'dod pa sgrub/ / phyung na sngon ltar rnal ma nyid// gso ba 'dra ba sa 'o mas kyang // nges par 'khrul 'khor bkru bar bya// rig sngags 'khrul 'khor las grol te// rnal ma nyid la gnas pa yin//
128a1(rgyud 'bum): snum ster dag gi sa bon la// nya lcibs dang ni byi tang ka/ khu bas yang de byugs pa la// thod pa sas ni rnam bkang bar// sbas te bzlas pa grangs med bya// de tshe mchod
128a2(rgyud 'bum): dang gtor ma dag/ yongs rgyas 'bras bu rnams blangs te// khar bcug mkha' 'gro byas 'gyur ro// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// zhus dang 'das byung gdug pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa'i ting
128a3(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin/ / dkyil 'khor rnam par spros pa dang // thig gis gzhal yas mtshan pa dang // rdul tshon phyogs las rnam par brtags// yang dag byin gyis brlabs pa dang // bdud rtsi myang bar
128a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sgom pa dang // sngags kyi dngos med de bzhin mtshams// chos 'byung dang ni sgrub po dang // bzlas dang de yi grangs tshad dang // 'khor lo dang ni yi ge
128a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis/ / nges par zhus dang mchod pa dang // 'khor lo 'dri ba'i mtshan ma dang // 'byung ba bzhi dang bsdu sogs dang // sdom pa 'khor lo'i yi ge bri// gzhi dang de bzhin snag tsha dang // so so
128a6(rgyud 'bum): las kyi bye brag de/ / bsdus te nga yis bstan pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po rnams la gtor mas tshim par bya ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// sku dang /
128a7(rgyud 'bum): / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las sngags 'di phyung ngo // oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT sA hA/ 'byung po rnams dang rnam sbal te// tha mar sbyar ba byas pa ni// hi hi hiM hUM pheM pheM po swA hA/
128b1(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam bzhugs pa'i// zhe sdang gshin gshed rdo rje ni// spros med nam mkha' lta bu las// snying rje thabs kyis sku sprul pa// ye shes khro rgyal rab 'jigs pa'i// dud kha mun
128b2(rgyud 'bum): chen sku la 'dud/ / gar dgu nyams dang ldan pa yi// gti mug rdo rje gshin rje gshed// skye med don dam ngang nyid las// thabs kyis sprul pa'i skur bstan pa// 'jigs byed drag po'i cha lugs
128b3(rgyud 'bum): can/ / zla ba nya 'dra khyod la 'dud// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi// ser sna gshin rje rdo rje ni// 'dzin pa po las grol ba yis// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bor sprul// gter 'chang ser sna grol
128b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa/ / bcom gser 'dra khyod la 'dud// chags pas ma lus dbang mdzad pa'i// 'dod chags gshin rje rdo rje ni// skye med rnam dag chos dbyings la// khams gsum pa dag khro bar
128b5(rgyud 'bum): sprul/ / ma chags spyan ldan thugs rje can// ban du lta bu'i sku la 'dud// shes rab thabs ldan he ru ka/ phrag dog gshin rje rdo rje ni// rnam rtog dpe dang bral ba las// thugs rje sprul pa'i khro
128b6(rgyud 'bum): bor ni/ / 'gro don brtson pa'i ral gri can// sna tshogs mdog can khyod la 'dud// thams cad bskyed pa'i lha mo che// dbang po lta bur bsgyur mdzad pa// khams gsum gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan//
128b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam snang can gyis bdud bzhi 'jigs// bde ba chen pos rtag tu dgyes// ye shes spyan can khyod la 'dud// kun sdud lha mo rin po che// rnam rtog skyon las rnam grol yang // dus gsum bde
129a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs bdag gir byed/ / rin chen tog can mdzes pa'i sku// don dam thugs chud 'khor ba sel// ma lus kun gyi bdag la 'dud// 'dus byas ma lus sreg byed pa//
129a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam rtog zhi ba'i rang bzhin las// khams gsum ma lus sgrol bar byed// 'od dpag med kyis rab mdzes pa// ma chags phyag na bsnams pa yi// 'phrin las dag byed can la 'dud// thugs
129a3(rgyud 'bum): rjes g.yo ba'i rang bzhin can/ / 'jig rten gsum dag sgrol bar byed// gnyis med bde chen ngang nyid las// 'phrin las grub pa'i rang bzhin can// btang snyoms zhugs par 'gro ba 'dul//
129a4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu las kyis rgyal la 'dud// ces gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa la so sor yongs su bstod do// de nas yang thams cad kyi bdag pos legs so zhes bya ba byin te lha mo rnams kyi sku la
129a5(rgyud 'bum): btsud de/ gdug pa 'jigs pa'i ye ge ni// bcu bzhi pa la dmigs pa yang // 'khor bar dmigs par bya ba'am// nyi ma'i steng na skyes pa ltar// dmigs te ma yengs brjed pa med//
129a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa nyid ni de ltar bya// bye ba tshang bar bzlas pa yis// rab 'byams las la mi 'grub pa// med de de yis thams cad 'grub// 'bum dang sa ya bzlas pas kyang // phra mo'i las
129a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'grub par byed/ / gzhan du mi 'gro sems kyis ni// de lta'i tshul du bzlas pa bya// yul gzhan blo ni 'gro ba yis// bskal par bzlas kyang 'bras mi 'byin// mi 'phro sems kyis 'di
129b1(rgyud 'bum): zlothos shing / / lam du zhugs pa'i skyes bu la// stag sogs chu yis mi 'jigs so// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// dbang gis blo sbyangs rab ldan pas// 'bras thob de med mi 'grub ste// de bas don
129b2(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / bram po'i dbang gis thog mar sbyang // gsang ba'i dbang gis gnyis par te// gsum par bya ba de nyid ni// shes rab ye shes de yin te// de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa yin// brtan pa yo ngas
129b3(rgyud 'bum): po ma lus pa/ / bsgom par bya ba'i dus nyid la// blos ni yongs su mi sgom ste// kun gyi mtshan nyid ma shes na// sgom pa kho na de min te// thams cad dngos nyid yongs shes na// de ni sgom par yongs
129b4(rgyud 'bum): su bsgrags/ / de nyid bla mi'i kha yis te// 'bad pas ma nyes bya de mi smad// de la thams cad 'byung ba ste// bla ma la smod g.yo sgyu can// nges par de ni dug dang yang // gdon chen dag ni ma lus
129b5(rgyud 'bum): sa/ / 'chi zhing rlabs par de gyur nas// dmyal ba dag tu yun ring ltung // bskal pa du mar sdug bsngal te// rtag tu cho nges 'debs par byed// de bas blo gros chen po la// nam du'ang mi smad gzhan
129b6(rgyud 'bum): dun/ / bkur sti phu dud 'gro ba la// phan pa'i sems kyis de ltar bya// gzhan yang bsgom par bya ba nyid// gang dag dbang po'i lam 'gro ba// de yi ngo bor bdag gis bya// bsam gtan ma byed de blo yi
129b7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu blo yis bsgom par bya/ / bcom ldan bdag po chen po yis// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje la// bos nas gsang ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs// gzugs sgra la sogs drug po rnams// dngos med mal
130a1(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra ba las/ / longs spyod yul du du mar snang // shel la tshon ni ji bzhin du// 'dod pa lnga dang chos rnams la// rtag tu rnal 'byor spyod par shog/ a la la ho rol du
130a2(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / mnams par mdzod// mi 'dzin sgyu ma lta bu la// gar gyis dgyes pa'i rol pa mdzod// rig bya dgag pa med pa la// mi g.yo bzhin du rol par mdzod// hong chags pa med pas chags par
130a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzod/ / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sngags dang phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i// de yi mtshan nyid bshad pa'i phyir// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// lce la sgom pa'i rdo rje ni// rdo rje gnod mdzes
130a4(rgyud 'bum): nag po ste/ / kha ni kun tu gyes pa ni// lag gnyis thal mo nges sbyar te// gung mo'i rtsa ba'i tshigs nyid la// mthe bong nges par sbyar bar bya// mdzub mo gung mo'i rgyab rtser sbyar// 'di ni dam tshig phyag
130a5(rgyud 'bum): / rgya ste// snying kha dpral ba lkog ma dang // spyi bor byin gyis brlabs par bya// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM/ gzhan yang rdo rje sems ma sogs// phyag rgyas dbang bskur
130a6(rgyud 'bum): dbu rgyan brtag/ gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa// so so'i bdag po dgu rgyan cing // dbang bskur chen bum pa che// phyag gis bsnams te dbang bskur ro// 'khor lo las kun byed pa la// gsang dbang
130a7(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje yis/ / bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis bstod// gdug pa skrag byed 'khor lo me ltar 'bar// dus gsum khro rgyal he ru ka yi thugs// las rnams dag byed phrag dog rdo rje ste// ma lus tshems
130b1(rgyud 'bum): gcod gsol bas sku yi dang / / hUM dang phaT kyi gdug rtsub sbyor bas gsung // kun gyi rang bzhin khyod kyi gshin rje yi// lhor 'dzud bka' las des kyang mi 'da' zhing // phyogs bcu'i sprul pa'i gnas nas
130b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs mdzad pa/ / ma lus kun byed 'khor lo tsha mchog la// gzhan gyi don rdzogs gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni dpa' bo thub chen kun gyi bdud// nga yis lam bstan bdud rnams mi phyed kyang // dam
130b3(rgyud 'bum): las 'da' zhing log pa kun skyed la/ / khyod kyang bka' las ma 'da' las rnams sgrubs// tshe dang srog bsdus yan lag rnam par bcings// bdud rtsi chu rgyun rnal 'byor nga la 'dod sgrub na// ngas ni sbyin bya khyod ni/
130b4(rgyud 'bum): dam las ma 'da' zhig/ ces dpal gshin rje dgra nag po'i 'khor lo gzhan gyi lto ba la gnas 'cha' bar 'dod pa'i gtan 'pho ba ma yin pa'i tshe bya'o// 'khor lo sgang khar lta ba'i tshe// sa bon tshul te lte ba la// yi ge ma lus
130b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa yang / / mtshan nyid ngan pa'i rtog pa las// grol te mtha' gsum ngo bo las// k+Sha ni zad pa'i bdag nyid la// u ni hUM gi bdag nyid de// de ni sems kyi rang bzhin nyid// dga' las 'das pa'i ye shes te// thabs ni/
130b6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ldan pa las// dus thabs bsten pa'i bdag nyid kyis// 'thob ste gzhan du de mi 'thob// chu 'gram chen po bas mtha' dang // dur khrod shing drung dgon pa ste// dben pa'i yul dang ma mo'i khyim// der ni mgon
130b7(rgyud 'bum): po 'di la 'bad/ / gzhan du bsgrubs kyang de mi 'grub// skad cig de la rang bzhin kun// nges par mi snang rig pa yi// lam du gyur pa med par shes// 'bras bu de ni rgya chen te// mtha' yi 'thob pa de yin no// de nas yang
131a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bdag po bde bar gshegs pas rdo rje sa'i cho ga gsungs pa/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rob phyin pa la// lha mo khyod
131a2(rgyud 'bum): ni dpang du gyur/ / srung ba'i dkyil 'khor rab gnas pas// sdang ba'i log 'dren skye bo dang // bgegs rnams bsal ba 'di skad gsungs// dpal ldan bdag ni rdo rje 'dzin// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas//
131a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi ye shes rdo rje yis// lus ngag yid du bcas pa dgas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// khro bo gshin rje nag po'i bdag/ slob dpon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bri// zhes lan gsum gyi bar du brjod par bya'o//
131a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi ni drung nyid du// dar gyis gdong ni bkab pa la// sgo drung gnas pa khyod gang yin// slob dpon gyis ni rab brjod do// des bdag skal ba ldan par brjod// ji ltar bla med dpa' bo yis// mgon la dbang
131a5(rgyud 'bum): ni bskur ba bzhin/ / bla med byang chub gnas bya'i phyir// bdag la'ang mgon po dbang bskur gsol// me tog sogs te mchod pa'i mchog/ rab 'byams rgya mtsho ma lus pas// slob dpon dpa' bo de nyid la// yang yang
131a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod cing bstod pa'i tshogs/ / rgyas par mnyes bya de 'og tu// dpa' bos de la dbang rnams sbyin// de nas rgyal po bde chen po// dpa' bo longs spyod kun ldan pa// 'gro don brtson po'i sku gsum bdag/ nyid kyis
131a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bka' stsal to/ / sbyin sreg med na 'bras mi 'byin// de bas bdag nyid dam pa yis// de yi las la 'bad par bya// gos nag rgyan gyis rnam brgyan la// gshin rjer rnam bltas rnal 'byor pas// blom
131b1(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung bcas pa yis/ / sran ti'i stan la bdag 'dug nas// las rnams bsgrub par bya ba ni// mtshan mo 'am nyi ma phyed nyid la// rang 'byung ma yi dkyil 'khor du// hUM phaT mtha' na yod pa yi// sngags kyis thob/
131b2(rgyud 'bum): ma bar mtha' mar// sbyin sreg bya ste de mi ni// dur khrod me 'am rus pa 'am// rdo nyid las ni byung ba'am// tsaN+DA li yi khyim nyid nas// thab khung gru gsum can der ni// tsher ma can gyi bud shing rdzas// rlung yab sbar te hUM
131b3(rgyud 'bum): dza la raM/ / dza la hUM brjod me sbar brjod// lag g.yas ku sha bcas pa yis// mthe bong srin lag rtsa ru gzugs// oM e he hi ma hA b+hU ti de ba r-i Shi dI dza satwa ma gr-i hI tA A hUM ti A hA ra a smin sa ni hi to b+ha ba
131b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes brjod la spyan drang ngo / / 'bar ba me yi dbus nyid du// ming de zad byed ces bya ba// khro bo me ltar phun sum tshogs// ba spu kham pa de bzhin du// du ba'i mdog can zur mig steng du gzigs// sgra chen mche//
131b5(rgyud 'bum): ba bzhi ldan stobs po che// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// bzhugs nas drag po'i yi ge brjod// spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa// rim pa'i gnas la legs par bzhugs// zhal bdun rnam gtsigs ma he
131b6(rgyud 'bum): la/ / bcibs pa du ba'i 'phreng rnams 'khrigs// phyag gnyis mdung dang rdo rje 'dzin// gnyis kyis ral gri gri gug 'dzin// de yi g.yas kyi phyogs nyid du// bde bzhin bdun gyi phyogs nyid dam// spyan drangs
131b7(rgyud 'bum): byin rlabs ldan pa la/ / ar+g+ha sogs kyis mchod pa bya// oM Ar+g+ha pra tits+tsha swA hA/ lag g.yas mdzub mo mthe bong dag/ skam pa lta bur rnam byas pas// chu blangs bskyod pas dbul bar bya// oM ta ba
132a1(rgyud 'bum): @tam mthar ni sngon gyi brjod/ / zhabs bkru ba la shis pa yin// dgang gzar yu ba sor bcu drug/ de min sor bzhi zabs sor gnyis// zur gsum dbus su sor gnyis tshad/
132a2(rgyud 'bum): rtse gsum 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// de yi dbus su'ang mtshan ma ste// stag sbrul gang 'dod pas mtshan bya// khu bcug 'dzag pa sor gcig go// khro bo rdo rjes mchu yi dbyibs// byin brlabs
132a3(rgyud 'bum): sor gcig tshad can no/ / blugs gzar yu ba sor bcu bzhi// zabs su sor gcig gru gsum dang // yu ba'i mthar ni rtse gsum pa// gdengs pa byin brlabs mngon spyod kyi// gzar bu yin par
132a4(rgyud 'bum): nga yis bstan/ / gnam lcags tsher ma can sogs shing // de la de byas sangs rgyas 'jigs// bsreg rdzas gzugs brnyan la sogs sreg/ stong du tshang bas 'bras bu ni// nges par 'byin par
132a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa yin/ / g.yon gyi rtsa der dgang gzar la// g.yas pa blugs pa'i gzar ba yi// kha ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma yin// sor mo gnyis par de rgyas so// rdo rje bar gyi thod pa dag/ bsreg rdzas kyi
132a6(rgyud 'bum): ni snod yin la/ / rdzas rnams rdo rje rin chen dpa'// hUM phaT kyi ni mtha' can gyis// bsreg bya sa chu me dang rlung // nam mkha' lta bu'i dbus su gnas// kha bye gnas pa rtag tu'o// kun tu'ang
132a7(rgyud 'bum): kha phye bskor bar bya/ / bzhi gnyis 'dab ma'i steng du ste// lte ba dang ni yang dag ldan// lhan cig rnam par shes pa'i lha// nam mkha' nyid du nges par 'bar// de yi mtshan mar shes bya ba// rdul
132b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi rnam par de nyid do/ / thig le yi ge med pa ste// rgyun mi 'chad par 'od kyis gnas// brgyar gshegs skra yi tshad kyis so// argas rab tu sbar bar bya// sngar gsungs 'byung ba rnam bzhi dang / ma
132b2(rgyud 'bum): mkhar yang dag ldan pa yi/ / sor mo lnga dang nges ldan pas// gang gi sbyin sreg des bya'o// gzhan dag sor mo gsum gyis bsres// dmigs pa thams cad 'gags par 'gyur// steng med stong pa nam mkhar
132b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dra/ / shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi// phyag rgya chen po dbang du 'gyur// bde gshegs kun dang mnyam 'gyur ba// shes rab dang ni snying rje ches// 'gags pa med pa'i chos 'gyur ro// bde chen nam
132b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' lta bu ste/ / rnal 'byor pa yi dmigs pa yin// mdog gnag 'dab brgyad lta bu la// rgya dang zabs su sor mo ni// nyi shu de bzhin bcu pa'i thab// byang du rtse mo bstan pa la// rdo rje tho ba'i mtshan
132b5(rgyud 'bum): ma med/ / sor ni bzhi par bri bar bya// de steng sor mo gsum bor bar// kha khyer yang ni de yi tshad// sa nag bong bu rnga mo'i spangs// mi rus 'bras kyi phub ma dang // sol ba'i phye mas rnam byugs la// mi zhim
132b6(rgyud 'bum): dri dang bdug pas mchod/ / dur khrod shing ngam bong bu dang // rnga mo'i spangs bskams bud shing ngo // sor gcig gis ni dma' ba yin// min pa de bzhin seng ldeng dang // sa pa de bzhin bas shing dang /
132b7(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod shing bu sor bcu pa// rtsa ba'i cha las rnam byung ba// dur khrod mar khu rnams bsnyugs la// de yis yam shing bya ba yin// bya rog 'ug pa'i gshog pa dang // nim pa'i 'dab mthal ba dang /
133a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes sa dang bong bu dang // rnga mo sogs kyi spangs dang ni// skra dang zhag dang bshang ba dang // gci ba mi rus yungs kar dang // yungs mar khrag dang lan tshwa dang // de la sogs pa re re zhing //
133a2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar rnyed pa'i rdzas rnams ni// dug dang khrag dang smyo byed kyi// 'dab khu thal ba sol pa dang // 'bras kyi phub ma la sogs la// dgra bo dag gi gzugs byas la// mgo nas brtsams te ral gri yas// dum bur
133a3(rgyud 'bum): btub cing lcags phor du/ / khrag dang chu dang mi rnams dang // bong bu'i gcin la phaT ldan pa'i// gdub pa'i yi ge rnam bzlas pa'i// rdzas la bsang gtor byas nas kyang // slob dpon la sdang rmongs pa 'di//
133a4(rgyud 'bum): brjod cing sbyin sreg dbul bar bya// de la 'dadi skad ces bya ste// 'byung po tshim bya gtor ma dang // bstod bzlas mnyes par bya ba dang // dbang gi dbye ba bstan pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya ba dang /
133a5(rgyud 'bum): de yi sa la mchod pa sogs// cod pan du ni bde gshegs gzhag/ mngon spyod hom gyi cho ga dang // bsdus nas bar du rnam pa brgyad// pad+ma dkar 'dra mgrin pa ring // gzugs mdzes ha cang ring ba min//
133a6(rgyud 'bum): lus la rdul 'byung yid 'phrogs// dri ni shin tu'ang zhim pa yin// lta stangs mig sogs ri dgas 'dra// mgrin dang lto ba rang ri dgas kyi// skal bzang rkeng pa'ang ri dgas kyi// glang chen dri ldan bzhin
133a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phel che/ / myos shing nu ma rab tu rgyas// gzhan yang kun rdzob bden pa ni// bong thung de yi skra yang thung // rkang lag ring zhing bzhin ring ma// nya yi dri bro bong ring mo// zla 'dra skye gnas rab tu ring /
133b1(rgyud 'bum): skye gnas chung zhing yan lag rtsub// bong ring de bzhin nu ma mkhrang // skra srab dal smra yan lag chung // sngo bsangs ri mo mnyam pa de/ gsang ba shes rab rnam gnyis la// rig mar nga yis bsgrags pa yin//
133b2(rgyud 'bum): nga pa'i 'gros can sgra 'khyil ma// bzhin zlum nu rgyas lus kyang rgyas// shin tu ring min dal bar smra// dbus gnas rna 'phyang gnyer gsum can// mtshan nyid ngan zhing le lo che// yan lab gnag cing skra
133b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khyil ma/ / khang par gnas shing lus rtsub ma// sa la'i dri 'byung sa la'i bro// nu spangs de ni skyes bu bzhin// chang gis myos pa'i dpa' mo ste// chang la shin tu chags pa yin// de gnyis de la shis
133b4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / tha ma tha mar nges par yin// 'chi ba'i bsam gtan de nyid ni// bde ba dam pa kho bos 'dod// 'di la'ang bde ba de nyid yin// ka sogs spangs pa'i A li naM// bcu drug yin te phrag gnyis
133b5(rgyud 'bum): po/ / 'khor lo sogs pa'i sa bon yin// zla ba de dag sum cu gnyis// a sogs spangs pa'i kA li ste// bcu bdun gnyis pa de stengs su// ya sogs spangs pa min pa nyid// gsum pa'i gsum
133b6(rgyud 'bum): dang bzhi pa'i gnyis/ / bcu phrag bzhi ste de phrag gnyis// sem mo bzang sogs sa bon te// nyi mar rnam bsgrags de dbus gnas// hUM dang a yi rang bzhin las// rdo rje tho sogs so sor rtog
133b7(rgyud 'bum): thim pas nan tan ye shes te/ / chod kyi dbyings nyid dag pa ste// gshin dgrar bdag nyid 'dod pa yin// rgyan gyi bye brag lus la gnas// de ni 'di skad bya ba ste// rig pa shes rab bstan pa dang /
134a1(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa'i rgya mi bye brag na// mtha' mar bstan te sdom gsum mo// mtshon par byed pa'i bdag nyid de/ mtshon tu sngon bstan ning yin no// gshin rje gshed nan pa las thams
134a2(rgyud 'bum): grub par byed pa'i 'khor lo'i rgyud/ / rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// @rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra b+hai ra bA kal+la tan+t+ra rA dzA/ bod skad du/ dpal
134a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas 'di ni bshad bya ba// ji ltar 'gro rnams zad byed pa// sdug bsngal rnams mthar byed pa yi// bsgrub bya'i thabs
134a4(rgyud 'bum): chen mchog gyur pa/ / gsang sngags de las 'byung bar 'gyur// dang mo rnam par snang mdzad do// de dang nye bar ngag dbang phyug/ rdo rje 'khor lo sgyur ba'o// gdon gyi bdag dang 'byung po yi/ mgo dang mtha'
134a5(rgyud 'bum): ma gnyis ldan bya/ / mchod rten sreg byed mtha' dang bcas// gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje can gyi mtha' la gnas// yi ge 'bum phrag khri brjod na// nyams pa thams cad sel byed cing / zhi dang
134a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod/ / gsod dang skrod dgug dbye rengs dang // dman par byed dang rgyal srid sogs// thob pa nyid la the tshom med// dur khrod tshang tshing khrod ngogs rtsub// shing gcig khang stong mtshan
134a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig dben/ / gang 'dod gnas su bsam gtan brtsam// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la khyab pa me long lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang ye shes thams cad
134b1(rgyud 'bum): la khyad par bya ba'i phyir/ sku mdog dkar po zhal dang ldan par byas nas/ 'jig rten pa thams cad la gzigs nas/ rang gi rigs kyi yi ge nyid brjod pas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon
134b2(rgyud 'bum): tan dang / bsran las dang / ye shes kyang gcig gis ngo bo sprul pa'i skur gyur to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje che// don rnams bskyed pa yang nyid do// mkha' dkyil 'od kyis 'gengs 'gyur ba// slar zhing
134b3(rgyud 'bum): kha dog lnga ldan pa/ / sa bon sngags kyis bskul ba yi// 'od kyi rtse phran thub pa'i sku// kun kyang sangs rgyas gnas las skyes// rang la zhugs pas sku rdzogs gyur// zhal drug khro gnyer rab brjid
134b4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / ma do'i zhal ldan steng gnas pa// 'jam dpal zhal ni 'dzum bcas bzhugs// lhag ma dkar dang ser dang dmar// dur po'i mdog mtshungs gyen skar ldan// thod pa skam rngon rgyu ma sprul
134b5(rgyud 'bum): rus pa rdo rje'i 'phreng bas brgyan/ / glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni// hUM phaT glur len gad mo can// nam mkha'i lus can khro bo'i sprin// yang dang yang du spro byed pa'o// phyag drug rab tu brjid
134b6(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / dbyug pa tho ba gtun shing dag/ g.yas pa'i phyag gis rim bzhin 'dzin// dgra sta dang ni lcags kyu dang // zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin// pad+ma na ma ma he dang // gshin
134b7(rgyud 'bum): rje'i steng na 'gying bka can/ / zhabs drug g.yon brkyang gar gyis gnas// 'jig rten bdag po mthar mdzad pa'o// de ltar gang zhig dang ba dang // blo ldan g.yo sgyu rab spangs shing / legs par
135a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang rnams thob byas nas/ / rdo rje slob dpon mnyes byed pas// yang nas yang du dran byed na// bstan pa chen po thob par 'gyur// lha yi dge 'dun nga la nyon// dang po chang la
135a2(rgyud 'bum): rab dga' zhing / / sha chen rtag tu mur byed na// las rnams de yis myur du 'grub// sku na du ma 'phro byed cing // sku la sku rnams nges thim byed// thams cad sgyu ma nyid shes pas// 'jig rten rnams su yid sad
135a3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / khong stong kha dog dkar ba ste// rgyun du rlung ni 'dzag par byed// chu skyes dmar po kha sbyar gnyis// yan lag gnyis kyis legs par btsun// shes par 'phel ba me dang rlung // nyi ma zla ba thabs ldan dang //
135a4(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ldan par shes par bya// gnyis po de nyid rnam spangs na/ khong du chud par mi 'gyur ro// chu skyes kha sbyor la brten te// gsum gnas pa yi ting 'dzin la// rdo rje chos kyis btab pa yi// thabs dang
135a5(rgyud 'bum): shes rab grol ba'i rgyu/ / blo ldan 'das pa shes par 'gyur// de phyir de la brtson par bya// chos rnams chos nyid dbyer med pas// stong pa nyid kyi ye shes che// mi shigs rtog bral mtshan ma med// bde chen ye shes
135a6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje sku/ / ye shes mi rtog rtog pa bral// rtog pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad sreg/ spros pa'i mtshan ma mtha' dag ni// ji snyed sgyu mi'i rnam par shes// de nyid shes nas grol ba'o// ma shes pas ni phyir zhing 'khor//
135a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skye bo blo ldan 'gas// nges par rtogs pa thabs kyi mchog/ sdug bsngal chen pos rab 'jigs nas// bde ba 'dod pas nan tan bya// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ thabs dang
135b1(rgyud 'bum): shes rab kyi bsam gtan bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sngags grub pa las byung ba yi// las rnams 'dir ni shes bya ste// der ni lha yi sku yang sbyar//
135b2(rgyud 'bum): zhi sogs bzlas pa'i rim pa la// rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje ni// nyi zla la brten yi ge yi// 'phreng ba kha dog lngar shes pa// skyen bul spangs nas klag pa ni// mkhas pas bzlas pa'i rim pa'o// drag po'i las rnams sgrub
135b3(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ / nyon mongs gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni// sngon po rtse rtsibs bcu pa la// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro bar bsam// zhi bar 'dod pa'i skyes bu des// sems ni yang dag mnyam bzhag nas// sngags kyi 'od kyang 'gro
135b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la/ / phan pa'i yid dang ldan par bya// gro ga ras dang shing shun la// gur kum gi'u waM dri rnams kyis// mchod rten rim pa lnga ldan zhing // gdugs dang 'khor lo ldan par bya// sgrub pa po yis ming dang rus//
135b5(rgyud 'bum): de yi bum pa'i nang du bri// rten 'brel snying po la sogs pa'i// sngags kyis g.yon nas bskor ba bri// cig shos g.yas ras g.yon du bri// de la spel tshig med pa 'am// yang na 'khor lo'i bar du gzhag/ 'khor
135b6(rgyud 'bum): lo kun la kha sbyor gnad/ / rab tu gnas par byas nas kyang // lus sam mgul lam gang bder gzhag/ des ni gdon dang byad snyems dang // rims dang yams rnams sel bar byed// gang zhig yul rnams gzhom
135b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na/ / hUM gi sa bon dang ldan par// ming yig tsam po bri bar bya// so phag phye ma ldong ros dang // ba bla ma he'i khrag gis brdzis// zla gam gnyis pa'i gzugs byas te// bar du gang 'dod sgrub pa yi// gzugs
136a1(rgyud 'bum): brnyan sor brgyad pa yi tshad/ / byas la gan kyal du bzhag la// ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis// khri phrag gcig tu sngags bzlas nas// dum bu dum bur gtubs byas te// chu bo'i gzhung du gtor
136a2(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / skad cig de la de dbang 'gyur// bya rog 'ug pa'i gzugs byas te// ma nu ma li ro tsa nas// khyo shug bsgrub bya'i ming bris te// gshin rje'i phyogs bltas gsang sngags gdon// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan
136a3(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / mi yi rje ngar phur bus gdab// skad cig tsam la de dag dbye// de nas 'dir ni bsad pa yi// cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya// zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug pa'am// yang na zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa 'am/
136a4(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yang rung // ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba yis// khrag rnams sna tshogs tha dad dang // bsgrub bya'i rjes dang dug gi rigs// rta dang ma he bong bu'i chus// sbrus pa'i bsgrub byi'i ling ga bya//
136a5(rgyud 'bum): lus la tsher mas gzugs bya zhing // til mar gyis kyang bsku bar bya// yang na shing lo gro ga 'am// dur khrod ras sam shun pa la// rang nyid gcer bu skra bshig nas// lus ni thal bas byugs bya ste// mngon sum
136a6(rgyud 'bum): khros nas sha chen bza'/ / rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing // nag po'i tshes kyi mtshan phyed dus// 'khor lo bri bar brtsam par byas// tshe bcu gnyis 'khor lo ni// hUM dang hrIHSh+T+rIHdbus su dgod// Na yo ni ra rtsibs
136a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan la/ / yungs kar til dang skar chu dang // rta dang ma he khyi khag khrag/ bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro yis bri// yi ge ya yi lto bar yang // ming dang rus su ldan pa bris// phyogs bzhir yi ge bcu pa ni// ming dang bcas
136b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bri bar bya/ / brgyad po dag la rim pa bzhin// yi ge 'di dag bri bar bya// oM ya ma rA dza kA la ru pa a mu ka mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ yi ge rnams la bskor nas ni// bsgrub bya gzugs dang ldan pa bri/
136b2(rgyud 'bum): de yi mu khyud dag la ni// yi ge bcu pa ming bcas bris// phyogs bzhi rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan// de bzhin rdzas rnams ma lus pas// 'khor lo lte bar ldan pa bri// gshin rje'i gzugs ni ral gri dang // dbyig pa
136b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa bris nas ni/ / de dang de nyid lto sbyar la// mtshan ngan thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ tshe gsum ske tshe dug mu zi// ro zhes bkang nas dkyil 'khor ni// gru gsum dbus su gzhag par bya// yungs dang bra bo sA lu nag
136b4(rgyud 'bum): dza b+ha bra bo sogs rnams la/ / gsang sngags rgyal po brjod byas te// dro'am du ba 'thul bar 'du// rims dang rims kyi khrag rnams ni// ma lus zad par 'thung ba yi// ma yengs par ni bsam gtan bya//
136b5(rgyud 'bum): yang na bsgrub bya za bar mthong // shing gcig rtsar ni rengs pa dang // mal 'og tu ni zha zhing lkugs// chu mdor 'byed cing ri rtse bskrad// gsad pa ma thabs 'og tu swa// dbug pa la ni sgo khang 'og/ lha 'am 'khor
136b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba'o/ / bde gnas rnams kyis dbang du 'gyur// mar khu chen po thod pa yi// nang du blugs nas bskol byas te// bzhar pas mig la byug byed na// mngon shes de nyid myur du 'thob// rigs ldan rgyal po
136b7(rgyud 'bum): las rnyed cing / / mdog ldan lang tsho gsang bkug la// tsan dan lde gu mar byas te// las kyi sbyor bas de nyid bcing // yang na me la gdung bas 'grub// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya ma rA dzaH/ badz+ra kI li kI la ha na ha na
137a1(rgyud 'bum): mA ra ya phaT/ ces bya'i gsang sngags brjod byas la// rus pa'i phur pa gdab par bya// gsal shing la btsugs skyes bu yi// rdzas la brten te bsgrub par bya// til mar byugs/
137a2(rgyud 'bum): la thod pas bzhar// mar ma byas pa'i dud pa yis// mig rnon dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// gsang sngags rgyal po thogs med la// bsten pas thob bya mang yod kyang // 'di ni brjod pa ci zhig dgos//
137a3(rgyud 'bum): yang na 'di ltar shes bya ste// rang nyid sngags dang ting 'dzin ldan// brtson chen gzhan du ma yengs pas// gang du brtsams pa de 'grub 'gyur// smad 'tshong rang byung nyid kyis ni// sngon bstan tsakra
137a4(rgyud 'bum): legs bris te/ / ling ga'i snying khar bcug byas la// rang mdun khrag gi zla gam ste// khrag gis byugs pa'i steng du gzhag/ mi 'am rgyal po'i bu mo dag/ dgug dang dbang gi yi ge yis// de nyid du
137a5(rgyud 'bum): ni nges par 'gyur/ / nyal ba'i 'og tu mnan par bya// mi glang ra khyi bas phag khrag/ 'khor lo bris nas lang ga yi// mgrin par bcug nas bya rog gi/ khrag gis khrag skyugs sngags bris nas//
137a6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge de ldan thod pa rung // bcug nas gsang sngags mang bzlas te// dur khrod me thab 'og bzhag na// khrag skyug pa la the tshom med// bsros na tsha ba'i nad kyis 'chi// sbal khrag pha wang klad pa yis//
137a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo de nyid legs bris nas// ling ga'i mchan khung g.yon bcug la// g.yas g.yon sbal khrag glang khrag byugs// ling ga'i phyogs su rang nyid kyi// rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnan// de tshe
137b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa mang byas nas/ / rgya gram lam du mnan la gzhag/ de nas bzlog pa bris nas ni// shing gcig khong par sbas na rengs/ rnga mo bya rog rgan po'i khrag/ 'khor lo bris nas ling ga yi// rkang gnyis
137b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bcu ga rang mdun du/ khrag gis rnga mi gzugs bris te// de yi steng gzhag rang nyid kyis// rlung gi bsam gtan nges ldan na// bskrad pa nyid du the tshom med// ri bo'i rtse la 'dzegs te sra// neru
137b3(rgyud 'bum): le sbrul rta ma he dang / / bya rog 'ug po'i khrag gis ni// khyo shug rkang pa'i rjes spras pa'i// ling gsor brgyad par byas te// khrag des bris pa'i 'khor lo dag/ snying khar bcug pa gnyis byas te//
137b4(rgyud 'bum): ne'u le gzugs byas steng du gzhag/ lag gnyis rta dang ma he yi// rus pas brdung zhing gsang sngags bzlas// rtse drung shing khar sbas na 'byed// tsan dan dkar pos legs bris nas// gser sogs rin chen
137b5(rgyud 'bum): rdzas su grol/ / mdun du zla ba'i gzugs stengs su// bzhag pa nyin re bskor ba ni// ji srid byas na bsrung bar nges// spyi bor btags na g.yul las rgyal// rkang par btags na chu stengs 'gro// ba yi'o/
137b6(rgyud 'bum): mas khrus byas te// ku sha ba mar sogs mchod nas// gsol btab nad rnams thams cad bsrung // de nas bcom ldan 'das las phra ba thams cad las rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
137b7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ las thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sngags 'di sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // mA ra ya phaT/ ces pa gsad pa'i'o// bi dwe Sha ya/ dbye ba'i'o// uts+tshu Ta ya/ bskrad pa'i'o/ oM
138a1(rgyud 'bum): hA ya/ rmongs pa'i'o// wa sha~M ku ru/ dbang du bya ba'i'o// s+thAm+b+ha ya/ mnan pa'i'o// A kad+ha ya dzaH/ dgug pa'i'o// oM hrI swAhA/ kha dang lag pa bshal ba'i sngags so// mar+tha
138a2(rgyud 'bum): hAHSh+TAHwa kr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha trun nA sha ya stam+b+ha ya phaT phaT swA hA/ / snying po'i sngags so// oM gr-iHkA la rU pa hUM khaM/ nye bo'i snying po'o// oM hrIHkruM bruM sU dz+dza hUM gaH/ snying po dam pa'o// oM hrIHhAd+ho ma hA kro d+ha bats+tsha
138a3(rgyud 'bum): gats+tsha smat+su dza pr-i ti grih+Na pra sA da~M dai bi mAM ku ru swA hA/ spyan drang ba'o// oM hrIHSh+T+rIHyon chab bo// oM hUM phaT phaT/ zhabs bsil/ oM sarba duSh+Ta satwa da ma ka ga ga/ zhes pa dri chab kyi sngags so// oM ku mA ra ru
138a4(rgyud 'bum): pi Ni dzaHdzaHhUM phaT/ me tog 'bul ba'i sngags so// oM hrIHhaHhe phaT/ bdug pa'i 'o// oM kA la ru pa sarba duSh+Ta sa twa da ma kaM ma hA b+hu ta pa ti i maM ba ling grih+Na grih+Na pa ya swA hA/ gtor ma'i sngags so//
138a5(rgyud 'bum): / oM hIp+ta lo tsa na bau kri tA na na ma hA twAt+tA hA sa nA dI ni dIp+ta ya swA hA/ mar mo'i sngags so// oM dzaM ya dza ya su dza ya bi shwa ru pa d+hA ri gats+tsha gats+tsha swa s+tha na kr-i taM te na ta thA ga tash+tsa bi sardza ya ma ma kAr+ya ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa gshegs
138a6(rgyud 'bum): su gsol ba'i sngags so/ / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang log pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang sngags yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'phrin las 'di nyid
138a7(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal to/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// hUM las yongs su rdzogs pa yi// rdo rje 'jigs byed bsam par bya// dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// srin po rab tu khros pa 'dra// dbyug
138b1(rgyud 'bum): pa thod khrag phyag na 'dzin/ / ma he pad+ma nyi ma la// g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul gyis sgom// oM ya mAn+ta krita hUM phaT/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di bzlas na// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung // nam mkha'i
138b2(rgyud 'bum): dbyings su dbus gnas par/ / ya yig sngon po las skyes pa'i/ khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed ni// pad+ma zhi mi gdan stengs na// sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa'i// gri gug bin+di pa la dang // dgra sta dang ni
138b3(rgyud 'bum): khrag dang / / phyag bzhi po na rim pas 'dzin// ma he nag po'i zhal steng na// 'jam dpal zhal ni ser zhing 'dzum// dpa' bo chen por nga nyid sgom// rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing // sha chen dag kyang mu ra bar
138b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu byed cing // rtag par gsang sngags bzlas par bya// thig le 'dren pa'i rnal 'byor ni// bsgrub byir phyogs su bsam par bya// las rnams myur du 'dis 'grub bo// yang
138b5(rgyud 'bum): na 'di ltar shes bya ste/ / ma ge gdong gi sbyor ba yis// sku yi kha dog so sor shes// khyad par du ni bsad pa la// nag po ma he'i zhal can ni// rtse gsum lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste// ma se sha steng bsam
138b6(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / khrag 'dren pa yi mchog tu gsungs// res 'ga' sku la khro bo ni// lcags kyu 'dzin pa grangs med spro// zla ba spyang kis zin dus su// byi la'i sder mo ra snying dang // byi ba'i khrag dang maM
138b7(rgyud 'bum): rus bsre/ / gang la phog pa spro bar 'gyur// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ sbyor ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//
139a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dur khrod ras sam dpa' bo'i gos// yang na mtshan gyi khab ma la// rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje chu// dpa' bo'i khrag dang chang dang dug
139a2(rgyud 'bum): go ro tsa nas ras chos bya/ / log par dam por drud byas te// lus ngab yid kyi gnas su ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chus// yi ge oM dang AHhUM bri// skra phyed dur khrod sol ba dang // khrag chen
139a3(rgyud 'bum): ldong ros pa bla yis/ / dbang thob dam tshig srung byed cing // shin tu gsang la dam pa yis// ri mo mkhan ni brtson ldan des// rgyud kyi don la mkhas byas nas// nag po'i dus kyi mtshan phyed dus//
139a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i gnas su rab zhugs nas// bcom ldan rdo rje 'jigs mdzad bri// rtsa ba ma he khros pa'i zhal// de stengs 'jam dpal 'dzum pa'i zhal// lhag ma dkar dang ser dang dmar// dur ba'i
139a5(rgyud 'bum): mdog mtshungs gyen skra can/ / rab tu brjid cing khro ba'i zhal// drug dang ldan par sku lus che// thod pa skam rlon rgyu ma sprul// rus pa rdo rje'i 'phreng bas brgyan// glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni/
139a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma nyi ma ma he la// gshin rje mnan nas zhabs drug gis// g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum gar gyis 'gyings// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na// rtse gcig gnyis pa tho ba ste// gsum pa gtun shing mkhar
139a7(rgyud 'bum): la 'phyar/ / dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa ni// g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa bri// nam mkha'i mdog can thal bas byugs// sku la khro bo du ma 'phro// sna tshogs mchod pa'i lha mos bskor// legs par
139b1(rgyud 'bum): de ltar bris pa yi/ / rgyab dang phyogs rnams thams cad du// dur khrod chen pos bskor ba bri// mgo dum rgyu ma mkha' la khyer// rkang dum lag dum ro langs dang // wa dang spyang ki gtum po dang /
139b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro pho mo sha za'i tshogs// byA dang gcan gzan sna tshogs bri// skyi bung rab tu 'jigs bris nas// der ni sgrub pa po yang bri// gri thod bzung nas sha chen mur// gos nag gyon nas khrag
139b3(rgyud 'bum): chen 'thung / / rta dang ma he'i rus pa yi// 'phreng ba bzung nas gsang sngags 'don// bcom ldan 'das la lta ba bris// de ltar bris nas chang dang khrag/ sha chen go ro tsa nas mchod// mnyam
139b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhag lha yi dge 'dun des/ / dus gsum rgyun du mchod byed na// rdo rje 'dzin pa myur du thob// sbyin rab tu sba zhing gsang // pan yon dam pa 'di la 'byung // dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i
139b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po las/ bris sku'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad par bya// rtog pa ma lus zad byed cing // las rnams thams cad 'grub 'dod pas// blo ldan sar
139b6(rgyud 'bum): sna rnam spangs te/ / brtul pod g.yeng ba rnams spangs nas// sbyin sreg las la rab brtson bya// mtshal dang ba zla ldong ros dang // shan po'i go thal dur khrod sa// mi dang ma he'i khrag gis rdzi// khru
139b7(rgyud 'bum): ro pa la khru phyed rtsig/ gru bzhi'i steng du zlum po ni// rdo rje rgya gram ldan byas la// de steng 'khor lo rtsibs drug la// mtshan ma drug ni dgod par bya// lte bar ma yi dkyil 'khor ni// mtho gang tshad du byas
140a1(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ / ma dor khrag gis legs par byag/ bdag nyid lho yi phyogs bltas te// ma he zhal gyi sbyor ba yis// thab kyi nang gi lte ba la// me yi sa bon mngon bltas la// bskal pa'i ma
140a2(rgyud 'bum): chen lta bur sgom/ / der ni me lha bsgom bya ste// zhal gsum phyag drug nag la rtsub// phyag gnyis rang 'dra'i yum la 'khyud// g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'gro rnams la// skyabs sbyin mdzad cing bgrang 'phreng 'dzin//
140a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas ril ba mchog stsol brtson// zhabs drug rigs drug mtshan ma brdzis// zhal nas me rnams rab 'phro zhing // 'od rnams sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// de ltar shes nas rab bsregs na// 'dod pa'i don
140a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams rab tu 'byung / / dgra bo'i gzugs rnams sha chen dang // chang dang ma he'i khra ba bcas pa// stong phrag gsum du bsregs byas na// bsgrub bya khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi// glang po rta bong khyi sha la// stong phrag
140a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis dbang ba byed/ / bya rog 'ug pa khyi sha chu// bsregs na me lha 'byed par 'gyur// til dang nas gro sA lu// yung ba ge'u waM so phag rnams// stong phrag drug tu gang bsregs pa// longs spyod bsam
140a6(rgyud 'bum): can rnyed par 'gyur/ / rta dang rnga mo bya rog sha// mi sha rdo rje chur bcas pa// gsang sngags rnal 'byor ldan byas te// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis nges par skrod// ra sha daN+Da ut+pa la// chang dang ma he'i chur bcas pa/
140a7(rgyud 'bum): gang 'dod brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lkugs// dug dang khrag dang sgog pa dang // sha chen til mar rab sbags te// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs byas na// pha rol gzhan gyi gsang sngags gcod// tsan dan dkar po 'bras
140b1(rgyud 'bum): dkar dang / / til can 'bras can yungs kar dang // ut+pal ka ra ga pur dang // shar du bltas te brgya rtsa brgyad// bsregs na dus rnams kun tu srung // gang zhig bya ba'i rigs sogs dang // sngags rnams
140b2(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan nges ldan pas/ / snying rje'i yid ni ma bral na// 'dod pa thams cad 'dir bsgrub bya// gzhan du rmongs pa'i byas pa bslu// blo gros med gang shes rab 'chal// sngags dang dam tshig dman gyur cing //
140b3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la mngon g.yel ba// brtson pa chung zhing lhod pa 'gas// bskal pa stong du bsgrub byas kyang // 'bras bu yod pa ma yin te// sha thang chad pa nyid du zad// dper na blo zhan byis pa rnams// 'ga'
140b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig 'bras 'dod 'khrul gyur nas/ / phub ma rlung khar byed pa la// 'bras yod nam yang mi 'gyur zhing // ji ltar sprin dang chu zla dang // dbang po'i gnu rnams rtag min te// thar pa 'dod pa'i bya ba yang //
140b5(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma rol// ye shes gcig su rnam grol rgyu// stong pa dpag par zlos mi nus// de la spyad cing gzhal bzod na// brtags pa'i snying po de la med// de la dngos rnams ma grub na// sgrub pa'i rwa
140b6(rgyud 'bum): mo gzhan smos ci dgos/ / bya ba dang ni byed pa dag/ nges par de la brtag mi bzod// ngam grog g.yang sar lhung yang bla'i// chad par rtog pa 'di mi bzod// rtag pa nyid kyang rigs min te// dngos po yod par gal
140b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dper na byis pa rnams la mas// sa 'dir sdong dang ma nyid kyis// 'bras bu shing thog mar blangs la// khyod la med pas sbyin zhes brjod// de bzhin rnam pa du ma yang // 'jig rten rtog pa tha dad pas//
141a1(rgyud 'bum): de dag drang bar bya phyir bshad// bcom ldan lha yi lha mdun du// sha chen po yi zhal zas dang // chang dang til mar ma hi'i khrag/ rab tu zhim pa'i zas mchog rnams// dus rnams
141a2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dbul bar bya/ / gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu// bdag gis rgyun du 'don bya zhing // bsam gtan rtag tu brtson par byas// de ltar shes shing sgrub byed pa'i// skyes bu blo ldan de yis ni// sangs
141a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas nyid kyang myur 'grub 'gyur/ / zhi sogs las la smos ci dgos// grong khyer dkrug na sngags pa des// khyi sha sbal sha rus sbal sha// rnga mo byis pa'i sha rnams la// stong rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya//
141a4(rgyud 'bum): rta sha tri chen rab sbyar nas// ral bu byas nas bdag mdun du// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas byas nas// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs pas ni// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur// bud med dbang du byed 'dod
141a5(rgyud 'bum): nan/ / nya sha chang dang sha chen rnams// rdo rje chu yis sbags byas te// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya// tha mal dbang du byed 'dod na// sha chen glang po sha dang bcas// byang chub sems dang rab bsres te//
141a6(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgyad du bsreg par bya// dgug pa dus rnams thams du// khyi sha nya sha bdud rtsi lnga// cha mnyam ril bu byas nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na 'gugs// sbyin sreg rnams thams cad kyang /
141a7(rgyud 'bum): ma ge zhal gyi sbyar bas ni// gsang sngags rgyal pos 'dod pa sbyar// ma yengs rtse gcig sems kyis bya// gsungs dang ma gsungs mtha' dag kyang // ji lta ba yi rim pa yis// rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid nyer
141b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / sangs rgyas 'bras bu myur du thob/ zhi la zhi ba'i sems kyis te// rgyal po lta bur rgyas pa la// sdang bral chags pas dbang la'o// drag po'i las la khro zhing rtsub// rab tu gtum par yid kyis
141b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par bya// gang zhig ltos pa med pa'i mi// grub pa myur du tshol byed na// sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag pas// rdo rje 'dzin par de 'grub 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang spyod
141b3(rgyud 'bum): yul/ / de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro// mnyam gzhag nyams par mi bya la// dus rnams rtag tu rnal 'byor pas// shin tu mnyam par gzhag par bya// de ni thar pa nyid kyi rgyu// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di la ni//
141b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i dngos grub myur byed de// dka' ba med pa'i thabs 'di ni// dka' spyod brtul zhugs rnam spangs te// shin tu bde bar sgrub pa'i thabs// duHkha 'jigs med bdud rtsi'i ro// blo ldan legs par
141b5(rgyud 'bum): blang bya ste/ / shin tu 'dad pas bsgrub pa bya// mi shes blo gros rmongs pa 'ga'// rtog pa'i dra bas bsgribs pa'i tshe// bsod nams dang ni sdig pa yi// phung po rnam pa gnyis su brtags// 'on kyang
141b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa thams cad ni/ / rgyud mchog 'di las 'byung 'gyur phyir// dmar zhing brtson pa chung ba 'ga'// 'di la zhugs na myur du 'grub// de bas ngo mtshar rgyud 'di ni// rnyed dka' khyad par mchog gyur pa//
141b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ge'i dbyibs kyang mi bstan na// bshad cing 'grol ba smos ci dgos// dbang rnams nges par ma blangs shing // bla ma mnyes par ma byas tshe// bstan kyang thos par mi 'gyur te// tsha ba la sogs 'khor bar
142a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor/ / de skad ston pas bshad pa'i tshe// de rnams myos shing brgyal rmongs te// kun kyang 'dud cing mgo bo smad// 'jig rten 'di ni shin tu g.yos// gang zhig rgyud 'di nyan pa
142a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / shes nas 'chang bar byed pa dang // dus rnams kun tu 'don byed na// tshe 'dir 'jigs pa kun bsal te// shi nas mtho ras myur du 'thob// gal te gzhan du rgyud mchog 'di// bstan nam bshad
142a3(rgyud 'bum): dam gsal phye na/ / de ni sdug bsngal mang myong nas// shi nas myur du dmyal bar 'gro// rang gis shin tu bcang bya zhing // dngos grub nyid bzhin mngon byas na// sdug bsngal mtha' dag nges zad nas//
