179b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje rnams las/ khro ba chen po gshin rje gshed 'di nges par phyung bar gyur to// nges par phyung nas phyag na rdo rje la/ bcom ldan 'das thub pa chen pos bka'
179b6(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje khyod khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs 'di yang dag par zung la/ bdud rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams la
179b7(rgyud 'bum): skrag pa dang / 'jigs pa dang // bsad par gyis shig ces gsungs so// de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das las dngas su thos te/ skad cig gis blangs nas nges par bzung ste/ yang dag par bsdus
180a1(rgyud 'bum): la bsngags shing sems la yang legs par bskyod do/ / 'di gsungs pas/ gsang bdag chen po pha rol zong // 'jug phyir 'di ni rab gsal bya// 'gro dang 'ong bar 'dod pa de//
180a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par gzhag ste sngags bzlas bya// bye ba bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te// bye ba lnga rnams kyi brjod cing // dang po'i rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// bdag nyid nam mkha' dang mtshungs par/ log
180a3(rgyud 'bum): mar sgom pa'i dus su yang / / sems ni gcig par nges gzhug bya// ji ltar rmi lam rang bzhin sems// 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar byed// de bzhin skye bo nyid bya ste// pha rol tu ni 'gro zhing 'ong //
180a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar sems ni ring por 'gro// slar yang skad cig las zlog byed// bar med goms pa'i sbyor ba la// de bzhin nyid du rnam par gnas// ji lta'i rang bzhin gnas bya ste// gzhul mnga' bzhin
180a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya/ / de ltar yid kyis gzhu 'di nyid// bar chad med par 'gro ba nyid// zla ba'am ni mi'i sbyor ba yang // sems ni rlung du nges gzhug bya/ lus dang rnam par bral ba yid// de nyid du ni 'ong
180a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin 'gro/ / cung zad drod ni yang dag thob// gnang ba thob pa'i sgrub pa po// ji ltar lus kyi nang 'gro zhing // grong las pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur// sgra gcan dang phrad sbyor ba las// zla ba nyi ma za bas
180a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro/ / rlung gi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'opho ba go 'phang kun bsgrubs te/ 'chi ltas mtshan nyid shes byas la// 'pho ba'i cho ga mtshon par byed// rgyu bcas mi rgyu ji ltar 'dod// sna tshogs rang
180b1(rgyud 'bum): tshad kyis skye 'gyur/ / zung sel bshang lam rtags kyi mthar// dor nas lte bar yang dag bsam// snong kha mgrin par son par srog/ sna bug la ni rnam par tu// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
180b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las/ pha rol gyi grong du rab tu 'jug pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / dpal gshin rje gshed dmar
180b3(rgyud 'bum): bo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ / yon tan mtha' yas pa mnga' bar bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che'i bka' lung gis/ dpon chen kun dga' bcang
180b4(rgyud 'bum): mos yon bdag byas pa'i dus na/ kha tshe'i par+d+ha tar hu la shrI b+ha dra dang / bod kyi mo tsa ba dge slong bro brtan gyis// dpalas spyi'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o//
180b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar swAng+ka du/ shrI mA rak+Sha sa mA ri kan+ta rarA dze nAm/ bad skad du/ dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ gshin ma par byed dam
180b6(rgyud 'bum): la phyag tshal lo/ / 'ad skar bdag gis zas po'i dus gtsigs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs su thams cad gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa bdag med par zla ka la nugs so/
180b7(rgyud 'bum): del mthon par dam 'gyur ro// rab ni sems can che zhus pa/ tshe la rdo rjer gsungs pa dag par pa de bzhin sdom par yang // 'dus pa la sogs drung du yang / mar mang ches mang sa sa sum
181a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed// da ni bdag gis rab bshad bya// kha cig rgyal srid 'dod pa dang // tshe ring nad med phun sum tshogs// zhi ba la sogs las rgyas pa//
181a2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs rgyud du gsungs pa yang // gang yang mngon par spyod pa dang // dgra yi sde nyams byed pa dang // skrod dang 'gugs dang bsod pa dang // sna tshogs rgyud du ma brjod pa'i// 'khrul 'khor 'jig rten gsum
181a3(rgyud 'bum): rnyed dka'/ / khyod la phan pa'i thabs gzung phyir// bshod bya lha mo gus bcas nyon// 'khrul 'khor gang gi mthu stobs kyis// rtag tu rgyal sreng thob byi ni// ji srid nyi ma zla ba bzhin// 'tshe bar 'dod
181a4(rgyud 'bum): rongo gal te min/ / da ni ming gi spyod yul du// khu ba rengs dang sde 'gugs dang // mkha' spyod nyid dang mchog tu myur// de yi sman ni bshad par bya// dang por byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis par snying rje
181a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin no/ / gsum par dga' ba bsgom par bya// bzhi par btang sgoms rnam bsgom bya// 'jig rten chos rnams brgyad po ni// yongs btang stong par bsam par bya// slar yang stong nyid byang
181a6(rgyud 'bum): chub ste/ / gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu// bzhi par yi ge dgod pa'o// ra yig las byung nyi ma la// pU byung sna tshogs rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis ni rdo rje yi// ra ba zhes dang de bzhin du// sa gzhi rdo rje bcings pa
181a7(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ / dang por stong par bsgom par bya// de nas yi ge aM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// de'i steng du yi ge hUM dmar po'o// de'i steng du brlan dang bcas pa'i mgo bos brgyan
181b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbyug pa'i dbus su hUM yig dmar po'o/ / der yang nyi ma la hUM yig go/ de las nges par byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis nam mkha'i phyogs su dpa' bo'i gzugs de la 'jig rten gsum po thams cad bsdus nas
181b2(rgyud 'bum): slar yang de nyid du bcug ste/ dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// sku mdog dmar po g.yon brkyang zhing rnam par 'gyur pa'i zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ ljags bsgral
181b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par byed pa/ klu brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba/ rked pa'i phyogs su stag gi pags pa 'dzag pas rnam par brgyan pa/ mi'u thung gsus pa 'phyang zhing 'jigs
181b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ spyan gsum pa/ shin tu 'jigs par byed pa/ dmar po 'bar ba'i rgyun mi zad pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu 'khrugs pa/ g.yon par sred med kyi bu la sogs pa'i khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang /
181b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yas par bdud bzhi rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i dbyug pa dkar po dang klu'i rgyan la sog pas spras pa/ rdo rje ro langs mas phrag par 'khyud pa/ 'dod chags chen po gcig tu nges par rgyas pa dang mtshungs
181b6(rgyud 'bum): pa gang yin pa'i rje btsun gyi gzugs so/ / rje btsun ma yang de dang 'dra ste khyad par du mgo bo skam pos brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dzag pa dang bcas pa'i mgo bo'i rgyan dang ska rags kyang grol
181b7(rgyud 'bum): grol bar gyur pa'o/ / ma he dmar po la g.yon brkyang gi zhabs kyis gnas pas bzhugs pa'o// phyi nas bcom ldan 'das las skyes pa'i rtse gsum pa'i dbyug pa dkar po'i dbus su slar yang sa bon
182a1(rgyud 'bum): dog dmar po bsam par bya'o/ / phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje yang hUM yig las skyes pa'o// slar yang bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsang ba'i pad+mar yang pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa dngos
182a2(rgyud 'bum): su AHyig gis rdzogs par mtshan po'o/ / de'i rjes su gsang sngags rgyal ba'i bdag nyid can ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ra ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ lte ba'i 'og tu pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa
182a3(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dmar pa'o/ / der yi ge hrIHdmar po nges par son pa'o// spyi bor son pa'i re kha dkar po slar yang bsam par bya zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi dbul gzhug par bya'o// slar yang rdo rje'i lam
182a4(rgyud 'bum): der son par blo bzang pos bsam par bya'o/ / phan tshun gnyis gnyis sgoms par zhugs pas ro mnyam pa'i sa bon gyi gzugs can no// sa bon de lha mo bzhis rang gi gzugs su blang ba ni/
182a5(rgyud 'bum): shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi rnams na gnas pa de rnams rang gi bdag po la blta zhing slong bar byed pas lha mo thams cad blang ba'i ched du glu'i mchod pa byed par blta'o// thugs rje'i khro bo rje btsun
182a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid bzhengs shig/ sa gsum mtha' dag rmongs pa sol mdzod cig/ rdo rje tsartsi ka yis so// jo bo bdud bzhi po ni las rgyal ba// sems ni g.yeng su rje btsun nyid bzhengs shig/ phag mo yis so//
182a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mgron gnyer stong nyid bzhugs sam ci// rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams nyid kyis bzhengs// dbyangs can ma yis so// byang chub rang bzhin 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas// khyod nyid
182b1(rgyud 'bum): stong nyid sems shing ci la bzhugs/ / gau ri'i 'o// rab tu sad par byas nas slar yang de la rab tu zhugs so// de'i 'og tu de la khu ba'i tshogs gyur pa las bdag nyid lha'i bdag nyid can ma he dmar po'i
182b2(rgyud 'bum): steng na de yang gar gyi nyams dgu dang ldan pa/ ban d+hu ka'i me tog lta bu drag po zhal gcig pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ dmar la zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa/ sma ra dmar ser
182b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par byed pa/ me'u thung gsus pa 'phyang zhing 'jigs pa/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa/ ljags bsgril zhing khrag 'dzag pa/ smin ma gnyer zhing drag tu bzhad pa/ mgo bos mtshan pa'i
182b4(rgyud 'bum): dbyug pa dkar po g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa/ phyag g.yon pas myos byed dang khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa 'dzin pa/ nyi ma bye ba'i gzi brjid dang mnyam pa/ g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas
182b5(rgyud 'bum): ba/ gshin rje 'jigs shing bsdigs par mdzad pa/ ma he'i rgyab na gnas pa/ brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa can/ klu brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ mgo bo'i 'phreng ba dbul bcings pa/ mgo
182b6(rgyud 'bum): bopo'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba/ stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ rdo rje phag mos 'khyud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs dang kha dog 'dra ba la gri gug dang thod pa can/ phyag rgya lngas
182b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan pa'i lus can mar brtson pa'i sems kyis bsgom par bya zhing / de nas nga rgyal byas na bdag nyid grub par 'gyur bar the tsom med do// de nas badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma kohaM gi gsang
183a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags klog par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das mas rjes su chags pa chen pos yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rnam par bltas nas pad+mar rdo rje gsor te gnyis ka'i stag
183a2(rgyud 'bum): lpags kyi na bza' 'phyar bar bsgom par bya'o/ / de la 'di dag rjes su chags par byed do zhes byas nas rdo rje pad+ma dag sems la byin nas hUM dmar po yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i rtse mor oM yig ser
183a3(rgyud 'bum): pos byin gyis brlabs pa rab tu bsgom par bya'o/ / AHyig dmar pos pad+ma de'i ze 'bru la AHyig gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// de nas oM sarba ta thA ka ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma koH/
183a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes klog nas/ rdo rje pad+ma mnyam par sbyor ba las bzhengs par bdag nyid bsgom par bya ste/ phyi rol gyi gnyis gnyis bzhin no// de nas 'pho ba'i gnas skabs na bdag nyid du bsgoms pa'i lha mo'i badrin
183a5(rgyud 'bum): khongs su dus mnyam par 'dzag pa'i khams gnyis 'dres par bsgom par bya'o/ / dkar po dang dmar po de dag yongs su gyur pas gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa rnams bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du pad+ma'i
183a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma las skye bar bsgom par bya'o// de'i 'og tu de rnams mdun du bltas nas rang rang gi gnas su so sor gnas par bsam par bya'o// de nas shar gyi 'dab ma'i ni
183a7(rgyud 'bum): ma la gti mug gshin rje gshed tsartsi kA nag mos 'khyud pa'o/ / lho'i 'dab ma'i nyi ma la phra ma gshin rje gshed ser po phag mo ser mos 'khyud pa ste/ de'ang phag pa'i gdong pa can no// nub kyi 'dab ma'i nyi ma
183b1(rgyud 'bum): la 'dod chags gshin rje gshed dmar po dbyangs can ma dkar mo dang sbyar ba'o/ / byang gi 'dab ma'i nyi ma la phrag dog gshin rje gshed sngo bsangs gau ri ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o// yang na thams cad kyang gshin
183b2(rgyud 'bum): rje gshed dmar po dang / ro langs ma dang mtshungs par bsgom par bya'o// me ru mu men gyi bum pa bzhi mnyam sbyar bas gang ba'o// bden bral du gser gyi bum pa gla rtsis gang ba'o// de bzhin du rlung du byu ru'i bum
183b3(rgyud 'bum): pa si gAs gang ba'o/ / dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa ga pur gyis gang ba ji lta ba bzhin no// zod pa gang ba bltas nas nyi ma dang zla ba kun rdzogs pa dag la'o// 'di nyid bde ba chen po dang zung du 'jug pa mchog
183b4(rgyud 'bum): las gzhan pa ma yin pa'o/ / de nas rang gi snying khar pad+ma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i hUM yig las skyes pa de'i 'od zer rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mchod pa kun gyis mchod nas/ dzaHhUM baM hoH
183b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes pas bden par dgug pa dang gzhug pa la sogs pa dang mchod par bya'o/ / sems can rnams thams cad tha ma'i man ngag ji lta bas las so zhes rnal 'byor gnyis pa'o// de nas phyogs bcur bzhugs
183b6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor/ / rnal 'byor ma tshegs de rnams la/ blo dang ldan pas sngar bzhin dgug/ mchod cing dbang bskur la sogs pa// zhes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dbang bskur bzhin pa la spyan ma la/
183b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa rnams kyis kun dga' ba'i thugs kyis sna tshogs par gyur pa'i glu la sogs pa dang gar gyis bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pa rnams kyis/ dbang bskur rin chen chen po la// khams gsum pa
184a1(rgyud 'bum): yis phyag byas pa/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas la byung ba sbyin par bya// zhes klog cing bstod pas/ dkyil 'khor ba thams cad kyi dbul khu ba ster du 'byung ba las/
184a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpas rgyas btab par bsam mo// cho ga'o// gti mug dang / phra ma dang / 'dod chags dang / phrag dog rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs par byed pa ni/ kye kye gshin rje gshed dmar po// bla ma
184a3(rgyud 'bum): srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin/ / kho bos khyod mthong rnam par 'jigs// bla ma khro bo'i rang bzhin spongs// khyod kyis gar mdzad sa steng dang // sa bla dang ni sa 'og g.yo// chags pas brgyan pa'i khro bo yi//
184a4(rgyud 'bum): gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs lags/ sku ni sbom thung dmar po ste// rnam pa sna tshogs sku sprul pa// rdo rje dbyangs can ma yis btud// gar mdzad khyod ni bde ba che// hrIHSh+T+rIHgsang sngags dag gis ni// khyod
184a5(rgyud 'bum): ni sa gsum 'khrul pa sel/ / rje btsun snying rje'i khro bo lags// gar mdzad khyod ni 'gro la gzigs// oM sarba ta thA ka ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa at+ma kohaM zhes so// de nas sngar bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor
184a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi steng du me'i dkyil 'khor/ / de'i steng du oM yig yongs su gyur pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi steng du AHyig yongs su gyur pa las thod pa bsgom par bya'o zhes so// de'i dbus su bdud
184a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsi lnga dang / sha lA dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / sha dang / zhal sogs pa dbyug pas dkrugs pas ro mnyam par byas la chos nas rgya skyegs kyi khu ba lta bur blta'o// oM AHhUM/ zhes pa 'dis bsil
184b1(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur par byas nas hUM yig yongs su gyur pa'i lce bu gu can bsams nas btung bar bya'o/ / rang rang gi khas ni lha mo'i kha ru sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis kyang bsams nas kun tu spyad
184b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / de nas bdud rtsi myangs pas yang dag par dgos par gyur nas phyi nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya'o// snying khar gnas pa'i sa bon dang mtshan ma bstan par byas nas gsang sngags bzlas par
184b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes pa ji srid 'dod par bsams nas bzlas par bya'o// ldang bar 'dod na rang gi lus kyi 'od zer gyis sems can gyi don byas nas thams cad
184b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag la rab tu bcug ste/ yid kyis gshin rje gshed lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ji ltar bde bar gnas par bya'o zhes pa'o// lhan cig skyes pa'i gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyi gnas skabs
184b5(rgyud 'bum): ni bdag nyid kyi gzugs lta burang bzhin gyis grub pa'i gshin rje gshed du nga rgyal byed par brjod par bya ste/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa gshin rje gsher kho na nga'o zhes so//
184b6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor chen po'o// rnal 'byor bzhi brjod pa 'dis thun gsum nyid kyis sam thun bzhis kyang rung ste/ ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i dus su rtag tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ji srid du'o zhes so/
184b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'bum phrag gi mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya ste/ sngon du bsnyen par byas par 'gyur ro// de nas las thams cad pa'i zab kyi cho gas mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / me tog dmar pos stong
185a1(rgyud 'bum): zag bcur sbyin sreg bya/ / re zhi gsang sngags bathags nas sa// man+t+raHhrIHla pa kun na man pa na dan tA d+hu d+hU wal Ta swAH/ de nas gsang sngags kyi sngags kyi dngas grus
185a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / las thams cad kyi dngos grub bo// dmar po zhes pa'i lha la sogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / 'dir bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya che'i/
185a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur pa dang // rnam pa ci yis bsgrub bya ba// de yang bcom ldan gsung du gsol// kha yis kha la'o byas nas// phan tshun dam po yis ni 'khyud// mchog tu dga' ba'i gzugs kyis ni// /
185a4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ma bshad par bya yis nyon// gar byed pa'i 'byung gnas rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyi gzugs gang yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchog tu rnam par ma chad par 'bab pa ste// dper na chu klung gi rgyun rab tu 'bar/
185a5(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin no// 'dir ji srid du bsgoms pa las skyon sngags bzlas par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs gal te myur du grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ma yin no// ji srid du 'dir dngos grub kyang phyag rgya
185a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i dngos grub kho na de'o/ / 'di rnams kyang rnal 'byor goms pa kho nas thams cad sgrub par byed kyi gzhan du ma yin no// goms pa'i sbyor bar 'gyur ba ni skyes pa dang / byung ba dang / ma byung ba dang /
185a7(rgyud 'bum): sngon du gnas pa rnams thar pa'i don dang / 'dod pa'i don rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid kyi dngos grub kyang skye ba 'di nyid la'o// las thams cad yongs su spangs nas der son pa'i yid
185b1(rgyud 'bum): du gyur nas/ ji srid rang zhing 'ongs nas smra bar byed de/ kye kye sgrub pa po mchog ci yin pa de stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas mchod yon byin nas phyag byas te/ dngos grub blang bar byas pa de sbyin par byed do//
185b2(rgyud 'bum): oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na A gats+tsha A gats+tsha hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas rdo rje ro langs ma sgrub par 'dod na rdo rje ro langs ma'i gzugs brnyan byas te/ ras sam 'bras bu la byas te/ rje btsun gyi kha dog dang dbyibs
185b3(rgyud 'bum): su thog mar yang dag par gnas te/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ de dag rang rang so so'i gzugs ma 'dres pas kun tu mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// ji srid du 'ongs nas sgrub pa po la 'khyud de/
185b4(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ kye sgrub pa po khyod kyi bka' bsgo ba ci lags/ sgrub pa pos mchod yon byin nas smra bar bya ste/ bdag gi chung mar 'gyur ba'o zhes pas chung mar 'gyur ro// de la longs spyod pas gshin rje
185b5(rgyud 'bum): gshed kyi gzugs su grub par 'gyur ro/ / oM dwe Sha ra ti A gats+tsha A gats+tsha nu da nu da tru Ta tru Ta hUM dzaHswA hA/ yang na/ oM badz+ra bet+tA li A gats+tsha A gats+tsha hUMHdz+raHswA hA/ gzhon nu ma lo bcu drug lon pa yan
185b6(rgyud 'bum): lag bzang mo bag mar blangs pas sam/ bskyed nas skal ldan mar byas te/ dbang bskur ba'i rnal 'byor ma sngags kyi bsgom pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par mchod de/ lag pa g.yon pas 'khyud

191a7(rgyud 'bum): rngadza yab dkar mos brgyan pa yis/ / lag pa dag gis rdor dril yang / yang nas yang du gtor ma sbyin// ji ltar kha cig yon phul bas// gang gis mnyes par 'gyur ba yin// dbus su'ang de dang
191b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs par bya/ / mtha' ru bzhi 'gyur du bya'o// dge 'dun bza' ba yang bya'o// dman dang zhan la rjes brtse bas// so sor bdag ni dam tshig mchod// shes rab bcas shing yon dang bcas// rigs
191b2(rgyud 'bum): ni lnga po rnams kyis ni/ / de nas no bcas bza' ba yi// me la sbyin sreg bya ba'o// blo bzangs 'bad pas gzhag mi bya// dbyug pa lhan cig de sgo bzhir// rnga bo che yi sgra bya'o// gang dang gang du sgra thos pa//
191b3(rgyud 'bum): pha rol sde ni rab bros nas// rna ba rnams ni gsal bar byed// mig gis mthong bar mi byed cing // sde rnams dbang du byed pa dang // mgo la zug rngur 'gyur ba dang // skrod pa dag ni byed pa yin// yang na/
191b4(rgyud 'bum): bya'i gshog pa la bcings nas brjod par bya ste/ gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de nyid du pha rol gyi sde rnams ni rang gi chung ma'ang yongs su dor nas spro bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid g.yul la mchog tu gzhol
191b5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / glang po che rnams dang rta la sogs pa rnams kyis ldog ste/ bdag nyid kyi sngas 'gro bar byed do// gang gi tshe sde tshan gsum gyis g.yul byas nas dum bu dum bus ltung bar byed do//
191b6(rgyud 'bum): po nya ba gcig pus gnas pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'tsho ba tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed do// de'i thal bas pha rol gyi sde gshog par byed pa'am/ kun tu bskor bas sgrib par 'gyur ro// glo bur du glang po
191b7(rgyud 'bum): che'i tshad kyi rdo ba 'bab par byed do/ / char chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// klu'i tshul gyi sgrub pas sbyin sreg 'bum gyis 'dod pa rnyed do// shi ba'i pha rol tu rang dgra bo de rnams 'bangs su 'gyur ro//
192a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni lum 'gyur gyi sras dang 'jig rten gsum la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// de nas shings pa la'i 'bras bu 'bum phrag bcig gis rol 'bras bur gyu / zhes pa
192a2(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje gshed dmar por rgyud du dngos grub phran tshogs kyi las rab 'byams kyi le'u ste bzhi po la/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de nas b+ha ga la rtags yang dag
192a3(rgyud 'bum): par sbyor ba'i khu ba 'di nu ma rab tu 'phel par bya ba la nad nyams pa las dang / yid bud med kyi dbang du gyur pa las dang / de 'ching bar byed pa las kyang khu bas nu ma la bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba
192a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis maka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis ngal zhus pa legs so zhes gnang nas/ dang por phung po sbyang bya ste// phyi nas rab 'byams las brtsam bya// 'bras bu gsum
192a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi phye ma gzung / / ya bak+Sha rA pA lA sha// zos nas bu ram 'thungs pa las// srin dang 'khogs pa rab tu 'joms// til mar ke ta kI'i khu ba// hi la mo ci khu ba dang // rgyam tshwa 'thungs shing byugs pa
192a6(rgyud 'bum): de'i/ / srin bu shig rnams 'joms par 'gyur/ til mar ke ta kA'i khu ba// pi tsin+de wa Na yang dag ldan// drag mo bla ma Na sbyor bas// nI wa Na yis 'joms par 'gyur// gil mo tsa'i khu ba dang // rgya mtshwa
192a7(rgyud 'bum): cung zad yang dag ldan/ / grib mar rab tu 'jug byas nas// bi tsi pi tu 'joms par byed// thil mar ke ta kA'i khu ba/ rgya skyegs rtsa bar swa byas nas// 'thung ba'i sbyor bas til mar 'joms// kur+tha r+Na lu
192b1(rgyud 'bum): rkang mar dang / / pi rtsi nI wa Na yang dag ldan// klu yi phye ma 'thungs gyur na// bad kan rnams kyi sbrang rtsi 'joms// nyi ma re rer bya ba'o// phyi nas sman ni brtsam par bya// de nas 'bras bu sbyin par gnas// gzhan
192b2(rgyud 'bum): du 'bras bu med la dga'/ / shal ma li shun phye ma dang // tap+ta snying pos bza' bar bya// rnam bdun bsngags la tho rangs su// rung ste bza' ba za byed la// slar bdag ji srid 'tshe yi bar// khrag dang khum
192b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar byed/ / oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na i ma di bya a mr-i ti ma ku ru hUM phaT/ sa Ti taM dang ma bi ShaM// na ri ke la dag la yang // wa sha'i nying khu yang dag ldan// phag las byung ba'i tshil khu yis// rtags dang rna ba ru
192b4(rgyud 'bum): mami'i dang / / b+ha ga yi yang rnam par mnyes// lus kun rnam par mnyes pa yis// 'phel bar 'gyur bar the tshom med// nges par sen mos bsdigs byas nas// bskus nas kyang ni de nyid kyis// skye gnas
192b5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rab gzhug bya/ / rgas pas skye gnas 'phel bar 'gyur// sa 'bru'i pags pa snyigs ma yis// yungs kar til mar la btso bya// nu ma mnyes pas 'phel bar byed// mgo bo ro rak+Sha ra 'joms
192b6(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / yungs kar dkar po shu dag dang // dri bzangs ni dA tri byas pas// snyigs ma yis ni ling ga 'phal// nu ma rna ba 'phel bar 'gyur// gzhan gyis mi thub dkar po dang // lag ldan pi pi ling byas
192b7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / ma he yi yang mar gsar gyi// 'thungs pas ling ga 'phel bar byed// da d+hur khu ba rta bon po// rtsa bar bcug nas ma he yi// mar gsar dang ni bsres pa dang // da d+hur 'bras bu go Da ka/ nyin
193a1(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshan du gdung bar bya/ / de nas mgo'i sa gu za mnyes nas sngar brjod pas mtshan mo gsum du byugs nas man par bya ste 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lham bu chu shel gyi skye mas mar
193a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs nas btsun mo'i skye gnas kyi nang du byug par bya'o/ / shi thi la yis skye gnas dam por 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i sa bon dang / ut+pa la'i sa bon dang / pad+ma'i rtsa lag dang / pu shel tsi dang /
193a3(rgyud 'bum): tha sgad rnams nyim gyi til mar la gtso bar bya'o// des rna ka'i yan lag mngon par bgrod dka' ba'i don du/ she zil lar nyam nga bar 'dor ba la sogs pa 'joms par byed do// no mA la shun
193a4(rgyud 'bum): pa bskol bas b+ha ga bkru bar bya'o/ / nim+ba'i shun pas bdug par bya'o// gzhon nu ma bzang mo nyid dri bzang po can skal ba bzang po la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ba tha'i cha

193a7(rgyud 'bum): skra rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / ma he dang / phag pa dang / glang po che dang / khyim bya rnams kyi mar khu dag gis mnyes pas nu ma la sogs pa rnams 'phel lo// dzA ti'i me tog gi til mar gyis
193b1(rgyud 'bum): btags na b+ha ka 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / ma ge'i mar gsar dang / shu dag dang / shing ku Ta rnams lte bar mnyes par bya ste nu ma 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rnga mo'i chus bkrus pa las ling ga 'phel bar 'gyur
193b2(rgyud 'bum): b.re dang 'dra'o/ / brjod pa la'i rtsa ba dang ba las byung ba'i mar gyis btung bar bya ste sbrum par 'gyur ro// bal dang / A ti ba lA dang / shi ta dang / shin rwa dang / ti la mar dang / phung ba'i sbrang rtsi dang / sngang
193b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa btung bar bya ste sbrum par 'gyur ro/ / ba la'i rtsa ba'i chu yis btags nas btung bar bya ste khrag 'bab pa 'joms par byed do// nas kyi phye ma dang / ba lang ga gcin dang / sra rtsi po ga gal te

193b6(rgyud 'bum): ba 'phel lo/ / skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang / chu dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi rnams brjod pa'i dus su bza' bar bya'o// mig la sdug pa dang shes rab kyang skye bar byed do// skyu ru ra'i phye ma dang 'o ma la sogs pa bza' bar bya/

196b1(rgyud 'bum): ru rta dang / sbrang rtsis btags la dril phyis byas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// dad+hod pa la'i rtsa ba la tam+bu la yis sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i dbyug pa dang / shu dag dang / ru rta dang /
196b2(rgyud 'bum): na ga ge sar dang / tam+bu la byin na dbang du 'gyur ro// ge'u waM dang rang byung gi me tog gi thig les skal ba dang ldan pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gi'u wa dang / shing shu lo la dang / b+hing+ga rA dzas lhan cig skar ma rgyal

196b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin no/ / skar ma rgyal la da d+hu r-i'i rtsa ba bzung nas skar ma skag la wA Da'i shing shun no// me bzhi la 'dab ma'o// nag pa la me tog go// snrubs la rtsa ba'o// cha mnyam pa'i phye ma la sbrang rtsis bAN+Di
196b6(rgyud 'bum): ka ru bya'o/ / ra sa la gtums nas bskam par bya'o// tam+bu la la byin nas dung gi phye mas dbang du 'gyur ro// shing arka'i sol ba dang / smyur byed dang / khyi'i mig dang / rkang pa'i mthe bos gang
196b7(rgyud 'bum): gi ming sris te che ge mo shog cig ces brjod pas 'ong bar byed do/ / du ba med pa'i me la gdung bar bya'o// skar ma rgyal la gnan gyis mi thub pa'i rtsa ba bton te me'i zhun gyi mar khus de la bskus nas zong pa
197a1(rgyud 'bum): ru dud pa gtang bar bya'o/ / mig sman des bud med dang skyes pa dbang du byedang // rgya spos dang / byi thang ka dang / seng ldeng dang / rurta byin na mi 'dod pa 'joms par byed do//

197a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byed do/ / na ma sh+tsaN+Da lI che ge mo me wa sha mA na ya swA hA/ stong phrag bcu bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas bsnyen pa khri'o// dur khrod kyi thal ba la bcu bzhi la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsdad
197a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ bud med kyi mgo la byin na dbang du 'gyur te/ rtag tu nges par sems pas slar yang dga' bzhin pa'i sems dang ldan no// khu ba rengs pa'o// shing khu byug gi mag dang / shing rta'i rtsa ba dang /
197a5(rgyud 'bum): d+harU ra dang / gzhan yang byang gi muk+ta shi kha rkeng pa la bcings nas khu ba rengs par byed do// sra rtsi pog dang / wA ma t+ti ti dang / gzhan yang shar dkar po dang pu kha'i rtsa bas kyang 'khrig pa las khu ba
197a6(rgyud 'bum): rengs par byed do/ / 'jam 'bras la sbubs byas nas dngul chus bkang ste srad bus rked pa la bcings na khu ba 'dzin no// phag pa'i til mar dang / rgya skyegs dang / rany+dzi ta dang / arka dkar
197a7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i shing bal gyi snying pos sbar na khu ba rengs so/ / sa'i 'khril shing gi phye ma dang / dbus kyi snying po til mar gyis bsreg par bya ste/ khu ba rengs so// til gyi til mar dang sa'i 'khril shing phye
197b1(rgyud 'bum): mar byas nas sam me tog gi mar khu btung bar bya'o/ / des rkang pa'i mthil la bskus na khu ba rengs so// khA ta dkar po'i rje ngar gyi rtsa ba dang / pad+ma dkar po'i ge sar dang / sbrang rtsi rnams kyis
197b2(rgyud 'bum): lte bar blugs na khu ba rengs so/ / pad+ma'i 'dab mas khyab 'jug gnon pa'i rtsa bar 'dab mas dkris nas wA rdzi dkri bar bya ste/ khu ba rengs so// ba zlar khu ba'i mig sman dang / dngul chu dang
197b3(rgyud 'bum): bi bi ling dang / rgyam tshwa dang / ru rta dang / pug ron gyi thun rnams kyis ling ga la dril phyis byas pa las khu ba rengs so// kus+tha dang / Udz+nyA ba li dang / badz+ra dang / shri ga byugs na steng du 'gyur ro/
197b4(rgyud 'bum): shing ka pad kyi rtsa ba dang / darbi dang / ra'i gcin gyis btags nas lang ga la kun tu byugs te// pad+ma dbye bar bya ste/ lan gsum du steng du 'gyur ro// tsha ba'i chus bkrus na rab tu zhi bar
197b5(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / 'gron bu'i nang du dngul chus bkang nas kha ru bzhag na khu ba rengs so// ring gcin gyis dbang po chu lha mo la nyi ma bdun du bgo bar bya'o// des dril phyis byas pa las ling ga rengs par
197b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / d+ha d+hu ra'i rtsa ba dang / kA mA tsI'i rtsa ba dang / oM ShaN+Di'i rtsa ba dang / ka pur gyi khu bas btags nas ling ga la byugs na 'dod pa'i bud med 'dzag par byed do// rgya mtsha dang / tshal dang /
197b7(rgyud 'bum): ga pur dang / g+ho Sha'i phye ma sbrang rtsis btags nas ling+gi la byugs na'ang de bzhin no// phug ron gyi brun sbrang rtsis btags nas ling+ga la bskus na 'dod pa'i bud med 'dzag par byed do// kA mA tsI'i rtsa/
198a1(rgyud 'bum): kha dang tAm+bu la shin tu dga' ba'i dus su bud med kyis zos na de 'dzag par byed do// ba ka dang / nA DI dang / mal+li kAM rgya ma tshwa bsres par byas nas rang gi sdigs mdzub kyi sor mor
198a2(rgyud 'bum): bcug ste/ de'i b+ha gar bcug nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa ji srid du de 'dzag par byed kyi bar du bskyod par bya'o// ga pur dang / dngul chu dang / tsha la dang / shing ha ti dang / pi pi ling dang /
198a3(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi rnams kyis byugs na bud med 'dzag par byed do// shing dza yAn+ti'i rtsa bas btags nas 'bras thug po che dang / chu bsres pa'i zla mtshan gyi dbus su de'i skye gnas la rab tu byugs na bud
198a4(rgyud 'bum): med mo gsham du 'gyur bar the tshom med do/ / sA lA sha'i sa bon btags nas byug par bya zhing / mar dang sbrang rtsi 'thungs pa las khrag gi mtshan ma'i bud med mo gsham du 'gyur ro// cha gas
198a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / phye ma leb kyi phye ma dang / phyis sa skye gnas su byin na dam por 'gyur ro// khu ba rengs pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // mgrin pa bteg nas dam 'khyud cing // lba
198a6(rgyud 'bum): la yang yang 'o byas nas/ / rgyal po'i dngos por byas pa zhig/ 'khor los sgyur bar ji ltar 'gyur// gang zhig nye bar ma zhugs pa/ gnas gcig tu ni rgyal srid 'gyur// dgra bo g.yo med
198a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / / dga' zhing zhabs la 'dud pa 'am// kun tu 'gugs shing 'dren pa dang // mnga' bdag de bzhin der bzlas pa// sems can don du bdag la shod// bcom ldan 'das kyi
198b1(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / bris sku 'am ni gzugs brnyan la// nyer spyod lnga rnams kyis mchod nas// drug cu rtsa bzhi yongs rdzogs pa'i// gtor ma thun mtshams gsum du sbyin// gser 'bum de bzhin
198b2(rgyud 'bum): kham por brgyad/ / 'khrul 'khor rgyas pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin sngags la mchog gzhol ba// slar yang shing rta kham por sogs// mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba yis// gtso bo dpal gyi khyim steng
198b3(rgyud 'bum): du/ / aHyig 'khor lor nges bcing bya// gsang sngags rig pa prIHSh+TiHsogs// blo dang ldan pas dus gsum mchod// ka Da ka yi steng gi char// dkyil 'khor lnga po byas nas ni// legs par
198b4(rgyud 'bum): bkri ba byin nas ni/ / 'bad pas sa kun sbyang bar bya// sa gzhi yongs su bzung byas nas// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bya ba yin// rdul tshon mdzes pas bri ba'am// yang na 'bras ni thug po che//

198b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor ldan/ / srad bus thig gdab shes rab can// lha mo'i dkyil 'khor ches mang ba// rnam pa ji bzhin mngon bri bya// 'dab bzhir de bzhin bri bya ba// khyad par dbyug pa dkar po'o//
198b7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su'ang dbyug pa dkar po ni// sna tshogs rdo rje bzhin zi bya// rigs ni lnga po mtshungs par bya// skal ba byas nas legs par bslabs// rgyud la sogs pa'i sbyor bas 'di// rab tu 'bad pas
199a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur sbyin/ / slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa de slar de bzhin no// slob dpon bzhi po rnams nyid kyis// yang dang yang du gtor ma sbyin// dril bu rdo rje mnyam par
199a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis// kun tu ser pori gos nyid dang // mi yi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// gser dngul zangs lcags bzhi yis ni// bum pa dkyil 'khor yang dag dgod// dbus su
199a3(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi bum pa yang / / sna tshogs rin chen legs par mdzes// gser dngul zangs dang lcags las byung // 'khrul 'khor bzhi po rnams dang ni// dbus su gser gyi 'khrul 'khor ni// me tog dmar pos

199a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod kyang / blo bzang 'bad pas bya ba yin// shar du wa DaHlho ru ni/ a shwat+thaHnub wa ku la// byang du na ka ge sar ro// shar du me tog dkar lhor sar// de bzhin nub dmar byang du yang // ljang khu de bzhin
199a6(rgyud 'bum): steng du yang / / me ru la Da rje rigs dang // bram ze rdo rje rin chen sogs// shar gyi phyogs su rab sbyin phyir// skye bo 'di dag sa ga la// sna tshogs rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa'i// mi bdag gis ni ngos bzhi ru/

199b1(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ / sna tshogs la sogs rgyan dang gser// gang ba'i snod la de brjod pa// sa steng thams cad gnod med pa'i// lha yi rgyal srid bdag la stsol// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang // dbang po nyid kyang

199b3(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan mchog gzhol ma/ / blo ldan gus pas cung zad nyon// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bklag/ dzam+b+ha la la chu sbyin dang // yi dgas gtor ma re bzhin ston// brtse ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten skyong // deng khyod la sogs
199b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya/ / mi bdag bdag la bden par smos// mnga' bdag bden las gzhan min pas// mi bdag gis bden brjod par bya// mgo dang snying khar rdo rje ni// lan gsum byin nas rgyal srid bya// dkyil 'khor
199b5(rgyud 'bum): bsten par bya ba'o/ / gnas su bdag la smra ba ni// deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas// mi yi 'gro ba legs par thob// de nas dpal ldan gshin rje gshed// dmar po'i rnal 'byor pa bdag ni// 'jig
199b6(rgyud 'bum): rten gsum rgyal srid byas nas/ / phyi nas dbang po la sogs pa// zlos pa bdag gis byed pa yin// de bzhin slar yang ke lA shar// bud med rgyal srid byas nas ni// rgyal srid 'byor grub ches mang dang //
199b7(rgyud 'bum): mtha' dag rgyal srid khur bzung nas// mi bdag 'phrog byed zla ba ltar// sangs rgyas nyid dang dngos grub kun// gang gis myur du 'byung 'gyur ba// da ltar lha yis de mdzad la/ mnga' bdag bdag la
200a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog stsol cig/ de bzhin kho nar bden dang bden// sa yi gnas su phyag byas nas// bzod par gsol nas khyim 'gro bya// de bzhin sna tshogs klu dang ni// rol mo la sogs pa rnams
200a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / spro bar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya// nyi ma so sor nyer spyod bcas// mtshan mo phyed nas tshogs 'khor dang // shes rab bcas shing yon dang bcas// rim 'dis nyi ma nyi shu ldan// zla ba drug gis
200a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod sbyin rdzogs/ / de bzhin kun tu 'ongs nas gar// glang po rta la sogs pa'i yon// phyin nas mchog ni blang bar bya// de tshe yang dang yang du ni// gang gang mi bdag gang yin te// gzhan du pho nya rab tu
200a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jog/ rgyal srid bdag gir gzung ba nyid// gal te min na chad pa la// rab tu bzhag nas 'byin par byed// sna tshogs rin chen la sogs pa// myur 'gro rnams ni 'bul bar byed// rang phan rang gi skal pa
200a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / rab mchog gal te 'dod na ni// de yis rgyal srid sbyin par byed// gang gang ming gis mi 'ong na// de yi 'khrul 'khor seng ldeng gi/ me la gdung bar bya ba yin// skad cig de las de rmongs te//
200a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi yul du 'gro bar 'gyur// gtso bo'i thab kyi thal ba gang // gang gi nad la sogs byin pa// de dag nye bar zhi bar byed// gal te gso sbyong bya ba yi// dbang po nyid ni thob par byed// sbyin sreg gig/

203b1(rgyud 'bum): nas reg cing 'bab pa yis/ / me yi dkyil 'khor brjod bya ste// g.yon dang g.yas la reg pa las// dbang chen gyi ni 'khor lor 'gyur// brtan thob dal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'gyur// brkyang ma dang ni ro
203b2(rgyud 'bum): ma dag/ g.yon dang g.yas su gnas pa'o// kun 'dar ma ni dbus phyogs su// lhan cig skyes pa rjes su byed// 'jug par 'gyur dang 'byin pa dang // gnas pa g.yon med ngo bo la// rnam 'joms
203b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa srad bu'i rlung / / ji srid 'tsho ba'i 'jug par 'gyur// 'jug pa bum pa can zhes bya// de yi 'dzin las gang ba can// dbyung ba re tsa ka shes bya// g.yo med dum pa can du 'gyur// rlung ni rab tu
203b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'i tshogs/ / stong phrag brgya la sogs pa'i grangs// sangs rgyas mgon po'i gsung ji bzhin// skad cig de las 'grub par 'gyur// rlung tshogs gcig gyur gang yin ni// shes rab la ni dam
203b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud pas/ / zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag ldan// mngon shes ldan shes par 'gyur// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas/
203b6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi bud med dam du 'khyud// snying kha yis ni snying kha ru// gsang bar gsang bas yang dag sbyor// kha yis kyang ni khar byas nas/ byed pa med pa lhur len pas// snying khar gnas pa'i sa
203b7(rgyud 'bum): bon pa ni/ / kun tu gang bar bsgom par bya// de gnas gang yin de nyid kyis// mi ni thams cad shes par 'gyur// kun tu dgongs pa tsam gyis ni// byung dang 'byung 'gyur da lta bar// pha rol sem
204a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang shes par byed/ / bden pa bden par smra bar byed// de bzhin sbyar ba de nyid kyis// rna ba la ni rnam bsgom bya// drung na gnas pa'i sgra ji bzhin// bstan pa kun ni zhan par
204a2(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / de bzhin mig la rab bsgoms nas// 'jig rten gsum yang lta bar byed// sna la de bzhin bsams nas ni// dri rnams thams cad shes par byed/ lce la de bzhin bsams nas ni// thag
204a3(rgyud 'bum): rings myong bya rab rtogs byed/ / rang gi rtags rtser de bzhin bsam// reg bya thams cad shes par byed// de bzhin mgo bo'i dbus bsams nas// nus pa thams cad rab 'phel byed// gang dang gang du
204a4(rgyud 'bum): rlung gnas pa/ / ro mnam gyur pa byas pa ni// 'gags pa de dang de nyid la// de nyid so sor rtogs par byed// zhi dang rgyas pa can dang dbang // de bzhin dgug dang gsod pa dang // skrod par byed dang thams
204a5(rgyud 'bum): cad nyid/ / sgom pa kho nas rab sgrub byed// bum pa can sogs rab sbyor bas// lta stangs bzhi ni nges sbyor bya// g.yon du 'ang lta ba'i lta stangs ni// bum pa can gyis dbang du byed// g.yas nas dgug
204a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba ni/ / gang ba can gyis nges par sbyar// dpral bar gnas par lta stangs gang // ra tsa ka yis gsod par byed// sne rtser gnas pa'i lta stangs ni// bum pa can gyis rengs par byed// che ba'i ma
204a7(rgyud 'bum): tog bum pa can/ / rngon pa'i shing la'ang re tsa kas// mnyam par zos la re tsa kas// g.yo bcas rtsal bum pa can// sngon du sta stangs nges sbyor ba// zla ba drug tu bsam par bya// kun gyi nus
204b1(rgyud 'bum): pa sbyor ba ni/ / sems 'gog pa las 'grub par byed// sems 'gog pa las rdung 'gog ste// 'gog las sems kyang 'gog par 'gyur// phan tshun son pa bcings pa'o// shes rab thabs
204b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig rdo rje dang / / pad+ma mnyam par rtogs pa la// 'gog pa'i bde ba zos pa ni// thams cad yang dag 'grub par 'dod// tshangs pa khyab 'jug la sogs lnga// sngags pa de yi lhan cig tu/
204b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs rten pa kun ci slar yang // ci bgyi yod par 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud du// thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa yang // rtsod ldan dus su rab tu spyod// dngos grub
204b4(rgyud 'bum): med par mi lta ste/ / rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang // rtsod dus la'ang bden par 'grub// slar yang lha dang bcas pa yi// dngos grub mchog ni bstan par bya// sbas pa kun mkhyen

204b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'o/ / // bcom ldan gshin rje gshed kyi ming // dmar brjod pa yi ming can la// ya yig gis ni ci zhig brjod// de bzhin ma yig gis kyang ni// slar yang de yi A
204b7(rgyud 'bum): yig gis/ / ri yig gis ci brjod par bya// rak+ta nyid ni ci yi ming // mnga' bdag bden pas gsung du gsol// legs so legs so gang dris pa// de ni bshad kyis nyozhon cig dang // ya yig
205a1(rgyud 'bum): gis ni rlung yang ste/ / gshin rje gshed dmar por brjod bya// de nas ya yig mchog tu dga'// ma yig gnyis par brjod par bya// A ri dga' ba gsum pa'o// rak+ta bzhi pa'i
205a2(rgyud 'bum): ming can na/ / yang na rlung dang ldan pa la// de yi thabs ni A yig ste// i yig reg pa'i dbang po'o// rak+ta gnyis med sbyor ba'o// yang na rak+ta 'dod chags rgyal// rlung gis ro skul der so na sems/

205a4(rgyud 'bum): mug gshin rje mthar byed ni/ / rnam snang mdzad do pra ma yi// gshin rje mthar byed rin chen 'byung // 'dod chags gshin rje mthar byed ni// snang mtha' phrag dog gshin mthar byed// don grub dbus su

205a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / zhes pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du ming mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / ro langs mas ni dam 'khyud nas// 'o byas tshems kyis ma mchu bzung /

205b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i lha rnams gzhag par bya'o/ / oM hrIHSh+NIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM sarba big+h+nAM ga NA sa pA ri wa rA na A kaR+Sha ya dzaH/ zhes pa'i sngags 'dis shar phyogs kyi cha pa rnams la bka' bsgo ba dang / rang nyid
205b5(rgyud 'bum): song nas bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kyi mgrin par zhags pas bcings nas snying khar lcags kyus phug ste 'gugs bzhin par bsam par bya'o/ / dbang po ser po spyan stong pa phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pas
205b6(rgyud 'bum): srungs dkar po la zhon pa'o/ / lho ru gshin rje nag po lag na dbyug pa can ma he la zhon pa'o// nub tu chu lha dkar po chu srin ma ka ra la zhon pa lag na ku mud can no// byang gaM 'dab mar gnod sbyin ser
205b7(rgyud 'bum): po mi la zhon pa lag na dpal 'bras thogs pa'o/ / 'di rnams thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rin che'i cod pan can// gshin rje ni nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od can no// lhag ma rnams
206a1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od can no/ / dbang ldan gyi 'dab mar 'byung po'i bdag po dkar po mig gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan can/ khyu mchog la zhon pa/ lag na mdung
206a2(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa/ stag gi pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa/ lus thal bas byugs pa/ rus pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zla ba'i gdan dang zla ba'i 'od do// me'i 'dab ma la me lha ser po bongs thung zhing

206a4(rgyud 'bum): ba can lag na gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa/ khros pa smin ma khro gnyer dang bcas pa nag po ro'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi mi'i 'od mnga' ba'o// rlung phyogs kyi 'dab ma la rlung lha ljang zhing dmar ba

206b1(rgyud 'bum): do/ / lho'i 'dab ma la nyi ma dmar po phyag gnyis pa pad+ma 'dzin pa rta ljang khu la zhon pa rin po che'i cod pan dang rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa 'od sngo bsangs can no// nub kyi 'dab ma la lhag pa ser po khyu mchog

206b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams so/ / 'o ga gi chos 'byung gi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la/ nor rgyas kyi bu sar po// klu pad+ma da kar po// klu stobs kyi rgyu dmar po/ klu 'jog po nag po/ klu dung skyong mi'i gdong pa can rgyan
206b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'chang ba/ mgo bor gdengs ka dang bcas pas mtshan pa/ lha ma yin dang sems can dmyal ba'i sems can dang lhan cig pa'o// ze 'bru lhag ma la kru lhag ma rin po che'i cod
207a1(rgyud 'bum): ban can mi'i gdong pa can no/ / 'dir gdengs can 'di dag bstan par byas nas/ slar de dag yongs su gyur pas dpal gshin rje gshed mthar byed kyi gzugs kyis
207a2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par byas te/ sku gsung thugs kyi rab tu sbyor ba las steng du gnas pa ni sku'i rnam pa'o// dbus su gnas pa ni slar yang mi bskyod pa'i rnam pa'o// 'og tu gnas pa ni gsung rdo rje'i

207a5(rgyud 'bum): rak+ta mu khA ya/ rak+ta b+hu dzA ya/ rak+ta sha rI rA ya/ rak+ta mur+d+ha mA lA b+ha ra NA ya/ rak+Sha pad+ma A sa nA ya/ rak+ta ba ra na b+hU Sha NA ya/ i maM ba liM gr-ih+Na gr-ib+ta tsa tur+m+ma ra nI bA rA ya ni bA rA ya/ tA sa ya thA sa ya/

207b1(rgyud 'bum): kA ya swAt+ma/ ma pa shun ya mAn+ta kA ya swAH/ oM rA ga ya nAn kA ya swA hA/ ma ir+yA yasan+d+ha k+Sha sa swA hA/ oM bam tsa kA me swA hA/ a adza bA na rbe swAk+Sha/ a laHsA ra sa t+ye swAhA/ oM badz+rag ng+ya swAH
207b2(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra bet+tA li ba li pra tIts+tsha sA hA/ gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod// ga shi ni rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs// ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// sku yi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// pra ma rdo rje'i rang

208b7(rgyud 'bum): ngogogs chen por khyod bkrus te/ / de bzhin gshegs pas mngon dbang bskur// de yang gang dang gang 'gro ba// der ni sangs rgyas 'ong bar byed// kun tu byang chub sems dpa' zhing // sna tshogs sems can phan
209a1(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / gdar dgod par gyis shig ces// phyogs bcur rnam par gnas pa yis// bdud rnams kun tu 'bros par byed// thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni// khyed zhabs kun
209a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis gdud par byed/ / sna tshogs gzugs 'chang bud med ni// sna tshogs 'dod pas 'khrugs par rigs// btsogs ma til mchog ma la sogs// bkug nas rdzogs par longs spyod byed/
209a3(rgyud 'bum): ces pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du rlung gi de nyid de le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas rlung gi rnam grangs ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol// rab tu bya nas
209a4(rgyud 'bum): babashad kyis nyon/ / rigs kyi dbyug gu so gnyis la// thun tshod bzhi ru 'gyur ba yin// bcu drug gnyis kyi rnam par 'gyur// thun gcig dbyug gu lhag pa la// thun phyed dbyug gu bzhi yin te//

209a6(rgyud 'bum): rab grags/ / drung ni bzhi po rnams 'phel las// 'khor lo bzhi ru rab tu brjod// rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs bzhi// skad cig zang cig sogs dbye las// rnam pa bzhi ru de brjod do// de
209a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin dga' ba bzhi po ste/ / thun tshod bzhir yang rab tu brjod// sku gsum de la sku bzhi pa// de bzhin thams cad bzhi ru yang // byi yi rim pa de bzhin no// rnal 'byor bzhi dang bzhi pa ni/
209b1(rgyud 'bum): sku ni bzhi ru yang dag brjod// 'dis ni dbyug gu bzhir 'gyur te// rab tu dbye bas drug cu bani// kye yi rdo rjer bstan dang 'dir// de bzhin nges bstan lus kyi ni// 'og la 'khor lo bzhi yod de//
209b2(rgyud 'bum): de yang sku ni bzhi pa yin// dga' ba bzhi la mtshon pa yang // sku bzhi por ni rab tu brjod// dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud mdor bstan pa ste le'u bco lnga pa'o// /
209b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// srid pa'i 'khor lor brjod bya ci// lha yi gsang las ches gsang dris// srid gsum sems can rmongs pa rnams// nyams byed snying po 'di nyon cig
209b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa/ / bdud kyi sprul pa 'dis ni zhes// de ltar rnal 'byor 'khor bar 'khyams// rnal 'byor 'khor bar 'khyams pa las// 'khor bar mchog tu rtse bar byed/
209b5(rgyud 'bum): chu la pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin// skyon gyis ci yang gos pa med// bcu gnyis rnam pa'i 'khor lo 'di/ bcu gnyis don zhes rab tu gnas// 'khor lo 'di nyid kho na yang // yan lag bcu
209b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis rab tu grags/ / gang gi 'khor lo 'di shes byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi sa rab grags pa'i// chos rnams ma lus shes byed cing // chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor byed// de phyir yan
209b7(rgyud 'bum): lag bcu gnas pa'i/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// bdag gis bshad par bya yis nyon// ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang // skye
210a1(rgyud 'bum): mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / nye bar len pa dang // srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi zhes bya ba yan lag bcu gnyis rnams so// ma rig
210a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni sngon gyi nyon mongs pa'o/ / 'du byed ni sngon gyi las rnams so// rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi so sor kun tu rtog pa'o// ming dang gzugs ni nur nur po dang / mer mer po dang /
210a3(rgyud 'bum): gor gor po dang / nar nar po dang / rkang lag 'gyus pa'i gnas skabs lnga'o// skye mched drug ni mngal nas nges par byung ba'i mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug rdzogs pa'o// reg pa ni yul
210a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa gsum 'dus pa las so// tshor ba ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / btang sgoms kyi mtshan nyid las don rnam pa gsum du dbye'o// sred pa ni
210a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags so/ / nye bar len pa ni 'dod pa'i yul yongs su 'dzin pa'o// sred pa na 'byung 'gyur gyi srid pa las kyi 'bras bu'o// skye ba ni slar yang phung po la nying mtshams sbyor
210a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / rga shi ni ming dang gzugs la sogs pa'i yan lag bzhi'o zhes so// yan lag bcu gnyis khyad par las// thub pas rten cing kun 'byung bstan// ji srid nyon mongs las dang na/
210a7(rgyud 'bum): sdug pa sngal gsum du de rnams 'dus// dang po brgyad pa dgu nyon mongs// gnyis pa bcu pa las su 'gyur// lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal yin// bcu gnyis po ni gsam 'aras pa
210b1(rgyud 'bum): chos gsum po ni bstan par 'gyur/ / bzlas dbye gnyis su de 'gyur ro// bdun bdun dag tu 'gyur ba yin// de nyid yang yang de 'khor zhing // 'khor bas srid pa'i 'khor lo'o// 'gro ba phan tshun
210b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu dang 'bras/ / 'ga' zhig 'dir med sems can stong // de ltar stong las chos rab 'byung / chos las 'pho ba'ang yod min te// legs par klog dang mar me rgya// me long sgra dang nyi ma 'pho// sa bon
210b3(rgyud 'bum): las ni phung po 'di/ / mtshams sbyor ba dang 'pho ba med// sems kyi kun spyod 'dul bar 'gro// 'dir brjod yan lag bcu gnyis ni// khyad par thub pas bstan pa yin// ji ltar rten cing yang dag
210b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / de rnams bsdus par shes par bya// so sor nges pastan nyan par 'dod// de de sangs rgyas spyod yul zhes// slob dpon 'dir brjod gnas pa'o// nyon mongs las dang sdug bsngal rnams /
210b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes pas ji srid bsdus pa'o// de la gnyis dag gis lhag pa'i bcu so sor bstan pa la/ yan lag ces pa 'di dag gi cha shas kyi khyad par ro// dper na aM ga paM ga'i dngos po'i khyad par ni bsngags
210b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o zhes te/ aM ga ni khyad par ro// lus dang / ngag dang / yid 'khrig pa las thub pa des ni thub pas so// bstan pa ni rab tu gsal bar gsungs pa'o zhes pa rnam grangs so// de rnams kyi gtso
210b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / rang bzhin dang / dbang phyug tu nges pa dang / phyogs skyong ba dang / ngo bo nyid la sogs pa ma yin gyi/ yan lag bcu gnyis kyi khyad par ro// de lta mod kyi nyon mongs pa rnams la las dang sdug
211a1(rgyud 'bum): bsngal rnams su ste/ phan tshun brten pa dbyug gu gsum gyi tshul gyis gsum rnams su ji lta ba bzhin du bsdus nas 'gro ste/ dper na chu bzhin no// slar yang nyon mongs pa rnam
211a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / las rnams dang / sdug bsngal te/ de rnams su ji lta ba bzhin du 'di gsum bsdus nas ji ltar 'gro zhe na/ brjod par bya ste/ dang po brgyad dgu nyon mongs 'gyur// zhes pa ni/ yan lag bcu
211a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis po 'di rnams kyi khyad par gyi nang nas/ dang po ma rig pa dang / brgyad pa sred pa dang / dgu pa nye bar len pa zhes pa gsum po 'di rnams nyon mongs pa so sor bsdus par rtogs par bya'o//
211a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa bcu pa las yin te// yang ci/ 'du byed ni gnyis pa'o// srid pa ni bcu pa'o// 'di dag las su bsdus par rig par bya'o// lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal yin// nyon mongs pa dang las
211a5(rgyud 'bum): su bsdus pa 'di rnams kyi lhag ma gang yin pa'i yan lag gi khyad par bdun ni sdug bsngal du bsdus par rig par bya'o/ / 'di lta ste/ rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug
211a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / skye ba dang / rga sha yang ngo zhes pa ste/ yang gi sgra rab tu sbyor ba ni bsdu ba yang dag par rab tu sbyor ba ste/ ma rig pa la sogs pa rnams sdug bsngal du yang dag
211a7(rgyud 'bum): bar sdud par byed do/ / de bzhin du chos bcu gnyis po 'di rnams thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang / las dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba gsum du bsdus te/ dman pa dang lhag pa yod pa ma yin
211b1(rgyud 'bum): shes par byed pa'i don las so/ / ni'i sgra ni 'di rnams mdo ru nges par bstan pa de srid du yongs su bslangs pa 'di dang 'di dag mchog tu yod do zhes brjod par bya'o// ci ste gang las 'di rnams las
211b2(rgyud 'bum): dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyi dang / las dang / sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'gyur zhe na brjod par bya ste/ gsum rnams zlas dbyer 'gyur ba ni/ zlas dbye ba las 'gyur ro// bdun pa nyon mongs pa zhes
211b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba ni gsum rnams su zlas dbye bar 'gyur ro/ / las zhes bya bar zlas dbyar 'gyur te/ zlas dbye ba las rab tu 'gyur ba kho na'o// sdug bsngal zhes pa sngar bzhin du nges par bstan pa las bdun
211b4(rgyud 'bum): pa gsum 'byung ste/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba rnams su nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba gnyis po de nyid ni rab tu 'khor bar byed pas srid pa'i 'khor lo'o// de la srid pa ni las kyi gzugs kyis sgra gcan no//
211b5(rgyud 'bum): de yang maung gsum pa can 'dir 'khor lo byung ba las 'jig rten bdun po der yongs su 'khor bar byed do// ni'i sgra ni nges par don no// dper na bla la shar du yongs su 'khor bar byed pa bzhin srid
211b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor lo'o/ / de bzhin du rdzogs par 'byung ba ni ma yin no// de lta mod kyi nges pa ni med do// zhes pas ni sgra'o// de na sa da ni lus can thams cad dbang phyug dang byed pa po dang / byed pa ci yin
211b7(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ brjod par bya ste/ 'gro ba thams cad phan tshun du rgyu dang 'bras bu'ang 'ga' zhig kyang 'dir med de/ sems can la gzhan du nye bar btags pa las so// rgyu yi yang 'di yongs su byedapa
212a1(rgyud 'bum): la rgyur nye bar btags pa tsam mo/ / de'i phyir rdzas gzhan la sems can du bden no zhes so// de nas da ni gnas pa'i 'jig rten las pha rol gyi 'jig rten du rjes su 'gro ba ci zhe na/ brjod
212a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi don tsam yang dngos po ste/ 'pho ba ni med do// 'on kyang stong pa kho na las stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu 'byung ste/ 'pho ba'ang med do// chos rnams las ni bdag gi nga
212a3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i nyon mongs dang las kyi ming can lnga po rnams las bdag dang bdag gi bas stong pa'i 'bras bu'i ming can bdun po'i chos rnams rab tu 'byung ste/ 'pho ba'ang med do zhes pa de lta bur 'dzin pa'i
212a4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin du bdag tu gnas pa rnams las/ rang bzhin dang bral ba'i stong po'i chos bdun po rnams rab tu 'byung ste/ 'pho ba'ang med do// de'ang 'di dag bstan pa ci na na/ 'dir brjod par bya ste/
212a5(rgyud 'bum): legs par klog dang sgron me rgya// me long sgra dang nyi ma 'pho// sa bon mig gi nges bsnan pa// zhes pa ni de kho na nyid las 'gro ba med pa nyid dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag kyang med de/ tha snyad du 'jig
212a6(rgyud 'bum): rten pha rol yod do zhes pa'o/ / dper na tha ma las klog par byed pa ni 'pho b.rang med de/ de'i dngos po tha ma las klog pa nyams pa med la slob mas klog pa'ang nyams pa med cing / slob mas klog pa
212a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan ma yin no/ / de bzhin du kun tu 'byung bar byed na rgyu med pa can gyi zhes par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du 'chi bar byed pa'i sems ni 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba med de rtag pa'i nyes par
212b1(rgyud 'bum): thal ba'i phyir ro/ / 'jig rten pha rol gzhan kho na las 'byung ba ma yin te/ dper na bla ma las klog par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan can ni slob mi'i klog par byed pa'o// de nyid de las gzhan ma yin pa de mazhin
212b2(rgyud 'bum): du de'o zhes nus pa mngon par brjod do/ / de bzhin du de'i 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa'i sems la brten nas skye ba'i cha shas can gyi sems de nyid gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin du de'ang nus pa mngon par brjod
212b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / dper na mar me las mar me'o// rgya las phyir rgya'o// bzhin las me long las gzugs brnyan no// sgra las brag cha'o// nyi ma dang / nor bu'i 'od dang / bud shing rnams las ma'o// sa bon las
212b4(rgyud 'bum): myu gu'o/ / dper na shu ga'i 'bras bu zos pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis gzhan gyi kha 'dzag pa las gzhan ma yin no zhes rab tu shes par bya'o// de bzhin du phung po las phyir phung po 'pho ba med pa'ang mkhas pa rnams
212b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis kun tu dpyad pa'o zhes so/ / de la phung po ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i ming can 'di rnams kyi phung po nying mtshams sbyor ba 'di dag phung po
212b6(rgyud 'bum): lnga po rnams su nges par brtag par bya ste/ rgyu med pa can yang ma yin la gzhan las 'byung ba'ang ma yin no// 'jig rten 'di las 'jig rten pha rol ma yin no// de nas mig kyang dngos po 'pho pa
212b7(rgyud 'bum): yang ro/ / 'di srid du 'du byed 'khor ba'i rim pa'o// yang gi sgra ni ldog pa ste/ de'i phyir phyin ci log tu rtogs par mi bya'o// gang gi phyir rtag tu sdug bsngal stong pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dngas pa
213a1(rgyud 'bum): yin pa de'i phyir/ so sor kun tu rtog pa'i dngos po la kun tu rmongs par mi 'gyur ro// rmongs pa med pa'i yid rtag tu skye bar mi byed do// srung ba med pas nyes par mi
213a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gdug pa med pas rtag tu sdig pa'i las su mi 'gyur ro// las su gyur pa'i dngos po nye bar mi len no// nye bar len pa med pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa med do// dngos po dang
213a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos po med pa gdags pa med do/ / ma skyes pa'i phung po la yid rnams sdug bsngal rnams su mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'dir rnam pa lnga po 'di'i rgyu'i zas byin pa las 'dir 'bras bu rnam pa
213a4(rgyud 'bum): bdun thob kyi gzhan med pa las mi 'byung ngo / / de'ang thar pa zhes brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du dad pa dang / rtag pa dang / chad pa dang / 'pho ba la sogs pa rnams rtag tu lta ba ngan pa dang
213a5(rgyud 'bum): gya nom pa rnams mi 'byung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis yang 'dir tshigs su bcad pa/ rkyen las 'byung ba ma mthong zhing // don nyid kyis ni tshor ba med// skye ba dang ni 'jig pa yang //
213a6(rgyud 'bum): gang gis 'byung ba rnam par brtags// 'di la gsal bya ci yang med// gzhag par bya ba cung zad med// yang dag nyid la yang dag lta// yang dag mthong na rnam par grol// rten cing 'brel par
213a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / / kha sbyor gyi tshul gyis kyang gnas pa la 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i 'jig rten gyi 'dzag pa'i bde ba'o// de rnams tshe brgya la lo brgya'i tshe rnams so//
213b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das bud med med pa las ji ltar khu ba rengs par 'gyur// khu ba rengs pa dang bral bas tshe ring po rjes su 'gro ba med do// de'i phyir 'og dang steng du rlung gi rgyu ba rjes su bcing bar byed pa las/
213b2(rgyud 'bum): srog brtan par byas pa la lus la rgas pa dang 'chi ba mi 'byung ngo // dang por lus dag par gyur nas chos kyi phyag rgya rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// phyi'i dga' ba gang dang 'dra ba de dang 'dra bar bsgom par bya'o//
213b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du slar yang rnal 'byor pas lus kyi phyag rgya'i dka' ba rtsom pa la rkang pa g.yon pas tshangs pa'i skud pa kun tu btsir nas kha steng du byas nas hAHyig rnam par bsam par bya'o// slar yang stita
213b4(rgyud 'bum): yig byas nas hUM yig snying khar gnas pa'o/ / AHyig slar yang bsgom par bya'o// 'dab ma brgyad pa ga sar dang bcas pa de'i dbus su hrIHyig 'bar ba de la 'od zer dang bcas pa'o// de las
213b5(rgyud 'bum): nges par byung ba'i ri mo dkar po nges par 'byung ba slar yang 'ongs te pad+ma 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i dbus su son par bsam par bya'o/ / slar yang a yig bsam par bya ste/ rnal 'byor pas srog gi
213b6(rgyud 'bum): rlung slar yang bcing bar bya'o/ / de'i phyogs su lha mor gsal ba'i tshangs pa'i mdud pa nges par byung nas b+ha ga dang snying khar yang ldan par bsam par bya'o// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa de la phyogs su dmar
213b7(rgyud 'bum): por bsam par bya'o/ / me'i zur du me dang / de bzhin du slar yang rlung ngu'o// dbang ldan du sngon po'ang ngo // de bzhin du srin po'i phur du'o// de'i dbus su son pa'i hUM yig kha dog nag po 'od zer dmar
214a1(rgyud 'bum): po can no/ / de las nges par byung ba'i ri mo spyi bor son pa rnam par bsam par bya'o// 'og dang steng du hUM yig kha dog nag po 'od zer dang bcas pa deng son pa bsam par bya'o//
214a2(rgyud 'bum): ri mo 'bar bar byed pa ni yang nas yang du de bzhin no// de'i tshe khyogs bya ba'i sgom pa bla ma'i man ngag las so// de'i tshe gtum mo 'bar bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsregs te/ ri bong can 'dzag
214a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'og gi b+ha ga la dga' ba chen pos bde bar 'gyur ro/ / slar yang gnyis gnyis steng du 'gro ba'i don du srog dang thur sel 'gog pa las sems stong pa la nges par sbar nas myos par byed do// slar yang
214a4(rgyud 'bum): sems myos par gyur pa ji srid du 'khyil pa bcing ba'i sbyor ba las/ de'i tshe 'khor ba las 'bad pas kun nas g.yas su 'khor ba med par bya ste// slar yang kho Dor sgra nye bar gnas so// chos kyi 'khor
214a5(rgyud 'bum): lo la hUM yig gi nA das slar yang gnas su rab tu bkug nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la rtsa gnyis rab tu g.yo bar byas nas/ slar yang brtan par bcing bar bya'o// g.yon pa gnyis po de la zhu bar
214a6(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa de'i tshe 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / de la yang dag par sbyangs par 'gyur te/ slar yang ye shes kyi 'khor lo la srub par byed pa dang 'o byed pa ni bla ma'i man ngag las so// slar yang 'khor lo gsum po myos
214a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa'i sbyor bas sbyang bar bya'o/ / steng du song po de la bde ba chen po bstan par 'gyur te/ 'di rnams lam gyi mchog ste phul du byung ba'i lha rnams kyi'ang spyod yul ma yin no// gang zhig shes pa
214b1(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten gsum dang bcas pas mchod par 'gyur ro// lo gcig tu goms pas ches phra ba'i lus su 'gyur ro// sgra chen po'i rang bzhin rab tu smra'o// de bzhin du
214b2(rgyud 'bum): sems phra ba'i rang bzhin dang 'dod pa'i don la kun tu rgyu ste/ gdul bya'i ched du rgya mtsho dang nam mkha' la'ang 'gro'i/ gang 'dod pa de byed do// blo bzang rtse bar byed cing dga' bar byed do// zhes gzhin
214b3(rgyud 'bum): rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du goms pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ / / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltad mo la// sogs pa mnga' bdag gsung du gso
214b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba sna tshogs ma lus nyid/ / de bzhin dus kyi mtshan nyid dang // rang gzugs lus kyi 'khrul 'khor ni// da lta bka' drin mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
214b5(rgyud 'bum): / lha mo legs so legs par byas// khyod kyis gang gzhin byas te bshad// oM dz+wa la ka rA la ya da ne sarba satwa hA la hA la badz+re su badz+ra s+pha ra s+pha ra s+pha ra ya sA ra ya sarba me g+ha bA ka/ biSh+Ti stam+b+ha ya s+pho Ta ya
214b6(rgyud 'bum): s+pho Ta ya g+haHg+haHsarba pA nI yaM sho Sha ya hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas par bya zhing khro bo'i lta stangs kyis nam mkha' la blta bar bya'o// rlung dang sprin la sogs pa 'joms par byed do//
214b7(rgyud 'bum): / oM phaT kA ra pe ha ha hA hA phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na na sarba kro d+hA na kI la ya kI la ya badz+ra daSh+Te na A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ hrIHbrjod nas lha'i bdag nyid kyi rdul rnam pa bdun sbyin par
215a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ste sbrul 'bros par byed do/ / oM ya mAn+ta ka hrIHSh+TIHsU hU~M phaT phaT thA sa ya trA sa ya tsaN+Da tsat+ta pra tsat+ta pra tsar+d+ha hUM phaT/ ces pas ma he 'bros par byed do// oM ma ma mdzan
215a2(rgyud 'bum): marda ya marda ya tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ ces pa 'dis sdig pa'i nad 'joms so// oM kro d+ha ne sa kro d+ha ya saM kro d+ha ya swA hA// zhes pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal por sngags kyi las rab
215a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byam gyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / / lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gtum pa chen po khros pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i dbang phyug de'i sngags kyi las rab 'byam
215a4(rgyud 'bum): gsung du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpa' bo chen po mi g.yo ba 'jigs pa'i yang 'jigs par byed pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i dpa' bo ral gri dang sdigs mdzub
215a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba/ gtum po khros pa chen po'i nga rgyal du byas nas sngags bzlas par bya'o// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ ces pa'i gsang sngags chen po gang gi dpung par son cing gnas pa de bdud thams
215a6(rgyud 'bum): cad las nges par rgyal b.rar gyur ro/ / oM kro d+ha ne sa kro Sha Ne b+he da ne hUM phaT/ chu la mngon par bsngags nas sbyin par bya ste/ gzer sel bar 'gyur ro// oM san+na A sa ne mo hA ya hUM phaT/ ces pa
215a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dis spyi gtsug tu bcings na mi mthong ngo / / oM a tsa le sany+tsa le che ge mo'i mu khaM kI la ya hUM phaT/ myos byed la gzugs brnyan byas nas gro ga la ba blas bris nas de'i khar bcug ste/ phur bus
215b1(rgyud 'bum): btab la lam bzhi mdor sba bar bya ste/ phyir rgol ba'i kha la phur bus gdab bo// oM sar+b+ba mA ra b+hany+dza ne che ge mo'i pA dau kI la ya hUM phaT/ sngar bzhin du snying khar bcug nas rkang pa dag la phur bus
215b2(rgyud 'bum): gdab par bya ste/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par byed do// oM bi kr-i tA na ne sA ra ba la b+hany+dza ne dzam+b+ha ya dzam+bA ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya badz+ra pA she na che ge mo saM n+ye ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ oM hU paT khaHShaHhA hA hI hA
215b3(rgyud 'bum): pheM pheM/ oM tsat+ta ma hA ro Sha na hUM phaT/ sngar bzhin du bcug nas sde'i bdag po'i gos la phur bus gdab ste/ gzugs brnyan kha 'og tu byas te sba bar bya'o// pha rol gyi sde 'ong bar nges par byed
215b4(rgyud 'bum): do/ / oM da had ga pa tsa pa tsa ma tha ma tha/ dz+wa la dza la/ dzA la ya dzA ya/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na dzA la dz+wa la hUM/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ dur khrod kyi gos la gzhan gyis mi thub pa sor mo brgyad kyi tshad la lba sbyin
215b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bris nas sngags kyi 'phreng bas bskor te myos byed gzugs brnyan gyi snying khar bcug nas shing la gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Sha che ge mo la dz+wa ra Na gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM phaT/
215b6(rgyud 'bum): ces bzlas nas dur khrod kyi me la gdung bar bya'o// seng ldeng dang rgya shug gi ma la'o// dgra rnams la rims byed do// au dza ya dza ya pa rA dza ya niN+Di ta yan+na hri hri s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya uts+tsha Ta ya uts+tsha Ta ya/
215b7(rgyud 'bum): shI g+h+raM karma ku ru tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ dur khrod kyi ra sa la bris nas skud pa sngon pos dkris nas dpung pa 'am/ mgul lam/ mgo bo 'am/ rked par 'chang bar byed na gzhan gyi sngags rab
216a1(rgyud 'bum): tu mi 'byung ngo / / oM tsat+ta ma hA se na gra sa kra sa kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ ma ra ma ra mA ra ya mA ra ya che ge mo oM phaT/ dur khrod kyi ras la bris nas sngar bzhin du gzugs
216a2(rgyud 'bum): brnyan du bcug ste/ sor mo'i tshad kyi rus pa'i phur pas sam lcags kyi bur bas bur bus btab nas dur khrod du kha 'og tu byas nas sbas na zhim bdun gyis 'chi bar byed do// oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo
216a3(rgyud 'bum): uts+tsha Ta ya hUM phaT/ nim par shing bya kha ka'i tshang na gnas pa slangs te/ dur khrod kyi mes bsreg par bya'o// ngor thal ba la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags te/ khyim dang gos la gtor te gzhag go/

216a6(rgyud 'bum): Ta tsa Ta pra tsa Ta pra tsa Ta/ ha na ha na g+hA ta ya b+hU ta ya kar+N+Na kar+b+hu pra s+phu ra pra s+phu ra/ pra sA ra ya pra s+pha ra ya/ kI la ya kI la ya/ dzam+b+ha ya dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya che ge mo la hUM phaT/ gro ga la ta la'i smyu gus
216a7(rgyud 'bum): rus sbal sor drug par mnyam par bris nas rkang pa bzhi la hU~M ga~M yo ge dang / kha'i dbus suSh+NIH'i yi ge'o// sdang bar 'gyur ro// de nas bris pa'i sgrub bya de'i rgyab tu sngags kyi 'phreng ba gzhan gyis kun
216b1(rgyud 'bum): tu dkris te mchod na/ de nas brtsams te 'dod pa yongs su nyams te rus sbal bzhin du mang pos g.yog par byed de// srad bu dmar pos kun tu dkris nas rkang pa rab tu bsdus nas mi 'deg par byas la
216b2(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa g.yon pas bdeg par bya'o/ / che ge mo me ba sa mA na ya lan bdun gyis dgra'i kha rengs par byed do// oM tsa li tsi li/ mi li mi li nA li She hUM phaT/ mig 'dzum pa nyams par byed do// oM ts+tshats+tsha
216b3(rgyud 'bum): / ts+tshi sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+han+d+ha ban+d+ha/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ ro'i rus pa'i phur bu sor bdun pa'i tshad la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas ba lang gi gnas su sbas na 'o ma mi 'dzag
216b4(rgyud 'bum): oM ba li pat+taM ma ta ya su ru pa ri mA dz+nyA pa ti dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/ grog mkhar gyi sa'i gong bu la brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags te tshong pa'i khyim du swa bar bya ste zong mi brim
216b5(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / oM hri pri tra pra ya ma ma tha ne A kaD+D+h+ya ab+h+yA k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho d+ha ya/ sarba kA ma pra sA d+ha ne hUM hUM phaT phaT sA hA/ gro ga'i 'dab ma la gur kum dang yang dag par ldan pas lha phyag gnyis pa la ga na zhags pa dang
216b6(rgyud 'bum): lcag kyu can 'dod pa drag cing 'jigs par byed pa bris la/ glang po che'i chang dang / zla mtshan dang / me tog gi sngags kyis yi ge rnams spel bar bya'o// oM spyi bor ro// hUM snying khar ro// hri lte bar
216b7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / ta mig tu'o// de la sngags kyi 'phreng bas bskor nas khrag gis kun tu bkang zhing phye mar byas te/ skyes pa dang bud med kyi thod par bcug nas mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ste myos byed kyi sa dang srad bu
217a1(rgyud 'bum): dmar pos dkris nas mgo bo'i gnas su sba bar bya'o/ / rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas bzlas par bya ste stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngas grong 'khrug par 'gyur ro// oM Ar+d+ha a kar+b+ha
217a2(rgyud 'bum): mo ha ya mo ha ya che ge mo me ba shAM b+ha ba tu swA hA/ lto ba'i srin bu phra mo'i phye ma dang / khu ba dang / ming med kyi khrag dag gis pa Di ka byas nas mngon par bsngags te bza' ba dang btung ba la sbyin par bya'o//

217a4(rgyud 'bum): nas rgyug go/ oM shwe te gr-i d+hI NI kha hI bi khany+tsa rU pi NI khaHkhaHkhaHa ti mr-it+tA rA re tsI ra ka pA ba sa bat+tA be shaHhaHgaHsaHsaHsaHtsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na sa na A dz+nyA pa ya ti sA hA/ yang na/ oM saM kA ri tsi baM hUM sA h+ma
217a5(rgyud 'bum): hAHdug thams cad 'joms par byed do/ / oM nA gA ri bA ma ne ha ra ha ra phaT phaT/ oM A Ne kA Ne che ge mo ba shAM ku ru sA hA/ dri bzang po can gyi me tog dkar po sbyin pa las dbang du byed do// na mo bi tA
217a6(rgyud 'bum): ragA ya mi tri sid+d+ha lo tsa sA hA/ chu la mngon par bsngags nas des mig bkrus pa las rab rib 'joms par byed do// oM sa ba na kha kha rbur+Na khA nA ta pra b+ha ba ti/ A thI ra r+ya ra tha be ge na pA su de ba ba la
217a7(rgyud 'bum): natsa/ ga ru Da pA k+Shi sA de na b+hu m+ba gats+tsha bi ShaM sA hA/ sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / karka Ta la sogs pa'i dug 'joms par byed do// oM tsA muN+De a dzaM te a pa rA dzi te a pa rA dzi te pu pu rak+Sha rak+Sha sA hA
217b1(rgyud 'bum): bong ba la lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du gcig gzhag par bya'o// oM dzam+b+ha ni stam+b+ha nI mo ha nI sarba duSh+Ta pra sha ma nI swA hA/ chom kun mi 'byung ngo/
217b2(rgyud 'bum): / oM na maHtsaN+Da kro d+hA ya hu lu hu lu tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha mo ha ya mo ha la ha na ha na hUM phaT/ me tog la sogs pa la yongs su bzlas te byin pa la dbang du byed do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM TaHsuHbi sma ra
217b3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ ke ta ki'i 'dab ma lus la bcangs na rims thams cad 'joms par byed do// zhes pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs la sogs pa 'khrul 'khor dang
217b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o/ / / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ltad mo nyan par 'tshal lo// shA kha~M Da ka'i rtsa ba dang ba ru ra'i rtsa ba dang gcig
217b5(rgyud 'bum): tutubyas nas khyim du gzhag par bya ste rtsod par 'gyur ro/ / da dru ri'i me tog gi dbus su gnas pa'i kuN+Da ka dri bzang po'i me tog gi dbus su bcug pa tsam gyis mgo la gzer 'byung ngo // rtsub
217b6(rgyud 'bum): mos nyams par byas pas grol lo/ / khyi mo'i mngal gyi mal stan des 'dugs te bskor la rma byaM'i mjug mas g.yas su bskor ba sa ri mo 'phrog go// g.yon du bskor bas thar ro// khwa ti'i snying
217b7(rgyud 'bum): khrag gis shing a smra'i 'dab ma la de'i gzugs brnyan bri ba'i tshul gyis bris pa'i 'khrul 'khor gang gi bshang ba la bzhag pa de khA tas za bar byed do/ / bla ga'i rnam pa'i dong byas nas
218a1(rgyud 'bum): bud med kyi bshang ba dang / sdig pa dang / pat+ti ka dang ldan pa bcug nas byug par bya ste/ de'i lam du gnod par byed do// shing sU hi'i 'o mas basbos pa'i til gyi til mar
218a2(rgyud 'bum): bskus pa las mgo skyes dkar por 'gyur ro/ / skra bzhar bas thar ro// byi la mo'i sru ma dang mi mo'i phru ma dag gis bdugs pa las zla ba'i ri mo mi mthong bar byed do// sbrang rtsis bdugs pas
218a3(rgyud 'bum): zathar ro/ / rnga mo'i thod pa dang / dbyug pa dkar po dang / skud pa la ba blas bsgos nas lag pa la bskus nas ni mar byas nar mo mthong ngo // lag pa bkrus pa las thar ro// bud med kyi phru ma'i bdug pa
218a4(rgyud 'bum): las ri mo 'gebs par byed do/ / gu gul gyis bdugs pa las thar ro// sbal pa'i zhun mar gyi mig sman las khyim du 'brel ba'i sbrul mthong ngo // mar ma mnal po'i me la mu zi'i phye ma byin pa las 'bar
218a5(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / shing snu hi'i rtsa ba dang bu ram zos na gnyid med par 'gyur ro// kA ma rtsi'i rtsa ba gtsug tor du bcing bar bya ste gnyid med par 'gyur ro// klu 'dul bar byed pa dang / dro Ni'i me tog gi rtsa ba dang /
218a6(rgyud 'bum): yung ba dang / 'bras bu thug po che btags nas dril myis byas pa las chu yongs su zad pa las rgyal lo// shing shal ma li'i rtsa ba la mtshal dang ldan pa zos pa las me tog ltung bar bya'o// kA guSh+Ta dang ma ri ra ya
218a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par bya ba 'am/ yang na tam+bu las rdul dang phral bar 'gyur ro// shing stu hi'i lo ma dang / marga Da'i sa bon dang / gu Na'i phye ma bu ram dang lhan cig zos pa las khrag ltung ngo // chu tshun da rI phye ma sa rta'i
218b1(rgyud 'bum): snal bskus na zas mi byed do/ / tsan dan gyis bkrus pa las thar ro// shing ke ti'i rtsa ba mgo la bcings par bya/ shing 'bra gong rtsa ba lag pa la/ shing ta la'i rtsa ba kha ru skar ma rgyal la gdon par bya'o//
218b2(rgyud 'bum): byang phyogs su gnas te gcer bu skra grol bar gyur/ gnas gsum po rnams cung zad bzhags nas gtugs par bya ste/ mtshon chas 'joms par mi 'gyur ro// sho nA ka'i sa bon dang / pU ra ka pA du ka
218b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis po sha ba'i pags pa'i khung du de mnyes te lce'i mthal du bzhag pa la tap+ta'i 'bras bu zos pa las sreg par mi byed do/ zhes gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du thun mong gi sman gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// /
218b4(rgyud 'bum): / kye bcom ldan 'das ji ltar dus byed pa dang / sems can byed par nges pa de rnams kyi rgyu mtshan bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ rkang pa dang rkan la phug nas mig tu gzug
218b5(rgyud 'bum): ma las zla ba gsum gyis grub bo/ / rna bar phug pas zla ba bzhis so// mdzod spur zug pa las nyi ma gcig gis so// rkang pa dang rkan la phug nas lte bar thug pa las zla ba gsum gyis 'chi'o//
218b6(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa dang rkan la phug nas snal thug pa las zla ba gsum gyis so// bshang pa rab tu 'dzag pa'i dus mtshungs par srid pa byung na lo gcig gis so// shin tu dgara' ba'i bar du kal te sbrid pa byung ba dang
218b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs par mthe'u chung thams cad du drug pa las zla bas so/ / snying dang mgrin par jug pa las phyogs gsum gyis so// mtshungs par rkan la gsum thug pa las nyim gsum gyis so// rkang par
219a1(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong nas brtsams nas lte ba'i mthar thug par zug pa las zla ba drug gis so/ / sna'i rtse mor zla bas de der gyur na mtshan mo bdun gyis 'chi ba'i dus gsum 'gyur ro// rna ba dag gis
219a2(rgyud 'bum): zil gu'i sgra las zla ba gsum gyis so/ / rna ba gnyis dang / smin ma'i dbus dang / klad pa'i rtse mo rnams su so so so sor thug pa las nyi ma gcig gis so// sen mo la dmar ba'i mchog tu mthong ba
219a3(rgyud 'bum): las zla ba drug gis so/ / so bskams pa las zla ba drug gis so// byas pa shes par 'gyur ba nyid// rdo rje skyes bde bdag la gsol// 'dam skyes 'dab ma gsum pa ni// ge sar sbrang rtsis brgyan pa
219a4(rgyud 'bum): mthong / / e ma bde ba ldan pa'i zhing // chags pa sangs rgyas nye bar mdzes// chags can rnams kyis bde bzhi// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// yid ni 'dod chags kyis dkrugs pas//
219a5(rgyud 'bum): bud med gan rgyal ba sgyel nas ni// phrag par rkang pa zung byin nas// 'og dang steng du nges brtags nas// de yi pad+ma rgyas pa yi// pad+ma'i bu gar 'jug par byed// pad+ma'i 'dab mar sha'i snying po// ldan
219a6(rgyud 'bum): par rdo rje de bcug nas/ / ji ltar bdag gi nur nur po// bye ba nyis stong 'bum rnams kyis// dbus su sems la rab mchod bya// bdag la rlung pad snying po las// snying po tha med rdo rje'i rtser//
219a7(rgyud 'bum): rak+ta ban d+hu ka dang ldan// blo ldan re rer brjod sa khyer// slar yang sems dpa' gcig bsgom bya// bde ba g.yo med dam pa'i sems// de las so sor mchog byin nas// dga' ba'i skad ci gnyis
219b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing/ / ji srid rab brjod 'di lta bu'i// gzugs sku skad cig tsam bsam bya// bud med ri mo skyes ma'ang gcig/ 'gro ba rnams kyi yang gsum mo// bde ba sbyin pa zhi bar rig/ cung
219b2(rgyud 'bum): zad 'dir ni rtog par byed/ / kha drag tshad du sdig las gnas// de des gting dpag dka' ba can// ngu 'bod du ni rtag tu gdungs// rnam mang sreg cing 'o dod 'bod// lus ni bskal pa gsum
219b3(rgyud 'bum): du gnas/ / bud med yon tan brjod ci dgos// sems can kun la yongs su 'dzin// snying rjes nyin mor byed pa las// bud med sems kyis so sor gnas// nub par gyur pa legs
219b4(rgyud 'bum): shes shing / / yongs su shes pa'ang rgyas par byed// gal te de lta'i slong mo'i gzugs// gzhan min rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// de yi nub dang mthong ba ni// sa dang sa la ring ba las// gang gis
219b5(rgyud 'bum): dran par byed tsam gyis/ / skad cig de las bde ba myong // phyogs nyid yul dang bud med nyid// lha yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// phyag rgya de la phan byas nas// yid ldan de la gnas par
219b6(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / de phyir skyon las rnam par grol// yon tan dam pa kun la mkhas// bsod nams bsod nams bsod nams che// rab dang byed pa mthar phyin can// de phyir de la brtan bltas nas//
219b7(rgyud 'bum): rede mchu so yis btsir byas te// rnal 'byor pa shIta sgrog byed cing // de la'ang sta zur du bya ba// rang bde 'byung ba bcing bar bya// sa ma dam+b+ha ka nyid kyang // bcing ba'ang sna tshogs ming can no//
220a1(rgyud 'bum): bung ba'i dra ba bcing ba yang // rkang pa steng nas 'khrul 'khor lo// de bzhin kho nar rus sbal gyi// bcing ba'ang kun las bzang po nyid// de la skyil krung dbus su ni//
220a2(rgyud 'bum): lnga gsum tsog pu'i gdan du ni// byas nas dpung pa zung la ni// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yis// bcom ldan 'das la dam po yis// 'khyud nas pad+mas rdo rje ni// rgyas par byas nas rab
220a3(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba/ / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor la// sgom pa ji lta bu zhig 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa rnams pan don du// zhus pa 'bras bu bcas par mdzod// bka' stsal pa/ rdzogs pa'i
220a4(rgyud 'bum): rim pa'i rnal 'byor gang / / rnal 'byor brtson pa'i rnal 'byor pa// nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i tshul du ni// sems gcig gis ni bsgom par bya// dge legs gang bsgom brtag bya ba//
220a5(rgyud 'bum): srid pa'i ngo bos nges par rgyas// shin tu brtan zhing mngon sbyor bas// ji bzhin kho nar gsal bar 'gro// de nas ma dang bu mo 'am// rnal 'byor ma dang tsha mo dang // gzhan yang nye du mo
220a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun/ / gtum mo de bzhin bram ze mo// mi mo'i tshogs ni 'di dag sbyin// cho ga bzang pos kun bsnyen bya// ji ltar dbye ba mi shes pa// dbye bas rje btsun chog shes pa//
220a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub po mnar med 'khrid par byed// 'dir ni 'jig rten 'gal ba nyid// 'jig rten pha rol bden pa bcom// de phyir kun tu rab 'bad pas// blo bzang legs pas yang dag
220b1(rgyud 'bum): brtsam/ / mkha' 'gro ma sngags bzhin sbas nas// ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// yid dang rjes mthun phyogs su ni// nye bar 'tshe ba kun spangs te// rang sems dga'
220b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'dod pa mo/ / rab dang de dag yang dag blangs// dben zhing dub pa med byas nas// ji srid rnyed pa'i gos dang ni// gnyis kyis brtan par bsgom par bya// blo bzang phan tshun sbyor ba
220b3(rgyud 'bum): las/ / bud med rang la mngon phyogs byas// zhugs nas gnyis dag phan tshun du// chags pas brtan par brtag par bya// de nas blta dang khar brjod pa// rtse gcig yid kyis gnas par
220b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ de bzhin de nyid las brjod bya// bden pa'i gzi brjing shin tu byed// de yi bu dang khyim thabs khyod// bdag la spun dang pa zhing pa// khyod nga'i ma dang chung ma ste// rnal 'byor ma dang tsha
220b5(rgyud 'bum): mo dang / / skyes bu bdun gyi 'bangs nga yin// khyod zhal can gyi 'bangs dang zan// smra ba de 'drar brjod par bya// bde ba gzi brjid byed pa'i mchog/ khyod nga'i pha ma chung ma dang // rnal 'byor
220b6(rgyud 'bum): ma dang tsha mo dang / / nga ni khyod kyi dus kun 'bangs/ mdung thung rnon po mchog tu gzhol// brtse ba'i ma yis bdag la gzigs// bsnyen pa'i lta bas nges rtogs pas// de bdag skyes bu
220b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong nas ni/ / yang dang yang du'o byas nas// yi ge gsum ni ster bar byed// rdo rje'i sbrang rtsi mtshungs pa'i khrag/ pad+mas 'jib par bya'o de'i// mthong nas mig ni rnam par 'khral// gdod
