221a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dri yis byugs byas nas/ / de nas nu mar btsir bar bya// brtan par kun tu khar de'i khar// reg nas kha ru sbyin par byed// g.yo bar byed cing smra bar bya// de yis 'di
221a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dar brjod par bya/ / bdag gi a run+tet+ta ni// mthong phyir bza' ba rnam snang mdzad// zla drug lte ba phyin ci log/ bu ga thams cad mthong ba'i phyir// ha yig reg cing mthong ba las phyogs gsum
221a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis so/ / ming med kyi rtsa bar ri mo nag po mthong ba las so// yan lag thams cad bsil bar mthong ba las ni ma bco brgyad na'o// khrus byas pa byas ma thog bskams pa nas nyi ma bcu yis so//
221a4(rgyud 'bum): lus dri ngan pa las zla ba gnyis na'o// gcin g.yon du 'khor ba las mtshan mo gsum gyis so// lus phra mor mthong bas zla ba drug gis so// sna'i rtse mo ma mtho nga ba las nyi ma gcig la'o// phyogs
221a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'di dag shes pa'i phyir/ / de bzhin rnal 'byor pa sgom dang / bsam gtan brtson pas sngags bzlas byas// rnal 'byor pas ni 'bad pas bklag/ bsrung ba lnga sogs bklag pa yang //
221a6(rgyud 'bum): rang ngam gzhan gyis bya ba'o// nyin rer tshogs la zas dang ni// dge 'dun zas dang de bzhin gzhan// dman dang zhan la rjes brtse bas// sems can rnams la rtag tu bya// zhes pa sna tshogs
221a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyud du gsungs/ / zhes so// gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud du le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o// / kye bcom ldan 'das mu stegs byed pa rnams thams cad la snying brtse ba med par
221b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i don lhur len pa dang / gang zhig ngag gdug pa thams cad du gsod pa lhur len pa de rnams kyi bsam pa la thugs brtse bar gyur pas de dag mnga' bdag gis bdag la gsung du gsol/
221b2(rgyud 'bum): dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya// phyi nas bslab pa'i gnas lnga sbyin// bye zag smra ba 'bad pas bslab// mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no// dge ba bcu la goms gyur cing // bla ma la gus 'dul la mos//
221b3(rgyud 'bum): dbu ma'ang slob tu bcug nas ni// sngags ni kun tu brtsam par bya// gsang las shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud// myur du phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyud// cho ga'i sbyor ba 'dis myur du// bslab pa thos nas spyod
221b4(rgyud 'bum): yul bzang / / bdud bzhi rnam spangs rnal 'byor pas// lha yi sbyor bas gnas par bya// sta res gcod pa dang thod le kor byas nas nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su ma bskyod pas gtor te/ de nas
221b5(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa gnyis kyis mnan nas sngags bzlas par bya'o/ / gsang sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na thig le 'ching ngo // gshin rje'i stobs su 'gro ste de gsal bar byed do// bdag gi lte bar
221b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom pa'i man ngag go/ / gang gang skad cig las brtsams te// de yi nyi mas bsgrub par bya// nam lnga yi mthar thug bya// log par smra ba'i 'jig rten las// legs sbas rab tu gsal
221b7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ de nyid 'dus pa'i rnal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor ma kun de nyid brten// bzlas brjod 'bum phrag gcig tu 'arjod// brtul po yis ni 'bum phrag lnga// gang zhig rgyud du gsungs rang gi/ rang
222a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin las ni 'bum phrag bzhi/ / de nas shin tu chung ba 'di// lha mo de kun gsal bar bstan// dpal ldan gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal por le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis
222a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / // gang gi rgyud 'di mi shes par// rgyud dang rgyud du nges brjod pa// gal te 'tsho ba'i bsam pa yis// stong pa'i sa la de 'khor ro// dpal ldan gshin rje gshed
222a3(rgyud 'bum): dmar po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ / / skad gnyis smra ba chen po thar pa lo tsa ba'i bka' drin gyis bskyangs pa/ bod kyi lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis
222a4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rje khro phu lo tsA ba'i gdan sa gnas gsar dgon par bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / rgyud 'di 'gyur las 'bad pa'i bsod nams kyis// nag po'i rtsa lag ma lus kun bcom ste/
222a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i bya ba yid bzhin 'grub pa dang // mthar thug 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid gyur cig// rgya gar skad du/ shrI b+ha ga bAn a ka dza Ta ma hA tan+ta rA
222a6(rgyud 'bum): nAm/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
222a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi gnas rdo rje'i ri bo'i zom na bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jigs byed rgyal po dang / klu'i dbang po dang / nyi ma dang zla ba'i gdong can
222b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / ye shes bkod pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba'i de kho na nyid shin tu sbas pa'i mdzod la mnga' brnyas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
222b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor du yang dag par nges pa/ rigs dang / tshogs dang / dam tshig dang / brtul zhugs chen po phyag rgya rgya mtsho lta bu'i tshul la gnas pa/ gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba'i bde ba chen
222b3(rgyud 'bum): po la rnam par rol pa/ thabs shes rab bla na med pa'i kha sbyor las nges par 'byung ba'i ye shes can/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi kun nas ldang ba dang bag la zhal 'joms pa la mkhas pa dpag tu
222b4(rgyud 'bum): med pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
222b5(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / rdo rje dbang phyug rdo rje che// rdo rje'i rgyal po kun bdag po// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed mdzad yab// bde chen 'khor lo bdag la gsungs// srid gsum thibs po sel mdzad
222b6(rgyud 'bum): cing / / mya ngan 'das la mi gnas pa// lus can kun skyob brtse chen po// 'dren pa khyod lam bstan du gsol// blo gros snying rje brtan ldan pas// thabs ni gang zhig mngon bsgoms na//
222b7(rgyud 'bum): sku lnga phyag rgya 'grub 'gyur pa// gtso bo de ni 'dir bshad gsol// rdo rje dkyil 'khor cher 'byung ba// 'bum phrag rgyud chen las gsungs pa// ral pa gcig 'phreng dkyil 'khor gtso/
223a1(rgyud 'bum): sbas pa gang lags brtse bas gsungs// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dkyil 'khor ma lus pa'i bdag po rab tu dgyes pas 'dzum pa mdzad do//
223a2(rgyud 'bum): zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog lnga phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te slar 'dus pas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs te/ bcom ldan pa das nyid la bskor
223a3(rgyud 'bum): ba lan gsum byas nas spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ / de nas yang dbu' gtsug tor gyi nor bu las zla ba dang kun da lta bu'i 'od zer dkar po byang ste/ dbu' steng du dkyil 'khor chen po mngon
223a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba'i rnam par bkod pa mngon sum du mdzad do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
223a5(rgyud 'bum): snying rje chen po khyod sems can thams cad la sman pa dang bde ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par 'byung ba'i mdzod rdo rje sgeg pa chen po ral pa gcig pa'i
223a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba mchog zhus pa legs so legs so/ / rdo rje 'chang 'di ni khyod kyi dus yin zhing 'di ni khyod kyi snang bar byed pa yin no// nga yang sngon rdo rje ri bo'i zom 'di nyid du byang chub sems dpa'
223a7(rgyud 'bum): skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ye shes ral pa gcig pa'i gsang ba lhan cig tu rnam par rol pas sems can dpag tu med pa smin par byas pa rjes
223b1(rgyud 'bum): su dran no/ / de bas na khyod kyis snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pas gsang sngags kyi nges par 'byung ba'i rtog pa 'di legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// byang chub sems
223b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// oM AHhUM/ oM oM hrI trAM hUM/ oM AHsarba ta thA ga to gar+b+he badz+ra ta tA sA rA dzA la hUM
223b3(rgyud 'bum): phaT swA hA/ oM AHsarba ta thA ga to mA traM badz+ra tra to pA ya sar ba hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+redz+ra dz+nyA na hUM phaT/ oM AHbadz+re pA ya hUM phaT/ oM AHbadz+ra tsakra a hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+raHrat+na i hUM/
223b4(rgyud 'bum): phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra pad+ma u hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra bi shwa a hUM phaT sA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra ha mo ha oM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra war+t+ta AM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra rA ga u hUM phaT swA hA
223b5(rgyud 'bum): oM AHbadz+ra dre ai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra s+thi ra oM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra yo ka oM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra dz+wa la AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra ba la A hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra
223b6(rgyud 'bum): ru pa Ni ke hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra shab+da tsa hUM phaT sA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra ga~M d+hA Ta hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra ra sa ta hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra s+pha rA pa hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra d+harmA ya hUM phaT
223b7(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra k+She tra sha hUM phaT sA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra A mo ka k+Sha hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra aHku Sha ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra pA sha rI hUM paT swA hA/ oM AHbadz+ra bad+ha laM hUM phaT sA hA
224a1(rgyud 'bum): oM AHbadz+ra krAN+Dal-I hUM phaT sA hA/ oM sa b+hA wa shuSh+Ta sarbad+harmAHswa b+hA ba shunan/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha/ sarbaHrmAHbadz+ra shud+d+horba/ oM ya ga shud+d+ha/ sarba d+harmAHyo ga shu d+hodzaH/
224a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mi bskyor ral pa gcig/ mi bskyod pa ni byang sems bcas// rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje dang // rdo rje zhags pa rnam par sgom// gti mug bag chags 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor lor gnas/
224a3(rgyud 'bum): ri rab nyi zla ba dan las// 'byung bzhi'i rdo rje de bzhin no// khyams bzhir me long pi wang dang // dri mchog zhal zas las byung ba// gzugs sgra dri ro rdo rje ma// mkhas pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/
224a4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs thal na bza' chos 'byung dang // maN+Dal mar me las skyes pa// reg chos zhing dang snang ba yis// sgo bzhi lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dral bu yongs gyur pas// rdo rje lcags kyu la
224a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs sgom/ / rang mtshan ka pA las rab mdzes// gtum drag tshang tshing 'khrig pa dang / 'u ra 'u ra 'bar bas khyab pa dang / keng rus 'jigs rung shar sogs kyi// phyogs su g.yon bskor gyis
224a6(rgyud 'bum): legs gnas/ / ha har dgod pa dbang ldan du// byin zar dpal gyi nags tshal lo// mun pa ma zad bden bral du// rlung du ki li ki lir sgrog/ mi mnyam med par zur bzhi yin// dran dang
224a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po sgo bzhi ste/ / bsam gtan bzhi ni rnarta babs bzhi// rnam thar brgyad phyir ka ba brgyad// byang chub yan lag bdun dag phyir// dra ba dang ni dra ba phyed// phyogs bzhir tshad med bzhi yin te//
224b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma 'khor lo shes rab thabs// rnam par shes brgyad yongs dag pa// de ni dur khrod chen po brgyad// zla ba me long zhi mnyam nyid// sa bon mtshan ma kun tu rtog/ yongs gyur bya ba sgrub pa ste/
224b2(rgyud 'bum): nyer rdzogs chos dbyings ye shes yin// lnga phung dang ni dri ma bzhi// chen po bzhi dang spyod yul brgyad// rnam bzhi tshor ba rnam dag lnga// ye shes bdag nyid 'khor lo'o// dgod dang phrad 'khyud
224b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khrig pa dag/ pU dzA au a go ra de ma/ ka o tr-i ko ka la ka hi/ pri gri sau su na si ma kun ha hi hu he do haM/ a i u e o aM/ rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin// rnam par 'joms
224b4(rgyud 'bum): dang rnam mtshan bral/ / dga' dang mchog dga' dga' bral dang // lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid do// dgod dang phrad 'khyud 'khrig pa dag/ bde chen dag phyir bum pa dang // gsang ba ye shes
224b5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba che/ / dbang bzhi rgyal po thob par 'gyur// dzaHsgrub so// dmigs pas du ba dang gzhan goms 'dod// rnam par mi rtog de nyid sgom// rmi lam nam mkha' sbyar ba ni// nyin mtshan
224b6(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu rnam par gzhag/ spyi bo snying kha lte bar ni// zla ba pad+ma ni steng du// haM dang hUM dang a zhes pa// i gi bde gsal mi rtog rgyud// snying po 'pho dang thim dang gnas// 'gyur dang 'gul
224b7(rgyud 'bum): dang 'bar ba dang / / mda' bsnun bsdu dang 'gro 'ong sbar// lus med sems ni ci bder 'gro// bstim nas 'phro zhing 'bar bar byed// dbang du byed dang kha sbyar sgom// 'dun pas sgrub dang
225a1(rgyud 'bum): sa bon bsgyur/ / 'phen dran par dor don sgrub 'gyur/ tshe 'di yi ni de bzhin du// zhing mtshams sbyor dang srid mtshams yang // rnal 'byor rgyal po thabs ldan pas//
225a2(rgyud 'bum): bde chen sa gsum bde blag 'gro// srid bzhi dag dang nges pa dang // rten 'brel 'byung dang zlog dang gsad// zhi rgyas dbang dang zhi la sogs// 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// gnyis sbyor rgyun mi 'chad
225a3(rgyud 'bum): bde dang / / kun nas 'od gsal lhan cig skyes// bung bas me tog rtsi ltar ni// rnam pa kun tu sgrub pa'o// oM a kA ro mu kha~M sarba d+har+m+ma NAM Ad+ya nuta pan+na tAta sar+b+ba ni sA b+hA ba hUM/ bcom ldan
225a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / / byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor de dag thams cad rab tu yi rangs te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par
225a5(rgyud 'bum): bstod cing mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la brtson par gyur te/ 'jig rten mgon po bcom ldan legs// 'gro ba nyon mongs paskya ba slad du// stong pa'i ting
225a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin spangs nas ni/ / khyod kyis byams chen skur bstan mdzad// thugs rje chen po bcom ldan legs// sems can sdug bsngal bsgral slad du// bzhi pa'i mtha' la mi gnas par/
225a7(rgyud 'bum): brtse chen rnam par 'phrul bar mdzad// bde chen rgyal po bcom ldan legs// lus can bde don sgrub slad du// zag med dbyings thugs ma gzhol bar// dgyes chen kun tu snang mdzad
225b1(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / gtso bo rdo rje rgyal po legs// skye bo dub pa ngal ba so'i phyir// mtha' ci rgyun chad mi zhugs par// ma lus 'tshal ba sgrub pa rmad// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs phal po che de dag dang
225b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'i nges par gyur pa thabs dang shes rab bsam gyi mi khyab cing gzhal du
225b3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas bzhin du tham cad byin gyi rlabs kyis/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du cho 'phrul chen po du ma bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka'
225b4(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pa'i gsang ba chen po rgyud kyi rgyal po nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba la sogs pa de dag ming dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis
225b5(rgyud 'bum): dgongs par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje 'bar ba khrag 'thung gi dkyil 'khor lha bye ba khrag khrag mang po'ang ro'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis tshe rabs thams cad du yi dam byed par
225b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / mi 'am mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba dang / ya nga ba dang / bkra ma shis pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gang gi khyim na gnas pa de'ang
225b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod rten du bya bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs dang dngos grub thams cad kyi gter tshad med par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang
226a1(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa
226a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa rtag pa rdo rje'i rgyud chen chen po za na med pa rdzogs so/ / / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi tra A nA dA'i bka' drin la brten nas/ rgya gar gyi biN+Di ta chen po
226a3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra shrI kha la ru tra dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis 'gyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsan+da gu h+ya ti la ka nA ma ma hA tan+ta rA
226a4(rgyud 'bum): dzabod skad du/ dpal zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar cher
226a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phyag gar dang bcas pas thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la gtsug gi 'dud pas gsol ba btab pa/ dpa' bo kun gyi gsang ba
226a6(rgyud 'bum): yi/ rma gsang thig le dga' byed pa// gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung // bcom ldan khyod kyis bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyis ma skyes pa// skyes dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i//
226a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung 'gyur dang ni rab sbyor ba'i// mchog tu rtag par sbyor ba'o// rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag/ dri med nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i// rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng byas te// nyi ma chen pos
226b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba'o/ / chos kyi longs spyod yang dga' 'byung // pad+mo dmar mo mchog gi mdog/ 'dod chags de nyid gsang ba che// thams cad bde byed bdud rtsi'i mchog/ A dang lar ni yang dag ldan/
226b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag mdzes pa 'gying ba'i 'gros// sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs che// zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu
226b3(rgyud 'bum): bzang pos/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ 'gog pa chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi
226b4(rgyud 'bum): gsung bar bzhugs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid dbyangs kyis bskul te bzhengs par
226b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / oM hUM AHmi skye ye shes bde ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i rol mnabs su gsol/ a la la go// sems dpa' bde mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams la bsrang ba'i phyir// chags pa
226b6(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i bde mchog mnga' mdzad bzhengs shig mnapas/ / mchog tu gsang ba'i bde la rol cing dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol// byang chub skye gnas bde mchog dbyings las mi nyams dga' ba'i
226b7(rgyud 'bum): gar mdzod cig/ a la la ho// sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang dngo bskams nyon mongs gzir ba la// rmongs med pade mchog rgyan dang ldan pas thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzod// 'gro kun
227a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs par spyod pa'i sgo mor byang chub lam bstan cing / / bde mchog bdud rtsi khyad par med par 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol cig/ a la la ho// de nas bcom
227a2(rgyud 'bum): l dan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po zla gsang thig le skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting
227a3(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi thugs kyi gsang ba las shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying
227a4(rgyud 'bum): po zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du'ang snang bar byas/ steng dang 'og tu rang zhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i ri dang sems can rnams la gsal bar
227a5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes par byas te/ sngar de nyid du log nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mnyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po snying po gsang ba mchog gi zla ba'i thig
227a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i dbus na bde bar bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi 'phreng ba mchog tu bde ba chen por gyur pa'i snying po des bskul pa na/
227a7(rgyud 'bum): gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po thugs ka'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su mchog tu gsang ba'i dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar gcig tu
227b1(rgyud 'bum): sdug por gyur pa bsgrubs te/ rang rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par byung bar gyur to// de nas la la ni spyan pad+mo 'bar brgyas pa ltar bsgyur
227b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing bzlog ste smin rigs g.yo bas/ sangs rgyas tshul gyi gar mdzad cing // sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// rdo rje rab dgyes gdon mi za// sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing // sangs
227b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bde ba'i bde ba yis/ / bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur// smin ma bsgyur zhing zhabs bsgyur ba// spyan bsgyur shin tu gnon pa yin// sor mo'i mtha' ma rnams bsgyur ba/
227b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i tshul gyis gar mdzad de// rdo rje che la mnyes mdzad cing // rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ skad cig skad cig skul ba yis// bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur// brjid pa'i zhabs dang
227b5(rgyud 'bum): rin chen dbu/ / dri med spyi bos gar mdzad cing // zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rnam bsgyur bas// bde byed chen po mya ngan mdzad// dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gis// pad+mo'i spyan gyis
227b6(rgyud 'bum): gzigs mdzad cing / / bde ba bdag po chen po la// rin chen tshul gyis mdzes par mdzad// shin dgyes gsal ba bde dam pa// pad+mo dmar la phye mdzad de// 'dod chags bul dgyes
227b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam bsgyur bar/ / pad+mo dra bas gar mdzad cing // pad+mo rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// brjod pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs te// bde ba che la mnyes mdzad cing // bcom ldan pad+mor gnas par
228a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / phyag gi rtse mor sor mo'i mtha'// rnam par bsgyur bas gar mdzad cing // phyag sbyar khong stong pad+mo yos// glog bzhin dpal dang spyi gtsug tu// mchod pa'i spyan
228a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis long long bas/ / sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la// las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing // sna tshogs bcom ldan gnas par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun
228a3(rgyud 'bum): tu bzang po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che gsang
228a4(rgyud 'bum): pab dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi gsang ba chen po thams cad kyi bzhed pa bde ba chen po zhes bya ba/ 'od zer chen po'i sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mchog las phyung ngo // de nas
228a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa sku 'di dag thams cad la snang bas snang bar byas te/ nyid kyi thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le la stug po gcig tu gyur nas bzhugs te/ thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su 'od zer des dgyes
228a6(rgyud 'bum): par skyed cing drangs nas bcug ste gcig tu byas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za bar rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//
228a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las gsungs so// dkyil
228b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi ni tshul gyis su/ / tshogs kyi sbyor bas spro byas te// theg dang mthun par dkyil 'khor gdon// sbyor ba'i gar gyi gar bya zhing // ji ltar yang dag brtag par byas// ji ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na//
228b2(rgyud 'bum): zla gsang thig le'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang // brtag par nus pa ma yin no// dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pa// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// lha yi sbyor
228b3(rgyud 'bum): bas rgyas btab pas/ / cho ga shes pas bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// thig bzhi yongs su bris pa ste// ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas// kun tu
228b4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su zlum pa ste/ / zla ba de yi dbus bsam pa// bde ba chen po mi phyed pa// gtso bo de ste bri bar bya// de nas tsheg drag bcas pa ste// yi ge bcu gsum ldan pa yi// yi ge mchog tu ba ba ste// rlung gi
228b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor yang dag 'byung / / shes rab can gyis de mdun du// mi phyed yid phyung bri bya ste// drag po'i tshig dang 'dren par bcas// bzhi yis gtsug tu byas pa'o// de yi lho yi phyogs su ni// mi smra ba yi/
228b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge'i mchog/ phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog thams cad// sgrub par byed pa'i yi ge bri// ha dang rang ldan tsheg drag bcas// bzhi pa yis ni dbur byas pa// sngags kyi gzugs kyi yi ge ni// nub kyi phyogs su
228b7(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ / khro zar yi ge ye shes che// yi ge'i phyag rgya rmad byung ba// brjid du bcas pa dgod pa yi// byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya// sems can thams cad mchog dag dang // dgyes pa chen po rab 'grub phying
229a1(rgyud 'bum): nga yi de zhing gsung gi ni/ / dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// bar gyis tshud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can mchog gis ston byed
229a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la gar mdzad cing /
229a3(rgyud 'bum): ba tu spros pa spyan gdangs nas// zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa yis// sdud cing 'dor ba 'dzugs par mdzad// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis// rjed pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad
229a4(rgyud 'bum): zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan/ / mdzes pa'i spyan tshugs rnam bsgyur ba'i// spyan gyi phyag rgyas gar mdzad pas// 'gro la rgyas btab 'dud par 'gyur// sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo la// dbyangs 'di yis
229a5(rgyud 'bum): ni bskul mdzad cing / / shin tu dgyes che dkyil 'khor du// rnal 'byor ma kun gnas par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// dkyil 'khor mchog tu dgyes pa yis//
229a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid bcom ldan nyid kyis shod// rnam pa kun tu skye med pa'i// bde bas rol cing chub mdzad pa'i// bdag cag gzugs kyi dmar dang bcas te rnam dpyod 'gyur ba med pa'i yid// bde mchog byang
229a7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems ni rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te/ / che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis grub mchog ldan pa bde sprod bde la rol par mdzod// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yin// shin tu srid pas mya ngan 'das//
229b1(rgyud 'bum): dga' chen de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams// dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlob// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rgyas pa spyan ut+pa la kha phye ba bzhin smin ma dang
229b2(rgyud 'bum): sku rnam par 'gyur pa/ glog dang chu rlabs bzhin du 'gyur pa'i rnam par gnon pas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje de kho na nyid ni gsungs so// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba//
229b3(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog nyid ni// bdag nyid sbyor bas brtags pa yin// rdo rje dgyes pa chen po yi// dkyil 'khor zla ba gang ba 'dra// 'od zer dkar po 'phreng
229b4(rgyud 'bum): bas mdzes/ / byang chub sems mchog 'dra ba yin// rdo rje dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor ni// mdzes pa zla ba kham pa yi// mthing kha'i 'bar ba kun rgyas pa// me dang rlung gis bus pa bzhin// shin tu
229b5(rgyud 'bum): dgyes pa'i mchog sgrub pa/ / rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor cha brgyad kyi// 'bar dang bcas pa'i nyi ma bzhin// dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa// pad+mor dbang po
229b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo 'dra/ / 'dab ma brgyad po gyes pa yi// ge sar zla bas mdzes byas pa'o// thams cad las ni grub byed pa// rdo rje'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste// rab tu 'bar ba ma
229b7(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra/ / de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas pa// dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag par bya// skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa' yis// ji ltar de nyid sprul pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
230a1(rgyud 'bum): yang bzhengs nas brjid pa'i rdo rje'i gar dag gis gar mdzad cing glu dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / du na wa dang / pa na wa dang
230a2(rgyud 'bum): ba li ka dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun tu brdung ba dang / sil snyan la sogs pa'i rnam par rol pas lI'i ro dang / ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang /
230a3(rgyud 'bum): bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / stan dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang / gzhib pa dang / 'jams la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje
230a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la bstabs nas/ gus pa dang bcas pas pad+mo'i sor mo khong stong du mdzad de g.yon du 'dud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ yang de kho na nyid bskul bar mdzad pa'i dbyangs
230a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dis bstod pa mdzad do/ / shin tu bde ba'i byams pa kun tu gzigs pa'i thugs rje spyan mnga' bas// byang chub chen po snying por 'gro ba sgrol bas skyo yis mi mnga' ste// mthun pa'i lam ston nyon
230a6(rgyud 'bum): / mongs drug las sgrol ba'i phyir// nam mkha'i tshul du gzungs kyi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs// e ma'o bde ba kun tu rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren cing mnapas// sa yi khyad par bde
230a7(rgyud 'bum): bas rdzogs pa'i sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ chos nyid ji bzhin de la reg pas sku nyid che ba kun ston cing // snying po byang chub bgrod phyir 'gro ba thams cad sgo mo bsam gyis mi khyab
230b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ / dpal gyi snying po gzugs su bstan te rigs lnga'i gtso rnams mnyes mdzad cing // dgyes pas drongs la mnabs shing rab tu dgyes pas rol mo mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde mnos te/
230b2(rgyud 'bum): bying ba'i gnas nas bslang ba'i phyir// gnod sbyin cha lugs skye 'gog med pa'i tshul dang rnam par ldan// snying rje chen po rgyun dang bcas nas bde ba chen po ston pa'i chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin// dgyes pa
230b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi dang la sprul pa'i lha mo skye mched dang / / rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde mchog sgrog par mdzod// ha ha do bde la gnas shing bde mnobs hUM// dgyes pa mchog dang ldan pa'i maM skye bde mchog
230b4(rgyud 'bum): bde la char pa rab tu dbab tu stsol/ / rnam pa kun tu mtha' dang bral ba'i dbyings la bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol// dpal gyi rgyal po tshul bzhin de ltar bzhugs pa'i gnas su mnabs su
230b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / ngo mtshar byang chub che ba 'di nyid 'gro ba rten bzhin bde thob pa// pha rol phyin drug dngos nyid gang la yang ni mi bstan par// mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzungs dang rtag tu rnam par ldan/ mtha' dang
230b6(rgyud 'bum): bral ba'i bde bas chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi/ / rmongs pa'i bde bas bying zhing gnas pa'i 'grol snying rje'i chu yis khrus mthong ho// de nas shin tu dgyes mchog mi chags pa// 'di ni glu ru blangs
230b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / yid dang 'thab pa'i bde chen po// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
231a1(rgyud 'bum): po la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa nye bar gnas nas/ yang chu skyes kyi 'dab ma dri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs shing 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/
231a2(rgyud 'bum): yang tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal pa rgyas pa'i srin gyi rgya mtsho ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu
231a3(rgyud 'bum): rin po che dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dang
231a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po dang / thugs las byung ba dang / dga' ba dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo'i g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par 'dren par byed pa dang
231a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gug par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs dang / grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang
231a6(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par bde ba chen
231a7(rgyud 'bum): po gyur pa dang bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon pas rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pas 'degs
231b1(rgyud 'bum): shing tshems kyis 'debs pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'brel ba'i phyag gis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pas 'gying ba dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par
231b2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i rnams dang / kun tu 'dor ba'i rnam par gnon pas 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po da
231b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa/ bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang // de bzhin lha yi de nyid dang // sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid ni// de yis dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur//
231b4(rgyud 'bum): yan lag thams cad sgom las 'das// rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa// 'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya// chos dang chos min rnams spyod pa/ chos rnams
231b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad brtag par bya/ / rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin// 'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam// chu yi pad+mo dmar ba 'dra// rang sems bsod nams
231b6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu chags/ / 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pa'i// gang khams kun la 'jug 'gyur pa// sems ni chu dang skul byed pa// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor
231b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes pa'o/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang / pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i
232a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin gtso bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma'o rab dgyes
232a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' mchog/ kye ma'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs mchog gi/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba sbyor che ba// rdo rje sbyor ba bla na med//
232a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs gsum bde mchog thob 'gyur pa'i// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// rin chen pad+ma sna tshogs che// sna tshogs sbyor ba gang mdzad pa// rnam grangs thig le'i 'jig rten du//
232a4(rgyud 'bum): / rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsung // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag pad+mo sor mo'i 'dab ma kun tu 'brel ba'i rdo rje'i thal mo dang / gar rnam par
232a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'i brjid pag tu bcas pas mtha' 'grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas chu skus gsar pa'i 'dab ma bzhin gzigs par bzhad pa/ glu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang / gcig la gcig
232a6(rgyud 'bum): bskul ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa la 'degs shing g.yas dang g.yon pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i tshul gyis/ oM hUM a la la la ho/ kun tu snang zhing mi chags par// mi chags pa yi bde mchog
232a7(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / bdag gi rnal 'byor gzungs kyi rnams// stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pas// a la la la ho// bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/ bzhengs shing gzhan la sto/
232b1(rgyud 'bum): la grub par mdzod// chags pas mi gos dngos po yaM// bde ba kun la reg par mdzad cing dgongs su gsol/ de nas kun tu bamang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag po de khon nyid kyi dbyangs chen pos
232b2(rgyud 'bum): bskul bas thugs sad par gyur te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje gdon mi ba ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i
232b3(rgyud 'bum): / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i gar sna tshogs shin tu dgyes pa chen po rnam par gnon par gar mdzad shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis mgur len/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa chen pos rnam par rol/
232b4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rdo rje bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i zla ba'i thig le'i dkyil na/ oM ma hA su kha hUM/ zhes brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
232b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag mo ye shes dbyings phyug ma phyung ngo / / steng du zla gam ldan pa yin// gnyis pa yi ge ma lta bu/ mtshan du thig le ldan byas pa/ ye shes gsar bar rnal 'byor ma'o// A li kA li 'dren bya ba/ dbus
232b6(rgyud 'bum): su ri mo brtaka byas te/ / de yi mgo dang mjug dag tu// khro bo gnyis po mchog bsam bya// 'di ni btsun mo'i rab gsal ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o// 'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang // bsod
232b7(rgyud 'bum): nams kun gyi byin rlob 'gyur/ / A li gnyis dbus ri mor bris// ldan pa 'dren pa yang dag ldan// de ste zla gam thig le dga'// mgo mjug gnyis su gzhan yang traM/ 'di ni don dam gsal ba ste/
233a1(rgyud 'bum): rin chen rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin// dran pa bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed// A li gnyis dang ldan byas te// tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad
233a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rab dga' kun tu chags/ / chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin// dang po bskal pa chen po yi// tsheg drag po dang bcas pa gzhan// sangs rgyas kun gyi A li 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub rab byin byed// bdag
233a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid la 'am yang na gzhan/ / phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsgrub bya'i dkyil 'khor grub byed na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog/ yi ge phyag rgya'i mngon
233a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i/ / 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// bros pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur// e ma'o bde ba ye shes che// de yi ye shes tshe 'di la// 'dod byed bde ba sten byed cing // 'di yi tshul gyis thob
233a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di las rgya che mchog gzhan med// sgrub pa po yi sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// zla gsang thig le gsang ba'i rgyal po
233a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i da
233a7(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen mo rnams kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te dang po rdzogs so/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes
233b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yid bde ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba skyes nas/ gar dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje band pa mdzad cing / yang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya /
233b2(rgyud 'bum): 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par gyur to// bde byed chen po bshad pa shod// bde ba chen po bshad pa shod// gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod// dgyes pa chen po bshad pa
233b3(rgyud 'bum): shod/ / khyod las 'dod chags yang dag 'byung // khyod las zhe sdang chen po ste// khyod las bde byed sdug bsngal dang // khyod las khams gsum thams cad 'byung // khyod las skyes pa ma ning dang
233b4(rgyud 'bum): khyod las 'dod gzir bud med dang / khyod las 'dod las rnam grol dang // khyod las byang chub bla med 'byung / khyod las nam mkha' rlung dag dang / khyod las gzi brjid me yi khams/ khyo las
233b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin chu dang sa/ khyod las spyod dang mi spyod kun// khyod las sangs rgyas pa chen po// yang dang yang du 'byung bar 'gyur// khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang // khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs/
233b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' dpa' chen dang // ri dang skye bo thams cad 'byung // khyod las rdo rje sems dpa' dang // khyod las dri med pad+mo dang // khyod las rin chen tshad med che// de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung
233b7(rgyud 'bum): khyod las phyag rgya sngags kyi rnams/ / khyod las rig pa snying las 'byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzums par smin ma brkyang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems
234a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten
234a2(rgyud 'bum): las 'das pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhar lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma yin pa kun 'dus pa thams cad la skad cig
234a3(rgyud 'bum): skad cig tu kun tu gzigs nas brjid pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jam pos/ nyid kyi snying khar rdo rje gsor zhing / nyid kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rdo rje su chags pa rab tu rgyas pa chen po'i lta bas 'khor thams cad zil gyis
234a4(rgyud 'bum): mnan te/ nyid kyi thugs pad+mo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge'i thig le'i dkyil nas phyung ste kun tu snang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
234a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid kyi sku dang / / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dang po'i yi ge bcu gsum pa// thig ler bcas pa bsam byas te// bde chen tshul bzhin gzhab byas la// gzhan gyis mi phyed thig ler
234a6(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ / yi ge drug pa 'dren pa ru// tshul bzhin 'og tu yongs su brtag/ 'di ni gsang ba chen po ste// rmad byung yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// bde chen bde bar bskyed pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis
234a7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags pa yin/ / ye shes kyis ni phyag rgya 'dis// skad cig snying pos rgyas btab na// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chang ba po// ston pa rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// bde ba chen po skul byed pa'i/
234b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs par byed// yi ge ye shes grub pa yis// ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur// 'phrul gyi mig dang shes rab che// mi shes sdig pa 'joms par byed// rdo rje sems pa' nyid
234b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dra bar/ / tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// bde ba chen po reg pa che// sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms byed pa'o// shes rab ye shes dngos grub che// byang chub myur du 'thob 'gyur te// rig ma 'bum phrag
234b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyas bskor cing / / sems dpa' chen po de dang rtsen// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// thal mo brgyang ste rol pa yis// tshe dang lang tsho skal dang ldan// dran pa tsam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// 'dod pa yis
234b4(rgyud 'bum): ni dgos par rnams/ / myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// 'og dang steng gi nam mkha' la// bdag 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed// sa yang rnam par phug nas su// stobs chen de 'dir 'ong bar byed//
234b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed de// byang chub par ni gdon mi bya// bde ba chen po'i rnam mdzad pas// gnom zhing de bzhin myang ba yi// rdo rje blo yis bdud kyi rnams// rnam par 'gyur bas thams cad bsgra
234b6(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po gtong ba yis/ / skad cig nyid du gsol ba bya// grub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa che// dpa' bo chen pos dgug par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams ci 'dod par// rnam gnod tshul gyis gnon par bya// dbang
234b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i dbang dbang chen po/ / gnod byed stobs kyis dgon gnas par// rab tu rnam 'joms gnon pa yis// gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bar bya// mtshon cha lnga yis rnam gnon pas// gzhan gyi bud med
235a1(rgyud 'bum): rtsen par bya/ / kye ma'o bde ba bde gnas pa'i// sems can chen po'i grol byas te// byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// dam tshig rjes
235a2(rgyud 'bum): su ldan pa yis/ / rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur// skad cig mtho ris 'grol bar byed// rdo rje'i shugs kyis thams cad du// sems can skad cig 'di ru'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas su 'gyur/
235a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams dang grags chen po// thams cad kyi ni rigs rnams dang // pha rol phyin rnams skye gnas te// de bzhin rigs dang pha rol phyin// de dag 'di la rab tu gnas// dbang por gyur pa brtan/
235a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po// yon tan tshogs ni nam mkha' bzhin// de nyid dngos po thams cad dus gsum mnyam gnas te// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde// sems dpa' thog ma tha med yin// bcom ldan 'das
235a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos kyi yi ge zhes bya ba yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ / / bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge che// ye shes thig le ldan pa ste// rdo rje
235a6(rgyud 'bum): yid 'byung lpags pa yi/ / ga la ra btags dbu bskor bya// 'di ni yid las skyes pa ste// shin tu dgyes che mdzes pa yis// yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che// gtso bo'i spyan sngar gnas pa yis//
235a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i snying gi pad+mo la// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// de ni de ma thag nyid du/ shin tu dgyes pa'i mnyes par 'gyur// gtso chen rdo rje sems dpa' la// de yi bde bas mnyes byas te/
235b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang po yin sbyor ba yis// de dang rol pas myang du 'grub// de gnyis phan tshun dgyes pa las// shin tu dgyes pa'i gzhir gyur te// rig 'dzin mchog gi gzugs ldan dang // lA mi kun gyis
235b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod par 'gyur/ / de dang ldan cig rol pan// lha chen tshangs pa gtogs 'dod rnams// byab rtswa sbyar ba'i tshul gnas pa'i// bdag nyid che la phyag byed pa'o// zhes gsum drim spangs pa sa/
235b3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu sbyor ba'i rgyas btab pa// sems can gar ni byed pa dang // sems dpa' chal mnyes par byed// don sa dang nam mkha' la// bde bar gnas shing 'gro bar byed// sna tshogs lha mo bden
235b4(rgyud 'bum): bo'o/ / sna tshogs bde bas ner sbyar ro// phyag rgyar kar gos kar mdzad cing // sems can myur du rtogs par byed// ral gror gyur pa gami chen po/ nam mkha' kun tu phan tshun 'gro// lha mo 'phrul gyi
235b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba dang / / lha min klu yi bu mo dang // gzhan yang 'phrul ldan mo'i bu mo// de yis bud me kun bsgrub bya// phyag rgya'i ye shes rab gnas pas// de nyid kun tu 'gro byed de// ji tsam 'dod par na gyi ma mcho
235b6(rgyud 'bum): du/ / rdo rje sems dpa' che gnas so// sangs rgyas thams cad myur du 'grub// thams cad chos ni bde chen po// dge 'dun phyags med thams cad rnams// de dag thams cad de yin no// dbang po nye dbang dbang
235b7(rgyud 'bum): chen gyi/ / thogs med stobs kyis bkug nas su// rdo rje sems dpa' thabs gnas pas// gzhan gyi bud med 'atsem par bya// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya ye shes bsgrub bya ste// skad ci
236a1(rgyud 'bum): skad cig bsten pa yis/ / bdag gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med sbyor ba 'di yis ni// don dngos grub kun 'gyur te// bdag med nga rgyam med gyur te// snang ba med
236a2(rgyud 'bum): cing yi ge med/ / shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i yid dang rjes su mthun par mdzad ma'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / lha mo rdo rje kA li ni// dang por oM gyis rnam brgyan pa// bgegs mthar byed dang
236a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa ni/ / dbang mchog sbyin par mdzad ma ste// de yis bud med snying kha ru// bdag nyid kyis ni byin brlabs te// dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis// mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya// de nas
236a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor chen po de/ / rnal 'byor dbang phyug byin brlabs pas// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu// mdzes pa'i spyan dang rol cing 'gro// bdag ga mngon te gzhan dag la// phyag rgya de yis rgyas
236a5(rgyud 'bum): btab ste/ / rdo rje pad+mo phye ba yis// sgrub pa po sa ni myur du sgrub// pad+mo rnam par phye byas te// phyag rgya sbyor bas rol pa yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// 'gro dang 'ong ba gdon mi ma// g.yas dang
236a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i tshul gyis su/ / lag pa'i phyag rgya gzung byas ste// sbyor ba chen po bsgom byas na// de ma thag tu nam mkha' 'gro// bdag nyid gan kyal gnas byas te// nyid kyi steng du phyag rgya gzhag/ nyid
236a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis byin brlabs phyag rgya la/ / sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyod par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi glo dag tu// dgyes dang mdza' ba gnyis gzhug par// mig yang phyag rgya bzhag byas te// bdag nyid shin
236b1(rgyud 'bum): tu dgyes par bsgom/ / 'di yis dngos grub 'thob 'gyur te// 'di dag lhan cig 'grogs pa yis// gzung ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du// sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur// 'di dang lhan cig
236b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / nam mkha' bdag po sangs rgyas bzhin// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// de ni sangs rgyas ngo bor 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// nub gcig bdud rtsi dbyung
236b3(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / gzung ma'i phyag rgya la brten nas// rmad byung zhing ni 'thob ces bshad// mtshan gyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mtha'// dang por gnyis ka 'dug byas na// sngags kyi dbyings srug gar 'gro sa// de dang /
236b4(rgyud 'bum): cig dngos grub 'gro// phyed dam yang na nam phyed na// rig mi'i dbyings su reg bya zhing // myu ra bas khros pa'i sgra sgrog pas// gyad kyi 'byed pas brtsam par bya// bkye ba'i mjug tu de ma zag/ 'o ma
236b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni btung byas na/ / de nas de ni rdo rje 'grub// zla gsang dkyil du 'gro bar byed// sa de bzhin bzlog pa dang // ci 'de brtan pa bya ba las// byang chub sems ni 'char ma thag/ 'phrog ma yi ni dngos
236b6(rgyud 'bum): grub bo/ / 'di yis rig chen gtsug nyid du/ mi g.yeng mtshan mo byas 'gyur na// sangs rgyas dngos grub 'phrog kyang ngo do// sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis 'thob// 'di yis snying khor zla gsang la//
236b7(rgyud 'bum): mig yor nyid du brtag byas na// de ni de ma thag tu yang / khwa gsang thig yo'i mchog 'drar 'gyur// ring yos rig pa tsam gyis kyang // dngos grub gang dga' thob byed de// rdo rje'i phyag rgyag zi chen po// rgyal po 'din rnam
237a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyu/ / 'don sgrub pa'i dus su yang / rnam par rtog pa yong mI tra// rtag tu mi rtog 'gyur ba yis// nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par bya// sdug bsngal ba yi sems can la// sbyin pa bzhi ni/
237a2(rgyud 'bum): tu sbyin// de la bde ba sbyin byas te// mi snyan nam yang sbyin mi bya// shin tu dgyes pa'i sems ma chen mo dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje kI li kA li shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa'o/
237a3(rgyud 'bum): thog ma oM ste ja' chen mo// rdo rje shin tu dgyes dang 'brel// 'di ni 'dod chags thams cad la// 'dod chags bde byed snyoms par thob// rol pa'i sbyor bas bud med la// 'di ni rtag tu mnyes par bya//
237a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis 'gro ba gsum dag tu// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// pad+mo kha phye rgyas pa'i spun// sngags mkhan de ni skad cig 'gyur// gtso bo yi ni bde mchog gis// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bya//
237a5(rgyud 'bum): sprod pa'i phyag rgya rgyas btab ste// skad cig skad cig spyod par bya// dus dag tu ni reg pa dang // gzhug pa yang ni rtag tu bya// bskyod dang mnyes pa de bzhin du// mnyam du 'grogs pa'i cho ga bya// skyed
237a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ni sbyang ba dang / / skad cig skad cig bsnyen par bya// gar dang kun nas bskor ba dang // 'jib dang de bzhin btung ba dang // the tsom med pa'i sems kyis ni// dam tshig dang ni bsgrub par bya//
237a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// mi g.yor tsher ni dngos grub ste// sangs rgyas kyang chub dngos grub dang // bskal par gnas pa smos ci dgos// 'di ni dngos grub thob ma thag/ pad+mo 'dzin pa'i rjes
237b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ / la ka na pad+mo 'bar khyer bzhin// khro ldan mi g.yeng bskal par gnas// brjod pas dpal dges lhan cig ku// bde ldan zhing du 'gro 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po deng phyin nas// bde ldan gyi mchon
237b2(rgyud 'bum): rtse lo lo/ / pad+ma'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// don bde bar gnas par 'gyur// bde ldan rtag tu 'grogs 'gyur ba// dngos grub ye shes bde myong 'gyur// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// pad+mo las skyes
237b3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs bzung ste/ / byin gyis brlabs na bde myangs na// pad+mo bde ba'i bdag por 'gyur// gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsten byas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid du/
237b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdon mi za// sdug cing la sogs rgyan pa yaM// nyi ma'i 'od zer gsar byung bzhin// dri med yangs pa'i lta ba yis// pad+mo sems dpa'i tshe 'grub bo// ji tsam nam mkha' se ba rig
237b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed de/ / rig ma 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi// lha mo yis ni mchod pa myed// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdagazhid mchod// 'khor ba nyid na gnas
237b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshe/ / 'khor ba'i dri mas mi gos so// phyag rgya 'od yis rgyas btab na// rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te// sman gyis phye ma sbyor ba yis// sbrul ni gsod par gyur pa bzhin// zla gsang thog le'i
237b7(rgyud 'bum): dga' byed 'di/ / tshe 'di nyid la thog 'gyur te// 'di yi mthu mi bo yis// dgos pa thams cad dngos grub po// gang 'dod dngos grub don yod pa/ 'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi// mthun chen phrab
238a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid kyis/ / dran pa tsam gyis de dngos 'grub// shin tu dgyes pa pad+mo 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes so// // dang por oM dang yang dag ldan// mtha'
238a2(rgyud 'bum): mar bsgyings pa'i hUM nyid de/ / dbus su rab dgyes rdo rje gzhag/ yi ge 'di ni rmad byung ba'o// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur// khams gsum 'di na dngos grub
238a3(rgyud 'bum): che/ dpal gyi bsgyings pa 'thob par 'gyur// bdud dang bdud las rjes 'jug pa// mi thogs par ni rgyal byed de// sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas// de yis khams gsum 'phrog par byed//
238a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te// de yi khams gsum longs spyod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// pad+mo rdo rje rab ldan bya// 'phreng byed 'phreng ba'i tshul gyis su// 'phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin// 'di
238a5(rgyud 'bum): yis byin gyis brlabs byas te/ / bsnyen na myur du dngos grub bo// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sprin bsgyur bas// chu skyes can ni sbyar byas te// phyag rgyas btab ste rol byas na// bla ma'i dngos grub thob par byed// rdo rje rnam
238a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor na pa yi/ / rdo rje bdag nad mchod byed de// de dang kun gyis bskor byas nas// dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo yis// 'jigs shing skrag pas sbyin byed pa// rang ning
238a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni phyag rgya'i gzugs/ / nyid kyi dngos grub pastobs par byed// gzhan ni yang dag pha rol phyin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyan// de yang de la 'jigs skrag nas// rang gi dgyes mchog stobs par byed/
238b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po dmigs gsum dang // che ba'i pa ni ngo bzhi dang // rdo rje 'dzin dang rtogs rnams dang / rang gi sdig pa stobs par byed// gshin rje sha ka rgyal po yang // rdo rje 'dzin rje dngos grub la// 'ongs nas bdag gi sdug
238b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnams/ / srog gi phyir yang stobs par byed// gzhan gyi 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams// khams gsum lam la gnas pa dang / myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang // bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin par byed// sna tshogs
238b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyen ni rgyal po che/ / dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs byed// de yang nyer 'ongs gtsug gtugs te// rnal 'byor sna tshogs ma sbyin byed// gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs la sogs// sha za yi dgas bu mo rnams/
238b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ldan phyag rgya blang byas te// brtag pa mchog gis brtag par bya// thams cad las byed dge ba yi// rang yis dngos grub myur du 'grub// lha dang klu yi bu mo dang // lha min lha yi mngal skyes pa// phyag rgya 'di
238b5(rgyud 'bum): yis byin brlabs na/ / grub pa myur du dngos grub bo// gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung // gang de bud med bzung byas pa// rim pa 'ding yi tshul gyis su// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba brtag par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas
238b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / de bzhin dpa' bo kun nyid du// skad cig skad cig rgyas btab pas// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po sna tshogs dpe med pa'i 'brang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// /
238b7(rgyud 'bum): / nga ro bcu gsum steng nyid du// de bzhin thig lo'i rgyal po ste// rab dgyes rdo rje lga che bde// mtha' ni yi ge gi sbyar bor// 'don sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde chen spyan ni dga' byed yin// phrag rgya'i mi
239a1(rgyud 'bum): ge 'di yis ni/ / mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs byas nas// des ni de ma thag tu yang // bla med 'phrul gyi spyan du 'gyur// stong nyid ye shes gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas shin tu phra ba mthong /
239a2(rgyud 'bum): smin ma rnam bsgyur rgyas pa yis// lta ba'i phyag rgyas gar byed cing // 'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rdo rje kun 'dzin dang // pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // de bzhin gzung ma'i tshogs rnam
239a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dang // phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang // lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// lha min dngos grub lus kyi mchog/ grul bum ma 'am yi dgas sam// sha za 'phrul gyi mi bu mo// 'di
239a4(rgyud 'bum): ni snying khar bzhag pa yis/ / rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas yang na nyi ma dang // pad+mo dra ba sna tshogs zo// lha dang lha min mi dag dang // gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang // bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs
239a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi/ / gzhan gyis 'phrog par yod mi nus// lha dang lha min gyis mchod cing // dngos grub khams gsum 'gro bar byed// lha dang lha min rten byed cing // skad cig nyid du 'gro bar byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mkhyen
239a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yul/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing kun tu// rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang // de ni rtsen cing 'gro bar byed// 'jigs med yan lag kun spangs pa// thog ma tha ma med 'gyur te// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
239a7(rgyud 'bum): mkhyen sbyor bas/ / dgyes pa'i rmad mchog gcig tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i nang na rdo rjer 'gyur// rin chen nang na rin chen 'gyur// pad+mo'i nang na pad+mor 'gyur// sna tshogs nang na sna tshogs mchog/ de la sogs pa
239b1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yas mchog/ mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs pas// dam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// gzugs mi sdug pa gzugs mchog 'gyur// mig med pa yang mig
239b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'gyur/ / rna 'on pa yang sgra thos te// glen pa yang ni yid rnor 'gyur// de la sogs pa dpag med pa// mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// de yi lus la yon tan ni// yon tan dam pa mdangs cher 'brug/
239b3(rgyud 'bum): ji tsam de ni nam mkha'i mthongs// 'phur zhing 'og tu 'bar bar byed// de ni nam yang lug nas 'gro// sa dang sa yi 'og tu ni// sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnams byed pas// de ni skad cig 'gro bar byed//
239b4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// sngags mkhan 'gyur bar gar byed pa// bde ba chen po bskyed pa yis// sems can de ni 'jug par byed// ma g.yeng lta bu'i bsgyur ba yis// las rnams tham
239b5(rgyud 'bum): cad de yis byed/ / 'deg pa dang ni lta ba yis// gar dang rnam par bskor ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed de// ri dang sems can thams cad la// smra ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang // ci dga' bar ni
239b6(rgyud 'bum): mngag par byed/ / sdug pa'i lta bas srog chags rnams// rdeg pa dang ni sgral bar byed// gtum dang gdug 'jigs che ba dang // khro bo'i lta bas sgral bar byed// shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje spyan
239b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa zhes bya bar 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i yi go phyag rgya ye shes kyi mthu chen po'o/ / / dang po oM gyis rnam par brgyan// tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa/ rdo rje
240a1(rgyud 'bum): tu dgyes pa'i sku/ / bde ba skyes byed bshad pa yin// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo yi// gang gis kyang ni bsgoms ma thag/ rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlob
240a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // 'di yis nyid kyi snying kha ru// bsgoms te gnyis med sbyor byas na// sangs rgyas sku ni rab tu 'grub// bsgrubs na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bud
240a3(rgyud 'bum): med kun dang rtsen byed de/ / A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// sems can dman yang dngos grub bo// shin tu skal ldan thams cad dang // sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob 'gyur te// skal dang ldan pa thams
240a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi/ / chu skyes zhabs la snyan par byed// lha dang lha min bu mo de'i// rig mas mthong na dga' byed de// phyag rgya'i ye shes brgyan pa yis// sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur//
240a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod dang mi spyod mi dag dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mi 'am ci dang skyes bu yi// dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus// de la sogs pas stod byed de// 'jigs par 'gyur ba'i sems
240a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / bla ma bzhin du mchod byed cing // kun gyis bstod mchod bsti stang byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ nam mkha' mtha' klas lha rnams dang // nyi ma bcu yis 'od zer bzhin//
240a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor chen po 'grub par 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun tu// 'od kyis thams cad mnyes byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// zil gyis mnan te gnas par 'gyur/
240b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la// sras rnams 'dud cing phyag byed de// lha dang lha min grul bum dang // tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lnga chen po// phyag rgyar ye shes byin brlabs der// 'jigs shing skrag
240b2(rgyud 'bum): bas 'ong bar byed/ / bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol// ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin// spyi bos bkar blang gdul dka' rnams// de dag thams cad sgrub par byed// mdor bsdus
240b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa bzhi po yi/ / dam pa rnams kyang bskyang bar bgyi// bla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid kyi// dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste// rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid// rnam pa bzhi po thams cad blang /
240b4(rgyud 'bum): chu skyes dngos grub khyod zhabs drung // 'tsho ba'i bar du bdag cag 'bangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar zhabs 'bring du// ci bgyi zhes ni bkar nod do// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// spyod bcas mi spyod
240b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' byed de/ / rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog/ shin tu bde dang mdza' ba myong // rdo rje shin tu dbyes ma'i sku chen mo bde ba dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin to//
240b6(rgyud 'bum): / dang por oM steng thig le'i ste// gzhan gyis mi phyed khros bcas pas// gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni// gsung gi rdo rje shin tu dgyes// bde gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ mchog
240b7(rgyud 'bum): tun myong byed pa/ / dam chos sgra yis gang byas pa'o// gsung gsal rnab dka' bar byed// yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po 'di// byang chub chen por grub byed de// yon tan yon tan sdug mtho ba'i/
241a1(rgyud 'bum): tshad med yon tan 'dzin pa'o// dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab na// dpal kun bdag po de ma thag/ bdag dang bdag rig 'dzin spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob// phyag
241a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya 'di yis bdag gam gzhan/ / rgyas btab 'dod pa spyad byas na// dngos grub rmad du byung ba yi// de yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// sgrub pa po yi bka' nyan te// ci ste rmod
241a3(rgyud 'bum): pas 'da' byed na/ / de yi srog ni tha ma yin// de yis bsrung ba byas na dpal// tshe dang lang tsho bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin// gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya ye shes rjes
241a4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pas/ / sgrub pa mi byed cung zad med// bdag nyid thams cad sprul pa ni// mchog gi ye shes dngos grub 'gyur// phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs la// sangs rgyas byang chub mi ldog dang / chos dgyis
241a5(rgyud 'bum): mi mnyam rab klag pa/ / dngos grub bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang // shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sems dpa' chen po de khrid do// rang gi ting nge 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe// dam tshig mchog tu gasrung bya ba/
241a6(rgyud 'bum): ji snyed nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// 'dod pa thams cad de spyod do// rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing // ngan song gsum yang mi 'gro byed// de ni cung zad 'og sdug bsngal// 'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur// rdo rje
241a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum de rmad byung bas/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed do// bag chags mtshams sbyor rnam grol bas// nam mkha'i rin par 'gro 'ong byed// lha yis rtag tu mchod byed de// mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod//
241b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'dug kyang // bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid dag/ gnas dang zas dang btung la sogs// nam mkha'i las ni skad cig rnyed// bud med rin chen mchog mkhas las// bsams pa tsam gyis
241b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / las kyi dbyings ma ma lus pa// de yis khams gsum thob par byed// rnal 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub kyi// rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur// 'di las brtul zhugs drag pa med// dka'
241b3(rgyud 'bum): thub 'di dang 'dra med do/ / sud med mchog tu bde ba las// 'dod pa'i legs spyod spyad las 'grub// dge ba'i pad+mo'i rigs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po dag dbang 'gyur// gzugs ma kun gyi bde chen po//
241b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen por de 'gyur ro// gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgas pa chen po'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa/ khams gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad+mo'i rigs kyi tshogs
241b5(rgyud 'bum): zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o/ / / oM bcas mi byed tha mar te// rab tu sems ni bde ba ste// rdo rje rab dges bde byed che// dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya// phyag
241b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya 'di yis dngos grub che/ / byang chub sems ni rab bsgrubs pa// 'di yis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ bdud rtsi'i mchog ni chud par 'gyur// thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas nas// de ste thams cad sems kyang rung //
241b7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen pos sems thams cad// sngags mkhan reg pa'i rgyas btab na// 'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // rdo rje dpa' bo nyid du yang // lha mo'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs pa// skad cig tu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ l+h+wa ma
242a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang gar byed cing / / de ni rab dges bdag po khrid// pho brang dga' byad rab dges byed// rab tu chen po bde thob tu// seng ge'i gdan rab 'jog byed do// ban dang bzhi yi mchog
242a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi/ / rdo rje pad+mo sbyor ba yis// de ni khrid nas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag med// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus che// yod dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa// de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje
242a3(rgyud 'bum): sems mchog 'jog byed de/ / rang gi spyad pa'i tshul gyis ni// pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskor// sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni// sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa// res 'ga' shin
242a4(rgyud 'bum): tu dga' spyod pa/ / res 'ga' khab nas 'byung ba dang // res 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums// res 'ga' skra dang res 'ga' 'pho// res 'ga' spyod chen rol pa dang // res 'ga' bdud las rgyal bar mdzad// res 'ga'
242a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub mngon byang chub/ / res 'ga' 'khor lo skor mdzad de// res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mdzad// ras 'ga' dus su shin tu mdzes// res 'ga' bud med skyes pa dang // res 'ga' lha dang skye dgu'i bdag/
242a6(rgyud 'bum): res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste// res 'ga' 'dod la rgyab kyis phyogs// res 'ga' zhal ras dga' drag/ res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btang
242a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ ci dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la// bdag gi ngo bor ston par byed// mi phyed cho ga sbyor ba yis// 'dren pa mi phyed le byas te// phan tshun reg pa chen po yis// rdo rje can gyis de 'biges te// gzung ma mang po tshogs kyi
242b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos// spyod bcas mi spyod bde dam pa// 'chad pa mi dgos thob par 'gyur// brjid pas byang chub snying po ru// rtag pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// sbyor ba rjes// /
242b2(rgyud 'bum): sdud ldan pas so// thams cad cha ni rnam bral ba// byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin du// yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro// rdo rje shin tu dgos pa chen mo tshim pa'i yid la skyes pa dpe med
242b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad grub par byed pa'o// / dang por oM ni sbyor ba ste// tha mar gnyis po rdza dzi'i sgra// rab dgas rdo rje byin brlabs pa'i// lha mo de dang ma byed
242b4(rgyud 'bum): / dbus gzhag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rab dges thob pa rmongs byed ma// rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sngags mkhan yi ge phyag rgya 'dis// bdag gam
242b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la rgyas btab ste/ / rdo rje 'dam skyes bcug byas na// de nas de myur dngos grub bo// thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan// tshe dang lang tsho skal ldan pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra 'thob ste// rdo rje sems dpa'
242b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'grub/ / sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yis// sangs rgyas kun dang rtsen byed cing // sde dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyi// 'phrul gyi bud med 'phrog byed do// rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa chen po dngar byed kun tu
242b7(rgyud 'bum): myang ba med pa rtog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba las thams cad byed pa chen mo gdong mi za ba'i gzhan gyi mi phyed ma'o// / tshangs pa'i
243a1(rgyud 'bum): gsung gi nga ror bcas/ / tha mar dril bu'i ra ror gnyis// dbus su ming gi 'phreng ba ste// yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yid kyi dngos grub 'thob byed
243a2(rgyud 'bum): de/ 'dod pa yid ni thams cad rnams// yi ge skad cig 'grub par byed// 'di yis rgyas btab bud med rnams// bdag dang rang gi slob ma'ang rung // de nyid sbyor bas bsten byas na// rdo rje 'dzin dpal 'dra
243a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni// myur du mkha' la 'gro byed de// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang chen dang // lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur// lha mo tshogs dang rtsen byed cing // lha mo kun
243a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi bdag por 'gyur/ / 'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che// 'jig par byed dang rku byed pa// sems can kun gyi mchog dam pa// sems dpa' chen por de 'gyur ro// stug po'i tshogs kyi dbus su ni//
243a5(rgyud 'bum): brjid la sogs pas spyod pas 'gro// brjid che pad+mo chen mo la// thams cad kun tu brjid pa yis// bde byed chen po myong byed de// rab tu dgyes pas sgeg pa bzhin// rab tu skal ldan mgrin 'khyud pas// rnal 'byor
243a6(rgyud 'bum): chen por de gnas te/ / 'di ni snying la bris pa yis// ci 'dod par mi 'dor ba 'thob// phyag rgya chu skyes btam byas te// de ltar byas na phyag rgya dgyes// rdo rje shin tu dges pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang pa
243a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ / thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o// / dang po nyid du oM bya ste// thig le'i rgyal pos nye bar brgyan// tsheg drag bcas pa 'dren pa gnyis// ldan pa mtha' mar bzhag byas
243b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ / rdo rje rab dgas brgyan byas pa// rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snang ba rab sgrub pa// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying khar rgyas btab na// sangs rgyas ye shes
243b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog byed pa/ / de yis ston ka ma dngos grub// sde dbang lngar bcas lha rnams dang // gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang // sbrul dang mi 'am ci gnas pa// thams cad 'di yi g.yog tu 'gyur// 'di ni 'od zer rab tu
243b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba yis/ / sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ldan de 'gro ste// sna tshogs rab 'byung yang dag khyab// chos mchog dam pa byed pa gtong byed cing // spyod bcas mi spyod 'jig rten snang byed de// sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i
243b4(rgyud 'bum): 'od mchog byed/ / mkha' dbyings rnam par bsgyings pas rab tu dga'// A li kA li pad+mo mchog la// myong zhing mchog byas bskal par gnas par 'gyur// 'di yis sdig pa 'phrog byed de// 'di yis myur du dga'
243b5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / 'dis ni bde ba'i ngo bo de// 'di yis dngos grub grub par 'gyur// skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa/ tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dbes pa
243b6(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen mo sde thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes 'grub par byed pa'o/ / / dang po oM dang yang dag ldan/ tha mar dgas pa'i yi ge gnyis// rdo rje shin tu dgyes
243b7(rgyud 'bum): pa che/ / dbus su gsal ba'i yi ge bsam// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo// sngags mkhan
244a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis byin brlabs pa/ / sna tshogs sna tshogs bdag chen 'gyur// sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te// bsod nams kun gyi yan lag dge/ kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni// 'di
244a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis ni rab tu 'grub/ / sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bde chen gyis// sna tshogs chen po'i bskal par gnas// rdo rje'i bdag nyid brgyan pa yi// bud med kun dang rtsen par 'gyur// de nas de yi chos dbyings nas// dbang
244a3(rgyud 'bum): phyug mchog gi dngos grub po/ / pad+mo'i mdun du thog ma'i lha// byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya// mthe bong srin lag de phyung ste// kha yi nang du gzhag par bya// chang bzhin myang bar byas na ni// mod la 'dod pa'i
244a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su 'gyur/ / A li kA li rab sbyor bas// bud med rnams dang rtsen par byed// blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// 'di ni shin tu dgyes zhes bya'o// bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste// sna tshogs 'di ni
244a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro la gnas/ / dang po oM ni gnas pa ste// tra ta dang ldan tha mar bya// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che do// sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin/ 'di dag mnyam
244a6(rgyud 'bum): par sbyor ba yis/ / sgeg mos ye shes bskyed par bya// rdo rje blo ldan brtag po yis// bde bar 'dod pa'i pad+mor gzugs// 'dod pas 'dod pa spyad par bya// myur du 'dod pas dngos grub bo// de nas rdo rje
244a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod dpal te/ / bde byed thams cad nye bar sgrub// sems can kun gyi 'dod skyed pa// bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro// mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/ pad+mo'i tshul du sgeg pa yis// rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas
244b1(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / rdo rje chen po de dngos grub// ci dgar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis// rtag pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes mthun spyod// bsgrub na rtag pa rtogs par 'gyur// 'di yis kun tu
244b2(rgyud 'bum): bzang zhes bya/ / de ni dngos po kun yin te// 'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med// nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa// sangs rgyas mchog tu rtag pa yis// sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos// dpal ldan thog ma
244b3(rgyud 'bum): tha ma med/ / chos rnams kun gyi rjes su mthun// 'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang // 'di la khyad par cung zad med//
244b4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa sgeg mo dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge mchog gi sku'o// / dang po oM bcas lha mo yis// tha mar tsheg drag mi byed gnyis
244b5(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid du/ / he zhes bya ba rnam brgyan te// shin tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje che// bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis// nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na// 'phreng ba'i
244b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis rnam brgyan pa/ / dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur// yid kyis ji ltar bsams pa bzhin// de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro// de ni phyir sangs rgyas mthong // chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed// de nas
244b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te/ / sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bde ba che// dngos grub rnal 'byor de la sbyin// byed pa dang ni thob pa dang // bde ba chen po 'phrob pa yis// rnal 'byor
245a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dbang phyug la/ / gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed// thabs bcas shes rab chen po la// rgyal po nyid kyis stobs byed de// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba
245a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po mgu bar byed/ / bde ba thabs kyi dngos grub rnams// sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya// yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'di// shin tu dngos grub mchog tu brtag/ rdo rje shin tu dges pa'i bde ba'i 'phreng ba rgyas
245a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// / oM ni dang por gtsug tor bya// te te skad snyan tha mar te// dbus su he dga' zhes bya
245a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / bde chen dga' ba rdo rje dbyangs// rdo rje shin tu dgyes che yi// phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgyes 'brel// bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang // dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ster// sdig pa kun las grol byed cing //
245a5(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams thams cad nye ba 'gro// mi dge thams cad ma lus spong byed cing // sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ge rgyan te 'gro// 'jig rten thams cad kun tu bkur sti byed// rig ma stong gis mngon par mchod byed
245a6(rgyud 'bum): cing / / rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni// g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yeng byed pa'i// 'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel ba 'thob// blo ldan nam mkha' ngos ni thams cad du//
245a7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma// yid du 'ong ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang // rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yis// mgul nas 'khyud pa'i rtsen pas rol par byed pas rol par byed/ i wang gling bu
245b1(rgyud 'bum): / ya mtshan sgra snyan gyis// gru blangs dngos grub rgya ma thob par byed// ji nyid yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni// 'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag/ bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed par rnam bsgyur ba'i// de dang mthun pa'i
245b2(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed/ / Sha Ta ba da gar dzi'i dbyangs// gru ru blangs pas pad+mo gnas// dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// 'di yi byin rlabs dag pa dang // 'di yi byini rlabs bde ba'i rnams// sbyor ba
245b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis sbyar ba yis/ / 'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dbyangs depe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya bar yi ge'i phyag rgya'o//
245b4(rgyud 'bum): / de bzhin oM ni dang por te// dbus su he dgyes bde ba che// rdo rje gar byed dpe pa gnyis// 'di ni thams cad bde byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab dgyes nyid// rnal 'byor yis ni rgyas btab na/
245b5(rgyud 'bum): bde dang ldan par byed cing 'gro// 'og min gyi ni gnas chen du// sangs rgyas rnams dang thabs cig 'grogs// bde byed chen po'i dbang chen dang // chos kyi rgyal po bde chen 'thob// ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag
245b6(rgyud 'bum): las/ / sgyur ba byed pa bshad pa dang // ji snyed phyag rgya'i rnams// gnyis min 'dus pas 'dis dngos grub// kye ma'o dgyes pa bde byed che// kye ma'o bde ba bde chen po// kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che//
245b7(rgyud 'bum): kye mo'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che// de la sogs pa tshad med pa// 'jig rten gyi ni yo byad rnams// pad+mo gsal ba gar gyi ni// rnal 'byor kar byas dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di// sna tshogs
246a1(rgyud 'bum): gar ni ston byed pas/ / myur du gar ni mang byas pas// gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub bo// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i dpal bde ba chen po dga' byed gang zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag
246a2(rgyud 'bum): / rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gsum pa'o// / bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sku ni sna tshogs che// tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i dza// nam mkhar zla sar
246a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dra ba yi/ / phyag rgya'i ye shes rmad byung ba'i// 'di yi thabs kyis mnyam bzhag ste// gzung ba gsal bar bzung ba yi// tsha ba'i gser gyi gzi brjid 'dzin// ye shes snying khar bsam par bya// nam
246a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' nyi ma bum 'dra bar/ / de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// shin tu rmad byung thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel ba// rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo// sangs rgyas
246a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin dge yi/ / sna tshogs chen po thob 'gyur gnas// 'dod pa'i chos kyis mi gos blo// 'dod pa chen po sten par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje
246a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / / de bzhin oM ni gzhag bya ste// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// rdo rje'i sgra ni bde
246a7(rgyud 'bum): 'bral ba/ / tha mar khro bcas sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste// bar bcad pa yang thos par 'gyur// khams gsum ngo bo thams cad na// sgra yis thos pa dngos grub bo// 'di yis sangs
246b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad nyid la dngos grub ste/ / bud med pad+mo u t+pal dang // ma lus rgyal ba'i rnams dang rtsen// rdo rje pad+mo sbyar bas na// dga' byed sbyar du dngos grub bo// rab tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems
246b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi sgra dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba don gyi dpal thams cad grub par byed ma'o/ / / oM ni spyi gtsug thig ler babs// rab dgyes chen mo rdo rje can// rdo rje dri bder
246b3(rgyud 'bum): bris pa yis/ / tha mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro// sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni// sna tshogs ye shes grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid
246b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje brgyan pa yis/ / de ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen// de nas chos dbyings gnas pa des// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas na// dbang phyug dam pa dngos grub 'gyur// 'di ni
246b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ / blo ldan rab tu dgyes zhes bya// rdo rje'i dri ripe med pa ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya'o// / oM mchog gtsug tor rnams byas te// shin tu dgyes che dbus nyid du/
246b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ro ni sbyor ba che// tha mar he ste thig le gnyis// 'di yi rab tu dgyes par 'gyur// dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang // bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs bdag/ sangs
246b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun gyi rol pa yis/ / mchod pa mi zad byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad// nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo// rab tu dgyes pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro mchog
247a1(rgyud 'bum): gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bla gsang
247a2(rgyud 'bum): thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dag
247a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs rdo rje las/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam
247a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gsang ba'i gzung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du byas pa/
247a5(rgyud 'bum): ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ phyi nang gi pho nya dang po nya mo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dgyes shing spyan ni
