247a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa yis/ / bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yis// brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du// bzhag pa yis ni 'dud par byed// bskul ba yi ni dbyangs 'di
247a7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / de dag gtso la mnyes par byed// kye ma'o chos ni ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o spyod pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o sbas pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma'o bde ba yang dag 'byung // kye ma'o kun tu bzang po'i don//
247b1(rgyud 'bum): kye ma'o rab dgyes yang dga' grogs// kye ma'o bde ba yang dag che// kye ma'o bde ba bde mchog ste// kye ma'o sngags kyi yang dag sbyor// kye ma'o snying po yang dag bsdus// kye ma'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhun/
247b2(rgyud 'bum): kye ma'o sgrub pa rmad byung ba'o// kye ma'o pha rol phyin ma yin// kye ma'o ji ltar mthur rigs// kye ma'o sna tshogs dgos pa che// kye ma'o dag pa gsum sbyar ba// kye mdo rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba'i// kye me
247b3(rgyud 'bum): parla rnam phyi bas/ / kye ma'i'o dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'o// kye ma'o mchog dang mnam pa'o// rtse ma'o gar ni dag pa che// kye ma'o klu rab dri ma med// kye ma'o sil snyan rnam par 'brel// se ma'o bajas
247b4(rgyud 'bum): dang mun pa sel/ / kye ma'o ngag byed me tog 'phreng // kye ma'o log snod dge ba de// kye ma'o mar me mun la sel// kye ma'o dr-i ni shin tu bsil// kye ma'o rnal 'byor mnyam par sbyor// kye ma'o sgyur ba
247b5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' 'dra/ / kye ma'o sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog/ kye ma'o ri'i chen ba mtsham sbyar// kye ma'o sna tshogs pang mchog ldan// kye mo'o sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad// kye ma'o ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang /
247b6(rgyud 'bum): kye mchong mtshar dpa' bo rnams// kye mtshor mtshar sems dpa' rnams// kye mtsho ngo mtshar mA yi rnams// shin tu dgyes me rdo rje la// rgyanu pa kun gyis bsnyad byas te// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'cha
247b7(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin thams cad// 'khor dang bcas pa dgyes gyur te// sems dpa' che la phyag byas nas// mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod par/
248a1(rgyud 'bum): byed// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad do// phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur// yid tsam 'dzum pa'i
248a2(rgyud 'bum): spyan zur gzigs/ / sha rgyas brla ni nu mar mdud// rked pa'i dbyibs ni rnam par yangs// snam gyi ngos kyang che la mdzes// chags pa cung zad tshems kyis gnon// tshems kyi 'phreng ba kun da
248a3(rgyud 'bum): / mi drag thos par dbugs 'byin cing // rab tu dgyes byed dgyes par bstod// bde bas bde la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bstan// dgongs pa'i dbang dang ldan
248a4(rgyud 'bum): pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing / / gsang ba'i thig le 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtso bstan te// 'jig rten gsum po sbyar bar bya ba'i chos de bder gshegs
248a5(rgyud 'bum): don du mdzad/ / ngo mtshar yon tan ldan pa dam tshig bde las 'byung // bde mdzod bde spyod dga' la rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// thams cad dga' ba'i ngang nyid thig le'i dkyil du skyed mdzod de// byang
248a6(rgyud 'bum): chub snying po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar skur la snyan par mdzod/ / ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rigs pa che la dgyes shing bzhugs// bdag cag 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs/
248a7(rgyud 'bum): spyod 'dzin bcas pas// tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang ldan pas kyang ni de la rag lus so// a la la go/ yangs pa'i spyan can drangs shing bcug ste rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod// rnam dag ye shes chu des
248b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus/ / byams ma'i gzung ma bdag nyid che dang rab tu rtsen mdzod la// thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin dag pa'i chu de'i bdag skur cig/ mi yi mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ye shes
248b2(rgyud 'bum): thob 'dod phyir/ / dam tshig chen po gsum po gsum po 'di la gnas nas ni// sgra gsang thig le'i dbyings su bdag cag dogs med 'gro bar bgyi// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// shin tu srid pa'i sku
248b3(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhin// gru blangs myur du bskul bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bstod pas shin tu dgyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems
248b4(rgyud 'bum): dpar bcas pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs kyi btsun mo de dag thams cad la rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnam
248b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs su bcas pa'i rnams dang / phyi nang gi rdo rje rigs las
248b6(rgyud 'bum): / skyes pa'i rnams las shin tu dgyes pa dgyes pa chen po'i gar dang / dbyangs dang / rdung ba dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam par mdzad pa chen pos rab tu mdzad nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa
248b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i dbang mo dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bde bar cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ / de nas de dag kun dgyes nas// shin tu dgyes pa nyid byas te// thal mo sbyar nas sa steng
249a1(rgyud 'bum): du/ / pus mo'i lha nga btsugs mdzad de// chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba 'debs// dkyil 'khor dam tshig bdag nyid la// bcom ldan dgyes pas bshad du gsol// gang gi sems
249a2(rgyud 'bum): can bde nyid kyi/ / bde bas dkyil 'khor sgrub par bgyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te dkyil 'khor mdzad do//
249a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag gnyis gar dang bcas pa yis// mdun du thal mo bkan par bya// sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la// pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams sam// de dag ming gi brda yis ni// se mo tham cad brtag par bya// sbom
249a4(rgyud 'bum): po phan tshun pa snol byas te/ / shes rab mchod rten du ni brtag/ rdo rje mchod sbyin sbyar byas te// lhag ma 'od bzhin spro bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes ral pha rol phyin ma dge/ gang gis
249a5(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / / sangs rgyas byang chub byin rlob po// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rtag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'ong byed// sangs rgyas snang mdzad dpal dang ldan// btso ma'i gser gyi kha dog 'dzin//
249a6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na// 'di yis myur du dngos grub bo// skal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la// 'di yis byin brlabs gar byas te// rdo rje dpal mo gzhag byas nas// sems ni bzhugs pas bsgrub byas la//
249a7(rgyud 'bum): denas sems de blang bya ste// blo ldan de yis btung byas te// grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du// yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed// shes rab dang ni 'phrul gyi 'am// de bzhin gshegs pa 'phral rtag 'thob// sangs
249b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis/ / kun tu 'phrog par long mi nus// shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o// / mal mo de nyid khro skyes pa// sbom po skyil krung ba nag byas
249b2(rgyud 'bum): te sna tshogs 'phreng ba 'bar byed pa/ / rnal 'byor gyi ni lhag ma spro// 'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin ma gsal// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rdo rje ye shes bla na med// 'di yis myur du thob
249b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed// tshe dang dpal dang ye shes skal// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bskur tsam
249b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis kyang / / rdo rje 'dzin rjer re 'gyur te// rdo rje dkyil gyi mtshan btab pas// sa chen 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed// 'di ni dga' byed rdo rje rigs// rdo rje bud med 'grogs pa dang // rdo rje gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du//
249b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems nyid 'thob par 'gyur// ji ltar dngos grub 'dug pa dang // sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo rnams// skad cig gcig gis 'dren par byed// bsgral dang mnyes par bya ba dang // rgyas btab de bzhin rmongs
249b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / gsol bar byed dang za ba dang // phan tshun du mi skyed par byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba rdo rje 'phreng ba zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par byed pa dpe med
249b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / / rdo rje thal mo de nyid las// khro mo rgyab ni bskum byas te// sor mo lhag ma snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya 'di ni dbang bskur ba'o// rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs//
250a1(rgyud 'bum): de ma thag tu 'phrog par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas kyis ni dgyes pa thob// 'di nyid kyis ni dbang bskur dang // 'di nyid kyis ni bde ram pa// 'di nyid
250a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni rgyal po che/ / 'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa// 'di yis rtsen pa byas pa yis// rang dga' 'gugs pa dngos grub bo// mi la 'di yis byin brlabs te// nyi ma phyed nas spyad byas nas// 'di ni de ma
250a3(rgyud 'bum): thag tu yang / / dpal ldan rdo rje gzi brjid 'dzin// nyi ma bcu gnyis 'od 'drar 'gyur// zhag bdun gyis gyur gzhan gyis min// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'dul ba dang // dge ba thams cad dbang du byed//
250a4(rgyud 'bum): grol 'don rnams kyi mun pa sel// blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po gzi brjid depe med pa dang ldan pa'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba/ ba dan gsum pa'i 'jig
250a5(rgyud 'bum): rten gsum du bde ba chen po thob par byed pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po'o/ / // pha rol phyin pa'i phyag rgya nyid// dge ba'i khro mo dang bral ba// pha rol phyin pa'i chos yin te// tshig dang tshig
250a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams bral ba'o/ / phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yas// chos kyi dbyings nas rje ru 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur bas// dbang phyug dam par de 'gyur te// thams cad dag pa mos pa yis/
250a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo dmar po mchog 'dzin 'gyur// pad+mo sgyu ma rnams mdzad pas// sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed// sems can kun la thams cad sbyin// 'dod chags chen po zhes
250b1(rgyud 'bum): spangs te/ / de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur// 'di ni myur du gar byas pa// sgrub par mi byed cung zad med// 'di ni pad+mo sbyor ba yis// de bde mchog rtag thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa chen pos mos par
250b2(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i dpal pad+mo'i'abrang ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / / 'di nyid gnyis pa'i spyi gtsug tu// bsgyur nas bzhag par byas pa ni// ma lus dri ma
250b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog byed pa/ / sna tshogs chen por der 'gyur ro// 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag// khams gsum sna tshog byed par 'gyur// sna tshogs dbang po rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs dang sna tshogs bdag/
250b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa thams cad bde dam pa// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// thams cad 'di yis dngos grub bo// bud med 'di yis byin brlabs nas// sngo bsangs mkhur
250b5(rgyud 'bum): chos dkar mo dang / / de dang lhan cig gar byas pas// sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur// sngo bsangs zhing ma 'phreng ma dag/ byin gyis brlabs nas dus gsum du// mtshan gyi mthar ni bsnyen byas nas/
250b6(rgyud 'bum): las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rigs ngan can dang spri ma dang // gar mkhan de bzhin gar byed dag/ phyag rgya ye shes byin brlabs te// bsnyen dang dngos grub thob par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes pa sna tshogs bdas
250b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / / phyag rgya de dag bstan pa'i rnams// gar gyi tshul gyis rang gis gnas// dam tshig mchog gi
251a1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gis/ / dngos grub chen po'i mthur 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid sbyar byas te// rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya// de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed do// mda' yi tshul gyis gzung bar bya//
251a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rab dgyes gtso bo yi// pha rol phyin mchog sdug pa yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyis myos byed pa// dpa' bo rnams kyang rmongs par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // mi shes byed pa 'jig par
251a3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / las kyi don ni bka' bzhin du// dga' nas bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing // 'di dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa kun tu bzang
251a4(rgyud 'bum): mo'i dgyes pa chen mo'i bde ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o/ / // snying khar bzung ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'di yi las kun byed 'gyur te// bdud rnams
251a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'bigs par byed/ / rgyal ba 'dod chags zal spyod pa// bde gshegs mya ngan 'das kun dang // thams cad 'di yis slong bar byed// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas// myur du las la sbyor bar byed//
251a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi// gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de// 'jigs byed drag po chen po yis// gdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed// rdo rje pad+mor bcug pa yis// mche bas ma mchu bzung byas te// sor mo
251a7(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun bsnol ba yis/ / dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya// sna tshogs chen po rab rgyas pas// bde chen po'i bde 'thob bo// 'dod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'dod dang thar par grub byed de// phyag rgya 'di yi
251b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas btab na/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'phur bar byed/ rab dgyes 'brel pas gar byas shing // nam mkha' gzung ma'i thabs nyid kyi// phan tshun bcu pa'i gnon pa yis// bcings na 'di yis dngos grub bo//
251b2(rgyud 'bum): de ni de ma thag tu yang // lha dang lha min mchod byed de// dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang / zhi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams// sbyin po yis ni phyag byas nas// rang gi dpal mchog stobs byed de// rdo rje 'dzin
251b3(rgyud 'bum): ma thams cad kyang / / nyid kyi dpal can stobs pa yin// brtan pa de la mgu byed cing // sangs rgyas dgos pa rab sgrub byed// 'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams// las dang rjes su mthun 'gyur te//
251b4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor te// gzung dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis// yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed// 'dzum dang gnas dang sbas pa dang // spyod pas
251b5(rgyud 'bum): gar gyis byas pas so/ / gzhan dag kyang dngos grub che// pad+mo'i 'dab ma rnams che bas// byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa// sgrub pa pos ni pad+mo sgrub// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba gnyis
251b6(rgyud 'bum): su med pa'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa'i dpal mo 'dab ma zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par bya'o/ / // thal mo de nyid bcings pa yis// bcings pa gyen du bzung byas te/
251b7(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgreng byas te// de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya// phyag rgya 'di ni chu srin zhes// rgyal mtshan ldan par bshad pa yin// rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste// 'dod bral chags par sgrub pa yin// phyag
252a1(rgyud 'bum): @rgya 'di yis bde ldan gyi/ / pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed// de byin chos kyi 'khor lo dag/ bla med par ni skor bar byed// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin mas bskor// sdig spangs rnams ni bkras
252a2(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / spyod pa drag po'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar snyen par byed// yang dag byang chub gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas 'di yis mnyes par byed// de nas dgyes te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes skye ba yi//
252a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi// sems dpa' chen po sgrub par byed// bla mad dngos grub thams cad kyang // 'di yis thams cad grub par byed// sbyor dang ldan pas byin brlabs te// snying khar nye bar bsam
252a4(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis// thams cad las ni byed du gzhug/ gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang // sil snyan brdung ba rnams byed dang // paM wang gling bu rdza rnga yis// phyag rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya//
252a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i thugs kyi dgyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas// 'gyings shing 'gying bas gar byas te// bcing
252a6(rgyud 'bum): chen pos bcings byas nas/ / sbyor ba chen po gnyis su bya// khu tshur gnyis po dgu nyid du// g.yon du 'gying bas bstan par byas// phrag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs// bde ba dam pas mchod byas te//
252a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gying ba'i sbyor bas kar byas na// dngos grub thams cad grub par byed// 'gying ba tsam gyi sbyor ba yis// 'gying ba thams cad 'phrog par byed// lha dang lha min rig ma yis// 'bum phrag brgya yis
252b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod par byed/ / rab tu dgyes pa bde mchog che// kun tu gar byas gnas par 'gyur// klu mo lga dang lha min dang // de bzhin mi 'am bdag por 'gyur// nam mkhar 'gro ma'i khyor 'gyur te// rnal 'byor
252b2(rgyud 'bum): ma kun bde ba che/ / gzung ma rnams kyi dag pa bdag/ gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje// las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// thams cad las ni byed par bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// gsang
252b3(rgyud 'bum): chen sbyor bas dngos grub bo/ / dpal shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo sems can thams cad sgrol bar sbas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'o// / phyag rgya de nyid mnyam bzung ste/
252b4(rgyud 'bum): lag pa'i 'dab ma gar dang bcas// myur bar steng du dor ba yis// mgyogs su 'gro ba dngos grub po// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad byung dam pa mchod byas pa// sbyor ba gar gyis mchod
252b5(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / thams cad las byed dngos grub bo// gang dag dngos grub med pa dang // gang dag bde ba med pa'i rnams// de dag phyag rgya 'dis btab na// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur// de yis
252b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las rnams ni/ / rmad byung dam pa 'grub par byed// btsun mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs// 'di yis don 'grub par byed// gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba// mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings// btsun
252b7(rgyud 'bum): mo dam pa de bzhin gshegs/ / phyag rgya'i sbyor bas dngos grub bo// dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i me tog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / de nyid 'og gi ngos su dor//
253a1(rgyud 'bum): steng du cung zad bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bde mchog yid ni tshim byed pa/ 'dis ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // bdud rnams shin tu ring bar 'gyur/
253a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bcings te bsdigs pa yis// skra ga nas dngos grub sbyin par byed// sangs rgyas dam tshig gsum gnas pa'i// 'di yis mchod pa byas par 'gyur// de nas gtso bo 'dis mnyes nas// mchog
253a3(rgyud 'bum): gi thabs ni stobs par byed/ / phyag rgya bcings pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'di ni thams cad byed par 'gyur// rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa// dngos po thams cad byed par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cabyed de/
253a4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba pad+ma 'thob byed cing // tshe 'di dang ni pha rol tu// phyag rgya'i gnas su de 'gro'o// dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dri ma thams cad spang ba dpal shin tu dgyes
253a5(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / / thal mo de nyid sbom po bsgreng // lhag ma gsal po'i nyi ma bzhin// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes mchog tu snang byed pa'o// thog ma med nas bskor ba yi// 'di yis gti mug
253a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog byed de/ / mnyam par gzhag nas bcings ma thag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob// mnyam nyid ye shes dri med dang // pad+mo dra ba dga' ba che// sna tshogs dra ba dpal chen po// bde phyed chen po 'thob par
253a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// / g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag pa yis// brjid pa'i gar gyis gar bya zhing // thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te//
253b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon gyi khu tshur spyi bor bzhag/ rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di// mchod pa thams cad grub byed do// thams cad don rnams grub pa dge/ bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par byed// gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis kyang /
253b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i sprin nyid rgyal chen po// mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang // sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos grub bo// phyag rgya sbyor bas sbyar byas te// skad cig gcig gi gar byas na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras
253b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog kyang / / 'di yis thams cad 'bab par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yis// sna tshogs gar gyi gar byas na// dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro// phun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'grub bo// dpal shin
253b4(rgyud 'bum): tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed ma zhes pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i
253b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa/ gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
253b6(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dgyes pa/ rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskal pa'i mtha' klas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kun
253b7(rgyud 'bum): tu bzang po'i gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas/ slar yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
254a1(rgyud 'bum): cad ngo mtshar dang / pha rol tu phyin ma rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur
254a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ phyi nang gi rdo rje rigs su gtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slar dbugs phyung ste/ de las bzhengs nas gar mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das
254a3(rgyud 'bum): la yang dang yang du lta zhing dbyangs kyi mchog bde ba 'dis glu blangs te dgyes par byed do/ / rnam mang bde ba'i rol pas bdag nyid chen po yis// skye dang mi skye'i chos nyid ya mtshan rmad dag dpal bstan pa//
254a4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'dir phyug ste// rang bzhin dag pa'i gzung ma'i dkyil nas skyed par mdzod// ngo mtshar rmad du byung bas bde bas rol mdzad cing // bdud rtsi'i rang banan 'dus
254a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams la dbugs 'byin cing / / gsang ba'i thig le dngos nyid nam mkha' 'dra ba rnams spyad de// bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod rgyu la dbang mdzad pas// byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon
254a6(rgyud 'bum): / mongs mtha' dang rnam bral zhing // bde ba'i 'byung gnas skye shi med pa'i sgo mor pad+mo rnam dag pa// nyon mongs mi go sgyu mar gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// e ma'o kun tu bzang po rig pa rgya chen
254a7(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ / dngos nyid med pa'i chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzungs su 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsi ra sa yan// ji ltar bde la rten cing kun tu snang bar mdzad// kye
254b1(rgyud 'bum): ma bde mchog bde bas rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod/ / sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i las can bde bas tshim par mdzod// byams pa'i spyan can thugs rje nyi mas 'gro ba kun la shar mdzad nas// gti mug thibs
254b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i mun nag byang chub sems kyis gsal bar ston/ / de ni 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde sbyin rol pa'i rgyal pos gsungs// byang chub mchog gi sems des snying po dbang skur cig/ dbyangs kyi phyag rgya
254b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis ni/ / skad cig skad cig bskul byas na// rab tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis// mdun du gnas te dngos grub sbyin// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po kun
254b4(rgyud 'bum): tu bzang po rdo rje phra gsang thig le chen po la/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen mo de rnams kyis bstod
254b5(rgyud 'bum): cing bskal ba byas pa dang / gsang ba thabs kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di la snyoms par zhugs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon
254b6(rgyud 'bum): mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan//
254b7(rgyud 'bum): dar dang dril bu'i chun po dang // nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras/ do shal gdu bu rnams kyis brgyan// sna tshogs gdugs ni rnam bres pa// sna tshogs 'phreng ba
255a1(rgyud 'bum): @gos kyis brgyan/ / srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// ka ba brgyad mchog yang dang gnas// dbus kyi dgas byed ldan la ni// dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs bad+ma dang gyis g.yogs/
255a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad stan de dag ces bya// dbus su rdo rje shin tu gyes// sman de la ni gzhag par bya// tshad med pad+mod mar 'dra ba'i// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// yid bzhin nor drang du rgyan ldan// ri chen bcwa
255a3(rgyud 'bum): gis rnam par mdzes/ / tshad med dar ni dpyangs pa yis// ngapa la chen pos mdzes par bya// sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam gyis// dga' byed yid
255a4(rgyud 'bum): tsam g.yon du 'dud/ / g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje che// swA ma sar gsor la shin tu brtson// de la sogs pa'i yon tan ldan// thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag/ slob ma 'am yang na gzhan yang rung // mtshar kun gyis ni rnam
255a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ / tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa na// bdag ni rab dgyes zhes
255a6(rgyud 'bum): su smra/ / des ni slob ma byin brlabs te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje pad+mo las 'byung ba'i// gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yon lan ldan// yid 'ongs bu mo bcam/
255a7(rgyud 'bum): byas te// mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor// lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bad pa// rdo rje pad+mor mnyam sbyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag
255b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / mdun du lha mo smyo byed ma// ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis// thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan// lo na bcu drug lon pa'i mchog/ shes rab can gyis mdun du gzhag/
255b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma// mtshan cha'i mnga' ni 'dren par brtson// do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste// gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo// sems dpa'
255b3(rgyud 'bum): che la dgyes mdzad cing / / 'di ni tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma// pad+mo dmar po mdog gi 'od// chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes ma'o// sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig/ dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro
255b4(rgyud 'bum): la dgyes/ / sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs// gar gyi bya ba rab bslabs gzhag/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste// sna tshogs dgos pa'i
255b5(rgyud 'bum): / rjes bslabs pa// sku tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor pa la shin tu brtson// lha dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad myos 'gyur ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs dar gyi
255b6(rgyud 'bum): na bsang gsol/ / grwa rnams kyi ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri ro rig gi rnams// 'dug pa me tog bsung ldan pa// gzi brjid chen po 'od ldan pa// ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya// rko yi phyogs rnams thams cad
255b7(rgyud 'bum): du/ / rang gi las kyi phyag rgya ldan// skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa// sgo srungs bzhi ni gzhag par bya// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang // rdza rnga rnga chen mu ku dang // mu ra dza dang
256a1(rgyud 'bum): ra dang / / gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che// rol mo'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor 'di yi
256a2(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol du/ / rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ma gzhag/ yi dgas rgyal po yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te// skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan// gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing // sha khrag
256a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ni rgyus dang / / rkang dang tshil bur spyod pa// dkyil 'khor byas te 'jug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed// gsod par byed dang spro bar byed/
256a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams// shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya// gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'jigs byed bong bu'i lhor ste// gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshal bzhin gzhag
256a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / chags chen mo dang gas rdul dang // 'khor lo mo dang rgyas 'debs mo// rab tu sbyor ba sgor byas te// ci rigs ru du gzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang srab pa// yang
256a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrog/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs te// sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du gzhag/ shar gyi grwa ru gzhag pa ni// bya rog gdong ste mig 'dra zhing // 'jigs pa'i tshig dang 'dzags pa 'dong // miH
256a7(rgyud 'bum): rjes su mthun byas so/ / mau dgas stan la yang dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te// lag pa dri dang la khar gzho thogs// mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o// nab pa gro mtshams ga
256b1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma// khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong // gsus pa phye la lto 'phyangs ma// nub byang gi ni mtshams ngag tu// rnga mo bong bu'i gdong 'dzin dang // khros pa'i ra dang byi la'i
256b2(rgyud 'bum): gdong / / rgyu ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams// shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// keng rus kar po 'dzin pa ste// khros pa rus pa'i 'phreng bas klubs// lto 'tshangs mo la bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'theg
256b3(rgyud 'bum): par brtson pa yis/ / ce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'byin// rnam par 'gyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// sgo srungs kyi ni phyogs kun tu// sgo bzhi rnams su gzhag bya/
256b4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'grogs te// bum pa sna ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jigs pa'o// lhor ni gshin rje rgyal po gzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog/ nam mkhar 'gro bas kun tu bskor
256b5(rgyud 'bum): bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs te/ / gser dang dngul las byas pa la// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// sman lnga dang ni yang dag
256b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa// 'bru rnam lnga yis brgyan byas pa'i// bum pa bcu drug gzhag byas te// bcu gnyis brgyang ma yang na byed// tha na chung ngu gcig tsam yang // ji ltar rim bzhin bzhag
256b7(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / dbus su bum pa ro yi mchog/ dam tshig chus ni gang byas pa// gser ram dngul lam zangs kyang rung // lcags sams las byas pa la// zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang // btung ba sbub por ldan pa yi// dbang po
257a1(rgyud 'bum): kun las 'byung ba rnams/ / sha srang gcig gis rab 'asres pa// kun las 'phags pa ma mchag/ chags kyi dbus su bsgrub byas te// ba pa bzhin bsnyungs
257a2(rgyud 'bum): rje sprul ba / #
257a3(rgyud 'bum): cigagang ci 'chod par byas/ / na dru na pa mang dag// rnams sna
257a4(rgyud 'bum): spyan drangs gcang zlas byas par dzum/ / gsum gyi tshogs ni de rnams ma// c+doMs pa byas nas mam so// nal 'byor ma chen dkyil lakho du/ rlo ma'i mtshag na zhug pa mdzu s
257a5(rgyud 'bum): pyong bar ba mdzes so/ / chog sa 'os kyis yang dag dkris// lags man gzung bya ba kyis 'ongs spyong phyub tu yis// btsu nas mi tha das// rdo Sh+TA ma mas par/
257b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum la gnod byed dang // slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa// rdo rje khro bo'i bsdus pa yis// dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya// de nas dam tshig blung byas te// rdo rje bdud rtsi ro yi mchog/ dung chen por gzhag
257b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu blung ngo // kye dmyal ba yi ni chu 'di ste// khyod kyi snying la kun tu gnas// dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ster// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung // oM badz+ra u da ka hUM na// dam tshig
257b3(rgyud 'bum): la ni brgyar bzlas pa'i/ / byin gyis brlabs te 'thung du gzhug/ gzhan du dam tshig mi 'gyur te// dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur ro// bdag ni dam tshig skal dga' zhes// slob ma sngags ni brjod du gzhug/ sgo
257b4(rgyud 'bum): grwar gnas nas dri ba bya/ / kye khyod dga' ba ci la dang // 'jug pa yis kyang smra bya ba// bdag ni skal ldan bde mchog la// rab dgyes 'phrul la bdag dgang ste// mchog tu dga' la bdag dga' 'o// de nas rnal
257b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma mchog gis/ / dkyil du me tog bor byas te// me tog gang la ltung ba yi// lnga nyid du ni dngos grub bo// dbang bskur ba yi phyag rgya yis// de nas spyi bor dbang bskur bya// bum pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang //
257b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bzhag ste lnga po yis// pad+mo dkyil 'khor zhugs byas te// de nas yang ni dbang bskur bya// ci rigs pa ni gzung ma'i rnams// bdag ni skal ldan zhes su smra// gang dag 'gro bar gyur
257b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / lha de nyid ni bstan par bya// dga' bar byed pa'i gzung ma de'i// khyod kyis rtag tu sgrub par gyis// de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de// nang gi sbas pa bsdus pa yi// gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yis/
258a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur u0f7f// rdo rje bkrol drangs pa// sbom po dang ni dbang gis byung // rdo rje dkun du bzhag byas nas// rtag pa dge ba' ba che// kye ma'o dam tshig bde brdzun c
258a2(rgyud 'bum): ing / / kye ma bde ba byung bar bya// 'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste// dbang bskur ba yi thabs mchog go// rdo rje slob dpon 'dag nyid che'o// rang gi khang ni rdo rje gzhag/ sems dpa' chen po drangs byan/
258a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi byang chub bdeb 'thog/ de ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// dbang bskur ba yi bde 'o// ba ma mi shes pa rnams la// 'di dag thams cadang skrag ma bya// rdo rje slob dpon gyis rgya ba// yang nas
258a4(rgyud 'bum): brtag par bya/ / 'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag/ slong ma tshogs kyi bdog por 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur// gzung ma rnams kyi dga' ba'i bdag/
258a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnams kyi rjer bshad do// mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyor 'gyur te// ring 'gro ba kun gyi bdag/ de nas shes rab ye shes dbang // slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya// gzung mde ni ngadag nyid la// bla ma nyid kyi
258a6(rgyud 'bum): / byin brlabs te// dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'grob phyir// slob ma la ni sbyir bar bya// dbang bskur shin tu smras pa yis// rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin// blo ldan the tsom med pa'i phyir// rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyir no//
258a7(rgyud 'bum): de tshun chad ni slob ma la// rlung kun las ni gang cung zad // ye ge'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams// gsang bas chog ni brdzun par bya// de nas de nyid langs byas te// slob dpon rkang par gtugs byas nas// rgyal po dbong phyur
258b1(rgyud 'bum): bang dam pa/ / thams cad yon ni dbul bar bya// gzung de dag ni thams cad la// ci dga' ba ni yon yang 'bul// slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa// yid la bsam pa'i yon yang rung // dam tshig 'das pas 'jig
258b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / de dag thams cad dbul bar bya// slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog/ rigs kyi khyad par dbul byas te// seng ge'i gdan la nyid kyi ma// sangs rgyas byin ni yon mchog yin// glang po rin chen gser dag dang // sring /
258b3(rgyud 'bum): mo bla ma'i yon mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te// yon de mchog gi yon yin no// rin chen pad+mo'i chung ma dang // shing rda rta ni shin tu brgyan// sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa// mu tig 'phreng bas shin
258b4(rgyud 'bum): tu mdzes/ / bu mo ri ni chen dra ba yis// brgyan te sna tshogs rdo rje la'o// rgyal po yis ni dbang phyug dang // chung ma bla mar dbul bar bya// 'phrul gyi bzhon pa rnam sna tshogs// glang po rta ni shin tu brgyan// de bzhin
258b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ / nan tan bla mar dbul bar bya// bla ma'i yon gyi phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje blo ldan slong ma yis// ci sde bde byed kun 'dod na// dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya// de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba
258b6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / rab dgyes gdon mi za ba'i bde// gang gis myur du thob 'gyur te// slob dpon gtso mchog nyid du 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu 'gyur// rin chen kun gyi rigs
258b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal/ / de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun tu// bad+ma'i rigs kun dpal dang ldan// rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de// sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs kun dang // rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur// dkyil latsho
259a1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'khor mo'i gar/ / nyid dang slob ma'i tshogs gyur pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya// phan tshun la sogs tshul gyis ni// shes rab
259a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ / rdo rje che yi thabs gnas te// mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par bya// phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs// nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba tshul gnas te// tshul bzhin rgyas
259a3(rgyud 'bum): par dbul bar bya/ / lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyis// mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya// 'dod pa'i rol pa myong ba yi// myangs na mchod pa 'thob par 'gyur// mchod pa kun gyi cho ga yis// rang rig khyad
259a4(rgyud 'bum): par shes byas te/ / sgrub pa thams cad bsgrubs byas na// dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas// dga' mgur rangs pa'i yid kyis ni// rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing
259a5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs/ / bde byed chen po'i skyil mo brgya// rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lha// lha rnams kyang ni re re yang // sems kyi khyad par mchog mtha' yas// 'das pa'i dus na ma byung
259a6(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / mtha' yas chos ni yangs pa bstan// 'dod chags rnams kyis bkris pa yis// sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' nas 'gro// 'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams// mos pa'i rjes su zhugs shing spod//
259a7(rgyud 'bum): kun tu chags par mi 'gyur zhing // bde bas longs pa'i yid dang ldan// byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni// dam bcas rnams dang sems kyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag
259b1(rgyud 'bum): po kun tu babang po chen po rab tu bzhad cing / / spyan bur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i skyil mo krung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// skyil k
259b2(rgyud 'bum): rung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes nyid kyi sku dang / / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni// rkang pa gnyis ka bteg byas te// bdag nyid brla ni mi
259b3(rgyud 'bum): snang bzhin/ / rtsa ba skyil mo bcing bar bya// sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni// gar gyi sbyor bas gar bya'o// rdo rje gdan gyi bde ba che// 'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur// gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad/
259b4(rgyud 'bum): skad cig gis kyang smos ci dgos// rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis// yang dag byang chub myur du thob// mi phyed pa ni thig ler bcas// 'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug/ shes rab can gyis bskyod cing bzlas// 'byung ba'i
259b5(rgyud 'bum): tshe ni phaT ces bshad/ / pad+mo mi phyed 'dren pa dang // thig ler bcas pa sbyor bar bya// mi phyed oM dang yang dag ldan// tsheg drag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o// bud med la ni zhag bdun du// 'di yis rtsen par byas pa na//
259b6(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' thams cad gang ba yi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong // rab dgyes longs spyod gnas pa yi// sems dpa' che la slong mdzad de// gzungs kyi pad+mo las byung ba// bde byed mchog gi dbang bskur ro// de nas
259b7(rgyud 'bum): rab dga' bde thob pa/ / sems dpa' deng ni dngos grub bo// thog ma dang ni mtha' med par// 'dod pa thams cad de longs spyod// tshe dang dpal dang phun sum ldan// gdon dang dug dang tsha ba'i nad// mkha' 'gro nye bar gtses pa
260a1(rgyud 'bum): 5/ sa 'tshar / na / nyis ga d+ma m+b+ha sa da nga byu/ can
260a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / nang dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog/ phyag rgya 'di mi sbyong ba yis// ye shes lnga nI bsten par bya// zla ba'i skyil mo zhes bya ba// phyag rgya chen po'i las kyi don// thams cad sgrub par byeng ba'o// bdag gi
260a3(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa dbus su bsdu/ / de yi rkang pas bcings byas te// sems dpa' skyil mo bzhin du 'bral// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // khams gsum sgrub bzhed pa yin// yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin// rang gi lhar ni sbyor
260a4(rgyud 'bum): brtson pas/ / bsgoms sam yang na bskyod kyang rung // sngags pa'i yis dngos grub ste// sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi// zhag 'dun sgom byas nas// yang dag dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab hU~M//
260a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba shin tu bsten byas nas// gdon mi za bar rgyal po thob// yid bzhin dgod pa thams cad byed// rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo // gzugs ma ste bcing ba ni// rin po che ltar sbyar byas te// rang gi rkang pa mi snang bya// rin chen kun gyi
260a6(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo krung / / 'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi// dbul zhing 'phongs pa 'joms byed de// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma// gnod pa'i dug kun 'phrog par byed// gdug pa thams cad rmongs byed de// dgra rnams thams cad
260a7(rgyud 'bum): 'joms par byed/ / khro bo thams cad 'dzum byed de// gdug pa rnams kyis rgyas 'debs na// mi g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ni// 'di yis rgyal po dngos grub bo// yid bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// ci ste bdag
260b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid rgyal po ru/ / mchog tu rmad byung sbub 'dong na// rin chen sems kyi rin chen mtshan// gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon pa// rgyal po khams gsum rgyal byed pa// zla byed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// rin po che yi skyil
260b2(rgyud 'bum): mo'o/ / de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa// pad+mo 'dra ba sbyar byas te// bdag gam de bzhin gzhan yang rung // blo ldan pad+mo bde bsgrub bya// 'di yis sems can thams cad dang // mdor na sangs rgyas rnams dag dang /
260b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang // dbang du 'gyur ba gdon mi za// bde ldan pho brang chen po yi// bde byed 'di yis 'thod par byed// sems can khams rnams thams cad du// sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'ong byed// pad+mo'i
260b4(rgyud 'bum): skyil mo'o/ / de bzhin skyil mo rgyas byas te// sna tshogs tshul gyis sbyor ba bya// sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yi// sngags mkhan yi ge shin tu brtson// zlos pa byed cing rnam bsgoms na// dngos grub rtag pa thob
260b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / mi g.yeng sngon gyi gdug pa yis// las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed// sna tshogs skyil du gnas pa yis// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sna tshogs kyi ni skyil mo'o// de nas mkha' 'gro
260b6(rgyud 'bum): ma yi skyil mo rgyas/ / thams cad khrag ni 'phrog byas te// gzung ma yi ni rkang pa gnyis// yid kyis gnyis par rkang pa 'deg/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa khrag rnams 'phrog par byed// mnyam par
260b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhag nas gzung ma yi/ / rkang pa gcig ni mgul nyid du// sbyor dang ldan pas bteg byas nas// zas rnams thams cad 'phrog byed de// btung dang bza' ba bca' ba dang // gos kyi rgyan gyis spabs pa yis//
261a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin zhag 'dun nyid kyis kyang // thams cad las byed gdon mi za// tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang po yi// dpal chen mchog ni 'phrog par byed// lag pa bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni//
261a2(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum rim par rgal bar byed// mig ni btsum par byed 'gyur ba// 'gro ba gsum po rnam par 'jig/ rus sbal bzhin du mnyam bzhag ste// mi g.yeng skad cig bcings byas na// gdug pa srog chags
261a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / dgra dang spyod bcas mi spyod 'phrog/ sbal pa bzhin du mnyam bzhag ste// dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar bya'o// ma lus rnams kyang rmongs byed de// khams gsum rnams kyang rgal bar
261a4(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / gtogs 'dod kyi ni mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab bya// gar dbang gi ni mnyam pazhag ste// sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab bya// gar dbang gi ni mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum
261a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni gar byed gzhug/ dril bu yi ni mnyam bzhag ste// sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya// gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed// skyil mo phyed ni mnyam bzhag nas// gnyis
261a6(rgyud 'bum): pa yis ni mnan byas na/ / khams gsum thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing // 'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo// dga' byed ma yi mnyam bzhag pas// skyil mo rab tu dga' thob ste// dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma// khams
261a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum thams cad dngos grub bo/ / rigs 'dzin rnam par bzhag byas te// khams gsum skad cig mnan par bya// dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi// mdor 'dus gzung ma'i bcings pa yis// 'jig rten
261b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum ni rnam rgyal te/ / skad cig khams gsum bdag por 'gyur// rtag par phan tshun 'brel ba yis// dpung ba gnyis ni bskum byas te// thams cad sgo ni 'gebs pa yis// che ba sbom po rab tu sbyar// g.yas kyi
261b2(rgyud 'bum): brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni/ / gnon pa'i mnan pas bsdigs byas te// mi phyed sbyor bas bskul bya ba// khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya// g.yon pa'i brkyang bskum sbyar bar bya// myur du mnan pas gteg
261b3(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / / mthe'u chung po ba'i lcags kyu yis// mdzub mo lce la reg byas te// sa bon tsheg drag hri ldan pa'i// thig le'i spyi bor brgyan byas pas// bdud rtsi 'am ni rig ma drang bar bya// lce yi thog mar spro byas te//
261b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam bzhag ste// kha yi phyogs su mche ba yis// sbom po lce dang 'dra byas te// khros pa mche ba sbyor ba yis// sor mo thos pa bzhin byas nas// khrag mang po ni
261b5(rgyud 'bum): btung bar bya/ / yi ge dang po o dang ldan// spyi bor thig le ldan byas te// 'og gi phyogs su ra yis gdags// u 'dren nga ros brgyan par bya// 'di ni khro bo'i snying po ste// mchog tu thams cad las byas pa'o//
261b6(rgyud 'bum): gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun// dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs// de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang // tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par 'gyur// shi ba bzhin du mig btsums nas// rang gi lus ni bskum
261b7(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / bum bu lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yis// dgra rnams thams cad bsad par bya// nga ro dang po yang dag ldan// bdag nyid ngo bo thams cad bya// sangs rgyas chen po bsgom byas te// zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro/
262a1(rgyud 'bum): yis lus ni zhi bar 'gyur// de yis sems can thams cad kyi// 'tshe ba gdon dang dug la sogs// sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i mche ba dang // 'jigs pa thams cad bral bar byed//
262a2(rgyud 'bum): shes rab pha rol phyin mnyam gzhag/ bdag nyid kyi ni tshul bzhin du// 'di yis thams cad nang gi rnams// sdug bsngal dogs pa 'phrog par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// nam mkha' sa steng
262a3(rgyud 'bum): las kyi rnams/ / snying khar rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag/ yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur// myur du rdo rje slob dpon la// sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas// gus pa zhe sar bcas pa yis// shin
262a4(rgyud 'bum): tu lhag par phyogs par bya/ / nam yang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// sems ni dkrug par mi bya ste// ci ste shes rab 'chal pas byed// myur du na rag lhung bar 'gyur// nad dang 'tshe ba dgra dag dang // gdon dang tsha
262a5(rgyud 'bum): bdug nyid kyis/ / slob dpon zhabs la smod byed pa// gti mug chen po de 'chi'o// bla ma las ni dngos grub thob// bla ma mtho ris bla ma bde// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi
262a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi
262a7(rgyud 'bum): za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje mchog gsang ba sbas pa chen po zla gsang thig le'i rgyu kyi rgyal po shin
262b1(rgyud 'bum): dgyes pa chen pos rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs rdo rje rnal 'byor pa dang /
262b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma dang / rnam 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi g.yog rnams mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod
262b3(rgyud 'bum): par gyur to/ / kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che// sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che// sna tshogs ye shes bde ba che// kye ma kun tu bzang po yi// dge ba'i ye shes bde ba che// gang bde phyir
262b4(rgyud 'bum): ni rig mi yi/ / pad+mo las ni gnas pa mdzad// kye ma'o rig pa shin tu zab// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde// sems can kun la shes rab kyis// mun pa'i thibs po sel bar mdzad// kye ma'o thams cad do
262b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshar che/ / mkha' 'gro'i dra bas gar mdzad cing // bsnam par mdzad dang myang ba dang // mnye ba ni 'phrog pa'i tshogs// e ma'o shin tu rab tu dgyes// skal ldan skal la sprod pa dang // sna tshogs skal bas
262b6(rgyud 'bum): bde byed che/ / sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la// rnam
262b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma thams cad dang mchog gi pha rol byin ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te/ / shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud pas phyag byas te// shin tu rtsa
263a1(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes par mdzad do/ / sgyu ma'i bde bas nam mkha' kun tu gang ba yin// sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog gi bde bsten te/
263a2(rgyud 'bum): rjes su chags pa'i pad+ma dga' bas kun khyab cing // chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang snyoms mdzad// e ma'o 'di lta'i gzung ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma// byams ma'i phyogs su mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jug
263a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyid rnam par dag/ dug gsum dbang du mdzad cing mos pa rnams mi bskyod// ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chub snying por bgrod// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po
263a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ / rdo rje pad+mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs te// cang mi gsung
263a5(rgyud 'bum): babar mnyam par zhugs te dbugs mi rngub/ / dbugs mi 'dzin/ dbugs rab tu gtong bar ma mdzad// kun tu mi gzigs/ kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/ bzhengs par mi mdzad/ bzhugs par mi mdzad/ gshegs par
263a6(rgyud 'bum): mi mdzad/ gsung bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog pa'ang mi mdzad bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dpyid thams cad shin tu khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa ma/
263a7(rgyud 'bum): de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug bcings dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dang
263b1(rgyud 'bum): yang du 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/ bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang gnyis su med par longs spyod pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bskul
263b2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs te byang chub kyi sems chen po la'ang thim pa na/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang 'jug par byed/ bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med/ sangs
263b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun 'jug par byed pa'ang med/ khros pa dang / gtum po chen po dang / rngam pa dang / rab tu gdug pa chen por sems pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pas bsgribs
263b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gtum 'khrug chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi bud med kyis 'chums pa dang / tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pas
263b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la gtses pa dang / gcig gi sha gcig za ba dang / thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi stobs la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
263b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis gzigs so/ / thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu yang dag par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin
263b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do/ / ho rang bzhin dag pa dag pa pad+ma bde
264a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchog mnga' ba/ / thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad de// bskal pa mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i byams pas gzugs kyis brjid pa dang // byang chub
264a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i chu nges 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus/ / a la la la ho/ pad+mo'i 'byung gnas bde gshegs kun gyi mchog dang ldan// sdug bsngal kun sel ba yi thugs rjes 'jig rten gsum la gzigs// dga' ba'i rol
264a3(rgyud 'bum): pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod/ / a la la la ho/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bsgrags// gsang ba'i 'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'di phyung ste// rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyi
264a4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'phrog nam mkha' la/ / dngos med rol mo'i gzhan las 'phangs pa bzhengs shing mdzad du gsol// a la la la ho/ skad cig ma yi spyod yul 'dis// mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir// gzhan la thugs rjes
264a5(rgyud 'bum): dgongs nas su/ / bying ba'i lha rnams bslang du gsol// dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// dgyes mchog dam pa bskul byas nas// pad+mo dra ba rdo rje dang // bde bar sbyor bar bzhengs su gsol// bde ba chen po bde
264a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa/ / gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis// sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te// rgyal ba thams cad gdon par mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang
264a7(rgyud 'bum): dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhengs nas/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byams mtha' klas pa'i 'jig rjen gyi khams
264b1(rgyud 'bum): kun gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ / kye ma'o khams gsum 'di stongs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyi 'di dag nye bar gces
264b2(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / / srin po thams cad dang // nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa chen po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos zhes dgongs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das sum
264b3(rgyud 'bum): bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde ba chen po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo
264b4(rgyud 'bum): dang pad+mo las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar bya ste/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // thog mar oM ni thig ler bsam byas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa// mi phyer 'dren pa
264b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa ste/ / 'di ni ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid do// phyung nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du gang ba'i spro bas snang bar byas te// slar yang 'dus nas rdo rje lta bur gnas so// yang spro ba dang bsdu ba byas
264b6(rgyud 'bum): nas slar 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / / gsung dang // thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur nas/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs par gyur pa na// hUM hUM hUM zhes bzhad pa chen por bas
264b7(rgyud 'bum): cing a zhes brjod nas bzhugs te/ / rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mos g.yon du yid tsam 'gying bas 'dus pa g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum dang bcas shing spyan rgyas pa che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa// phyag ni bcu druH
265a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang ldan/ / sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin pa// dpa' bo thams cad las byed pa// kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid che// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje rgyu mar rab tu gnas/
265a2(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa gang gi snying kha nyid// mnyam par gzhag ste 'dzin byas na// rdo rje pad+mo bde che yis// rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkhar 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya
265a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zla gsang thig le las// nam mkha' shin tu dgyes pa
265a4(rgyud 'bum): thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo / / oM yi gtsug tu thig le ste// mi phyed thig ler bcas pa yi// 'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bca// mthar ni dra
265a5(rgyud 'bum): ste tsheg drag bcas/ / 'dir ni rin chen thams cad kyi// snying po mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// phyung ba yis ni nam mkha' dang // sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun tu// 'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te// slar yang de nyid
265a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs par 'gyur/ / de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang // lnga yis tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas// sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni// kha dog rnam lnga yangs
265a7(rgyud 'bum): par spyan/ / chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas// nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che// phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs rgyan// skyil mo 'gying ba g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi snying khar rin chen 'jim// brgyad gnyis
265b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ngo bo yis/ / dri ma gsum spangs brgyan pa ste// rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas// sna tshogs lho ru gnas par 'gyur// rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rig pa'i// nad kyis slongs pa 'jigs par 'gyur/
265b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gzi brjid chen mo mdangs che ba// dbul dang nad dang gnod chen po// sems can kun gyi 'phrog par byed// nyi ma 'char ba'i dus nyid dang // nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyid du//
265b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi snying khar 'di byas te// nor bu rin chen bsgom byas na// zhag dun gyis ni nges par yang // dngos grub don mang sbyin mdzad de// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde bas dbang bskur byas//
265b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod pa'i dbang gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// pad+mo
265b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang / / gsung dang / thugs kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le las 'di phyung ngo // dang por oM dang ldan
265b6(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / mi phyed ra btags 'dren par bcas// tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te// bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskor// sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam bzhag ste// snang khar 'di ni skur byas nas//
265b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shing // pad+mo sbyor bas bsgom par bya// mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu// dam tshig 'di ni spyad byas na// zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su// dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub 'thob/
266a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo che las byung nas kyang // thams cad du ni rgyas 'gyur te// 'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas// pad+mo'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur// kun tu snang bas khyab byas nas// sems dpa'i
266a2(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis sprul pa ni/ / de nas 'dod chags 'bas nas kyang // pad+mo'i dbus su bzhugs par gyur// dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis// rgyab nas rjes su mnyes mdzad cing // 'dzum bcas pad+mo phye ba yis//
266a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi dbus su yid tsam 'dud// dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin// phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma bstam// mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa yis// zla ba bzhin du rnam grol ba//
266a4(rgyud 'bum): brjid pa'i gar ni mdzad cing bzhugs// 'di yis pad+mo'i gnas nyid du// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// dpal ldan gar dbang thob 'gyur te// 'dod chags kun gyi thabs gnas pas// 'jam pa'i
266a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag ni stong rnams kyi/ / gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par
266a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le'i chen po las phyung ngo // sna tshogs chen po oM chen po// sde
266a7(rgyud 'bum): du thig ler yang dag ldan/ / 'di ni dbus te lha 'og khro// sngags kyi mchog ni gzhag par bya// sna tshogs 'di ni thugs kar grags// sna tshogs phyung nas kun snang bas// sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas/
266b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid slar 'khor bar bzhugs te// sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas// skad cig sems dpa' sku gnas pa// rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas brgyan// 'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin// sna tshogs
266b2(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid 'bar bar gtong / / phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyis phyogs// kha byed sna tshogs mtshon cha gtong // zhal lnga sna tshogs yangs che ba// bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad// dkyil 'khor gar bar
266b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan nas byang du gnas/ / sna tshogs rdo rje bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis// thugs kar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas// sngags mkhan zhag bdun nyid du bsgom byas na// sna tshogs gyur te sna tshogs de la bab// sna tshog
266b4(rgyud 'bum): las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te// dbyangs chen po len cing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyes pa
266b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / gtso bo byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir// ye shes lnga yi dngos po dge/ rgyal ba nyid kyis bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas sku la bstod phyag 'tshal// sngags rigs phyag rgya yan lag bcas// lha yi
266b6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid pha rol phyin/ / bdag ni de nyid sna tshogs che// sna tshogs ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal// gzungs kyi pad+mo yang dag ldan// 'dod byed thugs kyi mchog yin te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// spyod pa'i ye shes
266b7(rgyud 'bum): bstod phyag 'tshal/ / chos kyi don ni gnyis med tshul// stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa// yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs// me long ye shes yang dag 'byung // bya ba nan tan sems can don// rang gi yon tan mi
267a1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam shod/ / de nyid rig pas sems can kun// rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa// gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag/ sangs rgyas gsum ni dbang du 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
267a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku
267a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM b+h+rUM stong pa chen po'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra tsat+te hUM/ oM badz+ra kA ya oM/ oM badz+ra bAka AH/ oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa traM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
267a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad shin tu mgu/ rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rang rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo// de nas
267a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o/ / zhes bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad do// dge'o dge'o rgyal ba kun// dge 'o dge'o rgyal ba mchog/ dge 'o dge'o
267a6(rgyud 'bum): legs pa'i las/ / dge'o dge'o sngon 'gro ba// dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che// nyid kyi snying khar drangs byas te// rang gi gsang ba bshad par mdzod// gang gi ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams// bde ba'i yid ni chud par 'gyur//
267a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang // gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma koha~M/ de nas bcom
267b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das me long gi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ti ri Shi dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
267b2(rgyud 'bum): pa so sor kun tu gzigs pa'i ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ma hA pra pek+Sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ de nas bcom
267b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa maM tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma kohaM/ de nas bcom
267b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA kr-i t+ya a nusta ne dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ de nas bcom
267b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de/ oM dge'o dge 'o stong pa che/ oM dge'o dge 'o thugs chen po/ oM dge'o dge 'o sku chen po// oM dge 'o dge 'o gsung chen po// oM dge
267b6(rgyud 'bum): 'o dge 'o rin po che'o/ / dge 'o dge 'o sna tshogs che// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas// bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs
267b7(rgyud 'bum): te/ dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje yi// dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shod// gang gis sems can bde nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor rab tu 'thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes
268a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba/ / rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gsang ba gsungs// gang gis dkyil 'khor myur bris nas// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bde ba'i bzhi nyid ni// gsang ba'i
268a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o/ / dkyil 'khor rgyan pa'i bdag nyid de// gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs// dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bya ba// dkyil
268a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par/ / gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod// dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+mo ste// dkyil 'khor rab dgyes 'thob byed pa'i// tshad med dkyil 'khor
268a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad par mdzod/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dkyil
268a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa yi// bu mo mig yangs gzung bya ste// shes rab can gyis byin brlabs 'bras// mnyam par bzhag ste byin
268a6(rgyud 'bum): brlabs nas/ / shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo gzhag/ gnyis po mdun du bzhag byas pa// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo ste// thugs ni dgyes
268a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa yin/ / gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba// dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che// dbang bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o// bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste// de nyid chos don yang dag kan
268b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste/ / de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no// bzod pa chen mo byang du ste// gsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin// btsun mo rdo rje gdon mi za// dam tshig gnas ni skyong byed ma'i// grwa dag tu ni thams cad du//
268b2(rgyud 'bum): snga ma bzhin du mchod la sogs// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sgo srungs rnams ni rnam pa bzhi// ci 'dod par ni mchod bya ste// slob ma mchog ni gzhug par bya// phyag rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te// 'dzum dang /
268b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig/ rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs// spro ba che bas gar bya zhing // lha yi 'gying ba'i 'dun pa yis// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya// mig ni dar gyi gos nyid kyis// g.yogs te
268b4(rgyud 'bum): lag pas bzung nas kyang / / sgo yi grwar yang gzhag bya ste// smon lam mchog ni sma ru gzhug/ rdo rje chen mo bdag ces bgyi// rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste// rang gi dgyes nas las byung ba'i// bde byed chen mo'i
268b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyes par bgyi/ / ji ltar bzhin du mnyam nyid thob// me tog 'phreng ba dor byas te// lha mo chen mo bzhes su gsol// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshal lo// lha mo gang la lhung ba yis// de yi lag nas bskor ba bya//
268b6(rgyud 'bum): lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun// sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis// de nas slob ma de yis ni// bdag gi rab dgyes smra bya zhing // de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod// khro bo rnams kyi mi phyed phaT// mtha' ni ho zhes sbyar
268b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / 'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni// a ho su kha bde zhes smra// de nas rdo rje phyung ba yi// mkhas pas de ni blang byas te// bde ba chen po dngos grub rdzas// bla ma la ni dang por dbul// de nas de nyid kun la yang //
269a1(rgyud 'bum): ci bde bar ni dngul babya// spyi bos nabs la gtugs b+h+yas te/ bla ma la ni dbang bslang bya// shin tu sbas pa'i 'phags pa'i dbang // bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod// de nas sbyor
269a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po yi/ / snyoms par zhugs te de bde ba// slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te// spyi bor rab tu gzhag par bya// lag pa yis ni ma rig par// kha la rab tu sbyin par bya// khyad par du ni drang byas te// ci 'de bar ni
269a3(rgyud 'bum): btung bar bya/ / gzung ma de dag thams cad la// rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya// de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyis// bla ma la ni yon dngul ba// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma dang ni rang gi bu// bdag nyid dang ni rgyal sring
269a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de bzhin longs spyod dbang phyug dang // rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang // glang po rta dang shing rta dag/ bla ma la ni yon mchog ste// dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya// phyi ni sbas pa gsang ba dang // de bzhin
269a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad dang / / rdo rje dang ni gzung ma'i rnams// 'dod pa'i dngos grub d+hi bar bya// snying po yang dag shes gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// gas
269a6(rgyud 'bum): ba yi ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ / ci ste rmongs pas smra byas na// slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams// myur du bA byed tshun chad du// bstan pas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// dang por dam tshig gzhag byas te// phyi nas dkyil
269a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bstan par bya/ / gzhan du byas na dpa' bo'i rnams// dmyal bar dka' bar grangs med smin// de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis// nan tan dam tshig bsgrags mi bya// sngags kyi dngos grub ngon ngor pas// dam tshig srung la
269b1(rgyud 'bum): brtson par bya/ / gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi// sngags la sogs pa'i don mi 'grub// lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi/ gsol yang bzhes su mi gnang ste// 'jig rten 'di ru sdug bsngal che// 'jig rten pa
269b2(rgyud 'bum): rol dmyal ba'i rnams/ / dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob bo// slob ma de yang de bzhin du// blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te// de na sngags kyi don mi smin// lha rnams kyi ni
269b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu bde/ / dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la// nams kyang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro// de bas dam tshig gtso yin te// thog mar dam tshig sbyin par bya// sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang // de bzhin thabs dang shes
269b4(rgyud 'bum): rab rnams/ / dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang // sngags pas gsang ba sbyor ba yis// dmyal ba ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir// bu dang slob ma sbyin par byed// sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed// gtsang sbra dogs/
269b5(rgyud 'bum): pa med par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dal// dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bris byas te// gzhon nu'i tshad ni bcu drug lo// dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bzhag nas cho ga 'dis gzhug bya// dam
269b6(rgyud 'bum): tshig rnams ni 'di yin te/ / sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po// nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang // rdo rje las byung chubasgrubs rnams// dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag/ dam tshig yi ge bzhag pa yis// myur du dam
269b7(rgyud 'bum): tshig bsgrub byas na/ / dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te// 'dzin pa yis ni mthu ru 'gyur// ma 'ongs sangs rgyas chen po dang // rdo rje
270a1(rgyud 'bum): / sems dpa' bdag po rnyer// blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis// dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'thob 'gyur te// dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyupa/
270a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
270a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad mchog tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te/ / bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// gdug pa thams cad rnam 'dul ba// 'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di/ rdo rje jo bo chen po 'i// dkyil 'khor chen
270a4(rgyud 'bum): po rnams bshad phyir/ / 'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul ba// dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi// khro bo'i dam tshig ded dpon gyis// gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems
270a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye she las 'di byung ngo // oM badz+ra ma hA tsar+d+ha sar+b+ba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha ba tsa
270a6(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos/ lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
270a7(rgyud 'bum): lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'khrug pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas de dag brgya byin gyi thad du lhags nas// brgya byin bdag nyid kyang skyabs med par mthong nas tshangs pa'i thad du
270b1(rgyud 'bum): phyin/ tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi kun du phyin te/ gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du phyin te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag tham
270b2(rgyud 'bum): cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus kun tu snang bar byas te/ lha rnams ma 'jigs shig/ klu rnams ma 'jigs shig/ gnod sbyin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig/ dri za rnams ma 'jigs shig/ lha dang 'jig
270b3(rgyud 'bum): rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam/ khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas gnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de
270b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba// khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
270b5(rgyud 'bum): thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ma hA kro d+ha ha na ha na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+haM dza b+haM dza/ da ha da hA/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM/ b+h+rUM b+h+raM/ brad+d+hA ya prad+d+hA ya/ b+h+r-i ku T+yan sar+b+ba mA rA na sar+b+ba duSh+TA/ ma ta ma ta/ mo ta mo ta/ hUM bruM/ hUM traM/ tra Ta tra Ta/
270b6(rgyud 'bum): b+h+rUM trUM traM/ hUM traM traT/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du smag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhags so// de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi tshe banye bar ston cing gtogs 'dod la smras pa// khyod kyang mthu che ba'i
270b7(rgyud 'bum): lha chen po ste gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin/ rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig/ de nas gtogs 'dod de ma thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed
271a1(rgyud 'bum): @kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas/ rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i bgad pa'i gdangs 'dzin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
271a2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po chen po yang khro bo chen po'i pad+mo 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu pad+mo'i dra ba 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
271a3(rgyud 'bum): kar zhugs so/ / zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i kha nas phyung ngo // oM pad+ma ma hA dz+wa la ma hA bo d+ha ba ta ba mu kha kha kha/ sar+b+ba du
271a4(rgyud 'bum): Sh+T+r-iShAM/ wA hi khA hi sar+b+ba duSh+TaM pra duSh+TaM naM/ da ma da ma/ badz+ra daMSh+To ta ka Da ma ta ma ta k+Sho Ta k+Sho Ta/ badz+ra kha ra/ tsa pa la durga be ga/ tra sa tra sa/ ma hA badz+ra pa Ta ba mu kha/ pra ma ta pra ma ta hUM phaT/ hri ha ha hi hi/ tsa tu ra mu kha/ be sha prA Na sha na/
271a5(rgyud 'bum): hUM hrI hUM hUM d+hIHha/ de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu tshangs ris chen po 'dar phad pad cing kha sbub tu 'gyel te rnga ba 'chol lo// de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po la dris pa/ lha 'di ni shan tu ngo
271a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshar du snang ngo / / de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskul ba/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso'o// lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po/ khyod ni 'jig rten gsum na stong pa dang byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan
271a7(rgyud 'bum): pa de'i phyir khyod kyi gdug pa'i sems can dang / gdug pa'i lus can thams cad rlag par gyis shig/ de nas tshangs pas rang nyid kyi mthu dang / tshangs pa chen po'i srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ 'jigs byed
271b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po lta bur gdong bzhi pa/ me lde stong gis gzi brjid can gyi lus 'gul ba dang bcas pas bgad pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
271b2(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po chen po yang lha thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku
271b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba/ ma hA kro d+ha sar+b+ba duSh+TA na sa ma b+hak+Sha ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ badz+ra yak+Sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ de nas 'di byung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di
271b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dum bu brgyar rnam par bshig ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'ang 'gul zhing kun tu 'khyor nas gnas par 'gyur/ brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa'ang kha sbub tsam du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur to// de nas langs te dbang
271b5(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen po la bltas pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul ba/ khyod ni lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po ste/ mthu che ba yin la/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par
271b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa yin na/ de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar ston cig/ de nas lha'i rgyal po chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthu gnod sbyin dang / srin po chen po'i gzugs nye bar ston cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams
271b7(rgyud 'bum): cad la gdug pa dag ma 'jigs shig/ nga'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyang zil gyis gnon mi nus so zhes dbugs 'byin par byed de/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang sngags kyi
272a1(rgyud 'bum): lha thams cad 'dren pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i ye shes la 'jug par mdzad de/
272a2(rgyud 'bum): bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur nas/ bdag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad 'byin pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugs su dmigs te mche ba chen po 'byin pa/ zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan
272a3(rgyud 'bum): stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can/ rab tu mi bzang bar byed pa'i me rlung gis 'das pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag rgya mi'i keng rus dang / khrag dang / sha dang / klad pa dang
272a4(rgyud 'bum): rkang dang / tsha'i rnams zas su gsol pa/ mi'i pags pas snam g.yogs te bsdams pa/ maM'i mgo bo'i 'phreng ba dbul 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma the dang / pag dang / ce spyang dang
272a5(rgyud 'bum): radang / khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhang dang / byil dang / gzig dang / stag le sogs pa'i jo bo byol song gi gdong brgya skyong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu gnas phyung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar
272a6(rgyud 'bum): grogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par gnyer ba'i 'dzugs pa lta bu'i spyan dang / zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gis yog dang / shar phyogs kyi
272a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/ / lho'i dkyil 'khor du'ang rdo rje khro gnyer can tho bobargya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// nung kyi dkyil 'khor du'ang pad+ma chen po cha gdong khro bo brgya stong ma
272b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yog dang / nub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// byang gi dkyil 'khor du'ang rdo rje 'ur 'ur chen po'i khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes
272b2(rgyud 'bum): pa khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs te/ khro bo chen po'i tshogs de dag dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos kun du spyod cing / khro bo chen po'i rnam par brgya stong mang po'i
272b3(rgyud 'bum): ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snyed phyung nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad du gang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas so// de nas gdug pa'i tshogs
272b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs sngangs skyabs ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi bdag po'i thad du song ste/ rje cig rje cig nyid kyis bdag la skyobs shig/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag bdag
