272b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi mthu sprul nas slar yang bslang ste/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yongs su bskor du bcug nas/ 'jigs byed gdungs pa nga la skyabs su song zhes bsgo yang skyabs su 'gro ba mi len cing / slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal
272b6(rgyud 'bum): bskyed de/ 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba phyung nas ri rab kyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing / bgad pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin par gyur to/ oM ma hA b+hai ra beSh+Ti Sh+T+r-i/ Ta Ta Ta ta Ta ta/ ha ha i ti/ 'on kyang ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse'u chung
272b7(rgyud 'bum): tshad tsam yang ma 'gul to/ / de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnun te// he ru kas bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin
273a1(rgyud 'bum): cing rgyu ma'i sbub bu drangs nas/ khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang rnams za zhing chem che ma mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/ u ma dang 'ga' 'ga' yang rnam par bcom mo/
273a2(rgyud 'bum): mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te sma phab nas/ khro bo bdag nyid kyi mthu nye bar spel cing 'khor thams cad kyang btul/ skyabs len du'ang bcug/ dam tshig la'ang gnas par byas te yang dag par zhugs so//
273a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po drag po bzhad pas bzhad cing rdo rje'i khro gnyer khro bo chen po'i zhal nas ma 'jigs shig/ ces dbugs 'byin par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo
273a4(rgyud 'bum): / rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs kun la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM bo d+ha bo d+ha/ ma hA b+hai ra ba da ra ba pa dA ri ha ra ha ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/
273a5(rgyud 'bum): mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ shI g+h+raM ma hA badz+ra/ tsar+N+Na sar+b+ba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hUM phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'dul bar byed pas rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed/
273a6(rgyud 'bum): do// khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs te/ 'khyil zhing bsgyur ba/ phyag brgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong me lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i
273a7(rgyud 'bum): sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po ga na ba der song ste/ rdo rje drag po'i gad mo cher 'byin pas bzhad cing mdun na gnas so// oM ma hA badz+ra he ru ka badz+ra aT+TA T+Ta hA sa hA sa ra ha ha ha ha hUM ha/ oM ti/ de nas dbang
273b1(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen pos rdo rje drag po bzhad pa chen po thos nas g.yog dang bcas par kha sbub tu 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur nas/ mgo la zhabs kyis bsnun te gtong bar mdzad do// oM badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti ha na ha na/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ ma ta ma ta
273b2(rgyud 'bum): kiny+tsi rA ya si/ sUr+ya sa ha pra ha sti/ re ka ba su rA dza la la rtsi pra dzA la ti/ ma hA mu rti A kar+N+Na A kab+d+ha a bya wa ma bya wa ma/ kri na ba tsakra b+hai ra ba hri da yaM hUM b+h+r-i/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo chen pos bzhad pas bzhad
273b3(rgyud 'bum): cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi mdun du ston to/ / de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyen te/ kha sbub tu 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhing rje cig bdag cag
273b4(rgyud 'bum): la skyobs shig ces smra zhing / skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas 'khor lo can la skyabs su song ngo // de nas biSh+Tas kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po rab tu nye bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du gnas
273b5(rgyud 'bum): te rgyab la zhugs so/ / kA ye kA ye gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis snying dral te ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de srid rang gi gnas su song zhig/ de nas khro gnyer chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ de drangs te
273b6(rgyud 'bum): gdams nas snying dral te/ de'i khrag la nyi ma'i khro gnyer chen po gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshim par mdzad do// oM badz+ra ba sUr+ya b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha ma hA gra ha ha ra pa su d+he/ ra ma sa med mad dza
273b7(rgyud 'bum): na oM p+pa bA k+Shi/ de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu brlag par gyur te gnas so// de'i chung ma rug mi ni dang / ma hA shrI dang / lag lI yang g.yog dang bcas par rnam par bcom ste/ sna tshogs rnams rnam par
274a1(rgyud 'bum): btul nas bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rta gdong chen po'i rgyab tu gcig bsnun nas gtong bar mdzad do// oM badz+ra ba Da ba mu kha kha kha khA hI khA hI/ tsa tur mu lA/ pi ba pi ba/
274a2(rgyud 'bum): / A s+ya ru d+hi raM/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ hr-i da yAM tA na/ ha ma he/ badz+ra b+ha ga ba mu ka/ hi hi kha ma hA/ shwa shwe shwe ra hI hI/ de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to// de nas tshad
274a3(rgyud 'bum): pa tshangs pa'i srin po bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' bkang nas rgya bar byed de/ de nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor kha sbub tu 'gyel nas/ rje cig skyobs shig ces smras so// kA ye kA ye gdug pa'i gdong myur du song song /
274a4(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma dul re zhes spras so// de nas rdo rje rnga gdong chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ tshangs pa chen po de'i mgor brdzis te/ snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la zhugs te/ sha dang /
274a5(rgyud 'bum): klad pa dang / tshal bu dang / rus pa rnams myangs nas phyogs bcur gtor ro// de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang / swa ra sa ti dang / shAn+ti rnams kyang rnam par bcom/ de'i tshogs kyang btul nas/ dam tshig gi sdom pa
274a6(rgyud 'bum): la gnas par byas te bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen pos khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs te gtong bar mdzad do// oM gu la gu lu badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha/ A kaR+Sha
274a7(rgyud 'bum): ya A kaR+Sha ya sha kra hri da yaM/ ma hA badz+ra daMSh+TA ya/ hUM b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos nam mkha'i ngos kun bkang ste/ brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to// de na brgya byin
274b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gying ba chen pos bsgyings te/ mi bzad par khros gnod sbyin chen po khyod su'i bran yin zhes de la smras so// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po khros 'khros rngam par gyur te/ snying nas gtsug gi nor bu phyung snying yang
274b2(rgyud 'bum): dral te/ de'i sha dang / khrag dang / klad pa dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa dang / bza' ba rnams bza' bar zhugs so// de nas de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing spangs pa'i yid du gyur te skyabs su nye bar gyur to// /
274b3(rgyud 'bum): de'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang bcom nas de'i gnas na gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang rol cing shin tu dgyes pa'i kun
274b4(rgyud 'bum): tu longs spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad do// oM ma hA su ra ta badz+ra ma
274b5(rgyud 'bum): hA kro d+ha saM ha ro pa saM ha ra sar+b+ba kro d+ha ma/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha/ ut+ta ma kro d+ha/ swa sa ma ya ma hA maN+Da le/ s+thA pa ya s+thA pa ya/ sarba kro d+ha ma duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta bi ba ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya sha kra bah+ma biSh+Ta ra ma he shwa
274b6(rgyud 'bum): ram ho b+ha ga gaM sur ta so khya kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ba ta sad+h+ye na sa ma oM tsa ho/ su ra ta sa ma ya i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen pos khro bo thams cad 'dren pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bc-i
274b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM dzAHhUM ba~M hoHTak+ki hUM hrIHTak+ki hU~M dz+dzaHhUM Tak+ki hUM dz+dza/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ bi d+ha ya ba sha~M ku ru/ sar+b+ba krod+ha/ sa ma yaM/ dzaHhUMH
275a1(rgyud 'bum): ho/ Ta k+ki hUM dz+dza hUM Tak+ki hUM/ de nas khro bo chen po'i dam tshig de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lor 'khyil bar gyur te/ kye bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du
275a2(rgyud 'bum): gsol zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyung
275a3(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ma hA kro d+ha sha hUM phaT/ de nas de dag la khyed kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems can chen po rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to// de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab
275a4(rgyud 'bum): tu gdug pa'i rnams gsos zhes gsol nas/ de nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pas khro bos phyag bsnol te btsa re nas rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo phyung
275a5(rgyud 'bum): / ngo// oM badz+ra a mri ta/ ma hA kro d+he shwa ri ud shI dzaHuT shrI dzaHbadz+ra a mr-i te hUM AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo de dag kun tu khros te smin ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa/ ru lu ru lu zhes
275a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgra 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i rig ma 'di phyung ngo / / oM a mr-i ta saM dzI ba ni ma hA mr-i ta mu khe/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badz+ra pad+ma sad yo
275a7(rgyud 'bum): ge/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta/ bi tha pi tha/ mUrti a/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo thams
275b1(rgyud 'bum): cad mthong nas ngo mtshar bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyabs su dong nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor rnams gnas par gyur to// de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i
275b2(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod par byed de/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab/ phan byed de bzhin yum yin te/ gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag rnams/ 'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste/ rje bo sdug bsngal thams cad
275b3(rgyud 'bum): sel/ / khyod ni 'gro ba'i dbang po rje// khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong // che ba che khyod skye bo skyong // thog ma med khyod nga ro thigs// nga ro'i steng ni cha yang med// gtso bo yig med bdud rtsi yi// rang dgyes bde byed
275b4(rgyud 'bum): gtong ba yis/ / 'gro ba kun la phan bya'i phyir// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams// rab dgyes 'gro la bde ba'i phyir// mgon po khyod kyis gtong ba mdzod// sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing // bla na med pa byang
275b5(rgyud 'bum): chub lam/ / sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa// sems can skom pa ngoms mdzad cing // 'khor ba dpa' glong grol mdzad do// myur du bde la dgongs pa mdzad// dngos po kun gyis thams cad du// rgyal ba kun gyi
275b6(rgyud 'bum): mi dpogs te/ / zhi ba'i rnam par zhir 'gyur ba// rdul dang bral ba 'jug pa spangs// nam mkha' sgom las rnam 'das pa// rnam rtog dri mas ma gos te// sgyu ma kun las yang dag 'das// 'dod pa kun la rgyab
275b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs pa/ / gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed la// byang chub mchog ni thob kyi bar// bdag cag skyabs su rab tu mchi// ji srong 'tsho ba mchis pa dang // dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jig rten/
276a1(rgyud 'bum): du// ltung bar gyur pa ji srid pa// khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi// byang chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang // dri med skal bar gyur pa yi// gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba// bde ba chen/
276a2(rgyud 'bum): pos sbal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos de dag gis gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te//
276a3(rgyud 'bum): zhugs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba sgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang // gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ste/ bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul chen po'i lha'i 'khor thams cad
276a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur te/ / de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas yid bde bar gyur te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du
276a5(rgyud 'bum): gtugs nas bskor ba byas te/ / ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas// yang rdo rje gzung ma shin tu dgyes
276a6(rgyud 'bum): pa bde ba chen mo'i dam tshig dang sbyor ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te cang mi gsung bar bzhugs nas/ de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro mo dbang mo chen mo
276a7(rgyud 'bum): / zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra kro d+he shwa ri sar+b+ba duSh+TA ni mu dra Ni/ ma hA pa la yA na lash+ma shA na b+hi Sha Ne/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha daMSh+Ta ka rA la kr-i ta ba da ne/ sar+b+ba sha
276b1(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ pra sha ma ni/ hUM hUM ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT phaT/ 'dis ji lta bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du bzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum
276b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ mdog in+d+ra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / thod pa'i 'khar ba dang / thod pa dang / mdung dang / sta gri dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / be con dang / mu su ra dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang /
276b3(rgyud 'bum): to ma ya dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / shag ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu rgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang me'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i
276b4(rgyud 'bum): / gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o// oM ma hA badz+ra d+harma kro d+he shwa ri ma hA shA shA na b+hi Sha Ne ni lA dzA la sa ha sra pra dzA li ta mUrti d+he re ka pA la mA lA/ b+hU Shi ta ma gu te/ na ra du ti ra ra tra/ pa ri
276b5(rgyud 'bum): pu ri/ ta ka pA la/ a ste kha T+wAM ga/ badz+ra tri shU la gan+ta ma hA kro d+he na/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ he he run+ta mun+ta pri ye hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan
276b6(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nyi ma khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hUM traM ma hA sUr+ya badz+ra kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha ma/ ma tha ma tha/
276b7(rgyud 'bum): g+ha sa grA sa/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAM/ pra duSh+TAM hU~M phaT/ oM hUM tra~M traM/ Tha tra rba/ khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen por gtor zhing / shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar
277a1(rgyud 'bum): dpung pa bcu drug rno ba ste/ dngu rgyan thod pas brtsegs par bya/ spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha'i tshogs ni bsnams par brtson// gdug pa thams cad 'cha' byed cing /
277a2(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas chen po'i stan la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'byung gnas bkod pa'i 'od kyi 'phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// pad+ma'i dra ba
277a3(rgyud 'bum): / khro mo'i dbang mo nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hrIHbadz+ra pad+ma ma hA ban+d+ha mu khe// kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho/ dA ra paM ko be hUM he hUM s+t+waM ha sa hUM hUM hri/ hi sha hi sha/ ma hA badz+ra ba drA ba rul pa
277a4(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ hUM hUM/ hi hi hUM hrIHhUM// dkyil 'khor nang gi dbus nyid du// 'di ni rgyab tu bzhag par bya// rnob chen po zhal gsum pa// Na gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro mo chen mo dpung bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong /
277a5(rgyud 'bum): pi ro'i rta la yang dag zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs// 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing // g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor brgyan te gnas//
277a6(rgyud 'bum): denas bcom ldan 'das yang gdon mi za ba'i ye shes khro mo gnyis su med par 'du ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma zhes bya ba khros pa'i dbang
277a7(rgyud 'bum): / chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba a mo g+ha ma hA bi shwe sha ri hUM hUM hUM/ haM haM haM/ ma hA bo d+he ku mu khe/ ma hA bi shwe ba da ri Ni/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra sha ma ni hUM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis mi
277b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs par/ / rdo rje gdon ma za ba yi// dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnams pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig bzhag byas te// sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan// kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas// bskor ba dang

277b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// bskor bar shes rab can gyis gzhag/ rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan// dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi// de ni cho ga ji bzhin du// 'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin

277b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par gang byas pas mngon par mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so/ / rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang // phyag rgya ma ni ci rigs par// gsang ba'i gar ni bde chen mo// bcom ldan de nyid kyis gsungs//

278a1(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra satwa a nu rA gi ni ma hA kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra A kaR+Sha Ni ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM hUM/ dzA dza hUM hUM/
278a2(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ku la a nu rA ga ni ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM he he hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ro gra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM swa swa hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA te dza a b+hi She ke hUM taM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA sUr+ya b+h+r-i ku Te ka ro ke tA ta Tatra
278a3(rgyud 'bum): hUMhU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA ke tu kro d+he shwa ri ma hA do dza yot+ta ye hUM hUM traM tra phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha Ar+tha A si hUM hUM traM taM hri da ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro hA bak+Shi Ni hUM hUM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM hrIH/
278a4(rgyud 'bum): oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA tik+Sh+Na kro d+he shwa ri ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM hUM badz+ra tik+Sha ha stets+tshe da ya hUM hUM ma Ta ma Ta/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra tsakra d+ha ri Ni ma ho gra du pi ni hUM hUM/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ ma hA badz+ra tsakre Na/ tsAN+Da ya tsAN+Da ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM
278a5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA shwa ga pra b+ha Ni hUM hUM ma ta ma ta phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA bai shwa mu khi hUM hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra pA Ni hUM hUM ha hi phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra yak+Shi Ni hUM kha kha khA hi khA di/
278a6(rgyud 'bum): / a bi b+ha a bi b+ha hA phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra b+ha ni d+ha ni ma hA ke d+he/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ pi ta ya pi ta ya hUM phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra pA la da ni ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha mA li ra
278a7(rgyud 'bum): hUM hUM hUM b+h+rUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he gan+d+ha ba hi hUM ga gr-i/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha rI ma hA kro d+he shwa ra ma hA lo ka d+hA ra Ni/ dI pa yaM dI pa yaM hUM hUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa raM ma hA lA s+ya hUM/ oM sar+b+ba ba
278b1(rgyud 'bum): dA ra ma ma hA kro d+he ma le d+hA ri Ni ts+tsha/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma b+hUg+ni ti ni hUM h+ye he/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha nir+Na ke hUM b+h+rUM/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya dz+nyA dz+dza hUM hUM dz+dza/ oM sar+b+ba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA/

278b3(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so/ / bde ba ma chog gi rgya chen dgongs su gsol// bsam gyis mi khyab bde mchog dbyings dang ldan/ mi g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas// bzung la rol
278b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i bde ba bzhes su gsol/ / ngo mtshar chen po cho 'phrul snang mdzad cing / snying po byang chub bgrod pa rnams kyi lam ston te// rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rten pa// bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol
278b5(rgyud 'bum): bar mdzod/ / ru mu ma hA su hU dzo hi ni dzA la su hU pU mU/ ma hA su hU dzo i ni/ dz+wa la su hU pa b+h+r-i dz+nyA/ ma hA su hU/ i ni dz+wa la su hU u dzi/ u ma hA su hU dzo/ dza i ni dzA su hU/ a la la la ho/ ma hA su hU ra ma ra ma hA/
278b6(rgyud 'bum): su hU/ a la la la ho/ ma hA su tra Na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po 'di
278b7(rgyud 'bum): / nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha gi ni hUM phaT b+haM/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA he ma ba ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ku mA ra pri ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra/
279a1(rgyud 'bum): DA ki nI dri sh+ye mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki rI ma hA badz+ra mUSh+NI tan/ b+hI ta ya b+hI ta ya/ suM b+ha ni su~M b+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+rA kro d+ha ya d+ha ra la li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA kro d+ha
279a2(rgyud 'bum): tsakre N+De ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA mr-i to ta pa ta ki hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA sau maM kro d+he hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra tan+ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA mA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA mri te ka ba la
279a3(rgyud 'bum): sA se hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA so mya kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA a mi ta pu dan d+ha ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra D+ha ki nI badz+ra ping ka li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI bi ba bi ka ru d+hi raM ma hA badz+ra ba li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nA~M/
279a4(rgyud 'bum): ma hA badz+ra sha ni b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra shra ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra pA she hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI A na ya A na ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra be d+hi ni gu gu ma ra ya hUM phaT/ oM
279a5(rgyud 'bum): DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la ya b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra bi ga ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra daSh+Ti hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra ki li pra bi sha pra bi sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA puSh+Ti mAM sA
279a6(rgyud 'bum): sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ka ra badz+ra d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI a kaR+Sha Ni ma hA bing+ga rA li mu ku hUM dz+dzaHdz+dzaHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki n+ya a bi sha ne hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA dan+d+ha hUM hUM baM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra DA ki/
279a7(rgyud 'bum): nI ma hA to Tha Ni sa ma ye hUM hUM A A/ oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha sa mAM sa ru d+hi ra me da pri ya/ ma hA ku b+ha karna d+hu d+hU hUM hUM k+ShaH/ oM badz+ra ma hA rAk+Sha sa A kaD+D+h+ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badz+ra kA la shi ni ban d+he hUM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha
279b1(rgyud 'bum): sa ba~M d+ha ba d+ha ya/ bi sha ya bi sha Na sarbA na d+hU hUM phaH/ oM badz+ra ma hA rAk+Sha sa/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya sar+b+ban ma hA bi li tA nan/ ha ya mI ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag thams cad/
279b2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu mgu nas yid dga' bar 'gyur te/ dbyangs chen mo 'di 'byin par gyur to// kye ma rdo rje sems dpa' yi// rdo rje sbyor ba rab bstan pas// mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid// ci bde bas ni sgrub par byed// de nas
279b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos yang rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun mgu dga' bar bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM DA ki nA A kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya/
279b4(rgyud 'bum): ban d+ha ya to Sha ya/ A/ sar+b+ban badz+ra DA ki nI sri da yaM hUM dz+dza dzaHhUM baM hoHTak+ki hUM dz+dza/ oM he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ A kaD+D+h+ya A kan+d+ha/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ baM d+ha ya baM d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pad+ma ma hA ba
279b5(rgyud 'bum): Ta ba mu kha/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ to / Sha ya/ ha ha hi/ khro bo'i sngags kyi tshogs 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ba dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma de dag la sogs
279b6(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las bya ste/ gtor ma'i mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang / Tak+ki rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyin te/ las
279b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la sbyar ro/ / rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin bcings te/ khro bo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar zhing / zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu bsgreng / lhag ma gnyis brkyang ste 'od zer ltar
280a1(rgyud 'bum): btang ba 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchog yin no/ / phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che// lha dang lha min phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin/
280a2(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa de nyid 'bebs pa dang // thams cad tshogs ni 'dzud par byed// gdug pa thams cad gsod byed ma// srin mo thams cad za bar byed// rnal 'byor dam pa gnas pa yis// 'di yis las
280a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad byed/ / las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// mi ldan dngos grub mi 'gyur te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// bsnyen pas dngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje bcings pa gnyis su
280a4(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste phan tshun bsnol// khros pa gnyis gyen du bsgreng ste snying khar bstan nas// brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams cad byed pa'o// 'di yis thams
280a5(rgyud 'bum): cad las kyi rnams/ / ji tsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur// tshe 'dir sdig pa gang byas pa// 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed// de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te// dngos grub yid bzhin rin chen no//
280a6(rgyud 'bum): ji snyed nam mkha'i lam dag tu// rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phrul par byed// rigs 'dzin mchog ni mtshon par yang // cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong // thal mo sbyar te sbom po gnyis dbus su sbyar// lhag ma
280a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni pad+ma'i gdan no/ / sbom po gnyis rtse mo thur du bstan pa ni rta gdong gi'o// gang gi sbyor byas skad cig tu// de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur// bcings ma thag tu 'phur 'gyur
280b1(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro// sa la sogs dngos 'dod pa bzhin// myur du slar yang ldog par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge/ nga ni bstan de rgyal ba'i rnams//
280b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yi drang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang // phyag rgya'i yan lag mchog des sbyar// de nas mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo de dag 'dod pas gzir ba rnams rangs te// rang gi gzugs ni
280b3(rgyud 'bum): bsgyur ba yis/ / bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cang // dur khrod kyi ni sa chen du// mgu ba chen po'i brtag par byed// phyag na thod pa gri ngag dang // rdo rje kha T+wAM rnam par 'dzin// skal ldan rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan// dbu
280b4(rgyud 'bum): dmug rnam par ster ba'i zhal/ / bde ba'i cha lugs sbyor ba yis// bde ba dam pa longs spyod mong // rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing // rab dgyes khro la gsol ba 'debs// zla ba dri med stong pas shin tu rdzogs pa'i
280b5(rgyud 'bum): spyan mnga' bas/ / thugs rje'i dbyings rum nyid du bdag cag bskyed// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tshabs gdungs pa yi// byang chub des ni kun tu tshim par mdzod// a la la la ho// mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed
280b6(rgyud 'bum): tsocing / / byang chub mchog gi lam 'di snying po nyid kyi ston// gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil mnan te// rmongs shing bying ba'i rnams la thugs rjes sgrol// a la la la ho// che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa//
280b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs// bde ba mchog gi gsang ba'i gnas nyid du// mya ngan 'da' ba'ang longs spyod bsnyen pas 'grub// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang // rmugs pa'i 'gro
281a1(rgyud 'bum): sa bdud rtsi'i ngos ma mthong / / kye ma'o ma skyes chos te snying po las 'byung ba// bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha' dang mnyam pa// rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso// rin
281a2(rgyud 'bum): chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs/ / sngon med rol mo 'di la rol mdzad cing // dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal bar mdzod// thugs rjes pad+ma'i dbyings las skyed par mdzod// a la la la ho//
281a3(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar pad+ma 'di la chags med bzhin// sdug pa'i bcings pas mazin rnams grol te// 'jig rten gsum po 'di la gzigs nas rol mo mdzod// bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shig snang ba'i rnams// mnyes
281a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzod shin tu bde ba bzhengs su gsol/ / 'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la// nam mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas// khams kyi rang bzhin mnabs shing rnams khro yang // byams pa'i thubs/
281a5(rgyud 'bum): rjes kun gnas khyab par mdzod// e ma'o bde bas bde sbyin phyag 'tshal lo// rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba dngos grub gsol// chags med chags dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis// dam tshig skyon med bdag cag rol
281a6(rgyud 'bum): pa mdzod/ / thugs rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs// rgyu dang rkyen la ma brten rang bzhin grub// ma chags dri med yongs su gsal ba zla ba bzhin// 'jig rten
281a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de/ / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun tu bde bas rtsen// 'di yis gtso la bskul byas na// dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos grub bo// yid gdungs gnyen pa'i nga ro yis/
281b1(rgyud 'bum): dpyid kyi rgyal po glu blangs te// mkha' 'gro drab dri med pa'i// dgongs pa thams cad bstan byas te// rdo rje pad+mo yid 'ongs pa'i// dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya// bde byed chen po 'di yis ni// bskul
281b2(rgyud 'bum): bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed/ / rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan// dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i longs spyod dpal gyi bde
281b3(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag thams cad la rjes su mgu bar mdzad do// g.yon gyi lag pas bzung byas te// gsang skyes pad+mo che ba las// rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid kyis// bcug
281b4(rgyud 'bum): na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te/ / mkha' la 'gro ba dra ba 'dis// mnyes pas 'di nas dngos grub thob// oM dang oM dang mi phyed rdo rje bde// mtha' ru phaT kyis stobs rab sbyor ba yis// kye ma'o bde ba mkha'
281b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro dra ba che/ / rab dgyes dbang mo bde byed bde stabs mdzod// rnal 'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la// 'di yis rtsen pa rnams byas na// bde chen bde ba dgyes pa yis// rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par
281b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor ma'i che ba rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ye shes so// / mgo la zang mo phyed sbyin te// chu skyes la ni yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje bcings pa yang dag
281b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / pad+mo'i dkyil mo bcing bar bya// 'di yis brtson par byas na ni// bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ de ba chen po'i gar byed cing // rab dgyes bde byed gnod byed dang // kun tu 'khyud dang
282a1(rgyud 'bum): spro byed dang / / sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te// thams cad zas dang ros dngos grub// mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing byas te// sangs rgyas sbyor ba
282a2(rgyud 'bum): bde chen po/ / myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya// gsum gyis mtshams su rab bya zhing // mkhur tshos so yis btab byas te// ma mchu yang nas yang du gzung // 'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing mnye// g.yang
282a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pad+mo rnam bzhi bya/ / pad+mo phyi phyir rab mnye zhing // ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyar// sen mos mchan khung sum mdo dang // rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs// dal nas rdo rje gzhug bya zhing // khro bo'i rgyal po
282a4(rgyud 'bum): bskyed bar bya/ / g.yas kyis shin tu bskyod byas nas// g.yon pa yis ni gtang bar bya// sbyor ba 'di yis rtsen pa yis// mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo mchod par bya// kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod do// bde ba chen po dbyangs
282a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bskul/ / yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na// blo ldan sgrub pas bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro ba ye shes so// de dag thams cad mgu nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs
282a6(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang / / de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams// bde ba bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po// sna tshogs chen po bsgo bar gsol// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas// gdon mi za dka' rtag bgyid pas// gang
282a7(rgyud 'bum): gi myur du mnyam sbyor bas/ / dkyil 'khor rab tu rnam bsgyur bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa/ yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang // gos dang rgyan la sogs
282b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / nye ba'i kha zas rnams la ni// sha dang khrag las yang dag sgrub// 'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do// mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa// 'di yis mchod pa byas pa na// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur// bus
282b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sha las rab sgrub pa'i/ / 'o ma dam pas thod pa dgang // mkha' 'gro ma kun dbul byas na// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'gyur// gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so//
282b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin thams cad bzhengs te phyag 'tshal nas yang gcig tu sdug por 'du ba mdzad de// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so// rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes
282b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan/ / rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// thams cad brda rnams dran 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel ba'i dpal zhes
282b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang // 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir// bdag ni 'dod can smas yin te// gti mug
282b6(rgyud 'bum): mdongs pas ma byin na/ / myur du dam tshig de nyams so// dam tshig dam tshig can mthong na// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yi// rang gi nu ma rab bsdams na// mgo bos g.yon/
282b7(rgyud 'bum): du 'dud byas nas// phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa bkur brten na// de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur// g.yon pa mgo ru bzhag pa yi// g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no// g.yon gyi smin ma
283a1(rgyud 'bum): bskyod pa yis/ / myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur// sbyor ba shin tu brtson pa yis// g.yas kyi smin mas phyag lan bya// g.yas kyi lag pas snying kha ru// sbyor dang ldan pas mnyes
283a2(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / 'di ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ de yi mtshan mar shes par bya// g.yon gyi khro mo bsgreng ba yi// nam zhig de ltar bstan byas na// lus che de ni khros 'gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya// g.yon
283a3(rgyud 'bum): du 'gying ba'i bsgyings pa yis/ / lag pa snying khar brkyang bya ste// dbang mo gyen du rnam bstan na// de tshe mdza' bar rab tu brtag/ chung ngu rtse mor byas pa yi// nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na// de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor
283a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang / / rdo rje pad+mo rtsen par 'dod// sbom po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na// de la ston mo sbyin par bya// gang tshe shin tu mthor ston na// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag/ khro mo lcags kyu 'dra byas te// gang tshe sngags
283a5(rgyud 'bum): mkhan gyis bstan na/ / de tshe nges par 'o byas te// gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung // de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar// sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bstan na// de tshe myur du 'gro byas te// gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams// /
283a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam bskul na// las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis// las de dag ni brtsam par bya// brda yi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// 'dren pa med pa'i ye shes kun// rnal 'byor/
283a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yis rab tu brtag/ rtag tu tsheg drag rnam bral ba// 'dren tshul rnal 'byor ma yi'o// oM ni thig ler bcas pa'i brda// sbyor ba sngags 'dzin rnal 'byor brtag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sbyor ba'i
283b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil du brtag par bya/ / rdo rje pad+mo mnyam par sbyor ba'i rjes su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham
283b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo thams cad kyi
283b3(rgyud 'bum): / phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang // gsung dang // thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rdo rje thal mo mnyam bzhag ste// sbom po skyil mo bcing bar bya// khro mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ste// lhag ma 'od bzhin gtang
283b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / snying khar phyag rgya 'di bzhag nas// thams cad las ni rab sbyar te// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// gdon mi za ba'i dngos grub byed// thal mo de gnyid mnyam sbyar te//
283b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar// chung ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de/ snying khar de bzhi ni sbom po sbyar// 'di yis rdo rje thams cad rnams// dam tshig 'jig byed rab mdzad cing // sems can thams
283b6(rgyud 'bum): cad pham mdzad ma/ / de ni dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid las ni rdo rje dang // mchog nyid sgreng ba'i tshul byas te// rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yis// drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na// mi g.yeng
283b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas dngos grub bo/ / gnon byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis// rgyal ba mchog kyang 'dren 'gyur na// lha dang mi yi bu mo dag/ lha min la sogs smos ci dgos// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin// 'di nyid kyis ni dngos
284a1(rgyud 'bum): grub ste/ / sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas// mchog tu myur du 'dren par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid las byung khro// rtse mo yid tsam bkug byas te// lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin// des ni myos
284a2(rgyud 'bum): byed thob pa yin/ / 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // bde bar gshegs kyang dbang sgyur na// yid las skyes pa 'dod chags can// gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos// ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis// de yis
284a3(rgyud 'bum): las rnams byed 'gyur te/ / yang dag sbyor ba thams cad 'grub// sbyor dang mi ldan dngos grub med// snying khar 'di nyid kyi byas te// mgu ba'i sbyor ba bde chen pos// rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur// mchog
284a4(rgyud 'bum): gi bcing ba 'di kun dang / / 'di yis las rnams thams cad dang // yid la bsam pa thams cad 'thob// phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing // mgu bar dngos grub myur du 'thob// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te// rdo rje bkug
284a5(rgyud 'bum): nas sbom por sbyar/ / lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtong // dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngos grub 'thob// rgyal srid nor dang 'bru yi rnams// de bzhin nor bu 'di dngos grub// de ni de ma thag
284a6(rgyud 'bum): tu yang / / lha dang lha min mchod par 'gyur// bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te// mkhas pa yis ni dus 'tshams phyar// gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba yis// spyi bor dbang ni bskur byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi
284a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang / / de nas de ni nges par 'gyur// lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyor bas// phan tshun du ni dbang bskur bas// khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru// blo ldan rdo rje mi g.yeng 'gyur// de nyid 'khor lo bskor byas te//
284b1(rgyud 'bum): snying khar 'khor lo bzhin du skor// zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyar bas// 'khor lo bskor ba rab tu sgrub// de nyid g.yon par rab sbyar te// rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni mnyam bzhag pas//
284b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten du ni rgyal bar 'gyur// de nyid kha nas bgad par sbyar// mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis// las rnams thams cad rab grub pa// bgad pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag
284b3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / rtse mo kha phyed rnam bsgyur bas// sbom po ze bar rnam byas te// lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya// rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// sdig pa kun las rab tu grol// bsod nams chen pos byin rlob ste// bde
284b4(rgyud 'bum): byed thams cad grub par 'gyur/ / thal mo de nyid snying khar sbyar// mchog dang khro mo gnyis sbyar te// de gnyis tshigs gsum rab tu dgug/ sbom po skyil mo tsam du bya// rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis// 'di yis
284b5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba gcig byas na/ / 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjer// dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi snying khar bskor bar bya// de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par// mi g.yeng sem
284b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis de 'gyur ro/ / sbom po lce yi tshul bzhag pas// de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag/ mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang // dbyig dang gser dang gos la sogs// bdud rtsi btud
284b7(rgyud 'bum): ba mchog gi rnams/ / 'di yis thams cad 'phrog byed de// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug/ chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis// sbyar te snying khar
285a1(rgyud 'bum): @rab tu gzhug/ yid la dka' ba'i las rnams thams cad byed// sgyu ma'i mthu dang srid pa mthar byed pa// rtag tu blo ldan lo ni phyed gnyis kyis// khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen
285a2(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur/ / thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te// rang gi ma mchu dbus nyid nas// sbom po ro 'bro ba tshul gyis ni// khro mo 'khor lo yang dag spro// zhag bdun du ni bsgrims pa yis// 'di yis khrag 'dren dngos
285a3(rgyud 'bum): grub ste/ / sha zas bza' ba las kun byed// thal mo nyid ni bcings byas na// rdo rje gnyis ni pad+mor spor// sbom po'i zur ni sbrel nas kyang // chung ngu gnyis kyang de bzhin te// mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang // thams
285a4(rgyud 'bum): cad las ni sbyar byas te/ / 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par 'gyur// thal mo de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya// sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhug/
285a5(rgyud 'bum): khro mo gnyis kyang bskul bar bya// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag/ 'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur// skad cig tu ni gnon byed de// de bzhin bsdus dang btsir bar 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas
285a6(rgyud 'bum): btab pas/ / de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi// dngos grub chen po bdag po dang // thams cad las don 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas// rim par myur du 'gro 'ong byed// lo gcig gi ni
285a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// / de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas
285b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshar du gyur te/ / rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing // hi hi zhes pas glu ru len// ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu// ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed// he he zhes pas 'bod par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gang bar byed//
285b2(rgyud 'bum): hA hA zhes pas skyong bar byed// phaT phaT ces pas gsod par byed// hUM hUM zhes pas phur bus 'debs// dzA dzA zhes pas 'dren par byed// sa sa zhes pas dam par byed// dge ba dbang nga ro mchog/ hUM b+h+rUM zhes pa
285b3(rgyud 'bum): gsod par byed/ / nUn+na d+hu dz+ra/ hUM hUM zhes pas 'bar bar byed// hUM druM zhes pas gzi brjid byed// tra~M traM zhes pas 'dren par byed// traM traM zhes pas mchod par byed// dngos grub thams cad 'bras bu smin//
285b4(rgyud 'bum): hr-i hraM zhes pas rmongs par byed// d+h+r-i d+h+waM zhes pas 'dzums par byed// hr-i hr-i zhes pas 'dren par byed// hUM hUM zhes par 'phyan par byed// hr-i hr-i zhes pas rmongs par byed// dz+wa hr-i zhes pas gnon par
285b5(rgyud 'bum): byed/ ho ho zhes pas mnyes pas byed// haM haM zhes pas srung bar byed// hUM hUM zhes pas gsad par byed// hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed// g+h+raM g+h+raM zhes pas 'phreng bar byed// gaM gaM zhes pas tri ru byed//
285b6(rgyud 'bum): ra raM zhes pas rgyal bar byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs ngo mtshar cher gyur// rmad du byung ba chen por gyur to// rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
285b7(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par zhugs nas/ / yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba 'debs so// gnyis med
286a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu rmad byung ba/ / bcom ldan de nyid bshad du gsol// gang gis sems can grub pa 'di// gsang ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur// gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che// skrag mo rol pa bde ba
286a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ sil snyan gling bu rnam sna tshogs// brdab dang rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa// gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams// rdzu 'phrul blo yi che ba che// dngos grub thams cad grub pa yis// sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshad
286a3(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams// thams cad bdag po rgyal po che// thog ma med nas spyod rmad byung // sna tshogs chen po rnam mi rtog/ sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che// bla med chos kun dbang
286a4(rgyud 'bum): po ste/ / rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che// de nyid chen po snying po mchog/ blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'debs te// rgyas 'debs rmongs byed zab bo// gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che// skyong ba sdig pa 'phrog par byed// sdig
286a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed/ / dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa po// gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed// sa dang bar snang de bzhin bde// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa la sbyin// tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen po//
286a6(rgyud 'bum): de la phyag dang mchod par byed// de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po// gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che// zla gsang thig le las byung ba'i// sbas pa chen po gsang ba ston// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje// bde ba chen po 'byin
286a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad de/ / skal ldan nye bar longs spyod kun// bud med thams cad dbang du byed// rang 'byung mtshan du thig le sde// bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ldan// 'di yis bud med bskyed byas te// sa bon gyis ni rgyal po 'dra//
286b1(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer gzi brjid 'bar ba can// rang las myu gur 'dra ba yis// 'og gi phyogs su bzhag pa ni// hraM byas myur du drang bar bya// dang po drang ba gnyis drang bas// tsheg drag des ni lcags kyu byas// lha dang lha min
286b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi bdag/ khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed// 'di yi tshul gyis sbyor ba yi// phan tshun du ni bsgrub byas nas// rmad byung rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed// bdag nyid
286b3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin mthong bar bya/ / sbyor ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid du// de ste sa bon gzhag par bya// de nyid de nyid thabs kyis gnas// sngags kyi sbyor ba rab sbyor bas// de nas sngags mkhan der 'grub bo// de nyid
286b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang snying po dang / / phyag rgya rig dang mi ldan pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang // 'grub pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur// de nyid nang du sbyar byas na// snying po snying khar sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya phyag rgyas
286b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar byas/ / sngags dang sngags kyi 'bru bsgoms te// rig ma rig ma nyid du sbyar// 'di yis myur du dngos grub ste// mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyis chen por// 'byung dang 'byung
286b6(rgyud 'bum): las 'gyur ba nye/ / rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po// dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'ong byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab mgu rangs par gyur te// rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di sgrogs so// kye ma'o kun tu
286b7(rgyud 'bum): bzang po yi/ / rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// bshad pa gsang ba zhes bgyid pa// de nyid don du sgrub pa ste// snying po phyag rgya dam tshig ni// sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de// bdag gi de nyid ji bzhin pa// gsang
287a1(rgyud 'bum): ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs/ / dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang // gsang ba sbas pa de nyid de// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud pa'i rim// dpa' bo chen pos rab tu sgrogs// rdo rje
287a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo rnam mdzad pas/ / rig ma dang ni lhan cig rtsen// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya dang // dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang // slob dpon smod la bsgral pa dang // gzung ma'i bdag por sgrub pa dang // sangs rgyas
287a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bskyed bya dang / / rab dgyes bdag nyid bskul ba dang // sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang // bud med thams cad 'dod bya dang // bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang // rdo rje kun tu gzhug bya dang // pad+mo'i
287a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni gang bya dang / / sgrub dang nye bar sgrub pa dang // shin tu sbyor dang sbyor che ba// sbyor ba rab sbyor skye ba// de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa po// bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs// sgrub pa yi ni sbyor che ba// sbyor dang sbyor
287a5(rgyud 'bum): mar yang dag sbyor/ / de nyid gsal bar sems dpa' che// phan par dgongs pa nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i mdo rjes su dris po rang gi thugs
287a6(rgyud 'bum): la bzhag ste/ / nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni// kun tu sbyor ba mnyam par ldan// de nyid phyag rgya chen po ste// ye shes lnga yis rjes su bskyed// dkyil 'khor
287a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bzhi pa ste/ / phyag rgya chen pos rjes su bsgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' skyed mdzad de// kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung // snying po ye shes zhes bya ste// ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan// phyag rgya ye shes phyag rgya che//
287b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o// sngags kyi yi ge tshul 'dra ba// yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin// 'di yis sgrub pa byas pa'i gzung // bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid// de dag de nyid ji bzhin par// nga yis gsang ba rab tu
287b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags/ / dam tshig ma yin mi shes la// sngags rig pas ni bstan mi bya// phyag rgya thams cad gang bya ste// dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin// de nyid lha yi sbyor ba ni// gsang ba gsang ba rab tu sgrub//
287b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+mo rnams mdzad pas// rol pa phyi nang sbyor ba yis// rig dang lhan cig rtsen bya ba// spyod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang // de bzhin mchu ni so yis gzung // rdo rje brtan pa gzhug par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul
287b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni/ / bskyod cing rnam par gar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste// nu ma mchan khung mkhur tshos gnyis// 'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgyab// rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyis// mnye ba'i sbyor ba
287b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis ni/ / mdza' ba chen po de 'grub bo// 'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang // dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang // zhe sdang can gyis zos 'gyur ba// khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'// rtag par mi phyogs
287b6(rgyud 'bum): smra ba dang / / bla ma smod rnams bsgral bya ba// sha dang khrag dang klad pa'i rnams// drangs te tshogs kyis mchod par bya// 'di ni gsad pa drag po ste// rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang // bla ma smod byed brtson pa
287b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ / dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya// gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur// sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te// thams cad nad dang khros chen dang // 'jigs byed nye bar 'tshe ba yis// bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru//
288a1(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal chen po sten byed cing // 'o dod 'bod par sbrul gyi bdag/ bstir med chen po brlag par 'gro// lus ngag sems ni bde dam pa// rig ma kun la bskyod byas te// byang chub chen
288a2(rgyud 'bum): po bde ba yi/ / tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya// bskul ba'i snying po 'di smras te// dza zhes skad cig skad cig tu// rang gi gnas na gnas pa yis// de nyid las ni bskyod par bya// bcu drug cha dang yang dag ldan//
288a3(rgyud 'bum): / zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la// me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid// rlung gis phul ba bskyod par bya// de ni bskyod pas 'grub pa ste// de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya// rgyan gyi 'phreng ni 'od gsal bzhin// blo ldan rtag tu
288a4(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / bdud rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni// lha mo rnams ni snying por bshad// zhags pa'i tshul gyis bzhug pa dang // de bzhin dgang ba bcing ba'o// sgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste// rjes su sgrub pa lha mo'i
288a5(rgyud 'bum): don/ / sgrub pa chen po gnyis ka'i rgya// mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog/ nye bar sgrub pa gnyis ka gnas// shin tu sgrub pa bde dam pa// so yi rtse mos mchu bzung ste// ma mchu mchog ni bsdam par bya// sbyor ba
288a6(rgyud 'bum): rab sbyor skal ldan pa'i/ / rab dgyes ro myang bde dam pa// lha dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor// 'di ni gnyis su med ces bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste// bdag ni sems
288a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' 'o zhes bsams ni/ / 'di ni gnyis med myur du 'gyur// gzugs dang dgra la sogs pa'i lha'i// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba// rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gis
288b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba ste// rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro// phyag rgya de dag rab sbyor ba// sbyor ba chen po bsgrags pa yin// 'di yis dpa' bo thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba//
288b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na// rdo rje'i bdag po chen por 'gyur// mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis// 'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal// yang
288b3(rgyud 'bum): dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis/ / drangs te rab tu bcug nas kyang // rdo rje brtan pos bskul byas te// shin tu 'dod pas 'dod pa skyed// mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan// rgyas dang de bzhi ni zag par bya//
288b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni yang dag sbyor ba sbas// sbas pa rnal 'byor ma dkyil lo// 'di yis yang dag dngos grub blang // rdzu 'phrul chen po 'bras bu 'thob// sangs rgyas byang chub bde che dang // byang chub mchog rab yang dag
288b5(rgyud 'bum): 'thob/ / gsang ba chen po rmang byung ba// de dag de nyid spras pa che// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dris pa'i rgya// nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan// gang gis yang dag ldan mthong dang // bdag po chen po mchod byed ma// /
288b6(rgyud 'bum): de yis ston pa kun mthong ste// rgyal ba mchog la mchod par 'gyur// srid pa gcod pa por 'gyur te// 'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur// de la lha kun mchod byed cing // skad cig skud cing phyag kyang byed//
288b7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// phan byed 'jig rten skyes gyur pa// sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus pas// rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur// rang gis dam tshig bsrungs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa'//
289a1(rgyud 'bum): bde skye ba// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ldan pas// dngos grub chen po des 'thob bo// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan btang la// cung zad mi 'grub yod med de// phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che// bdag
289a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid so sor rjes su 'grub/ / rab dgyes mtshan dang mdza' chen mo// ro dang reg pa'i che ba'i che// rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de dag mgu 'gyur te// rdo rje
289a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' bde che ba/ / sbyor ba 'dod pa'i gzir ba yis// sbyor ba chen pos mnyes par mdzod// ra ma ra ma sa ma ho ma hA satwa// rab dgyes gdon mi za la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// zla
289a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang thig ler yang dag ldan/ / bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste// skal ldan dri med rab dgyes kyi// rnal 'byor ma snying mchog nyid du// sbyor chen nyid kyis rol pa mdzod// theg pa chen po bde che yi// pad+mo rdo
289a5(rgyud 'bum): / rje'i rin chen gyis// rnal 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor du// rab dgyes longs spyod gnyis sten mdzod// bdag cag thams cad nyes bral te// gnod med de ni gser dang 'dra// de nyid thams cad grub chen po//
289a6(rgyud 'bum): rab dgyes bdag nyid nyid sten mdzod// spros pa 'khyud pa sbas pa dang // gzhug pa dang ni gtong ba'i mchog/ 'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan pa yis// ded dpon rab tu brtag par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba
289a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po kun tu bzang pos 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / rnal
289b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma thams cad shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun tu 'khyud pa dang / / spros pa dang / gzhug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / rab tu bskul ba dang / mnye ba dang / thigs pa dang / tshor bar bya ba dang / bskyod pa dang / kun
289b2(rgyud 'bum): tu bskyod pa dang / bcing ba'i rdo rje dang / pad+ma chen mo mnyam du sbyor ba la yang dag par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
289b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang gzung ma'i tshogs thams cad la bskyod pa dang / rab tu rgyas pa dang / rab tu rnam par 'byin cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi tshogs kyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad
289b4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu rgyas par byas te gnas so/ / de nas rnal 'byor ma chen mo shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen po de dag nyid mgu zhing bde bar gyur te// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mgu ba che//
289b5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po rabs par 'gyur// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed de// byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po// mgu ba chen po'i bde dang ldan// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// 'jigs shing skrag
289b6(rgyud 'bum): pas sdud par byed/ / khros pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma// rab tu mi bzang dug dang 'dra// bde byed chen po'i rol pa yis// bde byed che la mchod par byed// skal ba chen po sring mo dang // bde byed bde bas rab
289b7(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa/ / mchod pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i// rgya che mchog gis mchod par byed// drag mo chen mo ma lta bu// rab tu gtum pa me 'dra ba// 'ongs nas bde byed chen mo yis// gtso bo mchog la mchod
290a1(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / lha dang lha mo thams cad kyang // klu mo dang ni rta gdong yang // 'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yis// yid du 'ong bas mchod par byed// de nas dbang po lha chen po// bdag nyid chen
290a2(rgyud 'bum): po lha yi lha/ / kye ma'o bde ba sna tshogs nyid// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che// mgu zhing rab tu rangs pa yis// lha yis lha ni sngon du 'gro// dpa' bo bde la phyag byas te// kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che// rang gi bde bas
290a3(rgyud 'bum): mngon mchod cing / / 'jigs shing skrag pas mnyes par byed// tshad med rangs pa bzhad pa che// glu gar mchog tu ldan pa dang // bza' dang bca' ba sha chen dang // sil snyan 'phreng ba ro chen dang // gling bu rgyud
290a4(rgyud 'bum): dang rdza rnga dang / / pi wa dpal kig ha la le// steg dang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang // zhi dang rmad byung 'jags byed dang // bdag dang khros dang spyan rgyas pas// skad cig skad cig mchod byed cing // byed pa dang ni
290a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlog pa dang / / 'phrog pa dang ni gzhug pa dang // snyid ces pa dang hUM hUM dang // ha ha zhes pas mnyes byed cing // rab dgyes bdag nyid bde ba yi// rang gi chung mas mnyes par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das
290a6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu dgyes pa bde ba chen pos nam mkha' dang nam mkha'i skabs thams cad la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / / byang chub sems dpa' dang // rang rgyal dang / nyan thos
290a7(rgyud 'bum): dang rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes la gnas pa rnams shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i thabs dang shes rab kyi bde bas bkug ste dbang bskur nas// shin tu
290b1(rgyud 'bum): dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog pa dang / / shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rjes su skyong zhing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
290b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams chen po ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams su/ rab tu gzig pas gziganas/ 'jig rten dang lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ sems can dang / rigs thams
290b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa dang / 'byung ba dang 'byung ba las gyur pa dang / sa'i 'og dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang //
290b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par shes pa dang / shes bya dang / bdag dang / bdag gi dang / sna tshogs dang / sna tshogs ma yin pa dang / bus pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / srog dang /
290b5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zad pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / khyab pa dang / khyad byed dang / zla ba dang /
290b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang chen dang / nyi ma dang / me dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus srul po dang / tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha mo dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / skal ba dang mi ldan pa dang / dngos po
290b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / pad+mo dang / rin po che dang / ral gri dang / tho ba dang / dbyig pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / sbyor ba dang / rab tu sbyor ba dang / stong pa dang / stong pa chen po dang /
291a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa rab tu spong ba dang / byang chungab dang / byang chub kyi sems dang / yi ge dang / yi ge med pa dang / dra ba dang / lkug ma dang / cha dang / cha med pa
291a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / thig le dang / ro dang / ro chen po dang / yid la byed pa med pa dang / rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / mi zad pa dang / thar pa dang / thar byed dang / grol ba dang / rigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nam mkha' dang /
291a3(rgyud 'bum): skabs dang / skabs med pa rnams la gcig tu phyug por gyur te/ rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul du gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / thabs
291a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen
291a5(rgyud 'bum): po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa chen po la phyag mdzad de/ mngon sum du yang dag par bskul nas dris pa/ su ra ta s+t+waM sta ma si ha/ gang phyir 'dod pa bde ba re/ gang gis 'dod las byang chub
291a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'dod chags bral ba ji ltar bde// gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje che// gang gis gti mug rgyal ba che// gang gis 'dod chags pad+mor 'gyur// gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i bdag/ gang gis phrag dog gdon mi
291a7(rgyud 'bum): za/ / byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde// gang gis bde byed mchod par 'gyur// mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas// yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// ji ltar 'dod pa'i
291b1(rgyud 'bum): yon tan lnga/ / bsnyems pa yis ni myur du 'grub// ji ltar gsang ba mnyam sbyor bas// rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// ji ltar pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs par 'gyur// ji ltar
291b2(rgyud 'bum): dri chu byang chub dang / / dmar dang snang mdzad chen po yis// dam tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag pa kun tu bzang po chen po/
291b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas te// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin tu sbas pa mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi
291b4(rgyud 'bum): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs byed du// sems can nyon mongs sdang byed pas// de phyir nga ni rdo rje che// zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// ngan song 'jigs pa
291b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po ru/ / sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas// de phyir 'di ni gti mug ste// rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no// thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis// 'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cing // pad+mo tshul dra
291b6(rgyud 'bum): rab rtogs phyir/ / de phyir 'dod chags zhes bya'o// bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin gyis ni// sems can thams cad nga rgyal skyed// nam mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir// de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin// ro la
291b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i mnyam sbyor bas/ / phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za// sna tshogs pad+mo rab 'jug phyir// de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che// 'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir// bdag ni rab dgyes sbas pa che// 'dod/
292a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ma gtogs bde byed med// bde bye 'dod pa yin no// 'dod chags med par byang chub med// byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med// sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te//
292a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas// 'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi// bde ba mchog tu rmad byung 'gyur// byang chub sems med bde byed gzhon// 'jig rten gsum po 'dir med do//
292a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byang chub sems ngo bo// bde ba kun gyis tshim par 'gyur// bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad// d+hi zhes pa ni gzung ma'i mchog/ tsaM zhes pa ni zag pa bshad// ta zhes pa ni bde ba che// mchod pa
292a4(rgyud 'bum): med pas bde byed med/ / bde ba med pas mgu ba med// mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// grub na bde byed rtag pa yi// phyag na rdo rje bde ba che// 'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing // tshe 'di nyid la thob
292a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / bde ba kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par 'dzin// rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzung ma yin// hrI zhes pa ni pad+mo 'dzin// 'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba is// yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur//
292a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i longs spyod de// de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// de yis bsnyen na grub par 'gyur// sngags kyi
292a7(rgyud 'bum): sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ / dbang phyug mchog gi sngags rgya'o// rdo rje sems kyi thugs las skyes// mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad// de dang mnyam du sbyor ba yis// mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// pad+mo'i
292b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed// blo ldan de ru zhugs gyur na'o// dam tshig sbas pa tshogs kyi rnams// dri chu byang chub dmar po'i mchog/ sha chen sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis// lus
292b2(rgyud 'bum): la kun tu khyab gnas te/ / de yi phyir ni dam tshig che// dam tshig 'di yis dngos grub ste// dam tshig yi ger ldan pa yis// sbyor ces sbyang dang bskyed byas na// bza' ba dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// de nas pa
292b3(rgyud 'bum): / rol phyin ma kun// pad+mo'i gzigs pa rgyas pa yi// 'dzum bcas g.yon nas gar mdzad cing // rtag pa la ni yang gsol ba// rigs ni rnam pa du ru bstan// ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi// sna tshogs chen
292b4(rgyud 'bum): po de dag kun/ / bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
292b5(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba pha rol tu phyin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung ngo // nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das//
292b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin// rigs kyi khyab par lnga rnams kyis// spyod bcas mi spyod rnams la rol// rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog/ 'jigs dbang gdon mi za grub rnams// rigs ni rnam pa#
292b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan te/ / mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum// de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'// bde ba'i gnas la rol pa mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das
293a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ / rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so// sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa// brtul zhugs dka' thub sngags mkha/
293a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi/ dam chog mchog tu srung ba'i rnams// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po mchog tu dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de bzhin
293a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen te/ / zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas// nan tan
293a4(rgyud 'bum): du ni bsrung bar bya/ / bsrungs pa yis ni bsod nams che// dngos grub shin tu skye bar 'gyur// de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i// yid kyis kha dog dbyings chen gyi// phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab// sbas
293a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku ni rab bsgrub bya/ / rdo rje gsung du rab sbyor bas// chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgya brjod// ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni// nga ro spangs pa rdo rje'i gsung // rang sems rab tu 'bigs pa yis// zla ba rdo rje rnam par
293a6(rgyud 'bum): sgom/ / rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu sgom// 'di ni yid sbas chen po yin// 'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog/ rgyan du sgom pa rnams byas te// gsum bsgoms pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// gzhan min rdo rje
293a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyis gsungs/ / sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis// phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste// de bas nan tan thams cad kyis// sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya// rdo rje mchog 'dzin chen po dang //
293b1(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo chen pos byin gyis rlob// blun po gang gis 'das byas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa skad cig 'jig/ sems dpa' che dang bral gyur na// ngan song gsum du yang dang yang // ji tsam nam mkha'i dkyil
293b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba/ / shin tu mi bzad smin par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig de dag kun// rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te// 'jam po'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol pa// gar dbang
293b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par gnon par gar mdzad cing / / mtha' yas phyag ni badra pa'i bsgyings pa yis// pad+ma'i lo ma 'jam po brgyad phye nas// gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de// sbas pa de nyid mi mnyam
293b4(rgyud 'bum): sad par gyur/ / rdo rje 'dam skyes zla ba yang dag 'dra// thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa bde byed sogs// bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shod// sbyor dang sbyor ma yang dag sbyor// zhi ba'i
293b5(rgyud 'bum): thathal mo mchog tu bde/ / 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// de nyid sbas pa bskul ba yi//
293b6(rgyud 'bum): sbas pa ma lus 'chad par mdzad// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// cho gar ldan pas gang dbang bskur// bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis// de nyid 'di ni de las bstan// 'di la khrus med nges
293b7(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ / dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// rje
294a1(rgyud 'bum): rje dbab pa skyes 'gyur na/ / ji tsam 'dod par nam mkhar 'phur// snying khar rdo rje khu tshur bcings// rdo rje lta bas rnam bstas te// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen byas ma
294a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' skad cig 'gyur/ / rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas// rab dgyes sar ni 'gro byed de// sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang // grub pa yis kyang mchod byed cing // rdo rje sems
294a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i rgya che mchog/ 'gying ba'i longs pas gar byed pas// bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // las kyi khyab par la sogs gnon// sbas pa'i gar gyis gar byas pas// sbas pa sbyor ba'i bdag nyid
294a4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / sna tshogs dkyil 'khor gar byed cing // lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur dang // phyir brkyang dbyings su ldan pa dang // khro bar dri med lta ba yis// gdul dka' gnod pa 'jigs byed pa'i// 'jig rten
294a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur/ / me 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du// khro bo hUM mdzad bsgom byas na// myur du 'jig rten don sgrub phyir// 'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor bas//
294a6(rgyud 'bum): su ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing // ha ra thig le tshul sbyar na// rab dgyes de ma thag tu 'gyur// rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yi// sa chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te// lha mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// sems can
294a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi don kun byed/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa// thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te// phyag rgya de nyid nyid kyis shod// rdo rje mchog
294b1(rgyud 'bum): la gsol ba 'debs/ / bde ba'i bdag nyid mchod pa shod// gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang // ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba// thugs rje chen pos bsgrubs pa yis// dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod// de nas/
294b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan bde byed che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che// phyag rgya bcing ba bde ba che// de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzad// dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste// gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin// gsum pa phyag rgya
294b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po ste/ / bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad// de nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje// ji ltar 'gying bzhin bsgom bya ba// sna tshogs ye shes rjes su dag/ sna tshogs chen pos 'chad par mdzad// rtag pa'i sku ni
294b4(rgyud 'bum): ser po ste/ / mi bskyod rdo rje dkar po yin// nam mkha'i snying po mthing kha che// tshe dpag med pa pad+mo dmar// sna tshogs kha dog rgya che mchog/ 'od zer 'phreng ba rmad byung ba// gdon mi za ba rdo rje che// don chen byed
294b5(rgyud 'bum): pa bsam par bya/ / rang rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du// myur du nam mkha' 'gro byed cing // rigs kyi lha mo bzhi rnams kyis// rol pa dang ni mchod par byed// sna tshogs sbyor ba bde che ba'i// lha mo bzhi dang
294b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyor ba/ / rdo rje sbyor ba dag bsgoms byas na// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog/ rdo rje la sogs gdan bzhugs par// rang gi 'khor lo mchog
294b7(rgyud 'bum): gi brgyan/ / rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam// pad+mo'i gdan gyi tshul gyis ni// brtse dang ldan pas bsgom byas te// snying po sbas don gar byas pas// sbas pa che la bde byed na// 'gying ba'i bde bar
295a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa yi/ / rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye ba// sna tshogs chen po 'gro bar 'gyur// bde ba chen po thams cad 'grub pa'i sbyor ba chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag
295a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya rab tu rgyas pa'o/ / / de nas phyag rgya bcing bshad de// rtag la sogs pa'i de kho na// gang gis myur du bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'gro// thabs ni g.yas kyi logs su
295a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de bzhin shes rab g.yon par te// zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyis// sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar bya// sor mo thams cad bar bar du// mnyam du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin// rdo rje yi ni thal po ris//
295a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du sgrub// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su 'gro// 'di nyid shin tu bcings pa yis// gsum du sbyor bas mchod pa bya// de nyid las ni sor
295a5(rgyud 'bum): mo kun/ / kun tu bskum ste bcing bar bya/ ji rje bcing ba bsdus pa ni// bcing ba ldan par rnam bsgyur te// de nyid sbom po rab bcug nas// khro mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug/ 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bcing // rdo rje sems dpa'
295a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid 'grub byed/ / de bzhin bcing ba rnam gzhag ste// sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni bcing ba bcing ba che// nam mkhar 'gro ba nye bar sgrub// de nyid bcing babacing byas te// khro mo gnyis po mtshan bzhin du//
295a7(rgyud 'bum): mo spang de dgu bya ba// bcing ba 'di yis pad+mo sgrub// bcing ba de nyid rab tu sbom// bde ba bcug nas bsdam byas te// las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis// don yod mchog gi rigs su 'gro// bcing ba de nyid bcing byas te//
295b1(rgyud 'bum): sbom dang khro ba'i rtse mo sbyar// g.yas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis// de yi dbus su bcug bya ba// de 'di bcing ba chen po ste// rab dgyes ro ni sgrub byed pa// gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// rab tu dgyes pa nyid
295b2(rgyud 'bum): 'thob bo/ / dngos grub thams cad bde ba che// de yis 'di tshe 'thob 'gyur te// phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas// phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o//
295b3(rgyud 'bum): / bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis// gcig gis rnal 'byor bsgrub mi bya// drug ni sbyor bas sbyor byas na// de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur// bcing ba lnga yi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin bcing ba gnyis
295b4(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / g.yon gyi snying khar bcing bar bya// g.yas kyi rtse mo bsgreng byas te// rdo rje'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde// sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu sgrub// gdon mi za bar tshe 'di
295b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ / rtag pa 'dra ba thob par byed// g.yon pa de nyid snying khar gzhag/ g.yas pa sa la reg byas pa// sa la bde ba rol pa yis// 'di yis mi zad 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin snying khar g.yon pa
295b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ rtag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya// 'di yis rin chen skal ldan sogs// nam mkha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar gzhag/ g.yas kyang bzhag snga ting 'dzin
295b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / 'di yis tshe dpag med po nyid// tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin g.yon pa snying khar sbyar// lag pa g.yA pa mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba// sdig pa gdug pa 'jig
296a1(rgyud 'bum): pa che/ / 'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed// gdon mi za ba'i nges pa yi// de ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur// de nyid bcing ba gnyis byas te// g.yon pa g.yon du sbyar bar bya// g.yas
296a2(rgyud 'bum): ni snying khar bzung byas te/ / brjod pas rab tu bzhad cing gnas// bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas// 'di yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te// bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po// tshe 'di nyid la the tshom med// de
296a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi ni bcing pa bcing byas te/ / sbyor dang ldan pas bstan par bya// sbom po'i rtse mo pad+mo'i gnas// g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mor sbyar// g.yas pa yi ni sbom po yis// mngon sum rdo rjer byas pa yis//
296a4(rgyud 'bum): bcug nas bde ba spyod bya zhing // skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya// de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// dgyes pa dgyes mchog sgrub pa po// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // yang dag rdo rje dgyes pa
296a5(rgyud 'bum): 'thob/ / rab dgyes bde mchog longs spyod kyi// btsun mo dngos grub nyid du 'gyur// g.yas ni mtshan mas drang byas te// lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu ste// rdo rje 'dod byed
296a6(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo yi/ / dang por 'dren pa de nyid gzhag/ tha mar ha ra thig ler bya// rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying khar byas pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog
296a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro/ / phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// lus 'dis tshe 'di 'grub par 'gyur// rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag ldan// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing // rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas//
296b1(rgyud 'bum): / rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis// rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa// rab dgyes ro la bsgyings ma yis// skad cig nyid du 'dren par 'gyur// de bzhin sbom po'i rtse mor sbyar// snying rje chen po der
296b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pa/ / skal ba chen po rdo rje spyan// de nyid don kun bstan byed ma// 'di ni yang dag bcings pa yis// rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur// yod dang med pa rnam spangs pa// dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur//
296b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i thal mo bstan bya ste// khro mo rtse mo zlum po yis// mthon por mtshan dang 'dra byas te// sbom por rdo rje bstan pa che// de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog/ rdo rje pad+mo'i bde 'thob byed// rnal 'byor
296b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bcings pa yis/ / sbas pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob// de nas lha mo chen mo dag/ spros pa che bas gar mdzad cing // rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la// 'dud dang bcas pas phyag byas te// chos kyi yi
296b5(rgyud 'bum): ge thabs gnas nas/ / de nyid chos kyi gsol ba 'debs// chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che// rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol// sgrub pa pos ni rab bsgrims na// gang gis lnga ni 'grub par 'gyur// gang gis
296b6(rgyud 'bum): myur du byin brlangs pas/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub ste// bde byed gnyis kyi sgo che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas 'jug 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha mo thams cad kyis gsol
296b7(rgyud 'bum): ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ / nyid kyi sku dang // gsung dang / thugs sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // / bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste// thig le lngar ni yang dag
297a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / tha mar hang thig ler gnas// rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes// snying khar phyag rgya 'di byas nas// dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byed cing // spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur te/ rnal
297a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor bde ba chen por 'gro/ / de bzhin 'dren pa thog mar bya// rdo rje 'dod pa kyo ba mchog/ ha ra thig le yang dag ldan// cha gnyis gsum pa sbyar byas pa// 'di ni snying khar bzhag byas na// bde bar nam
297a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhar 'gro 'gyur te/ / bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi// 'di yis mchog tu dngos grub bo// 'dren pa de nyid thog mar gzhag/ ltos ltos zhes pa hUM dang ldan// skal ba chen po rdo rje can// dbus su bskul bas 'grub
297a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / 'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che ba// 'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje byang chub dgyes pa che// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dang por 'dren pa de nyid gzhag/ tha mar ha ra thig
297a5(rgyud 'bum): ler bya/ / rdo rje dgyes pa de 'thob byed// ming ni dbus su bri bar bya// 'di yis snying khar byas pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro// phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis// lus 'di'i 'di tshe 'grub par
297a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag zhon// phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing // rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas// bcom ldan 'dod ma 'grub par 'gyur// chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi
297a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / / de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che// thog ma tha ma med pa mchog/ gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// rdo rje khro bor de 'gyur ro// mdun du thog ma'i lha nyid du// rdo rje hUM mdzad
297b1(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma 'bar/ / nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi brjid che// me 'bar rab tu 'bar bar ldan// 'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kun// dur khrod kyi ni rgyan mchog gis// brgyan te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la// de ni yang dag
