297b2(rgyud 'bum): rol pa mdzad/ / khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di// sngags ni rang gi snying khar bsgom// khro mo'i bu mos mdun du bskor// khro mo chen mo de 'grub bo// 'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams// hUM byas
297b3(rgyud 'bum): myur du brgyab par 'gyur/ / de dag gdug pa gdug pa che// 'jigs shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig/ skyobs shig skyobs shig ces smra zhing // rdo rje gtso la dran par byed// phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam par gzhag/
297b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba thams cad dbang bya ste// las mchog thams cad sgrub pa pos// dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya// sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te// las rnams thams cad byed pa na// gdon mi za bar kun
297b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ / rdo rje sems dpa'ang sgrub par nus// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// jo bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// / de nas sangs rgyas che
297b6(rgyud 'bum): dag/ sangs rgyas nyid skyes thams cad mchog/ gzugs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad// rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs// phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi// dga' bas 'khor rnams 'phags/
297b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te// rang gi bde byed skyes par 'brel// skal ba chen mo rtsen par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la yang
298a1(rgyud 'bum): dang yang du gzigs te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do// oM badz+ra ang+ku sha/ du ru du ru/ e h+ye hI kaD+D+h+ya bi kan+d+ha sar+b+bAr+tha
298a2(rgyud 'bum): tsakra sany+tsa ya/ / badz+ra ang+ku sha hUM phaT// 'di yi phyag rgya rdo rje yi// bcing ba gnyis ni dam byas te// rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar bya// rdo rje khro ba rab sbyar ba// rdo rje'i kyo ba zhes bya'o// 'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams//
298a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste// 'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams// mi yi bu mo smos ci dgos// rdo rje bcings pa mnyam bzhag ste// g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin gzhag/ dbus su sbom mo gzhag par
298a4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che// rdo rje bcing ba bsdam byas te// rdo rje sbom mo rtse mo spang // bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgom zhing // bcing ba de ni dgrol bar bya// de nyid bcing ba dam byas te// dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i
298a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshams/ / rdo rje sbom mo nus byas te// rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par bya// de las rdo rje mchog gnyis bskyed// mdud pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya// bzhugs pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog/ 'di yis thams cad dngos grub
298a6(rgyud 'bum): pas/ rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis// drangs te bcug nas bcing byas te// dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de nas de dag thams cad drangs bcug bcings dga' ba bskyed na rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i
298a7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen pos rang gi rgyal srid rjes su skyong zhing rdo rje chos la bka' stsal pa/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po// dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi// rab dgyes bdag nyid gsang ba 'di// sems dpa' chen po
298b1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis zung / / de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te// thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas// chos kyi ngo bor tshig smras pa// bde ba chen po bdag gis blangs// rang bde longs spyod gar byas te// rdo rje tshe yis 'di
298b2(rgyud 'bum): skad smras/ / rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che// sna tshogs pad+mo gar rab byed// de nas pha rol phyin de kun// rab dgyes longs spyod gar byed cing // 'de byed chen po'i bdag nyid che// legs pa zhes pa sbyin byed de//
298b3(rgyud 'bum): legs so legs so bde ba che// legs so legs so ye shes che// legs so legs so sna tshogs che// leg so legs so dgyes pa che// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
298b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / pha rol tu phyin ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dga' bar gyur to// zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so//
298b5(rgyud 'bum): tsa ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// gsung rab don rtogs slob dpon gyis// lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la// ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis// sems can sems pade thob par smon//
298b6(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta ta tA saM gra ha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/
298b7(rgyud 'bum): / bam po dang // / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
299a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje byin gyi rlabs dang / dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang ldan yang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dadu rgyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal
299a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i dbang bskur ba mnga' brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes/ rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam
299a3(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid thugs su chud cing thams cad kyi dgos pa mdzad pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs
299a4(rgyud 'bum): rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag par dus gsum du bzhugs shing sku dang / gsung dang / thugs thams cad rdo rje lta bur gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs
299a5(rgyud 'bum): shing bsngags bstod pa/ / nor bu dang nor bu rin po che chen pos spras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu btags pa/ dar dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang /
299a6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' byed pa phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
299a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha'i
299b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
299b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'ang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi skus kyang til gyi gang bu bzhin du kun tu gang bar snang ngo // de
299b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa rnams snang ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid 'chad do// // de nas
299b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
299b5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa'/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs las byung
299b6(rgyud 'bum): baba'i ye shes kyi snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i dbang du gyur pa/ nam mkha'i dbyi
299b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas byang chub par gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dag par nyid kyis chos thams cad
300a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rang bzhin dag par thugs su chud pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang dag par ston pa/ mkhyen pa sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i
300a2(rgyud 'bum): khams rnams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyis tham cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med pa'i 'phrin las sna tshogs
300a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub chen por sems dpa' brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i
300a4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs la thams cad kyi leg so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhi ni gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbang chen por bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i
300a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
300a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dag pa'i chos chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa dang / de bzhin
300a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin tu brtan po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis srung zhing bskyang ba'i rngo
300b1(rgyud 'bum): rje gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings pa'i ye shes rnams so// kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za// bdud dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang / mkha' skyes shin tu
300b2(rgyud 'bum): gzi chen dang / / rin chen dpal dang 'dzum pa che// kun tu gzigs pa'i dbang chen dang // 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // mi gsung ba dang thams cad las// brtson 'grus ma rungs dam du bzung // rdo rje lcags kyu mnga' gzu
300b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum// pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo gsung // las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcas// thog ma tha ma med cing zhing // ma rungs khro ba bzod pa che// gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan// gzi chen dpa' bo khyab
300b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag che/ / u ma'i bdag po skyed dgu'i mgon// gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che// 'jig rten skyon dang mkha' dang sa// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum dang // 'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad//
300b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ku lang tshangs pa dang // 'khor dang mya ngan 'da' dang rtag/ yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa che// sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che// srid gsum rtag pa'ang de bzhin no// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bde sbyong dang /
300b6(rgyud 'bum): bde spyod mgon po rab 'dul mdzad// rdo rje gtso dang sa rab mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// byang chub sems dpa' rnam thar dang // spyod dang de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sangs rgyas don dang
300b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thugs/ / byang chub kun dang bla na med// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal dang mgon// rang 'byung gzungs dang dran pa dang // sems dpa' che dang phyag rgya che// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas 'phrin las mdzad//
301a1(rgyud 'bum): yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// sems can rtag don rtogs mdzad pa// sdong po chen po nag po che// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog/ kun gyi mchog
301a2(rgyud 'bum): dang gnas dbang po/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub chen po'i thugs byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
301a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don
301a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ / byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyirnga
301a5(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing / / ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
301a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhed
301a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gso to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de kho na nyid ji lta bu legs/ ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi bka' stsal par
301b1(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtogs cing mnyam par zhog la rang bzhin
301b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar blos shing sgrub par gyis shig/ oM tsit+ta pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mo/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad
301b3(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi snying kha na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/
301b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu sems 'di ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na de ni ji ltar sbyangs pa de lta bur 'gyur te/ dper na ras dkar po tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang
301b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da ya mi/ zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
301b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta
301b7(rgyud 'bum): bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po
302a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis mngon du gyur kyis/ de legs par sgrubs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis rang gi snying/
302a2(rgyud 'bum): kha'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyings su soms shig/ oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ byang chub sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje bdag
302a3(rgyud 'bum): gis mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra At+ma kohaM
302a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams
302a5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhugs so/ / de ras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa de la rdo rje'i dbyings zhes
302a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang bsgyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin
302a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag lags par mthong lags so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na sems dpa' rdo rje de rnam pa thams cad kyi
302b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang ldan pa'i sems sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis ci dkar zlos la sgoms shig/ oM ya thA sar+b+ba ta thA gasta thA a haM/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
302b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te bos nas 'di skad ces
302b3(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa de brtan par mdzod cig/ de nas de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
302b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad de bzhi ni gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis skad cig ma de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa
302b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs so// de bzhin
302b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis dag go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung
302b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems
303a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i rdo rje las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed/ nam mkha'i snying po'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur/ kun
303a2(rgyud 'bum): tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po chos kyi ye shes ni bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang / khang bu rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu'i
303a3(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i las byas pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
303a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi seng ge'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhag par gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mo bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs
303a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
303a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhugs so// de nas bcom
303a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa/ de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin
303b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes
303b2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad nyid kyis gdon mi zazhin thogs pa med par ston pa/ dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid la re ba yongs su/
303b3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pas de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las
303b4(rgyud 'bum): byung ba sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
303b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid do// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur
303b6(rgyud 'bum): nas byung ste/ sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khod do// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin
303b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs so// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu brten pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs
304a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi tshad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba can rtse mo lnga pa/ de bzhin gshegs
304a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje lta bu'i 'od
304a3(rgyud 'bum): zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung ngo / / rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul sha ni tu phra
304a4(rgyud 'bum): mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyad pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin
304a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs
304a6(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa
304a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ ji srid sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa
304b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bde bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub thob pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul
304b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi bar du bstan nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
304b3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu dbang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i/ kun tu bzang po sems dpa' brtan/
304b4(rgyud 'bum): ni brtan phyir lus min yang // sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
304b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
304b6(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bsko
304b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba dang / thabs chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab par
305a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong ba bya ba nas/ ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa/
305a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs par 'grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de de bzhin gshegs pa thams
305a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang dar dpyangs kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par
305a4(rgyud 'bum): byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lag na rdo rje lag na rdo rje zhes ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje phyag g.yon pa rdo
305a5(rgyud 'bum): rje bsgyings par bzhugs/ phyag g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar gsor zhing 'phen pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi// rdo rje bla na med pa 'di// bdag ste
305a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi lag tu byin/ / rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i sems dpa' byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes
305a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi sngags ka nas phyung
305b1(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / badz+ra rA dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas/
305b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje lcags kyu chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje lcags
305b3(rgyud 'bum): kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs
305b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid yin pa dang / shin tu brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'
305b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i// lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po dag/ gang
305b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir kun tu sangs rgyas khyab/ / grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin
305b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam
306a1(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa/
306a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dgug pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba'i byan gyi rlabs dam pa'i dngos grub kyis bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje lcags kyu de byang chub
306a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo
306a4(rgyud 'bum): rje 'gugs pa rdo rje lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yis// ye shes bla na med pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi don
306a5(rgyud 'bum): grub phyir/ / kun nas spyan drangs dam pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
306a6(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rA
306a7(rgyud 'bum): ga/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi mdar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom
306b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i mda' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje mda'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten
306b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams
306b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu bdud byed pa nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud
306b4(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag gi rang bzhin dag/ rang byung ba dag dgyes byed na// 'dod
306b5(rgyud 'bum): chags bral rnams dag bya'i phyir/ / 'dod chags kyis ni 'dul bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste// de bzhin gshegs
306b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i byin gyi
306b7(rgyud 'bum): rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi badrad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig dang // sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mthu
307a1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba dang / / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de
307a2(rgyud 'bum): dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba'i de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i gzhu rdo rje'i gzhu
307a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing
307a4(rgyud 'bum): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// ye shes 'di ni dri ma med// 'dod chags kyis ni chags bral bcom// bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed// de nas bcom
307a5(rgyud 'bum): l dan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
307a6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra sA d+hA/ de nas de bzhin
307a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'do ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
307b1(rgyud 'bum): su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul
307b2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang tshe
307b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul rnams byas nas/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur
307b4(rgyud 'bum): te/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi// legs sbyin nang na bdag mchog pas// rnam
307b5(rgyud 'bum): rtog bral ba de dag gi/ nges par dgyes pa bskyed pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste// de bzhin gshegs
307b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
307b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang // sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams
308a1(rgyud 'bum): cang mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i ro bla na med pa grub pa dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de
308a2(rgyud 'bum): dag gi phyir/ rdo rje dgyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya
308a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par
308a4(rgyud 'bum): byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi legs sbyin pa// 'di ni rab tu 'jug byed pas// rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed// lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba'o// byang chub kyi sems chen po
308a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang // dgyes pa chen po dang // 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
308a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa' 'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
308a7(rgyud 'bum): denge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rat+na/
308b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir bcom ldan
308b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo // nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas thams
308b3(rgyud 'bum): cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi nam mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs
308b4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir/ yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam
308b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas de bzhini gshegs pa'i phyag gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang
308b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnams
308b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin tu byung ba dang rab tu brten pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/
309a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o/
309a2(rgyud 'bum): chags med rgyal ba yang // khams gsum bdag por dgongs pas na// rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi// dbang gi mchog ni bdag yini no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom
309a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang dag pa'i bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
309a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i
309a5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don thams cad yongs su grub par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
309a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs pa grub pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis
309a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje nor bu de byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
309b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje'i nor bu de rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyings// dbang bskur de ni bdag yin te/
309b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi lag tu byin pas na// rin chen la ni rin chen gzhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po
309b3(rgyud 'bum): che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi
309b4(rgyud 'bum): thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra te dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bcom ldan
309b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyangs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las 'jig
309b6(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer dgyes pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
309b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gzi brjid che ba nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid
310a1(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sems can khams kun// snang byed gzi brjid der
310a2(rgyud 'bum): med bdag/ gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi// 'dren pa rnams dang sbyor byed pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste// de bzhin
310a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil
310a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams
310a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi 'od 'thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/
310a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nyi ma de byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i 'od rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba'i ming go dbang gis dbang bskur
310a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje'i 'od ces bya ba rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'di//
310b1(rgyud 'bum): mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pas// shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'i// nyi ma'i 'od pas shin tu lhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi dam tshig las
310b2(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin
310b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo / / badz+ra ke tuH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rgyal
310b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan kha dog dang / gzugs dang / rgyan dang / dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyen
310b5(rgyud 'bum): su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin
310b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rin po che chen po'i dpal
310b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la
311a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o don kun grub pa dang / dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi/ don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// 'dra med dpal ni/
311a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gan
311a3(rgyud 'bum): nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de
311a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang bar
311a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po'i dngos grub dam pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan de byang chub
311a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//
311a7(rgyud 'bum): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched
311b1(rgyud 'bum): / du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu rgyal mtshan 'di// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
311b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu bar byed pa'i dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /
311b3(rgyud 'bum): / badz+ra hA sa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
311b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar
311b5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo
311b6(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas
311b7(rgyud 'bum): rdorje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu
312a1(rgyud 'bum): mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag rnams kyi/
312a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phyir// e ma'o bdag ni kun mchog gi/ bzhad ched rmad du byung chen yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom
312a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
312a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi
312a5(rgyud 'bum): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su sbyong ba'i ye shes dang
312a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par shes pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
312a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis rdo rje dga' ba rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dga' bas rdo rje 'dzum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes
312b1(rgyud 'bum): par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmang du byung skyed ston pa po// dgyes chen byed pa'i ye shes te// gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes mi nus// dbang bskur ba
312b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba dang / sems dpa' chen po'i don dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba chen po'i sems dpa' 'o// de
312b3(rgyud 'bum): nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzini la snyoms par zhugs na/ /
312b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra d+harma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs lnga
312b5(rgyud 'bum): byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer
312b6(rgyud 'bum): de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du gyur to/ / chos kyi dbyings de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su
312b7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje pad+ma'i dbyibs de
313a1(rgyud 'bum): las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes
313a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / mngon par shes pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu kun
313a3(rgyud 'bum): tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin pa nyid dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
313a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o rang byung gdod nas dag/ dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te// gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos
313a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la/ / rnam par dag pa dmigs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste// de bzhin
313a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi
313a7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sbyang ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi kham ma lus shing lus pa
313b1(rgyud 'bum): med pa rnams kyis bdag dang gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad kyis yid bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang mngon par she
313b2(rgyud 'bum): pa drug thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
313b3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu rdo rje pad+mo de byin no/ / de nas de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i spyan rdo rje'i spyan zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang
313b4(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyi rdo rje'i pad+mo'i 'dab mkha 'byed pas 'dod chags rnam par dag cing ma chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas
313b5(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi 'dod chags kyi/ / de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'di// bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po
313b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i dam
313b7(rgyud 'bum): tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom
314a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyi ral grir gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par
314a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas/ rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i
314a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin ni shin
314a4(rgyud 'bum): tu 'jam pa'i dpal yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la
314a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'jam dbyangs pa dag ni yin par dgongs// gang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang // dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa
314a6(rgyud 'bum): yani/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka'
314a7(rgyud 'bum): nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
314b1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad gcad pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde
314b2(rgyud 'bum): ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i ral gri de byang chub sems
314b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i blo rdo rje'i blo zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
314b4(rgyud 'bum): / chen po rdo rje'i blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gri des 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// dam
314b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad gcod byed cing / / sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor
314b6(rgyud 'bum): lo skor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
314b7(rgyud 'bum): / po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra he tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje 'khor lor gyur te byung nas
315a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so//
315a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku rnams byung ste/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
315a3(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
315a4(rgyud 'bum): ba yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
315a5(rgyud 'bum): snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi// e ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo bdag/ gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
315a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi
315a7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
315b1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / thams
315b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje 'khor lo de byang
315b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje snying po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi
315b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje 'khor lo des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog cing ched du brjod
315b5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong // phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang // byang chub snying po yin par dgongs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
315b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po mi gsung ba'i dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzlas
315b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra b+hA Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni
316a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi ger gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/
316a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje bzlas pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje bzlas pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang
316a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams su byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas
316a4(rgyud 'bum): nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu tshig ma yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas bcom
316a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi gsang // ldem po ngag tu bdag dgongs te// gang phyir dam pa'i chos
316a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chad pa/ / tshig tu spros las rnam par bral// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na
316a7(rgyud 'bum): / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi rdo rje dam tshig las byung ba zhes bya
316b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang / yang
316b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi gsang ba nyid thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje bzlas pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po tshig
316b3(rgyud 'bum): ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig rdo rje'i tshig ces rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tshig gis de
316b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i bzlas pa des yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i bzlas par brjod pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
316b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi/ / sngags 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes dang // chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba'i ye shes dang / de bzhin
316b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye shes dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
316b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phrin las thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
317a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra karma/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las tham
317a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin lnga
317a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi
317a4(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs lta bur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs ma lus pa de'ang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad mnyam pa'i
317a5(rgyud 'bum): tshad tsam du gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi dbyibs de las kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
317a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas
317a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu
317b1(rgyud 'bum): / 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched
317b2(rgyud 'bum): / du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges// 'phrin las mang po kun bdag yin// sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir// rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
317b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
317b4(rgyud 'bum): nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
317b5(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gdon mi za bar tshad med pa dang / las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing
317b6(rgyud 'bum): lus pa med pa rnams kyi las thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'brin las nyid dang / ye shes dang / mngon par
317b7(rgyud 'bum): shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las zhes bya ba 'phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de
318a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de'i lag tu las kyi rdo rje de de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje sna tshogs rdo rje
318a2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs zhes bya bas rdo rje de rang gi snying khar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las
318a3(rgyud 'bum): la sbyor zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// las rnams thams cad byed du bcug/
318a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
318a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
318a6(rgyud 'bum): thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ go cha brtan par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur
318a7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
318b1(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi sgra byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la srung ba'i cho ga rgyas pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i//
318b2(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dka' ba dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom
318b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o brtson 'grus go cha 'di// brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag/ de ni brtan phyir lus min yang // rdo rje'i lus
318b4(rgyud 'bum): su byed pa'i mchog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po thub bka' ba'i lus de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor na gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs
318b5(rgyud 'bum): papar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam
318b6(rgyud 'bum): tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku 'thob pa'i mchog
318b7(rgyud 'bum): grub par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i go cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grub thub bka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i grogs po rdo rje'i
319a1(rgyud 'bum): grogs po zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i grogs po des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go cha bsgom zhing
319a2(rgyud 'bum): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byams pa'i go cha dam pa ste// brtson 'grus brtan pas srung ba che// grogs po chen por brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
319a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
319a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra yak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di
319a5(rgyud 'bum): ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha chen por gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje mche ba'i
319a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs su gyur te byung nas phyag gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung
319a7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu
319b1(rgyud 'bum): 'joms pa yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
319b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams// thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te// zhi yang sems can don du ni// ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur/
319b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil
319b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu gtum pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
319b5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba
319b6(rgyud 'bum): dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams thob cing / dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje mche ba'i
319b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje ming gi dbang gis
320a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bo rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de rang gi khar gzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsdigs shing ched du brjod pa 'di
320a2(rgyud 'bum): ched du brjod do/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rnon te// thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
320a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
320a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje bcing ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra san+d+hi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma
320a5(rgyud 'bum): thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres
320a6(rgyud 'bum): par gyur nas/ rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam kyi
320a7(rgyud 'bum): skubyung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge
320b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin tu bcings pa dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya
320b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'i// dam tshig bdag ste brtan bdag nyid// bsam pa thams
320b3(rgyud 'bum): cad rab grub phyir/ / grol ba rnams kyang ching bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs
320b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'ching ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes
320b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcings pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi kham ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa tham
320b6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtags pa dang / grub pa thams cad dang / thams cad kyi 'de ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang phyag rgya
320b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje bcings pa de byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
321a1(rgyud 'bum): @thams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des
321a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcings pa che zhing brtan// sangs rgyas kun gyi myur grub phyir// dam tshig shin tu
321a3(rgyud 'bum): 'da' bar dka'/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang // brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
321a4(rgyud 'bum): thabs chen po dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las chen po'i sems dpa' 'o// / bam po gnyis pa/
321a5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs
321a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
321a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / satwa badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i 'od/
321b1(rgyud 'bum): zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shing tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/
321b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs
321b3(rgyud 'bum): chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa
321b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ gang phyir brtan pas lus med kyang // rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin
321b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye she sa la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs par bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par
321b6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyug rgyu 'di mang gi drugs ka nas byung ngo // rat+na dz+rIM/ daM nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di thung ma bag tu rin po che'i 'od
321b7(rgyud 'bum): zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam kyi
322a1(rgyud 'bum): skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas cher yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rjerje rin po
322a2(rgyud 'bum): che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje rin
322a3(rgyud 'bum): chen bdag nyid grags/ / gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi// dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa
322a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas ye shes la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir/ / chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi
322a5(rgyud 'bum): rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // d+har+m+ma badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung
322a6(rgyud 'bum): ma thag tu pad+mo'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// pad+ma'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
322a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad+mo chen po'i
322b1(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams kyi// chos kyi rdo rje gtsang
322b2(rgyud 'bum): ma ngag/ gang phyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas// 'dod chags yin yang dri ma med// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das
322b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir/ las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i
322b4(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // kar+m+ma badz+rA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
322b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// las thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
322b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi tshul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab ste yang gcig tu 'dres nas/ 'jig rten gyi
322b7(rgyud 'bum): khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i rdo rje chen po'i dbyings su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas cheng
323a1(rgyud 'bum): du brjod pa 'di cheng du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las kyi rdo rje mang po dag/ gang phyir gcig kyang sems can khams// ma lus par ni las bzang byed// de bzhin gshegs
323a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje chos nyid dang / mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnams so// de nas yang bcom ldan
323a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
323a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra lA s+ye/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur na byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa

323a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang / gzugs dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod lam sna tshogs brgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tham cad
323a7(rgyud 'bum): bsdus par gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang byung
323b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi ni/ / mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de// gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas// mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin

323b3(rgyud 'bum): le/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rin po che'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten
