323b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di cheng du brjod do/ / e ma'o rin chen mchod pa zhes// bdag dang 'dra bar grags pa med// gang phyir khams gsum rgyal
323b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog kyang / / rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu'i mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

324a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams

324b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs
325a1(rgyud 'bum): su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i grwar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che/

326a6(rgyud 'bum): chub chen po'i yan lag bsags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun tu snang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam pa grol ba dang / rnam pa grol ba'i ye shes
326a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba'i dri rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcag kyu'i
326b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas
326b2(rgyud 'bum): phyung ngo / / badz+ra a~M ku sha/ de nas de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs pas 'di byung ma thag tu me na gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs mang po thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom

326b5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'i rdo rje sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhi ni gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi spyad 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang

326b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa'i gsol ka pa 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // dz+ra
327a1(rgyud 'bum): pA sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan
327a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams
327a3(rgyud 'bum): byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje rim
327a4(rgyud 'bum): che'i sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'jug cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag/ rdul phran
327a5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa thams cad kyang / / bdag gi slar yang drang bar bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rngo
327a6(rgyud 'bum): rjezhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje pho nya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra s+phoT/ de nas de
327a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin
327b1(rgyud 'bum): g shegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas gcig tu 'dres
327b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs brtse mo rdoHda nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
327b3(rgyud 'bum): la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di cheng du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag/ 'ching ba kun las grol ba rnams// sems
327b4(rgyud 'bum): can don du 'ching bar 'dod/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
327b5(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra a be sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu
327b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad las
327b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste gcig tu 'dres nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
328a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi khang bu brtsegs partse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'beb shing
328a2(rgyud 'bum): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa bdag/ kun gyi ngag tu gyur nas kyang // bran du yang ni gyur pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba
328a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / gzhug pa dang / 'ching ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlabs
328a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir rdo rje'i se gol gyi mtshan ma mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsdu ba'i byin rlabs 'di gsungs so// badz+ra sa mA dzaH/ de nas skad cig zang cig yud tsam de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
328a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad se gol gyi mtshan mas bskul ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam sprin gyi rgya tshe'i thams cad nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi tshul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
328a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dus nas khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa gang na ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
328a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der gshegs nas kyang ched du/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA nga ban+da naM ka ro mi/ zhes brjod do// rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci gar zlos shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
328b1(rgyud 'bum): zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' yi// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi// dbus na de bzhin bzhugs pa madz+re//
328b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas de skad ces gsungs pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang
328b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang
328b4(rgyud 'bum): gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du
328b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rgya chen 'dod nas skye ba med// rdul phran thams cad ji snyed pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams
328b6(rgyud 'bum): ni gcig tu gyur/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / thams cad la phan pa dang bde
328b7(rgyud 'bum): babartan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje dbyings kyi
329a1(rgyud 'bum): d kyil 'khor chen po 'di byin gyis brlabs par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rang gi rdo rje sems dpa'i thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa la
329a2(rgyud 'bum): ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje dang po kun tu bzang / phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o// rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog/
329a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs// don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la// rdo rje chags pa bde chen po// rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa// bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la'o//
329a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje legs pa sems dpa'i mchog/ rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che// rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje don// rdo rje nam mkha'i nor bu che// nam mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyug/ phyag 'tshal
329a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying khyod la/ / rdo rje gzi brjing cher 'bar ba// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od // rdo rje'i 'od zer gzi brjid che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od lang la// sems can ngon rab rdo rje'i dpal// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rdo rje chen po
329a6(rgyud 'bum): rin chen dka'/ / phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la// rdo rje bzhad mo banang pa che// rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che// dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la// rdo rje chos rab de nyid don// rdo rje pad+mor ba dga' byed// rdo rje
329a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan/ / phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la// rdo rje rno ba theg pa che// rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po// 'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu bzab// phyag 'tshal rdo rje blo khyod la// rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che// rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po//
329b1(rgyud 'bum): rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po la// rdo rje gsung ba rang rig mchog/ rdo rje zlos pa rab sgru sbyin// mi gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la// rdo rje las rab rdo rje'i bka'/
329b2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro// rdo rje nges pa'i rgya che ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la// rdo rje srungs pa brtan pa che// rdo rje go cha sra pa che// brtson 'grus mchog ni thub par dka'// phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la// rdo rje gnod
329b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin thabs chen po/ / rdo rje mche ba 'jig pa che// bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzad ma// phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la// rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab sdung nyid// rdo rje 'ching bar rab grol byed// rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog/ phyag 'tshal
329b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur la/ / su zhig ming rnams 'chang ba ni// zhi ba rgyal po rtsa brgyad 'di// rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs// mchog rnams kun gyi de dbang bskur// gang zhig yon tan ming rnams kyis// rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la/
329b5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dbyangs kyis bstod pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur// ming brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis// bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yin// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// tshul chen yi ni rgyas par mdzod// mgon
329b6(rgyud 'bum): po khyod la gsol ba ni/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi// cho ga mchog ni bshad par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i
329b7(rgyud 'bum): tshig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas yang
330a1(rgyud 'bum): dag bshad bya ba/ / dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'drabs na// rdo rje dbyings zhes bgyi bar grags// sems dpa' che ba'i phyag rgya cher// sgom zhing byin gyis rdo
330a2(rgyud 'bum): bgyid cing / / dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang // phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs// kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor//
330a3(rgyud 'bum): gsar pa legs par bkal nas kyang // tshad dang mthun par mdzes pa yi// thig gis mkhas pas ci nus kyis// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thig gdab cing // gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // rnga babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la/
330a4(rgyud 'bum): thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa// dar dang me tog 'phreng bas brgyan// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi raM ma thig gdab bo// de yi rim pa'i
330a5(rgyud 'bum): nang zhugs la/ / 'khor lo 'dra ba'i rdo rje yi// thig gis yongs su bskor bar bya// ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis pa// rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor dbus su
330a6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing // sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus rnams su// rin bzhin du mi dam tshig mchog/ bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag
330a7(rgyud 'bum): tu/ / rdo rje gom pas song nas ni// mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag/ mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par gzhag/ rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyis
330b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du/ / rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par gzhag/ tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje spyan sogs dag par gzhag/ gdon mi za grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rgya gram la sogs gzhag/ 'khor lo yi ni grwa rnam
330b2(rgyud 'bum): su/ / rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang gzhag/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol grwa rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang gzhag/ sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni// sgo srungs bzhi yang gzhag par bgyi// dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs
330b3(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni// cho ga bzhin bcings bzhugs nas kyang // s+pho Ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi// de la thams cad dbab
330b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po 'di lags so/ / a/ bdag la byin gyis brlabs la sogs// ji lta bar ni bka' nod do// de ltar bgyis na bdag ming brjod// de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyi ba// rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi// rdo rje lcags
330b5(rgyud 'bum): kyu bcings nas ni/ / se gol mang po brdab bgyis la// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas// dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams//
330b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus gyur te// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi// phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing // ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// cung zad bar du brjod par bgyi// de nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na// de bzhin gshegs
330b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams bstan par gyur/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rang grub pa// grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas// de nas sgo rnams thams cad du// lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas// las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis// dam tshig rnams
331a1(rgyud 'bum): / ni gzhag par bgyi// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang // sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pa// de ltar sems dpa' chen po sgrub// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod cing // de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa//
331a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar// spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug/ bcings nas de yi dbang du gyur// de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams// gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la// thams cad don kun grub pa'i phyir//
331a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa la sogs
331a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga rgyas pa mchis so/ / de la dang por ni gzhug pa lags te// sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dngos grub mchog gi rgyu dang
331a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu nyid kyi slad du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhugs pa la snod du gyur pa dang snod du ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sems
331a6(rgyud 'bum): can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa'ang mchis te/ de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang / bza' ba dang /
331a7(rgyud 'bum): btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang / sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du
331b1(rgyud 'bum): bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyis bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang / glu dang / gad mo dang / rtsed mo dang / kha zas kyi spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin
331b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chung ba la gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du re ba thams
331b3(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa rnams 'byung bar byed pa de ni bslab pa'i gzhis 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de
331b4(rgyud 'bum): dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba dam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyu thams cad du 'jug par kha
331b5(rgyud 'bum): bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug tu rung ngo / / bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin
331b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / shes rab kyi dngos grub dam pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba na/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa rnams kyis 'bad cing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang mchis te/ ngag kyang
331b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'ang rnyed par dka' ba ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de la dang po kho na re zhig de bzhin gshegs
332a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad la phyag bzhi bgyi'o/ / de ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dzo bas+thA na ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sar+b+ba/
332a2(rgyud 'bum): tathA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha sA maM/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo snying khar bzhag ste dpral bas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ka ta pU dza la a b+hi She kA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi
332a3(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bor sbyar te khas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra baR+Sha nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi sar+b+ba tathA
332a4(rgyud 'bum): ga ta badz+ra d+har+m+ma pra bar+d+ha ya maM/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas phab ste snying khar bzhag nas spyi bos phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga A dza karma Ne At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA ma~M/
332a5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mAM/ zhes brjod do// de nas stong g.yogs gos dmar po gyon la gdong dmar pos dkris nas/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas gung mo
332a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyis me tog gi 'phreng ba 'dzin du 'jug/ bcug la drang zhing snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma yA hUM/ de nas bcug ma thag tu 'di skad du sgo zhig/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/
332a7(rgyud 'bum): ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa'ang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnam
332b1(rgyud 'bum): la ma smra zhig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha nang du bstan pa dang phyir bstan pa bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// 'di
332b2(rgyud 'bum): ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis/ gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang mna'i chu'i snying pos bsngags la slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go/ de la mna'i snying po
332b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid ni deng // khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs// gal te tshul de sman ni// de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ oM badz+ro da ka tha/ de nas slob ma la 'di skad du sgo zhig/ deng phyin chad khyod kyi
332b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so// khyod kyis de la brnyas pa ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la/
332b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig ces smos shig par bsgo'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya
332b6(rgyud 'bum): bcings la 'di skad du brjod du gzhug go/ / 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags// rdo rje ye shes bla med ni// de ring nyid du 'bab par shog/ oM badz+ra A be sha a/ de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings
332b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya mdud cing drangs la/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje tshig ci dga' bar brjod du gzhug go// de bas babs te babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skyes par 'gyur te/
333a1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgos pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa
333a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la 'di'i sems brtan par 'gyur ro/ / de'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' thams cad dang de bzhin
333a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / dngos grub thams cad ni 'di'i mngon sum du gyur ro// rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs par byed pa'i bde ba thams
333a4(rgyud 'bum): cad 'di la skyes par 'gyur ro/ / bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur ro// kha cig gis ni gzungs/ kha cig gis ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nas/ kha cig gos ni de bzhin gshegs
333a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad grub pa'i bar du'ang 'gyur ro/ / de nas phyag rgya de bcings la rang gi snying khar 'grol zhing snying po 'di'ang brjod du gzhug go/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ shA shA to me b+ha ba hr-i da yaM me/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ sar+b+ba
333a6(rgyud 'bum): sid+d+hi swe pra yats+tsha hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ de nas me tog gi 'phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor zhing snying po 'di brjod du gzhug go/ pra tIts+tsha badz+ra hoH/ de nas gang la bab pa de 'dis 'grub bo// de nas 'phreng ba 'di
333a7(rgyud 'bum): blangs te/ snying po 'dis de nyid kyi mgo bor bcings la 'di brjod du gzhug go// oM pra ti gr-ih+Na swa mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ de bcings pas sems dpa' chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur du
333b1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de ltar babs bzhin du gdong g.yogs bkrol te snying po 'di'ang brjod du gzhug go// oM badz+ra satwa sa yan+te/ t+ya tsak+Shu ra ga ta na tad pa ra ud g+ha Ta ya ti sar+b+bA k+Sho/ badz+ra tsak+Shu a nut+ta ra
333b2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra pA sh+ya/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po rig bzhin du bstan to// dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'di'i
333b3(rgyud 'bum): snying kha na gnas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'od zer sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyang mthong
333b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig ston par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad don thams cad dang / yid kyi 'dod pa'i dgos pa thams cad dang / dngos grub
333b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nas/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba'i 'og tu rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri'i chu dang snying po 'dis dbang
333b6(rgyud 'bum): bskur bar bya'o/ / oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ de nas phyag rgya dang 'phreng ba gang yang rung ba zhig bcings la/ rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag pa 'di skad du rjod par byed/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbang // de ring khyod
333b7(rgyud 'bum): la bskur bar bya/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis rab grub phyir// rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long // oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas snying po 'di rdo rje ming gi dbang gi dbang bsrung bar byed/ oM badz+ra satwa/
334a1(rgyud 'bum): tAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ke taH/ kye rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gang brjod pa der kye zhes brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas ci khyod don
334a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog grub pa'i ye shes
334a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi bar du gang 'dod ces smras la/ de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod par bya'o// de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbyings ni gter nus na// snying khar
334a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bsgom par bya/ / bsgoms na sa la gnas pa yi// gter ni de yis mthong bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i dbyibs gcig bris nas kyang // nam mkha'i ngos su bsgom par bya// gang du lhung ba mthong ba der// gter yod
334a5(rgyud 'bum): par ni rnam par bshad/ / blo ldan mi yis rdo rje'i dbyibs// lce yi steng du bsgoms nas ni// 'di ni yod ces bdag nyid kyis// bden pa nyid kyis smra bar 'gyur// bdag gi lus ni thams cad la// rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsgoms
334a6(rgyud 'bum): / nas ni// babs par gyur nas gar gnas pa// gter ni de na yod par bshad// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// oM badz+ra ni d+hi/ oM rat+na ni d+hi/ oM d+har+m+ma ni d+hi/ oM kar+m+ma ni d+hi/ de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub
334a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// chu la rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar// bsgoms na chu yi steng na 'phar// 'gro ba'i dngos grub myur du thob// de ltar 'bab pa byas nas kyang // gang gi gzugs
334b1(rgyud 'bum): su bdag gi lus/ / bsgoms par gyur na bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni skur yang 'gyur// de ltar bdag la phab nas kyang // bdag nyid kyis ni nam mkhar ni// bsgoms par gyur na ji srid du// 'dod pa de srid mi
334b2(rgyud 'bum): snang 'gyur/ / rdo rje dbab par bdag 'gyur nas// rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms nas// gnas nas ji srid lding 'dod pa// de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra dz+wa la/ badz+ra rU pa/ badz+ra
334b3(rgyud 'bum): A kA sha/ badz+ra ma hUM/ de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas ni// steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas te// lag par rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje'i rig
334b4(rgyud 'bum): ba 'dzin par 'gyur/ / zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug nas ni// rdo rje rin chen rab bsgoms na// bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod// de srid skad cig sding bar 'gyur// zla ba'i dbyibs kyi steng 'dug nas// rdo rje pad+mo lag gnas par//
334b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms nas rdo rje'i spyan gyis ni// rig 'dzin go 'phang sbyin par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas// las kyi rdo rje bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las// rig 'dzin kun tu myur bar 'gyur// de dag gi
334b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'di dag yin no/ / badz+ra d+hA ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ d+harmA d+ha ra/ kar+m+ma d+ha ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin// nam mkha'i
334b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs su bsams nas ni/ / rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid bar du lding bar 'gyur// kun la dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bsgoms na bla med de bzhin du// ye shes bsgrubs pas myur du ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob
335a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar ni// nam mkha' thams cad dran byas na// bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing // rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyibs ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas/
335a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin las// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra badz+ra/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ satwa satwa/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ thams cad kyi dngos grub
335a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnams so/ / de nas gsang ba thub pa yin pas de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste/ oM sarba sa yan+te/ hri da ye sa ma bsti ta ni Shad+hi ta ta k+Sha NAM/ yA yAng ya ti pra yang i daM na yaM/ de nas 'di skad du
335a4(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ khyod kyis gnod pa ma spangs pas dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ta re/ lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal bar 'gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i
335a5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes bslab par bya'o/ / rdo rje dbab pa bskyed nas ni// mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje yi// thal mo'i ngos kyis dal brdangs nas// ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo
335a6(rgyud 'bum): rje bsdams pa'i dngos gnyis ni/ / dal gyi brdabs par sbyor ba yis// ri bor yang ni kun nas 'gugs// de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas ni// sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam brdabs na// rigs rgya yud kyi
335a7(rgyud 'bum): rlag par 'gyur/ / phra mo dbab pa'i cho ga byas// sor mo thams cad mnyam gzhag cing // rdo rje bsdams la dkrol ba ni// gnod pa kun las bsal ba'i mchog/ des na de dag gis gsang bsgrub pa yin bud med dam ni
335b1(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa yi/ / bu ga'i nang du 'jug par bya// yid kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang // de yi lus kun khyab par bsam// de la rdo rje thal mo'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra pA sha/ badz+ra A be sha/ badz+ra ha na/ badz+ra ha ra/ de nas
335b2(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'di byin la rang gi rigs kyi lha'i phyag rgya bzhis ye shes bslab par bya'o/ / cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste// khyod kyis phyag rgya la mi mkhas pa gzhan su'ang rung la// phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par ma byed
335b3(rgyud 'bum): cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya bcing ba byas pa na de'i tshe de de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de dag the tsom du gyur te/ gnod pa
335b4(rgyud 'bum): ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ / khyod nyid kyang ngan song du lhung bar 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgrub pa'i
335b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bshad do/ / sems rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni// rdo rje dbyings zhes rjod byed cing // sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgyur la// rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya'o// grub ma thag tu 'di yis ni// ye she
335b6(rgyud 'bum): tshe stobs na tshod dang / / kun tu 'gro ba nyid rnams 'thob// sangs rgyas 'grub par dka' ba min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' chen po sgrub
335b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// rdo rje bsgyings par sems bskyed de// bsgyings bcas rdo rje gsor byed na// rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid 'gyur// 'dis ni kun tu 'gro ba dang // 'dod
336a1(rgyud 'bum): pa kun bdag bde chen dang / / rdzu 'phrul tshe stobs gzugs mchog rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// ji ltar ri mo'i rjes mthun zhing // mtshan ma
336a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rnams ldan par/ / sems dpa' chen po bsgrub par bya// de nas 'dis ni rtog kun gyi// sgrub pa dang ni dngos grub dang // grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// dang po nyan
336a3(rgyud 'bum): re dus bzhin du/ / rang la byin gyis brlab la sogs// byas nas thams cad bsgrub bya ste// de yi 'og tu ci dgar bya// de la phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje babs pa byas nas ni//
336a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin// bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su// sems dpa' chen po de sgom mo// ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas// rang gi lus su bsgom par bya// bkug cing bcug la bcang ba dang
336a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya'o/ / de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra satwa a/ rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po'o// badz+ra satwa dri sh+ya ho// sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ba'i snying po'o// dzaHhUM baM hoH/
336a6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams kyi snying po'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas// rgyab tu zla ba grub nas ni// der bdag sems dpa'i lus su sgom// sa
336a7(rgyud 'bum): ma ya s+t+waM a haM brjod/ / sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang // de ni bdag tu bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pas sgrub par bya// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'o// gzhan yang sgrub pa chen po ni// dzaHhUM baM ho zhes brjod
336b1(rgyud 'bum): la/ / legs pa'i cho ga yid kyis ni// lus la sangs rgyas kun gzhug go// de nas bla med rdo rje las// de dag gi ni las bshad do// sangs rgyas rjes su dran grub na// sangs rgyas nyid du myur du 'gyur// sems dpa'i
336b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ma grub na/ / phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje ma phyag rgyas// de ni rin chen kun dbang 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rje ma grub na// sangs rgyas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje ma phyag rgyas// rdo rje las
336b3(rgyud 'bum): ni byed par 'gyur/ / sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dren pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan 'dren 'gyur// rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ches// sangs rgyas thams
336b4(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyes par byed/ / rdo rje legs pa'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas dbang bskur sbyin par byed// rdo rje gzi brjid cho ga yis// rdo rje gzi brjid
336b5(rgyud 'bum): myur du 'gyur/ / rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsten pa yi// re ba rnams ni yongs su song // rdo rje ba nang pa'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bcang // rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yis// rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje rnon
336b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i cho ga yis/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsnyen pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// rdo rje gsung ba'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas gsung gi grub pa thob// rdo rje las mchog
336b7(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs pas na/ / rdo rje'i las skyes myur du 'gyur// rdo rje'i go cha bskon pas na// rdo rje sku ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgrub pas na// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pasam// phyag rgya
337a1(rgyud 'bum): @thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ / rdo rje 'dzin ma grub pas na// rdo rje chen po dga' ba thob// rdo rje 'phreng ba bcings pas na// sangs rgya kun gyi dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje gru yi cho ga yis// rdo rje spun
337a2(rgyud 'bum): len par 'gyur/ / rdo rje gar ni bsgyur ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis de mchod do// rdo rje 'dug pa'i cho ga yis// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed// rdo rje'i me tog sbyor byed pas// de ni 'gro ba dbang du byed// rdo rje snang ba'i
337a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ches/ / rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed// rdo rje dri yi cho gas ni// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyu drangs pas na// 'dren pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje zhags pa'i cho gas ni// thams
337a4(rgyud 'bum): cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ / rdo rje lugs sgrog sbyor bas ni// thams cad bcing bar nus par 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// thams cad dbab par rab tu 'grub// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
337a5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bshad de/ / thal mo dam du sbyar ba las// sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te// rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdam
337a6(rgyud 'bum): las byung bas na/ / de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yi// bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam sdang // gung mo nang du gzhibs pa ni// sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par
337a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / gung mo rin chen 'dra ba dang // gung mo pad+mo 'dra ba dgug/ sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgya ni// de bzhin mdzub mo dgug pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rigs kyi dam tshig 'dzin pa yi// phyag rgya bcings
337b1(rgyud 'bum): / dang dngos grub dang // las rnams yang dag bshad par bya// zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis// gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi// mthe bong mthe'u chung so sor sgreng // sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgreng rdo rje// mdzub mo'i lcags
337b2(rgyud 'bum): kyus mdzub mo sbyar/ / legs so sbyin pa 'dra ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi po yi// phyag rgya mang po dngos grub 'di// mthe bong gzhibs la mdzub gnyis bcag/ rtse sprad rdo rje rin chen yin// de nyid gung mo srin lag
337b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / mthe'u chung rnams ni bsnol brkyang ba'o// de la srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis// mnyam pa'i gshibs pa rgyal mtshan no// de nyid las ni bskor nas kyang // de yi phyogs su gzhag pa'o// mthe bong gnyis ka
337b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par gshabs/ / mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang // de nyid gung mo sgreng rtse mo// bkug pa rdo rje ral gri'o// de las srin lag mthe'u chung gshibs// 'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin// bsdams pas
337b5(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong gnyis bkrol ba/ / bkan te kha phyogs gzhag pa'o// mthe bong mthe'u chung rtse sprad bkyed// las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad// de las mdzub mo gnyis gshibs pas// snying khar brkyang ste gzhag
337b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / mdzub mo rtse bcug che ba la// mthe'u chung gshibs pa brkyang ba'o// mthe'u chung gnyis par mthe bong gnyis// mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o// snying khar mthe bong bsnyams la gzhag/
337b7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu brgya pa 'phreng ba'o// thal mo sbyar te kha nas dbyung // gar las thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag/ rdo rje bcing ba thur du krugs// rang gi thal sbyar gyen du gtor// mthe bong bsnyams te rab tu bsdams// rab tu
338a1(rgyud 'bum): brkyang nas byug pa'o/ / mdzub mo gcig pu bkug pa dang // mthe bong gnyis ni mdud pa dor// mthe bong mdzub mo gdu bur bcing // rdo rje bcing ba mdzub mo bsdams// de nas 'di rnams
338a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub bshad de/ / rdo rje sgrub pa dam pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi phyag rgya snying khar gzhag/ de nas 'di rnams las bshad pa// rdo rje'i las ni dra na med// rdo rje dbyings sogs phyag rgya ni
338a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs rnams 'dus pa yin/ / dkyil 'khor slong dpon slob mar bcas// de ma thag tu byin gyis rlob// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings pa ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje lcags gru bcings
338a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kun nas 'gugs// 'dod pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyang mnyes par byed// rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun// legs so bas ni skyod par byed// rin chen rdo rje bcing
338a5(rgyud 'bum): pas na/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis de dbang bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'chi 'gyur bas// re ba kun yang rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhad pa'i tshul gyis ni//
338a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig bzhad// chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas ni// rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i ral gri thogs pas ni// nyon mongs thams cad des gcod do// rdo rje 'khor lo brtan byas pas// dkyil
338a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi ni dbang por 'gyur/ / rdo rje smra ba'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje'i ngag mchog 'grub par 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje bcings pas ni// rdo rje'i las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje go cha brtan byas pas// lus ni rdo rje 'dra bar
338b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rdo rje mche ba'i mchog phyag rgyas// ma rungs bdud ni nges 'joms so// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings pas// phyag rgya kun kyang dbang du 'gyur// 'dzum pas lha yi dga' ba rnams// 'phreng ba yis ni rgyan gyis
338b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / glu yis rtag tu skad gsal ba// gar gyis mchod pa brnyes par 'gyur// bdug pas 'jig rten tshim par byed// me tog gis ni mdzes pa'i gzugs// mar mes snang ba dag pa nyid// dri yis lha rdzas 'dri
338b3(rgyud 'bum): can du'o/ / rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste// rdo rje zhags pas 'jug par byed// rdo rje lcags sgrog bcing ba ste// rdo rje dril bus 'bebs pa'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// badz+ra dz+nyA na sangs rgyas rnams/
338b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dbyings ni brtan par byed// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// chos kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod na// phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur// A na ya sA zhes brjod na// gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas
338b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs/ / a ho su khaM zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par 'gyur// sA d+hu sA d+hu zhes smras na// legs pa'i tshig gos de dgar byed// su ma ha ta taM zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas rnams kyis dbang bskur thob
338b6(rgyud 'bum): / rU pa d+yo ta zhes smras na// chos kyi gzi brjid nyid du 'gyur// ar+tha prA b+he zhes smras na// ri ba kun kyang rdzogs par byed// ha ha hUM he zhes bgang na// sangs rgyas bzhad pa rnyed par 'gyur// sarba ka ri zhes smras na// mi bya ba
338b7(rgyud 'bum): yi rnams kyang sbyod / / du khaHts+tshe da zhes smras na// des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// bud+d+ha bo d+d+hi zhes smras na// dkyil 'khor kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// pra ti sha b+ha zhes smras na// sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig smra//
339a1(rgyud 'bum): su b+ha Shi trAM zhes smras na// kun gyi dbang dang ldan par 'gyur// nir b+ha ya tAM zhes smras na// de ma thag tu 'jigs med 'gyur// sha twaM b+hAk+Shazhes smras na// dgra rnams thams cad za bar 'gyur/
339a2(rgyud 'bum): sarba sid+d+hi zhes smras na// thams cad grub pa nyid du 'gyur// ma hA ra ti lha yi dga'// ru pa sho d+his gzugs bzang nyid// sho tra so so khya bde ba sbyin// sarba pU dza mchod par byed// pra d+hA da ni yid bder 'gyur/
339a3(rgyud 'bum): / pha lA ga mi 'bras bu thob// su te dzA gri gzi brjid che// su gan+d+hargi dri mchod can// A ya hi dza 'gugs par byed// A ya hi hUM 'jug par byed// he s+phoT baM 'ching ba che// g+han+na a a rab bskyod pa// de nas de rnam
339a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa dge ba bshad do/ / lce la rdo rje dge bsgoms na// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bshad do// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te// mnyam
339a5(rgyud 'bum): bapar bzhag pas gnyis su bya/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// de nas bcings pa rab tu bshad// g.yon pa rdo rje mdzub mo ni// g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste// sangs
339a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o/ / mi g.yo ba yis reg pa// de bzhin rin chen sbyin pa'o// tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// mdor bsdus
339a7(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bshad par bya/ / rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams// rdo rje las rnams byed pa ste// bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis// lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phang ba yi tshul
339b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni/ / legs so zhes pa snying khar gzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying khar nyi ma brtan par bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa
339b2(rgyud 'bum): dbye/ / snying khar g.yon pa ral gri mdung // mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yis// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang //
339b3(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su// bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par bya// 'phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// bdug pa
339b4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs de bzhin sbyin/ / sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yi// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa yi// mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing ba ni// mthe'u chung la ste lcags kyu che// mkhrig ma mdud pa mdzub gnyis gdub//
339b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyab gnyis kyang ni bsnyams te mnan// de nas 'di rnams sgrub bshad pa// rdo rje las ni byed dang mnyam// rdo rje kun gyi rdo rje ni// rang gi snying khar goms par bya// de nas 'di rnams las phyag rgya// rdo rje'i las
339b6(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam pa mang / / ye shes khu tshur bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// mi g.yo ba yi bcings pas ni// yid ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yi// gzhan la
339b7(rgyud 'bum): phan byed ldan par 'gyur/ / dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// mi 'jigs mchog gis myur ba ni// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// rdo rje bsgying ba brtan byas la// rdo/
340a1(rgyud 'bum): rje sems dpa'i bde brjed// rdo rje lcags kyu skang cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang 'gugs// rdo rje mdara' yis rdo rje yi// lha mo mnyes par bdag nyid byed// rdo rje dpa' bsar+b+ba
340a2(rgyud 'bum): ba kun/ / legs so zhes pas tshig kyang sbyin// rdo rje chen po nor bu sbyin// ston pa rnams kyis de dbang bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyi ma 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan gleng bas ni// des nI rim
340a3(rgyud 'bum): chen char yang 'bebs/ / rdo rje 'dzum pa bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas 'dra ba myur bzhad 'gyur// rdo rje me tog bcings pas ni// rdo rje'i chos nyid de yis mthong // rdo rje ral gri brtan bcings na// des ni sdug
340a4(rgyud 'bum): bsngal thams cad gcod/ / rdo rje 'khor lo bcings pas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig rnams ni// rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje bar gyi mchod pa yis//
340a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje'i go chas lus bcangs pas// rdo rje snying po thob par 'gyur// rdo rje'i mche ba bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyid kyang bdag gis choms// rdo rje khu tshur kun 'phrog cing /
340a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya grub pa kun tu rnyed// rdo rje 'dzin pas dga' ba sbyin// rdo rje 'phreng bas gzugs bzang ba// rdo rje glu yis glu snyan cing // rdo rje gar gyis dbang du byed// bdug pa yis ni yid tshim pa// me tog gis ni rgyan rnam
340a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ mar me yis ni gzi chen po// rdo rje'i dris ni dri bar ldan// rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs pa ste// rdo rje zhags pas 'jug pa'o// rdo rje lcags sgrog gis ni bcing // rdo rje dril bus bskyod pa'o// de nas phyag rgya
340b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga rgyas par bshad de/ / de la thog ma nyid du rdo rje bcing ba'i sor mo snying khar brdab par bya ste snying po ni 'di brjod do// badz+ra ban+d+ha traT/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa kun rang gi lus
340b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ngag dang / sems rdo rje'i dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po brjod do// a de nas yang dag par babs nas grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas
340b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ste snying po 'di brjod do/ / ma hA sa ma ya satwa haM// 'dis phyag rgya thams cad 'grung ste// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas spyi'i sgrub pa'i
340b4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpa' bdag gi snying po 'dis sgom mo// sa ma yo haM// de nas rang phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag bsgoms nas// sngags 'dis
340b5(rgyud 'bum): / byin gyis brlab bo// sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa mAM/ de nas bsgrub par bya'o// sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad de// de la thog mar re zhig nor grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no//
340b6(rgyud 'bum): ar+tha sid+d+hi/ 'dis phyag rgya grung na nor chen po skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje grub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra sid+d+hi/ 'dis ci 'dod pa bzhin du rdo rje grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rig 'dzin gyi grub pa 'dod
340b7(rgyud 'bum): na snying po 'di yin no/ / badz+ra bi d+yA d+ha ra sid+d+hi/ 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin 'grub bo// de bzhin du dam pa grub par 'dod na rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos sgrub bo// dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas
341a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i rang gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems rdo rjer bya ba'i phyir cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ nam phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs lhod par gyur tam/ bdag rang gtong bar 'dod
341a2(rgyud 'bum): na de nas snying po 'di brtan par bya'o/ / oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra satwa te no pa tiSh+Tha dri D+ho me b+ha wa/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma
341a3(rgyud 'bum): su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoH/ b+ha ga wA na/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA me muny+tsa badz+ri b+ha wa ma ha sA ma ya satwa AH/ 'dis ni mtshams med byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus
341a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dam pa'i chos smod pa dang / nyes pa thams cad byas pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub
341a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dam/ dngos grub dam pa 'am/ rdo rje dngos grub bam/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi dngos grub kyi bar du myur du thob bo zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
341a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad de// de la thog ma nyid du phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de nga nyid
341a7(rgyud 'bum): nas snying po 'dis dgrol lo/ / oM badz+ra muH/ de nas snying kha nas byung ba rin chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na gnas pas dbang bskur te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis bskor zhing bcings nas/
341b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du go cha'ang snying po 'dris bcing ngo // oM badz+ra rak+Sha a d+hI Shiny+tsa/ sarba s+'ur+d+ha me hrid+d+hi Taru bA radaka btson 'o// de nas yang go cha'i mthar 'brang ba bcings pa gta la/ thal mo mnyam par brdungs
341b2(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'dis mnyes par bya'o/ / badz+ra tu N+ya no// cho ga 'dis phyag rgya rnams dkrol ba dang / bcing ba dang / mnyes par byas nas rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro// yang na rdo rje sems dpas kyang bya'o// rdo rje sem
341b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' lan cig bzlas/ / ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar// brlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// rdo rje
341b4(rgyud 'bum): sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/ / sgrub pa dang ni las kun la// 'dir ni ci dgar bzlas na ni// rtog pa kun las dngos grub thob// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul
341b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni/ / rtog pa las bshad rang byas pa'am// sgrub pa 'dir ni thams cad do// de nas gsang ba'i mchod brjod cing // rdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis glu blangs te// gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o// oM/ rdo rje sem
341b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bsdus pas na/ / rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni klu blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i glu 'di nyid kyis rdo rje'i gar lag pa gnyis
341b7(rgyud 'bum): gshibs pa gsang ba bya'o/ / bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya ste// mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su gzhag go// de nas
342a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la ci nus par mchod cig ces bskon sa/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stsol te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du
342a2(rgyud 'bum): bcug la/ / ji ltar bzhugs pa rnams ci 'byor pa'i ro dang / kha zas la sogs pa thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor chen por phul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis mgu bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
342a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin no/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs bstan// oM sarba ta
342a4(rgyud 'bum): thA ga ta sid+d+he badz+ra sa ma ya/ / tiSh+Tha e Sha tAM d+ha ra yA mi/ badz+ra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas thams cad du su la'ang ma badz+ra zhig ces bsgo la mna'i snying po'ang bstan to// de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams slar
342a5(rgyud 'bum): bkye ste/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gdab cing sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas kha gyen du bstan te/ snying po 'di bzlas shing dkrol nas/ oM/ khyed kyis sems can don
342a6(rgyud 'bum): kun mdzad/ / rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzod// slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol// badz+ra satwa muH/ de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya'o//
342a7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya rnams kyang dgrol bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen
342b1(rgyud 'bum): bopo'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / / bam po gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs dam tshig las byung
342b2(rgyud 'bum): ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu yang de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de rdo rje
342b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'i gzungs 'dzin pa kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin gshegs
342b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil
342b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod de ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o gang phyir byang chub sems// sems can kun la phan bzhed pa// 'dul ba'i dbang
342b6(rgyud 'bum): gis dpa' bo gang / / bud med gzugs su'ang mdzad par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyi
342b7(rgyud 'bum): rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+hA tI shwa ri hUM badz+rI Ni/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs
343a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di
343a2(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ oM badz+ra badz+rI Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya
343a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM rat+na badz+rA Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam
343a4(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+harma badz+rA Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
343a5(rgyud 'bum): gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di
343a6(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ oM karma badz+rI Ni hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badz+ra satwa gu h+ya sa ma
343a7(rgyud 'bum): ye hUM/ oM gu h+ya rat+na aM ku sha~M hUM/ oM gu h+ya gi rA gA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya badz+ra sA dI shwa ri hUM/ kun tu bzang mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu ma dang / dga' ba la chags ma dang / legs ldan ma ste rdo
343b1(rgyud 'bum): rje gzungs chen mo rnams so/ / oM badz+ra gu h+ya rat+na sa ma ya trAM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya pra b+he hUM/ oM badz+ra d+ha dzA a gra gu h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra hA sa badz+rI hUM/ rin po che'i gtso mo dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / rgyal mtshan gyi
343b2(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma dang / 'khor lo thams cad ma dang / stong du zlos ma ste chos rnams so// oM badz+ra d+harma gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra ko Sha gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya maN+Da le hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya
343b3(rgyud 'bum): tsa sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje pad+mo dang / kun 'dzin ma dang / 'khor lo thams cad ma dang / stong du zlos ma ste chos kyi gzungs ma rnams so// oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ka ba tse hUM/ oM badz+ra
343b4(rgyud 'bum): / gu h+ya daMSh+ThA d+hA ra NI hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya muSh+Ti hUM/ dngos grub kun gyi gtso mo dang / thams cad srung ba ma dang / mdangs slar 'phrog ma dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma ste thams cad kyi gzungs rnams so//
343b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po rnams bshad do// oM badz+ra gu h+ya satwa badz+rI Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu
343b6(rgyud 'bum): h+ya rat+na badz+rI Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya d+harma badz+rI Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma badz+rI Ni hUM/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
343b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams te/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma dkyil 'khor chen por 'bar ba dang bcas pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par bzhag go// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
344a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do/ / oM badz+ra gu h+ya ra ti pU dza sa ma ye sarba pU dz+nyA pra brta nA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya a b+hi She ka pU dza sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra ba
344a2(rgyud 'bum): nA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya gI ti pU dzA sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta nA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya nA~M t+ya pU dz+nyA sa ma ye sarba pU dza pra brta nA ya hUM/ rdo rje 'dzin ma la sogs pa de dag nyid de 'bar ba dang bcas pa rang gi mtshan ma'i
344a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rnams 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams su dgod do/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad
344a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ / rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri ba bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus
344a5(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya// mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// khri yi steng du rdo rje brtsegs// rdo rje sems shes bshad pa'o// rdo rje rin chen khri yi steng //
344a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi dbang ni bskur bar bshad// rdo rje pad+ma khri yi steng // mtshon cha zhes ni bya bar bshad// las kyi rdo rje khri yi steng // rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad// pad+mo'i steng du bri bar ni// 'od kyi 'khor lo brten
344a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / khri yi steng du rdo rje bri// lcags kyu 'greng ba gnyis de bzhin// rdo rje rdo rje la skyes par// legs par sbyin pa gnyis de bzhin// rin chen 'od zer 'bar bar bya// nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin
344b1(rgyud 'bum): no/ / phyag mtshan rtse mo 'bar bar bcas// rdo rje gnyis par so yi 'phreng // rdo rje dbus su pad+mo bri// ral gri 'bar bcas de bzhin ni// rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje rtsibs// 'bar ba'i 'od zer can gyi
344b2(rgyud 'bum): lce/ / rdo rje kun tu rtse mo dang // go cha rdo rje yang dag ldan// rdo rje mche ba yang dag bri// lag gnyis khu tshur phyag rgya bya// sems ma rdo rje la sogs ni// dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du//
344b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar ni// rdo rje 'dzin sogs dkyil 'khor du// phyi rol du yang ci rigs bya// rang gi mtshan ma rnams kyang bri// byams pa la sogs rang gi mtshan// ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri//
344b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rang gi rigs bcings te 'jug par bya'o//
344b5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas lan cig bskor te phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas/ rang gi snying khar tshul bzhin du bkrol te/ sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas ji lta ba'i las rnams byas te phyir byung
344b6(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / phyir byung nas kyang rdo rje slob ma rnam rdo rje dbyis kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gzung ba'i tshul du gzung ngo // de nas btsud nas dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'chang bas g.yogs la byin te/
344b7(rgyud 'bum): rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// de la dang po'i re zhig rdo rje gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rkang lag thal mo sbyar nas kha// glang cing rdo rje bsgom
345a1(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / rdo rje ma yang chags par byed// dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang // mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya// lag pa yis ni 'bod byed cing // lcags kyu ma yang 'gugs par byed
345a2(rgyud 'bum): mnga' 'phen pa yi tshul gyis ni/ / glal zhing snying khar 'phangs nas ni// nyid kyis rdo rje dga' ma yang // 'dud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed// bdag gi lus kyi snying kha ru// rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis ni/
345a3(rgyud 'bum): dpung pa bsnol bar bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// badz+ra rA ga ma ho/ badz+ra aM ku shi dza/ badz+ra mA ra ya mA ra ya phaT/ badz+ra ban d+ha rak+Sha haM/
345a4(rgyud 'bum): denas rdo rje gsang ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje lta ba chags pas ni// dga' bas mig ni rab tu bgrang // de yis bud med bltas pas ni// rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin// rab tu
345a5(rgyud 'bum): myur bar mig bsgral zhing / / mig gi rdzi ma 'gugs byed pa// lta ba gzi can yin par bshad// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o// tho gar gnyer ma rab bsdus pa// khro bo'i mig ni btsums pa
345a6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ khro bo'i lte bas byas nas ni// khams gsum yang ni 'jigs par byed// ri rab ri yi brag 'dra ba// brtan par 'dzums pa med pa'i mig/ byams pa'i lta ba yin par bshad// nad dang gdon /
345a7(rgyud 'bum): dang dug sel to// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti marba dib+ha dr-iSh+Ti a ku shi dzaHkro d+ha dr-iSh+Ti hrIHdza~M D+ha tiSh+Thi phaT/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//
345b1(rgyud 'bum): ho ho ho ho zhes smras na// sgra dang bral bas de ma thag/ sems can kun ni mgu bar byed// de ni rdo rje tshig gsal ba'o// dza dza dza dza zhes brjod na// khro ba'i tshig ni gsal ba ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba
345b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ skye bo kun kyang 'gugs par byed// hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na// tshig tu brjod pa gsal ba yis// ri rab dang ni 'dra ba yis// sems can kun la bdud byed do// haM haM haM haM zhes smras na// phra ba'i
345b3(rgyud 'bum): tshig ni gsal ba ste/ / 'jig rten 'di kun srung byed pa// rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyal ba'ang srung // de la snying po 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra hoHbadz+raHbadz+ra hUM/ badz+ra haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag
345b4(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ / rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas la// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog
345b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ / rdo rje snying po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas na// phyag na rdo rje 'gugs par byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje'i spyan ni bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis
345b6(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgom byas na/ / chos rnams thams cad des btud byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje thams cad bdag nyid la// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom byas na// rdo rje thams cad des srung
345b7(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra pA Ni sarba sha ma na ya sarba bud+d+ha ho/ badz+ra gar+b+ha badz+ra pA ni shI g+h+ra~M A kaR+Sha ya hUM dzaHbadz+ra ne tra sarba d+harmA na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra bi shwa rak+Sha sar+b+ba na hUM/ de nas rdo rje/
346a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// bdag gis bdag gi snying khar ni// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcing byas la// rdo rje lta bas bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad 'bab par byed//
346a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis bdag gi snying khar ni// rin chen rdo rje bcing byas la// 'bar ba'i lta bas bltas na ni// thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur// bdag gis bdag gi snying khar ni// chos kyi rdo rje bcing byas
346a3(rgyud 'bum): la/ khro bo'i lta bas bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad des sdud byed// bdag gis bdag gi snying khar ni// las kyi rdo rje bcing byas la// byams pa'i lta bas bltas na no// 'gro ba thams cad
346a4(rgyud 'bum): srung bar byed/ / de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya ho/ badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya dza/ badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya hUM/ badz+ra gu h+ya sa ma ya haM/ de nas rdo rje
346a5(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bslab bo/ / rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// gsang ba chen po rab tu bshad// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus pa// de dag gi ni bcing ba bshad// mthe bong gnyis ni bsnol byas
346a6(rgyud 'bum): la/ mdzub mo rtse mo bkug pas ni// gung mo bsnyams pa'i tshigs su sbyar// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang por bshad// de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur byas// pad+mo srin lag mthe'u
346a7(rgyud 'bum): chung gung / / lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang // mdzub mo rdo rje mdzub gnyis rtse// de nyid mthe bong gnyis kyis sbas// legs pa sbyin dang mdzub rin chen// mdzub mo rin chen can 'od 'bar//
346b1(rgyud 'bum): srin lag gzhibs mthe'u chung rin chen// de nyid kyang ni bskor ba'o// kun gyi rtse mo rab tu 'gyed// mthe bong mthe'u chung rab tu gzhug/ sor mo bar du 'khor lo brkyang // de nyid kyang ni kha nas
346b2(rgyud 'bum): dbyung / / mthe bong brkyang ste rdo rjes dga'// mdzub mo bsnyams nas nang du gzhug/ mtheb gnyis dbye ba de nyid las// de nas nang du rdo rjer bya// rdo rje gsang ba de rnams ni// rdo rje bcings las
346b3(rgyud 'bum): byung ba yin/ / chos kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams ni// thal mo nang du bkug pas so// las kyi gsang ba nang gnas pa'i// mtshan ma lus su bstan pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa'o//
346b4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// a/ dz+dza/ ho/ sa/ oM/ aM/ traM/ ha/ hrI/ hUM/ maM/ raM/ kaM/ haM/ hUM/ baM/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas// las kyi phyag rgya rnams su bya// dam tshig
346b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni ji snyed pa/ / gnyis su phral nas de bzhin no// de nas 'di rnams sgrub pa bshad// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes smras shing // bdag gis bcings pas 'grub pa ni// 'dod la chags pa bde ba'i
346b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ 'di rnams lhag par gcig kyang ni// dus kun tu ni bcing mi bya// gsang ba 'am ni don chen la// mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya// 'di rnams kun la bdag nyid gnas// rab byung rnams
346b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi lha mo brtan/ / sgrub pa rnams la rab chags na// rang gi bdag po btang ba re// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams bcing ba la sogs pa'i las rnams yin no// bdag gam 'on te gzhan yang rung // rdo rje dbab
347a1(rgyud 'bum): pa byas nas ni/ / snying por bcas pa 'di yis ni// bcing ngam 'ching du gzhug kyang rung // badz+ra hUM ban+d+ha/ de nas dgrol ba yin no// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// snying por bya
347a2(rgyud 'bum): ba 'di nyid kyis/ / gang dang gang nas byung ba yi// de dang de nas dgrol bar bya// oM badz+ra muH/ de nas brtan par bya ba yin te/ rin chen rdo rje brtan byas te// snying kha nas ni spyi bor dgrol// mdzub mo
347a3(rgyud 'bum): yis ni go cha bcing / / snying por bya ba 'di nyid do// oM dr-i D+ha badz+ra ka ba tsa dr-i D+ha/ de nas bcing ba'i dam tshig yin no// ji ltar gnas pa rnams su dgrol// go cha yis ni brtan par byas// thal mo brda ba
347a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i kun sbyar la/ / snying por bya ba 'di nyid do// oM gu h+ya sa ma ya tra/ rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas// dkyil 'khor dang ni las kun la// dus 'di nyid du sbyar bar bya// thams cad 'grub par
347a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// /
347a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
347a7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ / rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes phra mo'i dam
347b1(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM satwa sUk+Sh+ma badz+rA dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
347b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog la
347b3(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ oM rat+na sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs
347b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+harma sU k+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs
347b5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya bi'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM karma sUk+Sh+ma
347b6(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
347b7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhini gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams
348a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa brtan par byas te/ yang gcig
348a2(rgyud 'bum): tu gyur nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs te gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas bcom
348a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa/ sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra/ de nas de
348a4(rgyud 'bum): smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis
348a5(rgyud 'bum): brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje phra mo'i bdag ste che// gang phyir phra yang che ba'i
348a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / khams gsum yang ni rgyas par byed// de nas de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs na rab tu
348a7(rgyud 'bum): phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i sbyor bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyad par bya ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rab tu phra
348b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyis khyab par byas so/ / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlab
348b2(rgyud 'bum): te'adug go/ / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje'i chos nyid du dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo
348b3(rgyud 'bum): rje'i ye shes phra mo'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge
348b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo / / badz+ra nA b+hi ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas de phyung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs
348b5(rgyud 'bum): nas thugs kar rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur te gnas so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las ye shes chen po 'di bzhi phyung ngo // badz+ra At+ma ka dr-i D+ha badz+ra aM ku sha tiSh+Tha rA ga badz+ra
348b6(rgyud 'bum): pra be sha hr-i da yaM/ a ho badz+ra duSh+Ti/ rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par
348b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mor
349a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi thugs su zhugs te snying kha'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so/ / de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo //
349a2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra rat+na At+ma kahr-i da ya/ badz+ra sUr+ya toSh+Tha/ badz+ra d+hA dzA gra bgr-i da ya/ badz+ra hA sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i rgyan ye
349a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
349a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas yang phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi snying kha rdo rje'i snying por zhugs nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje'i
349a5(rgyud 'bum): / dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo // badz+ra pad+ma At+ma ka hr-i da ya badz+ra ko Sha/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra tsakra hr-i da yaM pra be sha/ badz+ra dzi hwA gra hr-i da ya/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs
349a6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad shes rab kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig gi spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin
349a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung nas ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i thugs der zhugs nas/ yang rdo rje shin tu phra
349b1(rgyud 'bum): mo'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so/ / de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo // sarba badz+ra At+ma ka hr-i da badz+ra ka ba tsa/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra rak+Sha hr-i da ya/ badz+ra muSh+Ti hr-i da ya/ de bzhin gshegs
349b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / bdud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
349b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi 'ching ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gsheg
349b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas/ de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi skur gyur te/ rang rang gi
349b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas rang rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste bzhugs so/ / de
349b6(rgyud 'bum): nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi
349b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ / rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje phra mo zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ rdo rje dbus su sangs rgyas bri// sangs rgyas
350a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rnams su yang / / sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing // de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyag rgya// ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang // phyag gnyis rdo rje bcing bar bcings// de nas
350a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas// ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byan
350a3(rgyud 'bum): nas rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo/ / lce ni dkan la sbyar bya zhing // sna yi rtse mor bsam bya ba// rdo rje phra mo bde reg pas// sems ni mnyam par bzhag par
350a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rdo rje phra mo bde reg pa'i// mtshan ma gal te byung ba na// mtshan ma de ni khyab bya ba// sems de kun tu khyab par bya// ji tsam 'dod pas sems khyab nas// khams gsum du yang khyab par 'gyur// de nas
350a5(rgyud 'bum): de yang bsdu ba ni/ / sna yi rtse mo'i bar du gnas// de nas shin tu mnyam par gzhag/ gang yang rung ste bsgom bya ba// de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyis brtag pa'o// de nas de rnams
350a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying po 'di yin no/ / sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra s+pha ra Na/ saM ha Na badz+ra/ badz+ra hr-i da tiSh+Tha/ sems dpa' gang gi byams pa ni// mnyam 'gyur brtan pa chen po yis// sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// sems can kun la nges khyab
350a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// snying rje can ni gang yin pa// sems can kun don ldan pa yin// sgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya// kun kyang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pas nam mkha' bzhin//
350b1(rgyud 'bum): chos sam yang na chos ma yin// bsam pas khyab cing dga' bar 'gyur// gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// btang snyoms chen po gom
350b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// ma hA mai tri s+pha ra Na/ ma hA kA ru Na s+pha ra Na/ sar+b+ba bud+d+ha pra mo ha s+pha ra Na/ sar+b+ba satwAM saM bo d+ha ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa'i ye shes
