350b3(rgyud 'bum): bslab bo/ / nam mkha' yi ni phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// 'greng ngam yang na 'dug kyang rung // rdo rje'i dbyibs ni goms par bya// de bzhin du yang gnas kun tu// rdo rje phra mo sbyor ba yis//
350b4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bzhag pas snying khar ni// rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sgom// ji lta ba yi rim bzhin du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rje dbyibs chen po// gnas rnams kun tu bsgom par bya// rnam pa thams
350b5(rgyud 'bum): cad mchog ldan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi dus kun tu// ji lta ba yi go rims bzhin// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra mu khi b+ha ba/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa a be sha/
350b6(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra pA Ni d+hA ra sha ya swa ru baM/ bud+d+ha a nu smr-i ti A be sha/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis// zla ba'i dbyings su bdag nyid ni// byang chub sems kyis sgom pa'o// zla ba'i dkyil
350b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus su ni/ / bdag nyid rdo rje'i dbyibs gyur par// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// sems dpa'i rdo rje sgom pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// bdag nyid snying khar rdo rje sems// bdag nyid kyis
351a1(rgyud 'bum): ni bsgom bya ba/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sgom pa'o// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag nyid ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub
351a2(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa'o/ / de la snying po ni 'di rnams so// sa man+ta b+ha dra A be sha/ badz+ra satwa badz+ra A be sha/ badz+ra satwa sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na A be sha/ ta thA ga to haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid gsal
351a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ / bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sems can thams cad chags par byed// bdag ni rdo rje chen
351a4(rgyud 'bum): por mnyam/ / rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// gdon mi za bar 'jig rten 'gugs// bdag ni rdo rje chos dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam
351a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas/ / de yis 'jig rten thams cad 'jig/ bdag ni sna tshogs las dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// las rnams thams cad nges sgrub bo// de nas de bzhin
351a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ / rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku nyid du/ des ni
351a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ / de nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// snying khar rdo rje la sogs 'khor// bsgoms na rdo rje la sogs pas// rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed// de
351b1(rgyud 'bum): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ / rdo rje bcings las legs byung bar// bcu drug rnams su bshad pa ste// ting nge 'dzin ni dam tshig mchog/
351b2(rgyud 'bum): de rnams kyi ni bcings pa bshad// skyil mo krung 'dug gan rkyal du// g.yas bcus de bzhin slar bcus pa// snying khar gnas pa bzhi pa ste// rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro// dpral bar bzhag dang lhag
351b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / phrag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar// khar bzhag snying khar ral gri dang // snying khar rgyas dang kha nas dbyung // spyi bo thong ka khar bzhag pa// mdzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin// de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag
351b4(rgyud 'bum): rgya bslab par bya'o/ / Tak+ki/ za gra/ ma Ta/ a gra/ traM traM/ aM aM baM baM/ triT/ hrIHTa/ b+hai Ta/ kra sha/ ha ha/ ba ba ba~M ba~M/ phaT/ gra sa/ de nas chos kyi las kyi mchog/ phra mo'i rdo rje can rnams bsgrub// ye shes khu tshur
351b5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig las/ / gnyis su byas nas sbyar bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs
351b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes byin
351b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hA tu a nut+ta ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi
352a1(rgyud 'bum): g .yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
352a2(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a nut+ta ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa
352a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs shes bya ba'o ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di
352a4(rgyud 'bum): smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a nuSh+ka ra pU dza kar+m+ma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga
352a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma a nut+ta ra pU dza karmas
352a6(rgyud 'bum): ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje
352a7(rgyud 'bum): byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma a nut+ta ra pU dza rma s+pha ra Nas ma ye hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan
352b1(rgyud 'bum): ' das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
352b2(rgyud 'bum): zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings kun
352b3(rgyud 'bum): tu rgyas pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi bkod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rab 'byam sprin gyi rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnams su gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams sprin rgya mtsho
352b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
352b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sgrub pa dang / byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam
352b6(rgyud 'bum): panyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa dang / khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang / dam
352b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstan nas
353a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs so/ / mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang rang gi phyag rgya la gang gnyis kyis 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la cho ga bzhin du yang dag par
353a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas mchod pa bdag/ mchod pa kun ni byed pa yin/ gang phyir
353a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyid chen du/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis grub par mdzad// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdo rje'i bya ba zhes bya ba'i las
353a4(rgyud 'bum): / kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+ya ta na pU dza swa ra Na karma badz+ri Ni hUM A/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma gri dza/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na a nu rA ga pU
353a5(rgyud 'bum): dza s+pha ra Na karma b+ha Ne hUM ho/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza s+pha ra Na karma tuSh+Ti aH/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bde ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma
353a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed pa mo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po rnams so// oM na maHsa
353a7(rgyud 'bum): tathA ga ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badz+ra ma Ni oM/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta sUr+ye b+h+yo badz+ra te dzo ni dz+wa la hrIH/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga tA sha ba ri pU ra Ni tsan+ti ma Ni d+h+wa dza a gre b+h+yo badz+ra d+ha dza a gri trA~M/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga tam
353b1(rgyud 'bum): hA prI ti pra mo d+ya ka re b+h+yo badz+ra hA s+ye he/ dbang mo chen mo dang / snang ba chen mo dang / rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs ma dang / rab tu dga' zhing mgu ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i
353b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'o/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harmA tA sa mA d+hi b+hiHstu no mi ma hA d+har+m+ma gr-i hrIH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA na ri ha reHstu no mi ma hA g+ho ShA nu ge d+haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra ak+Sha raM ba ri bar+t+ta di sarba su
353b3(rgyud 'bum): / trAtAn+ta na yeHstu no mi sarba maN+Da le hUM/ oM sarba ti thA ga ta san+to b+ha Sha bud+d+ha saM gI ti b+hirga yaM/ sU no mi badz+ra bA tse baM/ ye shes chen mo'i klu dang / dbyangs chen mo'i rjes su 'brang ma dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug
353b4(rgyud 'bum): mame dang / sngags kyi spyod ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mchod pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha sA ra Na pU dza karma ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ka~M rika
353b5(rgyud 'bum): ri/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA A lo ke dz+wa la s+pha ra Na pU dza karma kA ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA gan+d+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ku ru ku ru/ sems can ma dang / byang chub chen po'i yan lag can ma dang / mig ldan ma dang /
353b6(rgyud 'bum): dri ldan ma rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi mchod pa'o// de nas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i las kyi dkyil
353b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rdo rje zhes bya ba bshad do/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje bya ba zhes kyang grags// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas
354a1(rgyud 'bum): sku rnams gzhag par bya/ / rdo rje sems la sogs tshul du// lha mo phyag rgya bcas pa bri// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad
354a2(rgyud 'bum): de/ de la dang po rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzhug par bya ba bcug nas kyang // 'di skad du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyis/ mchod pa
354a3(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug po 'di rnams khyod kyis nyin re zhing ci nus su gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ / de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan la thams cad kyi mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su sbyin no//
354a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod na gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas byang chub chen po'i sems sgrub pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems
354a5(rgyud 'bum): ni brtan bskyed pas/ / bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // dga' bas bdag ni mchod byed na// sangs rgyas kyi ni bde ba'ang 'thob// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam
354a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / 'phreng ba la sogs rab mchod pas// mchod na de ni dbang yang bskur// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // snyam pa'i glu yis rab mchod pas// mchod
354a7(rgyud 'bum): na bdag de mgu bar 'gyur/ / byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing // gar gyi mchod pas bdag mchod na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de mchod 'gyur// de la snying po
354b1(rgyud 'bum): / ni 'di rnams yin no// bud+d+ha At+ma kohaM/ bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsA mi/ bud+d+ha sU ti ka ro mi/ bud+d+ha pU dza ka ro mi/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje/
354b2(rgyud 'bum): yi// mchog gi tshul gyis phyag 'tshal zhing // de bzhin sangs rgyas rtag mchod na// rtag tu phyag byar 'os par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// rjes
354b3(rgyud 'bum): su yi rang bas mchod na/ / myur du sangs rgyas 'thob par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// lha rdzas kyi ni bdag dbul ba'i// mchod pa kun gyis sangs rgyas rnams// mchod na de yang mchod
354b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni// yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yi// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//
354b5(rgyud 'bum): praN+Da mi nuta mo de bud+d+ha pU dza pa ri nA ma/ de nas chos kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ngo bo nyid kyis gzod nas dag/ chos 'di dag gis mchod pas ni/
354b6(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi// a zhes bya ba sgo zhes brjod// chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// de yi sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// 'dir ni chos rnams thams
354b7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi/ / chu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste// dam chos 'khor lo'i mchod pa yis// mchod pas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// sgra brnyan dag dang 'drar bshad de//
355a1(rgyud 'bum): / chos kyi mchod pa 'di dag gis// mchod na sangs rgyas gsung yang 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// sarba shud+d+ha sa man+ta d+hA dra/ d+har+m+ma tsakra niSh+Ta pany+dza/
355a2(rgyud 'bum): nas ting nge 'dzin gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// rdo rje'i dbyings su bsgoms na ni// rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du thob/
355a3(rgyud 'bum): lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams// sangs rgyas kun tu bsgoms na ni// chos kyi skur ni myur du 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi lus ni phra me rnams//
355a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms na ni// rdo rje sems dpar mnyam par 'gyur// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi// rang gi lus ni phra mo rnams// sangs rgyas kyi ni skur bsgoms na// rdzogs pa
355a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ / de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra kA ya/ d+har+m+ma k+Sha ya// satwa kA ya/ bud+d+ha kA ya/ de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya u0f7f/
355a6(rgyud 'bum): rang byung la ni las kun gyis// 'khyud pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni// phul na rdo rje sems dpa'i dang // 'dra bar de ni myur du 'gyur// shin tu chags par sbyor ba yis// dam du bzung ba'i bde ba ni//
355a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams la phul gyur na// rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur// shin tu dga' zhing bde chags pas// brtan par gyur pa'i mchod bde bas// sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni// rdo rje chos dang 'dra
355b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// kun tu sbyor ba'i bde ba ni// mchod pa'i phyir ni phul bas na// rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag gi gsang ba'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no// ra ti badz+ra/ rA
355b2(rgyud 'bum): ga badz+ra/ pra ti badz+ra/ karma badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'phrin las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab par bya ste// snying kha rtsib logs rgyab sbyor ba// dpral ba la sogs de bzhin
355b3(rgyud 'bum): du/ kha dang rna ba mgo lhag pa// spyi bo phrag pa kha rked gzhag/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje bcings
355b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dam byas la/ / snying kha la sogs gnas tshul dra// bzhag nas rgyal ba rnams mchod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// oM kra sa s+ya
355b5(rgyud 'bum): sA tri raM kr-i na khaM shaM hUM hUM sha no shI sAM/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las// rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje
355b6(rgyud 'bum): las zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin
355b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rtog pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
356a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta muSh+Ti baM/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

356a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgya

356a7(rgyud 'bum): grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i
356b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir de bzhin pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra karma muSh+Ti haM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyi rlabs kyis bcom ldan
356b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dum bu'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad
356b3(rgyud 'bum): bsdu ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje dngos grub ces kyang
356b4(rgyud 'bum): grabs/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas rab tu bri bar bya// thog mar sangs rgyas gzugs bzhag ste// de nas phyag rgya bzhi yang bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje'i phyag rgya la
356b5(rgyud 'bum): sogs bri/ / de nas rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ de bzhin du bcud de 'di skad smra bar bya'o// khyod kyis gsang ba'i le'u 'di su

356b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su brtson 'grus chung bas mi 'jug ste/ de dag gi don du rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gsheg/
357a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig tu gyur pa 'di ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba

357a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches shing ma dad par ma byed cig/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / yi dgas kyi khams su lhung bar gyur pa 'am/ mi bde
357a4(rgyud 'bum): ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la/ gdong g.yogs bkrol te dkyil 'khor bstan to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig smos shig/
357a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po gang gang gi/ phyag rgya gang dang gang bcings pa// bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni// der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya// ye shes 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rje gsung ba bzhin/
357a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya kun// de dag kun gyis grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bya'o// rang gi dbang po gshibs nas ni// rdo rje bcings pas gzung bar
357a7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa// de ma thag tu de dbang bskur// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi chos nyid brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyor la// ye shes phyag rgya bcing bar bya// cho ga 'di yi
357b1(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis ni/ / ye shes phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya kun gyi las brjod par bya'o// glu dang gar dang zas dang bro// spyod pa la sogs bde ba rnams// sangs rgyas rnams la phral na ni//
357b2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur nas// dkar por gyur pa'i ras
357b3(rgyud 'bum): la gnas/ / mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs te// bdag nyid rdo rje dbyangs su sgom// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te// gung mo myu gu bzhin du gshibs// mthe'u chung dang ni mdzub rtse sgreng // dam
357b4(rgyud 'bum): tshig mchog gi dam tshig go/ / rdo rje phra mo'i tshul du ni// rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom// rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor de// ting 'dzin dbang du 'gyur ba'i tshul// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la/
357b5(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis rdo rje dam du gzung // mdzub mo'i mthe'u chung bsnol ba ni// rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor lo// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bslabs
357b6(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/ / rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du mi g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
357b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du rang rang gi phyag rgya rnams su bris na dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub bo/ / de ltar ras dang / rtsig pa dang / nam mkha' dang / gnas thams cad du bris na dngos grub
358a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub bo/ / dkyil 'khor brtag pa nas brtsams te la la ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa nyid kyi tshe ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub// la la ni de nas brtsams nas nyin zhag
358a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig gis/ / la la ni nyi ma bzhis/ la la ni zhag bcu drug gis/ la la ni mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'ang ji ltar 'dod pa bde blag tu don thams cad byed cing thams cad rjes su dga' ba dang / ro dang //
358a3(rgyud 'bum): zas dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams myong bar byed bzhin du yang lo gcig gis mchog 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
358a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa
358a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra satwa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems
358a6(rgyud 'bum): can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa
358a7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par bya ba'i bar du theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje sems
358b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i zhes kyang bzhad/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya// de nas dgug pa dang gzhug pa la
358b2(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes rnams bskyed par bya'o// de la thog mar 'di skad du khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang khong du ma chud pa
358b3(rgyud 'bum): su la'ang gsang ba 'di ma smra zhig/ khyod ngan song thams cad du lhung ba 'am mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub dam pa sgrub
358b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ye shes bslab bo/ / zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste/ phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung bas// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ni// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor thams
358b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig ye shes bslab bo/ / 'dod chags bral ba'i sdig lta bu// khams gsum na yang gzhan med de// de bas 'dod la chags bral bar// khyod ni nam yang ma byed cig/ ma hA/
358b6(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya ha na phaT/ ces mna'i snying po sbyin no// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams su dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i
358b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi bcing ba bslab par bya'o/ / dngos grub kyang de bzhin no// ri mo la sogs pa dang lugs ma'i sku gzugs thams cad la'ang ji ltar 'dod par cho ga bzhin du byas na dngos
359a1(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas par bya ba ji lta ba bzhin du'ang bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
359a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje chen po la rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po
359a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dis legs par gsol to/ / oM/ lags so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// re
359a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / / theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan gyis kyang // dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dag par
359a5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas bsgrubs na ni/ / sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde bar 'grub// rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas ni// 'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub pas ni// bde ba mi zad med mi 'gyur// de
359a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i rtogs pa'i rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba
359a7(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / // bam po bzhi pa// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus par gyur te/ bcom
359b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje mgon po rab sgrub mdzad/
359b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od // rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po// rdo rje ral gri mchog chen po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog/ spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
359b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las dang srung ba che// gnod sbyin gtum pa gdon chen po// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che// phyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang byang chub che// sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin
359b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs/ / rdo rje'i ye shes ye shes che// theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// don kun gyi ni de nyid don// sems can don chen kun rig pa// kun mkhyen kun byas thams cad de// kun gzigs khyod la
359b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang // dam tshig chen po de nyid don// sems chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che// rab tu dga' ba 'od chen po/
359b6(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje 'od dang 'od snang ba// sangs rgyas 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje mchog/ rig mchog mchog dang mi yi mchog/ rdo rje dam pa mchod chen mchog/ rig mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal
359b7(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / rdo rje dbyings dang gsang ba che// rdo rje gsang ba rab gsang 'chang // rdo rje phra ba bsam gtan che// rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje mchog/ sangs
360a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che/ / sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che// sems dpa
360a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rab mchod pa/ / thabs chen dang ni dngos grub che// rdo rje sgrub khyod phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs te// de zhin gshegs
360a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems chen po/ / rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan// sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes// rnam par snang mdzad re dang khyab// ston zhi khre la phyag
360a4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / de zhin gshegs pa de nyid che// yang dag mtha' dang che ba'i tshul// pha rol phyin pa kun mkhyen pa// don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang dang spyod pa mchog/ bdud dang bdud
360a5(rgyud 'bum): ni ra ba 'dul ba/ / kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen// kun tu 'gro khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas hUM zhes hUM zhes pa// rdo rje huM zhes 'dul ba po// rdo rje tham cad rdo rje mchog/ phyag na
360a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ / phyag rgya mchod cing rjed pa dang // rim gror de bzhin gshegs pas bya// gang phyir rdo rje sems brtan pas// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes khyod bya// rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rab lus
360a7(rgyud 'bum): kun gzigs yab ni khyod yin te/ / byung ba dang ni 'byung 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// rab tu mos pas bstod byed cing // glu blangs gang
360b1(rgyud 'bum): zhig mchod byed pa/ / de ni rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir// rang gi rigs ni skyed par mdzod//
360b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gtso bo phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i tshig thos nas rdo rje de bdag nyid kyi snying khar zhag ste// de bzhin gshegs pa de
360b3(rgyud 'bum): ngag thams cad bos nas 'di skad gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'tshal to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa// ci'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dzin pas smras pa
360b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bas gdul bar mi sdod pa de dag la bdag gis ji ltar
360b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par gyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ti
360b6(rgyud 'bum): denge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam par spros pa nyid kyi/ ri rab
360b7(rgyud 'bum): ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
361a1(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i dpal gyi be'ur zhugs so/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
361a2(rgyud 'bum): thugs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su bslab pa dang / phan pa dang /
361a3(rgyud 'bum): bde ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te/ de
361a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs khro bo'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par gzhugs so/ / snyom par zhugs ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
361a5(rgyud 'bum): thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo / / hUMHde nas de phyung ma thag tu phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i rdo rje las bcom
361a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer can/ smin ma bcus shing da pral ba bsnyer ba/ mche ba lha ger byung zhing gtsigs pa/ rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa
361a7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa rdo rje me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon cha lag na thogs pa/ rnam pa du ma'i kha dog dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi cha lugs can phyag na rdo rje'i sku byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu ma rungs pa thams
361b1(rgyud 'bum): cad gdul ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs kun tu rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma thab/
361b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'dul ba yi/ thabs chen ldan pa bdag yin te// gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir// dri ma med pa'i khro gnyer rab// de nas de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin
361b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas/ / de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/
361b4(rgyud 'bum): / bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rigs pa'i cho ga 'di smras pa/ oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha hUM/ grih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn badz+ra
361b5(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjer gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa byang
361b6(rgyud 'bum): / chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad byin gyis rlabs te spyan drangs nas/ rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste dam tshig gis bcings nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres
361b7(rgyud 'bum): te rdo rje khro bo chen po'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar 'dug ste ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o byang chub sems 'di ni// kun tu zang zhing sdig
362a1(rgyud 'bum): med de/ gang phyir sems can 'dul don du// khro bo yang ni yid 'ong gyur// de nas rdo rje khro bo chen po'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas babs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
362a2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis dgug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
362a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // hUM Tak+ki dza/ de nas de byung ma
362a4(rgyud 'bum): thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams sprin rgya che thams cad na/ 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jig rten thams cad na gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba
362a5(rgyud 'bum): ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lugs kyus bkug nas ri rab ri gang na ba dang / rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu
362a6(rgyud 'bum): brtsegs pa gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa thams cad du bskor nas 'khod par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje rang
362a7(rgyud 'bum): gis thug+sa ka nas rdo rje de blangs te gsor zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum ji srid pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo la bltas te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / grogs po rnams
362b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la nga'i bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di bskad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
362b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// skyabs su 'gro ba grub par byos// kun mkhyen ye shes thob pa'i phyir// grogs po rnams kyis sgrub par byos// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams
362b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po lha chen po 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag par gyur pas dregs te cher khros pas ston cing 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye gnod sbyin nga ni 'jig rten
362b4(rgyud 'bum): gsum po mtha' dag gi gtse bo/ / dbang phyug chen po// byed pa po/ 'jigs pa po/ 'byung po thams cad kyi dbang po/ lha'i lha chen po yin na/ gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag ci'i phyir nyan/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes
362b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gsor zhing bka' stsal pa/ kye sems can ma rungs pa dkyil 'khor du myur du zhugs la nga'i dam tshig la gnas par gyis shig/ de nas lha chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
362b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can dbang phyug chen po la de skad bka' stsol ba 'di su zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi tshogs thams
362b7(rgyud 'bum): cad dang ldan pa la bos te 'di skad gsungs so/ / grogs po rnams dkon mchog gsum la bskabs su 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa la sgrub par gyis shig/ phyag na rdo rje 'di gnod sbyin khro bo ma
363a1(rgyud 'bum): rungs pa gtum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste/ rdo rje 'bar bas khyed khams gsum po 'di dag thams cad brlag par byas sa re/ de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum
363a2(rgyud 'bum): po mtha' dag gi dbang por gyur pa dang rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor mang po dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs pa bstan pa'i phyir khro zhing gtum pa chen po rab tu 'jigs pa'i
363a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing ma rungs pa chen pos rtag tu dgod pa rnams bstan nas 'di skad smras so/ / kye nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gis bdag po bas khyod kyis nga la ci'i phyir bka' stsal/
363a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje de snyems pa dang bcas pas gsor zhing 'dzum ste 'di bskad ces smras so// kyes lus srul po mi'i sha za ba/ zas su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing / kha zas dang / mal dang /
363a5(rgyud 'bum): gos kyang de las byed pa nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shig/ de nas lha chen po dbang phyug chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang nam mkha' rnams khro bo chen po chen pos non par byin gyis brlabs te 'di
363a6(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / khyod kyang nga'i bka' nyon la dam tshig kyang long zhig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha chen po zhe
363a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i lha 'di ni rang gis 'tshal ba'i stobs kyis dregs pa dang dbang phyug chen po'i dbang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par mi 'atub na/ de la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/
363b1(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig dran par byas so// oM suM b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje/
363b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i snying po 'di brjod do// hUMHde nas de brjod ma thag tu khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po thams cad kha sbub tu 'gyel te nyam thag pa'i/
363b3(rgyud 'bum): tshig 'byin cing / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo // lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha de ni sa la 'gyel te dran pa med par gyur te shi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/ byang
363b4(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / phyag na rdo rje 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin pa byos te ma bsad cig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i
363b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas/ lha thams cang bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so// gal te khyed rang gi srog 'dod na sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dgen 'dun la skyabs
363b6(rgyud 'bum): su deng la nga'i bka' yang nyon cig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dgen 'dun phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la skyabs su mchi'o// khyod kyis bstan pa'i
363b7(rgyud 'bum): bka' ni bdag cag gis ma 'tshal to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye lha rnams 'di ni nged de bzhin gshegs
364a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
364a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi thu bo bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ste/ sems cad thams cad gdul ba'i don bya ba'i phyir khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bkur ba'o// de ci'i phyir
364a3(rgyud 'bum): zhe na/ khyed kyi nang na'ang lha chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can yod de/ de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pas sdig pa las bzlog par mi spyod pa'i sdig
364a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems can de rnams tshar can pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so/ / de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig par bka' stsal to// de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
364a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag cag srog yal ba las bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag kyang bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyid cing mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ kye grog po rnams 'di nyid la skyabs su dong dang /
364a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid kyis kun tu skyob kyis/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin no// de nas khams gsum kun nas 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag ga la ba de logs su bltas nas nyams
364a7(rgyud 'bum): zag pa chen po'i sgra mgrin gcig tu phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun tu sgrub par gsol/ de bar gshegs pa kun tu bskyabs par gsol/
364b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar
364b2(rgyud 'bum): par byas nas khyed thams cad kyang thal bar byas sa re/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa/ zhi ba/ dul ba/ sems
364b3(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag sreg par 'gyur/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de
364b4(rgyud 'bum): dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kye grogs po dag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa de'i phyir nga ni kun tu bzang po ste/ khyed lta bu'i sems can ma rungs pa'i ngang tshul can sdig/
364b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir gal te nga'i dam tshig la mi gnas na chung bzan par bya'o// gsol pa/ de bzhin du 'gyi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa'i lha de
364b6(rgyud 'bum): dag gzhan dbugs dbyung zhing bslang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smras so/ / oM badz+rod tiSh+Tha/ de nas de skad smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs par khams
364b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kun brgyal ba las sems dbugs byung ste/ lha'i bde ba myong zhing 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang ba spu lang ba med par gyur nas/
365a1(rgyud 'bum): / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la lta zhing langs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang po lha
365a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'di ma bslang na 'di'i srog de chung gzan par gyur te ci rung / gsos na ni de'ang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas shi ba gso ba'i snying po 'di smras so// badz+ra
365a3(rgyud 'bum): yu Na/ de nas 'di smras ma thag tu lha chen po lha'i bdag po shi ba las sos te ldang 'dod na ldang ni ma nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das padage 'di lta bu'i
365a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dul lam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod skyes bu chen po 'di'i bka' nyan par mi 'jug na khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi/ nga ma yin no// dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa/ ci bcom
365a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das khyod kyis ma rungs pa'i sems can 'di las skyabs mdzad par mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas di bskyab mi nus so// gsol pa/ ci'i slad du/ bka' stsal pa/
365a6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis ma 'tshal to// ji ltar zhe na/ khams gsum gyi dag
365a7(rgyud 'bum): po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na 'di su lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ yang lha chen po/
365b1(rgyud 'bum): la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye ma rungs pa'i sems can nga'i bka' mi nyan tam/ de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas 'khrugs shing khros par gyur to// de ltar 'gyel bzhin
365b2(rgyud 'bum): du'ang 'jig pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te 'di skad ces smras so/ / nga shi bar bzod kyi/ khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rab tu khros par ston cing rang gi rkang
365b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mthil nas rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa 'di phyung ngo / / oM pa ta ka ri Sha na badz+ra hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthil nas kun tu 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i snying po khro gnyer byas pa/ mche ba lhag ger phyung
365b4(rgyud 'bum): ba/ gdong chen po'i rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byang nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar bka' nyan cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po sbyang ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs
365b5(rgyud 'bum): so oM pa ta ka ri Sha Na badz+ra hUM/ oM pa ta ka re She/ sarba badz+ra d+ha ra a nu tsa ra ka ta badz+ra hUM dza/ de skad gsungs pa dang / lha chen po dang lha mo u mar bcas te rkang pa gyen khar bstan nas gcer bur byung ste/ skye bo zam
365b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis gad mos btab cing rkang pas 'gugs pa rdo rjes rjes su spyod pas bkug ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
365b7(rgyud 'bum): po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can ma rungs pa mchis brang dang bcas pa 'di ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
366a1(rgyud 'bum): / oM badz+ra kra ma ho/ de nas de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g.yon pas mnan/ zhabs g.yas pas u
366a2(rgyud 'bum): ma'i nu ma'i steng du mnan nas rang gi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra A be sha ha na pa taM traT/ de nas de smas ma thag tu lha chen po la babs nas rang gi lag pa stong gis rang gi gdong stong la 'tshog go// de nas rdo rje'i nor/
366a3(rgyud 'bum): bu rin po che'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i phyi rol na srid pa gsum po thams cad kyis nged kyi dbang po de bdag nyid chen po des btul lo zhes sgra chen po phyung
366a4(rgyud 'bum): ngode nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM bud+d+ha me tri badz+ra rak+Sha haM/ de nas de skad gsungs ma thag tu lha
366a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po la babs pa'i sdug bsngal de kun zhi bar gyur te/ de'ang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas de ba bla na med pa 'grub pa'i dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar par dang / gzungs dang /
366a6(rgyud 'bum): ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa thob nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to// de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs
366a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste/ lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phul nas 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis
366b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i
366b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs par skyes so/ / de nas lha chen po'i lus de las ched du brjod pa 'di byung ngo // e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// yi ge'i tshig gis mnan nas su// mya
366b3(rgyud 'bum): ngan las ni 'das par bzhag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa mthu chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad la 'di skad ces bka'
366b4(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs shig/ zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsungs shig/ de dag/
366b5(rgyud 'bum): gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa de rnams bos te 'di skad ces gsung/
366b6(rgyud 'bum): so grogs po rnams yang gsum la skyabs su 'dong ba dang / bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa gzung la nga'i dam tshig la'ang gnas par gyis shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ de bzhin du 'tshal na/
366b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang dam tshig glo bar ma chud do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam tshig 'di byin no// byang chub sems ni rim bzhin du/ bskyed nas de yi 'og tu ni// byang chub chen por
367a1(rgyud 'bum): ci nus par/ / shin tu mnyam gzhag 'bad par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams 'jug pa'i dam tshig chen po'i
367a2(rgyud 'bum): / phyag rgya bcing ba byas nas/ dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis 'ching du gzhug go// oM badz+ra sa ma ya grih+Na staM ban d+ha sa ma ya/ badz+ra satwa sa ma yaM/ a nu sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dri D+heMm
367a3(rgyud 'bum): b+ha baHs+thi ro me b+hA ba/ A hA d+yo me b+ha ba/ a pra tit+ta Do me b+ha ba/ sarba karma su tsa me tsat+ta shre yaM/ ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ de nas 'di smras ma thag tu khams gsum gyi srid pa gsum gyi skye bo 'dus pa thams cad rdo rje khro
367a4(rgyud 'bum): bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya lag tu babs nas dam du 'ching bar gyur to/ / de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas dkyil khor chen po thams cad go rims bzhin du bstan te rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas
367a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur nas/ rdo rje'i mtshan ma'ang lag tu byin nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la bkod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po thams
367a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ming rnams yin ste/ 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o// mthu bo che ni sgyu ma'i rdo rje'o// sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o// tshangs pa ni thub pa'i rdo rje'o// dbang po ni rdo rje tshon cha ste/ rig pa'i rgyal
367a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams su dbang skur ro/ / de nas bar snang la spyod pa'i bdag po rnams la rjes su byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyi ma ni rdo rje 'khyil ba'o// zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do// dbyig pa chen po'i gtso bo ni dbyig pa'o// sar sA
367b1(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje ser smag ste/ de la sogs pa rdo rje khro bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ sbrang rtsis myos pa ni rdo rje glang po'i sna'o// sbrang rtsir byed pa
367b2(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje 'phreng ba'o/ / rgya ba ni rdo rje dbang po'o// rgyal bar byed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas sa bla'i dbang po thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ mdzod
367b3(rgyud 'bum): skyong ni rdo rje thob pa'o/ / me ni rdo rje me'o// rlung ni rdo rje rlung ngo // ku be ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa'o// de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nyar dbang bskur ro// de nas sa 'og gi dbang po lha thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje lcag kyu'o//
367b4(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje ni rdo rje dus so// gtsug pungs ni rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'o// ba ru Na ni klu'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran zhes bya ba'i dbang bskur ro// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i lha mo thams cad rdo rje rim
367b5(rgyud 'bum): po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma la rdo rjer byin gyis rlabs nas rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la rab tu bskod do//
367b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ u ma ni khro bo rdo rje ma'o// rug mi n+ye ni rdo rje ser ro// ShaSh+Ta ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o// tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ba ma'o// dbang mo ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje rgyal mor dbang bskur ro// de nas bar snang
367b7(rgyud 'bum): la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ mi 'chi ba ni rdo rje mi 'chi ba'o// ro hin ni rdo rje mngangs so// dbyig pa 'dzin ma ni rdo rje dbyig mchog ma'o// skye ba 'phrog ma ni rdo rje skyeng 'ching ma ste/ de la sogs
368a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni khro mo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro/ / de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje 'ju ma'o// za ba ma ni rdo rje zab mo'o// bgo ba ni rdo rje bsgo
368a2(rgyud 'bum): mo'o/ dga' ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo // de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso bor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ zhi ba mo ni rdo rje pho nya mo'o// rlung ni mgyogs ma'i rdo rje ma'o// me ni rdo
368a3(rgyud 'bum): rje 'bar ba ma'o/ / ku be ra ma ni rdo rje 'bar ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mor dbang skur ro// de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ phag mo ni rdo rje'i kha'o// tsa mun tri ni rdo rje'i dus
368a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / sna tshad ma ni rdo rje rul pa me'o// ba ru na ma ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/ rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams
368a5(rgyud 'bum): bskyed nas phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad bslabs te/ rdo rje dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no// rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni// rigs rnams myur du
368a6(rgyud 'bum): thal bar byed/ / oM han sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ de nas snying po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di byin no// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni/ gcu zhing phyir yang gcu bar bya/
368a7(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa'i don sems gang yin pa/ de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni// dgos pa 'grub phyir 'dug par byos// khyod kyi srog ni ma rung bar// dam tshig 'dis ni gyur ta re// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/
368b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo 'gug nas rab tu mnan// mthe bong gnyis ka mtshams sbyor bas// gung mo gnyis ka rab tu mnan// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcing ba las// gal te 'ga' yis
368b2(rgyud 'bum): bcings gyur na/ / dam tshig 'dis ni khyed gsod do// rdo rje phu rgya gnyis ka yis// mthe'u chung sor mo bcings nas ni/ mdzub mo sor rgyab nas ni mdung // bzlog ste mgo bor gzhag par bya// bdag nyid
368b3(rgyud 'bum): che ba'i dam tshig 'di/ / rdo rje rig 'dzin bcing nas ni// khros te gang la bltas pa yi// de yi mdun du de bzhin 'drag/ rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje yi// srung ba dam bcings mnan pa ni// de ni gsang ba'i dam
368b4(rgyud 'bum): tshig ste/ / sems can thams cad srung ba'o// gang zhig gang la bskyabs pa'i phyir// khro bor ldan pas bcings na ni// sems can gang la srung ba yi// de yi rgyab tu 'dug par spyos// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis
368b5(rgyud 'bum): bcings te/ / g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// mthe'u chung gis ni dam par byas// gdu zhing slar gcu drag bkrol nas// spyi bor mnyam zhugs gang yin pa'i// dam tshig 'di yang sbyar byas na// khyed kyi nga
368b6(rgyud 'bum): yi mdun du ni/ / dngos grub kun gyi mchog phyir khong // rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni/ mdzub mo gnyis ka dam por bya// mthe bong gung mo'i rtse mo gnyis// rdo rje'i phyag rgyar bcings nas kyang // bzlog ste dpral bar gzhags
368b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gal te gsod par 'dod ni ni/ gug par bya ba gang yin pa// de yi mdun du rtag tu 'dug/ de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di yin te/
369a1(rgyud 'bum): oM ba li to ba li ta badz+ra A karA ya hUM dzadzaH/ rdo rje gcu ba'i phyag rgya lha dgug pa'i snying po'o/ hUM badz+ra a gra dI pa ya sa ma ye huM/ bar snang nas spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra mA la a gra
369a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba can rnams kyi'o/ / oM badz+ra ban+d+ha haM/ sa la spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra pA tA la b+hany+dza b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM he ru ka badz+ra sa ma ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu dra b+hany+dza ka hUM
369a3(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ bud med thams cad kyi'o// de na bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba por
369a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur na/ bcings pa'i dkyil khor ma rungs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba legs par bka' stsal par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsan nas di skad ces bka' stsal to//
369a5(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa ma ya A
369a6(rgyud 'bum): karA ya sarba maN+Da lam badz+ra d+ha ra sad t+ya mA ti kra mA hUM phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis bcings te// snying khar yongs su bskor bar bya// mdzub gnyis lcag kyu'i phyi rol gyi// dkyil 'khor 'gugs po mchog yin no// de nas
369a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di bshad ma thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol kun tu bskor te 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces gsungs so//
369b1(rgyud 'bum): kye grogs po dag sro gcod pa dag spang zhing dam tshig gzung ba la sgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi sems can de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
369b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba ma rungs pa'i sems can lags pas mdangs 'phrog pa la srog ltos na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar 'tsho bar bgyi ba de bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
369b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje sa ma rungs pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so/ / oM duSh+Ta badz+ra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+han sa ya bi ka ra sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA maN+Da la/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ mar dmar da/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man+ta badz+ra sa ma ya
369b4(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ rdo rje khro mdzub legs par ni/ sen mo sprad de dkris nas kyang / rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba/ phyag rgya 'di ni ma rungs 'joms/ de nas 'di smras ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad gcig
369b5(rgyud 'bum): tu 'dras pa rnam pa du mas gtse zhing dpral ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa'ang dral te/ ma rungs pa'i dam tshig gi sems can de rnams yi bsregs shin tu bcos pas 'o dod char 'bod cing 'phongs pa'i sgra
369b6(rgyud 'bum): cher phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ga la ba der thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag srog dang mi dpral bar skyabs mdzad du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes
369b7(rgyud 'bum): yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
370a1(rgyud 'bum): oM ni suM b+ha ha na da ha pa tsa gr-ih+Na b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje khro bo mi bzad pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma hA badz+ra khur kro d+ha pa ta ye sarba duSh+Ta maN+Da laM/ bi nA sha ya
370a2(rgyud 'bum): sarba duSh+Ta sa ma yaM b+hik+ka ra bid+h+wa na sa ya s+pho Ta ya b+hany+dza ya sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA ban+d+ha gr-i hA ha na da ha pa tsa sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya satwaM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas gsungs ma thag tu ma rungs pa'i dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang /
370a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang gcig tu gyur nas rgya mtsho chen por lhung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag
370a4(rgyud 'bum): la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig ces bka' stsal na/ 'phra men ma dang gdon la sogs pa gnod pa de dag thams cad la bdag gis ji ltar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
370a5(rgyud 'bum): stsal to/ / oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so//
370a6(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya shI g+h+raM sarba duSh+Ta gra haM/ badz+ra d+ha ra satwa na hUM dza/ de nas de smras ma thag tu 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol bskor te 'khod do// de nas byang chub
370a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ 'phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye bzod ldan rnams srog gcod pa spang ba'i bslab pa dang / dam tshig
370b1(rgyud 'bum): zhe dang / sdom pa gzung bar byos shig/ rdo rje 'od 'phro ba dang / rab tu 'bar ba dang / gcig pu 'bar bar gyur pas khyed kyi rigs rnams ma lus par bsregs sa re/ de nas pa phra men ma la sogs pa'i gdon
370b2(rgyud 'bum): ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba na ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ de
370b3(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / phyag na rdo rje sems can 'di dag rnams la snying rje chen po skyed la thabs sbyin pa sgrub par gyis shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs
370b4(rgyud 'bum): rje chen pos sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang snying po 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hri da ya mA karA ya/ yad t+ye yaM mA ma d+hA ra d+he na mi ya te/ tad+ya s+ya hr-i da yaM ni skra
370b5(rgyud 'bum): mi du sa ma ya hUM dza/ de nas de'i grwab rgya bcing ba bshad do// snying khar rdo rje lag ngar gnyis// shin tu dam por bcings nas ni// rdo rje badzub mo'i rtse mo yis// rang gi chan khung drud par bya// khyed rnams
370b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis phyag rgya 'dis sems can thams cad kyi snying rus la zo zhig/ de nas 'phra men ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad dga' ba'i sgra phyung nas mchod rgal te rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de nas
370b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba lags par bdag la bka'
371a1(rgyud 'bum): stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das rims la sogs pa'i nad de rnams la ji ltar bgyi/ bdag la bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM hUM phaT/
371a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rims la gsogs pa'i nad 'gug pa'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya/ A na ya sarba duSh+Ta dzA rA d+hanA sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma
371a3(rgyud 'bum): thag tu rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do/ / de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ rims la sogs pa'i nad 'di rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal ta/
371a4(rgyud 'bum): kye bzod ldan rnams sems can gsod pa las ldog pa'i bslab pa zung ba'i sdom pa long shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdangs phrogs te 'tshor bar gyis
371a5(rgyud 'bum): na/ da bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ji ltar bgyi/ legs par bka' stsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnam par dag par gyur pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di
371a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra karma bi sho d+ha ya sarba a ba ra NA ni bud+d+ha sa t+ye na sa ma ya huM/ de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas kyang // mthe bong bsnyams
371a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar nas ni/ / mnan pa 'di ni sdig 'phrog pa// phyag rgya 'di rims la sogs pa'i nad thams cad kyis gang btab pa la las byas la bston na de khyed rnams kyis thong zhig/ khyad dag srog dang bral la re/ de nas
371b1(rgyud 'bum): de rnams de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol te slar dong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag
371b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba dang las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spang ba'i slad du nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung na/ de la bcom ldan 'das sems can dmyal ba la gsogs pa ngan song de rnams thams cad ji
371b3(rgyud 'bum): ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM kA pa ya badz+ra swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ngu 'bod la sogs pa ngan song gi 'gro ba'i 'khor
371b4(rgyud 'bum): lo thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / oM sarba a pa ya A ka rA Ni bi sho d+ha na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu ngu 'bod chen po la sogs pa ngan song na gnas pa rnams ri rab kyi ril
371b5(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo'i phyi rol du bskor te 'khod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ ngan song gi sar ltung ba'i sems can de dag thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye bzod ldan rnams
371b6(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa dang / ngan song thams cad las thar pa'i phyag rgya dang snying po zung zhig/ de nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
371b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das bdag cag sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba 'di las skyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / khyod la skyabs su mchi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes ngan
372a1(rgyud 'bum): song thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra pA Ni bo s+pho Ta ya sarba a pa ya ban+d+han ni pra mo kA ya/ sarbA pA ya ga tib+h+yaHsarba satwAM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra
372a2(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya tra Ta/ de nas de'i phya rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas te// gung mo gnyis ka sbyar nas su// tha ma bzhi ni rtse mor sbyar// sdig pa 'joms par grag pa yin// de nas ngan
372a3(rgyud 'bum): song gsum gyi khor lo na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di mthong nas ngan song thams cad nas shi 'phos nas/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes so//

372b1(rgyud 'bum): sha ya bi nI sha ya/ ha ha ha ha hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de thos nas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba

372b5(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra sa ma ya sU traM/ mA ti kra ma ho/ gru bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhir gdod// rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// dar dang 'phreng bas shin tu brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa rnams su//

374b2(rgyud 'bum): bsdu na de ni ji ltar bgyi ba bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes byas nas/ rdo rje khro bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya rang gi snying khar ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/ rdo rje lcug kyu la sogs pas las byas nas/
