377a5(rgyud 'bum): bapa yis ni srung bar byed/ / khro bo gnon sbyin dgra yang za// khro bo khu tshur dngos grub ster// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje gnyis su gyur pa ni// dam tshigs
377a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu grag pa yin/ / de dag bcing ba bshad par bya// khro bo bcing ba bla na med// lag par rdo rjer byas nas su// mthe'u chung lcags kyur bcing bar bya// mdzub mo gnyis kyis
377a7(rgyud 'bum): bsdigs pa ni/ / 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// de bzhin mdzub mo nges sbyar te// nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgugs// gung mo mnyam bsgreng pad+mor bya// gung mo mdzub me gnyis
377b1(rgyud 'bum): kas bsdigs/ / mdzub mo gnyis ka rdo rjer bya// g.yas pa lpags kyus dgug par bya// de nyid hUM zhes bya bas 'dung // legs pa sbyin pa de yin te// mdzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer ma
377b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhag snying khar mdzub mo nyi mas bskor/ / lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor gzhag/ mdzub mo kha nas dgod ltar bya// mdzub mo sen mo sbyar ba ste// g.yas pa ral gri bcings pa'o// gung
377b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mnyam bsgreng 'khor lo yi/ / kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang // mdzub mo gung mo rdo rjer sbyar// mdzub mo yis ni mgul par bskor// mdzub mo gnyis ni mche ba che// mdzub mo bkug pas
377b4(rgyud 'bum): rdorje bcings/ / rdo rje lA s+ye la sogs pa// sems ma'i phyag rgya de nyid hUM// zhes bya chos kyi phyag rgya ste// hUM zhes bya bar lhan cig go/ de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad //
377b5(rgyud 'bum): hA ni sangs rgyas rdo rje yi// tra nI rdo rje snying po yi// hriHni rdo rje sde yi'o// a ni rdo rje thams cad kyi// hU~M he/ traM/ dz+rarmAHhed+ha pa/ d+he ka d+hi hU~M/ waM/ kri ba~M/ t+yai AH/ rdo rje khro bo mang po yi// chos kyi phyag rgya rab
377b6(rgyud 'bum): 'grub pa'o/ / de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// rdo rje rigs ni chen po yi// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul gyis// khro bo khu tshur gnyis su shad
377b7(rgyud 'bum): gang dang gang gis phyag rgya rnams/ / las kyi phyogs ni gang du bya// de dang der ni bsgyur nas kyang // phyag rgya de ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga'o// de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam
378a1(rgyud 'bum): par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po thun mong nga'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ / 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni// rdo rje mdzub mo dam tshig gi/ rdo rje hUM zhes sngags kyi ste// dngos
378a2(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad yud kyis 'thob/ / mthe'u chung gnyis ka lcags kyur bcings// rdo rje gnyis ka steng 'og tu// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// skad cig gis ni thams bcad 'gugs// rig pa dam
378a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi/ / 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad// thams cad kyang ni gnon pa ste// de bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// rdo rje mdzub ser gnyis legs pa// rab mnyam gzhag
378a4(rgyud 'bum): pa mnyam nas ni/ / shi ba thams cad slong ba ste// rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o// rdo rje mdzab gnyis legs par ni// rdo rje bcing bas bcings nas su// bsgyur te gtsug tu gzhag pa ni// tshe dang nad med
378a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phel ba bo/ / rdo rje bcing pa ram byas te// 'the bong bsnyams nas nang du gzhug/ mdzung mo dmar per bkug nas su// gcus pas zhabs su 'gugs pa'o// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bcing nas su/ gang
378a6(rgyud 'bum): gi gzugs la skad g.yon pas/ / legs par mnan pa'i sems can de// zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ gcig la gcig gis brdabs pas ni// sems can gang gis lus
378a7(rgyud 'bum): la ni/ / babs nas de yang rdob par byed// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// bdag gam pha rol go char bya// mdzub mo gnyis kyis bcings byas na// nges pa nyis du srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje mthil du bcings nas su/
378b1(rgyud 'bum): yid kyis khros nas dga' bya ba// mthe bong rdo rje dam pa ste// rdo rje rin chen 'grub par 'gyur// sems dpa'i rdo rje dam byas te// mthe bong gnyis kas gung mo mnan// mthe'u chung rdo rje rtse mo ni// rnon po
378b2(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig 'dzin pa'o/ / rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mdzub mo gnyis bkug bcings nas su// gcu zhing phyir gcu byas pa ni// lha 'gugs pa yi dam pa yin// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te// mdzu
378b3(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis bkug rab tu mnan/ / mthe bong gnyis ka sbyar ba yis// dbus su btsar ba bar snang gi'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka las// mthe'u chung gnyis ka bcing nas kyang // rgyab sbar mdzub
378b4(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis sbrel te/ / bsgyur ba mkha' la spyod pa'o// rdo rje bcings pa bsdams nas su// rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya// 'di ni sa yi dam tshig ste// thams cad byed pas 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje'i phyag
378b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gnyis bcings te/ / g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// mthe'u chung mdud bcing drag tu gtog/ 'di ni sa 'og 'gugs pa'o// rdo rje bcing ba sbrel ba ni// mdzub mo gnyis ka dam bor te/
378b6(rgyud 'bum): gung mo mthe bong rdo rje ni// gdug pa'i phya rgya 'joms pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mnyam gzhag ste ni snying khar gzhag/ khro bo khu tshur btsar ba ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'jig pa'o//
378b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas bzung // rab tu khros nas drag gtog na// ri rab kyang ni lhung bar byed// g.yon pa'i mdzug mo rdo rje la// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo/
379a1(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyus bzung // rab tu khro zhing bkug pa yi// gdon rnams kun la dbang du byed// rdo rje bcing ba byas nas su// lag ngang snying khar shin tu bsdam// rdo rje mdzub mo
379a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis mchan khung / / drud pa yis ni snying 'byin to// mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis// mthe bong gnyis ka'i drung du na// yid kyis khros nas btsir bya ba// rims la sogs 'gugs dam pa'o//
379a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te// mdzub mo gnyis ka bkug nas su// mthe bong rab tu mnyam sbyar ba// mnan pa de ni sdig 'i phrog pa'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du// 'dzub mo gnyis ni sbas nas kyang //
379a4(rgyud 'bum): legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni// skyel ba slong ba'i dam pa'o// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// gung mo gnyis ni ngos sbyar nas// mtha' ma bzhi yi ngos spyad pa// skad cig tu ni sdig 'dral to// de nas
379a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po sgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang po srang bus bre// srang bus bres la phyi nas ni/
379a6(rgyud 'bum): srad bu ji bzhin bri bar bshad// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka ya sa// mdzub mo rtse mo rab sbyar ba// byas nas tshon rnams thams cad la// 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya// rdo rje mdzub mo legs
379a7(rgyud 'bum): par no/ / sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su// rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni// sgo dbye ba yi mchog yin no// de nas rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa bshad do// brkyang bskum gyi ni tshul
379b1(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / khro ba yi ni skad 'byin cing // khro zhing khro bo'i lta bas ni// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las
379b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / // bam po lnga pa// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'ad
379b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba badz+ri na/
379b4(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra mA te a na ya sar+b+ba badz+ra satwa na hUM dzaH/ de nas ni gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje 'dra ba kun nas 'bar bas
379b5(rgyud 'bum): bskor nas/ rdo rje khro bo gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas/ bcom ldan
379b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo gsang ba'i phyir sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
379b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i ye shes bla na med// de bzhin
380a1(rgyud 'bum): / gshegs pa de ba'i phyir// btsun mo nyid du gyur pa yin// hi/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba 'di
380a2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dpying dang 'dra bas na// khro bo'i gsang ba zhes bshang ngo // dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu
380a3(rgyud 'bum): bre dkyil 'khor lnga yi gnas rnams su/ / gsang ba'i phyag rgya bshad par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas khro bo'i dam tshig kyang // ji bzhin par
380a4(rgyud 'bum): ni mkhas pas bri/ / rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor de'i// dbus su mdung rtse zhing bris la// rdo rje rab tu gnas bya zhing // 'ong 'a bar dbus su bri ba ni// de yi go rims ji
380a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin te/ / rdo rje rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang // mda' dang dga' ba de bzhin no// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par yang // 'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya//
380a6(rgyud 'bum): khro gnyer dbus su rdo rje bri// de bzhin rdo rje gnyis rgyal mtshan// de bzhin so yi baphreng ba de'i// ngos su rdo rje'i bri bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni// pad+ma'i dbus su
380a7(rgyud 'bum): gan pa yi/ / rdo rje pad+mo'i lha rdzas bris// 'bar ba'i dbus su pad+mo bri// ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin no// rdo rje lce yang tshul bzhin du// rtag tu de ya phyogs su gzhag/ rdo rje shag kyi brgal nas na// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa
380b1(rgyud 'bum): dam par yang / / rdo rje dmyal la rdo rje bri// rdo rje 'od ni chen por bskor// de yi phyogs ni thams can du// 'bar ba kun gyis dkrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad go cha'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba khu tshur mchog/ grwa dang
380b2(rgyud 'bum): phyi yi gnas rnams su/ / tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i rig pa mdor bsdus na// dzaHoM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ro Sha aM ku sha A na ya sar+b+bany+dzi/ oM badz+ra ro She kA ma
380b3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra Ni ba shaM me A na ya hi dza/ oM badz+ra duSh+Ta kro d+he to Sha ya sar+b+baM dza// rdo rje dza zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dzi oM badz+ra b+hi ku Ti kro d+he ha ra sar+b+ba ar+thany+dzi/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la mA lA pra be sha ma he kro d+ha ag+ni dz+wa la ya
380b4(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ra bi ro She dzaM/ / oM badz+ra d+h+wa dzA gra ke s+phu ra ma hA kro d+he hi me sar+b+ba s+thAny+dzi/ oM badz+ra aT+Ta hA sa ni hA sa hA sat+taM Ta hA se nA mA rA ya dza~M/ rdo rje ji zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// oM badz+ra shud d+ha kro d+he han ha na mA ra ya du
380b5(rgyud 'bum): Sh+T+r-iShAM di/ oM badz+ra hrIk+She kro d+ha ts+tshin+da/ kro d+he sha na sar+b+ba ni d+ha/ oM badz+ra he tu ma hA kre d+he pra pe sha tsa kraM/ pra be sha ya sar+b+ba nI/ oM badz+ra dza hA ma hA kro d+he ba she ba tsi muny+tsa di hi/ rdo rje di zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// hiHoM badz+ra
380b6(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba mu khe kar+m+ma badz+ra Na ma bkro d+ha ku ru ku ru san+nan ha~M/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha rak+Sha min+ta/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da kro d+he ma hA yak+Shi Ni badz+ra daMSh+Ta a kA la bi sha na pa ya hi/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+Ti ba~M d+ha ha~M/ rdo rje haM zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//
380b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams su rdo rje gar la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa'i snying po rnams gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra hUM khaM/ badz+ra hUM g+haM/ badz+ra hUM te/ badz+ra hUM taM/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchod pa'i
381a1(rgyud 'bum): snying po rnams brjod par bya'o/ / oM badz+ra ti ti/ badz+ra Tan+ta/ badz+ra d+hA tu/ badz+ra DoM ta/ de nas sgo bzhi'i mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po rnams gsungs so// badz+ra dza dza/ badz+raH/
381a2(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ badz+ra baM baM/ badz+ra a a/ de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'jugs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di bshad do// de nas de la thog ma nyid du re zhig 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil
381a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du bcug ste/ rdo rje thogs te rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang / lan gyi phyag rgya dang / nyer ba'i phyag rgya dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnams
381a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis rdo rje 'chang ba mchod pa'i phyir gar gyis mchod par bya'o/ / de la gar dang / lan gyi gar dang / nye ba'i gar dang / ye shes kyi gar rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes kyis gar rnams ni 'di yin no//
381a5(rgyud 'bum): de la dang po nyid du rdo rje dbyings su bsdus pa'i snying pos rdo rje glu len cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pas mchod pa byas nas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya drag tu gto/
381a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o// de nas ji snyed zhugs pa rnams phyag rgya rnams kyis yang dag par dbab par bya'o// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgyar ni// snyir khar shin tu bcings
381a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / de nas gar gyi cho ga yi// rdo rje khro bo lcag kyu yis// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo // rdo rje mdab ni 'phang bar bya// rdo rje mda' ni 'phang pas kyang // rdo rje dga' bas bsgrub par bya// phyag
381b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i cho ga bzhin bkrol te/ / thal mo brdab bcing bcing bar bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yi ni// phyag rgya rdo rje mnyes par bya// mnyes nas dgos pa thams cad ni// 'don bzhin skad cig nyis kyis 'grub/
381b2(rgyud 'bum): de la gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// si d+h+ya badz+ra/ A nA ya badz+ra/ rA gA ya badz+ra/ sA d+ha badz+ra/ de'i 'og tu 'dra ba'i gar gyis mchod pa bya ste// de bzhin gar gyi g.yon pa ni// khu tshur g.yas pas
381b3(rgyud 'bum): bzung nas ni/ / bsgyur zhing mdzub mo'i ngos kyis ni// dpral ba nyis la gzhag par bya// de bzhin gar byed nyi ma yang // bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya// rdo rje rgyal tshan bslang nas ni// rdo rje ha ha zhes dgod
381b4(rgyud 'bum): cing / mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis// rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang // dbang dang rab kyi gzi brjid dang // sbyin dang dgod pas mnyes par byed// de la 'di rnams ni 'dra ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'di rnams
381b5(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / e hi badz+ra/ dz+wa la ya badz+ra/ de hi badz+ra/ hA sa badz+ra/ de bzhin gar yang bkrol nas ni// pad+ma kha da dus sbyar ba yi// mdzub mo'i rtse mo snying khar gzhag/ bsam pa g.yos par gdud par bya// de bzhin
381b6(rgyud 'bum): kar byed rdo rje yi/ / ral gris bgegs ni gcod ltar bya// mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba yis// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor// rdo rje'i tshig tu glu len ltar// phyag na rdo rje mchod par bya// mchod
381b7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di yi cho ga yis/ / thams cad mnyes pa nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di rnams ni nye ba'i phyag rgya'i snying po rnams yin no// ga mA ya badz+ra/ ts+tshin+da ya badz+ra/ brah+ma ya badz+ra/ bru hi badz+ra/ rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub yang dag/
382a1(rgyud 'bum): @bkan nas rtse mo sbyar nas kyang // bsgyur te de nas gtsug tor dra// mdzub mo'i rtse mo gzhag par bya// rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis ni// lus kun mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// gar gyi cho gas brtan par/
382a2(rgyud 'bum): snying khar rab tu gzhag par bya// de bzhin kar gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje srung ba bcing bar bya// rdo rje mche ba bcings nas ni// rdo rje bcings pas mnan par bya// mchod pa 'di yi cho ga yis// las rnams kun kyang nus par 'gyur//
382a3(rgyud 'bum): / mchod pa rnams bzhi byas nas ni/ cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dgrol// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// nr-i t+ya badz+ra/ rak+Sha badz+ra/ khA da badz+ra/ ban+d+ha badz+ra/ de nas khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje gsang
382a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lag gnyis kyis/ / khros pa'i yid kyis drag gtog bya// skye bo gang gi ming smos pas// de yi snying ni 'gas par 'gyur// ma mchu so yis bzung nas ni// gang gi ming smos gzer ba ni// de yi mgo yang myur 'gas
382a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ gang gi bka' las 'da' ba'o// khro bo chen po 'di lta ba'o'i// mig kyang 'dzums par byed pa ni// gang gi ming ni smos bltas pa// de yi mig ni rdol bar 'gyur// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag la// bdag rang gi ni
382a6(rgyud 'bum): snying khar yang / / rdo rje bcings pas btsir nas ni// de yi sems ni 'jig par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// hUM badz+ra/ s+pho Ta tha/ hUM badz+ra mu ka badz+ra tha/ hUM badz+ra nitwA tha/ hUM badz+ra ma no tha/ de nas rdo rje chen
382a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ / de la dang por re zhig phyag rgya chen po 'di bcing ba bshad do// mthe'u chung lcag kyur bcing nas ni// rdo rje khro bor gzhag par bya// g.yon pa rtse gsum rgyab tu ni// 'jig rten
382b1(rgyud 'bum): gsum las rgyal gyis bshad/ / g.yon pa'i mdzug mo thad kar brkyang // de bzhin bkan pa pad+mo'o// de bzhin du yang bsgyur nas ni// g.yon pa'i rdo rje gzhag par bya// rdo rje mthil du bcing bya ste// khros pa'i yid kyis
382b2(rgyud 'bum): dgab pa ni/ / mthe bong rdo rje dam pas so// khro bo ti rin ti ri bshad// mdzub mo lcags kyus bkug pa nyid// mdzub mo ngos ni sbyar ba'o// de bzhin mdzub gnyis legs sbyar ba// mdzub mo sprang de dpral bar gzhag/ snying
382b3(rgyud 'bum): kar nyi ma rab tu bstan/ / mdzub mo bsnyams nas spyi bor gzhag/ bsgyur nas dgod par gzhag par bya// mdzub bsnyams pad+mo kha 'bus bzhin// gnyis ka ral gri chang par 'dzin// mdzub mo 'khor lor bcings pa'o//
382b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo bsnams te kha nas 'byung // mdzub mo legs par brkyang ba dang // mdzub mos mgul du bcing bar bya// de gnyis kha 'gram mche bar gzhag/ khu tshur dam du bcings pa ni// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad//
382b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// gsang ba'i khu tshur las byung ba// dam tshig mchog tu rab tu grags// de rnams bcing ba bshad par bya// rdo rje bcing ba bla na med// snying khar
382b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag nas rtsibs log gcu/ / mangs drangs pa ni g.yon pa nas// snying kha nas ni dbyung bar bya// khro gnyer du ni bsgyur nas te// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // spyi bor lag pa brkyang ba dang // bsgyur
382b7(rgyud 'bum): nas dgod par gzhag par bya/ / kha yi dbus su rab gzhag pa// mdzub mo ral gris 'bebs par bya// 'khor lo bskor bar ston pa dang // kha nas rab tu 'byin pa ste// spyi bo lus mchog dkyil 'khor
383a1(rgyud 'bum): ro dpung pa snying brtsibs logs rnams/ / rdo rje gsung ba de bzhin bya// mche ba'i gnas su bzhag pa dang // khu tshur dam du bsdams pa'o// phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag rgya ni//
383a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma'i go rims bzhin du bcings// dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa la// de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur gzhag/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// phaT Sha/ sha ta Ta/ ma ta ha/ sa ta ta/ 8
383a3(rgyud 'bum): ta/ ta Ta ta/ hr-i ta ta/ ha ta ta/ pa ta ta/ tra ta ta/ ka ta ta/ d+ha ta ta/ ku ta ta/ ri ta ta/ kha ta ta/ ba ta ta/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// mdor na las kyi phyag
383a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya ni/ / rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas te// gnas gang yin par gzhag par bya// khro bo'i lta ba khro dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// khro bo gsang ba'i
383a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis ye shes kyi phyag rgya
383a6(rgyud 'bum): byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos 'jig rten
383a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje phra mo'i rig
383b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra rat+na kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spun gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sU
383b2(rgyud 'bum): k+Sha pad+ma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra karma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT// de nas yang byab
383b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bkod do/ / de rnams kyi rang gi snying po gsungs pa/ oM sU k+Sh+ma badz+ra satwa su dz+nyA na kre d+ha hUM phaT/
383b4(rgyud 'bum): oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra aM ku sha A ka rA ya ma hA kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+ShA rA ga kro d+ha a nu rA ga ya ti kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra puSh+TiM kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha ha ra ha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+wa la maN+Dal gre/
383b5(rgyud 'bum): d+ha sUr+ya dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra tsakra kro d+ha sar+b+ba ar+tha mA me pra yats+tsha shI kra ma hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma hA sa kro d+ha ma hA Ta Ta hA sa ha ha ha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+harma badz+ra kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra ts+tshe d+ha kro d+hats+tshan+da bin+da hUM pha
383b6(rgyud 'bum): / oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+he ma hA tsakr-i ts+tshin+da pa ta ya shri pra be sha ya hri da yaM b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra hUM kA ra ha na tA ya bAka tren+d+ra hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kar+m+ma kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma ka rod b+ha ba/ sar+b+ba kA ra ya sA d+ha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma ka pa
383b7(rgyud 'bum): kro d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha ha na b+ha ya sap+pa duSh+Tany+tsit+ta mA t+ye badz+ra daMSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra suk+Sh+ma muSh+Ti kr-i d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor/
384a1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// khro ba'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyis
384a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thams cad srad bus bri/ / de yi dbus su sangs rgyas bri// ye shes rdo rje'i dbus na'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// phyag rgya de nyid kun rig shig/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi
384a3(rgyud 'bum): po rnams su yang / / 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs// rim pa bzhin du dgod par bya// de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu// rdo rje khro bo'i tshig bzhin// de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rim
384a4(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyas par bshad do/ / de la dang po nyid du re zhig bcug nas bsgo ba ni// de ring khyed la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bor bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur gyis// de la legs par nan
384a5(rgyud 'bum): tan gyis shig/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lus pa med pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phan pa dang // bde ba dang / grub pa dam pa 'thobs pa'i 'bras bu'i bar gyi
384a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir rdo rje khro bos sems can thams cad yang dag par sbyang ba'i phyir bdud byed na ma rungs pa thams cad lta zhig smos kyang ci dgos/ de skad bsgo nas gdong g.yogs bkrol to// de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor chen po
384a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bstan nas rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du lag pa gnyis su sbyin no/ / de nas rdo rje khro bo'i ye shes phra mo rnams slobs shig/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra mo brtan byas la// hUM zhes bya bas gar
384b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bas/ / de yi srog ni 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo brtan byas te// cho ga bzhin du mchod pa ni// ji srid bar du mchod pa des// de srid kyi ni dgra bo 'jig/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra mo tshul sbyar
384b2(rgyud 'bum): byas/ khro bor ldan pa ji srid mchod// de snyed sems can ma rungs byed// de ltar de bzhin gsol ba yang // rnal 'byor can gyis 'don na ni// ma lus pa ni thams cad kyang // de dag phyir zhing 'tshor bar 'gyur//
384b3(rgyud 'bum): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM hUM na sha ya badz+ra/ hUM bi na sha ya sar+b+ba sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra pra t+ya nA ya shI g+h+raM hUM/ sems can gang gis dgra la ni// lhan cig gyur pa cher bstan pas// byams pa mched pa'i rnal
384b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor gyis/ / rdo rje 'phro bas 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje 'phro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// snying rje can gyis su gang la// snying rje rnal 'byor de yis ni// gdug pa thams cad de 'jig go// chos sam yang na chos min pa
384b5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba/ / de ltar bsgoms nas sems can la// hUM zhes byas pas 'jig par byed// gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can gang // sangs rgyas byang chub snod min pa// de rnams yang
384b6(rgyud 'bum): dag sbyang ba'i phyir/ / hUM zhes bya bas 'jig par byed// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// byer badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ ga ru Na badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT// hUM bi shud+d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM bi sho d+ha na badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/
384b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i dbyibs ni bris nas kyang // yid kyis kyang ni gang su yi// khyim gyis dbus su lhung bsams nas// de yi rigs de 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin rdo rje 'phra tshul gyis// snying khar rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang //
385a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs// lhung na rigs ni 'jig par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs chen po// bsgoms nas gang du lhung ba de'i// snang srid nyes pa sna tshogs kyis
385a2(rgyud 'bum): btsun mor bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur/ / rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms nas ni// snang ba gang la lhung ba ni// de yi snang srid nges par 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po rnams
385a3(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di dag yin no/ / hUM badz+ra pra pa ta/ hUM bo d+hi satwa pra ba ta/ hUM badz+ra d+ha ra pra ba ta/ hUM bud+d+ha pra ba ta/ rdo rje rtse mo rab sbyor bas// zla ba'i gzugs la bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang // gang du
385a4(rgyud 'bum): ltung ba de lhung 'gyur/ / zla bar rdo rje bdag rang gis// bsgoms nas su ni bdag rang yang // rab tu khros nas gar lhung ba// de yi rigs ni mod la lhung // bdag rang phyag na rdo rje ni// bsgoms nas su ni
385a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag rang yang / / gang du lhung ba de yi yul// ring por mi thogs 'jig par 'gyur// bdag rang sangs rgyas gzugs nyis du// bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid dkyang // gang du lhung ba de yi ni// snang srid ring po mi
385a6(rgyud 'bum): / thogs 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no// bo d+hA gri pra ba ta ya hUM/ satwa badz+ra pra ba ta ya hUM/ badz+ra satwa pra ba ta ya hUM/ d+hu d+ha d+ha pra ba ta ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chom kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i
385a7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes bslab bo/ / rdo rje khro bar snyoms zhugs la// rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor ba/ rdo rje suM byas 'khyud nas ni// gang gi ming smos de 'chi'o// rdo rje khro bor snyoms par zhugs// sna nas phra mo thang cig tu// dbukra
385b1(rgyud 'bum): btang hU~M zhes bya tshul gyis/ / 'jig rten gsum yang lhung bar 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo tshul gyur la// khros nas rdo rje lta ba yin// bltas pa yis ni mun par 'gyur// yang na 'chi bdu ni 'gyur// bu gunas ni zhugs nas
385b2(rgyud 'bum): suyid kyis gang yang rung ba ni/ / snying nas drang pa de yis ni// rang ngam de ni dbang du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po rnams gsungs pa// hUM badz+ra ba li ta kro d+ha ma ra ya hUM phaT/ oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra shAs bi shra ba tA ya hUM
385b3(rgyud 'bum): phaTa.oM badz+ra pr-iSh+Ti bi sha bi nA sha ya hUM phaT/ hU~M hr-i da yak+Sha Na kro d+ha pra ti bi sha ka ya~M hr-i da ya ts+tshi n+da b+hin+da ka ta ka ta phaT phaT/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslabs bo// de la re zhig phyag rgya bcing ba bshad
385b4(rgyud 'bum): dongordo rje ye shes sbyor ba yis/ / 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje khro bor bdag rang nyid// bsgoms nas de ma thag tu 'grub// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//
385b5(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin ye shes dam tshig las// hUM zhes bya dang ldan 'gyur ba// ci rigs gnas su bzhags na ni// grub pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam rig gi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//
385b6(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ sha Ta/ maT/ sarba/ ra Ta/ taT/ hriT/ phaT/ pra Ta/ traT/ daH/ d+ha Ta/ kri ma riH/ khaT/ baT/ zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bshad pa'o// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi bya
385b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ / chos kyi khu tshur gnyis byas te// ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su sbyar// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// cho ka bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen mo'i rimachi/
386a1(rgyud 'bum): gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las// rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das/
386a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kar+m+me shwa ra hUM/
386a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA gat+na d+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi distA ra sa ma ye trai lo kya dza ya gi ra sar+b+ba duSh+Ta sa ma ya badz+ri Ni
386a4(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya sha du sa ma ya s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi bistA ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas byang chub sem
386a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spun gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta d+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pu ya dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi bistA ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
386a6(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sar+b+ba a ba lo ke d+ha tu mi bi ma hA pU dza kar+m+ma bi d+hi bi stA ra sa ma yai hUM phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi
386a7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa chen po'i tshi ga rgyas pa'i lha mo rnams rang gi snying kha nas bskyed/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de gzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang /
386b1(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad grub pa'i dgos pa byed pa nyis du yang dag pa'i sbyor ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul par byas te/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das

386b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbying dang 'dra bas na// las kyi rdo rje zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/
386b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas na ni// sangs rgyas sku zugs gzhag par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyogs kun tu// dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya// rdo rje shugs kyis

386b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'di/ / rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bshad do// oM badz+ra satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na kar+m+ma sa ma ye hUM dza// oM badz+ra A karA DA kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa ma ya hu dza/ oM badz+ra ra ti rA ga kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza/ oM badz+ra sA d+hu kar+m+ma dz+nyA na sa
386b7(rgyud 'bum): ma ye hUM dza/ oM badz+ra b+hi ku TI ba shA~M ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra sur+ya maN+Da le ba shA~M ku ru hU~M/ oM badz+ra d+ha dzA gra ke s+phu ru re ba sha~M ku ru hU~M/ oM badz+ra da ta ha se ba shi ku ru hU~M/ oM badz+ra pad+ma rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sha re ga
387a1(rgyud 'bum): rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra maN+Da le ra ke rA ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra ba ka ra ge rA ga ya hU~M/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma sa ma ya tsa ya hU~M/ oM badz+ra ka ba tse bi d+hi rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ oM badz+ra ya kI Ni mA ra ya badz+ra raN+DA
387a2(rgyud 'bum): / b+hin+da d+hir+d+ha ya mu ga s+ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma muSh+Ta sid+d+hi hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin byas te/ rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye shes rnams skyed do/ de la dang po nyid du zhi ba
387a3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ / yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me// rab sbyar rdo rje khro bo yis// mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms zhugs la// til sregs par ni sdigs bsregs shing /
387a4(rgyud 'bum): yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// byin za rab tu sbar nas kyang // rtag tu 'bras ni sbyin sreg na/ gdon mi za bar khyim rgyas 'gyur// yam shing mngar po rnams kyis kyang // 'khas pas rab tu me sbar te// dur
387a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i yal ga mar bcas pas/ / bsreg pa byas na tshe 'phel lo// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// byin za rab tu sbar byas la// ku sha'i yal ga 'bru mar gyis// bsreg pa byas na nges par srung // de la de
387a6(rgyud 'bum): ngadag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ / oM sar+b+ba pa paM da phan badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ oM badz+ra pri ta ha ta badz+ra ya swA hA/ yam shing tshabs dang por ni// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin
387a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ mo sbar nas kyang se ba yi// tsher ma can gyis 'gugs par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan pas me sbar na// me tog dmar ram 'bras bu'ang rung // sbyin sreg byas na skye bo rengs//
387b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor can gyis khros nas kyang // yam shing des ni me sbar te// lcags kyi phye ma bsregs na ni// rdo rje bcing ba nyid du 'gyur// yam shing de nyid kyis su ni// mnyam par gzhag ste me pus la// 'bras bu
387b2(rgyud 'bum): kha ba khros bzhin bsreg/ skad cig tu ni 'chi bar 'gyur// re te ba ru sa mau b+hi d+hu l+yag ni sa ma hri sa// dzu he da ti ga ta pha lAM ku to ma ri pu ta pa ta yeta// de la de dag gis snying po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya
387b3(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ hUM badz+ra rA ga ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra ban+d+ha ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra mA ra ya swA hA/ mkhas pas yaM shing skyur mo yis/ khros nas byin za spar nas ni// 'bra bu lo ma sgyur bsregs na// dbang du bya ba dam pa'o// yam shing de
387b4(rgyud 'bum): ngape nyid kyis kyang / / mnyam par bzhag ste me sbar la// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu khros bsregs na// 'dod pa bzhin gyi gzugs rnyed do// de 'dra ba yis yam shing gis// byin za rab tu spar nas kyang // mi snang
387b5(rgyud 'bum): me tog sdong bu yis/ / bsregs na 'dod bzhin mi snang 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// mnyam par bzhag ste med spar la// nam mkha'i lcug ma'i me tog gis// sbyin sreg byas na mkha' la
387b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro de la de dag gi snying po ni/ di dag go// oM badz+ra ba shaM ka ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ru pa badz+ra ya swAhA/ oM A d+hi sh+ya badz+ra ya swA hA/ oM badz+ra kha ba tsa ri Ni swA hA/ khro bor mnyam bzhag yam shing ni/ shing
387b7(rgyud 'bum): tu kha bos me sngar la/ / badz+ra me tog bsreg byas na// rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan la me sbar la// lha yi 'phreng ba gang bsregs pa// de yang bka' bzhin/
388a1(rgyud 'bum): nyan par 'gyur// khro bo nyid du mnyam bzhag ste// yam shing des ni me sbar te// phyag na rdo rje'i 'phreng ba bsregs// de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// yam shing de dag nyid kyi
388a2(rgyud 'bum): naHrab tu khros te me sbar la/ / chos gos bsregs pas sangs rgyas kyang // skad cig tu ni bka' bzhin mdzad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM badz+ra ba shaM ka rA ya swA hA/ hUM so ri ba shaM kA ra badz+ra
388a3(rgyud 'bum): ya swA hA/ hUM badz+ra pA Ni pa shaM ka ra ya swA hA/ hUM bud+d+ha pa shaM ka ra badz+ra ya swA hA/ de nas gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// yid 'ong bud med dang lhan cig/ gnas shing bu gar aM dza nar// bcug nas
388a4(rgyud 'bum): bskul ba byas nas kyang / / de yis mig bskus dbang du 'gyur// ldong ros bu gar bcug nas ni// rdo rje bsdams pas de g.yogs te// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi yis ni// dngos grub rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro// go ro tsa
388a5(rgyud 'bum): na bu gar bcug/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis btsir nas// bzhag na de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gur kum bu gar bcug nas ni// bu gar sems dpa' rdo rje yis// bkab nas 'bar bar gyur nas
388a6(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur/ / de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/ oM gu h+ya ra ti badz+ra ba shaM ka raM sid d+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya sid d+h+ya hUM/ oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid d+h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra gu h+ya sid d+hA huM/ de nas rdo rje
388a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo/ / rdo rje bgos pa'i tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus na// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// rdo rje khro bor mnyam par bzhag/ hUM zhes mdzub mo'i tshul gyis
388b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ dam tshig mchog ni 'dir de bzhin// oM zhes dang po yi ge as// chos kyi phyag rgya 'dir de bzhin// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis byas nas// thams cad grub byed dag pa ste/
388b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par rdzogs so//
388b3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nges 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rigs pa dam pa
388b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs so/ / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// hUM badz+ra ma tha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
388b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ / hUM b+hi ku TI badz+ra ra ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spun gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs
388b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / hUM ma hA pad+ma badz+ra dra d+ha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma a gra kri ta/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
388b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpapa chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang
389a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dra bas na/ / rdo rje khro bo zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la
389a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs bri/ / 'jig rten gsum las rgyal la sogs// sangs rgyab phyogs kun tu bri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas te bcug nas
389a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo/ / rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyis dag brjod la// bud med lhan cig gnas na ni// grub pa yang ni thob par
389a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos dag rab brjod la// chags pas bud med la bltas na// grub pa yang ni thob par 'gyur// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// dris nas chos nyid dag
389a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod la/ / bud med mdzes la spras pas 'grub// rang gi phyag rgya bzhi dkyil 'khor// bris nas chos nyid dag brjod la// lhan cig 'khyud na kun 'grub thob// de la chos nyid dag pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di dag yin no// /
389a6(rgyud 'bum): oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta bi shra d+ha d+har+m+ma te ho// oM badz+ra bi shud+d+ha dr-iSh+Ti dza/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+ha mu ki huM/ oM sar+b+ba bi shud+d+ha kA yA baM mA na kar+m+ma badz+ri hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba sbas pa'i phyag rgya bslab bo//
389a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'dir na zhugs nas kyang // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis ni// bud med mchog ni mgu byas na// shin tu grub pa thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i snying po brjod do// ho badz+ra kA ma// de nas ji lta ba bzhin
389b1(rgyud 'bum): du rdo rje mnan pa'i rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi rnams cho ga dang bcas par rgyas par bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul 'dir rdo rje sil snyan dang // dza dang / brdung ba dang /
389b2(rgyud 'bum): brdabs nas rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'dus pa'i snying po'i glu blangs te/ de phul nas phyag rgya dang // 'dra ba'i phyag rgya dang // nye ba'i phyag rgya dang // ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang // gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// ngal
389b3(rgyud 'bum): gar gyi mchod pas ni mchod pa 'di yin no/ / rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yi// rdo rje khro bo'i sor mo yis// rdo rje hUM gis phyag rgya ni// snying kha nyid du bcing bar bya// de bzhin gar byas g.yon pa ni// g.yas pa'i chang pas
389b4(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar bya/ / bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du ni// mdzub mo'i ngos kyis gzhag par bya// de bzhin gar yang bskor nas ni// mnyam par pad+mo kha dbus sbyar// mdzub mo snying khar bzhag nas ni// bsam pa g.yos
389b5(rgyud 'bum): pas gdud par bya/ / rdo rje khro bo mdzub bsnyams te// bkan nas rtse mo sprad bya zhing // de las bskur zhing gtsug tor du// mdzub mo rtse mo sbyar ba'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
389b6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bo gsungs pa/ hUM/ de nas de'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa// de nas rab tu bshad bu ba// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbying dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje hu zhes bya ba ste// dkyil
389b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus su legs bris pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje hu ni phyag rgya che// lag par 'dzin pa rdo rjer bcas// brkyang bskum tshul du
390a1(rgyud 'bum): @#gnas pa dang / / kha dog gzugs ni ji bzhin bya// de nas 'dir gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad bya ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo//
390a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'dir ni zhug nas kyang // 'jig rten gsum rgyal mdzub mo yis// bu gar bcug nas bsgrubs ni na// las kun rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sgrub pa'i snying po 'di bshad do// hUM badz+ra sa ma
390a3(rgyud 'bum): ya kr-i ta/ / de nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// dkyil 'khor zhugs nas legs par ni// phyag rgya chen po mchog gnas pa// gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya// las rnams kun ni
390a4(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur/ / de la 'di sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa// hUM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsrabs te/ de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba de
390a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du ras la gsogs pa la bri ba dang / lugs ma la sogs pa gzugs thams cad kyi dngos grub ni thun mong ngo // phyag rgya gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs
390a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi rigs 'di la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar
390a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba bzhin du bgyis kyang dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam
390b1(rgyud 'bum): par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod kyang legs/ rdo rje chos kyang khyod legs pa// rdo rje las
390b2(rgyud 'bum): khyod rab tu legs/ / mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste// theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
390b3(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rdo rje chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus
390b4(rgyud 'bum): te mkhyen bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nyon la dbang phyug chen po'i
390b5(rgyud 'bum): lus 'di khyod kyi rkang pa'i 'og nas gtang bar byos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa thams
390b6(rgyud 'bum): cad 'dul ba'i khro bor dbang bskur nas de bdag gis bkum lags na/ ji ltar de bdag gis gtang bar bgyi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug
390b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i lus kyi srog gso ba'i phyir shi ba'i rnam par shes pa dgug pa'i snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs las phyung ngo / / oM badz+ra satwa hU~M dza/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// gsang ba'i lcags sdug bsdam bya
391a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas kyang // shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni// srog ni phyir yang 'thob par 'gyur// de nas de thos ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdal
391a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dbang po'i dpyad de/ / thal bas khebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas slar phyin te dbang phyug gi lus der zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye
391a3(rgyud 'bum): bla na med/ / gang phyir shi ba'i lus 'di yang // 'tsho ba'i khams su gyur pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa 'degs pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra muH
391a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do/ / rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par// zur sprad bsdams te bzhag na ni// rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing // 'ogan de dag 'byin par byed// de nas de dag gsung ma thag tu rdo rje 'dzin pa chen
391a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i zhabs kyi 'og nas lha chen po thar par rang gis shes par gyur to/ / de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus de de bzhin gshegs pa des sos par byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyi
391a6(rgyud 'bum): don dang ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir nyid kyi rgyal tshab tu bcug go/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi mthil de nas zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag
391a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya byung ngo / / oM tsan+dot+ka re sa man+ta b+ha dra ki ra Ni ma hA badz+ri Ni hU/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam par ni// mnyam nas legs par brkyang na ni// rdo rje'i
391b1(rgyud 'bum): ri mo zhes kyang grags/ / de nas de byung ma thag tu zhabs kyi mthil de las zla ba'i bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas dbang phyug chen po de'i mgo la phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i rjes su zla ba phyed pa gan+da
391b2(rgyud 'bum): par gyur te g.yon logs na 'dug go/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogs su lag na rdo rje'i mdung rtse byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa zhes rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur
391b3(rgyud 'bum): bas dbang bskur ro/ / de nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje mdung rtse des mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bskor zhing gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
391b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni bla na med// zhabs mchog gis ni gar reg pa// sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa 'thob// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje khro
391b5(rgyud 'bum): bo'i ting nge 'dzin de las la nas/ / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gi sug par rdo rje stsal te/ phyag na rdo rje nyid du dbang bskur bas lha
391b6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs te phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyis nas/ gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
391b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can de rnams phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
392a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi gtsug tor 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra satwa uSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnams las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i
392a2(rgyud 'bum): kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi mtshams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi tshul
392a3(rgyud 'bum): du 'phungs nas 'khod do/ / de nas gzi brjid kyi phung po de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor 'di phyung ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta tiSh+Thi Sha a na a ba lo ki te mur+d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM hUM dz+wa la dz+wa la/
392a4(rgyud 'bum): / ka d+ha a r+tha ka/ da ra da ra/ bi di ra bdil/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ b+hin+da d+hin+da/ huM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM ni suM b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT/
392a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi thugs las snying po 'di byung ngo // oM Tak+ki dza/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+na ut+ta ma dz+wa la yA hUM phaT/
392a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHbadz+ra pad+ma sho d+ha ya sar+b+baM bi d+yota ta ma hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs
392a7(rgyud 'bum): / kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ut+ta ma badz+ra d+hA ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra su mA ni su b+he A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya A be sha ya/ dan+d+ha ya/ sa ma ya/ gra ha ya/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni me ku ru ma
392b1(rgyud 'bum): hA satwa hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa'i dam pas rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyir phul ba/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha badz+ra
392b2(rgyud 'bum): bai d+yot+ta ma hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo'i rigs pa'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra shU la/ de nas rdo rje sgyu ma
392b3(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa'i snying po dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra sa ma ya d+ha ri Sha ya sar+b+ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dril bu'i rig pa'i rgyal pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+re g+haH
392b4(rgyud 'bum): re Na ra Na hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje thub pos rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra mo na ma hA pradz+nyA hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje mtshon chas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra s+phu d+ha dA ma ka hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so//
392b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje khro bos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rang gi snying po 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo// oM badz+ra kuN+Da li ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha gr-ih+Na/ ha na han/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa bi d+hon sa ya badz+ra
392b6(rgyud 'bum): mu da na pa la ya ti b+hI ta sa hri da ya badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'od rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra pra b+ha mA ra ya s+yo ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dbyug pa rdo rje khro bo rang gi snying po 'di phul lo//
392b7(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra dad+hA ya sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ma bkro d+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje ser pos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra ping+ga la bi sha ya sar+b+ba duSh+Tam+bi ma hA kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khro bo rnams so// de nas rdo rje grang sna tshogs kyi bdag pos
393a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das byagan rdo rjel snying po 'di rdul lo/ / oM badz+ra sho d+ham gsan pA trI t+ta sarbA d+had+ha d+hi/ badzin pa na pa sa rdzu/ de nas yang rdo rje 'phreng bas rang gi snying po 'dzi
393a2(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / oM mA la ga Na pa ti ma la ya A karA ya pra be sha ya ba shaM ku ru na ra ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra pa shi ma hA ga Na pa ti ba shaM ku ru hU phaT/ de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje chos
393a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag pos rang gi snying po 'di phul lo/ / oM badz+ra bi dza ya bi dza ya ma hA ga Na pa ti hUM phaT/ tshogs kyi bdag po rnams so// de nas rdo rje tho ba rdo rje pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje la phul lo// oM badz+ra
393a4(rgyud 'bum): sa la ku ru sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje rlung gi pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra nI la ma hA be ga ga Na pa ti sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje me'i pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra a na la ma hA duH
393a5(rgyud 'bum): dz+wAdz+wa la ya sar+b+ba b+hasmiM ku ru sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'jigs pa'i pho nyas chen pos rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/ oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba badz+re hUMd pa sha ya sar+b+ba duSh+Ta ma hA yak+Sha phruM phaT/ pho nya rnams so// de nas rdo rje lcug kyu rdo rje bran gyis rang
393a6(rgyud 'bum): gi snying po 'ang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul lo/ / oM badz+ra ang+ku sha a karA ya/ sar+b+ba ma hAts+tshat+ta hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje dus kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra kA la ma hA mri t+yu mut+pA da hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje ngan
393a7(rgyud 'bum): khrid kyis rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra bi na ya ka sa s+ya big+h+nAM ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje klu'i rdo rje rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo// oM badz+ra na ga badz+ra A na ya sar+b+ba da
393b1(rgyud 'bum): na da ne hir+ya gaN ne muk+ta a lang+ga ra b+hi ni sarbo pa kA ra Na ni badz+ra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ka ta/ b+hin+da b+hin+da ha ra ha ra pra NAM ma hA ts+tshe da hUM phaT/ bra na rnams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje/
393b2(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje'i rigs thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ar+k+ka sha ya dza A ka rA ya hUM phaT/ de nas de gzhug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pA sha kar+N+Na hUM/ de nas thams cad bcing ba gsungs pa/
393b3(rgyud 'bum): hUM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ de nas las kyi snying po gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra karmA sa ma ya kri ta/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor
393b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po dam pa ste/ / chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// de la 'di ni srad du bre ba'i snying po yin no// oM sar+b+ba badz+ra sU taM A ka rA ya sar+b+ba maN+Dal hUM/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yang // seng lnga
393b5(rgyud 'bum): phur bu btab nas ni/ / de nas srang bu nyis rim du// byas nas de yi srad bus bre// de la 'di ni phur bu'i snying po yin no// oM badz+ra kI la ya kI la ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+na ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ srang bre ba ni dang ldan pa dang // dkyil 'khor zlum po srang
393b6(rgyud 'bum): bu bre/ / de yi phyi rol byung nas ni// nyis 'gyur du ni de bzhin no// de yi rim pa gsum du ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bu bre// phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs tshul du// grwa yi ri mor srad bu bre// srad bu bre ba'i cho ga'o//
393b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas srang du bris pa der// dag pa'i tshon gyis dbang bar bya// g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis// cho ga bzhin du gzung bar bya// dang po bris nas phyis ci bder// de la 'di ni tshon gyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra rang gas ma ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje
394a1(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon yang / / mnyam par bzhag la dbus 'dug nas// rdo rje yi ni sgo bzhi rnams// yid kyis kyang ni dbye bar bya// de la sgo dbye ba'i snying po ni 'di'o// oM badz+ra ung+ga ta sa ma ya pra ba
394a2(rgyud 'bum): ya shi g+h+raM s+phA ra badz+ra sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ gser ram yang na dngul yang rung // sa la rab tu bris pa'am// pha gu gru bzhi'i steng du ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya// de la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po na
394a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di'o/ / oM sar+b+ba bing / sangs rgyas ni phyogs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po bzhi gzhag go// mdun du phyag na rdo rje na// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// de la sems dpa' chen po'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin
394a4(rgyud 'bum): no.oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hU~M/ gr-ig+h+ra kr-i swA hUM/ kr-i h+NA pa ya kr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/ a na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAM badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra b+haM ku TI kro d+ha A na ya sar+b+ba rat+na hriHhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ta mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bi sha kro d+ha ku ru
394a5(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba ri shwa rU pa ta ya sing+ga ye hUM phaT/ 'jug gam phyir ni byung ba na// srad bu'i 'og 'jug yid bsams nas// rdo rje shugs su brjod pa ste// de yis ri mo brgal bar bya// de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di'o// oM
394a6(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra re krA kra ma hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang por de bzhin du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs bri// de la dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra tsakra hUM/
394a7(rgyud 'bum): oM 'dza u0f89u0fa4ng+ga hU~M/ oM badzad d+ha ka na hU~M/ oM badz+ra a suHhU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de ba'on te// rdo rje 'khyil ba la sogs pa// rdo rje khro bo gzhag par bya// de la de dag gi po
394b1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di rnams yin no/ / oM pra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra sau me hUM/ oM badz+ra dat+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra bi kr-i ta hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// sgo ni bzhi po rnams su yang // rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa// thams
394b2(rgyud 'bum): cad rim pa bzhin du bri/ / de dag gi dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra d+ha ma hUM/ oM badz+ra mA la hUM/ oM badz+ra ar+tha hUM/ oM badz+ra a si hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum par
394b3(rgyud 'bum): bri ba ni/ / lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra mu sa la hUM/ oM badz+ra pA ta hUM/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la hUM// oM badz+ra gra ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal
394b4(rgyud 'bum): / nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi par 'bri ba ni// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bran// lta 'og rim pa bzhin du'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra daMSh+Ta hUM/ oM badz+ra mA ra Na hUM/ oM badz+ra be ga hUM/
394b5(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra ha ra Na hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bzhag pa ni/ lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// mo mo thams cad bri bar bya// de nas rdo rje sgo bzhir yang // sgo ba rnams kyang de bzhin no//
