394b7(rgyud 'bum): rin ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te 'di skad sgo zhig/ ngas khyod la rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par byas/ de khyod kyis su la'ang ma smra zhig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas te dmyal bar lhung nga re/
395a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bsgo ste mna'i snying po 'di sbyin no// rdo rje jo bo ti rin ti ri'i phyag rgya'ang ston cig/ gal te dam tshig las 'das na// rdo rje khro bo chen po yis// dam tshig khyod kyi rigs
395a2(rgyud 'bum): bsregs pas/ / klad pa nas ni brtsams nas kyang // lus rnams ma rungs par yang byed// dam tshig bcing ba'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis bcing ngo // oM sar+b+ba ta
395a3(rgyud 'bum): tha ga ta badz+ra d+ha ra/ gr-ih+Na baM d+ha sa ma ya hUM/ de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// lag gnyis bla za 'og tu gtang // mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel ba dang // las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig 'di// rdo rje bcing
395a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhes kyang bshad/ / de nas rdo rje'i chus dbang bskur te// snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra a b+hi She ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra d+hA ra te sa ma graM gr-i/ de nas g.yogs pas gdong g.yogs te/ snying po 'dis
395a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhug go/ oM badz+ra pra be sha ya/ badz+ra pra be sha ya/ badz+ra a ba sha/ a bi sha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM/ de nas bcug nas snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro// oM pra tIts+tsha a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra ho// de nas de dag gar lhung
395a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dis 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas dkyil 'khor go rims bzhin du bstan te/ lha gang yin pa de ni de la mi bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can log par lta
395a7(rgyud 'bum): ngag yod de/ gang dag ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rigs su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam zhes
395b1(rgyud 'bum): rad par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni dam tshig go/ / gzhan du na lnga gang la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po 'di byin nas bstan par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i rin po che'i mtshan ma'i 'phreng bas dbang bskur nas las kyi rdo
395b2(rgyud 'bum): rje lag pa gnyis su byin la/ rdo rje ming btags te ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin du bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bslab bo// rdo rje bcing ba ma byas te// mthe bong nang du sbyar nas ni/
395b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo bkug nas gnyis kas bkab// sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya'o// rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni// mthe bong gung mo mthe'u chung bsgreng // gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste// gzi brjid chen po'i btsun pa'o//
395b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel ba ni// dam du lcags kyu bcings pa ste// rig pa chen po dam pa'i 'o// rig pa chen po dam pa yi// phyag rgya bcings pa rab btsir ba// snying khar mthe
395b5(rgyud 'bum): bo'i ngos kyis so/ / sems dpa'i yi ni snying por bshad// de nyid las gung mo srin lag/ sor mo rab tu bsdams nas ni// rdo rje rin chen tshul du ni// bsgyur nas gdong du gzhag par bya// de nyid bskyed de bzhag
395b6(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ snying khar yang ni bsgyur bar bya// me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste// pad+ma'i rig pa dam pa'o// de nyis spyi bo nas brtsams te// lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di// rdo rje las
395b7(rgyud 'bum): ni rab sgrub pa'o/ / sems ma'i rdo rje dam byas te// mthe'u chung rdo rje sgreng ba ni// thams cad rig pa'i snying po 'di// phyag rgya 'di ni thams cad sgrub// mthe bong mje'u chung bcings nas ni// g.yon pa'i sor mo dbus
396a1(rgyud 'bum): ma gsum/ / rtse gsus pa ni dbus ma'i rtse// rdo rje phyag rgya bzung ba ste// rdo rje rig pa dam pa 'di// rdo rje mdung zhes bya ba'o// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// rgyu ma rdo rje la sogs
396a2(rgyud 'bum): brtags rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te/ / g.yon pa'i rdo rje bcing bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do// rdo rje'i rigs ni kun gyi 'di'o// rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te// mtshan makun kyang des gzhag go// rdo rje'i rigs ni
396a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi/ / phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung ba ste// sor brkyang steng du gzhag pa dang // mdzub mos mthang stan srung ba dang // oM zhes bya ba spyir bzhag nas// rdo rje steng du gzhag pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen
396a4(rgyud 'bum): pos tshogs rnams so/ / rab tu brkyang nas lag gnas pa// lag pa'i rgyab tu de bzhin te// khu tshur bcangs bzhag lag ngar bskum// kha yi phyogs su bskor bar bya// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// g.yon pa'i
396a5(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong steng du gzhag/ 'phreng ba bcing ba'i thabs su sbyar// nor sbyin par ni g.yas pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya khu tshur mchog/ 'dus pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o// g.yas pa mdun du gtun rings
396a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / lag pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin te// g.yas pa'i 'or ni 'bar bar bstan// rdo rje khu tshur bskyod pa bya// po nya'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs so// bsgyings bcas mdzub mo'i khar mched// dbyug par snan cing
396a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa dang / / dpung pa bskum zhing sbyang ba dang // g.yas pa g.yon gyis 'dren pa'o// zan gyi phyag rgya'i tshogs chen po'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bya ba ni// g.yon pa'i rdo rje bur nas so// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni/
396b1(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dang ni las nyid dam// sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang // de ni bdag nyid nyid kyis kyang // bdag nyid goms par gyur na ni// phyag rgya dam par 'grub par 'gyur// gtsug tor chen po srung ba che// gzi brjid
396b2(rgyud 'bum): phung po rab grub ster/ / rdo rje hUM zhes bya kun byed/ snying khar bzhag pa thams cad 'gugs// sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams so// thams cad rig pa thams cad grub// rdo rje rig pa dam pa'o// rdo rje mdung ni phyag rgya che/
396b3(rgyud 'bum): grub pa chen po sbyin par byed// sgyu ma'i rdo rje rab 'grub pa// dril bu yis ni yang dag 'bebs// dbyug pa'i shing gis mya ngar 'da'// rdo rje'i rdo rje gsod par byed// rig pa'i rgyal po rnamaso// 'bar ba'i mchog ni ma
396b4(rgyud 'bum): rungs 'dul/ / zhi ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod// dbyug pa'i mchog ni gsod pa ste// 'jigs pa'i mig ni skrag par byed// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya rnams so// myos pas rab tu myos par byed// 'phreng ba kun ni
396b5(rgyud 'bum): byed par bshad/ / 'dod byed dga' bar byed pa ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod po'o// tshogs kyi phyag rgya rnams so// tho ba gdug pa 'joms pa ste// ras kyi rgyu ras de bzhin te// 'bar ba'i mchog ni gdug pa sreg
396b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin ma ni gdon spyod do/ / pho nya'i phyag rgya rnams so// rdo rje'i mche ba bza' ba ste// gsod pa thams cad gsod ma'o// gegs byed ma ni rab tu bgegs// 'phrog ma yang ni thams cad 'phrog/ bran gyi bya
396b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya rnams so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa
397a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzugs kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i
397a2(rgyud 'bum): ting nges 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ba si tre swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
397a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / oM badz+ra d+ha ri hUM/ oM badz+ra bi kra me hUM phaT/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+na kro sde swA hA/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
397a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdo rje spun gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra pad+ma ne tre swA hA// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/
397a5(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra kar+m+ma ka re swA hA// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rigs pa dam pas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra shu la gre swA hA/ de nas rdo rje myur ba'i rig pa'i
397a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal pos ring gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra tsakre hUM/ rdo rje dril bus smras pa// oM badz+ra g+haN+Da ke hUM/ rngub pa'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badz+ra danA kISh+Te trAM/ rdo rje mtshon chas smras pa/ oM
397a7(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ rigs pa'i rgyal po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje khro bas rang gi snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di smras so// oM badz+ra dz+wa la~M hU~M/ de nas rdo rje 'od kyis smras pa/ oM badz+ra
397b1(rgyud 'bum): sau me hUM/ de nas rdo rje dbyig pas smras pa/ oM badz+ra daN+De hUM/ rdo rje ser smag gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra biSh+Ta ni hU~M/ rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje grang snas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag
397b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya smras pa/ oM badz+ra me de hUM/ rdo rje 'phreng bas smras pa/ oM badz+ra mA le hUM/ rdo rje dbang gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra a b+hi She hUM/ rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rjes smras pa/ oM badz+ra a pa rA dzi ta hUM/ rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag
397b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so/ / de nas rdo rje gtun rings kyis rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams smras pa/ oM badz+ra mu sa la gra he hUM/ de nas rdo rje rlung gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra pA te hUM/ rdo rje mes smras pa/ oM
397b4(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra dz+wa le hUM/ rdo rje 'jigs pas smras pa/ oM badz+ra gra he hUM/ rdo rje pho nya'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyus smras pa/ oM badz+ra daSh+TA hUM/ rdo rje dus kyis smras pa/ oM badz+ra ba ne hUM/ rdo rje
397b5(rgyud 'bum): ngan khrid kyis smras pa/ oM badz+ra big+h+nA hUM/ rdo rje klus smras pa/ oM badz+ra ha ri Ni hUM/ rdo rje bran gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs
397b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// grwa bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo// phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bus bre// de yi nang du der yang ni// de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdod// de yi dbus
397b7(rgyud 'bum): su ci rigs par/ / sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs pa// bzhi po de yi phyogs kun gzhag/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin gtso bor yang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// de yi
398a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rnams thams cad du/ / rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya// rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa// bzhi po rnams ni sgo srungs so// 'jigs ma dpal dang sgra dbang dang // du ga g.yon pa'i grwa/
398a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams nas// phyi yi grwa rnams phyag rgya ni// de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor rnams su ni// lha mo rnams kyang bri bar bya// de nas cho ga rgyas pa rnams// ji bzhin par ni bshad par bya// de nas rdo rje'i
398a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'dir ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas te/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dam tshig gi las byas nas/ rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga bzhin du bcings la/ khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba su'i mdun du'ang
398a4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi phyag rgya de rnams ma smra zhig/ gsang ba 'phel bar ma byed cig ces sgo zhig/ de nas las kyi rdo rje de rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste cho ga bzhin du chug cig/ zhugs nas rdo rje de de bzhin du
398a5(rgyud 'bum): 'or cig/ gang la bab pa de de'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dbang du 'gyur te/ des las thams cad byed do// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol nas dkyil 'khor rim bzhin stan te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba spros shi
398a6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig phyag rgya 'di khyod kyi/ / rtag tu las kun byed pa ste// ma dang sring mo rnams dang ni// chung ma bu mo 'dra ba'o// de la de'i snying po ni 'di de dag yin no// oM sarba ga ma ni sarba bak+She sA d+ha ya gu h+ya badz+ri ni hUM phaT
398a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di lan cig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byas te spud na chos ma yin par mi 'gyur ro/ / ci dga' bar thams cad sprad nas sgrub par bya ste/ de nas sems can thams cad dag par phyag rgya thams cad yid kyi
398b1(rgyud 'bum): ma shes nas las dam pa thams cad kyang byed do zhes bcom ldan pa das rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so/ / de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// dam tshig khro bo mdzub bcug dang // snying khar yang ni bsdam par bya//
398b2(rgyud 'bum): ngos kyi mdzod spu kha nas drang // spyi bor bzhag nas gnyis su bya// g.yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo yis// mdung rtse rtse gsum mnan par bya'o// 'di bcings pas ni yang dag par// rig pa dam pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur//
398b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyi// g.yon pa'i rdo rje gtso bor 'dus// dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin par// phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya// thams cad 'khor lo mdzub rtse bcu ma// dril bu'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no// de bzhin
398b4(rgyud 'bum): oM gyi phyag rgya dang / / seng ge'i rnam par bya ba ste// rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so// 'bar ba kun tu 'dzin pa dang // 'od ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid// dbyug pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang // kha 'gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o// khro
398b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i dam tshig rnams so/ / gtum pa'i phyag rgya 'phreng ba dang // rdo rje mnan nas mdud pa yin// spyi bor bzhag pa tshegs kyi ste// dkyil 'khor gyi ni srung ba'o// tshogs rnams kyi dam tshig go// lag pa bskums pa khar bzhag
398b6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rgyab tu yang ni bskor bar bya// 'bar ba me stag gtong ba ste// phye nas khar yang gnas par bya// pho nya mo'i dam tshig rnams so// mtha' ma gnyis ni khar bcug dang // btsir cing rab tu gnon pa'o// dpung pas
398b7(rgyud 'bum): bsnol bas bsnol ba dang / / myur du 'phrog pa'ang de bzhin no// bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil
399a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi blo kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting
399a2(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bid/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje snying pos rang
399a3(rgyud 'bum): gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so/ / oM ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM mA ra mA ra hUM phaT/ de nas yang rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di
399a4(rgyud 'bum): / gsungs so// oM ku ru ku ru hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM hUM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje sgyu mas smras pa/ oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM A bi sha A bi sha hUM phaT/ oM
399a5(rgyud 'bum): / b+hur b+hur ba swa hUM phaT/ oM b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o// oM da ma da ma hUM phaT/ oM mAr ya mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ya b+ha ya hUM phaT/ khro bo rnams kyi'o// oM d+ha ma d+ha
399a6(rgyud 'bum): ma hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ba shI b+hA ba hUM phaT/ oM dza ya dza ya hUM phaT/ tshogs rnams kyi'o// oM b+h+yo b+h+yo hU~M phaT/ oM g+hu g+hu hUM phaT/ oM dz+wA la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ oM khA da khA da hU~M phaT/ pho nya rnams kyi'o//
399a7(rgyud 'bum): oM kha na kha na hUM phaT/ oM ma ra ma ra hUM phaT/ oM g+hih+Na g+hih+NahUM phaT/ oM pi b+ha bi b+ha hUM phaT/ bran mo rnams kyi'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so//
399b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor de// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo bzhin// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// thams cad snyoms
399b2(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs pa'o/ / chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul lta bu// snying khar mtshan ma yang dag gzhag/ de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga bzhin du las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu bcangs
399b3(rgyud 'bum): pa bcings te 'di skad smos shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la'ang ma smra zhig ces bsgo la dril bu dkrol du chug cig/ 'di skad bsgos nas kyang mna'i snying po byin
399b4(rgyud 'bum): kha/ ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol ba'i// de'i sgra ji ltar mi rtag pa// de bzhin las kyi rdo rje khyod// mi rtag par ni ma rungs byed// rdo rje slob dpon bsti stang med// rdo rje grogs dang mi mdza' dang // gdug
399b5(rgyud 'bum): la byams dang skye bar ni/ / gal te khyod kyis byas na'o// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan te chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs//
399b6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no// thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsams pa// rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste// 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin// de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra// sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 'da'//
399b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'joms pa bla na med// rig pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so// sems can gdul phyir khro bo mchog/ zhi ma yis ni nges par gsod// dbyug pa 'dra la 'tshog pa med// log par lta ba 'jigs
400a1(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so// ra ro 'dra bar dpa' ba med// 'phreng ba 'dra bar 'ching ba med// bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang byed// brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham mo//
400a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin rnamaso// 'tshog pa'i chad pa'i mchog yin te// reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o// gzi brjid can ni byin za mchog/ zas rnams kyi nang khrag dam pa// pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so// mche ba dag par
400a3(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa ste/ / 'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug/ 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med// chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med// bran gi ting nge 'dzin rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
400a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ / rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
400a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig las 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra karma pra brta ni sa ma ye hUM/
400a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi la sa pU dzA ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM a b+hi She ka
400a7(rgyud 'bum): a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ de nas rdo rje spun gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra gI te ga hi huM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa// oM badz+ra NiH
400b1(rgyud 'bum): Ni t+ya hUM/ de nas rdo rje rig pa dam pas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi d+yota ta ma ne tra bi kur ba bi kur ba hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro bo rdo rje me'i lha mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra/
400b2(rgyud 'bum): / kro d+ha badz+ra ag+ne dz+wA la tri shu lan bi na hrid ya badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje gser lha chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra he ma ts+tshin+da tsakre Na badz+ri Ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rdo rje gzhon nu mas rang gi las
400b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ / oM badz+ra ku mA ra shI g+h+raM a be sha ya gan+d+ha shab+de na badz+ra pA Ni pri ye badz+ra sa ma ya ma ru sma ra Na hUM phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje zhi bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra shaM
400b4(rgyud 'bum): / ti dza pa dza pa a g+ha ma la ya sar+b+ba na mA ra ya shAM ta tri h+ye hUM phaT/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti ha na ha na badz+ra b+hin+da b+han+da pI Ta ya pi Ta ya/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta hrid
400b5(rgyud 'bum): ya ni/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni hU~M phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal mo rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje mi 'chi ba khro bos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra a mr-i te badz+ra duSh+TiM gr-ih+Na ban+d+ha ha na sar+b+ba di d+h+waM sa ya/ bi nA sha ya ts+tshin+da
400b6(rgyud 'bum): / ba bi ku ru mut+ta ni/ ta yai badz+ra Na ye ke tsi ta ma ma mu ka ra bi na yA ka tan+ta ma dIp+ta kro d+ha badz+ri hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje mdangs can gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra kAn+ti mA ra ya sau me rU pe pra ti ba
400b7(rgyud 'bum): tar ge na shrI g+h+raM s+pho Ta ya badz+ra d+ha ra t+ye na ma hA dz+ye sA kA ra le shI ta rismai badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ / de nas rdo rje dbyug pa'i mchog mas rang gi las kyi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra daN+Da kra g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje
401a1(rgyud 'bum): tsong tsong khro bo chen mo rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so/ / oM badz+ra mA le me kha le kha na Sha na sha pa de ni ra shI ku ru traM daSh+Te mA ra ya bi sha ne hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rig pa rnams so//
401a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'dzums rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra ba la ye me ts+tshin+d+ra si na b+hin+da badz+ra Ni mA ra ya u ma da ya pi ba pi ba huM phaT/ de nas rdo rje zas kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra a
401a3(rgyud 'bum): ne pa krI ya sar+b+ba duSh+TAM badz+ra da sha ne sha ga ti d+hA ra Ni me nu sha ma na se a ha re Na ra ru ti sa shuta tsa pra ya ma dza ba sA nu le ba na bi le ba ta gra tre/ a na ya sar+b+ba dan+d+ha n+ya ya hi ra N+ya su bar+N+Na a di ni gra ma ya de ba rak+Sha Ni hUM phaT/
401a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje bgo bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra pA sa ne A na ya sar+b+ba sra an+t+ra ba Na di n+yA pa ka ra Na ni shI g+h+nAM ba shAM ku ru dI pa da me pra yats+tsha oM b+hi sha sa t+yaM ka ta ya badz+ra kro Sha d+ha Ni hUM phaH/ de nas rdo rje
401a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang gis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so/ / oM badz+ra ba shI A na ya ba shi ku ru sar+b+ba pri ya sar+b+ba pu ru Sha na da si ku ru krung raM pra se da ya sarba b+h+ya/ ba ha re b+h+yo d+ha ra ya bi tsa ra ya ka ri badz+ra pa ta ka d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/
401a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje tshogs kyi'o// de nas rdo rje pho nya mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras so// oM badz+ra duSh+Ti A nA ya sarba maN+Da la ma pra be sha ya/ a de sha ya bad+d+hA ya sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni me ku ru shI g+h+raM shAM g+h+raM la gu tre sa ye mA ra
401a7(rgyud 'bum): ya da bya ba re b+h+yo d+ha ra ya bi dza yaM ka ri badz+ra pa ta ka d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje shugs kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ aM be ga badz+ra Ni g+hu g+hu g+hu b+hu sha ba de mA ra ya ba~M b+hi ra bi d+hi sa ya badz+ra pA sha d+hA ra Ni hUM u0f7f d
401b1(rgyud 'bum): e nas rdo rje 'bar bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la ya dz+wA la ya sar+b+ba badz+ra dz+wa la ya dz+wa la yad ha da haHsmiM ku ru pU phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'jigs mas rang gi las kyi dam chog smras pa/ oM badz+ra
401b2(rgyud 'bum): ga te pra be ka daMSh+T+rA ka rA la ka la la bi shi sha na bAka trai shIb+h+raM shI g+h+raM A be sha ya b+hak+Sha ya ru d+hi raM pi pa ma hA yak+Shi Ni badz+ra dA sha d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje'i bzhin rdo rje bran mos rang gi
401b3(rgyud 'bum): las kyi dam tshig smras so/ / oM badz+ra muSh+Ti A na ya badz+ra doSh+Ti ba ya ni ka ba tA la ni ba si ni kha na khan/ khA hi khA hi sar+b+ba mu khe pra be sha ya s+pho Ta ya mA ra mA ra Ni sar+b+ba duSh+TA nA badz+ri Ni shi ta si d+hA ri Ni hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje
401b4(rgyud 'bum): dus mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra kA li ma hA pre ta du bi ni ma nu Sha nAM sa ru d+hi ra pri ye e h+ye he gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ badz+ra DA ki ni badz+ra shaM kha le sar+b+ba de ba ga Ne mA tri b+hU te/ ha ra ha ra pra NAM/ a mu ka s+ya ka pA
401b5(rgyud 'bum): lA ma la kr-i ta sar+b+ba ka ye kany+tsi ra ya sa~M badz+ra la T+wAM ga d+hA ri NI pre ta ma nu Sha sha rI re shi g+h+raM a be sha ya pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+rA ya mA ra ya badz+ra rak+Sha si hUM tsu huM hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje bskul mas rang gi las kyi dam
401b6(rgyud 'bum): tshig 'di smas so/ aM badz+ra pU ta me ma nu Sha ya ma na sar+b+ba ru d+hi ra mu tra pu ri sha shi lo smA shi g+h+raM na re ka to gar+b+ha hi ra N+ya ya hi shI g+h+raM ma ti ma mu ka sa ku ru badz+ra sho d+ha/ ni ka d+hA ri ni sar+b+ba kar+m+ma Ni me ku ru swA hA hUM/
401b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje ma ka ras rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra ma ka re gra sa gra sa shwe g+h+raM pra be sha ya pa tA laM b+hak+Sha ya badz+ra me ka ra d+hA ra Ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje bran mo rnams kyi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang
402a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa n+d+he// rdo rjes dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni/
402a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bres// dkyil 'khor mchog ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya// de dag phyogs su rim par yang // sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhag go// de
402a3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su chung mar bcas/ / rdo rje rig pa dam pa nyid// rdo rje lA s+yai la sogs gsang // gar gyi mchod la sogs pas mchod// de la lha mo'i go rims bzhin// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin
402a4(rgyud 'bum): duHrang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra/ / gar byed par yang bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so// grwa dang sgo yi phyogs rnams su// bdug pa la sogs rim pa bzhin// de nas
402a5(rgyud 'bum): las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin bcings te 'di skad smros shig/ khyod kyis lha'i rim pa ma mthong ba dang las mi shes pa
402a6(rgyud 'bum): su la'ang gsang ba'i las 'di ma smra zhig/ khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes smos shig/ rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing 'di skad brjod do//
402a7(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra satwa r+ya A be sha ya be sha ya nri te ba ya sar+b+ba kar+m+ma sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha hUM aHhUM a la ya la la badz+ra/ de nas yang bdag la babs nas bdag nyid kyis 'jug ste phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod
402b1(rgyud 'bum): pas mchod par bya'o/ / de phyin chad lus dang / ngag dang / lta ba dang / yid dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyi las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin byed pa'o// de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te/ gar gyi mchod pa'i
402b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i ye shes slobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi// dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas te// rdo rje rig pa dam pa la// rdo rje lA s+yai la sogs mchod// rig pa 'di rnams thams cad kyang // lha 'og go/
402b3(rgyud 'bum): rims ji bzhin du// gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya chen po mdor sdus so// dam tshig mchog ni gnyis byas nas// las kyi
402b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dgrol bar bya/ / gar gyi mchod pa 'dri yis ni// gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa che sogs kyi// las grub par yang nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam
402b5(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi rtog pa chen po las/ / rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag
402b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du bskos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu bzhag ste/ mkhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
402b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba de gang lags bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gas
403a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can rnams kyi rang bzhin ni// ji lta ji ltar 'dul
403a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / de lta de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags la sogs gtsang bas bya// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams
403a3(rgyud 'bum): kyis bstan pa'i phyir/ / sems can thams cad gsad kyang ni// sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi nor bu gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad
403a4(rgyud 'bum): phan phyir dang / / sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis// pha rol nor rnams 'phrog kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi gsang ba'i pad+mo 'di gsungs so// 'dod
403a5(rgyud 'bum): chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med/ / rgyal ba la ni de phul ba// gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir// bsten pas bsod nams thobs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gis las kyi gsang ba
403a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs so/ / sems can thams cad phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa yi// las rnams thams cad byas pa yis// bsod nams shin tu mang po rnyed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
403a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba legs so zhes bstan pa/ / legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje ches khyod legs pa ste/
403b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// mdo 'di legs par smras pa ste// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
403b2(rgyud 'bum): bsdus pa las/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / bam po drug pa// de nas yang /
403b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btang ba/
403b4(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo sems dpa' pad+mo che// 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug cha// spyan ras gzigs dbang brtan pa'i cho ga/ rdo rje chos la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi rgyal po dag pa che// sems dpa'i rgyal po blo gros cha//
403b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i bdag nyid pad+ma che// pad+mo'i mgon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo las byung pad+mo'i 'od// pad+mo dag par rab dga' byed// rdo rje pad+mo pad mchog lus// pad+mo d+mo khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs chen po
403b6(rgyud 'bum): snang ba che/ / dgos pa chen po che dang mtshud// brtan pa chen dpa' ba che// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can bsam pa reg pa che// rnal 'byor chen po mes po che// bde za dade byed dag pa'i don
403b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas pad+mo khyed phyag 'tshal/ / ches de nyid don dam pa'i chos// dam pa'i chos ni chos rab 'dzin// chos chen shin tu chos mchog pa// chos kyi 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas sems dpa'
404a1(rgyud 'bum): sems mchog gtso/ / chos kyi sems dpa' chos mchog 'dzin// sems dpa' dam pa sems mchog 'dzin// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// spyan ras gzis
404a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang mtshon pa'i mchog/ mgon po chen po rnam gzigs gtso// 'jig rten snang ba 'jig rten don// 'jig rten mgon po khyod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten yi ge yi ge che// yi ge mchog ni yi ge 'dra// yi ge
404a3(rgyud 'bum): ge thams cad gzigs/ / 'khor lo'i yi ge khyod phyag 'tshal// phyag na pad+mo pad chen po// dbugs 'byin pa ni sbyin pa po// sangs rgyas chos ni sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas bdag nying khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgya
404a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs ni gzugs chen po/ / rdo rje'i gzugs ni gzugs bzang ldan// chos kyi snang ba bzi brjid chog/ 'jig rten snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad+mo dpal ni mgon pa gtse// chos dpal mgon po mgon ldan pa// tshangs
404a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mgon po tshangs chen po/ / tshangs sras khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// snang ba snang mchog snang ba'i gtso// snang gsal shin tu snang ba'o// snang ba'i mgon po mgon po che// sangs rgyas snang khyed phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgya
404a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur sangs rgyas mchog/ sangs rgyas sras po mkhas chen po// sangs rgyas dbang bskur gtsug gi mchog/ sangs rgyas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas spyan ni spyan chen po// chos spyan gzigs pa chen po swa/
404a7(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin yang shas thams cad la// rdo rje spun khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di// khyod kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rnams// bstod nas goms par byed pa ni// 'jig rten dbang po thob par 'gyur//
404b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo khyod la gsol gdab pa// rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ni// thub pa chen pos bshad par gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
404b2(rgyud 'bum): gzigs kyi dbang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la bder mngon du phyogs te 'dug nas rdo rje pad+mo de
404b3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi thugs kar bzhags ste ched du brjod pa 'di chad du brjod do/ / e ma'o rab tu dag pa ni// bdag gi rdo rje pad+mo 'di// pa yin 'di ni bdag gi bu// rigs 'di byin gyis brlab par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das
404b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig
404b5(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / hrIHde nas dbyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas pad+mo lta bu'i 'od zer kha dog dang / gzugs dang /
404b6(rgyud 'bum): rtags dang / spyod lam dang / 'od rnam pa du ma byung ste// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang / chos nyid kyi ye shes yang dag par sbyangs nas yang slar log ste 'phags pa spyar
404b7(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs kar zhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pad+mot+ta ma hrIH
405a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs sa/ / oM badz+ra du d+ha paH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen brda rje snying pos
405a2(rgyud 'bum): gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra rat+not+ta ma tra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi d+yot+ta ma hrIH/ de nas byang chub sems

405a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs te/ dgra thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra tsu hri ho/ de nas de smras ma thag tu 'phags pa spyan
405a5(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+mo la zhugs te/ phyag rgya'i mtshan ma pad+ma 'dzin pa'i kha dog dang / gzugs
405a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / cha lugs dang / rgyaran sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzugs 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
405a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad ji ltar 'dul bar so so'i gzugs su bstan nas ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul bar byas te/ yang slar log nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du
405b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la 'khod nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thabs ni snying
405b2(rgyud 'bum): rje'i bdag nyid de/ / gang du thabs kyis 'dul mdzad na// lha rnams su yang 'gyur ba yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang pos rangab
405b3(rgyud 'bum): gi rig pa bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / don dang / grub pa dam pa dang / rdo rje chos nyid dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bra

405b5(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes bya ste/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta bgra bzhis ni brgyan pa dang // srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// dar dang 'phreng bas brgyan pa dang // dkyil 'khor gA ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud tsham rnams
405b6(rgyud 'bum): su rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan par/ / phyi rol dkyil 'khor srang bu bre// de yi nang du srang bu ni// gru bzhi par ni bri bar bya// gnyis pa'i grwar ni sgro gdod cing // pad+mo 'dri bas bya ba yin// ka ba brgyad kyi tshul ni//
405b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// de yi ge sar dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs gzhag/ de la sangs rgyas gzhag pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no// bud d+ha bruM/ sangs rgyas phyog kun dri ba ni/ pad+mo dbus
406a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa ste/ / ngom rin chen brjo dang// ma tshogs brjod pazhin no// de la de rnams kyi snying pa ni 'di yin no// many+dzu/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shuHsa
406a2(rgyud 'bum): brgal nas ni/ / der ni spyan ras gzigs dbang bri// gzugs rnams thams cad 'byin pa ste// da yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje 'gying la sogs tshul du// sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' che//
406a3(rgyud 'bum): / mtshan ma pad+mo 'chang ba zo// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// a/ oM ta thA ga ta d+harma hUM/ oM badz+ra pad+ma aM ku sha ko Sha d+ha ra badz+ra satwa hU~M phaT/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ pad+ma ku su ma a yu d+ha d+ha ra a mo g+ha sha ho//
406a4(rgyud 'bum): oM pad+ma saM b+ha ba pad+ma hasta sA d+hu hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te// de yi dbus su bri ba ni// thor tsugs dbus na'ang de bzhin gshegs// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du//
406a5(rgyud 'bum): khro gnyer la sogs tshul du ni// mtshan mar pad+mo 'chang bri ba// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// hUM oM pad+ma b+hi ku Ti Ti Di Da/ oM pad+ma su ra ya dzA la hUM/ oM pad+ma ma ni kre tu
406a6(rgyud 'bum): d+har tsan+d+ra pra had la a ba laM ki te shro ra de hi mo sarba ar+d+ha na shri ts+tsha sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma anu hA sa e ka da sha mu ka ha ha ha ha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa'ang de bzhin te// sems
406a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs par/ / pad+mo steng du bzhag par bri// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// pad+mo la sogs tshul du ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de la de dag gi
406b1(rgyud 'bum): snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ / hrI oM tA ra pad+ma a ba lo ki ya mA ma sa ma ya satwa hU~M/ oM pad+ma ku mA ra pad+ma shak+ti d+ha ra Sha Ta ke na ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma nI la kar+Na sha ra ka tsakra ga ta pad+ma pA Ni byAk+Sha
406b2(rgyud 'bum): tsarma Ni ba si na kr-i ta yadz+nyo bI ta a dzaM narma pa tsa tsan+ted/ d+ha ra ye na ra ya na ru pa da re tre ni mu la aT+Tan+ta hA sa na pra be sha ya sa ma yan/ de hi me sid+ha a ba lo ko te shwa ra hUM/ oM brah+ma pad+ma saM b+ha ba dza pa dza pa pad+ma
406b3(rgyud 'bum): b+ha sha hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de bzhin te// der ni pad+ma zhal bzhi pa// pad+mo mdung rtse thogs par bri// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// rdo rje gar la sogs tshul du/
406b4(rgyud 'bum): / mtshan ma pad+mo 'dzin bri ba// sems dpa' chen po cho ga bzhin// de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// hriM oM pad+mo na rte shwa ra nA tha pu dza ya sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma sa ma ya/ A kaR+Sha ya be sha ya ban+d+ha ya
406b5(rgyud 'bum): a be sha sarba karma sid+d+him+ba pra ya ts+tsha a ba lo ki te shwa ra hUM/ oM ba ya na d+ha ta da a ba lo kyi te shwa ra rak+Sha ban+d+ha ya ka ba tse sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma hA pra tsaN+De bi shwa rU pa tsi ka/ pad+ma daMSh+Ta A ka ra la bi shwa na badz+ra hri da
406b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma yak+Sha khA da khA da d+hi g+ni g+h+nAM b+hI ka/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti sa ma ya staM b+han+d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// grwa rnams kun tu bri ba ni// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs tshul// pad+ma sgeg mo la sogs lha// de dag gi ni
406b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di rnams so/ / oM pad+ma lA s+ye rA ka ya ma ha de rI ka ma he pU dza sa ma ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ a b+hi Shi ke pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM pad+ma gI te kI pU ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+ma ma naM wi d+ye sarba pu ra
407a1(rgyud 'bum): @pra brta na sa ma ya hU~M/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor ka rnams su// pad+ma'i mchod pa la sogs bzhi// mchod pa'i lha mo rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyam
407a2(rgyud 'bum): / rgya ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma d+hU pe pu dza sa ma ye pra hri da ya pad+ma ku la da yi te ma hA ga Ni pad+ma ra ti hUM/ oM pad+ma puSh+pe pU dza sa ma ye pad+ma ba si ma hA bIr+ya pad+ma ga la pra ri ha ri sarba arba sA d+ha ya hU~M/ oM pad+ma dI pa
407a3(rgyud 'bum): dza sa ma ya pad+ma ku la sun+d+ha ri ma hA tu d+ya a lo ke badz+ra pa tsa na ya pad+ma sa ra sA ti hUM/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha pU dza sa ma ye ma hA pad+ma ku la tsi re ku ru karmA ni me pad+ma sing+ga hUM/ de nas pad+ma sgo bzhi po// kun tu tshogs sogs ji
407a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / jo lta ba bzhin legs pra be// de dag snying po'i don gyis ni// ji bzhin par ni br-i bar bya// oM ha ya grI ba ma hA pad+ma aM ku sha A ka rA ya shI g+h+raM sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yan pad+ma aM ku sha d+ha ra duM dza// aM a
407a5(rgyud 'bum): me g+ha pA sha kro d+ha A ka rA ya pra be sha ya ma hA pa shu pa ti ya ma ba ru Na ku re ra pra be sha d+ha ra pad+ma ku la sa ma ye hUM hUM/ oM pad+ma po Ta kro Ta ban+d+ha sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yaM shi r+g+haM hUM baM/ oM ShaM mu kha sa nata ku mA ra be Sha d+ha ra
407a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma g+haN+De A be sha ya sarba pad+ma ku la sa ma yaM sarba mu dra ma ban+d+ha ya sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha pad+ma a be sha a a a a/ de nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do//

407b4(rgyud 'bum): yang 'di skad du bsko bar bya ste/ / gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig/ khyod kyis mi bde ba ma spang pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ de nas snying po 'dis dam
407b5(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ / oM badz+ra pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas gos dkar po bgos la dar dkar pos gdong g.yogs nas gzhug par bya ste/ snying po 'di yin no// oM pad+ma sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ ngas nas las mdza lta

407b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo dkar po 'di/ / 'dod pa'i nyes pas mi chags bzhin// thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni// de bzhin sdig pas chags mi 'gyur// de la chos nyid ni 'di yin no// de nas pad+mo'i rigs kyi phyag rgyal ye hUM
408a1(rgyud 'bum): bslab par bya ste/ snying la pad+mo bris nas kyang // pad+mo bsgoms na snying kha yi// pad+mo pa la yang dbang 'gyur na// bud med pa la la smos ci dgos// dpral bar sangs rgyas dkyis/
408a2(rgyud 'bum): bris te// rtag tu bsgoms par byas na ni// bsgoms pa des ni myur du yang // dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// kha yi nang du lce steng du// sangs rgyas dbyibs ni rab bsgoms na// sgra dbang lha me bdag

408a4(rgyud 'bum): / 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma shre yaM b+ha Sha ya ho/ oM pad+ma a b+hi She ka pra yats+tsha baM/ oM pad+ma sa ra s+thi bi sho d+ha ya huM/ oM pad+ma ung+ga gr-i ba sha~M ku ru dza/ rtsig pa'am yang na mkha' la'ang rung // pad+mo dam pa bsgoms na na~M//

408a7(rgyud 'bum): nyis kyis ni/ / pad+mo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra dza gad ba shI ka dz+nyA na pad+ma a be sha ya oM/ oM d+ha na pad+ma ThiSh+Tha a shan ba ku ru ra~M// oM sa ma d+hi ri sha pad+ma tiThA ru
408b1(rgyud 'bum): ne d+ha ra sha ya b+ha ga dI daM/ oM sa mA d+hi badz+ra d+ho/ a d+hi hrISh+Thak+kits+tsha hi/ dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni// de yi mdun du rta mgrin gyi// phyag rgya mchog gis 'dren par bya// dkyil
408b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la sogs thams cad du/ / spyad ras gzigs dbang bri bar bya// nges pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// 'gro ba thams cad nges dbang byed// dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs dbang
