408b4(rgyud 'bum): / dam pa'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+mo A ka rA ya sarba ma hA satwa na huM dza/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+har+m+mA ho hi/ oM pad+ma s+pho Ta raM/ oM pad+ma g+haN+Da a be sha ya sarba aH/ bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid
408b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo zhal bzhi sems dpar yang / / bsgom te de nas grub nas ni// skad cig gis ni gzugs mang 'gyur// de ltar bdag nyid dag nyid kyis// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gnas// pad+mo pad+mo bsgoms na ni// zad mi shes pa
408b6(rgyud 'bum): go 'phang 'thob/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang gtsug tor dbus// bdag gi sangs rgyas gzugs su ni// bdag nyis kyis ni bsgoms 'gyur na// tshe dpag med pa'ang mnyam par 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyis ting
408b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gnas/ / sna tshogs gzugs kyis ting 'dzin du// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di yin no// pad+mo bi shwa/ d+harma kA ya pad+ma/
409a1(rgyud 'bum): bu a b+hi ga a/ lo ke shwa ra/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslang po// de la re zhig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes yin te/ ji ltar rima'i tshul
409a2(rgyud 'bum): du ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing / / pad+mo la gnas sems dpar ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid skem// de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no// sangs rgyas phyag rgya che bcings na// tshong papa med dang
409a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par 'gyur/ / rdo rje pad+ma bcings na ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gis bcings na ni// bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bskur// pad+mo pad+mo'i ting 'dzin 'thob// sna tshogs kyis nid+yA
409a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba dang // sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur 'gyur// pad+mo sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// pad+mo khro bo dbang phyug dpal// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gis// pad+ma 'dod pa'i
409a5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub mchog/ sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid// rdo rje pad+mo grub mchog basbyin// 'dod pa'i pad+mo rab 'dod ldan// dga' ba yis ni legs pa sbyin// khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhir 'gyur// pad+mo'o nyi ma gzi
409a6(rgyud 'bum): brjid mchog/ pad+mo rna bas mdzes pa che// bzhad pas rab bzhad grub pa 'thob// grol bas dngos grub mchog 'thong ngo po// pad+mo ral gris longs spyod 'thob// mgrin sngon gyis ni 'gugs pa che// gos dkar gyi
409a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub 'thob/ / pad+mo gar dbang gis 'grub ste// mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa med// rab gtum gyis ni ma rungs 'dral// pad+ma khu chur rab tu sgrub// sgeg mo dga' zhing 'phreng ba'i nor// glu blangs gang
409b1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pas tshim/ / me teb mdzes shing me tog lta// dris ni mchog gi drir yang 'gyur// rnga mgrin gyis yang dag 'gugs// gdon mi za bar dbang du byed// pad+mo lcags sgrog bcing ba cha// dril bus kun nas 'ab
409b2(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / de nas pad+mo rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin te// rdo rje bsdam pa bcings nas ni// mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam par bsgreng // phyag rgya 'di ni ches dam chog/ sangs rgyas chos ni rab 'thor
409b3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / rdo rje bsdam pa bcings nas ni// mdzub me gung mo srin lag mnyam// sangs rgyas rigs mchog phyag rgya de// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par byed// rdo rje dam pa bcings nas ni// gung mo rdo rje rab mnyam
409b4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di ni rdo rje rigs dam pa'i/ / phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub// de las gung mo rin chen 'dra// rdo rje rin chen rab 'grub byed// gung mo pad+mo'i tshul du byas// pad+mo'i dngos grub 'theb par byed// rdo rje thal mo bsdam
409b5(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rje bcings na ni// skad cig gi ni dam tshig 'grub// rdo rje bsdams la mdzub bsnams pas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par byed// de nas rab tu ba par byang //
409b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du// rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas kyang // gung mo mnyan par bsdams nas ni// mthe bong mthe'u chung phye ba ni// sna tshogs pad+mor bshad pa yin// de las mthe bong gnyis bsngal pa//
409b7(rgyud 'bum): badzub gnyis rtse mo sdang la dgug/ dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug pud// gtsug pung sangs rgyas yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe bong mnyam nas btud nas ni// mdzub mo gnyis ni rtse skya
410a1(rgyud 'bum): @#dgug/ bkan nas ting nge 'dzin du bcug/ thal mo dad+ho mnyam sbyar la// mdzub mo rdo rjer bsnyams na ni// mthe bong ngos la sbyar ba 'di// nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams
410a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bsdams nas ni/ / lag par bkan te bcings nas kyang // mthe bong gnyis ni pad+mo sgreng // sangs rgyas pad+mo yin par bshad// mthe bong gnyis ni rdo rjer mnyam// mdzub mo lcags kyu ral grir bya// mthe'u chung
410a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni so sor dbye/ / gung mo srin lag pad+mor bya// pad+mor mnyam par rab sbar la// mthe bos mthe'u bzung dgug pas// g.yor pa'i mdzub mo bzung ba ni// pad+mo'i brdas ni 'gug par byed// thal mo mnya
410a4(rgyud 'bum): par sbyar nas ni/ / bkan legs phyag rgya bcings na ni// legs sog zhes bya sbyin par byed// pad+mo'i legs pa yin par grags// thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la// mdzub mo rtse mo bsnams te dgug
410a5(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung phye nas mdzod pur gzhag/ pad+mo khro mnyes zhes bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// sor mo thams cad dkyil 'khor du// snying khar rab tu brkyang ba ni// pad+mo nyi ma yin par bshad// thal mo rab
410a6(rgyud 'bum): tu dam sbyar la/ / mdzub gnyis rin chen 'dra bar bya// dpung pa'i spyi bor rab brgyan pa// pad+mo rin chen rgyal mtshan rtser// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor gzhag/ kha dang bcas par rab brkyang nas// nyid kyi kha nas
410a7(rgyud 'bum): dkod po dang / / kha ni bcu gcig nyid du 'gyur// ting 'dzin pad+mor bcings nas ni// mthe bong gnyis ni so sor dgyed// pad+mo sgrol ba'i phyag rgya las// mdzub gnyis pad+mo'i tshul du dgug/ pad+mo sgrol ba'i phyas
410b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya dang / / dngos grub thams cad grub par byed// ral gri'i tshul du byas pa ni// pad+mo'i ral gri'i phyag rgya yi// mthe'u chung pad+mo chen por bya// mthe bong gnyis ni dbyug ltar bsgreng // mdzub mo rtse mo dung chen bya//
410b2(rgyud 'bum): gung mo srin lag 'khor lor bya// rdo rje thal mor dam byas la// g.yas pa oM du nang du gzhug/ g.yon pa'i mdzub mtheb bzlas pa ba// sor kun chu skyes kha bye 'dra// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbar la// g.yon dang
410b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas nas de bzhin du/ / 'gying bcas gar byed bskor nas ni// spyi bor bzhag pa pad+mo can// rdo rje thal mo dam byas la// rtse mo thams cad kha phye ba// bskor te pad+mo'i snying khar ni// bzhag rasi bstan par byed pa
410b4(rgyud 'bum): pordo rje thal mo dam byas la/ / gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni// thal mo brkyang sta bskum nas ni// khar bzhag pad+mo'i gnod sbyin ma// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang // gung mo gnis ni phyir bkugs/
410b5(rgyud 'bum): rang gi mthe bo'i rgyab mnan pa// pad+ma'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshad// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// rached pa'i lha po thams cad kyi// dam rig tshacing ba'o// rdo rje bsdams
410b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dam byas la/ / mdzub mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas// mdzub mo gnyis ni phyir bkug la// rta mgrin gyi ni yin par rashad// pad+mo'i rdal mo mnyam sbyang la// mdzub gnas pa mdu pa ri nges par ba#
410b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya yin/ / mtheb mdzub lcags sgrog 'dra bar bya// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni// pacwo thal mo mnyam sbyar la// srin lag mthe'u chung gnyis bar du// mam bor banyis bcug dam du 'acing nganas pa/
411a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ hrIHgr-i kr-i ha~M/ shrI shi dzis rba ta kra pa/ bar gyi sa/ pad+mo'u tshur gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya sgrub par bya// de bzhin ga
411a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ / 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshe ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi
411a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rnams
411a4(rgyud 'bum): ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdorje
411a5(rgyud 'bum): snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM ma ni rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spun gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad+ma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'/
411a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM karma sa ma ye hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs
411a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbying dang 'dra ba la// pad+mo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil
411b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thams cad srad bus bre/ / de dbus pad+mo'i steng du ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// dam tshig mchog rnams lha ma bzhin// rang gi rig pa rnam ldan par// chos kyi rdo rje la sogs
411b2(rgyud 'bum): bri de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harme shwa ri hU~M/ oM d+harma sa ma ye badz+rA pad+mA ni hU~M/ oM bud+d+ha a d+hi Shi ka rat+na sa ma ye hUM// oM tA rA sa ma ye hUM/ oM bi shwa mu She hUM/ sna tshogs gzugs
411b3(rgyud 'bum): mchogs dkyil 'khor du/ / rdo rje bshugs kyis brgal nas ni// de yi dbus su pad+mo yis// bskor ba'i pad+mo bro bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad+mo'i phyag rgya gnyis gnas pa// pad+mo'i mtshan ma bri bar bya//
411b4(rgyud 'bum): bde gshegs nyid kyi nyid phyag rgya// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no// hriHoM pad+ma ta thA ga to/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dre pad+ma badz+ra aM ku sha ko Sha d+hA ri NI hUM/ oM pad+ma ra ti/ aM pad+ma duSh+Ti/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor
411b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis par yang / / rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// gtsug pud chu skyes che gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas dbang bskur bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// pad+mo'i mtshan mar
411b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa yi/ / dam tshig mchog rnams gzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// shIHoM b+h+r-i ku TaM be tA ni pad+me hUM/ oM pad+me dz+wa le/ oM sa~M me ni pad+me ni hUM oM parlom hA sa na e ka da sha bAka
411b7(rgyud 'bum): t+ye di ri di ri i aT+Te ban+de tsa le pra tsa le ku su ma d+ha re i le pra be sha sid+d+him+me pra ya ts+tsha hU~M/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum pa yang // rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // de yi dbus su pad+mo mdzes// bad+mo'i phyag u0f7f/
412a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya// de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin par// pad+mo mtshan mar ldan pa yi// pad+mol ni gnas par bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams
412a2(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / b+hi d+hI/ oM tA re tut+tA re hUM/ oM d+hiHhu~M/ oM pad+ma tsakra shaM kha d+hA ra NI/ ni la kaN+Tha sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya hUM/ oM pAr+N+Na ra bA se na pad+ma saM d+ha be ba d+ha ba d+ha hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhi par ni// rdo rje thugs kyis rgal
412a3(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / pad+mo'i dbus su pad+mo bri// 'bar ba'i baphreng bas bskor 'od bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin par// pad+mo'i dbus na gnas pa yi// pad+mo'i mtshan ma ldan par tha
412a4(rgyud 'bum): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ / sti/ oM pad+mo nar+N+Ne/ shwa ri pU dza ya sarba ta thA ga tA nAM na ta na ta hUM/ oM A be sha ya pad+ma ka pa tsa ban d+ha ra kra man hUM/ haMHoM ma hA pra tsaN+De pad+ma yak+Sha ni baM shwa ru da d+ha raN+Da
412a5(rgyud 'bum): bi shwa pa ya sarba duSh+Ta khA da khA da hUM/ oM pad+ma muSh+Ti a mu/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams bri ba// pad+ma lcags kyu la sogs rgyu// mdor na pad+mo'i mtshan ma can// de nas de dag
412a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so/ / oM pad+ma ra ti du dzi tse/ oM pad+ma a b+hi She ka pU dze ra ti/ oM pad+ma gi te pU dze ki/ oM pad+ma ne wi d+ya pU dze ho/ oM d+h+ya pi pad+ma ni hU~M/ oM pad+ma puSh+pa ts+tsha/ oM pad+ma ku la sun d+ha ri/ d+harma A lo
412a7(rgyud 'bum): pU dza ya Tu/ oM pad+ma gan d+he ts+tsha/ mchod pa rnams so// oM pad+ma a ku sha~M A rA ya ma hA pad+ma kA la na/ sa ya grI ba sa ma ye T+Ta dza/ oM a mo g+ha pa sha kro d+ha sa ma ye pra bai sha ya sarba satwa sa ma ya hU~M/ oM par+Na
412b1(rgyud 'bum): shAM ka le baM/ oM pad+ma gan+d+ha d+ha ri shI g+h+raM A be sha ya/ sa ma yaM sha na mu ki a/ de nas phyag rgya 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ pad+mo'i slob ma rnams ji ltar
412b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin btsud de/ 'di skad du khyod kyis gsang ba 'di gsu la'ang ma smra zhig/ khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re/ tshe gcig tu sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ de nas phab nas 'di skad du khyod kyi de mig lam
412b3(rgyud 'bum): du ci zhig snang zhes dris nas/ des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// des gal te nam mkha'i dkar bar mthong na ni de'i tshe de'i dngos grub dam pa'i ra slab par bya'o// yang na ser po
412b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong na ni de nor grub pa'i ye shes bslab bo/ / ci ste dmar po mthong na ni rjes su dag par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab bo// ci ste nag po mthong na ni mngon sbed kyi ye shes bsla ba'o// ci ste sna tshogs mthong na ni
412b5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par shes nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du gdong g.yogs pa bkrol nas snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed do// phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// de ltar rdo rje dbyings la sogs
412b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ni 'di bzhin du brtag par bya'o/ / de nas dngos grub dam pa sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang sems
412b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' che/ sna tshogs gzugs su bdag nyid kyis/ bsgoms na phyag rgya chen po yi// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dbang gis rim tshigs/ mnyam par bzhag pas bcan byab te/ bdag nyid kyis
413a1(rgyud 'bum): @#ni bsgoms na ni/ / mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// pad+mo pad+mo sems dpa' che// bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms// bdag nyid kyis ni dam pa yi// dngos grub thob pa'i
413a2(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / rang byung gdon mi za ba yi// dbang phyug las kyi phyag rgya ni// che ga bzhin bsgrubs myur bar yang // mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma satwa haM
413a3(rgyud 'bum): sid d+h+ya~M ho/ oM bud+d+he a bi Sha ka ko d+ho ho sid+ha d+h+ya Ni/ oM d+harma sa mA d+hi ra tsi sid+h+ya ho/ oM a rma b+hi sha'i ro so sid d+ha maM/ de nas nor sgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ kha yi nang du dbyig bcug ste// sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag
413a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya che/ / bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgom na ni// gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// gser srang brgyad cha drangs nas ni// dam tshig mchog ni rab brtan par// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// gcig tu gyur las stong
413a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur/ / mu tig 'brum bu khar bcug la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya la gnyis kyis// rin chen thams cad blangan
413a6(rgyud 'bum): nibadag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na yang / / gcig tu gyur las stong du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad+ma ma hA rat+na pra d+ha hu dza/ oM pad+ma su bar+d+ha pra d+ha hUM / oM pad+ma ru kuTapra d+ha hUM dza/
413a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma sarba rat+na pra d+ha hUM dza/ de nas rjes su dga' ba'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ sna tshogs dbang phag phyag rgya che// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ri// pad+mo blangs te mdun gnas pa// gang yin des ni de mgur byed/
413b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis// pad+mo dmar por dam bzung ste/ bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang // pad+mo blang te ji lta ba// rdo rje
413b2(rgyud 'bum): lta bas de ltar bltas/ / 'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga bzhin du pod+ma bzung // lag pa gnyis kyis bskor na ni// bud med thams cad de mgur 'gyur//
413b3(rgyud 'bum): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM bi shwe shwa ra ma hA pad+ma ho/ oM pad+ma sa ma ya pad+ma ho/ oM yo ga pad+ma ho/ oM karma pad+ma ho/ de nas mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo// sna tshogs ye shes dbang phyug che/
413b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid mdun du pad+mo bcad// phyag rgya pad+mod nyid kyis// de yi 'chi ba skad cig go// pad+mo bzung nas brtan bya ba// cho ga legs pa ji bzhin du// dam tshig dam pa de nyid kyis// nan tan kho nar gzhig par bya// gang
413b5(rgyud 'bum): gi ming smos 'jig pa ni/ / ting 'dzin phyag rgya sbar nas su// ji ltar de ltar pad+mo thogs// las de nges par 'grub par 'gyur// gang gi gzhig par khros na ni// las kyi phyag rgya sbyar nas su// bskor zhing brtag pa byas
413b6(rgyud 'bum): na ni/ / de yi 'tsho ba rdol bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM ma hA pad+ma ts+tsha na mA ra ya ho phaT/ oM sa ma ya pad+ma s+pho Ta nA sha ya ra ta phaT/ oM d+harma pad+ma ts+tsha da bi nA sha ya pre ta ya phaT/ oM karma pad+ma
413b7(rgyud 'bum): spoT yA dza~M bi ta ma s+ya kr-i ta phaT/ de nas chos kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// bud med du ni pad+mo bsam// de steng bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur// pad+mo pad mchog rtse byed cing // mnyam par
414a1(rgyud 'bum): @#bzhag na dngos grub thob/ / bud med du ni pad+mo bsam// de steng bdag nyid sangs rgyas bsgyur// rtse zhing dbu rgyan sangs rgyas ni// bsgoms na des ni de 'grub bo// bud med du ni pad+ma
414a2(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / de steng pad+mor bdag bsgyur te// rtse zhing pad+mo pad+mo mchog/ dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dbud med du ni pad+mo bsam// de stang sna tshogs pa dag bsgyur te// rtse zhing sna tshogs pad+mo mchog/ sna tshogs
414a3(rgyud 'bum): / dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya hrIH/ oM bud+d+ha ma ku Ta saM yo ga sA d+ha ya shI/ oM pad+ma pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya d+hi/ oM bi shA pad+ma saM yo ga sA d+ha ya s+t+wa~M/
414a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas pad+mo rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes ji lta ba bzhin du bslab bo// sor mo rtse sprad pad+mor bya// rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub gnyis sprad// rtse gnyis nor bu'i pad+mo ltar// rdo rje bsdam pa'ang de bzhin
414a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ / rdo rje bcings pa bsdam nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni myu gur sgreng // mdzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i// phyag rgya shAkya thub pa'i brtan// chos kyi rdo rje snying khar gzhag/ bsgyur te dpral bar gzhag
414a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / ting nge 'dzin tshul pang du gzhag/ bsgyur nas spyi bor gzhag par bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la// mchod rten pad+mo'i tshul du ni// gung mo'i gnyis ni bcings gyur na// sangs rgyas pa
414a7(rgyud 'bum): yin par bshad/ / de las me' bong rdo rje dang // mdzub gnyis ral gri lcags kyur bya// pad+mo rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // gsang ba'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// de las mthe bong bsnol nas kyang // mdzub mos
414b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo rab bzung la/ / drangs na rab dga' yin par bshad// legs so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bsdam pa dam byas las// mthe bong gnyis mnyam bcug nas kyang // mdzub gnyis rtse
414b2(rgyud 'bum): bkug rtse mo ni/ / dpral bzhag gung mo pad+mor bya// de nyid las ni snying khar yang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcing // lhag par rab tu brkyang bar bya// rdo rje bsdams
414b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dam byas la/ / mdzub gnyis rtse mo pad+mor dgug/ de bzhin pad+mo ral gri ste// mdzub mo pad+mor byas pas sbar// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe bong g.yon pa nang du gzhug/ dung ste mthe bong the
414b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bsgreng / / sor mo bskum brkyang dpang mthe'u chung // de las thams cad bcum nas kyang // mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya// mthe bong g.yas la sbyar ba yi// mdzub mor nor bu 'greng bar bya// rdo rje bstan
414b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dam byas la/ / mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya// mdzub mo bsgreng ste gar byed pa// pad+mo spyan gyi yin par bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe'u chung pad+mo lta bur bya// dam du mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste//
414b6(rgyud 'bum): mtha'u chung gnyis ni go char bya// de las mthe'u gnyis mche bar bya// mtheb gnyis nang du gzhug par bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ dam tshig mchog ni bla med de// rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang // mdzub gnyis
414b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dro 'angadra byas la/ / mthe bong phan tshun bsnol ba ni// gsang ba'i sna tshogs dbang du bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe'u chung gu mo mnyam bsgreng la// mtheb mos rdo rje gyur ba ni// gtsug bung dbu
415a1(rgyud 'bum): na de bzhin gshegs/ / de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe bong pad+mo 'drar byas la// kha nas dbyung ltar byas nas kyang // pang du ting nge 'dzin ltar bzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa
415a2(rgyud 'bum): las/ / sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni// mnyam par dam du bsdams nas kyang // mdzub gnyis rdo rjer mnyam pa'o// de bzhin rdo rje bsdam pa las// mdzub gnyis pad+mo 'drar byas la// mthe bong gnyis kyang bsnol
415a3(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / gung mo gnyis ni rtse sngar bkug/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mjeb gnyis rdo rje rab sbyar la// mdzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya// mthe'u chung pad+mo 'drar byas la// de bzhin du ni bsgyur nas kyang //
415a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo g.yon pa bsgreng ba la// mdzub mo mthe dong rtse sbur la// dam du bzung ste dgug ltar bya// de la mdzub mo gnyis bkug la// mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan pa ni// pad+mo dgyes pa bdag gnyis che// legs so zhes
415a5(rgyud 'bum): bya sbyin byed kyi/ / de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la// mthe bong gnyis kyis mnan nas ni// mdzub mo mnyam par sbyar ba'o// de nyid snying khar nyi mar bya// spyi bor pAd+mo rgyal mtshan bya// phab ste kha
415a6(rgyud 'bum): yi 'gram bzhag pa/ / pad+ma cher dgod dgod pa yin// rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la// chos kyis rdo rje tshul gyis ni// mthe'u chung mthe bong rab bsdams pa// 'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las
415a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub gung pad+mo ral thir bya/ / de bzhin nang du 'khor lor bya// zos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mtheb mdzub sprad de gnyis su bya// de nas snying khar sbyar ba ni// gsang ba'i srung ba
415b1(rgyud 'bum): yin par bshad/ / de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe'u chung pad+mo 'drar byas la// mdzub gnyis shin tu bkug nas kyang // mthab gnyis phyir bkyed mche ba can// de las khu tshur tshul gyis ni// mtheb gnyis ngos
415b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis btsir ba yi/ / pad+mo gsang ba'i khu tshur che// dam tshig mcheg tu rab brtag pa'o// pad+me lA s+yai la sogs pa// de dag gzhan rnams kun gyi ni// rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la// de 'dra bar ni bcings par bya// de nas pad+ma
415b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yin te/ / hra grA prA hA/ shrA sA d+ha hA/ gA dA krA dA/ dA rASh+Ta swa/ las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na khu tshur gnyis su bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen
415b4(rgyud 'bum): po las/ / chos gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig byin gyis
415b5(rgyud 'bum): brlab pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na ta thA ga Sha hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig kyi chos
415b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba'i rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra d+harmA hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM rat+na rArmA hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
415b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sman gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM d+harma d+harmA hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM
416a1(rgyud 'bum): d+harma d+hU/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/
416a2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// chos kyi ye shes zhes brjod do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// de yi dbus su bri ba ni// ye shes rdo rje
416a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs/ / de yi phyog rnams thams cad du// sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin// sna tshogs dbang phyug la sogs pa// ting nge 'dzin la snyom zhugs bri// de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so// oM d+ha
416a4(rgyud 'bum): / na bud+yA hUM// oM dz+nyA na bi shwe shwa ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na bud+d+ha mu ku Ta huM/ oM dz+nyA na d+harme shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a mo g+hA shwa re hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma dud+d+ha hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma badz+ra d+ha ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+me mA ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tuSh+Ti hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma d+h+ri ku/
416a5(rgyud 'bum): Ti hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+me sUr+ya hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+me tsan+da hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma hU~M sa hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma tA ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ku mA ri hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma na re ya hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma hA sa hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma narte shwa ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma rak+Sha hUM/ oM trA/
416a6(rgyud 'bum): na pad+ma yata hU~M/ oM dz+nyA nA drA muN+DihU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ma lA s+yai hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pan+da mA le ts+yai/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma grI Ni hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+mA na gyaM n+tu/ oM dz+nyAn rad+ma d+hu pa tsu/ oM dz+nyA na pad+hA p+'u rbu/ oM d+hA na pad+ma d+hi pa rbu oM dz+nyA na pad+manA~M nr-i/ oM
416a7(rgyud 'bum): na pad+ma a ku sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma s+pho Te hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma A be sha hUM/ de nas chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas 'di
416b1(rgyud 'bum): skad du khyed kyis gzhan su la'ang ma rjod cig/ khyod sems can dmyal bar lhung nas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re/ de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug snyoms zhugs la// snying khar
416b2(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang / / pad+mo'i ting nge 'dzin thob na ni// de ma thag tu myur bar lding // 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// dpral bar pad+mo bsgoms byas te/ goms nas shin tu brtan gyur na//
416b3(rgyud 'bum): de ma thag tu mkha' la lding // 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gis// lce la pad+mo bsgom nas kyang // grub par gyur na myur bar yang // nam mkha' la ni de 'gro'o// 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// gtsug/
416b4(rgyud 'bum): tu pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // grub par gyur na myur du ni// skad cig gis ni spang du lding // de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad+ma dz+nyA na hri da ya a be sha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka A be sha// oM pad+ma dz+nyA na bi d+yot+ta/
416b5(rgyud 'bum): ma A ba sha/ oM pad+ma dz+nyA na uSh+NI Sha A be sha/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+ma'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang // cho ga 'di ni grub 'gyur na// skad cig gis ni mi snang 'gyur// nam mkha' 'am
416b6(rgyud 'bum): ni phyogs gzhan du/ / pad+mo'i dbyibs shig bsgoms nas kyang // de yi steng du bdag dug par// bsgoms par gyur na mi snang 'gyur// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+ma'i dbyabs shig bsgom
416b7(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / gang tsha mthong ba de tshe blangs// mi snang bar ni myu rang 'gyur// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+ma'i dbyibs ni bsgoms byas la// mthong ba'i pad+mo de thos na// de ma thag tu mi sdang 'gyur//
417a1(rgyud 'bum): @de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad+ma sA kad+ya/ oM pad+mar tha/ oM badz+ra dz+nyAn gra hAn/ oM pad+ma ra sa yan hU~M phaT// phyag rgya che bcings pad+mo ni// kha dog dbyibs rnams sna tshogs
417a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / dbyibs de lag pas bzung na ni// gzugs rnams thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur// pad+ma'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs pad+mo'i dbyibs bris la// de nyid bsgom pa byas na no// gzugs mang 'chang
417a3(rgyud 'bum): par de 'gyur ro/ / nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad+mo'i kha dog dbyings rnams ni// sna tshogs dbyibs su bsgoms na yang // sgra yi gzugs su de 'gyur ro// pad+mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs dbyibs su/
417a4(rgyud 'bum): byas kyang ni// de la zhon nas mkha' 'gro zhing // ci dga' gzugs sunges par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad+ma d+ha ri bi shwa rU pa pra brta ya A be sha/ oM bi shwa pad+ma pra brta ya maM/ oM sa ma d+hi
417a5(rgyud 'bum): bi shwa pad+ma a be sha/ oM bi sha pad+ma ma no ta kI pa A kA sha bi shwa rU paM a d+hiSh+Tha mAM/ gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che// ting nge 'dzin gyis legs bcings la// pad+mo blangs te rab byin na// gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur//
417a6(rgyud 'bum): gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya zhes bye bcings na ni// des ni pad+mo blangs nas kya// byin par gyur na dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin skyes dge ba yi// phyag rgya gang yang rungs bcings la// ye shes pad+mo gang byin
417a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de ni de yis myur dang 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i dmachig ldan// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// pad+mo byin pa gang yin pa// de ma thag tu de dbang 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnams so// oM ma hAdz+nyAn
417b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma ho/ oM sa ma ya pad+ma ho/ oM dz+nyA na pad+ma ho/ oM karma pad+ma ho/ de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// de nas rab
417b2(rgyud 'bum): tu bshad bya ba/ / dam tshig mchog ni bsgrub bya ste// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// pad+ma'i pad+mo gzhag par bya// chos kyi khu tshur brtan byas la// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
417b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi las
417b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad+mo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyom par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungang so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma kri hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi las
417b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba rang gi rigs pa dam pa gsungs so/ / oM hUM d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM rat+na karma sa ma ye huM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje
417b6(rgyud 'bum): spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM pad+ma karme hU~M/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyi rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bi shA kam+me huM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
417b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do/ / de nas rab tu bshang bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbying dang 'dra ba ni// pad+ma'i las zhes
418a1(rgyud 'bum): @bya ba ste/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srung bus bre// sangs rgyas phyogs kun pad+mo yi// mtshan ma 'dzin pa thams cad bri// de la de dag
418a2(rgyud 'bum): gi rig pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so/ / oM bu ri ni hUM/ bi shwa karme sha ri nr-i/ oM ta thA ga te shwa ra a d+hi She ka karma bi d+ha dz+dza/ oM d+harma kar+m+me shwa ra dz+nyA na pU dza sa ma ye ts+yai/ oM a mo b+ha karme shwa ri hU~M/ oM pad+ma k+Sha
418a3(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+he hUM/ oM pad+ma karma badz+ra Ni hUM/ oM pad+ma karmi Ni mA ra Na pU dza karma saM ma ye hUM/ oM pad+ma karma duSh+Ti hU~M/ oM pad+ma karma b+h+ri ku Ti hU~M tra/ oM pad+ma karme sur+ye hUM/ oM pad+ma karma d+h+wa dze hUM/ oM pad+ma karma hA sa hUM/
418a4(rgyud 'bum): oM pad+ma karma tA re hUM/ oM pad+ma karma ku ma ri hUM/ oM pad+ma karma nA ra ya ni hUM/ oM pad+ma karma pra h+ni hUM/ oM pad+ma karma narte shA ri hUM/ oM pad+ma rak+Sha rak+Sha karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma hA pra tsiN+Da gI ti ni pad+ma daMSh+Ta karma ka ri hUM/
418a5(rgyud 'bum): oM pad+ma karma muSh+Ti ga tA ya hUM/ oM ra ti pU dza dz+ra dzaM/ oM a b+hi She ka pU dza hUM dza/ oM gi te pU dzo hr-i d+ha/ oM nai wi t+ya pUr+Na nU rbaM/ oM d+hu pi pu dze hUM a/ oM puSh+pa pu dze tsuH/ oM A lo ke pU dze tsU d+hi/ ma~M
418a6(rgyud 'bum): kan+d+he pU dze phreM dzi/ oM ha~M ya grI ba a na ya hU dza/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha kro d+hi pi DA ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma shAM ka la ban d+he hU~M phaT/ oM pad+me kan+d+he a be sha ye hUM phaT/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug/
418a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshul 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig/ sems can dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes sgo zhig/ de nas
418b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes bskyed par bya'o/ / de nas sdig pa bshags pa'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya che// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms nas kyang // sdig rnams bshags pas myur bar ni//
418b2(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa kun las de 'dag 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te// sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni// mtshams med lnga las 'byang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten
418b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug ting 'dzin du/ / shin tu mnyam par bzhag bsgoms la// sdig pa thams cang bshags na ni// sdig pa kun yang rab tu 'joms// mdor na gang yang rung ba yi// las kyi phyag rgya legs bcing
418b4(rgyud 'bum): la las rnams thams cad bshags na ni/ / las rnams kun las rnams par bdag/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM sarba pA paM saM sho d+ha na ma hA pad+ma// saM sarba nan ta t+ya sho d+ha na sa
418b5(rgyud 'bum): a ya pad+ma/ oM sarba pA paM prA Na sha Na d+harma pad+ma/ oM sarba pad+ma sa pa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka karma pad+ma/ de nas sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab pa// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya cher//
418b6(rgyud 'bum): tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms byas la// shud d+h+ya shud d+h+ya zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi dam tshig bcings na ni// bud d+h+ya bud d+h+ya
418b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes brjod na/ / las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// chos kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms nas ni// d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par
419a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgyab cing sa nas kyang // hrI hrInI hI zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying
419a2(rgyud 'bum): po ni 'di rnams so/ / oM pA pAM kA ya pad+ma/ oM a bA ra NA kA ya pad+ma/ oM ni bA ra NA kA ya pad+ma/ oM karma kA ya pad+ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten
419a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang gyis phyag rgya cher/ / rab tu mnyam par bzhag bcings la// oM oM oM oM zhes brjod na// mchod pa thams cad rab tu byed// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig mchog ni bcings
419a4(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / b+hu b+hu b+hu b+hu zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad de mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po snyoms bzhugs la// chos kyi pad+mo bsgoms nas kyang // he he he he zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams
419a5(rgyud 'bum): cad nges mchod 'gyur/ / pad+mo'i las kyi phyag rgya ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag bcings la// d+he d+he d+hi d+he zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//
419a6(rgyud 'bum): oM kA ra pad+ma/ oM b+hu kar pad+ma/ oM he kA ra pad+ma/ oM d+hi kAr pad+ma/ de nas dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab bo// 'jig rten dbang po phyag rgya cher// mnyam par bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // hri hri hri hri zhes
419a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod na/ / 'jig rten dbang por grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig ces bya bcings nas kyang // shrI shrI shrI shrI zhes brjod na// dngos grug dam pa 'thob par 'gyur// 'jig
419b1(rgyud 'bum): rten dbang po'i mnyam gzhag par/ / mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // d+h+r-i ga d+h+rig d+hig d+hig ces brjod na// pad+mo khro bar 'grub par 'gyur// pad+mo chen po dge ba yi// las kyi phyag rgya bcings
419b2(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / s+thi s+thi sI smi zhes brjod na// dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM dr-iHsid d+h+ya/ oM shrI sid d+ha/ oM d+hika sid d+h+ya/ oM si sid d+ha/ de nas las
419b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ / 'jig rten dbang por sgom bzhugs la/ bud med kun dang rtsa byed cing // oM ho su kha zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten
419b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang por snyoms zhugs la/ / bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // pri ya pri ya zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dges so// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing /
419b5(rgyud 'bum): a ho ra ti zhes brjod na// de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // sra kha su la zhes brjod na// de yi bde ba mnyam mi 'gyur// de la de dag
419b6(rgyud 'bum): gi snying pon 'di rnams so/ / oM sarba bud+d+ha pU dza pra brta na ban+d+ha/ oM b+h+r-i ta kA ra par+d+ha/ I ra ti pra brtan pad+ma/ oM ma hA su la pad+ma nIT+Ta hUM/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya ste// de nas
419b7(rgyud 'bum): bad+mom la sbyar te/ / dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje dgongs// las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gnas rnams kun tu gzhag par bya// de nas bad+mo rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni// bu zhes bya ba brjod par bya// las kyi
420a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gnyis byas la/ / las kyi phyag rgya des sgrub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen pa las/ las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi che ga rgyas pa
420a2(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs
420a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / oM badz+ra d+harma pad+ma hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+h+r-i/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ de nas byang chub
420a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ / oM d+harma pad+ma d+hi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM sarba mu khe hUM/ de nas byang chub sems
420a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya bzhi mchog dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra
420a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gzug ni bzhag par bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje pad+mo la sogs bri// de nas dkyil 'khor/
420a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la'ang marjod cig/ khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang mi de ba ma spangs pas dus byas
420b1(rgyud 'bum): nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes sgo zhig/ de nas de yi ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ lag pas pad+mo bzung nas kyang // bsgribs te legs par bsdam par bya// dri ngas sangs rgyas rnams mchod na//
420b2(rgyud 'bum): myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// mnyam par bzhag par gtsug phud dbus// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bzhag la// 'gro zhing rdo rje 'gying bstan na// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// pad+mo'o pad+ma/
420b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i gzugs// ting nge 'dzin 'dug ji lta bzhin// yid kyis su ni de bsad do// gang du phog pa de rgyas pa'i// sa sogs pa yi las byed do// pad+mo pad+mo chen po'i gzugs// pad+mo brgya grangs nyid du ni/
420b4(rgyud 'bum): byas te lag pas bzung nas kyang // bskor nas dbab la sogs de byed// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na ma hA rat+na hUM/ oM badz+ra hUM tra/ oM gan+d+ha pung+ga
420b5(rgyud 'bum): gri sA d+ha ya hriH/ oM pad+ma mu ku Ta ta thA ga ta ba shaM ku ru sarba na lo ke shwa ra a b+hi She ka sa ma ya ho/ oM pad+ma pad+ma mA ra ya sarba pra t+yar+thi ka na sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na d+hI/ oM bi shwa pad+ma sarba karma kA ro b+hA ba la li lu la la li hUM paH/
420b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo// chags nas dgro pa thams cad ni// bsgrub par bya ste dam tshig 'di// sgrub par dka' ba'i phyag rgya yang // rnal 'byor gyis ni myur du 'grub// de la 'di'i
420b7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig kyis snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ / oM sA d+ha ya pad+ma rags ma ya a/ de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po thams cad bslab par bya'o// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil
421a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad
421a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ / oM sarba dza ba da bi na ya ma hA satwa a/ A gats+tsha shI g+haM bi shwa rU paM san d+hA ra ya ma ma tsa sarba sid d+hA ya pra yats+tsha rIH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
421a3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// phyi
421a4(rgyud 'bum): yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ / de yi nang du pad+mo yang // de bzhin du ni bri bar bya// der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i// sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta bzhin
421a5(rgyud 'bum): du btsud nas/ / de bzhin du bsgo ste 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes bslab bo// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i// dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang // phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// sna
421a6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ / de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // dbang po ga
421a7(rgyud 'bum): ni sbyar bar bya/ / dkyil 'khor de ni de grub bo// de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bcing ba rnams bslab par bya'o// dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de bzhin du ras la sogs pa la'ang bya'o//
421b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gcig pa'i tshul du phyag rgya la sogs pa'ang de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
421b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa// rdo rje theg pa bla med kyi// mdo sde'ang ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje sems dpo 'a khyod legs
421b3(rgyud 'bum): pabar/ / rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las rtog pa'i rgyal
421b4(rgyud 'bum): po chen po rdzogs so/ / / bam po bdun pa// / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang
421b5(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la ming rgyu rtsa brgyad pa'i dngos gsol ba btab bo// nam mkha'i snying po sems can don// sems dpa'
421b6(rgyud 'bum): chen po gzi chen po/ / rin chen che ba'i rin chen mchog/ rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// dbang bskur rin chen chen po ni// dag pa che zhing dge ba che// sangs rgyas rin chen rnams dag sku// rin chen rin chen khyod
421b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal/ / nam mkha' nam mkha' las byung ba// nam mkha' kun gyi 'od che ba// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi// re kun mchog ni khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen mdzod spa rin chen 'byang // sangs rgya
422a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzod spu de bzhin gshegs/ / rin chen thams cad rab kun mchog/ rin chen dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen rin chen gtsor na drag/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun rin chen// rin chen
422a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma nam mkha' che/ / mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyan yin pas ni mdzes pa che// mdzes par snang zhing rab mdzes mdzad// don kun dag cing dag pa'i don// sbyin mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
422a3(rgyud 'bum): chos rin chen ni rnam dag mchog/ dge 'dun rin chen de bzhin gshegs// dbang bskur chen po 'jig rten don// don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin pa rab sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog/ gtong zhing gtong mchog sbyin
422a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa/ / sems can kun don de nyid don// don chen don ni khyod phyag 'tshal// bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjod che// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad che// sangs
422a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kun te khyod phyag 'tshal/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen che// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po// bzhad chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
422a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang gi mchog/ dbang chen khyab pa chen po ste// 'jig rten gtso bo 'jig rten mchog/ 'jig rten nyi ma khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen phul bas rab kyi mchog/ rin chen rgya te rin chen 'dzin// rin chen snang
422a7(rgyud 'bum): bas snang ba che/ / rin chen grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen phung po rin chen don// nor bu rdo rje nor bu yi// rin chen 'byung ba sku rab 'bar// rin chen sgra ste khyod phyag 'tshal// tshe nyid shing ste
422b1(rgyud 'bum): rin chen dbang / / re ba thams cad skong mdzad pa// bsam pa thams cad legs par mnyes// rin chen phung po khyod phyag 'tshal// srid rtse khyab par bdag nyid kun// mchog par sbyin zhing
422b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog chen po/ / phun sum thams cad 'byor pa'o// rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal// ming brgya rtsa brgyad zhi ba 'di// su yang rung ba 'chang byed na// sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba// skad
422b3(rgyud 'bum): cig tu ni sdig med 'thob/ / rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni// nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang gi mchog/ nges pa'i rigs ni skyed par mdzod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam
422b4(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam chog ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ de bzhin
422b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta u sha pa ri pU ra Na ma hA rat+na hUM/ de nas byang
422b6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra hUM tra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs
422b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ oM ma Ni ts+tsha/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad+ma hriH/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna chog
423a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM bi shwa ra rut+na nu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos de bzhin gshegs pa
423a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi dbang gi rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs so/ / de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu
423a3(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rnams byung nas/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ yang gcig tu gyur
423a4(rgyud 'bum): te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs kar zhugs so/ / de nas nam na kha'i snying po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying /
423a5(rgyud 'bum): po rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dbang la sogs pa bkod pa dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma phyag na bsnams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sku
423a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams su gyur te byung nas/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rin po che chen po'i char 'bab pa la sogs pa nor bskyed pa rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu bar byas nas/ yang slar byon nas bcom ldan 'das
423a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i kyil 'khor la gnas nas med du spodro pa 'di cid du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rin chen thams cad bsdus
423b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du// 'gro ba'i don du 'di gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsams nas de bzhin
423b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di bul te/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa
423b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// thams cad grub pa zhes bshad pa// grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa ste// srang bu bzhi dang ldan pa la// dang dang 'phreng ba lnga ldis brgyan// dkyil 'khor
423b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i grwa rnams dang / / sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor srang bus bre// de yi nang du rdo rje yi// rin chen las byung gnas bya zhing // ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni// rin chen
423b5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs bod 'bar ba'i/ / dkyil 'khor lngar ni brgyan gyur par// der ni skad bu bre bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas bskor ba yi// der ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM bud+hA rat+na hUM/
423b6(rgyud 'bum): / oM badz+ra ma Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ oM ku ru hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na baR+Sha hUM/ re ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas kyang // rdo rje snying po der gnas shig/ rin chen mchog ni sbyin
423b7(rgyud 'bum): par dri/ / de ya~M phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM sapa ar+tha sa~Md+d+hi pra/
424a1(rgyud 'bum): dats+tsha/ oM badz+ra ma Ni tsir+N+Na A kA sha gar+b+ha b+ha ka b+hA na sid d+ha sid d+h+ya ts+tsha/ oM rat+na ku sha A kaR+Sha ya sar+b+ba ar+tha na sa ma ya shIg+h+ra~M sarba ta thA ga ta satwa ma nu s+pha raNAM/ oM ti rA ka ba shi ku ru sarba na/
424a2(rgyud 'bum): shad+d+ha hUM/ oM rat+na tuSh+Ti hUM/ rin chen 'phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// rin chen 'phreng ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ nges pa'i dbus su legs par bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//
424a3(rgyud 'bum): lta 'og go rims ji bzhin du// nor bu'i mtshan rnams lag thob pa'i// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM rat+na tiSh+Tha tra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka rat+na mA
424a4(rgyud 'bum): le hUM/ oM rat+na ma Ni su ru hU~M/ oM tsan+d+ra ma Ni d+h+wa dza sarba sha pa ri pU ra A kA sha gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+na n+ya hA sa hA sa hUM/ rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// rin chen pad+ma 'dzin khyab pa/
424a5(rgyud 'bum): de dbus gnas par bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin par// nor bu mtshan ma 'chang ba yi// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//
424a6(rgyud 'bum): / oM rat+na pad+ma hU~M// oM he ga sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na gar+b+ha hUM/ oM rat+na ko Sha pra hUM/ oM ma Ni tsakra pra brta ya hUM/ oM rat+na ba shi hUM/ rin chen char 'bebs dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shug kyis brgal nas ni// rin chen char ni
424a7(rgyud 'bum): rab 'bebs pa'i/ / sems dpa' chen po der yang bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// mdor ni lag ni phyag rgya yang // rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin// de dag gi snying
424b1(rgyud 'bum): po ni 'di rnams so/ / oM rat+na bats+tsha pa dA ya sarba bar+d+ha sa~M b+ha d+ho d+hA ga bAn Ni ta to n+d+re/ oM ma Ni pU dza sa ma ya ts+tsha/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha kA da tsa ts+yai/ oM ma ni dan+t+ra kAd la ma hA lak+Sha har ba ra sarba dz+nyAn ti sha ya r+thaM/ oM ma Shi//
424b2(rgyud 'bum): ban+d+ha sa mA ya hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// glu yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ lte 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ rin chen lA s+yai la sogs bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM raSh+Ta rAH
424b3(rgyud 'bum): hU~M/ oM rat+na mA ye hUM/ oM rat+na krI t+ye hUM/ oM radz+nyA na ts+yai hUM/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ni/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// bdug pa'i mchod pa la srogs bri// de la
424b4(rgyud 'bum): de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so/ / oM rat+na d+hU paM rat+ne/ oM puSh+pa ma Ni/ oM rat+na A lo ke/ oM ma Ni gan+d+he/ sgo rnams bzhi dbus su ni// sgo ba rnams ni gzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni bdi rnams
424b5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / oM sarba rat+na A kaR+Sha ru Na ma hA satwa b+ha ga bAn taM A ka rA dzaH/ oM sarba rat+na pra be sha ya/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya sa ma hA ma ni rA dza ku la rat+na pA sha hUM/ oM ma Ni ban d+ha pa d+ha hUM baM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A be sha ya a/
424b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon nyid ji lta ba bzhin zhugs te cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la/ de nas rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa gang ba'i nor bu'i slob ma
424b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur te/ rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra ma Ni sa ma ya baM/ de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i gos bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ de dang 'dra bas
425a1(rgyud 'bum): mig g.yogs la snying po 'di brjod du gdug ste gzhugs par bya'o/ / oM ma Ni rA dza ku lAn/ de nas de ltar bdug nas 'di skad du khyod kyis 'di su la'ang ma brjod cig/
425a2(rgyud 'bum): khyod tshe rabs thams cad du dbul por gyur ta re/ sdug bsngal las mi thar par gyur ta re/ sems can dmyal bar yun ring por gnas par gyur ta re zhes bsgo la dam tshig gnyis su bya'o// theg
425a3(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'ang brjod par bya'o/ / de nas babs pa dang gter chen po gang na yod/ ji ltar thob par 'gyur zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
425a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thams cad smrar stsol cig ces smras ma thag tu gdong g.yogs pa bkrol te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dam tshig kyang bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das
425a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o/ / de nas ci 'byor par mchod pa byas nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying
425a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i phyag rgya che/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bcings// gtar brkos nas ni gang dag na// gter yon pa ni de zong 'gyur// dam tshig gis ni mchog bcings la// gang na gter rnams yod 'gyur pa//
425a7(rgyud 'bum): der ni phyag rgya btsir na no// de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// gang na gter rnams yod pa yang // yid kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur//
425b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du phyag rgya babs gyur na// de nas gter yod shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na A bi sha
425b2(rgyud 'bum): nr-i/ oM ma Ni pi DoM pA ri sha ya hU~M/ sau rat+na sa ma d+hi bri hi/ oM raSh+Ta A bi sha da ra sha ya hU~M/ phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni// gang du lus ni 'khor gyur ba// de na rin chen gter yod par // dam chig nid kyis
425b3(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa// de nas rin chen chen po yi// gter yod par ni shes par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang la babs
425b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bdag nyid kyis/ / rin chen chen po bdag nyid kyis// gter ni gang na yod par smra// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun du// babs nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa// de na
425b5(rgyud 'bum): gtar ni yod par bshad/ / de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA rat+na kA ya dar sha ya rat+na/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha ma Ni rat+na/ oM s+pho Ta s+pho Ta ya ni d+hi/ oM ma ma Ni rat+na dz+nyA na swa yaM bru hi/ oM pu na sa ma ya
425b6(rgyud 'bum): ban d+ha dar sha ya swA hA/ phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// de bzhin gang du dogs gyur pa// de nas rin chen 'byung ba yi// gter yod ye shes shes par bya// gang du dogs yod der yang ni// dam tshig mchog ni
425b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog bcings la/ / gang tshe nyid ni grol gyur pa// de na gter ni yod par shad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang du nges par dogs gyur pa// de na nges par gter yod par // ye shes bskyed de shes
426a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gdan yang dang yang dogs par// las kyi phyag rgya chog bzhin// der bcings de na gnyis gyur pa// gter yod par ni shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po na
426a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams so/ / oM ni d+hi dz+nyA na A bi sha/ ai radz+nyA na sa ma ya mum+b+ha ni d+hi ban d+haM// oM d+harma rat+na dru hi ni d+ha naM/ oM sarba karma Ni s+pho Ta ya dar sha ya d+hi bin+to da k+Shi pa/ phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni// gter rnams kun tu
426a3(rgyud 'bum): btsal nas kyang / / gang na gnas pa der babs na// de na yod par rnams par bshad// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gter rnams kun tu btsal nas ni// gang na gnas pa brtag gyur pa/ de na
426a4(rgyud 'bum): gter ni yod par bshad/ / ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gtar rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang na yod par rtag tu shes// de na gter ni yod par bshad// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas
426a5(rgyud 'bum): nigater rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang / / gang na yod par las phyag rgya// bskor ba de na yod par bshad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA rat+na pA rI k+Sha a bi sha/ oM rat+na sa ma ya hrid
426a6(rgyud 'bum): dar sha ya/ oM rat+na pa rikA dz+nyA na A bi na/ oM ma Ni karma prasma sa/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing //
426a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po bsgom na ni// babs par gyur na gter rnyed do// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // bud med dang ni rtse byed cing // gang du phyag rgya dam gyur tam// de na gter ni yod par bshad//
426b1(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyas ni ma gyu na// rnams can na chol byed cing // ye shes byag chu ba rnams na na// gted gyi ye shes 'dug par 'gyur// dbang pa gnyis kyi cing dzin gyis/ @#
426b2(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yar+b+ha bcis nas naM/ / king sa phywab rgya gnyis byung ba// den gter ni yid par ba shad// de la de dag mi snying man 'di rnamams// mnyam Na sa las / oM sa ma mas mas d+ha mangs
426b3(rgyud 'bum): oM di ni dz+nyA na A bi shas yog/ oM sarba karma sa sA Ta saM yog/ de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thams cad bslab bo// de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di yin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
426b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / ji lta ba yi ro mo bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no// sangs rgyas byag rgyas sangs
426b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas nyid/ / rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grub// rin chen lcag kyus kun spyan 'dren// nor bu dga' bar rdzas dkar byed// nor bu mgu bas dgyes par byed// nor bu lta bas nor thob bo// nor bu
426b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng bas dbang bskur bzhin/ / nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid mchog/ yid po seMn nor bus ci dgar sbyin// rin chen bzhad pas nor thob 'gyur// rin chen chos kyis chos kyang 'thod // gtong
426b7(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyis dam pa rnyed/ / rin chen ral gris mtshon chen po// rin chen 'khor los dbang por 'gyur// smrabs btsal ba'i dngos grub 'thob// rin chen char gyis nor chen po// nor bu'i mchod pas
427a1(rgyud 'bum): rab mchod nyid/ / rin chen chos kyis brtan par byed// rin chen mche bas nor thob bo// khu tshur nor bu'i dngos grub thob// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi
427a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no/ / rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'thob// rdo rje nor bu che bcings nas// rdo rje rin chen grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gnyis las nor bur byas// rdo rje
427a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin las nor 'thob bo/ / de nyid mthe bong rdo rje yis// nor bu sbyar te snying khar gzhag/ mdzub gnyis pad+mo'i nor bur bcings// 'jig rten dbang gis nor byin 'gyur// rdo rje sa las nor sna tshogs kyi//
427a4(rgyud 'bum): nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sprin// rdo rje dbyings mdzub nor bu yis// sangs rgyas rin chen nyid 'thob bo// mdzub mo mnyam te phyir bkug la// mthe bong rdo rjer bcings pa yis// rdo rje snying po'i phyag las
427a5(rgyud 'bum): byung/ 'di na rdo rje'i nor bur gsungs// 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang // rdo rje'i nor bu chen po 'thob// mdzub gnyis rin chen 'drar bcings la// gung mo myu gur bslang ba ste// 'di ni bcing ma thag tu yang // rang
427a6(rgyud 'bum): gi dbang bskur 'thob par 'gyur/ / de nas gung mo srin lag dang // mthe'u chung rnams ni pad+mor bya// 'di ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs// mtshan 'dzin pas ni nor sbyin 'gyur// mdzub mo mthe bong mthe'u chung rnams// rdo rje
427a7(rgyud 'bum): rin chen tshul du bya/ / gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo sbar// srin lag myu gu 'dra bar bsgreng // rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mdzub gnyis nor bur byas nas kyang // mtheb gnyis brkyang ba'i ngos snying kha// don kun
427b1(rgyud 'bum): grub pa sbyin par byed/ / rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya// nor bu mtshan gyi phyag rgya 'di// nor bu chen po rab sbyin no// de nyid las ni mdzub mo gnyis// lcags kyu'i tshul du bya
427b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ don kun 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya ste// nor bu rin chen lcag kyur bshad// de nyid las ni bsgyur nas kyang // mdzub mos mdzub mo bzung nas ni// mda' 'phangs pa yi tshul byas la// drangs nas 'gro ba
427b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar byed/ / de nyid las ni mdzub mtheb gnyis// sbyar ba legs so zhes bya'o// de nas mtheb gnyis sbyar ba yis// mdzub gnyis rtse mo sbyar ba dang // mthe bong gnyis ni dbus sbyar la// mdzub gnyis
427b4(rgyud 'bum): ngos dang sbyar ba ni/ / nor bu lta bas bshad pa ste// lta ba'i don rnams 'phrog byed pa'o// don kun grub pa'i 'phreng ba ni// rang gi dbang ni rab sbyin 'gyur// de nyid snying khar mthe bong gnyis// bsgrang snga ngos kyis
427b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba ni/ / nor bu nyi ma'i snying khar gzhag/ gzi brjid chen por rab sbyin 'gyur// srin lag mnyam te bsgrengs nas ni// phye ste spyi bor gzhag par bya// rdo rje nor bu chen po gtso// re ba thams cad rdzogs pa'o//
427b6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid las ni 'gying byed bcing // kha 'gram dgod par bskor ba ste// rin chen cher dgod ces bya ba// bzhad pas don rnams thams cad 'grub// ti dang dzin du sor mo sgom// nor bu pad+ma nor 'chang ba'i/
427b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas mtha' nas grol ba ni// sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed// mthe bong gnyis ni nang du dgug/ mdzub gnyis nor bur byas pa ni// nor bur ral gri yin te mthus// 'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje
428a1(rgyud 'bum): bsdams las 'khor lor bya/ / mtheb gnyis nang du bdug nas kyang // mdzub gnyis nor bur 'drar byas pa// 'khor ler sgyur ba 'thob par byed// de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas/
428a2(rgyud 'bum): kha nas 'dren par byas pa ni// de bcings nas ni ngag gis kyang // rang gi bkas ni nor 'phrog 'gyur// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// rin chen char ni rabi 'bebs te// ser mo thams cad bsgreng ba ni// phyogs
428a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi nas ni nor char 'bebs/ / rdo rje nor bu chen bcings la// gar byas gtsug pud dbus bzhag nas// kun la cho ga bzhin mchod na// rin chen kun gyi de mchod 'gyur// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgyas ni//
428a4(rgyud 'bum): mgrin pa'i phyogs su 'khyud par bya// nor bu bcings pa zhes bya ste// srung ba yi ni cho gar grags// don kun grub pa de nyid las// gnod sbyin tshul du khar bzhag pa// nor bu mche ba zhes bya ste// 'jigs
428a5(rgyud 'bum): byed don kun 'phrog pa yi/ / rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mdzub bkug mthe bong gnyis kyis ni// legs par mnan te btsir ba ni// nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub thob// dam tshig rnams kyi mchod
428a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog rnams/ / rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni// ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa la// 'di ni dam tshig mchog tu btags// gung mo nor bu'i tshul du bya// de dag nyid la rnams par btags// lcags kyu gcig sogs
428a7(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis ni/ / las rnams thams cad rab grub byed// de nas nor bu chen po'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// tra gra tri hriH/ shrI i ri d+hi di gri bi ri Ta ya a/ rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas
428b1(rgyud 'bum): la/ / las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kya mchig rtog pa'i rgyal po las/ ngan thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'cho gargyas pa rdzogs so//
428b2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
428b3(rgyud 'bum): par zhugs nas/ rang gyi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rat+na d+hU pe hUM/ de nas byang chub sem dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a b+hi She ka mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa
428b4(rgyud 'bum): sa ma yaM hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM rat+na a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang
428b5(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ / oM d+harma a b+hi she ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga tam b+hi She ka pU dza sa ma ye hU~M// de nas
428b6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/
428b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen gsang ba zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus ze// de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri ba ste// khri la
429a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i nor du'i tse/ / rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du ni// nor bu 'phreng ba bad+mo'i nor// nor bus bskor ba'i nor du'i rnams// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oMtra
429a2(rgyud 'bum): oM ma Ni sa ma ye hUM/ / oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka mA le hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na pad+ma hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na bri ti sa ma ye hUM/ thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// rdo rje rin chen
429a3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni/ / rdo rje nor bu chen po bris// de yi phyogs ni thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin par// rang gi phyag rgya nor bu ldan// rin chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams
429a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ oM sarba ar+tha sid+d+hi pra be ma hA badz+ra rat+na sa ma ya ma Ni sarba ar+than me sA d+ha ya d+ha ri NI hU~M/ oM ma Ni rat+na a ka rA ya swA hA// oM ma Ni rat+na sa ma ya aM ku sha ma Ni ku la dza/ oM ma Ni rA ga sa ma ya hUM/ oM ma Ni sA/
429a5(rgyud 'bum): d+hu hUM/ de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang // rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yi// nor bu de yi dbus su bris// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// lha 'og go rims ji
429a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin par/ / nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri'o// de la de dog gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go/ oM ma Ni rat+na ne tra A na ya ba shaM ku ru sarba at+ma saM b+ha d+hA na shI g+h+raM tiSh+Thi a ku shi hU~M/ oM ma Ni raH
429a7(rgyud 'bum): rat+na mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na sAr+ya dz+wa la ya sarba ma hA rA di ni hUM/ oM ma Ni tsan+da d+h+wa dzA gr-i hU~M/ oM ma Ni sA sa hA sa hUM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// nor bu pad+ma bri ber bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams/
429b1(rgyud 'bum): cad du// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so// oM ma Ni sa mA d+hi pad+me na~M dzuM/ oM ma Ni rat+na t+ya tha sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya ko She hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya tsakra hUM/ oM ma
429b2(rgyud 'bum): pA shwa gri hUM/ dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi// rin chen char 'bebs der gnas shing // las kyi phyag rgya ji bzhin pas// yongs su bskor bar bri
429b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / nor bu'i mtshan mar ldan pa rnams// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de nas de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM rat+na briSh+Ti sA d+ha ya ma hA ma Ni hUM/ oM ma hA pU dzA sa ma ya ni tra A/ oM ma hA pu dza sa ma na
429b4(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya rak+Sha/ oM badz+ra ma Ni rat+na daMSh+Ta ka rA le ha ra ha ra hUM/ oM ma Ni sa ma ya muSh+Ti hUM/ de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas rang gi slob ma rnams btsud de 'di skad du bsgo bar
429b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / khyod kyis tshul 'di su la'ang ma smra zhig/ khyod rab tu dbul ba dang dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar lhung nga re zhes bsgo la/ rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par bya'o// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/
429b6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri// bdag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang // bzhag na rgyal por nges par 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri// rang gi gnas su bzhag na ni// nges par rgyal po
429b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'gyur/ / rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen mkhal la bri// ye shes rdo rje de bzhag na// nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri// rang gi
430a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas su de bzhag na/ / nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// ma hA badz+ra rat+na a d+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ sa ma ya rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ d+harma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma/
430a2(rgyud 'bum): karma rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ phyag rgya chen po'i snying khar ni// rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya// bsgom nas mngon par dbang du bskur// mchog tu rmad du byung ba 'thob// mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin chen dpral bar
430a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms nas ni/ / rin chen rdo rje bcings gyur na// thams cad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// lci la rdo rje rin chen bsgoms// chos kyi rgyal po nyid du ni// dbang bskur ba ni 'thob par 'gyur//
430a4(rgyud 'bum): rab mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin chen gtsur tor bsgoms nas kyang // las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// las leg byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rat+na hr-i ya
430a5(rgyud 'bum): a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shi ka dra/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsi baM/ oM badz+ra rat+na uSh+NI Sha a d+hi Sha nas man/ phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms na rdo rje rin chen yang // ras la sogs par bris nas ni// rgyal po
430a6(rgyud 'bum): chen por de 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje rin chen bla na med// ras la sogs par bris nas kyang // sems dpa' rdo rje bsgoms na no// dam tshig rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid kyis// ras la sogs
430a7(rgyud 'bum): la bris nas kyang / / bsam gtan phyag rgya bsgoms na ni// nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur// ras la sogs la rdo rje yi// rin chen bris nas las rnams kyi// phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni// bdag nyid las
430b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis bdag por 'gyur/ / de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// badz+ra rat+na bi d+ha a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra rat+na bi ma ba a b+hi She ka/ badz+ra rat+na bi ma ba ku ru/ gser ram yang na dbul yang rung //
430b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rin chen bcings gyur tam// yang na rin chen bzhag kyang rung // snying par bsgoms nas dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// gser ram rin chen gzhan las byas// rtag tu dpral bar gzhag
430b3(rgyud 'bum): na ni/ nor che ba yi rgyal por 'gyur// gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas kyang // rang gi khar yang bcug na ni// tshig la dbang bar de 'gyur ro// gser ram rin chen gzhan dag
430b4(rgyud 'bum): gi rdo rje rin chen bsgoms na ni/ / gtsug tor du ni yang bsgoms na// las rnams kun gyis bdag por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rat+na hr-i da ya A ba ra Na hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi
430b5(rgyud 'bum): She ka ma hA ar+tha pA da/ oM badz+ra rat+na pa tsa pA de/ oM badz+ra rat+na ma hA karma ba de/ de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i ye shes bslab bo// phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje nor bu che bcing
430b6(rgyud 'bum): la/ nor bu bud med bu gar bcug/ de ltar dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni// bud med bu gar bcug nas kyang // dam tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyi// dbang bskur ba yi dngos
430b7(rgyud 'bum): grub 'gyur/ / rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu// de ni bud med bu gar bcug/ bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// las kyi bug rgya nor bu bcings// bud med bu gang las phyisaH/
431a1(rgyud 'bum): bcings par gyu na las kun gyi// dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA sid rti/ oM sa ma ya a b+hi She ka sid d+d+hi/ oM d+harmA sid d+ha/
431a2(rgyud 'bum): karma sid d+hi/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i phyag rgya chen po bcings pa bshad de/ rin chen rdo rje myu gur bcings/ gung mo srin lag mthe'u chung rnams// sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni// spyi bor bzhag pa grub
431a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'thob/ / rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang // mdzub mo gnyis mdud mtheb gnyis dang // srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni// mdzod spur bzhag pa dbang 'thob bo// rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la// mdzub
431a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis dngos dang mtheb ngos spyad/ / de nyid bsgyur nas de dbang 'thob// de nyid mtheb gnyis mdzub gnyis ni// chos kyi rdo rje tshul du ni// bcings nas dpral bar bzhag pa ni// chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur
431a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ las kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang // dbang rnams kun gyi 'phreng ba ste// 'gyur nas dpral ba nyid du yang // bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje dbyings skyes
431a6(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig kyang / / bcing nas rin chen dpral bar ni// bzhag na dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur// mtheb gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni// mdzub gnyis kyi ni rtse mo yang // nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni// rdo rje
431a7(rgyud 'bum): nor bu chen po 'thob/ / rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang // rdo rje khur tshur gung mo gnyis// nor bu 'dra bar byas nas ni// nor bu 'phreng ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas ni// gung mo nor
431b1(rgyud 'bum): bu 'drar byas la/ / mdzub mo srin lag gnyis pad+mo// kha bye 'dra bar byas pas 'grub// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcings// sor mo thams cad bsgreng ba rnams// nor du nyid du bsgoms na ni// 'khor
431b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ / gung mo mthe bong rdo rje yi// rin chen tshul du byas nas kyang // srin lag mthe'u chung mnyam pa yi// khar bzhag lce sta nor bu sbyin// de la mdzub gnyis rdo rjer bya// de ltar de ga'i
431b3(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyur bya/ / mdzub mos mdzub mo dra ba dang // de nyid dga' bar rab sbyin pa'o// gung mo gnyis ni nor bu bcing // mdzub gnyis ngos la dgug pa ste// srin lag nges gnyis 'dud pa la// mthe bong gnyis kyis
431b4(rgyud 'bum): bkab pa ste/ / de nyid rdo rje nyi mar bskor// dpung pa'i spyi bor brkyang bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal tshan spyi bo'i rgyan// bzhad pa'i tshul du byas pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas na ni// mdzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgreng /
431b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag pad+mo 'dra bar bya// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya// de las mthab mar rab sbyin bya// rdo rje ral gri sbyar ba dang / rdo rje 'khor lo'i tshul du bya// de nyid kha nas dbyung bar bya// mjug gnyis rin chen myu gur bya//
431b6(rgyud 'bum): sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang // de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni// rin chen char gyis char 'bebs so// de nyid go cha'i tshul du ni// snying khar rin chen gnyis byas pa// mdzub gnyis nor bu 'dzin che ba// dbus
431b7(rgyud 'bum): su bsnyams pa khu tshur ro/ / de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// phyag rgya chen po de dag nyid// snyim pa sbyar ba bcings na ni// mdor na gsang ba gsang ba yi// dngos grub bzhi 'gyur sbyin par byed/
432a1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar rdo rje'i gsang ba'i sbyin// dus rnams kun tu bcings mi bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mngon bshad par bya'o// waM/ 9// saM/ gral/ d+hI/ haM/ baM/ daM/ kr-i/ baM/ k+Sha/ re/ U
432a2(rgyud 'bum): mi/ gsang ba gsang ba'i khu tshur mchog/ gnyis su byas na las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las/ rin chen phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
432a3(rgyud 'bum): chog rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba mkhyen pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge
432a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka dz+nyA nota ta ma hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs pa dam
432a5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka sa ma ya hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma Ni rat+na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems

432b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre// chos kyi dkyil 'khor
432b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul du ni/ / snying kha'i mtshan ma bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di ye shes kyi snying po 'di rnams gsungs so// oM dz+nyA na sarba sid d+ha dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na aM ku sha dzaH/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na
432b3(rgyud 'bum): rA ga/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Te/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na duSh+Ti ma Ni hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na sUr+ya/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na d+hA dza/ an+nar+thaM hA sa ma NI dzA naM pad+ma hUM/ oM maNi t+ye ga/ oM ma Ni dz+nyAM k+Sho/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni tsakra/
432b4(rgyud 'bum): oM dz+nyA na ma Ni b+ha ShaM/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni ri rat+na baR+Sha n+tu/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na Na nI t+ye pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na rak+Sha/ oM ma Ni d+h+we na muSh+Ti/ de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas
432b5(rgyud 'bum): slob ma la 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o/ / khyod kyis chos ma mthong ba su la'ang ma rjod cig/ khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la/ nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed par
432b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la// rdo rje snying po bris nas ni// bsgoms nas rin chen don 'byon ces// smra zhing gsol ba gdab par bya// ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la// rdo rje snying po bris nas
432b7(rgyud 'bum): nirnga bsgoms nas rin chen byin cig ces/ / tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gdab// rdo rje snying po ras sogs la// bris te mnyam par bzhag nas kyang // rnams par bsgoms te ye shes la// dam chos sprin
433a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes gsol ba gdab/ / rdo rje snying po ras sogs la// mnyam par bzhag pas bris nas kyang // bsgoms nas dam pa'i las byin zhes// las la gsol ba gdab par bya// nga dag
433a2(rgyud 'bum): nas de dag gi sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so/ / oM di hi sarba ar+tha b+ha ga dAM badz+ra gar+b+ha/ oM da hi sarba rat+na drA ba bA~M badz+ra gar+b+ha/ oM de hi sA d+ha d+harmAn b+ha ga bAM badz+ra gar+b+ha satwa/ oM de hi sA d+ha karma bA ka b+he badz+ra gar+d+ha/

433a4(rgyud 'bum): snying po lags sems pa/ / mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // nor bsags pa ni gsol bar bya// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa'i// mnyam
433a5(rgyud 'bum): par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / / phun sum tshogs ni gsol ba gdab// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po legs sems pa// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang //
