433a7(rgyud 'bum): po bris nas kyang / / snying khar yongs su bsgoms byas la// gang gi tshe na snying 'pha ba// de tshe grub pas nor steng ro// rdo rje snying po dpral bar ni// bris te rnams par bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe mgo bo 'dar
433b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / des ni mngon par dbang thob bo// rdo rje snying po khar bcug la// de nyid du ni bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshe de ni byed gyur pa// de tshe des ni ngag 'grub bo// rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor// rab tu
433b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhag ste bsgoms nas kyang / / gang tshe de ni 'bar gyur pa// de tshe 'phang du lding bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM hri da ya gar+b+he de hi d+ha na sa/ oM rat+na a b+hi She ka gar+b+ha a b+hiShiny+tsa ma/ oM b+ha ga garba

433b4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig ni/ / rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // dbang bskur ba ni gsol btab la// mi li rat+na zhes brjod thob// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin du// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni//
433b5(rgyud 'bum): chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la// tsi li rat+na zhes brjod thob// nam mkha'i snying po las kyi mchog/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas ni// rin chen thams cad gsol ba'ab la// kyi li rat+na zhes
433b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod thob/ / de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM i li/ oM mi li/ oM tsi li/ oM ki li/ de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du//

434a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur/ / rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// sdug pa de dag gang rtses pa// 'jig rten kun gyis de dag byed// nam
434a2(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i kun gyi rdul dbyibs kyis/ / rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor la// thams cad 'grub par nges par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni bdi rnams so// A kA sha guH
434a3(rgyud 'bum): dz+nyA na sa ma ya ts+tsha/ tsid+ha gu h+ya dz+nyA na a d+hi Ti ts+tsha dz+dza/ pr-i yA nu s+thi ti dz+nyA na gu h+ya sarba lo ka rA ga ya d+hu/ sorba guh+ya dz+nyA na sarba sid+d+hi m+me prA yats+tsha nr-i// de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcings par bya'o// dngos gru

434b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / oM badz+ra hUM kA ra a b+hi She ka/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta a d+hi She kaM hUM/ de nas byang chub sems

434b6(rgyud 'bum): Ni rat+na hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na A a kaR+Sha karma sa ma ya hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na rA ga ra ti ka ma pU dze pra bar+t+ta/ oM ma Ni rat+na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na tiSh+Tha ka ra She/ oM ma Ni rat+na ma ra pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na
434b7(rgyud 'bum): sAr+ya lo ka pU dza/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+ha dza kang+ka pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na aT+TAT+TA hA sa pU dze/ oM pad+ma ma Ni sa mA d+hi sa ma ye hUM/ oM sarba t+ya gA nu smr-i ti sa mA d+hi karma ka ri hUM/ oM ma Ni rat+na tik+Sh+Na sa ma ya ts+tshin+da tsu/ oM ma Ni rat+na tsakra

436a1(rgyud 'bum): dr-iSh+Ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rig kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag
436a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ / phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par bya// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas bslab par bya ste// khyod kyis su la'ang ma basmra zhig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas

436a4(rgyud 'bum): ba sho ka/ sarba sid+d+ho pra yats+tsha hUM tra/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya ste// khyo 'am yang na sdug pa 'am// bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung // dpral ba gnyis ni sprad nas kyang // gtugs na dngos grub thob
436a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / de la de sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badz+ra rat+na sa kha'i pad+yA d+hA ra ba'i/ pra yats+tsha shI g+h+raM b+hi Shiny+tsa yi ha ha ha ha tA/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi ji lta ba bzhin du bcings pa dang rnam pa bzhi bzhin du bslab po//
436a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ma Ni d+ha ra sarba ar+tha sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha ho//
436a7(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga bAn badz+ra rat+na hUM/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di yin te// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// de nas 'dir ye shes
436b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ / gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams// chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas
436b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ / ras la sogs pa la'ang sems dpa' 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas// byang
436b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa 'dis bstod do/ / legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs
436b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshesas pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las//
436b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyis dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // bam po brgyad pa// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems

436b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa phyag rgya che/ / bcings nas mkha' dbyings thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs byin brlabs la// rang gi snying du bcug nas ni// ci ste 'dod na tshe 'di la// zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas
437a1(rgyud 'bum): @nyid thob des 'di sgrub/ / ci ste mi 'dod dngos grub bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang // de nyid chen po tshig re rer// brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang // thams cad bdag ni yin banom/
437a2(rgyud 'bum): na/ ci ste 'dod na bdag nyid des// de bya gzi can bge ba yi// go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas dam tshig phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// ji ltar rdo rje
437a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin 'grub pa/ / de ltar bdag ces bsgoms na ni// sangs rgyas dang ni gzi chen thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// chos rnams thams cad
437a4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyis/ / dag ces brjod na nges par yang // sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can 'gyur// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// thams cad kyi ni
437a5(rgyud 'bum): kun dag par/ / las rnams thams cad spangs na ni// sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes
437a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kun gyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas kyi// bkas ni sems can kun don du// phyag rgya chen por bsgrub na ni// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam
437a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do/ / phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa// de bzhin bdab ces bsgoms na ni// skad cig gis ni gzi chen thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub
437b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyud bshad do/ / yi ge med pa'i chos rnams la// rab tu spros pa yod min te// chos mchog 'di ni rjong byed cing // bsgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
437b2(rgyud 'bum): bshad do/ / dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba'i// gang gis las rnams byas pa ni// rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes pad+mo'i rig
437b3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyi dag/ mu stegs can gyis smad gyur la// de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni//
437b4(rgyud 'bum): theg pa che la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ting 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni// byam pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang // cho ga bzhin ldan khyab byas nas// skad
437b5(rgyud 'bum): cig gcig gis gzi can thob/ / de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces// smra bar gyur pa'i tshul 'di ni// 'dod chags pha rol phyin rnyed de// skad cig gis
437b6(rgyud 'bum): ni gzi can thob/ / de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// bdag gis lha dang reg pa dang // mnyan pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung // sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal kun gyi mthar
437b7(rgyud 'bum): byin 'gyur/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/
438a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun dbang bdagagur ces// bsgom par bya ba rnams bsgoms nas// skad cig gis ni gzi can thog/ de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i/
438a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar ni// sems can kun gyi re ba kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed gyur cig/ skad cig gis ni gzi can thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i
438a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyis rgyud bshad do/ / bdag nyid las ni phyung nas kyang // nor byin rab tu dga' byed cing // chos byung phyag rgya smran ni// gzi can tshe 'di nyid la thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub
438a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyud bshad do/ / dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir// nor sgrub pa la brtson ldan na// gzi can 'gyur ro ci ste yang / mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs
438a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dang / / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa rnams kyi dngos grub thob pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam
438a6(rgyud 'bum): tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la de bzhin shegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ gang gis 'dod la snyoms zhugs pa// de la 'dod pas sbyong bar byed//
438a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi// ye shes dam tshig yin par bshad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod pa rnams la chags bral min// dam
438b1(rgyud 'bum): tshig mdzes pa chen po 'di/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// rgyal bas kyang ni 'da' mi mdzad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/ sems can don du khro/
438b2(rgyud 'bum): min yang // khro bo chen po rab tu ston// rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po yis// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' 'o// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te// rang bzhin dag par shes
438b3(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / de yi dgos pa de byed de// pad+mo'i rigs ni chen po yi// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// nyung ngam yang na mang yang rung //
438b4(rgyud 'bum): ci tsam nus pa nyid du ni// sbyin pas nyi ma stongs par ni// bya min dam tshig 'di yin no// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi tshe ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
438b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas chos zhes grags
438b6(rgyud 'bum): so zhes/ / brjod na chos nyid yi ge ni// sangs rgyas chos kyi phyag rgya che// ye shes mchog gi tshul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// 'dod chags las ni dag pa'i
438b7(rgyud 'bum): chos/ / bde ba thams cad rab sbyin byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni// dngos grub byed pa'i mchog 'di'o// de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas bka' ni spang ba
439a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir// de la khro bar ma gyur kyang // ma rungs bdud byas dngos grub thob// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no//
439a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo chu yis ma chags pa// de bzhin 'dod pas mi chags zhes// smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyu ni 'di yin no//
439a3(rgyud 'bum): sprin dang mnyam pa'i chos med do// sgrub par byed cing smra ba ni// nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud //
439a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di
439a5(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnams su// ji bzhin du ni btul nas su// las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog 'grub sbyin// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
439a6(rgyud 'bum): las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ / dus bzhin yi ni tshul dag tu// chod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rtag tu ldan pa rnams bzhir yang // byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje'i rigs kyi las
439a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ / ma rungs sems can gnod bya'i phyir// dgos pa gang dang gang byed de// las kyi rdo rje rigs kyi 'di// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed// de la pad+mo'i rigs kyi las kyi
439b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ / 'jigs pas gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin// ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin// 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi las// sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa'o// de la nor bu'i rigs
439b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ / sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du// lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang // re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// las kyi don du bsgrub pa'o// rigs thams cad kyi las
439b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de
439b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin no/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs// 'di ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// gzhan
439b5(rgyud 'bum): la sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// 'di ni nga
439b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs rigs kyis/ / chos nyid dngos grub dam pa thob// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dam tshig chog ni bcings nas kyang /
439b7(rgyud 'bum): las rnams thams cad bsgrub na ni// rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// chos kyi phyag rgya rjod byed cing /
440a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chos ni chos rnams kyi// chos nyid du ni 'dis bsgrubs pa'o// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// las kyi
440a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying khar gzhag/ chos nyid 'di dag bsgoms na ni// las kyi chos nyid thob par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
440a3(rgyud 'bum): po phyag na rdo rje de zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/
440a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin gnas// zla ba'i rdo rje tshul gyis ni// ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes// de ltar 'jig rten kun shes te// dag la dag dang dkar 'od gsal// chags la dmar dang dmar ser khro/
440a5(rgyud 'bum): shes nas kha dog ji bzhin pa'i// de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bces pa'i// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni//
440a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lus la ji ltar shes// de ltar 'gro ba'i yid shes so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// khros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni// ji lta bu
440a7(rgyud 'bum): yang mthong 'gyur ba/ / de lta bur ni yid shes so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am sa phyogs phra mo 'am// yi ge 'phreng ba thob 'gyur na// dor na kha dog ci 'dra
440b1(rgyud 'bum): bar/ shes pa de 'drar der sems shes// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten kun la bltas nas kyang // ji lta bur ni snang gyur cing // mthong bar gyur na
440b2(rgyud 'bum): de 'dra bar/ / 'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya// de nyid snyoms par zhugs nas ni// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang // byed pa dang ni 'chag pa'ang rung // ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs// snyoms par zhugs nas
440b3(rgyud 'bum): bsams na ni/ / sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i// de dang de ni de bzhin du// sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi
440b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// sems dpa' byin gyis
440b5(rgyud 'bum): brlabs tshul gyis/ / sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag bsgoms na// ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi
440b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud do/ / nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// dkyil 'khor 'di ni ser skya thong // sems dpa' nyid ni phyag rgya nyid// mngon gsum du ni mthong 'gyur na'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi
440b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyud do/ / de lta bu yi dbyibs gyur pa'i// dbus na sngo bsangs snang na ni// rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes yin te/ de nyid la ni mkha' 'dra ba'i// pad+mo sngon po
441a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs grub pa'i/ / dngos grub de ni legs par 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// de nyid mkha' bzhin dri med
441a2(rgyud 'bum): las/ 'od zer dkyil 'khor 'phro bar ni// mthong na dngos grub myur du thob// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od ces par// dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du// bdag nyid kyi
441a3(rgyud 'bum): mdun mthong na'o/ / rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i
441a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// lus kun de bzhi
441a5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs rnams dang / / byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms la// de bzhin lus las byung mthong na'o// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems
441a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' phyag rgya che/ / rab mnyam bzhags pas bcings na ni// sgrub pas cho ga 'di yis ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub yin no// phyag rgya chen
441a7(rgyud 'bum): por zhugs nas ni/ / mig gi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // gang yang rung ba des bsams na// shin tu ring ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen por gzhugs
441b1(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // des ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang // shin tu ring na gnas thos zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// yid
441b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang / / sems can gang la des brtags nas// de yi sems ni des shes 'gyur// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// dag gam sems can gang yang rung // yid kyi bltas nas
441b3(rgyud 'bum): gar skyes pa/ / gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang //
441b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul gang dang gang 'dod pa// de nas gang yang rung bar ni// ting 'dzin gyis ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par
441b5(rgyud 'bum): shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // cho ga 'di ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// khros nas dgos pa thams
441b6(rgyud 'bum): cad ni/ / lha 'og rim pa ji bzhin bya// rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes kun bdag nyid du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mngon
441b7(rgyud 'bum): par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du//
442a1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags// 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes thams cad tho ba 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs// de la 'di
442a2(rgyud 'bum): ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob bo// lha 'og
442a3(rgyud 'bum): rim pa ji bzhin du/ / 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas na// mngon shes lnga ni de thob bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams
442a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden
442a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi// tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing // bden pa
442a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po bsungs na ni/ / myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de bzhin gshegs
442a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i/ / dam tshig la ni mna' bor la// rdo rje'i bden pa bsungs na ni// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs
442b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / ci ste dngos grub mchog 'don na// shin tu 'di las 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje 'dzin la mna' 'dor cing // bden pa 'di la bsungs par bya// zhes sangs bcom ldan 'das/
442b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// pad+mo chen po rigs mchog gi/ pad+mo'i chos la mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa'i dam tshig
442b3(rgyud 'bum): bsung bar bya/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'di las shin tu 'da' dka' bar// sangs rgyas chos la mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa
442b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog 'di gsungs na ni/ / dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems
442b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos
442b6(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ / sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas// de yi 'og tu ma bsgrubs pas// rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgya rnams// nyid kyis bcings nas dam par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po
442b7(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// su ra ta s+t+waM zhes brjod na// de nyid bskul ba'i bdag nyid che// ma bsgrubs par yang phyag
443a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu kun/ / nyid kyis bcings na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi de khon nyid kyi dngos grub tu
443a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud do/ / hUM zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // nyid bcings 'ching du bcug kyang rung // de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos
443a3(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi rgyud do/ / sarba shud+d+ha zhes brjod na// dag gam yang na gzhan dag gis// bud med chags la sogs ldan na// thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos
443a4(rgyud 'bum): / grub kyi rgyud do// oM zhes bya bas mdo bsdun// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// 'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi// rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos
443a5(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi phyag rgya'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
443a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing // sangs rgyas phyag rgya bcings na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub brtan par yang // bsgrub na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin
443a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// bcings nas de yi mdun du yang // rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni// shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi
443b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings na// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni// nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi dngos grub/
443b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // 'jig rten mgon po bsgoms na ni// nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
443b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni// nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems
443b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams
443b5(rgyud 'bum): cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ / phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// bdag nyid dang ni mdun du yang // sangs rgyas rjes su 'dran pa sgom// de nas de ma thag tu 'grub// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
443b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang // phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub nas ni//
443b7(rgyud 'bum): grub pa'i mchog ni kun bsgrubs pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// bdag nyid nyid kyis rdo rje'i dbyibs// rab
444a1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam bzhag pas sgom byed cing / / phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs
444a2(rgyud 'bum): so/ de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi// pad+mo chen po'i rigs la gnas// bdag nyid kyi ni bdag nyid nyid// pad+ma'i dbyibs su bsgoms par bya//
444a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud ngo // nor bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms
444a4(rgyud 'bum): na ni nor bu chen po'i rigs mchod pa/ / kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub thob// ces bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
444a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi
444a6(rgyud 'bum): rlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // snying la mdzad spu mgrin spyi bor// bzhag na sangs rgyas byin rlobs po// zhes sangs rgyas bcom
444a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyi rlab kyi rgyud yin no// rdo rje sems pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas la// snying kha mdzod spu mgrin pa dang //
444b1(rgyud 'bum): spyi bor bzhag na byin gyis rlob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byin gyi rlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas
444b2(rgyud 'bum): bcings nas kyang / / snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// bzhag na nyid du byin gyis rlob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso bos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi byin gyi brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
444b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dbang po'i tin 'dzin gyis// rdo rje pad+mo'i dam byas la// snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzig kyi dbang po'i gsungs
444b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor bu chen bcings la// snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya// zhes bcom
444b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi byin gyi brlab pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos
444b6(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni// dpral bar rab tu bzhag byas na// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen gyis// dbang
444b7(rgyud 'bum): bskur bar ni de 'gyur ro/ / zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// de la 'od ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud // rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa/
445a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas phyag rgya mdun nas ni// brtsam pa byas nas ngos bzhir yang // 'phreng ba nyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje
445a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang gyi 'phreng ba ni/ / bcings nas dpral bar bzhag na yang // 'phreng ba'i dbang ni de yin no// rdo rje rnams ni de dbang 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi rdo rje bcings
445a3(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / mgo bor bzhag ste de dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jig rten gyi// dbang phyug gi ni dbang bskur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'dra kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
445a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud do/ / rdo rje rin chen myu gu bcings// dpral bar bzhag ste de dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyis ni mchod pa yi// dbang phyug tu ni dbang bskur 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos
445a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//
445a6(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par ni// phyag rgya mnyam par bzhag pa bcings// zlos shing sngags kyi rig pa ni// myur du/
445a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// ting
445b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang / / snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// zlos pas myur du grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi
445b2(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / 'dod chags las ni khyod phyung ste// bdag ni khro bo yin bsgoms nas// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo
445b3(rgyud 'bum): rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i rig zlos pas// byams pas 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis ni// snying po la sogs bsgoms na yang
445b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha'i kun gyi ting
445b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin ni/ / rab mnyam bzhag par bsgoms na yang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// bsgrubs na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad
445b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//
445b7(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rab mnyam bzhag pas dang por ni// bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la// de nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bsgrubs na dngos
446a1(rgyud 'bum): grub thob par 'gyur/ / zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gsang ba'i mchod rnams
446a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yis/ / gsang ba'i mchod brjod byed cing // bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi// mchod pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod
446a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po// khro bo gsang brjod byed cing // khro bo'i khu tshur rab sbyar na// myur du bdag gis rigs 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de
446a4(rgyud 'bum): la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i// tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang // yid dang ngag gis phul nas ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes
446a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gdug dang 'phan dang rgyal tshan gyis// rgyal pos mched pas mchod
446a6(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / / sbyin pa'i thams cad byin na ni// nor bu'i rigs ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// nyid la byin gyis rlabs sogs ldan// rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur//
446a7(rgyud 'bum): chotshe 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rdo rje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyi// dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
446b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba dang // ting nge 'dzin dang // mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye
446b2(rgyud 'bum): shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin no// lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni// 'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon
446b3(rgyud 'bum): shes/ / de ni rab tu rtogs nas ni// sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi
446b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / 'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // mngon shes lnga ni dag gyur na// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
446b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na yang // mngon shes
446b6(rgyud 'bum): lnga ni bdag gyur nas/ / dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod
446b7(rgyud 'bum): chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang / / rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lnga ni bdag gyur nas// dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so//
447a1(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lnga yang
447a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gyur nas/ / dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu gyur// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byung
447a3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes
447a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan
447a5(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// phyag rgya chen por sgom byed cing // byang chub chen
447a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i ye shes 'di/ / bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
447a7(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas// lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs
447b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas// de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgyas zlas// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di/
447b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje
447b3(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ / las kyi phyag rgya las legs byed// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so//
447b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i
447b5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir// sems can don rnams rab byed cing //
447b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang
447b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / ji ltar yul dang ldan gyur nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed ces// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms byed cing // de nyid bskur na myur bar ni// mnyes par 'gyur ba nges 'grub bo//
448a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mnyes par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' ni srung ba dang // sems can don ni
448a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyang ba'i phyir/ / rngam pas mngon spyod byas rnams ni// mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mnyes
448a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / chags pas kun tu lta ba dang // byams dang snying rjes chos smra dang // mi 'jigs kun sbyin byed pa rnams// sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyes par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
448a4(rgyud 'bum): sman gyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang // nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing // de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor// 'di ni
448a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ / ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub
448a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos
448a7(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi rgyud do/ / de ltar rnam dag de smin pa// 'dod chags la ni mnyes mi bya// sems can kun gyi don du brtson// 'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du byed// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
448b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de la bdi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'di sten bde ba'i bdag nyid kyis// su ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni// de nyid
448b2(rgyud 'bum): bskul na dbang du 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams// dag bya lus
448b3(rgyud 'bum): can skyabs sprin dang / / sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// bsad na yang ni dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi
448b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud do/ / pad+mo'i 'dab ma kha'abyed cing // 'dod chags ngag la kun rtog la// gdul ba'i phyir ni chags byed cing // 'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
448b5(rgyud 'bum): pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur phyir// rdo rje rin chen nyin re rer// spyi bor bzhag ste dbang bskur na// sangs
448b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
448b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can kun
449a1(rgyud 'bum): don ma mthab rnyid / / sangs rgyas de cing sa sbyangs la// yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni// gas na dngas gru ba thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshems pa
449a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dngos grub thams cad mthob la// rigs rnams kyang ni mi brtson zhing // rdo rje
449a3(rgyud 'bum): brtags nas na/ / bas na dngas rlung myur du zab// ces bcom ldan 'das pagan rdzas gsungs so// de 'i 'dzin rji kyigs pa'i das gyu kyi rgyud// ma r+g+has m+b+ha dz+hal nam / de s
449a4(rgyud 'bum): ems can mi 'dul la/ / bdag nyid sdug bsngal tho byed na// rtswa nes pa bas gsad par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'dini pad+ma'i rigs kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
449a5(rgyud 'bum): snyi rje me cung byams med la// sems can ma rungs mi skyong zhing // bdag nyid kyis ni dkyus na yang // ngas ngan dngas gra zab par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu rgyun pas
449a6(rgyud 'bum): gzigs kyi dbang pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni ning du'i rigs kyi gsang pa'i dngas zlab kyi rgyud dang// mi gtong bdag lanar med cing // nor stong pa dang gnad byed la// dbul par gyur la sems can nam
449a7(rgyud 'bum): bas dan dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das re ba thams cad yongs su spong bas gsungs so// kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyang // rnal 'byar mthong gsong bcug na// de dag drang ba
449b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir/ / bdag gi dngos grub sbyin par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsad pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub
449b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can
449b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mi gtong zhing / / rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod bdag nyid// rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed// 'di ni srung ba rmad kyi mchog/ ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de
449b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig/ lan cig tsam yang brjod gyur na// 'di ni srung ba rtag chen po// skad cig dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
449b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rigs dang rgyud kyis chog mi shes// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyi// rdo rje hUM la mos
449b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / 'di ni bdag dang gzhan la srung // zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags dag cing byam pa che// thams
449b7(rgyud 'bum): cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin/ / 'jig rten dbang gis mtshan zlos pa// srung ba 'di ni rmad du che// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi
450a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud do/ / sangs rgyas sems can gtong byed par// ci nus par ni sbyor byed cing // nyi ma stongs par mi bya bar// snang ba 'di ni rmad kyi mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sra
450a2(rgyud 'bum): bas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi srung ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
450a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di bzhengs pas gsol/ gang gis sems can thams cad brtags pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste/
450a4(rgyud 'bum): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang bya ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
450a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs shing byin gyis brlabs kyis legs so legs so// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
450a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon dus pa'i// 'do sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje sems
450a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' khyod legs so/ / rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ brtag pa thams
450b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so/ / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
450b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas byang chub ting nge 'dzin// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na
450b3(rgyud 'bum): nibyang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur/ / bsams nas de ni rtogs par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
450b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems dpa' rdo rje snying khar bcings// nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa// brtan par gyur cig ces smras nas// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub bya/
450b5(rgyud 'bum): sde cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// rang gi las rnams ma grub kyang // gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na// shin tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' rdo rjes gsungs
450b6(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / ji lta ba bzhin bsgrub na yang // dngos grub thob par ma gyur na// hUM gi phyag rgyas bsad na ni// skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed/
450b7(rgyud 'bum): ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de bzhin 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud do// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas kyang /
451a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje blta bas bltas nas kyang // bdag gi rlung ma'am gzhan chung ma// sdug pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di
451a2(rgyud 'bum): ni nor bu'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbar la// bde ba'i mchog ces smra byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po// phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur// zhes
451a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzhed pas gsungs so/ / rigs dam pa thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
451a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gis dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes rjod cing // bud med kun la
451a5(rgyud 'bum): chags byas la/ / sems can don gyis mi skyo na// nges par sangs rgyas des mnyes so// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi
451a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / 'dod chags la ni bsnyes mi bya// bud med kun dang rtse byed pa// rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig/ 'di ni bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
451a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// gsod pa 'jig rten thams cad gsod// lus dang ngag la dam dgos pa// 'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni// /
451b1(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dag pa'i bdag nyid
451b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags dag/ mu stegs rnal 'byor ma dag la// dag pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni// bsrungs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so//
451b3(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor bu sngar bcings la// ma rungs rnams kyi nor phrogs na// dam tshig dngos grub smin par
451b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nga bzhin
451b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni// rab mnyam
451b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / / dgos pa thams cad byas nas kyang // sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
451b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / sems can kun la chags byed cing // yul la skyo bar ma gyur la// bud med dga' ba'i dag pa ni// gsang chos dngos grub rab sbyin no// zhes bcom
452a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rna ba'i rnal 'byor cu zhes pa// phrag pa'i rdo rje ting 'dzin gnas//
452a2(rgyud 'bum): mi 'grungs rnal 'byor 'di bsad ces// rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes bskyal// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig dam pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi
452a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bud mod kun dang rtse byed cing // chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras
452a4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbar la// re ba thams cad yongs bskangs nas// bud med dam ni
452a5(rgyud 'bum): sdug pa yi/ / dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'

452b1(rgyud 'bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bu ga nas ni de bzhin zhugs// bud med lus su legs khyab byas// sems med
452b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yang mgu bar 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje hUM gi phyag bya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas
452b3(rgyud 'bum): bcings nas kyang / / khros nas bu gar zhugs na ni// yid kyis de ni dbab par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam chog gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang
452b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyud do/ / chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni// bcings nas pad+mo'i ting 'dzin gyis// bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// thams cad kyang ni bsrungs par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mos
452b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings// bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// nyid du phab nas gar
452b6(rgyud 'bum): byed 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
452b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud ngo // chos kyi 'khor
453a1(rgyud 'bum): lo 'dra bar ni/ / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing // phyag rgyu bud med rnams kyis bskor// der ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya// gsang ba der mi zhugs nas kyang // sangs rgyas
453a2(rgyud 'bum): la ni nyid du smra/ / bya r+ya he ta baSh+Tas pa bi bo data swa mA ma sarba/ rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni// tshul rnams la yang de skad brjod// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i// gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par
453a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings ni 'dra bar ni// dkyil
453a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor legs par bri bar bya/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams ni// thams cad kyi ni mchog tshul te// dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang // dngos grub 'dod pas myur bar ni// su ra ta sa ma ya
453a5(rgyud 'bum): s+t+waM ho/ / badz+ra satwa ad+ya si d+ha mAM/ zhes brjod snying po 'di bzlas te// bsgrubs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid bskul ba'i tshul gyis ni// mgu nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
453a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di na rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni// rdo rje rigs kun rnams kyi ni// dkyil 'khor
453a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'jug par yang / / mkhas pas legs par bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni myur bar yang // dngos grub 'debs pa gsol byed cing // rA ga tA si saM b+ha ta/ 'dod chags las ni khyod gyur ces// sman
453b1(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'grub par 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud // pad+mo'i rigs ni thams cad kyis// 'gro
453b2(rgyud 'bum): pa 'dul ba'i tshul du ni/ / mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni brjod bya bar// rA ga d+harma ma hA pad+ma pra sid d+ha la ga me bi bo// de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor ni// kun gyi de ni dngos grub bo//
453b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// nor bu chen pos rigs rnams ni// don kun 'grub pa'i
453b4(rgyud 'bum): tshul du yang / / dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas ni// zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya// sarba pri ya sid+d+hi mAM/ rA ga shi sid+d+hi mAM/ sing+ga sid+d+hi ma hA satwa/ de skad smras nas dkyil 'khor kun// zhugs nas mchod
453b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang bla med pa'i/ / dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis// bsgrubs na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na// de nyid bskul na 'grub par 'gyur//
453b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes com ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
453b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// tha ta thA ga ta ma hA
454a1(rgyud 'bum): de byi bya/ / pri ya sarba su kha pra ta/ bden las byung ba'i tshogs bden pas// bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
454a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// 'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi// rdo rje tshul gyis 'di smos shig/ badz+ra satwa sa ma ya hUM/ tra ma bar+ya
454a3(rgyud 'bum): ti tiSh+Tha/ sarba kA ya ma ma ra shwa ra dza/ badz+ra gar+b+he sa muta k+Shi pa/ rdo rje 'gying ba'i lha mo che// de nyid bskul bas chags 'gyur bas// lus kun la ni brtag 'gyur nas// ji bzhin myur du dngos grub bo// zhes
454a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bying ba'i bdag pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sid d+ha sid+ha sa ma ye/ sa ma yo paM ta pri ya ni// zhes bskul myur du chaH
454a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ / rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bud+d+ha bud+d+he ma hA satwa/
454a6(rgyud 'bum): bar+ya ta me a ti pri ya/ zhes ni bskul na myur ba yang // rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos
454a7(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi rgyud do/ / sarba karma ma da wa r+ya wa tA ma me sid+d+h+ya d+ha badz+ra Ni/ rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar// rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so//
454b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
454b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir// ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas btsun
454b3(rgyud 'bum): mo rab sba bar/ / shes na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig/
454b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can kun gyi yid la khyab// sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing // sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni// dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das de
454b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsong ba'i mchog ste rmad che bar// dang ldan shes nas dang byas nas// bsgrubs dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur/
454b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ma chika gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chags pa'i dag pa'i chags bral gyi// sems can don gyi yid phyung nas/
454b7(rgyud 'bum): mu stegs lta bar byas pa ste// lta ba ngan pa'i gcong rong lhung // theg pa che la dgod pa'i phyir// gsod pa'i tha tshig mchog yin te// de ltar shes na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
455a1(rgyud 'bum): pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung /
455a2(rgyud 'bum): mi gtsang zhes ni ci phyir brjod// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud // bung
455a3(rgyud 'bum): med chags phyir rin chen rnams/ / rtag tu legs par bsag par bya// bud med bla med rin chen zhes// bsams nas de ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du mdzad pas
455a4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod
455a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// bud med chags rnams yongs bskor la// kun nas rtses pa'i ba
455a6(rgyud 'bum): ba ni rdza/ sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang // mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i
455a7(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / rab dag ngal te skyo ba na// rab dga' las byung bde ba de// phyag bzhi pos ni mchod pa'i phyir// phul na myur du 'grub par gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
455b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// hUM gis dam tshig bcings nas ni// skye bo bud med 'khyud nas ni// 'byung bar gyur pa'i bde bde// phul na ngan
455b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la// sdug pa'i gdong
455b3(rgyud 'bum): du bltas nas ni/ / bltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de// phul na de yi 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo spun gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i/
455b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyud do// las kyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang // bud med 'khyud pa'i longs spod ni// mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyis
455b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
455b6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhi gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag bsgoms la// ci nas sus kyang mi tshor bar//
455b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gis bud mang rtsi byed na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
456a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud do/ / rdo rje 'jom byas nas kyang // rdo rje 'phreng ba 'ching byed cing // de nas rdo rje gru blangs la// rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas la// 'dod pa'i dga' bas dbang bskur mchog/ glu dang /
456a2(rgyud 'bum): gar gyis bde ba las// bde ba gzhan gyis myong min te// de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgya
456a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms/ / cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang // gsang ba'i mched pas mchod ma ni// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi
456a4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes
456a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gsang ba
456a6(rgyud 'bum): tshul ni ji bzhin par/ / las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na// mched pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod
456a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskrad pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//
456b1(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las// sems can rnams la chags tshul gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub//
456b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur na// myur du bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po bskyed pa'i dngos
456b3(rgyud 'bum): grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / sems can thog ma tha ma med// nam mkha' 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// 'dod pa 'gro ba kun bdag po// sems can kun gyi sems
456b4(rgyud 'bum): gang ni/ / brtan phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o// rdo rje mnyam par mnyam bzhag na// nges pa rdo rje nyid gyur pa// sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// bcom ldan sems
456b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' de nyid de/ / rdo rje bzhed pa de bzhin gshegs// nyid sems rab tu rtogs la sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// thams cad kyi ni rigs su 'gyur
456b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid de// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po// de nyid pad+mo'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi
456b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los gsungs so// rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa
457a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
457a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs la gnas// mnyam par bzhag las ting 'dzin te// sad+ma rgyas byang
457a3(rgyud 'bum): chub rab tu sgrub/ / ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rab tu rtogs
457a4(rgyud 'bum): phyir rdo rje ste/ / gzung ba'i tshul gyis lcag kyu yin// phra mo rdegs phyir mnga' yin la// mgu bar gyur phyir legs zhes bya// spras pa'i phyir yang rin chen gsungs// gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste/
457a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan legs par sgreng ba gsungs// 'dzum phyir bzhad par grags pa la// 'dod chags dag phyir pad+mo yin// ral gris nyon mongs dgra gcod yin// dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo ste// tshig
457a6(rgyud 'bum): gis brjod pas smra zhes bya/ / rgya gram tshul du kun rdo rje// mi tshugs tshul gyis ge cha yin// 'jigs byeng tshul gyis mche ba snga// phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o// ji ltar bcom ldan sems rtag
457a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba// de bzhin rdo rje mtshan la sogs// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs
457b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing
457b2(rgyud 'bum): pa skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud ngo // rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas//
457b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje skyil mo krung bcings la// lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
457b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs kyis phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / ji ltar rgyal po nyid phyag rgya// rgyal po khrims la 'debs pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams// sku gsung thugs//
457b5(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje yi// gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du yang // nyid kyi phyag rgya btab na ni// bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher// shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsungs
457b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya ba cing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// ji ltar dam tshig dam pa 'di// skye bo 'gas ni bcings gyur na// shin tu 'da' bar mi bya ba//
457b7(rgyud 'bum): de ltar de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na// ma shi bar du mi 'da' bar// shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom
458a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// mdor na rgyal bas rdo rje ngag/ ba
458a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba ma yin te/ / 'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang // des ni chos kyi dngos grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing bskye
458a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // bka' nyan pa yi las de ni// shes na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom
458a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa gsang ba'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems
458a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po phyag mardo rjes 'di skad res gsol lo/ / bcom 'das 'di yang gis yongs su 'azung zhing byin gyis brlabs so// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu
458a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dus nas/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa
458a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po sngon 'dus pa'i/ mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so//
458b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las// rigs thams cad kyis brtag pa gsang ba'i tshig rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems
458b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
458b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rjes su dran tshul gyis// sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzin ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms na yang // bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas
458b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chags pas rjes su dran tshul gyis// sems dpa' thams cad ting 'dzin gnas// rab mnyam bzhag pas
458b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms na ni/ / dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi
458b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud do/ / khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su// bsgoms nas 'dun dang de bzhin te// phyag na rdo rje'i mthur gyur nas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
458b7(rgyud 'bum): dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos su ni// bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan par// 'dul bar deni
459a1(rgyud 'bum): rab byed ces/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni// bsgoms na
459a2(rgyud 'bum): mdun du de bzhin te/ / rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi// phun tshogs don ni des thob bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga
459a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ / de nas byang chub sems da chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gis dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
459a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur la// rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni// badz+ra badz+ra zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom
459a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gis dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin du// rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing // badz+ra satwa zhes
459a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod na/ / rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su//
459a7(rgyud 'bum): dran byed mdun du de bzhin te// hUM hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod na// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos
459b1(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi rgyud do/ / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo sgom byed cing // sid d+h+ya sid d+hu zhes brjod na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyi gsungs so// de
459b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang // sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na// don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur//
459b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu chos kyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
459b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dam pa'i chos ni yi ge med//
459b5(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung ba ste// a zhes bya bas chos rnams ni// skye ba med par dgongs pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyis ni// shes pas bsgoms te de nas kyang // yi ge kun gyi ye shes ni// bde
459b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes/ / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos
459b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi// mdo sde 'di ni dad pa yis// dad nas bcangs sam bklags gyur na// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
460a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sdig pa'i sems can phan don du// sdig can sdig spod bzlog pa dang /
460a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bka' ni srung ba'i phyir// bsad pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
460a3(rgyud 'bum): do/ 'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes// dam pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang // thog ma tha mar 'di bsgoms na// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
460a4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can don phyir sbyin byed cing // bsams pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing // chos bsgoms
460a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni nor bu yi/ / rigs kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chos rin chen gyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas
460a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag ni rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge
460a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sangs rgyas kyis ni ting 'dzin las// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa// 'odi ni bsgoms par byas nas kyang // dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes
460b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// bla med dang ni
460b2(rgyud 'bum): las mang rnams/ / sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad dang // shes na yang ni grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las
460b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sdig pa dag pa rgyu yi phyir// mtshams med byed las mi zlog na// gsod pa'i las la dad pa can// des ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
460b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i dag/ kun dag pas na dgos pa kun// des byed las 'di yin no bar// shes na yang
460b5(rgyud 'bum): ni grub par 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo'i gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// srid ldan dbul po thams cad kyi// rtag tu bsam pa kun bskang la
460b6(rgyud 'bum): don kun grub pas kun bdag ni/ / grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ces bcom ldan 'das rin po che rgyal mtshan gyis gsungs so// rigs thams can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
460b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo
461a1(rgyud 'bum): mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul// 'bad pa kun gyis sbyor na ni// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs/
461a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ning bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni// slob ma yin bu min pa yi// mdun du
