461a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya mi brjod de/ / de dag gsang bas phyag rgya 'gra ba// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni//
461a4(rgyud 'bum): sna nas huM byung ldan gyur la// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos
461a5(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi rgyud do/ / pad+mo'i chen po'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje phra mo'i rdul gyis ni// rdo rje lta bas bltas na ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo bzhed pas gsungs so// de la
461a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rigs kyi phra mo'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje rim chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// shin tu phra mo'i lha 'bar bas// don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur// zhes bcom
461a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje nor bu'i gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi phra mo ba phras kyi rgyang ngo // de nas 'ang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig gi ye
461b1(rgyud 'bum): shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dzin// sgrub phyir stsol bar gyur pa na// gang tshe
461b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la skar ma 'dra/ / dkar po rgyug par des mthong na// de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi// spyan ni bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes// phyin chad sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// rtag pa kun las bsgrub par bya//
461b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te// ji snyed dngos grub yod par 'gyur
461b4(rgyud 'bum): de snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams/ / mkha' rgyug 'gro ba'i ma 'ong yang rung // mthong na rdo rje spun dag par// shes pas mchod na dngos grub ni// bla na med pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
461b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// g.yos pa'am ni g.yon phyogs kyi// mkha' la nam mkha'i dbyings nyid ni// sprin 'drar myur du 'khor ba yang // mig gi/
461b6(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar gyur pas kyang // rdo rje las 'byung phyag rgya de// mthong nas 'jigs par ma 'gyur la// phyag rgya de ni bzung na ni// rdo rje spun ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so//
461b7(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gang tshe skya 'am dmar ba dang // dkar ba'am ser ba'am sna tshogs kyi// dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe// dgongs 'gyur 'khor
462a1(rgyud 'bum): lo'i spyan 'grub 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad+mos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi spur gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba
462a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / gser la sogs pa 'dra ba ni// gang tshe mkha' mthong mkha' yi mig/ de ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos
462a3(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
462a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// 'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir// gtso bo thams cad mchod byas pa// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob
462a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags bdag ces sgoms byed cing // gsang ba'i
462a6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa rab byas na/ / rdo rje 'dod pa'i gzi can mnyam// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bzhed pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos
462a7(rgyud 'bum): grub kyis rgyud do/ / khro ba bdag ces sgom byed cing // gsang ba'i chod pa rab byas pa// khams gsum rnam rgyal ba 'ang ba'i// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na
462b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nang du song ba'i yid kyis ni// 'dod pa dam par sgom byed cing // dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi ge yis// sangs rgyas mngon
462b2(rgyud 'bum): par mchod na ni/ / dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
462b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la/ / bsam pa g.yos pas gdung na ni// phyag la rtag tu brtson byas la// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungs so//
462b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi
462b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun// rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas// e ma'o sems can
462b6(rgyud 'bum): don rnams la/ / skyo bar 'gyur ba gang bshad rmad// 'di ni las kyi dam tshig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du// bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchod na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes
462b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// sems can kun
463a1(rgyud 'bum): la bde sbyin pa'i/ / kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi
463a2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sems can kun la phan byed pa'i// kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te// rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom
463a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te// bdag nyid
463a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro 'dul skur gnas la/ / mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo chags pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi
463a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud do/ / sems can kun la don chen sbyin// kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te// don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub
463a6(rgyud 'bum): pas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
463a7(rgyud 'bum): las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rang gi ting nge 'dzin pa yis// g.yas pa'i mdzub mos
463b1(rgyud 'bum): mdun nas ni/ / go char bcings te spyi bor bzhag/ shin tu yang ni bsrung bar 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyis rigs kyi
463b2(rgyud 'bum): chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba// ri mor bris nas mtshan bsgreng ste// mnyes na bud med gang bsams pa// de ni 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
463b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sa la gnod sprin gdong bris la// de yi mig gi phyogs su ni// mdzub mo'i sen mo btsugs na yang // bud med
463b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog ni 'dran par 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// lag pa gnyis su pad+mo'i blangs// 'dod
463b5(rgyud 'bum): chags dag pa lta byed cing / / rdo rje lta bas bud med de// bltas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos
463b6(rgyud 'bum): grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gnas// lag pa gnyis kyis nor bu gzung // hUM zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud med kun la 'dud byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// riH
463b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems 'cher po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la
464a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / mchod pa'i las kyi cho gar sbyar// gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa// de dang de ni gsol
464a2(rgyud 'bum): btab ste/ / mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das las rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje
464a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ / gsang ba'i mchos pa cho gar sbyar// dgos pa gang zhig smras pa de// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di
464a4(rgyud 'bum): ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / khro bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang / rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas// mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams pa// da ni myur du dngos
464a5(rgyud 'bum): grub 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// yid kyi mchod pa byas nas kyang /
464a6(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de yis dngos grub thams cad thob// ces bcom ldan 'das pad+mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
464a7(rgyud 'bum): do/ / rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la// mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsung
464b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsgoms pa'i dngos grub kyi
464b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas
464b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pas/ / dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i
464b4(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni// bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste// sems dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs la// bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal
464b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs
464b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do/ / sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya bzhin// phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de bzhin// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par bya// zhes bcom
464b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do// chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la// ngag gi phyag
465a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas de dag kun/ / sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge dzin// ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
465a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do/ / sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang // mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub rnams// bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang // rdo rje las rnams
465a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig
465a4(rgyud 'bum): tu 'dus nas/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// rdo rje thegs pa bla na
465a5(rgyud 'bum): med/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod leg so// rdo rje chos ni khyod leg
465a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las ni khyod legs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las// brtag pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so//
465a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa bam po dgu pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshogs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// lta ba ngan cing chags
465b1(rgyud 'bum): bral la/ / gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te// sems can kun la phan don du// de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
465b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i
465b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyud yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje tshig gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i
465b4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste/ dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i
465b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de/ phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'di bzhis bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga
465b6(rgyud 'bum): ta pU dza bas+tha na ya/ At+ma naM nir+ya tA ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She ka ya At+ma naM/ nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra
465b7(rgyud 'bum): brta nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya mAM/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta pU dza karma Ne At+ma naM nir+yA ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mAM/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang /
466a1(rgyud 'bum): ma bral la kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing / bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la/ ci dga' bar byed/
466a2(rgyud 'bum): cing rdo rje tshig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod na ni/ de nas ras la bcom
466a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs/ de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du kha dog dang rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bri zhing / sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil
466a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la bzhugs la/ rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su bri'o// de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas la 'dzab bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthar mchod
466a5(rgyud 'bum): pargya cher byas la tshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
466a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni nges de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' pa bzhin
466a7(rgyud 'bum): du ji lta ba bzhin bcings shing dkrol te rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi bso bar cung zad tsam zhig phyag rgya bkrol te/ ji lta ba bzhin bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o//
466b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas phyag rgya la bar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du nam mkha' la lding bar 'gyur ro// gzugs ci dga' ba dang / mi snang ba dang / las thams cad kyang/
466b2(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur ro// bcings ma thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis kyang las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// yang na ting nge 'dzin sgrub par
466b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na ni des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te/ ting nge 'dzin de gang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag skyil mo krung mi zhig par snyoms par
466b4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs te 'dug par bya'o/ / de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom
466b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / ci ste las sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlas shing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgrubs la/ de nas mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las
466b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag dang // gzhan dang // grong dang // grong khyer
466b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams go cha bcing ba la sogs pas bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ / dbab pa yang byang ste tsan dan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zin pa dang gdon gyis mchin pa rnapas rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / lag pa dang / mda' thogs pa
467a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang / pad+mo dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lce dang / rdo rje rgya gram dang / go cha dang / mche ba dang / khu tshur dang /
467a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya la sogs pa dngos po thams cad lan cig brjod pas 'bebs par byed do// sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de/ rma bya'i mjug sgro'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la/ de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro de sems dpa'
467a3(rgyud 'bum): rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnan la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya babs kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas rma bya'i mjug sgro las gzugs sna tshogs la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te/
467a4(rgyud 'bum): de phyin chad rma bya'i mjug sgros rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ mjug sgro de nyid la lan cig bzlas te bskor bas kyang / bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro//
467a5(rgyud 'bum): mjug sgro de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i rnams kyang ston/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i
467a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa la sogs pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas/ bdag nyid las rnam
467a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o/ / ci ste dbang du byed par 'dod na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya de
467b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bar gyur gyi bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas de phyin chang phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du byang na sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ tsi
467b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub par 'dod na yang des dang po kho nang de bzhin du zlos shing zla ba gcig tu brgyad stong bzlas la/ de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings te de bzhin du mtshan sa
467b3(rgyud 'bum): thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar bzlas par bya'o/ / de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub gang yang rung ba gcig tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje/
467b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pas gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por ni sngar
467b5(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pa bya ste/ de ltar ci 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de'i mthar mtshang thog thag tu bzlas pa byas la/ de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang chad pas gcad par
467b6(rgyud 'bum): nus par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// 'on te sgrub par 'dod na yang des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la/ des de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu
467b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing / ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas par dus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlos shing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang / ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nas rdorje/
468a1(rgyud 'bum): hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po la phyag rgya bcings pa de las hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam nangs pa dang lha rnams kyi dbang po dang dbang phyug chen po
468a2(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas nas bka' nod par gyur to/ / de nas rig 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// gang gi tshe ngas khyod tshur shog 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na
468a3(rgyud 'bum): khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i bka' bzhin byos shig/ de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te// yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dgar bka' stsol cing bskor te slar
468a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ongs nas kyang phan gdags pa dang chad pas gcad pa rnams byed cing / lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi longs spyod la nye bar spyod nas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing / lha thams cad kyi dbang po'i bud
468a5(rgyud 'bum): med la sogs pa bud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas nye bar spyod kyang de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nus pa med de/ hUM zhes bya bas lha la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad gnon cing / de nas
468a6(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa chung ngu'i stong gi bar du 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzab byas la zla ba'i mthar rdo rje hUM zhes bya
468a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas hUM zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i cho ga bzhin phya rgya bcings na
468b1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gzugs rnams ston pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / sgra ma rnams ston pa dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad kyi dgag pa
468b2(rgyud 'bum): bskyed par bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad bsdu ba dang / 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bston pa dang / rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang / gang mo cher bgad pa dang / sems can thams cad
468b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyang ba dang / gcad pa dang / dbye ba dang / dus kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang / ji lta bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa dang // las thams cad la 'jug pa dang / dgag pa dang / bsdigs pa dang /
468b4(rgyud 'bum): gsad pa dang / sems can thams cad phyag rgyas gang ba pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / dngos po thams cad glu len du gzhug pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa
468b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste rdo rje phra mo sgrub par 'dod
468b6(rgyud 'bum): na yang des rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du sgom zhing / de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o//
468b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas nam nangs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan dag pa dang tshar gcid pa nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste las
469a1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlos shing zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs la de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes
469a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / de nas las thams cad byed par 'dod na yang lan cig brjod de yid kyis bsams pas srung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rdo rje
469a3(rgyud 'bum): 'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas pad+mo'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro//
469a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bsgrub par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris la/ de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' bzhi bris la/ grwa rnams su lha mo rnams
469a5(rgyud 'bum): bri'o/ / de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te dus ji bzhin par dam pa'i
469a6(rgyud 'bum): skas 'byed par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du pad+mo rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stongs phrag brgyad tshang bar brjod pa'i
469a7(rgyud 'bum): bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te bzlas pa byas la nam nangs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba
469b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dul bar byed do/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// ci snga ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji
469b2(rgyud 'bum): ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa bya'o/ / de nas nam nongs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// ri ste las sgrub par 'dod na
469b3(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas las thams cad rus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// pad+ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga
469b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / // de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phag rnams bzhi byas la 'bum
469b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du mchod pa byas te de bzhin du bsgrubs la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig
469b6(rgyud 'bum): thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas nam nangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po cha byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byin nas dbang bskur ba smin pa
469b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rigs 'dzin gyi 'khor lo skur bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ci ste phyag rgya sgrub par
470a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na yang de bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs na bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
470a2(rgyud 'bum): pas gsungs so/ / ci ste nor bu ye shes sgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rim pa bzhin du bsgom par byas te/ dngos po med pa'i nam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung ba rin
470a3(rgyud 'bum): po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o/ / de nas zla ba'i mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyi mtshan
470a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o/ / de nas nam nangs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so//
470a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas las sgrub pa bshad de/ de bzhin du bzlas pa zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam nangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur
470a6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// nor bu'i rigs kyi nye bar spyad pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas rim
470a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi thun mong du sgrub pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// snying po sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
470b1(rgyud 'bum): grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o/ / de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang cho ga ste phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga' bar 'gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig
470b2(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag rgya bcings te ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ste/ spros pa med pa'i tshig grub par gyur
470b3(rgyud 'bum): cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur rig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo// de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ste/ kye
470b4(rgyud 'bum): ma sems can 'di dag thams cad ni ma rig pas mdongs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to zhes smras la/ rig pa ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o//
470b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rigs pa thams cad ji ltar sgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ sems dpa
470b6(rgyud 'bum): gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag gam sems dpar bsgoms na bsgrub pa ba ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
470b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// / de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i tshe ga rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste/ del
471a1(rgyud 'bum): dang po kho na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni/ 'di lnga ste/ nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang / rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa
471a2(rgyud 'bum): dang dngos grub chen po rnams so/ / de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te// gang na gted yod par dgas pa der byag rgyabacings la rang gi ting 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der rdo rje bltabs lnga ban nr-i ste rje
471a3(rgyud 'bum): dra yar bar mthong na den te yod par shes par bya'o/ / de nas rdo rje ljags sgrog gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings tes brkos la ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom
471a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di na rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badz+ra sid+d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnams pa bzhi
471a5(rgyud 'bum): de/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas par 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa dang / ji srid du dga' ba de srid du mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam ma
471a6(rgyud 'bum): la gro ba dang / dpag tshad stong gi steng du lding ba dang / 'og tu 'gro zhing long ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la bskor te slar 'ong ba dang / dpag tshad skyong khor yug gi sems can
471a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang / dang sa po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong khor yug na gnas pa'i bung med thams cad ci dga' bar pang du blangs
471b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dug pa dang / gsar dang / nor bu dang / mu ti la sogs pa'i dbyig thams cad dang / nor thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang cung zad kyang rgal mi nus te bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na/ gzhan
471b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ skyes bu stong phrag bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nang med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu ngaral bab cing lha'i
471b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom
471b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na rdo rje rigs 'dzin ces brjod la
471b5(rgyud 'bum): 'grub pa dang rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gis bskor te slar 'ongs shing bde ba thams
471b6(rgyud 'bum): cad la yongs su spyad pa dang / lo bco brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang / sgra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen pos rig 'dzin du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad
471b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong zhing bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te/ bdag nyid phyag rgya'i
472a1(rgyud 'bum): s nying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis
472a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba sna tshogs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems
472a3(rgyud 'bum): can ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la
472a4(rgyud 'bum): spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
472a5(rgyud 'bum): thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / bde ba dang yid
472a6(rgyud 'bum): bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams so// de la 'di ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen
472a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o/ / de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad
472b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten
472b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun tu bskor te slar 'ongs nas lha ma rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams cad hUM zhes byas pas 'dul bar byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i
472b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing / rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro//
472b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes byed pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por
472b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas grub pa dang dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang dang / rin po che'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnams so// de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de
472b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// las kyi dbang
472b7(rgyud 'bum): gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni bde ba dang yid
473a1(rgyud 'bum): badre ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas la/ de bzhin gshegs
473a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni
473a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub dam pa ste/ de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di dag ni bad+mo'i rigs kyi dadro grub rnam te/ de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang / rang
473a4(rgyud 'bum): du bya ba dang / srung ba dang / pad+mo'i dngos grub rnams so// de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar pad+mo'i 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams
473a5(rgyud 'bum): cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro/ / bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro// byams pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba
473a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad srung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab nus par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid pad+mo'i ting 'dzin du zhugs la pad+mo lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i
473a7(rgyud 'bum): mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad+mo'i gsungs so// de la 'di dag ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub rnams
473b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang / rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs
473b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni/ 'di lta ste/ nyid kyi dbang dbul ba dang / mar me dbul ba dang / ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che sgrub pa'i dngos grub
473b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad
473b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi thun mong ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med
473b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la dang po kho nar ni spyi po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta bar// de 'dra bar ni dngos grub 'dod// de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste/ dngos grub chen
473b6(rgyud 'bum): po kun sbyin no/ / de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten 'dul ba chags bral min// phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las skyes// de yi thabs ni sgom pa ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog
473b7(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur/ / de la 'di ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bden las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas// sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog
474a1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur/ / de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ngo // ma rig mun chags 'di la ni// rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te// de yi thabs ni rgya che bas// dngos grub kun gyi
474a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog thob bo/ / brtag pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
474a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis gsungs so/ / de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang sangs
474a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas mchod/ / 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang
474a5(rgyud 'bum): myur bar ni/ / dam tshig bsrungs na myur du 'grub// de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod
474a6(rgyud 'bum): nams med kyang myur bar ni/ / chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog/ byin na bsod nams thob 'gyur te/
474a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na// myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ba#
474b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// yi ge a la 'jug byed cing // yi ga thams cad/
474b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam bsgom la// rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du// bsgoms na bsod nams thob par 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni
474b3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste// des ni phyag rgya myur 'grub par// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom
474b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shes rab mchog gis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brang ba// ting 'dzin tshig ni rab spros pa// de bsgoms na ni myur ba yang // sngags
474b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rig dang sngags dang khyad par du// khyad par yod pa ma yin te// shes
474b6(rgyud 'bum): rab bsgoms na myur bar ni/ / nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes kyi gsungs so// brtag pa thams cad kyi ya shas kyi dngos grub
474b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud / / de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi// tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur te// de nas tshogs ni 'grub par
475a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang // dkyil 'khor mang po bris pa'i phyir// tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya
475a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur/ / de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rjes su yi rang la sogs tshul// de bzhin dam pa'i chos bklags dang // bzlas pa mang po byas
475a3(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / nges par sngags ni dngos 'grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul las// tshogs ni yongs su
475a4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs nas kyang / / myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na
475a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes rig thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na/ de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// thams cad sems de nyid bdag po/
475a6(rgyud 'bum): sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje ni// sems dpa' brtan pa rang byung gi/ sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'// rdo rje snying khar rab bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags ste// 'di la rdo rje rab tu
475a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// ye shes tshul te mnyam med 'od// snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur te// khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed du// de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin/
475b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sku ni de rnams las// rdo rje sems dpar yang dag 'gyur// sems dpa' dang po de nyid las// mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung // mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che// de las tshul 'di thams
475b2(rgyud 'bum): rang 'byung / / gang gis 'di ni thos gyur la// dad cing 'dzin byed snying khar yang // rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms na ni// da ni myur du grub pa thob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de
475b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud
475b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di gsungs so/ / de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med pa'i// ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pa'i// mi rtog pa yi ye
475b5(rgyud 'bum): shes las/ / brtags pas rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi brtag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// mi rtog gang la rtog bdag nyid// brtags pa rtog pa byung ba ni/
475b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// cho ga bzhin du ri mo bris// rtog pa grub sbyin zhes rdog las// rtog
475b7(rgyud 'bum): las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ / de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud ngo // rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung // pad+mo lo ni de gnas te// de phyir
476a1(rgyud 'bum): rtog la gnas pa ni/ / grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni// mthu yis shin du mchog tu
476a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas// lha rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams
476a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do/ / yid kyis 'dod pa'i cho ga yis// yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te// ting 'dzin sgrub pa snying la gnas// de phyir snying po zhes brjod do// de nas rtog pa thams cad
476a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do/ / ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog/ khrims ni 'da' kha mi phyed bzhin// bdag nyid chen po gzugs brnyan gyis// mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags// de nas rtog
476a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi sngags byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do/ / 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // dbye ba dka' las gsang ba nyid// gsang ba grub phyir brjod pas na// de yi phyir na sngags zhes brjod// de nas rigs
476a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do/ / ma rig pa ni gzhom pa dang // ngag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i phyir// rdzogs shing rig pa'i dngos grub ste// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
476a7(rgyud 'bum): pas gsungs so/ / rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po la sogs pa 'bang ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud do// de la dang po kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te/
476b1(rgyud 'bum): snying po bzlas te 'dag gam mi// gzhan yang rung ste byung ba dang // 'byung dang 'byung gyur gang gis ni// mthong zhing thos 'gyur shes par bya// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ bdag
476b2(rgyud 'bum): gis cho ga ji bzhin du/ / gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings// 'jig rten pa la bltas na ni// gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ lan cig tsam
476b3(rgyud 'bum): yang sngags brjod na/ / 'das dang 'byung dang byang gang yin// rang gi lce la smras 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs
476b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud do// rig pa lan cig brjod na ni// byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams// ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// yid kyi de ni shes pas 'gyur/ rtogs
476b5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi ye shes slu ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so/ / / de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i sku dang / gsungs dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i
476b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud yin no/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar de ltar 'dug nas kyang // skyil mong krung bcas bsgrub bya ste// ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas// sems
476b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni// brkyang bskum
477a1(rgyud 'bum): tshul du gnas byas te/ / shin tu khros nas bsgrub byas na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad+mo'i
477a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/ rdo rje skyil mo krung bcas la// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings nas kyang // ting nge 'dzin gyi skur gyur la// pad+mo byung ba bsgrub par bya// zhes
477a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das pad+mo sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te/ ji ltar 'dug gam nyal ba 'am// 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni// rdo rje rin chen
477a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur na/ / the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do//
477a5(rgyud 'bum): lce ni shin tu mi bskul zhing // so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni// rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing // sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsung gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
477a6(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ / hUM zhes bya ba 'brug sgra bsgrags// khro bo'i ngag ni zab cing bstan// rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal// rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan
477a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag sgrub pa'i rgyud do// dbus mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing // phra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal// ting 'dzin
477b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes snying po yis/ / zlos pa po rnams grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yeng shes kyi snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs
477b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ / shin tu yongs su gsal tshig gis// rtag tu 'dod la brtson byed cing // tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni// myur du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom
477b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya grub pa'i rgyud do// rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das/
477b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi
477b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ / sems can kun la phan pa dang // ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa srung ba'i phyir// khro bo dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
477b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ / de la'ang ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// ji ltar pad+mo ba chags la// dgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa// de ltar bdag
477b7(rgyud 'bum): gis chags skyon yang / / sring mchags pade 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad+mo band pas gsungs so// de la 'dzin nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rlung ngo // nam
478a1(rgyud 'bum): zhig sems can thams cad kyi/ / dgos pa'i don ni kun sgrubs cing // rin chen char ni 'bebs 'gyur zhes// grub na myur bar de 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos
478a2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// ji ltar lang sam 'dug pa 'am// 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni// lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya mchog/ thams
478a3(rgyud 'bum): cad byangan 'grub par 'gyur/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// de lta
478a4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar gnas nas kyang / / ji lta ji ltar byed kyang rung // rdo rje khro bo mdzub mo bcings// gos kyis g.yogs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos
478a5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad+mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do// lag pa g.yon pas pad+mo yi// khu tshur bcings te sbas nas ni// ci dgar myur du pad+mo yi// dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur/
478a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud ngo // g.yon pa'i rin chen khu tshur ni// bcings te dam pa'i
478a7(rgyud 'bum): lag g.yogs la/ / cig bar ni rim gror byed// rin chen dngos grub thob 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba thams cad
478b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud do/ / rang gi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// rdo rje ngag dang rdo rje'i lha// ring por mi thogs mchog 'grub bo// zhes bcom
478b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sgra dang // gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//
478b3(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlab
478b4(rgyud 'bum): par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no// rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsad
478b5(rgyud 'bum): theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i/ / mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs
478b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi phye ma'i rgyud rdzogs so// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan
478b7(rgyud 'bum): las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad po 'jim 'i btab bo// rdo rje byings kyis sems dpa' che// sems can do mchog pa cid can// shAg zu rgyal po ye shes ma/
479a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid khyod phyag tshal// sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don// sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po// sems can don chen dgos pa'i don// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag
479a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal/ / sangs rgyas chos ni chos chen po// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// smra ba chen po rab rig mchog/ sems dpa' chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// las chen srung ba chen po ste// las rnams thams cad
479a3(rgyud 'bum): rab bsgrubs pa/ / bdag nyid chen po 'gro spyod mchog/ sems dpa' rgyud khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol phyin pa khyod kun brnyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa'o// sems dpa' kun te thabs chen po/
479a4(rgyud 'bum): shes rab chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog/ thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// thams cad gtong ba byams pa che// kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya seng ga shAkya
479a5(rgyud 'bum): che/ shAkya shAkya thubs pa che// 'dul ba chen po khyab pa po// 'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mnyes pa// chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste// rdo rje mgon
479a6(rgyud 'bum): po mgon chen po/ / sems can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal// 'od chen sna ba chen po ste// brtson 'grus chen po stobs chen po// dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' mchog/ bde spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal//
479a7(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che// kun bdag thub pa dag pa yi// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sku gsum sku min sgom pa'o//
479b1(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi sku ste sgyu che ba// rdo rje sku khyod phrag 'tshal lo// gsung min gsung ste gsung gis mchog/ gsung gsung gsung min ston pa po// gsung kun shin tu gsung che ba// rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal
479b2(rgyud 'bum): lo/ sems min sems te sems kyi mchog/ sems gsum sems min ston pa po// thams cad sems te sems che ba// rdo rje sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdor min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum pa rjor
479b3(rgyud 'bum): min spyod/ / rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che// rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal// kun khyang srid pa'i rtse mo mchog/ bang gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni// khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che// sna mdzad khyod la phyag
479b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// gang gis skad cig nyin byed ngam// klog gam yang na sgom pa'ang rung // kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni//
479b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
479b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag pos bka' stsal pa'i tshig gsan nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad par
479b7(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul bsna
480a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa'i/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang // 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra
480a2(rgyud 'bum): mo thams cad ji ltar snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par byas nas/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na
480a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ / rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsung ma thag
480a4(rgyud 'bum): tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra ma thams cad ji spad ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi rdo rje dbyings la sog pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo tham ca pas
480a5(rgyud 'bum): bskor bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i ro tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i
480a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bsgo// de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
480a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs
480b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang pos tshogs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ / rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kur la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// pad+mo'i 'khor lo rab du bskor// de nas 'di gsung
480b2(rgyud 'bum): ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo shin tu phra mo ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal pos pad+ma'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur
480b3(rgyud 'bum): to/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs
480b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ / de nas nga'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba 'am sbom pa yang rung // de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ri
480b5(rgyud 'bum): rab ri'i rgyal po rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu btsags par de bzhin gshegs pa thamaca kyi gdan la bzhugs nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar
480b6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kun nas mthong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// mi yi nang du babs nas kyang // dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don// rdo rje'i 'khor lo mchogs
480b7(rgyud 'bum): bskor zhing / / mgon po rab tu sgrub par mdzod// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la bos nas 'di skad ces sasungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang
481a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu 'du bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs
481a2(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas/ phyag ma rdo
481a3(rgyud 'bum): rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rigs thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
481a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi thugs su zhugs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// mdor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
481a5(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// zhugs nas sems can thams cad la// phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang
481a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i
481a7(rgyud 'bum): sku 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das
481b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang / gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang / sems kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cad dang / rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang / yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang /
481b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas thams cad dang / mtshan thams dang / dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba snga'i khung bu thams cad dang / rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thugs rnams su zhugs
481b3(rgyud 'bum): nas zhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rjer
481b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang chub gang na ba der gshegs nas tshang du bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa
481b5(rgyud 'bum): dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir rtswa blangs nas tshad du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sems can brtan pa yi// sems can don ni bdag don mchog/ gang phyir gdul bar dbang brtan rnams/
481b6(rgyud 'bum): mu stegs lta la gnas par mdzad// mdor na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa// lta ba dan pas mdongs pa rnams// ye shes snang bas ngag byas phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas 'dod/
481b7(rgyud 'bum): pa na sprod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad du kye dge sbyong cig byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i drug bsngal drag cing mi bzod pa la bzod par mdzad dam zhes gsol to// de nas bcom
482a1(rgyud 'bum): / ldan 'das kyis rtswa de bting ste steng du bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bos byang chub thob par sgrubs shig/ de nas
482a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der dong nas chad du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur
482a3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di brjod do/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la 'di
482a4(rgyud 'bum): ltar gyur pa de 'di dag brjod do/ / de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po
482a5(rgyud 'bum): la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do/ / de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos/ lha rnams kyi bdag po mthu bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs
482a6(rgyud 'bum): po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang mthun par mdzad cing yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis/ 'di ltar
482a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no snyam du shes par ma byed cing / lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/ lha de dag nyung ngu bsgrubs par bya'i de bzhin
482b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa nyid du ma yin no/ / de legs kyis der mchod pa la 'dod par sgrub bo// de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na ba
482b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byang chub par zhugs pa gang na ba der dong nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/ bcom ldan 'das
482b3(rgyud 'bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te ran gyi gdan 'di las bzhengs la/ lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
482b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bdag po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bo la bla na
482b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par sgrubs shig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub stsol bar mi nus/ ci ste bdag
482b6(rgyud 'bum): cag gis nus par gyur na bdag cag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di
482b7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs so/ / de ni gzugs min gzugs min min// bden min rdzun min gtsang ba yi// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po de
483a1(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rtswa'i gdan las bzhengs te/ lha de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
483a2(rgyud 'bum): grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtog par bya ba sgrubs shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rngo mi thog go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs
483a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ / yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na// byang chub sems ni brtan par byos// sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas la// sangs rgyas su ni bdag sgoms
483a4(rgyud 'bum): shig/ de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu legs so zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i tho rangs 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir
483a5(rgyud 'bum): bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
483a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/ / rdo rje sems dpa'
483a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' che/ / thegs pa chen po'i bdag nyid che// snang ba che zhing dag pa che// mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che/
483b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nA// thabs chen 'du la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che/
483b2(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi bde ba bde ba che// bde mchog thog ma tha ma med// bzhed chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che// legs pa zhes
483b3(rgyud 'bum): bya rab mnyes pa/ / mnyes pa che zhing dgyes pa che// rab dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che
483b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen thams cad mdzes pa che/ / rnam rgyan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gzo brjid gzi badzad che// 'od chen lham pa chen po ste/ rgyal ba'i 'od
483b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bu che/ / sangs rgyas 'ong khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal che ba// rgyal mtshan che bas nor bus gtong // nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan
483b6(rgyud 'bum): yu ba che/ / gtongs po'i mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che// dgyes pargya zhing rab dgyes pa// dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol
483b7(rgyud 'bum): cings dgyes/ / chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos ni chos che ba// sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor ba// sangs rgyas chos te chos ra
484a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ 'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// shes rab ye shes blo gros che// sdigs gcod ra
484a2(rgyud 'bum): gri chen po ste/ sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyud de 'khor lo ni// sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po// dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyis mchog
484a3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dkyil 'khor khyod phyag tshal/ / rdo rje gsung ba gsung ba che// spros med yi ge chen po ste// yi ge med pa bzlas pa che// sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo//
484a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje las te las rab mchog/ las chen las rab byed pa ste// gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che// sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje srung bgo cha che//
484a5(rgyud 'bum): go cha'i mchog ste brten pa che// srung ba che zhing snying po che// sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che// ma rungs thams cad skrag byed
484a6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// srung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che// ngom chog chen po bcings pa che// khu tshur chen
484a7(rgyud 'bum): po phyag rgya che/ / rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya zhing // brjod de mchod de bsting stang bya// gang phyir thog ma tha ma med/
484b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' khyod yin te// khyod la brten nas sangs rgyas dang // dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun// byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas/
484b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las
484b3(rgyud 'bum): ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ / yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing // mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i// bsod nams gang yin de kun kyang // sangs rgyas
484b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub thob par shog/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// rab dad pas ni lan cig tsam// gang gis legs par brjod pa ni// kun kyang sangs rgyas
484b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'gyur/ / zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
484b6(rgyud 'bum): cad gcig tu 'dus te gsungs gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba de byin no/ / rdo rje bag pa blan med// de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyis gsung /
484b7(rgyud 'bum): zag pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so//
485a1(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang /
485a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad dgyes shing mnyes nas bcom ldan
485a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa la mngon par dgyes par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg
